40001001	Kawa hi o liil, hoi sikrella, koon o Jesus Kristeskre phure his. Mank lende his o David un o Abraham.
40001002	O Abrahameskro tchawo his o Isaak. Leskro tchawo his o Jakob. Koleskre tchawe his o Juda un leskre phrala.
40001003	O Juda las tchawen. Kolla his o Perez un o Serach. Lengri dai his i Tamar. O Perez las i tchawes. Kowa his o Esrom. Koleskro tchawo his o Aram.
40001004	Koleskro tchawo his o Aminadab. Koleskro tchawo his o Nason. Koleskro tchawo his o Salmon.
40001005	Koleskro tchawo his o Boas. Koleskri dai his i Rahab. O Boas las i tchawes. Kowa his o Obed. Koleskri dai his i Ruth. O Obed las i tchawes. Kowa his o Isai.
40001006	Koleskro tchawo his o David, ko baro rai. Koleskro tchawo his o Salomo. Koleskri dai his i romni fun o Uria.
40001007	O Salomo las i tchawes. Kowa his o Rehabeam. Koleskro tchawo his o Abia. Koleskro tchawo his o Asaf.
40001008	Koleskro tchawo his o Josafat. Koleskro tchawo his o Joram. Koleskro tchawo his o Usia.
40001009	Koleskro tchawo his o Jotam. Koleskro tchawo his o Ahas. Koleskro tchawo his o Hiskia.
40001010	Koleskro tchawo his o Manasse. Koleskro tchawo his o Amos. Koleskro tchawo his o Josia.
40001011	Koleskre tchawe his o Jojachin un leskre phrala. Ap ko tsiro wan i Israelitarja pandlo, un wan an o them Babilonia anlo.
40001012	Un har jon an o them Babilonia djiwan, was o Shealtiel boldo. Leskro dad his o Jojachin. Un o Shealtiel las i tchawes. Kowa his o Serubabel.
40001013	Koleskro tchawo his o Abihud. Koleskro tchawo his o Eljakim. Koleskro tchawo his o Azor.
40001014	Koleskro tchawo his o Zadok. Koleskro tchawo his o Achim. Koleskro tchawo his o Eliud.
40001015	Koleskro tchawo his o Eleasar. Koleskro tchawo his o Matan. Koleskro tchawo his o Jakobo.
40001016	Koleskro tchawo his o Josef. Koleskri romni his i Maria. Lakro tchawo hi o Jesus. Kowa kharella Kristo.
40001017	Kol tsele phure, kai djiwan jek pal o wawar pal o Abraham un glan o David, his deesh-te-star phure. Un kol tsele phure, kai djiwan jek pal o wawar pal o David un glan ko tsiro, kai wan i Israelitarja an o them Babilonia anlo, his deesh-te-star phure. Un kol tsele phure, kai djiwan jek pal o wawar pal ko tsiro, un glan o Jesus Kristo, his ninna deesh-te-star phure.
40001018	Un jaake his kowa, har o Jesus Kristo boldo was. Leskri dai his i Maria. Lakro pirno his o Josef. Har jon gomme gar romedino his, was i Maria wawartchandes dran o Debleskro Ducho.
40001019	O Josef his i latcho mursh. Un job kamas kek ladj ap late anell. Doleske kamas lo lat tchorchanes te mukell.
40001020	Har leske kowa an o shero trujal djas, was o Debleskro bolepaskro pash leste an i suni, un penas: "Josef, tu Davideskro tchawo, ma traash, te less i Mariat pash tute, te romedineress lat! O tarnepen was dran o Debleskro Ducho an late.
40001021	Un joi lella i tchawes. Tu deh les o lab Jesus. Job lella i doosh peskre menshendar ap peste.
40001022	Kowa lauter was jaake, te well ko lab tchatcho, hoi o Dewel ap peskro rakepaskro penas:
40001023	I tarni tchai, kai gomme kek murshestar an tapedo was, lella i tarnepen. Un jon denn les o lab Emmanuel. Kowa kharella: O Dewel hi mentsa."
40001024	Un o Josef stas pre, un kras jaake, har o Debleskro bolepaskro leske penas. Un job las i Mariat pash peste.
40001025	Jaake raha, har ko tarnepen gar boldo was, tchiwas lo pes gar pash late. Un har o tchawo boldo was, das job les o lab Jesus.
40002001	Ap ko tsiro, har was o Jesus an o foro Betlehem an o them Judea boldo, his o Herodes o baro rai pral o them. Koi wan gosewe mursha dran o them, kai o kham pre djala, un djan an o foro Jerusalem. Jon putchan i menshendar an o foro Jerusalem:
40002002	"Kai hi o tarnepen, kai well o baro rai pral i biboldende? Mer dikam ko bolepaskri momeli ap o bolepen pre te djal, hoi mende sikras, kai job boldo was. Kanna wam kate, te mangas les an."
40002003	Har o baro rai Herodes kowa shunas, trashas lo. Un ninna bud menshe an o foro Jerusalem trashan leha khetne.
40002004	Un o Herodes mukas i tsele bare rashajen un i biboldengre tchatchepangren khetne te well, un putchas lendar, kai ko baro rai boldo wella, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
40002005	Un jon penan leske: "An o foro Betlehem an o them Judea. Jaake tchinas kowa o Debleskro rakepaskro:
40002006	Tu, o foro Betlehem, hoi an o them Judea tchiddo hi, tut hi i baro lab mashkral i tsele forja an o them Judea. Dran tute wella ko baro rai, kai ap mire menshende, o Israel, garda della, jaake har i bakrengro rai garda della ap peskre bakre."
40002007	Palle mukas o Herodes kol gosewe murshen tchorchanes pash peste te anell, te putchell lo lendar, kaana ko bolepaskri momeli diklo was.
40002008	Un job penas lenge: Djan an o foro Betlehem un rodenn ko tarnepen! Un te hatsan les, penenn les mange, te nai wap me ninna, te mangap les an.
40002009	Un har jon kowa lestar shunan, djan le dureder. Un glan lende djas ko bolepaskri momeli, hoi jon an pengro them dikan. Un kote, kai o tarnepen hi, atchas koi bolepaskri momeli pral wergal tardo.
40002010	Un har jon koi bolepaskri momeli koi tardo dikan, wan le o tselo djijestar bachtelo.
40002011	Un jon djan an ko kheer, un dikan kote o tarnepas un leskri dat, i Mariat. Un jon witsran pen glan leste tele, mangan les an, un tchiwan ko kutch brawlepen glan leste, hoi dan le leste. Un kowa his sonakai, kutch kasht, hoi sungella mishto, ninna wawar kutch kasht, hoi wella djet lestar kerdo.
40002012	Un an i suni penas o Dewel lenge, te djan le gar pash o Herodeste pale. Jaake djan le penge, te wenn le ap i wawar drom an pengro them pale.
40002013	Un har jon penge djan, was o Debleskro bolepaskro pash o Josefeste an i suni, un penas ap leste: "Ste pre! Le o tarnepas un leskri dat, un naash an o them Egiptia! O Herodes mukell o tarnepas te rodell, te marell lo les. Atch koi, bis te penau me les tuke, te wess pale!"
40002014	Un job stas pre an koi rat, las o tarnepas un leskri dat, un djas lentsa an o them Egiptia.
40002015	Un kote atchas lo, jaake raha har o Herodes djido his. Un jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel ap peskro rakepaskro penas: Dran o them Egiptia dom miro tchawes gole.
40002016	I gosewe mursha djan ap i wawar drom an pengro them, un wan gar pash o Herodeste pale. Har job kowa haiwas, was i bari choli ap leste. Un job bitchras lurden an o foro Betlehem un an i gaba trujal, te marenn le kol tsele mursh tchawen, kai dui bersha un tarneder hi. Kol dui bersha his ko tsiro, kai i gosewe mursha leske penan, te was o tchawo boldo bis ko diwes.
40002017	Koi was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jeremia, penas:
40002018	Bari gole un bud ropen shunan le an o gab Rama. I Rahel rowella pral peskre tchawende, un kamell kekestar latche laba te shunell. Lakre tchawe hi buder gar koi.
40002019	An ko tsiro, har o Josef an o them Egiptia his, meras o Herodes. Koi was o Debleskro bolepaskro pash leste an i suni,
40002020	un penas ap leste: "Ste pre! Le o tchawes un leskri dat, un dja pale an o them Israel! Kolla hi mulo, kai kaman o tchawes te marell."
40002021	Un job stas pre, las o tchawes un leskri dat, un djas an o them Israel pale.
40002022	Ap o drom shunas lo, te hi o Archelao kanna o baro rai pral o them Judea. Kowa his o Herodeskro tchawo. Doleske trashas o Josef, te djal lo kote pale. Un o Dewel penas leske an i suni, kai te djal. Un job djas an o them Galilea.
40002023	Un kote djiwas lo an i foro, hoi kharella Nazaret. Un jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro penan: Jon denn les Nazaretari gole.
40003001	An ko tsiro was i mursh an o mulo them an o them Judea. Leskro lab his Johanni. Job hi kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani o Debleske.
40003002	Un job penas i menshenge: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom! O tsiro well sik, kai lell o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win."
40003003	O Johanni hi ko mursh, kolestar o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, penas: Kote hi jek, kai an o mulo them gole della un penella: Krenn o drom o Debleske, te nai well lo pash i menshende! Lenn halauter krik, hoi o Debleske an o drom tchiddo hi.
40003004	I plashka dran fichengre balla his ap leste. Un i ledertikri dori his trul leste. Un leskro chapen his gwin un tikne stepangre, kai stenn an o senlepen trujal.
40003005	Un bud menshe djan pash leste. Kolla wan dran o foro Jerusalem un dran o tselo them Judea un dran o them pash o pani Jordan.
40003006	Un jon penan glan i menshende hawo tchilatcho koowa jon kran, un mukan pen lestar an o pani Jordan te thowell, te sikrenn le, kai mukan le pengro tchilatcho drom.
40003007	Ninna bud Farisarja un Saddukarja wan pash leste, te mukenn le pen lestar an o pani te thowell. Har job kolen dikas, penas lo ap lende: "Tumer tchilatche sapa! Tumer nai nashenn gar krik glan o Debleskri choli, hoi wella pral i menshende.
40003008	Sikrenn i menshende, te djan tumer ap o Debleskro drom un buder gar ap o tchilatcho drom!
40003009	Ma penenn: O Abraham hi maro dad! Me penau tumenge: O Dewel nai krell dran kal barra o Abrahameskre tchawen.
40003010	Tumer han har ruka, kai wenna tele dino. I tower hi koi tchiddo, te well ko tselo ruk tele dino. Hako ruk, hoi hidjella kek latcho koowa, well tele dino, un an i jag witsedo.
40003011	Me thowau tumen an o pani. Kowa sikrella, kai tumer mukan tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan kanna ap o Debleskro drom. Pal mande well jek, kowa hi sorleder har me. Un me hom gar moldo, te hidjrap leskre tircha leske. Kowa tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende. Kowa hi har i jag.
40003012	Job hi har i hacho, kai rikrell i witsepaskri an peskro wast, te witsrell lo o djob pral, jaake te perell o phuss tele ap i phub. Peskro djob anell lo an peskro djobeskro kheer dre. Un i phuss chatchrell lo an i jag, hoi hako tsiro chatchella."
40003013	Ap ko tsiro was o Jesus dran o them Galilea pash o pani Jordan, te mukell lo pes o Johannestar an o pani te thowell.
40003014	Kowa kamas les gar an o pani te thowell. Job penas ap leste: "Tu hunte thowals man an o pani. Hoske wal tu pash mande, te thowap tut an o pani?"
40003015	Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Muk kowa kanna jaake te well! Hi mishto menge, te kras kowa lauter, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella." Un o Johanni kras, hoi o Jesus leske penas,
40003016	un thowas o Jesuses an o pani. Har o Jesus dran o pani pral djas, djas o bolepen pre. Un job dikas o Debleskro Ducho har i parno tchirklo ap peste tele te well.
40003017	Un i rakepen dran o bolepen penas: "Kawa hi miro tchawo, kai me kamau. Pral leste hom me bachtelo."
40004001	Pal kowa anas o Debleskro Ducho o Jesuses an o mulo them, kai kamas les o beng o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell.
40004002	Un star-deesh (40) diwessa un ratsja chas o Jesus tchi. Un palle was les i bari bok.
40004003	Koi was o beng pash leste, un penas: "Te hal tu o Debleskro tchawo, rake ap kol barra, te well lendar maro!"
40004004	Penas o Jesus: "An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O maro kokres rikrell i menshes gar djido. Job djiwell dran hako lab, hoi o Dewel rakrella."
40004005	Pal kowa anas les o beng an o Debleskro foro. Kowa hi o foro Jerusalem. Un o beng tchiwas les ap o Debleskro baro kheer pral pre,
40004006	un penas ap leste: "Te hal tu o Debleskro tchawo, muk tut tele te perell! An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penas ap peskre bolepangre, te hidjenn le tut lengre wastentsa, te dukreh tu tire pire gar ap i barra."
40004007	Penas o Jesus: "Ninna hi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: Rike o Debles gar dineleske, te sikrell lo tut har sorelo job hi."
40004008	Pal kowa anas les o beng ap i bari berga pre, un sikras les i tsele themma ap i phub un lengro brawlepen,
40004009	un penas: "Kawa lauter kamau tut te dell, te pereh tu glan mande tele, un mangeh man an."
40004010	Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Dja tuke mandar! An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Tu mangess o Debles an, - job hi tiro rai, - un wess leske kokres koi!"
40004011	Koi djas peske o beng. Un bolepangre wan pash o Jesuseste, un his leske koi.
40004012	Un har o Jesus shunas, te was o Johanni stildo, djas lo dran o them Judea win, un djas pale an o them Galilea.
40004013	Kote atchas lo gar an o foro Nazaret. Job djas dureder un djiwas an o foro Kapernaum, hoi pash o baro pani Genezaret tchiddo hi. Kowa hi an i themma Sebulon un Naftali tchiddo.
40004014	Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, glan i raha tsiro penas:
40004015	Tumer menshe an i themma Sebulon un Naftali, tumer, kai djiwenna pash o baro pani, an o them wergal o pani Jordan, tumer djiwenn kote, kai kolla djiwenna, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar.
40004016	Tumenge hi ko lab, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro penas: Tumer djiwenna an i rati, un dikenna i bari momeli. Jaake har o kham pre djala, wella i momeli pash kolende, kai hi len traash o merepastar.
40004017	Ap ko tsiro penas o Jesus ap i menshende: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom! O tsiro well sik, kai lell o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win."
40004018	Un har job pash o baro pani an o them Galilea djas, dikas lo kote dui phralen: O Simon, kai kharella ninna Petro, un leskro phrales, o Andreas. Kolla his matchepangre, un witsran pengre matchengre gone an o pani, te taprenn le matchen.
40004019	Un job penas ap lende: "Awenn mantsa! Me krau tumendar menshen, kai anenn wawaren pash mande."
40004020	Har jon kowa shunan, mukan le pengre matchengre gone, un djan leha.
40004021	Un job djas dureder, un dikas dui wawar phralen: O Jakobo un o Johanni. Kolengro dad hi o Zebedeo. Jon his pash pengro dadeste an o panjeskro ulepaskro beshdo, un kran i matchengre gone tseles. Un job das len gole.
40004022	Un sik stan le pre, mukan o panjeskro ulepaskro un pengro dades, un djan leha.
40004023	Un job djas an o tselo them Galilea trujal, un rakras an i biboldengre kangria, un penas i menshenge ko latcho lab, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well. Un job kras lauteren sasto, kai mank lende nasselo hi.
40004024	Un ninna an o tselo them Siria shunan le lestar. Un jon anan lauteren pash leste, kai nasselo hi. Mashkral lende his kolla, kai hi len bare duka, un kolla, kai hi an lende benga, un kolla, kai hi nasselo an pengro shero, un kolla, kai hi bango. Un job kras len sasto.
40004025	Un bud menshe djan leske palla. Jon wan dran o them Galilea, un dran ko them, kai i deesh forja tchiddo hi. Jon wan ninna dran o them Judea, un dran o foro Jerusalem, un dran o them, hoi ap i wawar rig o panjestar Jordan tchiddo hi.
40005001	Un har job kol tsele menshe dikas, djas lo ap i berga pre, un beshas pes tele. Un leskre mala wan pash leste, te shunenn les le.
40005002	Un job penas ap lende:
40005003	Bachtele hi kolla, kai djinenna, kai hi le tchorwelo glan o Debleste. Jon djiwenna o Debleha khetne an o bolepen un lenn leskro brawlepen.
40005004	Bachtele hi kolla, kai kanna rowenna. O Dewel lell lengri duk dran lengro dji.
40005005	Bachtele hi kolla, kai kek tchingepen krenna. O Dewel dell len i tseli phub.
40005006	Bachtele hi kolla, kai kanna pal o tchatchepen bokenna un trushenna. O Dewel krell len tchalo.
40005007	Bachtele hi kolla, kai hi len i baro dji i wawar menshenge. O Debles hi i baro dji lenge.
40005008	Bachtele hi kolla, kai hi len i djudjo dji. Jon dikenn o Debles pengre jakentsa.
40005009	Bachtele hi kolla, kai krenna, te well kek tchingepen mank i menshende. O Dewel kharell len peskre tchawe.
40005010	Kolla, kai krenn, hoi o Dewel kamella, un doleske lenn len i menshe palla, kolla hi bachtelo! Jon djiwenna o Debleha khetne an o bolepen.
40005011	Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske praassenn le tumen, lenn tumen palla, un rakrenn chochene tchilatche laba pral tumende. Te krenn le kowa, awenn bachtele!
40005012	Giwenn un denn gole i bachtjatar ap ko diwes! O Dewel dell tumen i baro brawlepen an o bolepen. Jaake har jon tumen palla lenna, jaake lan le o Debleskre rakepangren an o phuro tsiro ninna palla.
40005013	Tumer han o loon ap kai phub. Te nashras o loon peskri soor, hi lo buder gar mishto. Un tu nai kreh buder tchi, te well lo pale londo. Ko loon molell tchi buder. Tu nai witsreh les tutar. Un i menshe stakrenn les khetne.
40005014	Tumer han i momeli ap kai phub. Un i foro, hoi pral ap i berga hi, nai atchell gar khatedo.
40005015	Kek chatchell i momeli an un tchiwell lat tel i piri. Na-a, job tchiwell lat ap i momelengri, te well koi momeli diklo hakenestar, kai an o kheer hi.
40005016	Jaake hunte wenn tumer har i momeli, hoi chatchell glan i menshende, te dikenn le, hawo latcho koowa tumer lauter krenna, un te sharenn le o Debles, kai hi tumaro dad an o bolepen.
40005017	Haiwenn man mishto: Me wom gar, te tchiwap kol laba ap i rig, hoi o Mose un o Debleskre rakepangre penan. Na-a! Ko krau me gar. Me wom, te krap kowa, hoi jon penan.
40005018	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Jaake raha har o bolepen un i phub atchenna, jaake raha well tchi krik lino kol labendar, hoi o Mose un kol Debleskre rakepangre penan. Witar gar o tikneder lab well krik lino jaake raha, bis te well lauter tchatcho, hoi glan i raha tsiro penlo was.
40005019	Koon jek kol tikneder labendar ap i rig tchiwella, un i menshenge kowa jaake penella, kowa hi o tikneder mashkral kolende, kai djiwenn khetne o Debleha an o bolepen. Koon krella, hoi o Dewel penas, un sikrell kowa i menshende, kowa wella bares mashkral kolende, kai djiwenn khetne o Debleha an o bolepen.
40005020	Un me penau tumenge: Tumer nai djiwenn gar o Debleha khetne an o bolepen, te krenn tumer gar, hoi o Dewel kamella. Un tumer hunte krenn kowa feteder, har i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja kowa krenna.
40005021	Tumer djinenna, te was ap i phurende penlo: Ma mare kekes! Koon jekes marella, kowa hunte well glan o tchatchepaskro anlo, un lell peskri phagi.
40005022	Me penau tumenge: Koon ap peskro phraleste chojedo hi, kowa hunte well glan o tchatchepaskro anlo. Un koon peskro phrales praassella, kowa hunte well glan i pralstune tchatchepangre anlo. Un koon penella: Dja tuke pash o bengeste! kowa wella an o bengeskri jag witsedo.
40005023	Te djah tu an o Debleskro baro kheer, te dess o Debles tchomone, un kote djal tuke an o shero trujal, te hi tiro phraal chojedo ap tute,
40005024	palle muk kowa tchiddo, hoi tu kamal o Debles te dell! Dja pash tiro phraleste, un dik, te wenn tumer pale mishto khetne! Un palle de kowa, hoi tu anal, o Debleste!
40005025	Te hi tut sijaan pash jekeste, un hal leha ap o drom pash o tchatchepaskro, palle plaisse tiri sijaan jaake raha, har hal tu leha ap o drom, te nai dell job tut gar an o tchatchepaskro wast! Un kowa dell tut an o klisteskro wast. Un kowa witsrell tut an o stilepen!
40005026	Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Tu weh gar dran o stilepen win jaake raha, har tu plaissral gar tiri tseli sijaan.
40005027	"Tumer djinenna, kai was glan i raha tsiro ap i phurende penlo: Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha!
40005028	Me penau tumenge: Koon ap i wawareskri romjate dikella, te sowell lo laha, kowa chochas lat an peskro dji.
40005029	Te kamell tiro jak tchomone te dikell, hoi anell tut ap i tchilatcho drom, palle tchin lat win, un witse lat tutar! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress jek jak, har te wess an o bengeskri jag witsedo.
40005030	Un te kamell tiro tchatcho wast, te kress i tchilatcho koowa, palle de les tele, un witse les tutar! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress tu jek wast, har te djas an o bengeskri jag.
40005031	Glan i raha tsiro was ap i phurende penlo: Kowa, kai peskri romjat mukella, kowa dell lat i liil, te nai djal li peske.
40005032	Me penau tumenge: Kones hi i romni, kai chochas les gar i wawar mursheha, un job mukell lat, kowa krell, te lell li i wawares. Un jaake anell li doosh ap peste. Un kowa, kai romedinerell i mukli djuwjat, kowa anell doosh ap peste, te las lo i wawareskri romjat.
40005033	Tumer djinenn ninna, kai was glan i raha tsiro ap i phurende penlo: De kek chocheni sowel tele! Un kowa, hoi tu o Debleske sowel dal, te kress ninna!
40005034	Me penau tumenge: Ma denn tumen sowel! Ma denn gole ap o bolepen, te shunell lo tumari sowel! O Dewel hi kote o rai.
40005035	Ma denn gole ap i phub, te shunell li tumari sowel! O Dewel hi ninna kote o rai. Ma denn gole ap o foro Jerusalem, te shunell lo tumari sowel! Kowa hi o Debleskro foro.
40005036	Ma denn witar kek sowel ap tumaro shero! Tumer nai krenn kek bal ap tumaro shero kalo un kek bal parno.
40005037	Te penenn tumer: Awa! jaake hunte well kowa ninna: Awa! Un te penenn tumer: Na-a! jaake hunte well kowa ninna: Na-a! Hako lab, hoi koi pral wergal hi, well o bengestar.
40005038	Tumer djinenna, kai was glan i raha tsiro ap i phurende penlo: Koon dukrell i wawares, koleske kress, har job kras un gar budeder: Te dukras lo i wawareskro jak, palle duke leske jek jak kokres. Te dukras lo i wawareskro dand, palle duke leske jek dand kokres.
40005039	Me penau tumenge: Ma hadenn tumaro wast ap koleste, kai kras tumen tchilatcho koowa! Te das tuke jek ap i tchatchi tcham, koleske rike ninna i serwi koi, te dell lo tut!
40005040	Un kowa, kai anell tut glan i tchatchepangre, te lell lo tiro gad, koles de ninna tiri plashka!
40005041	Un te kamell jek tutar, te djas tu jek kotar drom leha, jaake dja leha dui kope jaake dur ap o drom!
40005042	Te mangell jek tutar tchomone, palle de les kowa! Ma bitche koles tutar, kai kamell tutar lowe te patsell!
40005043	Tumer djinenna, kai glan i raha tsiro i phurenge penlo was: Ab latches ap koleste, kai pash tute hi! Ma ab latches ap koleste, kai kras tchilatcho koowa ap tute.
40005044	Me penau tumenge: Awenn latches kolenge, kai kran tchilatcho koowa ap tumende! Mangenn o Debles kolenge, kai lenn tumen palla!
40005045	Jaake han tumer tchatchepaha tchawe o baro Deblestar, kai hi tumaro dad an o bolepen. Job mukella o kham pre te djal kol tchilatchenge un kol latchenge. Un job dell brishin ap kolende, kai pal o tchatchepen djiwenna, ninna ap kolende, kai tchilatcho koowa krenna.
40005046	Tumer te wenn latches kolenge, kai kran latcho koowa ap tumende, patsenn tumer, kai o Dewel sharell tumen? Na-a! Ninna i chochene hi latches kolenge, kai ap lende latches hi.
40005047	Tumer te han latches ap tumare phralende kokres, palle krenn tumer, hoi lauter krenna. Ninna kolla, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar, krenn kowa, hoi tumer krenna.
40005048	Tumer hunte wenn jaake latches ap i menshende, har tumaro dad an o bolepen hi latches ap i menshende.
40006001	Denn jak, har krenn tumer latcho koowa! Ma krenn les jaake, te dikenn i menshe kowa un sharenn tumen! Koon tumendar kowa krella, koles dell tumaro dad an o bolepen kek latchepen pale.
40006002	Tu te deh i tchorweles lowe, palle ma pen kowa hakeneske! Ma kre har kolla, kai hi len dui djia, un penenn an i biboldengre kangria un ap o drom, hawo latchepen jon kran, te wenn le i menshendar sharedo. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kolla lenna buder tchi o Deblestar. Jon anan pengro latchepen kokres dre.
40006003	-
40006004	Tu te deh i tchorweles lowe, palle kre les tchorchanes, te djinell les kek! Muk tiro serwo wast gar te djinell, hoi tiro tchatcho wast kras! O Dewel, kai hi tiro dad an o bolepen, dikell ninna kowa, hoi tu tchorchanes kral. Un job dell tut ko latchepen pale, hoi tu kral.
40006005	Tu te rakreh o Debleha, palle ma kre kowa har kolla, kai hi len dui djia. Jon kamenn, te dikenn len i menshe, har jon an i biboldengre kangria un ap o drom tardo hi, un o Debleha rakrenna. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kolla lenna tchi o Deblestar. Jon anan pengro latchepen kokres dre.
40006006	Tu te rakreh o Debleha, palle dja an tiri isema, klide o wudar pal tute, un kote rake o Debleha! Un o baro Dewel, kai hi tiro dad an o bolepen, dikell tut kote. Un job dell ko latchepen pale, hoi tu kral.
40006007	Tumer te rakrenn o Debleha, palle penenn leske gar bud laba, jaake har kolla krenna, kai prindjrenn o tchatcho Debles gar. Jon patsenna, te rakrenn le bud, palle shunell len lengro dewel.
40006008	Ma krenn kowa jaake har jon! Un o baro Dewel, kai hi tumaro dad an o bolepen, djinella, hoi hunte well tumen djipaske. Job djinella kowa glan ko tsiro, kai tumer les mangenna.
40006009	Tumer te rakrenn o Debleha, penenn: Maro dad an o bolepen. Tiro lab well sharedo!
40006010	Te well ko tsiro sik, kai tu o rai hal pral i tseli phub! Te krenn i menshe ap i phub kowa, hoi tu kameh, jaake har ninna kolla an o bolepen krenn, hoi tu kameh!
40006011	De men maro hako diwes!
40006012	Un biste mari doosh, hoi mer ap mende anam! Un ninna mer bistrah o tchilatchepen, hoi i wawar ap mende kran.
40006013	Ma muk men tiro dromestar tele te djal! Le men dran o bengeskro wast win!
40006014	Tumer te bistrenn o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kran, palle bistrell tumaro dad an o bolepen ninna o tchilatchepen, hoi tumer kran.
40006015	Tumer te bistrenn gar o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kran, palle bistrell tumaro dad an o bolepen, witar gar o tchilatchepen, hoi tumer kran.
40006016	Te chan tumer i tikno tsiro tchi, te mangenn o Debles an, palle krenn kowa gar jaake, te dikenn i menshe kowa! Ma krenn har kolla, kai hi len dui djia! Jon sikrenn ap pengro mui, te bokenn le pengro Debleske. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kolla lenna tchi o Deblestar. Jon anan pengro latchepen kokres dre.
40006017	Tu te chah tchi an ko tsiro, kai tu o Debleha rakreh, palle thob tiro mui, mak tire balla har hako diwes,
40006018	te dikenn i menshe gar, kai tu bokeh o Debleske. Un o baro Dewel, kai hi tiro dad an o bolepen, djinella, hoi tu leske kreh. Job dikell tut, un dell tut o latchepen pale, hoi tu leske kral.
40006019	Anenn tumenge kek brawlepen ap i phub khetne! Kote hi i kerme, hoi i ripja chana. Koi krell o pani o saster paash. Kote hi i tchorepangre, kai tchorenn tumaro brawlepen.
40006020	Anenn tumenge brawlepen an o bolepen khetne, kai kek tchorepaskro tumaro koowa hatsella! Un kek kerme, witar kek pani krell les paash.
40006021	Kote, kai tiro brawlepen hi, kote hi ninna tiro dji.
40006022	O mensheskro jak hi har i momeli an i kheer. Te dikeh kokres ap o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te chatchell koi momeli mishto.
40006023	Te dikeh ap wawar koowa, un gar ap o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te chatchell kek momeli an kau kheer. Te chatchell tiri momeli buder gar, djiweh tu har an i kali rat.
40006024	Kek budrell nai dui rajenge. Te wals kowa jaake, budrals lo ko jekeske mishto, un ko wawareske gar mishto. Ko jekes kamals job gar, kol wawares kamals job o djijestar. Tu nai budreh gar o Debleske un rodeh tiro brawlepen.
40006025	Doleske penau me tumenge: Ma darenn tumaro djipaske! Ma darenn, te well tumen tchi te chal un tchi te pijell, witar gar, te well tumen tchi an-ripaske! O djipen hi budeder moldo har o chapen. Un o mensho hi budeder moldo har o ripen.
40006026	Dikenn ap i tchirkle! Jon witsrenn kek djob an i phub, te well lo baro. Witar gar anenn le o baro djob dre, te tchiwenn le les an o djobeskro kheer. Tumaro dad an o bolepen dell len te chal. Un tumer han budeder moldo har jon.
40006027	Kek tumendar nai tchiwell jek diwes budeder pash peskro djipen pashal!
40006028	Hoske trashenn tumen, te well tumen tchi an-ripaske? Dikenn, har ap o senlepen shukar blume baro wenna! Jon budrenna gar un krenn penge kek ripja.
40006029	O baro rai Salomo an peskro tselo railepen his gar jaake shukar an-rido har jek lendar.
40006030	O Dewel kras o senlepen jaake shukar, hoi kau diwes win tardo hi, un o wawar diwes an o bob witsedo wella. Kitse kope budeder nai dell lo tumen an-ripaske! Hoske hi tumaro patsepen jaake tikno?
40006031	Ma darenn un ma penenn: Hoi chas? Hoi pijas? Hoi riwas?
40006032	Kowa krenn kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Tumaro dad an o bolepen djinella, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske.
40006033	Mukenn o Debles o rai pral tumende te well, un krenn lauter, hoi job kamella! Un o Dewel dell tumen lauter, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske.
40006034	Doleske penau tumenge: Ma darenn kowa, hoi taissar wella! Mukenn o wawar diwes ap tumende te well, un palle dikenna, hoi te krenn! Hako diwes hi tumen doha hidjepaske.
40007001	Ma sikrenn ap i wawarengri doosh! Un o Dewel dikell gar ap tumari doosh.
40007002	Te hi tumen i baro dji i wawarenge, hi o Debles ninna i baro dji tumenge. Hi tumen kek baro dji lenge, hi o Debles witar gar i baro dji tumenge.
40007003	Hoske kameh tu i tikno kasht dran tiro phraleskro jak win tsardell, un tu dikeh gar o baro kasht an tiro jak?
40007004	Har nai peneh tu ap leste: Miro phraal, am kai! Me kamau ko tikno kasht dran tiro jak win tsardell. Un tu dikeh gar o baro kasht an tiro jak.
40007005	Tu chocheno! Tu kreh, har te wals tu latcheder har job. Le ko baro kasht dran tiro jak win, palle nai leh tu o tikno kasht dran tiro phraleskro jak win!
40007006	Ma witsrenn gar o Debleskro brawlepen glan i djuklende, te djan jon gar ap tumende pre! Ma witsrenn gar i kutch barra glan i balende, te stakrenn le len gar i pirentsa khetne.
40007007	Mangenn o Debles! Un o Dewel dell tumen! Rodenn les! Un tumer hatsenn les. Denn ap o wudar, un kowa well tumenge pre kerdo!
40007008	Koon mangella, kowa lella. Koon rodella, kowa hatsella. Un koon ap o wudar della, koleske well pre kerdo.
40007009	Mashkral tumende hi kek mursh, kai dell peskro tchawes i bar, te mangas job lestar i kotar maro.
40007010	Witar gar dell kek dad peskro tchawes i sap an o wast, te mangas job lestar i matcho.
40007011	Ninna te han tumer tchilatche menshe, denn tumer tumare tchawen latcho koowa. Har bud budeder dell tumaro dad an o bolepen latcho koowa kolen, kai les mangenna.
40007012	Lauter, hoi tumer kamenna, te krenn i menshe tumenge, kowa krenn tumer lenge ninna! Te krenn tumer kowa, jaake krenn tumer lauter kowa, hoi o Mose un i Debleskre rakepangre penan.
40007013	Djan an o tikno wudar dre! Nashedo hi kolla, kai djan an o baro wudar ap o buchlo drom. Un bud djan koi.
40007014	Tikno hi ko wudar un gar buchlo hi ko drom, kai i menshe hatsenn o djipen. Un gar bud hi kolla, kai ap ko drom djana.
40007015	Denn jak, te patsenn gar kol chochene rakepangren, kai penenn, te wans le o Deblestar bitchedo! Jon krenn, har te wans le tumare phrala. An lengro dji hi le diwje djukle, kai marenna.
40007016	Ap kowa, hoi jon krenna, dikenn tumer, har jon hi. Ap i subjengro ruk wenna kek drake baro. Witar gar wenna faige baro ap subjengre burra.
40007017	Jaake well latcho koowa dran i latcho ruk, un djungelo koowa dran i nasselo ruk.
40007018	Dran i latcho ruk well kek djungelo koowa. Un dran i nasselo ruk well kek latcho koowa.
40007019	Hako ruk, kai well kek latcho koowa dran leste, well tele dino, un an i jag witsedo.
40007020	Ap kowa, hoi dran lende wella, dikenna, har jon hi.
40007021	Kolen, kai penenn ap mande Rai, rai lell o Dewel gar lauter pash peste an o bolepen. Na-a! Kolla kokres, kai krenna, hoi miro dad an o bolepen kamella, kolen lell lo an o bolepen.
40007022	Well ko diwes, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende wi-rakrella. Ap ko diwes penenna bud ap mande: Rai, rai, an tiri soor penam mer i menshenge, hoi o Dewel menge penas. An tiri soor tradam i bengen win, un kram bud baro sorelo koowa.
40007023	Palle penau lenge: Me prindjrau tumen gar. Djan mandar, tumer tchilatche!
40007024	Hakeno, kai mire laba shunella un kowa krella, hoi me penau, kowa hi jaake har i gosewo mursh, kai peskro kheer ap i sorelo baro bar kras.
40007025	Har das sorelo brishin, un bud pani was, un i sorelo ducho phurdas ap ko kheer, koi peras ko kheer gar khetne. Kowa his ap i sorelo baro bar tardo.
40007026	Hakeno, kai mire laba shunella un kowa gar krella, hoi me penau, kowa hi har i dinelo, kai peskro kheer ap i tchik kras.
40007027	Har das sorelo brishin, un bud pani was, un i sorelo ducho phurdas ap ko kheer, koi peras ko tselo kheer khetne."
40007028	Un har o Jesus kowa lauter penas, kran kol bud menshe, kai trul leste his, bare jaka.
40007029	Job rakras bari sorjaha, un gar jaake har lengre tchatchepangre rakran.
40008001	Un o Jesus djas i berga tele, un bud menshe djan leske palla.
40008002	Kote was i mursh pash leste. Koles his i djungelo nasslepen ap peskro mass. Un job witsras pes glan o Jesuseste tele ap i phub, un mangas lestar: "Rai, te kameh tu, nai kreh man sasto."
40008003	Un o Jesus tchiwas peskro wast ap leste, un penas: "Me kamau, te wess sasto." Un ap jek kopo djas ko nasslepen lestar.
40008004	Un o Jesus penas ap leste: "Shun, pen kekeske, hoi me tuke krom! Dja an o Debleskro baro kheer pash o rashajeste un sike leste, kai tiro nasslepen tutar djas! Un aan kowa glan o Debleste, hoi o Mose penas, te djinenn i menshe, kai tu sasto wal."
40008005	Un o Jesus djas dureder, un was an o foro Kapernaum. Kote was i pralstuno lurdo pash leste, un mangas les:
40008006	"Rai, miro budepaskro hi khere tchiddo, un hi bango, jaake te nai djal lo buder gar. Un les hi bare duka."
40008007	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Me kamau tuha te djal, un kamau les sasto te krell."
40008008	Koi penas o pralstuno lurdo: "Me hom gar moldo, te wess tu pash mande. Te peneh tu jek lab, jaake well miro budepaskro sasto.
40008009	Jaake har me ninna hunte shunap ap mire pralstunende, jaake hi man ninna lurde, kai hunte krenn, hoi me penau. Me te penau ap jekeste: Dja koi! palle djal lo. Me te penau ap i wawareste: Am kai! palle well lo. Me te penau ap miro budepaskro: Kre kowa! palle krell job kowa."
40008010	Har o Jesus kowa shunas, kras lo bare jaka, un penas ap kolende, kai leha djan: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Sawo patsepen hatsom pash kekeste an o tselo them Israel.
40008011	Bud menshe wenna dran bud wawar themma pash o Debleste an o bolepen, un beshenn pen tele, te chan le o Abrahameha un o Isaakeha, un o Jakobeha khetne.
40008012	Un i biboldendar wenna bud an i kali rat win witsedo. Un jon rowenna, un dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne."
40008013	Un palle penas o Jesus ap o pralstuno lurdo: "Dja khere! jaake har tu patsal, jaake well kowa." Un ap kau tsiro was leskro budepaskro sasto.
40008014	Un o Jesus djas an o Petreskro kheer. Kote dikas lo koleskri romjakri dai. Joi his ap o tchiben tchiddo un lakro shero his tato.
40008015	Un job tapras lakro wast, un ko nasslepen djas latar. Un joi stas pre, un anas lenge i chapen.
40008016	Un har i rati was, anan le bud menshen pash leste, kai hi benga an lende. Un job rakras soreles ap i bengende, te djan le dran i menshende win. Un jon wan win. Ninna kras lo lauteren sasto, kai nasselo hi.
40008017	Jaake was kowa tchatches, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, glan i raha tsiro penas: Job las mare duka, un maro nasslepen mendar.
40008018	Un har o Jesus bud menshe trul peste dikas, penas lo peskre malenge: "Uleras ap i wawar panjeskri rig!"
40008019	Koi was i biboldengro tchatchepaskro pash leste un penas: "Sikepaskro, me kamau tuha te djal, kai tu ninna djah."
40008020	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "I diwje djuklen hi i tchiben an i phub, kai sowenn le. Un i tchirklen hi tikne khera ap i ruka. Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, man hi tchi, kai nai tchiwap man tele, te sowap."
40008021	Un i wawar, jek leskre malendar, penas ap leste: "Rai, muk man khere te djal, te paskrap miro dades! Pal kowa wau tuha."
40008022	Penas o Jesus: "Muk i mule pengre mulen te paskrell! Dja tu mantsa!"
40008023	Un o Jesus djas an o panjeskro ulepaskro. Un leskre mala djan leha.
40008024	Har jon ap o pani his, phurdas ap jek kopo i baro sorelo ducho pral o baro pani. Un o pani was diwjo, un djas pre te tele, un djas pral o ulepaskro wergal. Un o Jesus sowas.
40008025	Palle djan jon pash leste, djangran les pre, un penan ap leste: "Rai! Le men kate win! Mer tassah."
40008026	Koi penas lo: "Hoske trashenn tumer? Kai hi tumaro patsepen?" Un job stas pre, un penas ap ko sorelo ducho, hoi phurdas pral o pani: "Atch kanna!" Un ap o baro pani penas lo: "Muk tele!" Un o sorelo ducho phurdas buder gar, un o pani his buder gar diwjo.
40008027	Un peskre mala kran bare jaka un putchan pendar: "Hawo mursh hi kowa! Ninna o sorelo ducho un o baro pani shunenn ap leste."
40008028	Un jon wan ap i wawar panjeskri rig, an o them Gadara. Un dui mursha nashan dran i mulengre khera win, un wan pash o Jesuseste. Kolen hi benga an lende. Un jon hi jaake tchilatcho, te nai djas kek an lengro drom.
40008029	Un jon dan gole: "Hoi kameh tu mendar, Debleskro tchawo? Wal tu pash mende, te dukress men tu glan o tsiro, kai rakrell o Dewel i phagi pral mende win?"
40008030	Dur lendar his bud bale ap i berga.
40008031	Un kol benga mangan les: "Tu te tradeh men dran kol murshende win, palle muk men an kol balende dre te djal!"
40008032	Un job penas: "Djan tumenge!" Un jon wan dran i murshende win, un djan an kol balende dre. Un kol tsele bale wan diwjo un nashan i berga tele, un stan an o pani, un tassan.
40008033	Un kote his mursha, kai ap i balende jak denna. Kolla nashan an o foro, un penan kote halauter, hoi jon dikan, ninna, kai wan kol dui mursha sasto, kai benga an lende his.
40008034	Un i tsele menshe djan dran ko foro win, un wan pash o Jesuseste. Un har jon les dikan, mangan le les, te djal lo dran lengro them win.
40009001	Koi djas lo pale ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, uleras ap i wawar panjeskri rig, un was an peskro foro.
40009002	Un jon anan i murshes pash leste. Kowa nashte nashell gar un his ap o tchiben tchiddo. Un har o Jesus kolengro patsepen dikas, penas lo ap ko mursheste: "Ma traash, miro tchawo! Me lau tiri doosh tutar."
40009003	Har i biboldengre tchatchepangre kowa shunan, penan le ap pende kokres: "Kowa krell pes har o Dewel!"
40009004	Un o Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djas. Un job penas ap lende: "Hoske djal sawo tchilatchepen an tumaro shero trujal?
40009005	Hi kowa phareder, te penap ap leste: Me lau tiri doosh tutar, har te penap: Ste pre un dja khere?
40009006	Me kamau, te djinenn tumer, o Menshengro Tchawes hi koi soor ap i phub, te nai lell lo i doosh i menshendar." Doleske penas job ap ko mursheste, kai nai nashell gar: "Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja khere!"
40009007	Un kowa stas pre un djas khere.
40009008	Un har kol bud menshe kowa dikan, daran le o Deblestar un sharan les, kai das i menshes jaake bud soor.
40009009	Pal kowa djas o Jesus dureder. Un job dikas i murshes pash i kheer beshdo. Kowa his i biboldo, kai las i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre. Leskro lab hi Mateo. Un o Jesus penas ap leste: "Am, dja mantsa!" Un job stas pre un djas leha.
40009010	Pal kowa djas o Jesus pash koleste an o kheer. Un har job pash i chapaskri tchiddo his, wan kote ninna bud kolendar khetne, kai lenn i biboldendar kol lowe i Remarjenge dre, un wawar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske ninna pale-tchiddo hi. Un jon chan o Jesuseha un leskre malentsa khetne.
40009011	Un har i Farisarja kowa dikan, penan le ap i Jesuseskre malende: "Hoske chal tumaro sikepaskro kolentsa, kai lenna i biboldendar kol lowe i Remarjenge dre, un kol wawarentsa, kai ninna pale-tchiddo hi?"
40009012	Un o Jesus shunas kowa, un penas ap lende: "Kolla, kai sasto hi, djan gar pash o dramaskro. Kolla, kai nasselo hi, djan pash leste.
40009013	Kowa hunte djinenn tumer: O Dewel penas: Me kamau gar, te marenn mange fichen. Na-a! Me kamau, te hi tumen i baro dji i wawarenge. Me wom gar, te dap kolen pash mande gole, kai djan ap o tchatcho drom. Na-a! Me wom, te dap kolen pash mande gole, kai hi ap o tchilatcho drom."
40009014	Palle wan o Johanneskre mala pash o Jesuseste, un penan ap leste: "Mer un i Farisarja chah un pijah i tsiro tchi, te mangas o Debles an. Hoske krenn tire mala kowa gar?"
40009015	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Jaake raha har o bijabeskro ap i bijab hi, hi peskre mala bachtelo. Ko tsiro wella, kai well o bijabeskro lendar lino. Ap ko tsiro chan le un pijenn le tchi, te mangenn le o Debles an.
40009016	Kek siwell i newo kotar thann ap i phuro ripen. Pash o thopen well o newo kotar tikneder un tsardell pes pale tele, un o phuro ripen djal budeder paash.
40009017	Un kek tchorell i newi mool an i phure moljakre gone. I newi mool krell i phure moljakre gone paash. Un i mool nashell win. I newi mool well tchoredo an i newe moljakre gone. Palle djal i newi mool un i newe moljakre gone gar paash."
40009018	Un har job kowa rakras, was i pralstuno pral i biboldengri kangri pash leste, witsras pes glan leste tele ap i phub, un penas: "Miri tchai meras glan i tikno tsiro. Am mantsa un tchip tiro wast ap late! Un joi wella djido."
40009019	Un o Jesus stas pre un djas leha. Un leskre mala djan ninna leha.
40009020	-
40009021	Ap o drom his i djuwel. Kolat his deesh-te-dui bersha i ratlo nasslepen. Un koja penas peske: "Me te taprau ap leskro ripen, wau sasto." Un joi djas pal leste, un tapras ap leskro ripen.
40009022	Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, dikas lat, un penas ap late: "Romnija ma traash! Tiro patsepen kras tut sasto." Un ap kau tsiro was koi djuwel sasto.
40009023	Un o Jesus djas dureder, un was pash ko pralstuneskro kheer. Kote his i bashepangre un bud menshe. Har job o merepaskro bashepen un i bari gole shunas,
40009024	penas lo: "Djan tumenge! Kai tchai meras gar. Joi sowella." Un jon san pral leste.
40009025	Har kol tsele menshe win glan o kheer his, djas lo dre, tapras koi tchakro wast, un koi tchai djiwas pale, un stas pre.
40009026	Un i tsele menshe, kai kote an i forja un gaba djiwan, shunan kowa.
40009027	Un o Jesus djas dureder. Un dui korele mursha djan leske palla. Kolla dan gole: "Davideskro tchawo, kre men sasto!"
40009028	Un har job an o kheer djas, wan i dui korele pash leste. Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Patsenn tumer, te nai krau kowa?" Koi penan le: "Awa, rai."
40009029	Palle tchiwas lo peskro wast ap lengre jaka, un penas: "Jaake har tumer patsan, jaake han tumer kanna sasto."
40009030	Un jon nai dikan. Un o Jesus penas soreles ap lende: "Te shunell kowa kek!"
40009031	Un jon djan win, un rakran pral kowa, hoi job lenge kras, jaake te shunan le lestar an kol tsele forja un gaba trujal.
40009032	Un har jon win his, wan menshe pash lende, kai anan i murshes pash o Jesuseste, kai nashte rakras gar. Un les his i beng an leste.
40009033	Un o Jesus tradas o benges wi. Har ko beng win his, nai rakras ko mursh pale. Un kol bud menshe, kai kote tardo his, kran bare jaka un penan: "Kek tsireske was sawo koowa an o them Israel diklo."
40009034	I Farisarja penan: "O pralstuno beng das les koi soor. Doleske nai tradell job kol bengen wi."
40009035	Un o Jesus djas an i forja un gaba trujal, un rakras an i biboldengre kangria, un penas i menshenge ko latcho lab, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well. Un job kras lauteren sasto, kai nasselo hi.
40009036	Un har job kol bud menshen dikas, khaitan le les. Jon his leske har bakre, kai hi len kek bakrengro, kai ap lende garda della. Jon his khino, un len his buder kek soor an lende.
40009037	Un job penas ap peskre malende: "Bud djob hi win tardo, te well lo an o kheer anlo. Jaake hi bud menshe koi, kai kamenn pash o Debleste te well. Un hi gar doha budepangre koi, te anenn le len pash leste.
40009038	Doleske mangenn o Deblestar, te bitchrell lo budepangren, kai leske budrenna!"
40010001	Un o Jesus das peskre deesh-te-dui malen pash peste gole, un das len i soor pral i benga, te nai tradenn le len dran i menshende win, un te nai krenn le lauteren sasto, kai nasselo hi.
40010002	Kolla hi i laba kol deesh-te-dujendar, kolen o Jesus pash i menshende bitchras: O glanstuno his o Simon, kai kharas ninna Petro, un leskro phraal Andreas, un o Jakobo un leskro phraal Johanni, - kolengro dad his o Zebedeo,
40010003	o Filipo, un o Bartolomeo, o Thomas un o Mateo, kai i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre las, un o Jakobo, - koleskro dad his o Alfeo, un o Tadeo,
40010004	un o Simon, kai his kol menshendar, kai kharenna Zelotarja un o Judas Iskariot, ko phukepaskro.
40010005	Kolla deesh-te-dui mursha bitchras o Jesus pash i menshende, un penas soreles ap lende: Ma djan pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi! Ma djan an i forja, kai i Samaritarja djiwenna!
40010006	Djan pash i Israelitarja! Jon hi har nashede bakre!
40010007	Tumer te wenn pash lende, palle penenn lenge: O tsiro well sik, kai lell o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win.
40010008	Krenn i nasselen sasto, un krenn i mulen djido! Un kolla, kai i djungelo nasslepen ap o mass hi, kolen krenn ninna sasto! Tradenn i bengen dran i menshende win! Kai soor dom tumen tchitcheske. Doleske krenn kowa ninna tchitcheske, un lenn kek lowe lendar!
40010009	Ma lenn lowe tumentsa ap o drom, witar kek sonakai, kek rup, un witar kek tikne lowe!
40010010	Lenn kek possita tumentsa, kek duito gad, kek tircha, witar kek kasht! I budepaskro lell peskro chapen kolendar, kolenge job budrella.
40010011	Tumer te wenn an i foro un an i gab, palle putchenn pal jekeste, kai moldo hi, te atchenn tumer an leskro kheer. Pash leste atchenn jaake raha har tumer atchenn an ko foro.
40010012	Te wenn tumer an i kheer dre, palle rakrenn o Debleskri bacht pral kol menshende win!
40010013	Un jon te lenn tumen an lengro kheer dre, palle well o Debleskri bacht ap lende. Jon te lenn tumen gar an lengro kheer dre, palle well o Debleskri bacht gar ap lende.
40010014	Kote, kai lenn le tumen gar pre, un kamenn tumen gar te shunell, kote djan tumenge dran ko kheer un dran ko foro win! Un denn koi tchik tumare pirendar tele!
40010015	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende ap i phub wi-rakrella, lenna kol menshe, kai lan tumen gar pre, i bareder phagi har kolla, kai djiwan an i forja Sodom un Gomorra.
40010016	Djinenn, me bitchrau tumen har bakre mank i diwje djuklende. Doleske wenn gosewo har i sapa un djudjo har i parne tchirkle, an kolende kek chochepen hi!
40010017	Denn jak, hoi i menshe tumentsa krenna! Jon anenn tumen glan i tchatchepangre, un mukenn tumen an lengre kangria i tchupnijaha dawa te dell.
40010018	Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske anenn le tumen glan i pralstunende un glan i bare rajende, te rakrenn jon i phagi win pral tumende. Kowa well ap tumende, te rakrenn tumer mandar glan lende un glan kolende, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna.
40010019	Kowa te well, palle ma darenn, hoi tumer hunte penenna! O Dewel sikrell tumende, hoi tumer hunte penenna ap ko diwes.
40010020	Tumer han gar kolla, kai rakrenna. Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho, kai dran tumende rakrella.
40010021	Ap ko tsiro dell i phraal peskro phrales an lengre wasta, te well lo maredo. Un o dad dell o tchawes an lengre wasta, te well job maredo. Un i tchawe hi midjak ap pengre dadende un pengre dajende, un denn len an i wasta kolendar, kai marenn len.
40010022	Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske wenn i menshe chojedo ap tumende. Kowa, kai atchell soreles tardo an o patsepen, jaake raha, har job djiwella, kowa lell o Debleskro djipen.
40010023	Te lenn le tumen an jek foro palla, palle nashenn an i wawar foro! Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge, tumer wenna gar an hako foro an o them Israel jaake raha har o Menshengro Tchawo gar pale was.
40010024	Jek, kai djal an o sikepaskro kheer, djinell gar budeder har o sikepaskro. Un i budepaskro haiwell gar budeder har peskro rai.
40010025	Jek, kai djal an o sikepaskro kheer, koleske hi doha, te djinell lo jaake bud har peskro sikepaskro. Un i budepaskro, koleske hi doha, te haiwell lo jaake bud har peskro rai. Un te penenn le ap o rajeste pral ko kheer: Beng! palle kharenn le ninna kolen jaake, kai an leskro kheer djiwenna. Doleske ma darenn lendar!
40010026	Well o diwes, kai well kowa diklo, hoi kanna khatedo hi. Well o diwes, kai djinell hakeno kowa, hoi kanna kek djinella.
40010027	Kowa, hoi me tumenge tchorchanes penau, kowa penenn i menshenge jaake, te shunell les hakeno! Un kowa, hoi tumenge an o kand penlo wella, kowa penenn i tsele menshenge!
40010028	Ma trashenn kol menshendar, kai nai marenn tumen! Jon nai marenn gar ko djipen an tumende, hoi ninna pal o merepen djiwella. Trashenn o Deblestar, kai nai tchiwell tumen pal o merepen an o bengeskri jag, kai han hako tsiro nashedo!
40010029	Dui tikne tchirkle hi glan i menshende gar budeder moldo har jek bema. Un kek lendar perella ap i phub, te kamell o Dewel kowa gar. Job hi tumaro dad an o bolepen.
40010030	Un job djinella, kitse balla ap tumaro shero hi.
40010031	"Doleske ma darenn! Tumer molenn budeder har bud tchirkle.
40010032	Me penau tumenge: Koon glan i menshende penella: O Jesus hi miro rai! kolestar penau me glan miro dadeste an o bolepen: Job hi miro!
40010033	Koon man buchoste della glan i menshende, koles dau me ninna buchoste glan miro dadeste an o bolepen.
40010034	Ma patsenn, te lap o tchingepen ap kai phub krik. Na-a! Kowa krau gar. Mantsa well o kurepen.
40010035	Mange tchingrenn pen i menshe. O tchawo tchingrell pes peskro dadeha. Un i dai tchingrell pes peskri tchaha. Un i tchai tchingrell pes peskri daha. Un o tchaweskri romni tchingrell pes peskro romeskri dai.
40010036	Un kowa, kai ap o wawareste chojedo hi, djiwell leha an leskro kheer khetne.
40010037	Koon kamell peskro dades un peskri dai budeder har man, hi gar moldo, te well lo miro maal. Un koon kamell peskro tchawes un peskri tchat budeder har man, hi gar moldo, te well lo miro maal.
40010038	Un koon lell gar peskro trushel ap peste un djal mantsa, hi gar moldo, te well lo miro maal.
40010039	Koon kamell peskro djipen te rikrell, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen mange nashrella, kowa lell les pale.
40010040	Koon tumen an peskro kheer lella, lell man an peskro kheer. Un kowa, kai man an peskro kheer lella, kowa lell koles an peskro kheer, kai man bitchras.
40010041	Koon i Debleskro rakepaskres an peskro kheer lella, un krell kowa doleske, kai kowa o Debleskro lab penella, koles dell o Dewel jaake bud brawlepen, har job peskre rakepangren della. Koon i Debleskro murshes an peskro kheer lella, un krell kowa doleske, kai kowa i Debleskro mursh hi, koles dell o Dewel jaake bud brawlepen, har job i Debleskro murshes della.
40010042	Koon della jekes mire malendar i khoro shilo pani te pijell, koles dell o Dewel tchatchepaha ko latchepen pale, hoi job kras.
40011001	Un har o Jesus peskre deesh-te-dui malenge penas, hoi hunte krenn le, djas lo dureder an i wawar biboldengre forja, te sikrell lo kote i menshende o Debleskro drom
40011002	Ap ko tsiro his o Johanni an o stilepen. Kote shunas lo, hoi o Jesus Kristo lauter kras. Un job bitchras peskre malen pash leste,
40011003	un mukas lestar te putchell: "Hal tu kowa, kai hunte well? Hunte dikas mer ap i wawareste, te well lo?"
40011004	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Djan pash o Johanneste, un penenn leske, hoi tumer shunan un dikan:
40011005	I korele dikenna pale un i bange nashenna pale. I nassele, kai lengro mass ap lende tele merell, kolla wenna sasto. Kolla, kai nai shunan gar, shunenna kanna. I mule wenna djido. I tchorwele shunenn o Debleskro latcho lab.
40011006	Un bachtelo hi kowa, kai choirell pes gar pral mande!"
40011007	Un har o Johanneskre mala penge djana, rakras o Jesus ap kol bud menshende pral o Johanneste, un penas: Hoske djan tumer an o mulo them? Kaman tumer i murshes te dikell, kai hi har i patrin, hoi i sorelo ducho pral i phub phurdella? Na-a, sawo mursh hi lo gar!
40011008	Koon kaman tumer te dikell? Kaman tumer i murshes te dikell, kai an kutch koola rido hi? Na-a, sawo mursh hi lo witar gar! Kolla, kai riwenna kutch koola, djiwenn an i rajengre khera.
40011009	Hoske djan tumer an o mulo them? Kaman tumer i Debleskro rakepaskro te dikell? Awa, kowa hi o Johanni. Un me penau tumenge: Job hi bareder har i Debleskro rakepaskro.
40011010	Lestar hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Dewel penas ap peskro tchaweste: Me bitchrau i murshes glan tute ap o drom, te krell lo tuke i drom, te nai wess pash i menshende.
40011011	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kek was boldo ap kai phub, kai hi bareder har o Johanni. Me penau tumenge ninna: O tikneder kolendar, kai mukenn man pengro rai te well, kowa hi bareder har o Johanni.
40011012	Har o Johanni was un i menshe an o pani thowas, was o Debleskro newo tsiro. An kau tsiro dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. Un bis kau diwes kamenn tchilatche menshe i sorjaha o Debleskri budi paash te krell. Jon kamenn te well len penepaske koi pral.
40011013	Un i tsele Debleskre rakepangre un o Mose rakran glan i raha tsiro pral kau newo tsiro. Kanna hi o Johanni koi, un ko newo tsiro was.
40011014	Patsenn mange, o Johanni hi o Elija, kolestar penlo was, te well lo.
40011015	Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!
40011016	I menshe an kau tsiro hi har tchawe, kai khelenn an o foro. Un jon denn gole jek ap o wawareste:
40011017	Mer bashram tumenge. Tumer khelan gar. Mer giwam mulengre gilja. Tumer rowan gar.
40011018	O Johanni chas un pijas gar. Un jon penenna: "I beng hi an leste."
40011019	Un me, o Menshengro Tchawo, me wom, chom un pijom, un mandar penenn le: "Kowa hi i baro chapaskro un i pipaskro. Kowa hi i maal kolendar, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre. Un kowa hi i maal kolendar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske pale-tchiddo hi." Ninna te rakrenn le jaake, dikenn le ap o Debleskre menshende, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi o Dewel krella.
40011020	Palle tchingras lo pral kol forja, kai job bud baro koowa kras an o Debleskri soor. I menshe kote mukan gar pengro tchilatcho drom, te djan le ap o Debleskro drom.
40011021	Un job penas: Bibachtelo wenna tumer menshe an o foro Korazin! Bibachtelo wenna tumer menshe an o foro Betsaida! Te krals jek an i forja Tirus un Sidon sawo baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, har me pash tumende krom, riwans i menshe kote i gono trul pende, un tchiwans jagakri tchik ap pengre shere, te sikrenn le, kai lengro tchilatchepen khaitell len. Un jon mukans pengro tchilatcho drom, un djans ap o Debleskro drom.
40011022	Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende ap i phub, djal kol menshenge an i forja Sidon un Tirus feteder har tumenge kate.
40011023	Un tumer menshe an o foro Kapernaum, patsenn tumer, kai wenn tumer an o bolepen hadedo? Na-a! Tumer djan an o mulengro them tele. O baro koowa, hoi krom an o Debleskri soor pash tumende, te kroms kowa an o foro Sodom, palle wals ko foro gomme kau diwes.
40011024	Me penau tumenge: Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende win, lenn tumer i bareder phagi, har kol menshe an o foro Sodom.
40011025	Un ap kau tsiro penas o Jesus: Tata, tu hal o rai pral o bolepen un i phub. Me sharau tut. Kowa, hoi tu kreh, sikral tu kolende, kai gar bud djinenna. Kolla, kai gosewo hi un bud djinenna, kolla haiwenn kowa gar.
40011026	Awa tata, jaake kamal tu kowa.
40011027	Lauter das miro dad an mire wasta. Kek djinella, koon o tchawo hi, har kokres o dad. Un kokres o tchawo djinella, koon o dad hi. Un o tchawo sikrell kolen, kai patsenn ap leste, koon o dad hi.
40011028	Tumer marenna tumen tele, te krenn kowa, hoi tumare phure ap tumende penan. Awenn pash mande! Me lau ko pharo koowa tumendar, te lenn tumer pale newi soor.
40011029	Me hom tumenge i latcho rai, un dikau ap kekeste tele. Shunenn ap mande un krenn, hoi me tumenge penaua! Un tumaro dji well pale sorelo.
40011030	Kowa, hoi me tumenge penaua, hi tumenge latcho. Un tumer hunte marenn tumen gar tele.
40012001	Ap jek Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus peskre malentsa ap i tikno kotar them, kai o djob baro was. Un leskre malen his bok. Un jon lan o djob an i wasta, te chan le.
40012002	Kowa dikan i Farisarja un penan ap o Jesuseste: "Dik, tire mala krenn ap o Debleskro diwes, hoi hi gar pal o biboldengro tchatchepen."
40012003	Penas lo ap lende: Hoi kras o baro rai David un peskre mala, har jon bokan? Draweran tumer kowa gar an o Debleskro lab?
40012004	Job djas an o Debleskro kheer, un chas o Debleskro maro, job un kolla, kai pash leste his. Pal i biboldengro tchatchepen his i mare i rashajenge kokres koi.
40012005	Un tumer djinenn ninna, hoi an o Moseskre lila tardo hi, te krenn i rashaja ap o Debleskro diwes pengri budi an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un jaake krenn le o Debleskro diwes praassedo. Ninna te krenn le kowa, anenn le kek doosh ap pende.
40012006	Kanna penau me tumenge: Kowa, kai glan tumende tardo hi, kowa hi bareder har o Debleskro baro kheer.
40012007	Tumer haiwan kol laba gar, hoi o Dewel penas: Me kamau, te han tumer latcho ap i wawarende. Me kamau gar, te marenn tumer mange fichen. Te haiwans tumer, hoi kowa kharella, palle anans tumer kek doosh ap mire malende. Jon anan kek doosh ap pende.
40012008	Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hom ninna o rai pral o Debleskro diwes.
40012009	Un job djas peske, un djas an i biboldengri kangri.
40012010	Koi his i mursh, koles his i bango wast. Jon kaman i doosh ap o Jesuseste pre te anell, te anenn le les nai glan i tchatchepangre. Doleske putchan le lestar: "Nai krah mer jekes ap o Debleskro diwes sasto?"
40012011	Penas lo ap lende: "Te hi jekes tumendar i bakro, un kowa perell ap o Debleskro diwes an i cheb, kek tumendar mukals les kote. Na-a, job djals kote, taprals les, un lals les kote win.
40012012	I mensho hi budeder moldo har i bakro. Jaake hi kowa tchatcho, te krah mer i menshes ap o Debleskro diwes sasto."
40012013	Un ap ko mursheste penas lo: "Hade tiro wast pre!" Un job hadas peskro wast pre. Un leskro wast was sasto, har ko wawar wast.
40012014	Koi djan i Farisarja win, un rakran khetne, har jon les nai marenna.
40012015	Un o Jesus haiwas kowa, un djas peske. Un bud menshe djan leske palla. Un job kras hakenes lendar sasto.
40012016	Un job penas soreles ap lende, te penenn le kowa kekeske.
40012017	Un jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, glan i raha tsiro penas:
40012018	O Dewel penella: Dik, kowa hi miro budepaskro, kai me mange win rodom. Koles kamau o djijestar. Pral leste hom bachtelo. Me tchiwau miro Ducho ap leste. Un job penell i tsele menshenge, hoi me lendar kamau.
40012019	Job tchingrell pes gar, un dell gar bari gole. Un job krell kek baro rakepen ap o drom.
40012020	Job hi latcho ap koleste, kai hi les buder gar bud soor. Job phagell les gar har i kasht, kai hi an-phagedo. Ninna i momeli, hoi gomme i tikno kotar chatchella, krell lo gar win. Jaake hi lo, bis te hi peskro tchatchepen pral halauter tardo.
40012021	Un i tsele menshe ap i phub dikenn ap leste.
40012022	Palle anan le i murshes pash o Jesuseste. Kowa his korelo, un nashte rakras gar. Un i beng his an leste. Un o Jesus kras o murshes sasto, jaake te nai rakras lo, un dikas lo pale.
40012023	Un i tsele menshe, kai trul leste tardo his, kran bare jaka. Un jon penan: "Hi kawa nai o Davideskro tchawo?"
40012024	Har i Farisarja kowa shunan, penan le: "O pralstuno beng das les i soor. Dran kowa nai tradell job i bengen wi."
40012025	O Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djas. Un job penas ap lende: Hako them un hako foro djal paash, kai dui bare raja kurenn pen. Un an jek kheer nashte wenn gar dujen penepaske. Kowa djal gar.
40012026	Te tradell o beng i wawar benges wi, hi kowa jaake, har te kurell pes ko jek o wawareha. Palle nashrenn jon pengri soor.
40012027	Te dals o pralstuno beng mande peskri soor, te nai tradoms i bengen wi, koon dals tumare menshen i soor, te tradenn le i bengen wi? Well jek diwes, kai jon penenn tumenge, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi, hoi tumer pral mande rakran.
40012028	Na-a, gar o beng das man koi soor. O Debleskro Ducho das man koi soor, te nai tradap i bengen wi. Koi pre dikenn tumer, kai ko tsiro was, kai o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win lella, un leskri soor mank tumende hi.
40012029	Kowa, kai kamell an o kheer i sorelo murshestar dre phagell, te lell lo leskro brawlepen, kowa hunte pandell ko sorelo murshes. Un palle randell lo leskro tselo brawlepen.
40012030	Koon gar ap miri rig hi, kowa hi ap ko wawareskri rig. Un koon gar i menshe pash mande anella, kowa tradell len mandar.
40012031	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge kanna: O Dewel nai bistrell hako tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe kran. Un jon te rakrenn djungele laba pral leste, jaake nai bistrell lo kowa ninna. Jek penell djungele laba pral o Debleskro Ducho, palle bistrell lo kowa gar.
40012032	Un jek te penell djungele laba pral o Menshengro Tchaweste, jaake nai bistrell lo kowa. Jek te rakrell djungele laba pral o Debleskro Ducho, kowa bistrell lo an kek tsiro, gar an kau tsiro, un witar gar an ko tsiro, kai wella.
40012033	Te hi tumen i latcho pawjakro ruk, hi tumen ninna latche pawja. Te hi tumen i pawjakro ruk, kai gar latcho hi, hi tumen ninna pawja, kai gar latcho hi. Ap kowa, hoi o rukestar wella, dikenn tumer, har ko ruk hi.
40012034	Tumer han sapa! Tumer han tchilatcho un nai rakrenn gar latcho koowa. I mensho penell kowa, hoi an leskro dji dren hi.
40012035	Dran i latcho mensheskro dji wella latcho koowa. Dran i tchilatcho dji wella tchilatcho koowa.
40012036	Me penau tumenge: Well ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende ap i phub win. Kote putchell lo lendar pal hako tchilatcho lab, hoi jon penan.
40012037	Tu te penal i latcho un tchatcho koowa, leh tu kek phagi. Tu te penal kowa, hoi gar latcho un tchatcho hi, leh tu i phagi.
40012038	Palle penan i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja ap leste: "Sikepaskro, kre menge i baro koowa, hoi sikrell mende, te well tiri soor o Deblestar!"
40012039	Kote penas lo ap lende: Har tchilatcho hi kol menshe, kai djiwenn an kau tsiro. Jon mukan o Debles, un kamenn i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell. Un o Dewel sikrell len tchi wawar har kowa, hoi i menshe ninna ap o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jona, dikan.
40012040	O Jona atchas triin diwessa un triin rati an o baro matcheskro per. Un jaake hunte atchell o Menshengro Tchawo triin diwessa un triin rati an i phub paskedo.
40012041	Ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende wi-rakrella, stenna ninna i menshe dran o foro Ninive pre. Un jon penenna, te hi kol menshe tchilatcho, kai kanna djiwenna. Glan i raha tsiro penas o Jona i menshenge an o foro Ninive o Debleskro lab. Un jon mukan pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom. Kowa, kai glan tumende tardo hi, kowa hi bareder har o Jona.
40012042	Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, stella ninna i bari rani dran o foro Saba pre. Un joi penella, te hi kol menshe tchilatcho, kai kanna djiwenna. Glan i raha tsiro, was joi dran i dur them, un was pash o baro rai Salomo, te shunell li leskre gosewe laba. Kawa, kai glan tumende tardo hi, kawa hi bareder har o baro rai Salomo.
40012043	Te djas i beng dran i mensheste win, nashell job an i them trujal, kai kek djipen hi, un rodell peske, kai atchell job nai, un hatsell tchi.
40012044	Palle penell lo ap peste: Me kamau pale an miro kheer te djal, dran hoi me win djom. Un te well lo pale, hi ko kheer djudjo un shukar, un kek djiwell kote.
40012045	Koi rodell lo peske wawar efta benga, kai tchilatcheder hi har job. Un jon djan an ko mensheste dre, un djiwenn an leste. Jaake hi kol mensheha djungleder har glan kau tsiro. Un jaake djal ninna kal tchilatche menshenge, kai kanna djiwenna.
40012046	Un har job kowa kol menshenge penas, kai trul leste tardo his, koi was leskri dai un leskre phrala. Jon his win tardo, un kaman leha te rakrell.
40012047	Un jek penas ap leste: "Shun, tiri dai un tire phrala hi win tardo un kamenn tuha te rakrell."
40012048	Penas lo ap koleste: "Me kamau tuke te sikrell, koon miri dai un mire phrala hi."
40012049	Un palle sikras lo ap peskre malende un penas: "Dik, kalla hi miri dai un mire phrala!
40012050	Kowa, kai krella, hoi miro dad an o bolepen kamella, kowa hi miro phraal, un miri pheen, un miri dai."
40013001	Pal i tsiro djas o Jesus dran o kheer, un beshas pes pash o baro pani.
40013002	Un bud menshe wan kote pash leste. Doleske djas lo ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un beshas pes kote. Un i tsele menshe his pash o pani tardo.
40013003	Un o Jesus rakras ap lende bud sawe laba, kai hi i khatedo tchatchepen dre. Un job penas: I hacho djas win, te witsrell lo o tikno djob ap peskro kotar them, te well ko djob bares.
40013004	Un i tikne kotja peran ap o drom, un i tchirkle chan len pre.
40013005	Un wawar djob peras ap i barra, kai gar bud phub his. Dran kowa was ko djob sik dran i phub win.
40013006	Un har o kham djas pre, was ko djob, kai gar dur an i phub his, chatchedo un meras tele.
40013007	Wawar djob peras mank i subjengre burra, un kol burra wan jaake baro, te las o djob kek ducho buder, un job meras.
40013008	Wawar djob peras ap i latchi phub, un was baro, un hidjas sheel kope jaake bud. Wawar djob hidjas shob-deesh kope jaake bud, un wawar djob triin-deesh kope jaake bud.
40013009	Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!
40013010	Un leskre mala wan pash leste un putchan lestar: "Hoske rakreh tu sawe laba ap lende, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi?"
40013011	Penas lo ap lende: O Dewel mukell tumen te haiwell, har kote djal, kai dell lo menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. I wawar menshe haiwenn kowa gar.
40013012	Koon o Debleskro lab an peskro dji rikrella, kowa haiwell les bud un budeder. Koon o Debleskro lab gar an peskro dji rikrella, koleske well ninna kowa krik lino, hoi job patsell, te hi les.
40013013	Doleske rakrau sawe laba ap lende, kai hi i khatedo tchatchepen dre. Kal menshe dikenn, hoi krau. Un jon krenna, har te dikans le les gar. Un jon shunenn, hoi penau, un haiwenn kowa gar.
40013014	Ap kolende well kowa tchatcho, hoi penas o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, glan i raha tsiro: Tumer shunenn un haiwenn tchi. Un tumer dikenn un haiwenn witar tchi.
40013015	O Dewel penas: Kalla menshe kamenn gar te haiwell, hoi shunenn le. Jon kamenn gar te shunenn, hoi me penau. Witar gar kamenn le te dikell, hoi tchatcho hi. Te kamans le kowa te dikell, shunans le. Un te shunans le, haiwans le, un wans pash mande. Un me nai kroms len sasto.
40013016	Bachtele han tumer, kai dikenna un shunenna, hoi me tumenge penau un sikrau.
40013017	Tchatchepaha me penau tumenge: An o phuro tsiro his bud Debleskre rakepangre un wawar menshe, kai kran, hoi o Dewel kamella. Kolla kaman te dikell, hoi tumer dikenna, un dikan les gar. Un jon kaman te shunell, hoi tumer shunenna, un shunan les gar.
40013018	Shunenn kanna, hoi kamenn kol laba pral o djob tumenge te penell:
40013019	Ko djob, hoi peras ap o drom, sikrell tumende jekes, kai shunas ko lab, kai o Dewel les pash peste gole della. Un job haiwas ko lab gar. Un o beng was, un las ko lab dran leskro dji win.
40013020	Wawar menshe hi har ko kotar phub, kai o djob ap i barra peras. Jon shunenn ko lab, len les sik bachteles pre,
40013021	un bistrenn les ninna pale sik. Jon mukenn les gar an pengro dji soreles te well. Te well i pharo tsiro ap lende, un jon wenn mange palla lino, palle witsrenn le pengro patsepen ap i rig.
40013022	Wawar menshe hi har ko kotar phub, kai o djob tel i subjengre burra peras. Jon shunan ko lab. Palle dikenn le ap i phubjakro koowa un kamenn brawele te well. Un o brawlepen chochell i menshen. Un ko lab, hoi shunan le, well tassedo, un nai rakrell buder gar an lengro dji.
40013023	Pale wawar menshe hi har koi latchi phub, kai o djob peras. Kolla shunan un haiwan ko lab. An lende well ko patsepen baro. Un lengro djipen sikrella, te kamenn le o Debles, un shunenn le ap leste. Pash kolende hi ko lab har o djob, kai baro wella, un pash jekeste hidjell lo sheel kope jaake bud. Un pash i wawareste hidjell lo shob-deesh kope jaake bud. Un pale pash i wawareste hidjell lo triin-deesh kope jaake bud."
40013024	Un job penas lenge pale, har kote djal, kai dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. Un job penas: I hacho witsras o latcho djob ap peskro kotar them, te well ko djob baro.
40013025	An i rat, har i tsele menshe sowan, djas i tchilatcho ap ko kotar them, witsras o djungelo senlepen mashkral o djob, un djas peske.
40013026	Un o tsiro was, te well o latcho djob win, un was bares. Un koi was ninna ko djungelo senlepen bares.
40013027	Un i budepangre djan pash o hacheste, un putchan lestar: Rai, tu witsral o latcho djob ap tiro kotar them. Kai was o djungelo senlepen?
40013028	Un job penas ap lende: Kawa kras i tchilatcho, kai man gar kamella. Koi putchan le lestar: Kameh tu, te djas kote, te tsardas ko djungelo senlepen win?
40013029	Penas lo: Na-a! Tumer te tsardenn o djungelo senlepen win, palle tsardenn tumer o latcho djob ninna win.
40013030	Mukenn kowa lauter khetne baro te well, bis te anah mer o djob an o djobeskro kheer! Un ap ko tsiro penau me ap kolende, kai ko djob tchinenna: Anenn o djungelo senlepen khetne, un pandenn les khetne, te chatchrenn les! Un palle anenn o djob khetne, un anenn les an o djobeskro kheer!
40013031	Un pale penas o Jesus lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi: Un job penas: Kote, kai o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole della, te djan le ap leskro drom, hi kowa jaake har pash o djob dran i senftikro ruk, hoi witsras i mursh an i phub ap peskro kotar them.
40013032	O senftikro djob hi tikneder har ko tselo wawar djob. Job te well baro, well lo bareder har i tsele wawar burra. Dran leste well i ruk. Un i tchirkle wenna, un djiwenn ap leste.
40013033	Un pale penas o Jesus lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi: Un job penas: Kote, kai o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole della, te djan le ap leskro drom, hi kowa jaake har pash i kotar shutlo jarro, hoi las i djuwel un tchiwas les mashkral an i baro tcharo parno jarro. Un ko tikno kotar shutlo jarro kras ko tselo jarro shutlo.
40013034	Kowa lauter rakras o Jesus ap lende sawe labentsa, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Wawartchandes rakras lo gar ap lende.
40013035	Un jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro glan i raha tsiro penas: O Dewel penas: Me rakrau ap lende sawe labentsa, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Me penau lenge kowa, hoi kek mensho djinas, jaake raha har i phub tardo hi.
40013036	Un o Jesus bitchras kol tsele menshen khere, un djas an o kheer. Kote wan leskre mala pash leste, un putchan lestar: "Hoi sikrell men ko lab pral o djungelo senlepen, hoi ap o kotar them baro was?"
40013037	Penas lo ap lende: Kowa, kai o latcho djob ap i kotar them win witsrella, kowa hom me, o Menshengro Tchawo.
40013038	Un ko kotar them, kolla hi i tsele menshe ap i phub. Un o latcho djob, kolla hi kol menshe, kai mukenn o Debles pengro rai te well. Un ko djungelo senlepen, kolla hi i tchilatche, pral kolende o beng o rai hi.
40013039	Un kowa, kai hi chojedo ap o Debleste un witsrell o djungelo senlepen ap i phub, kowa hi o beng. Un ko tsiro, kai anenn le o djob an o djobeskro kheer, kowa hi ko tsiro, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende wi-rakrella. Un kol tchinepangre, kai tchinenn o djob tele, kolla hi bolepangre.
40013040	Un jaake har ko djungelo senlepen khetne lino wella, un an o jag witsedo wella, jaake well kowa ap ko tsiro, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende wi-rakrella.
40013041	O Menshengro Tchawo bitchrell peskre bolepangren ap i phub. Un jon lenn kolen glan leskre jaka krik, kai kran, hoi o Dewel gar kamella, ninna kolen, kai anan i wawaren ap o tchilatcho drom.
40013042	Un i bolepangre witsrenn len an i bobeskri jag. Kote rowenn le, un dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne.
40013043	Palle hi kolla, kai kran, hoi lengro dad an o bolepen kamas, har i bari momeli an leskro railo them. Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!
40013044	Kowa, kai hatsas o drom pash o Debleste, koleske hi kowa har i kutch brawlepen, hoi an i kotar phub khatedo hi. Un i mensho hatsell les, un khatrell les pale. Un job hi jaake bachtelo koi pral, te bikrell lo lauter, hoi les hi, un ginell ko kotar phub.
40013045	Kowa, kai hatsas o drom pash o Debleste, kowa hi har i bikepaskro, kai raile un kutch barra rodas.
40013046	Un har job i railo un kutch bar hatsas, bikras lo lauter, hoi les hi, un ginas ko kutch bar.
40013047	Ap ko diwes, kai o Debleskri harmenationa wella, well kowa jaake har pash i matchepangre, kai witsran pengre matchengre gone an o baro pani, un tapran bare un tikne matche.
40013048	Un har kol gone pherdo matche his, tsardan le kolen ap o them, beshan pen tele, un tchiwan i latche matchen an i tcharo. Un i djungele matchen witsran le ap i rig.
40013049	Jaake djal kowa ninna ap ko tsiro, kai o Debleskri harmenationa wella. I bolepangre wenna, un lenn kol tchilatchen mashkral i latchendar win.
40013050	Un jon witsrenn i tchilatchen an i bobeskri jag. Un kote rowenn le, un dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne.
40013051	Haiwan tumer kawa lauter? Un jon penan ap leste: "Awa."
40013052	"Tumer dikenn," penas lo, "hako tchatchepaskro, koon djinell o phuro biboldengro tchatchepen, un ap mande patslo was, kowa haiwell kanna o newo un o phuro koowa pral o Debleste, un nai penell kowa i menshenge."
40013053	Un har o Jesus i menshenge kol tsele laba penas, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, stas lo pre un djas peske.
40013054	Un job djas an peskro dadeskro foro, un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab an lengri kangri. Un jon kran bare jaka un penan: "Koon das les ko goswepen un koi soor, te nai krell lo sawo baro koowa?
40013055	Hi kowa gar o tchawo kolestar, kai budrell i kashtentsa. Hi leskri dai gar i Maria? Un hi o Jakobo, o Josef, o Simon, un o Judas gar leskre phrala?
40013056	Un djiwenn leskre phenja gar pash mende? Koon das les ko goswepen un koi soor?"
40013057	Un jon wan chojedo ap leste, un kaman gar te patsell, kai o Dewel les bitchras. Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Kek Debleskro rakepaskro well kote sharedo, kai job khere hi. An i wawar forja un gaba well lo sharedo."
40013058	Un jon patsan gar ap leste. Doleske kras job gar bud baro koowa an o Debleskri soor.
40014001	Ap ko tsiro his o Herodes o baro rai pral o them Galilea. Un job shunas, hoi pral o Jesuseste rakedo was.
40014002	Un job penas ap peskre pralstune budepangre: "Kawa mursh hi o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani. Job stas i mulendar pre. Doleske hi les sawi soor, te nai krell lo ko baro koowa." O Johanni his mulo. Doleske penas o Herodes kowa.
40014003	-
40014004	Glan ko tsiro las o Herodes koi romjat peskro phralestar Filip. Lakro lab his Herodia. Un o Johanni penas leske: "Kowa hi gar mishto, kai tu lal tiro phraleskri romjat." Doleske penas o Herodes ap peskre lurdende, te taprenn le o Johannes, te pandenn le les, un te witsrenn le les an o stilepen.
40014005	Job marals les, te wans gar kol bud menshe koi, kai patsan, te hi o Johanni i Debleskro rakepaskro. Kolendar daras o Herodes.
40014006	Koi was ko diwes, kai was o Herodes i bersh phureder. Un job mukas i baro chapen te krell. Un i Herodiakri tchai was, un khelas glan leste un glan kolende, kai pash leste hi. Un lakro khelepen his jaake shukar an leskre jaka,
40014007	te das lo pes sowel, te dell lo lat lauter, hoi joi lestar mangella.
40014008	Un joi djas pash peskri date un putchas latar, hoi joi nai lestar mangella. Un koja penas ap late, hoi joi hunte leske penella. Un jaake penas li ap leste: "De man kate ap i tcharo o shero o Johannestar, kowa kai thowas i menshen an o pani!"
40014009	Har o Herodes kowa shunas, khaitas les, hoi job lake penas. Palle dikas lo ap kol tsele menshende, hoi shunan, har job pes sowel das. Doleske penas lo ap peskre lurdende, te denn le lat, hoi joi kamas.
40014010	Dran kowa was o Johanneske leskro shero tele dino an o stilepen.
40014011	Un jon tchiwan leskro shero ap i tcharo, un dan les i tchate. Un koja anas les pash lakri date.
40014012	Un o Johanneskre mala wan, lan o mules, un paskran les. Un palle djan le pash o Jesuseste, un penan les leske.
40014013	Un har o Jesus kowa shunas, djas lo ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleras kote, kai hi lo kokres. Bud menshe shunan, kai job djas peske. Un jon wan dran i forja, te djan le ap o them pash leste.
40014014	Un har o Jesus dran o panjeskro ulepaskro djas, dikas lo kal bud menshen, un les khaitan le. Un job kras kolen sasto, kai mashkral lende nasselo hi.
40014015	Har o kham tele djas, wan leskre mala pash leste, un penan ap leste: "Kate, kai mer ham, della tchi te chal, un i rati wella. Bitche kal menshen tutar, te djan le an i gaba, te ginenn le penge tchomone te chal!"
40014016	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Jon nashte atchenna kate. Denn tumer len te chal!"
40014017	"Men hi gar budeder har pantch mare un dui matche," penan le.
40014018	Penas lo ap lende: "Anenn len pash mande!"
40014019	Palle penas lo ap kol tsele menshende, te beshenn le pen. Un job las kol pantch mare un kol dui matche, dikas pre, parkras pes pash peskro dadeste an o bolepen, un phagas kol mare an kotja, un das len peskre malende. Un kalla dan len i tsele menshende te chal.
40014020	Un jon chan lauter, un wan tchalo. Un pal o chapen hadan le kol kotja mare pre, hoi pral atchan. Un deesh-te-dui marengre gone wan pherdo.
40014021	Kolla, kai chan, his nai jaake pantch serja (5.000) mursha. Ninna bud djuwja un tchawe his kote pashal.
40014022	Un sik pal kowa tradas o Jesus peskre malen, te djan le an o panjeskro ulepaskro, un te ulerenn le glan leste ap o wawar panjeskri rig. Job atchas pash i menshende, te bitchrell lo len khere.
40014023	Palle djas job peske kokres ap i berga, te rakrell lo peskro dadeha an o bolepen. Har i rat was, his lo kote kokres.
40014024	O Jesuseskre mala his ap o panjeskro ulepaskro dur win ap o baro pani. Kote phurdas i sorelo ducho pral o pani. Un o pani djas pral, un witsras o panjeskro ulepaskro pral un tele.
40014025	Starenge taissarlake djas o Jesus ap o baro pani pash lende.
40014026	Un har leskre mala les dikan ap o pani te djal, trashan le un penan: "Kawa hi i mulo!" Un jon dan gole i darjatar.
40014027	Koi penas lo sik ap lende: "Ma darenn! Me hom. Lauter hi mishto!"
40014028	Penas o Petro ap leste: "Rai, tu te hal kowa, pen mange, te djap ap o pani pash tute!"
40014029	"Ab!" penas lo. Un o Petro djas dran o panjeskro ulepaskro, un djas ap o pani pash o Jesuseste.
40014030	Ap jek kopo haiwas lo, har sorelo o ducho pral o baro pani phurdas. Un i daar tapras les. Koi djas lo lokes tele, un das i darjatar gole: "Rai, ma muk man tassedo te djal!"
40014031	O Jesus rikras leske o wast koi, tapras les, un penas ap leste: "Tiro patsepen hi tikno. Hoske patsal man gar?"
40014032	Un jon djan ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un ko sorelo ducho phurdas buder gar.
40014033	Kolla, kai ap o panjeskro ulepaskro his, witsran pen glan o Jesuseste tele, un penan: "Tchatchepaha, tu hal o Debleskro tchawo."
40014034	Un jon uleran wergal un wan an o them Genezaret.
40014035	Un har i menshe kote dikan, te was o Jesus pash lende, mukan le kowa an kol tsele gaba un forja trujal te penell. Un kote anan le i tsele nasselen pash leste,
40014036	un mangan lestar, te mukell lo len i kotar leskro ripen an-taprell. Un hakeno, kai les an-tapras, was sasto.
40015001	Ap ko tsiro wan i Farisarja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre dran o foro Jerusalem pash o Jesuseste, un penan ap leste:
40015002	"Hoske thowenn tire mala pengre wasta gar glan o chapen, jaake har mare phure menge penan?"
40015003	Penas o Jesus ap lende: Tumenge hi kol phurengre laba budeder moldo, har o Debleskre laba. Hoske krenn tumer gar, hoi o Dewel kamella?
40015004	O Dewel penas tumenge: Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto! Un o Dewel penas ninna: Koon ap peskro dadeste un ap peskri date i bibacht anella, kowa hunte merella!
40015005	-
40015006	Tumer penenn i menshenge: Koon penell ap peskro dadeste un ap peskri date: Kol lowe hoi hunte doms tumende, kol lowe dau o Debleste, ko mensho hunte dikell gar koi pre, te djal leskro dadeske mishto. Me penau tumenge: Jaake kran tumer, te krenn i menshe buder gar, hoi o Dewel penas. Kowa, hoi tumare phure penan, hi tumenge budeder moldo har o Debleskro lab.
40015007	Tumer rakrenn dui tchipjentsa. O Debleskro rakepaskro Jesaja penas o tchatchepen pral tumende, har job penas:
40015008	O Dewel penas: Kal menshe sharenn man pengre muja. Lengre djia hi dur mandar.
40015009	Jon te mangenn man an, hi kowa mange tchi moldo! Jon penenn i menshenge i menshengre laba un gar mire laba.
40015010	Un o Jesus das kol tsele menshende pash peste gole, kai kote tardo his. Un job penas ap lende: "Shunenn un haiwenn mishto, hoi me tumenge penau!
40015011	O chapen un o pipen, hoi i mensho an peskro mui tchiwella, kowa krell les gar pale-tchiddo. Kol tchilatche laba, hoi i mensho rakrella, kolla krenn les pale-tchiddo."
40015012	Pal kowa wan peskre mala pash leste un penan ap leste: "Djineh tu, kai i Farisarja choiran pen, har jon tire laba shunan?"
40015013	Penas lo: "Jon hi har ruka, kolen gar miro dad an o bolepen an i phub tchiwas, un jon wenna dran i phub win tsardedo.
