40015014	Mukenn le te rakrell! Jon hi korele un kamenn i korelen ap o wast te lenn. Un te lell i korelo i koreles ap o wast, perenn hake dui."
40015015	O Petro penas leske: "Pen menge, hoi kameh menge te penell kal labentsa pral o pale-tchiddo koowa?"
40015016	Penas lo: Haiwan tumer kowa witar gar?
40015017	Haiwenn tumer gar, kai lauter, hoi i mensho chala, djal an o per dre, un palle dran o mensheste win?
40015018	Te penell i mensho tchilatche laba, wenn kolla dran leskro dji win. Un kol tchilatche laba krenn o menshes pale-tchiddo.
40015019	Dran o mensheskro dji well o tchilatcho koowa, hoi an leskro shero trujal djal. Dran leskro dji well, te dell lo i wawares mulo. Te chochell i mursh peskri romjat, well kowa dran leskro dji. Te chochell i djuwel peskro romes, well kowa dran lakro dji. Dran o dji wella o wi-ladjedo koowa, o tchorepen, o chochepen, un o praassepen.
40015020	Kowa lauter krell i menshes pale-tchiddo. Job te thowell gar peskre wasta glan o chapen, krell les kowa gar pale-tchiddo.
40015021	Un o Jesus djas peske, un was an o them, kai i forja Tirus un Sidon tchiddo hi.
40015022	Kote djiwas i djuwel, kai kek biboldetsa hi. Joi hi i Kanaanetsa. Kaja was pash leste, un das ap leste gole: "Mo rai, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre! I beng hi an miri tchate. Un kowa marell lat khetne."
40015023	O Jesus penas tchi ap late. Koi wan peskre mala pash leste, un penan ap leste: "Joi dell sawi bari gole pal mende. Bitche lat tutar!"
40015024	Penas lo ap lende: "O Dewel bitchras man pash i Israeleskre menshende kokres. Kolla hi har bakre, kai nashedo hi."
40015025	Koi witsras li pes glan leste tele ap i phub, un penas: "Rai, kre miri tchai sasto!"
40015026	Penas lo ap late: "Kowa hi gar mishto, te lell jek o tchawengro chapen lendar, un witsrell les glan i djuklende."
40015027	"Tiro hi tchatcho, miro rai" penas li, "ninna i djukle chan i tikne kotja, hoi mukenn lengre raja ap i phub te perell."
40015028	Penas lo: "Romnija, tiro patsepen ap mande hi bares. O Dewel krell tuke kowa, hoi tu kameh." Un ap kau tsiro was lakri tchai sasto.
40015029	Un o Jesus djas peske, un was pash o baro pani an o them Galilea. Un kote djas lo ap i berga, un beshas pes kote tele.
40015030	Un bud menshe anan pengre nasselen pash leste: i bangen, i korelen, kolen, kai nashte rakrenn gar, kolen, kolengre wasta un herja gar sasto hi, un bud wawar nasselen. Un jon tchiwan kolen glan leste. Un job kras len sasto.
40015031	Un i tsele menshe, kai trul leste tardo hi, kran bare jaka, har jon dikan, har i nassele sasto wan. Kolla, kai nashte rakran gar, rakrenn nai. Un kolla, kolengre wasta un herja gar sasto his, len hi kanna saste wasta un herja. Un i bange nai djana. Un i korele nai dikenna. Har i menshe kowa dikan, sharan le o Israeleskro Debles.
40015032	Un o Jesus das peskre malen pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Man khaitenn kal menshe. Jon hi kanna triin diwessa pash mande, un len hi tchi te chal. Len hi buder kek soor. Dran kowa kamau len gar khere te bitchrell, te perenn le gar ap o drom khetne."
40015033	Un leskre mala putchan lestar: "Kai las mer doha maro an kau mulo them kal bud menshenge, te wenn le tchalo?"
40015034	Penas o Jesus: "Kitse mare hi tumen?" Penan le: "Efta mare, un gar bud tikne matche."
40015035	Koi penas lo ap kal tsele menshende, te beshenn le pen ap i phub.
40015036	Un job las kol efta mare un kol matche, parkras pes pash o Debleste, un phagas len an kotja. Un job das len peskre malende, un kolla dan len halauterende, kai kote beshdo hi.
40015037	Un jon chan lauter, un wan tchalo. Un pal o chapen hadan le kol kotja maro pre, hoi pral atchan. Un efta marengre gone wan pherdo.
40015038	Un kolla, kai chan, his star serja (4.000) mursha, ninna bud djuwja un tchawe.
40015039	Un job bitchras kol tsele menshen khere, un djas ap o panjeskro ulepaskro. Un jon uleran pash o gab Magadan.
40016001	Un i Farisarja un i Saddukarja wan pash o Jesuseste. Jon kaman te taprenn le les leskre labentsa un penan ap leste: "Kre menge i baro koowa, hoi sikrell mende, te well tiri soor o Deblestar!"
40016002	Koi penas lo ap lende: Te djal o kham tele, un o bolepen well lolo, penenn tumer: Taissar well shukar!
40016003	Un te hi o bolepen taissarlake lolo, penenn tumer: Wella brishin! Jaake dikenn tumer ap o bolepen, un djinenn, hoi wella. Kowa, hoi kanna mashkral tumende djala, kowa haiwenn tumer gar.
40016004	Har tchilatcho hi kol menshe, kai djiwenn an kau tsiro! Jon mukan o Debles, un kamenn i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell. Un o Dewel sikrell len tchi wawar har kowa, hoi i menshe ninna ap o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jona, dikan. Un o Jesus mukas len, un djas peske.
40016005	Un o Jesuseskre mala wan ap i wawar panjeskri rig, un haiwan, te bistran le o maro lentsa te lell.
40016006	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Denn jak! O shutlo jarro hi gar mishto, hoi well i Farisarjendar un i Saddukarjendar!"
40016007	Har jon kowa shunan, rakran le pral leskre laba un penan: "Mer lam kek maro mentsa. Doleske penas lo kowa menge."
40016008	O Jesus haiwas, hoi jon penan, un job penas ap lende: "Hoske rakrenn tumer pral o maro, hoi tumer bistran? Hawo tikno patsepen hi tumen!
40016009	Tumer haiwan man gar. Bistran tumer kol pantch mare, hoi dom kol pantch serja menshende te chal? Un pal ko chapen hadan tumer deesh-te-dui marengre gone pherdo maro pre, hoi pral atchas.
40016010	Un bistran tumer ninna kol efta mare, hoi dom kol star serja menshende te chal? Un pal ko chapen hadan tumer efta marengre gone pherdo maro pre, hoi pral atchas.
40016011	Haiwenn tumer kanna, kai me rakrom gar pral o maro, har penom: Denn jak! O shutlo jarro hi gar mishto, hoi well i Farisarjendar un i Saddukarjendar!"
40016012	Un koi haiwan le, te rakras lo gar pral o shutlo jarro, hoi lenn le, te pekenn le maro. Job rakras pral kol laba, hoi i Farisarja un i Saddukarja i menshenge penenna.
40016013	O Jesus djas pash o foro Cesarea Filipi. Un kote putchas lo peskre malendar: "Hoi penenn i menshe pral o Menshengro Tchaweste?"
40016014	Un leskre mala penan ap leste: "Jon penenna, tu hal o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani. Wawar penenna, kai tu hal o Elija. Un wawar penenna, kai tu hal o Jeremia. Un pale wawar penenna, kai tu hal i Debleskro rakepaskro, kai i mulendar pre stas."
40016015	Penas lo: "Un hoi penenn tumer, koon me hom?"
40016016	Penas o Simon Petro: "Tu hal o baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas te well job. Tu hal o tchawo o djido Deblestar."
40016017	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Bachtelo hal tu, Simon Bar-Jona. Kol laba, hoi tu pral mande penal, kolla wan gar tutar, witar gar wawar menshendar. Miro dad an o bolepen sikras tut kowa.
40016018	Doleske penau tuke: Tiro lab hi kanna Petro. Kowa, hoi tu kate penal, hi har i sorelo bar, ap koleste tchiwau miro kheer. Un miro kheer hi kolla, kai patsenn ap mande. Un kek nashte lell len dran mire wasta win, ninna kek merepen.
40016019	Me dau tut i klidepaskro, hoi krell o wudar pre, te wenn i menshe ap miro drom. Ap koleste, kai tu peneh: O Dewel las tiri doosh tutar, kolestar hi li krik lino. Ap koleste, kai tu peneh: Tiri doosh atchell ap tute, ap koleste atchell leskri doosh tchiddo."
40016020	Pal kowa penas lo peskre malenge, te penenn le kekeske, te hi lo ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
40016021	Un ap ko tsiro penas o Jesus peskre malenge, te hunte djal lo an o foro Jerusalem. Un job penas lenge: "Me hunte lap bud duka ap mande. I bare rashaja, un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre, kolla marenn man. Un pal triin diwessa krell man o Dewel djido."
40016022	Koi las o Petro les ap i rig, un tchingras ap leste un penas: "Mo rai, ko nashte well gar. Ma muk kowa pral tute te well!"
40016023	O Jesus risras pes trujal, un penas ap o Petreste: "Dja tuke, tu beng! Tu kameh man o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Tu kameh gar, hoi o Dewel kamella. Na-a, tu kameh, hoi i menshe kamenna."
40016024	Palle penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala, kowa hunte bistrell, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, un hunte lell peskro trushel ap peste, un djal mantsa.
40016025	Koon peskro djipen soreles kamella, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen mange nashrella, lell les mandar pale.
40016026	I mensheske wals kowa gar mishto, te lals lo o tselo brawlepen ap kai phub, un nashrals o djipen. I mensho nai dell tchi o Debleste, te lell lo ko djipen pale.
40016027	Me hom o Menshengro Tchawo. Un me wau pale ap i phub an o railepen, hoi das man miro dad an o bolepen. Un mantsa wenna mire bolepangre. Un palle dikau ap hakeneste, hoi job kras. Un me dau latcho koowa kolen, kai latcho koowa kran. Un me dau i phagi kolen, kai tchilatcho koowa kran.
40016028	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Mashkral tumende hi sawe menshe, kai merenn gar, bis te dikenn le o Menshengro Tchawes, har job o baro rai hi.
40017001	Un pal shob diwessa djas o Jesus ap i bari berga. Leha khetne djas o Petro un kol dui phrala, o Jakobo un o Johanni. Kek wawar djas lentsa.
40017002	Un glan lengre jaka las lo i bolepaskro railepen. Leskro mui was har o kham. Un leskro ripen was bijalo har i bari momeli.
40017003	Un ap jek kopo dikan le o Moses un o Elijas koi tardo, kai leha rakrenn.
40017004	Koi penas o Petro ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, hi mishto, te ham mer kate. Tu te kameh, krau me triin tikne khera kate, jek tuke, jek o Moseske, un jek o Elijeske."
40017005	Un har job jaake rakras, was i parni wolka pral lende tele. Un dran koi wolka was o rakepen, hoi penas: "Kawa hi miro tchawo! Koles kamau o djijestar. Job krell man bachtelo. Shunenn ap leste!"
40017006	Un har jon kowa shunan, witsran le pen i bari darjatar ap i phub.
40017007	Un o Jesus djas pash lende, tchiwas peskre wasta ap lende, un penas: "Stenn pre! Ma darenn!"
40017008	Un jon dikan pre, un dikan kekes buder, har o Jesuses kokres.
40017009	Un o Jesus djas lentsa koi berga tele, un penas soreles ap lende: "Penenn kekeske, hoi tumer dikan, jaake raha har o Menshengro Tchawo gar i mulendar pre stas!"
40017010	Un leskre mala putchan lestar: "Hoske penenn mare tchatchepangre, kai o Elija hunte well glan ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella?"
40017011	Penas lo: "Kowa hi tchatcho: O Elija wella, un anell o Debleskre menshen lauter pale khetne.
40017012	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: O Elija was pale. Jon prindjran les gar, un kran leha, hoi jon kaman. Un jaake hunte lell ninna o Menshengro Tchawo bud duka ap peste."
40017013	Kote haiwan leskre mala, te rakras lo o Johannestar, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani.
40017014	Un har jon pash kol tsele menshende wan, kai kote tardo hi, was i mursh pash o Jesuseste. Kowa witsras pes glan leste ap i phub,
40017015	un penas: "Rai, kre tiro dji miro tchaweske pre! Job hi jaake nasselo, har te wals lo dinelo, un job perell ap i phub. Bud kope peras lo an i jag, un bud kope peras lo an i pani.
40017016	Me anom les pash tire malende, te krenn le les sasto. Un jon nashte kran kowa gar."
40017017	Koi penas o Jesus: "Tumer tchilatche menshe, tumen hi kek patsepen! Har raha hunte atchap pash tumende? Har raha marap man tumentsa tele? Anenn les pash mande!"
40017018	Un o Jesus das o benges trad, un penas leske, te djal job dran koleste win. Un o beng djas dran leste win. Un ko tchawo was sasto.
40017019	Koi wan o Jesuseskre mala pash o Jesuseste, har job kokres his, un putchan lestar: "Hoske tradam mer les nashte gar win?"
40017020	-
40017021	Penas lo ap lende: "Tumaro patsepen hi tikno. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te wals tumaro patsepen ninna tikno har i senftikro djob, nai penans tumer ap kai berga: Tchip tut ap koi wawar rig! Un koi berga tchiwals pes ap i wawar rig. Un tchi nashte wals, hoi tumer nashte gar krans."
40017022	Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa an o them Galilea trujal. Ap o drom penas lo ap lende: "O Menshengro Tchawo well an i menshengre wasta dino.
40017023	Un jon marenn les. Pal triin diwessa well lo o Deblestar djides kerdo." Un ko lab dukas len an o dji.
40017024	Un jon djan an o foro Kapernaum. Kote his kolla, kai lenn o Debleskro khereskre lowe khetne. Kolla wan pash o Petreste, un putchan lestar: "Dell tumaro sikepaskro kol Debleskro khereskre lowe?" "Awa," penas lo, "kowa plaissrell job."
40017025	Un o Petro djas an o kheer dre, te penell lo kowa o Jesuseske. Har o Jesus dikas, te well o Petro pash leste, putchas lo lestar: "Petro, koon hunte dell kol lowe i bare rajende ap kai phub? Hunte denn lengre menshe lende kol lowe? Hunte denn i wi-themarja lende kol lowe?"
40017026	Penas o Petro: "I wi-themarja hunte denn kol lowe ap i bare rajende." "Mishto," penas o Jesus, "jaake hunte plaissrenna lengre menshe tchi ap lende.
40017027	Ninna te hi kowa jaake, kamah gar, te wenn le chojedo ap mende. Doleske dja pash o baro pani, un witse i raan an o pani! Ko matcho, hoi tu tapreh, koleske kre o mui pre! Un tu hatseh an leskro mui i rupeni bema. Le koi rupeni bema, un de koi bema kolende, kai len kol lowe dre! Kowa hi doha mange un tuke."
40018001	Ap ko tsiro wan leskre mala pash leste un putchan lestar: "Koon hi o bareder mashkral kolende, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom?"
40018002	Koi das o Jesus i tikno tchawes pash peste gole, un tchiwas les glan lende,
40018003	un penas: Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Tumer te mukenn gar tumaro drom, un wenn gar har i tchawe, palle nashte wenn gar ap o Debleskro drom.
40018004	Koon krell pes gar bares un well har kau tchawo, kowa hi o bareder mank kolende, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom.
40018005	Un kowa, kai lell sawo tchawo pash peste pre, kowa lell man pash peste pre.
40018006	Kowa, kai anell jekes kal tikneder, kai patsenn ap mande, miro dromestar tele, koleske wals feteder, te well leske i pharo bar trul i meen pandlo, un te well lo tassedo an o baro pani.
40018007	I bibacht hi kowa, kai della ap kai phub bud koowa, hoi anell i menshen ap o tchilatcho drom. Hawo bibacht well ap koleste, kai anell i wawaren ap o tchilatcho drom!
40018008	Te kamell tiro wast, te kress i tchilatcho koowa, de les tele un witse les tutar! Te kamell tut tiro piro ap o tchilatcho drom te anel, de les tele, un witse les tutar! Hi tuke latcheder, te nashress tu jek wast un jek piro, un leh ko djipen, hoi o Dewel tut della, har te djas tu dui wastentsa un dui pirentsa an i jag, hoi hako tsireske chatchella.
40018009	Un te kamel tiro jak tchomone te dikell, hoi anell tut ap o tchilatcho drom, palle tchin les win, un witse les tutar! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress jek jak, un leh o djipen, hoi o Dewel tut della, har te djas dui jakentsa an o bengeskri jag.
40018010	Ma tchiwenn kol tiknen ap i rig, har te wans le tchi moldo. Me penau tumenge: I bolepangre, kai ap lende jak denna, kolla nai djana hako tsiro glan miro dadeste an o bolepen, te mangenn le les lenge.
40018011	O Menshengro Tchawo was ap i phub, te anell lo kolen ap o Debleskro drom pale, kai nashedo hi.
40018012	Kowa hi jaake, har te hi i murshes sheel bakre, un jek lendar djal nashedo. Palle mukell lo kol enja-deesh-te-enja (99) bakre ap i pralstuno them tardo, un rodell ko jek bakres, hoi nashedo hi.
40018013	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Un te hatsell lo les, palle hi lo bachtleder pral ko jekeste, har pral kol tsele wawar, hoi khetne atchan.
40018014	Un jaake kamell miro dad an o bolepen gar, te djal jek kol tikneder nashedo.
40018015	Te krell tiro phraal tchilatcho koowa ap tute, palle dja pash leste kokres, un pen leske, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras. Un te dikell lo, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi tu leske penal, palle anal tu tiro phrales pale ap miro drom.
40018016	Job te shunell gar ap tute, palle le dui wawar phralen tuha, un dja pash leste, te shunenn le, hoi tu leske peneh. Jaake djinenn dui, triin, hoi job kras.
40018017	Te shunell lo kau kopo witar gar ap tumende, palle pen les i patslenge an i kangri. Un te shunell lo gar ap kolende, palle well lo tumenge har i mursh, kai prindjrell o Debles gar un har i pale-tchiddo.
40018018	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap koleste, kai tumer penenna: O Dewel las tiri doosh tutar, kolestar hi li krik lino. Ap koleste, kai tumer penenna: Tiri doosh atchell ap tute, ap koleste atchell leskri doosh tchiddo.
40018019	Me penau tumenge ninna: Te mangenn dui tumendar khetne tchomone o Deblestar, palle dell len miro dad an o bolepen kowa, hoi jon lestar mangan.
40018020	Un kote, kai dui, triin menshe khetne wenna an miro lab, kote hom me mashkral lende.
40018021	Koi djas o Petro pash leste, un putchas lestar: "Rai, te hi miro phraal bud kope tchilatcho ap mande, kitse kope hunte bistrap ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi job ap mande kras? Hi efta kope doha?"
40018022	Penas o Jesus ap leste: Na-a, me penau tuke, efta kope hi gar doha. Tu hunte bistress kowa efta-deesh kope un pale efta-deesh kope, jaake raha har job ap tute tchilatcho koowa krella.
40018023	Me kamau te sikrap tumende har pash kolende hi, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom. O Dewel an o bolepen hi har i baro rai. Kowa mukell peskre budepangren glan peste te anell, te lell lo lendar kol lowe, hoi jon leske khetne anan dran pengri budi.
40018024	Koi was i mursh glan leste anlo. Koles his deesh serja rupene beme sijaan pash leste.
40018025	Kowa nashte plaissras kowa gar pale. Koi penas o rai: Bikrenn les peskri romjaha, un peskre tchawentsa, un lauterentsa, hoi les hi! Un denn mande kol lowe, hoi tumer lenge dre lenna!
40018026	Koi witsras pes ko mursh glan leste ap i phub, un penas: Rai, me mangau tut: Ab latches ap mande! De man i tsiro, te nai plaissrap miri sijaan pash tute!
40018027	Un o rajes khaitas kowa, un job mukas leske leskri tseli sijaan te perell, un mukas les te djal.
40018028	Un o mursh djas dran o kheer win, un tapras i wawar budepaskres ap o drom. Kales his sheel beme sijaan pash leste. Koi tchiwas lo peskre wasta trul koleskri meen, te tassrell lo les, un penas ap leste: De man kanna mire lowe pale!
40018029	Koi witsras pes kau mursh glan ko wawareste ap i phub un penas: Me mangau tut: Ab latches ap mande, un de man i tsiro, te nai plaissrap me tuke len pale!
40018030	Ko wawar mursh kamas tchi te shunell, un witsras les an o stilepen, te atchell job kote jaake raha, har job gar koi sijaan pale plaissras.
40018031	Un har shunan kowa kol tsele wawar budepangre, kai o rajeske budrenna, dukas kowa len an o dji. Un jon djan pash o rajeste, un penan leske lauter, hoi jon shunan.
40018032	Koi das o rai ap ko mursheste gole, un penas ap leste: Tu hal i tchilatcho budepaskro. Me mukom tiri sijaan tuke te perell, har tu mandar mangal.
40018033	Jaake har dikom latches ap tute, jaake hunte dikals tu ninna latches ap koleste, kai les hi i sijaan pash tute.
40018034	Un pherdo choli das les o rai an i wasta kolendar, kai denn les dawa an o stilepen. Kote hunte atchell job jaake raha, har job gar koi sijaan pale plaissras.
40018035	Un o Jesus penas dureder: Te bistrenn tumer gar o tselo djijestar o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar phraal ap tumende kras, jaake krell miro dad an o bolepen emligo tumentsa.
40019001	Un har o Jesus kowa lauter peskre malenge penas, djas lo lentsa dran o them Galilea win, un was an o them Judea wergal o pani Jordan.
40019002	Un bud menshe djan leske palla. Un job kras i nasselen kote sasto.
40019003	Un i Farisarja wan pash leste, un kaman les leskre labentsa te taprell. Un jon putchan lestar: "Nai tradell i mursh peskri romjat pestar, ninna te kras li kek tchilatchepen?"
40019004	Penas lo: "Tumer djinenn, hoi hi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: O Dewel kras o murshes un i djuwjat.
40019005	Un job penas: Doleske mukell i mursh peskro dades un peskri da, te djiwell lo peskri romjaha khetne. Un kol dui wenna har jek.
40019006	Jaake hi le har jek un buder gar dui. Un kowa, hoi o Dewel khetne anas, kowa hunte krell i mensho gar paash!"
40019007	Penan le ap leste: "Te hi kowa jaake, hoske tchinas o Mose an peskro liil: Te kamell i mursh peskri romjat te mukell, pali hunte dell lo lat i liil, kai tchindlo hi, kai job mukas lat?"
40019008	Penas lo ap lende: "Tumaro dji hi dran bar, kai o Debleskro lab gar dre djal. Doleske tchinas o Mose, kai nai mukenn tumer tumari romjat. Ap ko tsiro, kai o Dewel i murshes un i djuwjat kras, his kowa gar jaake.
40019009	Me penau tumenge: Te hi jekes i romni, kai chochas les gar i wawar mursheha, un job mukell lat, un romedinerell i wawar djuwjat, kowa chochell peskri romjat."
40019010	Penan leskre mala ap leste: "Te hi kowa jaake, palle hi i mursheske feteder, te romedinerell lo gar."
40019011	Penas lo: "Kau lab, hoi me penom, haiwell gar hakeno. Kolen, kai o Dewel kau lab an o dji tchiwas, kolla haiwenn les.
40019012	Della menshe, kai wan jaake boldo, kai hi lenge kowa gar mishto, te romedinerenn le. Un wawar wan jaake ap o mass tchindlo, te romedinerenn le nai gar. Wawar kamenn o tselo djijestar o Debleske te budrell. Doleske romedinerenn le gar. Koneske kau lab mishto hi, kowa te krell jaake."
40019013	Koi anan le tchawen pash o Jesuseste, te tchiwell lo peskre wasta ap lende, te mangell lo o Debles, te dikell job latches ap lende. Har peskre mala kowa dikan, tchingran le ap kol menshende.
40019014	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Mukenn kol tchawen pash mande te well! Ma rikrenn len pale! Sawe har jon, kolen das o Dewel gole, te djiwenn le khetne leha an o bolepen."
40019015	Un job tchiwas peskre wasta ap lende, un djas peske.
40019016	Un i mursh was pash leste un penas: "Sikepaskro, hawo latcho koowa hunte krap, te well man o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
40019017	Penas o Jesus: "Hoske putcheh tu mandar, hoi latcho hi? O Dewel kokres hi latcho. Tu te kameh o Debleskro djipen, palle kre kowa, hoi job penas!"
40019018	Koi putchas lo lestar: "Hoi hunte krap?" Penas o Jesus: "Ma mare kekes! Ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Ma tchore! Ma pen chochepen pral jekeste!
40019019	Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto! Un ap koleste, kai pash tute hi hunte wess jaake latches, har hal latches ap tute kokres."
40019020	Koi penas ko tarno mursh ap leste: "Kowa lauter krom. Hoi hunte krap budeder?"
40019021	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Te kameh tu o tselo Debleskro kamlepen te krell, palle bike lauter, hoi tut hi! Un de kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi tut i brawlepen an o bolepen. Un am un dja mantsa!"
40019022	Ko tarno murshes his bud brawlepen. Har job kal laba shunas, dukas kowa les. Un job djas peske.
40019023	Un o Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Pharo hi i braweleske, te well lo ap o Debleskro drom.
40019024	Me penau tumenge ninna: Hi gar jaake pharo, te djal i baro ficho an i subjakro kand dre har te well i brawelo ap o Debleskro drom."
40019025	Har leskre mala kowa shunan, tapras len i daar. Un jon putchan lestar: "Te hi kowa jaake, koon lell nai o Debleskro djipen?"
40019026	Un o Jesus dikas ap lende, un penas: "I menshe krenn nai kowa gar. O Dewel krell nai halauter."
40019027	Koi penas o Petro ap leste: "Djineh, mer mukam lauter un djam tuha. Hoi lah mer?"
40019028	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ko tsiro wella, kai o Dewel lauter newes krella. Ap ko tsiro hi o Menshengro Tchawo o rai pral lauterende, un job hi beshdo ap peskro rajeskro beshepaskro. Un tumer, kai mantsa djana, tumer wenn ninna raja, un han beshdo ap deesh-te-dui rajeskre beshepangre, un rakrenn o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, kai wenna i deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawendar.
40019029	Un hakeno, kai mukas peskro kheer, peskre phralen, peskre phenjen, peskro dades, peskri dat, peskre tchawen un peskro kotar them, te djal lo mantsa, kowa lell sheel kope pale, hoi job mukas. Un o Dewel dell les o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
40019030	Un bud, kai kanna glan tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes palla tardo. Un bud, kai kanna palla tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes glan tardo."
40020001	Un o Jesus penas lenge, har kote hi, kai dell o Dewel menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. O Dewel hi har i rai, koles his i kotar them, kai drakengre ruka tardo hi. Sik taissarlake djas lo an o foro dre, un rodas peske i budepangren, te budrenn le ap leskro kotar them.
40020002	Kolentsa kras job win, te dell lo len jek rupeni bema kau diweske. Palle bitchras lo len ap peskro kotar them, te budrenn le leske.
40020003	Har enjenge his, djas job pale an o foro, un dikas wawaren, kai his len kek budi.
40020004	Ap kolende penas lo: Djan ap miro kotar them, un budrenn mange! Me dau tumen jaake bud lowe, har tumari budi moldo hi. Un jon djan kote.
40020005	Har o paash diwes trujal his, djas lo pale an o foro dre, hatsas wawaren, kai hi len kek budi, un bitchras len ninna ap peskro kotar them. Ninna har trinenge his, kras job kowa jaake.
40020006	Har pantchenge his, djas lo pale an ko foro, dikas pale wawaren koi trujal tardo, un penas ap lende: Hoske han tumer koi tardo, un budrenn gar?
40020007	Penan le: Kek das men i budi. Koi penas job: Djan ap miro kotar them, un budrenn mange kote!
40020008	Har i rati was, penas ko rai ap peskro pralstuno budepaskro: De i budepangren khetne gole, un de len lengre lowe! De kolen pengre lowe, kai an i rat wan, un palle kolen, kai o paash diwes wan, un palle kolen kai taissarlake wan!
40020009	Koi wan kolla glan leste, kai an i rat wan, un lan jek rupeni bema lestar. Un lauter, kai pal lende wan, lan ninna jek rupeni bema lestar.
40020010	Har kolla pash leste wan, kai budran o tselo diwes, patsan le, te lenn le budeder lowe. Ninna jon lan jek rupeni bema.
40020011	Koi tchingran le ap ko rajeste, un penan:
40020012	Kolla, kai an i rat wan, budran i tikno tsiro. Tu dal len jaake bud lowe har men. Tu djineh, te budram mer o tselo diwes. Un o kham chatchas soreles ap mende.
40020013	Koi penas ko rai ap jekeste lendar: Miro maal, me chochom tut gar. Tu kral mantsa win, te budress mange, un te leh jek rupeni bema mandar.
40020014	Kanna le tire lowe, un dja khere! Me kamau, te dap koleste, kai an i rat was, jaake bud lowe har tut.
40020015	Me krau nai mire lowentsa, hoi me kamau. Hoske hal tu tchilatcho ap mande, te hom me latcho?
40020016	Un o Jesus penas dureder: "Dikenn, jaake wenn bud palla tardo, kai kanna glan tardo hi. Ninna wenn bud glan tardo, kai kanna palla tardo hi."
40020017	Un job djas dureder, te well lo an o foro Jerusalem. Ap o drom las lo peskre deesh-te-dui malen ap i rig, un penas lenge:
40020018	"Shunenn, mer djah kanna an o foro Jerusalem. Kote denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta kol bare rashajendar un kol tchatchepangre murshendar. Un kolla krenn win, te well lo maredo.
40020019	Jon denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi. Un kolla praassenn les, denn les dawa i tchupnijaha, un denn les ap o trushel, te merell lo. Pal triin diwessa krell o Dewel les pale djido."
40020020	Pal kowa was o Zebedeskri romni lakre tchawentsa, o Jakobeha un o Johanneha, pash o Jesuseste. Un joi witsras pes glan leste ap i phub, te mangas li lestar tchomone.
40020021	"Hoi kameh tu?" putchas lo latar. Penas li: "Ap ko diwes, kai tu hal o baro rai pral i tsele menshende, muk mire dui tchawen ap tiri rig te beshell: Jek ap tiri tchatchi rig un ko wawar ap tiri serwi rig."
40020022	Penas o Jesus: "Tumer djinenn gar, hoi mangenna mandar. Nai lenn tumer kol duka ap tumende, hoi me hunte lap ap mande?" Penan le: "Awa, ko nai krah mer."
40020023	"Hi tchatcho," penas lo, "tumer hunte lenna bud duka ap tumende, jaake har me hunte lap len ap mande. Ninna te hi jaake, nai penau tumenge gar, koon beshell ap miri tchatchi rig un ap miri serwi rig. Kowa hi gar an miro wast. Miro dad an o bolepen rodas kolen win, kai ap miri rig beshenna."
40020024	Un har kol wawar deesh kowa shunan, wan le chojemen ap kol dui phralende.
40020025	Doleske das len o Jesus pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, i bare raja un i pralstune ap kai phub, len hi penepaske pral i menshende an pengre themma. Un jon rikrenn i menshen sorjaha tele. Un jon hunte shunenn ap lende un hunte budrenn lenge.
40020026	Mank tumende hunte well kowa gar jaake! Koon tumendar kamell, te well lo baro, kowa hunte well tumenge koi.
40020027	Un koon tumendar kamell o pralstuno te well, kowa hunte well tumaro budepaskro.
40020028	Ninna o Menshengro Tchawo was gar ap i phub, te budrenn i menshen leske. Na-a. Job was ap i phub, te well lo lenge koi, un te merell lo budenge. Un jaake lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."
40020029	Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa dran o foro Jericho win. Un bud menshe djan leske palla.
40020030	Pash o drom his dui korele mursha beshdo. Kolla shunan, te well o Jesus ap o drom. Un jon dan gole: "Maro rai, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji menge pre!"
40020031	Kol menshe, kai djan o Jesuseha, tchingran ap kol dujende, un penan ap lende: "Mukenn tele! Atchenn!" Koi dan jon budeder gole: "Maro rai, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji menge pre!"
40020032	Un o Jesus atchas tardo, kharas len pash peste, un penas: "Hoi kamenn tumer, te krap tumenge?"
40020033	"Rai!" penan le, "mer mangah tut: Kre mare jaka sasto, te dikas nai pale!"
40020034	Un o Jesuseske djas kowa phares an o dji. Un job tchiwas peskre wasta ap lengre jaka. Un ap jek kopo dikan le pale. Un jon djan leha.
40021001	Ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem wan le an o gab Betfage, kai pash o djeteskri berga tchiddo hi. Un kote penas o Jesus ap dujende peskre malendar:
40021002	"Djan an o gab koi wergal! Kote hatsenn tumer i esla pandlo un lakro tarnepen pash late. Pandenn len tele, un anenn len pash mande!
40021003	Jon te putchenn tumendar, hoi tumer lentsa kamenn te krell, palle penenn lenge: Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job koi pre. Un jon denn len tumende."
40021004	Un kowa djas jaake, har o Dewel kowa glan i raha tsiro ap o Debleskro rakepaskro penas:
40021005	"Penenn i menshenge an o foro Jerusalem: Dik, tiro baro rai well pash tute. Job hi latcho un krell pes gar bares. Job hi beshdo ap i esla, ap i tarni esla.
40021006	Un o Jesuseskre mala djan an o gab, un kran jaake, har o Jesus ap lende penas.
40021007	Un jon anan koi esla un lakro tarnepen pash leste, un tchiwan pengre ripja koi pre. Un o Jesus beshas pes pral pre.
40021008	Un bud bud menshe, kai leha djan, tchiwan pengre ripja ap o drom. Un wawar dan i bare patria i rukendar tele, un tchiwan len ap o drom.
40021009	Un kol bud menshe, kai djan glan leste un pal leste, dan bari gole: "Sharas o Davideskro tchawes! Sharedo well kowa, koles o Dewel bitchras. Sharas o Debles an o bolepen!"
40021010	Un har o Jesus an o foro Jerusalem was, wan kote i tsele menshe diwjo, un jon putchan: "Koon hi kowa?"
40021011	Un kol bud menshe, kai leha djan, penan lenge: "Kawa hi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesus, kai was dran o foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea tchiddo hi."
40021012	Un o Jesus djas an o Debleskro baro kheer, un tradas lauteren win, kai kote bikran un ginan. Un job witsras i lowengre stamja kolendar trujal, kai kol menshenge lowe paran. Ninna i stamja kolendar, kai tchirkle bikran, witsras lo trujal.
40021013	Un job penas ap kol tsele menshende: "O Dewel penas: Miro kheer te well i kheer, kai sharenn man i menshe un mangenn man an. Tumer kran lestar i kheer, kai i menshe chochenna un randenna."
40021014	Koi wan korele un bange an o Debleskro baro kheer pash o Jesuseste, un job kras len sasto.
40021015	Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre dikan ko baro koowa, hoi o Jesus kote kras an o Debleskri soor. Un jon shunan, har i tchawe an o Debleskro baro kheer bari gole dan un penan: "Sharas o Davideskro tchawes!" Un jon wan chojedo ap o Jesuseste,
40021016	un penan ap leste: "Shuneh tu, hoi kol tchawe kote penenna?" "Awa," penas o Jesus ap lende, "me shunau len. Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Tu, o Dewel, kral, te sharenn tut i tchawe un i tarne."
40021017	Un job mukas len, djas dran o foro win, un was an o gab Betani. Un kote atchas lo pral i rat.
40021018	Un o wawar diwes taissarlake, djas job an o foro pale. Ap o drom las lo bok.
40021019	Un har job i faigetikro ruk dikas, djas lo kote un hatsas tchi har i patria kokres ap leste. Koi penas lo ap ko ruk: "Kek tsireske wenna pale faige ap tute!" Un ap jek kopo meras kau ruk tele.
40021020	Un har leskre mala kowa dikan, kran le bare jaka, un putchan lestar: "Har nai meras kau ruk jaake sik tele?"
40021021	Penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Tumer te patsenn ap o Debleste, te krell lo nai hako koowa, palle nai krenn tumer ninna budeder, har me krom kau rukeha. Tumer penenn nai ap koi berga: Hade tut un witse tut an o baro pani! Un kai berga krell kowa.
40021022	Te patsenn tumer, te lenn kowa, hoi mangenna o Deblestar, palle lenn tumer kowa lauter ninna."
40021023	Un har o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer was, ap i menshende rakras, un len o Debleskro drom sikras, koi wan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder pash leste, un putchan lestar: "Koon penas tuke, te kress tu kowa lauter? Koon bitchras tut?"
40021024	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Ninna me kamau tumendar tchomone te putchell. Tumer te penenn les mange, palle penau me tumenge ninna, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa lauter.
40021025	Kanna putchau me tumendar: Bitchras o Dewel o Johannes, te thowell lo i menshen an o pani? Bitchran i menshe o Johannes?" Un jon rakran mashkral pende, un penan: "Te penah mer leske: O Dewel bitchras o Johannes, palle penell lo menge: Hoske patsan tumer les gar?
40021026	Te penah mer leske: I menshe bitchran o Johannes, palle hunte trashas i menshendar. Jon patsenna, te hi o Johanni i Debleskro rakepaskro."
40021027	Un jaake penan le ap o Jesuseste: "Mer djinah les gar." Koi penas lo ap lende: "Jaake penau tumenge witar gar, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa."
40021028	"Kanna kamau tumenge tchomone te penell: His i dad. Koles his dui tchawe. Un job djas pash ko phureder tchaweste, un penas ap leste: Mo tchawo, dja ap ko kotar them, kai hi i drakengre ruka tardo, un bude kote!
40021029	Penas kowa: Na-a, me kamau gar. Pal i tikno tsiro, khaitas les kowa, hoi job penas. Un job djas, te budrell lo kote.
40021030	Un o dad djas ninna pash o tarneder, un penas leske i emlige laba. Un ko tarneder penas: Awa, mo rai, me djau kote. Un job djas gar.
40021031	Koon kol dujendar kras kowa, hoi o dad kamas?" Penan le ap leste: "O phureder." Penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol bibolde, kai i lowe i Remarjenge dre lenna un hi tumenge pale-tchiddo, un i lubja wenna sikeder ap o Debleskro drom har tumer.
40021032	Har o Johanni pash tumende was, te sikrell lo tumende o tchatcho drom, patsan tumer leske gar. I pale-tchidde un i lubja patsan ap leskre laba. Ninna har tumer dikan, te patsan kolla ap leskre laba, mukan tumer gar tumaro tchilatcho drom un patsan leske witar gar."
40021033	Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi: "Shunenn, hoi me tumenge kanna penau. His i rai. Koles his i kotar them. Kote tchiwas lo drakengre ruka an i phub. Trul ko kotar them tchiwas lo barra. Un kote kras lo ninna i platsa an i phub, kai nai stakrenn le ap i drake, te well i mool win. Mashkral kol ruka kras lo i kheer, kai kowa beshdo hi, kai dell garda ap i drake. Palle patsas o rai ko kotar them ap i hachende, te budrenn le kote leske. Un job djas peske an i wawar them.
40021034	Har ko tsiro was, te anenn le i drake dre, bitchras lo peskre budepangren pash i hachende, te lenn le lendar kol drake, hoi leske hi.
40021035	I hache tapran kol budepangren. Ko jekes dan le dawa, un ko wawares maran le. Un pale i wawares witsran le i barentsa mulo.
40021036	Job bitchras wawar budepangren pash lende, budeder har job o glanstuno kopo bitchras. Un i hache kran lentsa jaake, har kol wawarentsa.
40021037	Koi penas o rai peske: Miro tchawestar darenn le. Un jaake bitchras lo peskro tchawes pash lende.
40021038	Har i hache leskro tchawes dikan, rakran le mashkral pende: Kowa hi leskro tchawo, kai lauter lella pal peskro dadeskro merepen. Awenn, maras les, te well kau kotar them menge, hoi leske hunte wals.
40021039	Un jon tapran les, tradan les dran ko drakengro them win, un maran les."
40021040	Kanna putchas o Jesus kolendar, kai kote tardo hi: "Hoi krell o rai pral ko drakengro them kol hachentsa, te well lo pale?"
40021041	Penan le ap o Jesuseste: "Job marell kol tchilatche murshen. Les khaitenn jon gar. Un job dell ko kotar them kol wawarende, kai leske i drake an o tchatcho tsiro dre anenna."
40021042	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi? Kote hi tchindlo: His i bar, kai i budepangre lestar penan: Kowa hi tchi moldo. Ko bar las o Dewel un tchiwas les jaake an o kheer, te rikrell lo ko tselo kheer khetne. O Dewel kras kowa, un kowa hi i baro koowa menge."
40021043	Awa, me penau tumenge: An ko tsiro, hoi wella, han tumer buder gar o Debleskre menshe. O Dewel dell wawar menshen khetne gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne. Un jon krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella.
40021044	Koon ap kau bar perella, kowa merella. Ap koneste kau bar perella, koles dell ko bar khetne."
40021045	I bare rashaja un i Farisarja shunan kol laba un haiwan, te rakras lo lendar.
40021046	Un jon kaman les te taprell, un kran kowa gar. Jon daran i menshendar. Kolla patsan, kai hi o Jesus o Debleskro rakepaskro.
40022001	Un o Jesus rakras pale sawe laba ap lende, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un job penas:
40022002	"Te dell o Dewel i menshen gole, te wenn le pash leste, hi kowa jaake har pash i baro rajeste, kai kras peskro tchaweske i bari bijab.
40022003	Ap ko tsiro, kai i bijab his, bitchras lo peskre budepangren pash i menshende, te denn le len pash i bijab gole. Un jon kaman gar te well.
40022004	Un pale bitchras lo wawar budepangren pash kolende, te penenn le ap lende: Shunenn, me krom i chapen tumenge, un marom thule grumja. Un wawar latcho chapen un pipen hi lauter koi. Awenn ap i bijab!
40022005	Un kolla shunan gar ap lende un djan penge. Ko jek djas ap peskro kotar phub, ko wawar ap o mangepen.
40022006	Un pale wawar tapran kol budepangren, praassan len, un maran len.
40022007	O baro rajes tapras i bari choli, un job bitchras peskre lurden, te marenn le kol marepangren, un te chatchrenn le lengro foro.
40022008	Palle penas lo ap peskre budepangren: Kanna hi i bijab. Un kol menshe, kai me ap o chapen gole dom, hi gar moldo, te wenn le ap i bijab.
40022009	Djan kanna ap i dromma, kai bud menshe hi! Un penenn lauterenge, kai tumer kote hatsenna, te wenn le ap i bijab!
40022010	Un kol budepangre djan ap kol tsele dromma, un anan lauteren khetne, i tchilatchen un i latchen. Un jaake bud menshe wan ap i bijab, te was o kheer pherdo.
40022011	Un o baro rai was an o kheer, te dikell lo kolen, kai kote hi. Koi dikas lo kote i murshes, kai kek bijabeskro ripen ap leste hi.
40022012	Un job penas ap leste: Miro maal, tut hi kek bijabeskro ripen ap tute, te nai djah tu ap i bijab. Hoi kreh tu kate? Un kowa nashte penas leske tchi.
40022013	Penas o baro rai ap peskre budepangre: Pandenn les ap i pire un ap i wasta, un witsrenn les win an i kali rat! Un kote rowenn le un dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne."
40022014	Palle penas o Jesus ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo hi: "Bud menshen dell o Dewel gole. Kolla kokres, kai pash leste wenna, mukell lo dre te djal."
40022015	Un pal kowa wan i Farisarja khetne, un rakran mank pende, har jon nai taprenn o Jesuses an leskre laba.
40022016	Un jon bitchran pengre murshen pash leste. Lentsa djan ninna wawar mursha. Kolla his o Herodeskre mala. Un jon penan ap leste: "Sikepaskro, mer djinah, tu peneh o tchatchepen, un sikreh mishto i menshende o Debleskro drom. Tu rakreh kekeske pal o mui, ninna te hi len bud penepaske.
40022017	Pen menge kanna: Hi mishto pal maro tchatchepen, te das mer o themeskre lowe o baro rajeste an o foro Rom?"
40022018	O Jesus haiwas lengro tchilatchepen un penas ap lende: "Tumer rakrenn dui tchipjentsa. Hoske kamenn tumer man an mire laba te taprell?
40022019	Denn man i rupeni bema!" Un jon dan les jek bema.
40022020	Koi putchas lo lendar: "Koneskro shero un lab hi ap kai bema?"
40022021	Penan le: "O shero un o lab o baro rajestar an o foro Rom!" Penas lo ap lende: "Jaake denn leste, hoi leskro hi! Un denn o Debleste, hoi leskro hi!"
40022022	Un har jon kol laba lestar shunan, kran le bare jaka. Un jon mukan les, un djan penge.
40022023	Ap ko diwes wan i Saddukarja pash leste. Jon hi kolla, kai penenna: O Dewel krell i mulen gar djido.
40022024	Jon penan ap leste: "Sikepaskro, o Mose penas: Te merell i romedino mursh, un les his kek tchawe, palle hunte romedinerell peskro phraal koi romjat, te well peskro phraleske i tarnepen boldo.
40022025	Koi his pash mende efta phrala. Un o phurestar, kai romedino his, meras. Les his kek tchawe. Doleske las peskro phraal koi romjat.
40022026	Un ko duito meras, un les his kek tchawe. Un ko triinto romedineras lat un meras. Un les his kek tchawe. Un jaake djas kowa bis ap o eftato. Jek pal o wawar romedineran lat un meran. Un lauteren his kek tchawe.
40022027	Un har i tsele phrala mulo his, meras koi romni ninna.
40022028	Kanna putchah tutar: Ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, koneskri romni hi li? Hake efta his laha romedino."
40022029	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer prindjrenn gar o Debleskro lab un o Debleskri soor witar gar. Doleske haiwan tumer tchi.
40022030	Kol mulen, kai o Dewel djido krella, kolla romedinerenn buder gar, un wenna gar romedino. Jon hi har i bolepangre an o bolepen.
40022031	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, te wenn i mule djido. Kote penell o Dewel:
40022032	Me hom o Abrahameskro Dewel un o Isaakeskro Dewel un o Jakobeskro Dewel. Un me penau tumenge: Job hi gar o Dewel kolenge, kai mulo hi. Na-a, job hi o Dewel i djidenge."
40022033	Kolla bud menshe, kai trul o Jesuseste tardo his, kolenge atchas o rakepen krik, har jon kowa lestar shunan.
40022034	O Jesus rakras jaake, te nashte penan leske i Saddukarja tchi buder. Har i Farisarja kowa shunan, wan le khetne.
40022035	Un jek lendar, i biboldengro tchatchepaskro, kamas te taprell lo les an leskre laba un putchas lestar:
40022036	"Sikepaskro, kol tsele labendar, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, hawo lab hi o bareder lendar?"
40022037	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tu kamess tiro Debles o tselo djijestar an tiro tselo djipen, an lauter, hoi tu djineh.
40022038	Kowa hi o bareder lauterestar, hoi o Dewel tutar kamella.
40022039	Ninna kamell lo tutar, te wess jaake latches ap koleste, kai pash tute hi, har hal latches ap tute kokres.
40022040	Kowa, hoi o Mose un i tsele Debleskre rakepangre menge penan, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, kowa hi an kolla dui bare Debleskre laba penlo."
40022041	I Farisarja his gomme khetne pash o Jesuseste. Un job putchas lendar:
40022042	"Hoi penenn tumer pral ko baro rajeste, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Koneskro tchawo hi lo?" Penan le: "O Davideskro tchawo."
40022043	Penas o Jesus: "Te hi kowa tchatcho, har nai penas o David ap leste: Mo rai? Kau lab tchiwas o Debleskro Ducho an o Davideste,
40022044	har job penas: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig, te tchiwap kolen tel tire pire, kai hi chojedo ap tute.
40022045	Kate penas o David ap leste: Mo rai. Har well lo nai leskro tchawo?"
40022046	Un kek lendar nashte penas o Jesuseske jek lab koi pre. Un pal ko diwes trashan le, te putchenn le lestar budeder.
40023001	Palle rakras o Jesus ap i tsele menshende, kai trul leste tardo his, un ap peskre malende,
40023002	un penas: I biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja, kolen hi o Moseskro wast, te penenn le i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
40023003	Kowa, hoi jon tumenge penenna, kowa krenn lauter un rikrenn tumen ap kowa! Kowa, hoi jon krenna, ma krenn! Jon kokres krenn kowa gar, hoi jon i menshenge penenna.
40023004	Un jon krenn i menshenge o djipen pharo. Ko tselo koowa, hoi kolla hunte rikrenn, hi har i pharo gono ap lengri phik. I tchatchepangre un i Farisarja kokres rikrenn pen gar ap kowa.
40023005	Lauter, hoi kolla krenna, krenn le, te dikenn kowa i wawar. Te pandenn le i diklo trul o shero un trul i mussi, kai o Debleskre laba dre tchindlo hi, jaake hi lengro diklo buchleder har ko diklo i wawar murshendar. Un len hi lengste koola ap pende, te sikrenn le i menshende, te hi le o Debleskre mursha.
40023006	Pash i baro chapen kamenn le ap i feteder beshepangre te beshell. Un an i biboldengre kangria kamenn le ap i pralstune beshepangre te beshell.
40023007	Te djan le an o foro, kamenn le, te penenn i menshe ap lende: Latcho diwes, mo rai.
40023008	Tumenge penau me: Ma mukenn tumen te kharell: Mo rai! Tumer han halauter phrala. Jek kokres hi tumaro rai.
40023009	Ma kharenn jekes ap kai phub: Dad! Jek dad hi tumen. Kowa hi o Dewel an o bolepen.
40023010	Ma mukenn tumen te kharell: Baro sikepaskro! Jek baro sikepaskro hi tumen. Kowa hi o Kristo.
40023011	O bareder tumendar te well tumaro budepaskro.
40023012	Kowa, kai krell pes baro, koles krell o Dewel tikneder har i wawar. Kowa, kai krell pes tikno, koles krell o Dewel baro.
40023013	Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumaro patsepen ap o Debleste hi chochepen! Tumer krenn o wudar pandlo, te well kek ap o Debleskro drom. Tumer djan gar koi dre. Witar gar mukenn i wawaren dre te djal.
40023014	Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumaro patsepen ap o Debleste hi chochepen. Tumer lenn i khera i djuwjendar krik, kolengre romma mulo hi. Tumer te rakrenn o Debleha, rakrenn tumer i raha tsiro, te dikenn i menshe har patslo tumer han. O Dewel rakrell o tchatchepen pral tumende win, un tumer lenn i sorleder phagi har i wawar.
40023015	Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumaro patsepen ap o Debleste hi chochepen. Tumer djan pral i tseli phub, te anenn i menshenge o biboldengro patsepen. Un te djiwell jek pal tumaro patsepen, palle krenn lestar i bengeskro tchawo. Un job well dui kope tchilatcheder har tumer han.
40023016	Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer kamenn i wawaren o tchatcho drom te sikrell, un han kokres har i korele, kai tchi dikenna. Tumer penenn i menshenge: "Te dell jek pes ap o Debleskro baro kheer sowel, jaake hi kau sowel tchi moldo. Te dell jek pes ap o sonakai sowel, hoi an o Debleskro baro kheer hi, palle hunte krell lo kowa, hoi job penas."
40023017	Tumer han dinelo un korelo! Hi o Debleskro baro kheer gar budeder moldo har o sonakai, hoi an koleste hi un doleske i Debleskro koowa hi?
40023018	Tumer penenn i menshenge ninna: Te dell jek pes ap o Debleskri chapaskri sowel, palle hi kau sowel tchi moldo. Te dell jek pes ap ko chapen sowel, hoi ap late tchiddo hi, palle hunte krell lo kowa, hoi job penas.
40023019	Tumer han korelo! Hi o Debleskro chapaskri gar budeder moldo har o chapen, hoi ap late tchiddo hi un doleske i Debleskro koowa hi?
40023020	Kowa, kai dell pes ap o Debleskri chapaskri sowel, kowa dell pes ninna ap lauter sowel, hoi kote pre tchiddo hi.
40023021	Kowa, kai dell pes ap o Debleskro baro kheer sowel, kowa dell pes ninna ap o Debleste sowel, kai kote djiwella.
40023022	Kowa, kai dell pes ap o bolepen sowel, kowa dell pes ninna ap o Debleskro beshepaskro sowel un ap o Debleste, kai kote beshdo hi.
40023023	Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen. Tumer denna o Debleste o deshto kotar dran hako senlepen an tumari baar. Un tumer bistrenn ko bareder koowa, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella: O tchatchepen, un o kamlepen, un o patsepen. Kawa hunte krenn, un ko wawar gar mukenn!
40023024	Tumer kamenn i wawaren o tchatcho drom te sikrell, un han kokres har i korele, kai tchi dikenna. Tumer trashenn hako tikno koowa, hoi tumen pale-tchiddo krella, un denn gar garda ap kowa, hoi tumen glan o Debleste pale-tchiddo krella.
40023025	Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen! Tumer thowenn i khore un tchare kokres wrijal. Tumer han har i tcharo, hoi win djudjo hi un dren djungelo. An tumare djia han boklo un tchilatcho.
40023026	Tu Farisari, tu hal korelo. Kre tiro dji djudjo! Palle well tuke o tselo wawar koowa ninna djudjo.
40023027	Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen! Tumer han har i mulengre khera, hoi parno kerdo wan. Kolla hi win shukar. Dren hi le pherdo tchik un kokale.
40023028	Jaake han tumer. Te dikenn tumen i menshe, patsenn le, te han latche un tchatche menshe. An tumende hi lauter chochepen un tchilatchepen.
40023029	Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen! Tumer krenn shukar mulengre khera kolenge, kai his o Debleskre rakepangre. Un i mulengre khera, kai latche menshe paskedo hi, krenn tumer shukar un railo.
40023030	Un tumer penenna: Te djiwams mer an ko tsiro, kai mare phure djiwan, palle marams mer kol Debleskre rakepangren gar.
40023031	Me penau tumenge: Te penenn tumer kowa jaake, palle sikrenn tumer, kai han i tchawe kolendar, kai o Debleskre rakepangren maran.
40023032	Awa, krenn kowa dureder jaake, har tumare phure kran!
40023033	Tumer han sapa. Awa, tchilatche sapa han tumer. O Dewel witsrell tumen an o bengeskri jag. Un tumer nashte nashenn gar glan koleste krik.
40023034	Shunenn, bitchrau pash tumende mire rakepangren, mire gosewe murshen, un mire tchatchepangren. Kolen denn tumer ap o trushel, marenn len, un denn len dawa an tumare kangria. Un tumer lenn len palla an hako foro.
40023035	Tumer han tchilatcho har tumare phure. Jon maran i latche menshen jaake raha har i phub tardo hi: O latcho mursh Abel was maredo glan i tsele wawar menshende. Pal leste maran le wawar latche menshen bis ap ko tsiro, kai o Zachari maredo was, koleskro dad his o Barachi. O Zachares maran tumer mashkral o Debleskro kheer un i sasterni chapaskri, kai i fiche o Debleske maredo wenna. Doleske well i phagi ap tumende, kai kanna djiwenna.
40023036	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kalla menshe, kai kanna djiwenna, kolla lenna i tseli phagi.
40023037	Tumer menshe an o foro Jerusalem! Tumer maran o Debleskre rakepangren, un dan kolen i barentsa mulo, kai o Dewel pash tumende bitchras. Bud kope kamom tumen pash mande te lell, te dap garda ap tumende, har i kachni ap peskre tarnende garda della, un lell len tel peskre phora. Un tumer kaman gar.
40023038	Doleske mukell o Dewel peskro kheer pash tumende un djiwell buder gar koi.
40023039	Un me penau tumenge: Tumer dikenn man jaake raha buder gar bis te was ko tsiro, kai tumer penenna: Sharedo well kowa, kai hi o Deblestar bitchedo!
40024001	Un o Jesus mukas o Debleskro baro kheer. Har job peske djas, wan peskre mala pash leste, te sikrenn le leste o tselo Debleskro baro kheer.
40024002	Koi penas lo ap lende: "Kowa, hoi tumer kote lauter dikenna, kowa lauter djal paash. Kate atchell kek bar ap i wawareste."
40024003	Pale djas lo ap i djeteskri berga un beshas pes. Leskre mala kokres his pash leste un putchan lestar: "Ap hawo tsiro well o Debleskro baro kheer tele phagedo? Har nai dikas mer, te was ko tsiro, kai tu pale weh, un o Dewel o rai hi pral halauter?"
40024004	Penas o Jesus: Denn jak, ma mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell!
40024005	Bud mursha wenna un penenna: Me hom o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job! Un bud menshe patsenn ap lengro chochepen.
40024006	Baro kurepen wella an kol themma, kai hi dur tumendar un ninna an kol themma, kai hi gar dur tumendar. Te shunenn tumer kowa, ma trashenn! Ko hunte well jaake. Ko tsiro, kai o Dewel o rai hi pral lauterende, well gar jaake sik.
40024007	I pralstune pral bare themma kurenn pen i wawar pralstunentsa. Un i menshe dran jek them marenn kolen an i wawar them. An bud themma hi i menshen gar doha te chal. Un kate un kote well i phub trisslemen.
40024008	Kowa lauter wella jaake pral i phub, har i duka wenna pral i djuwjate, kai lell i tarnepen.
40024009	Palle taprenn le tumen, denn tumen dawa, un marenn tumen. Un i menshe an i tsele themma wenna chojedo ap tumende doleske, kai patsenn tumer ap mande.
40024010	Un bud denn pengro patsepen ap mande pre, un phukrenn ninna ap i wawarende, kai ap mande patsenna, un jek krell o wawareske tchilatchepen.
40024011	Ninna wenna bud chochene rakepangre un penenna, te hi le bitchedo o Deblestar. Kolla anenn bud menshen o tchatcho dromestar tele.
40024012	O tchilatchepen well jaake baro ap i phub, te denn bud patsle pengro kamlepen i wawarenge pre.
40024013	Kowa, kai atchell soreles tardo an o patsepen, jaake raha, har job djiwella, kowa lell o Debleskro djipen.
40024014	Ap i tseli phub well i menshenge ko latcho lab penlo, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell un kamell lengro rai te well. I menshe an hake themma hunte shunenn ko lab. Un palle well ko tsiro, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral lauterende.
40024015	Glan i raha tsiro rakras o Debleskro rakepaskro Daniel pral ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa. Koon kawa drawerella, kamaus, te haiwell lo les ninna. Ap ko diwes, kai dikenn tumer ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa an o Debleskro baro kheer tardo,
40024016	hunte nashenn kolla, kai an o them Judea djiwenna, sik ap i berga.
40024017	Kowa, kai pral ap o kheer hi, hunte djal buder gar an peskro kheer dre, te lell lo peskro koowa win.
40024018	Un kowa, kai ap i kotar phub budrella, kowa hunte djal buder gar khere, te lell lo peskri baja.
40024019	Koi bibacht hi bari kol djuwjenge, kai hi an wawar koowa, ninna kol djuwjenge, kai hi len i tarnepen.
40024020	Mangenn o Deblestar, te hunte nashenn gar krik an o wend, witar gar ap o Debleskro diwes!
40024021	Ko tsiro wella djungleder har lauter, hoi ap i menshende was, jaake raha, har i phub tardo hi. Un ko tsiro, hoi well pal kowa, well witar gar jaake tchilatcho.
40024022	Te krals o Dewel o tchilatcho tsiro gar tikneder, palle wals kek mensho dran o tchilatcho tsiro win. Kolen, kai o Dewel peske win rodas, kolenge krell lo o tchilatcho tsiro tikneder.
40024023	Te penell jek ap tumende: Dikenn, kate hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job! palle patsenn les gar! Un te penell i wawar ap tumende: Ake, kote hi lo! palle patsenn les witar gar!
40024024	Bud chochene mursha penenna ap tumende: Me hom ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Un chochene rakepangre penenna: Me hom o Deblestar bitchedo. Un jon krenna baro un sorelo koowa, hoi i mensho nashte krell gar dran peskri soor. Kowa krenn le, te anenn le i menshen o tchatcho dromestar tele. Te djals kowa, anans le ninna kolen o Debleskro dromestar tele, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas.
40024025	Ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge penom!
40024026	Jon te penenn tumenge: O baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, kowa hi an o mulo them! ma djan kote win! Un jon te penenn: Job hi an ko kheer! ma patsenn len!
40024027	Ap ko diwes, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella, dikenn les i tsele menshe, jaake har i Debleskri jag ap o bolepen diklo well, hoi djal jek rigatar ap i wawar rig an o bolepen.
40024028	Kote, kai i mulo mass tchiddo hi, kote wenn i bare diwje tchirkle khetne te chan le.
40024029	Un sik pal kol tchilatche diwessa, well o kham kalo har i rat, un o mondo dikell kek buder gar. Un i bare momlia ap o bolepen perenn tele. Un i bolepaskri soor perell khetne.
40024030	Palle dikenn le o Menshengro Tchawes, har job dran o bolepen wella. An hake themma dikenn le les, har job well ap i wolke bari sorjaha un railepen. Un jon rowenna un penenna: Patsams mer ap leste!
40024031	Un job bitchrell peskre bolepangren pral i tseli phub. Un kolla phurdenn an i bashepangre, te anenn le dran hako them kolen khetne, kai o Dewel peske win rodas.
40024032	Me kamau te sikrap tumende tchomone. Dikenn ap o faigetikro ruk! Te wenn leskre kashta senelo, un i patria wenn dran lende win, palle djinenn tumer, te well sik o nijal.
40024033	Jaake hi kowa ninna koleha, pral kowa rakrom. Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, palle djinenn tumer, kai o Debleskro tsiro was.
40024034	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol menshe, kai an ko tsiro djiwenna, dikenna kowa lauter pengre jakentsa.
40024035	O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Mire laba atchenna hako tsiro.
40024036	Kek djinella ko tsiro, kaana kowa lauter wella. I bolepangre an o bolepen djinenn les gar, witar gar o Debleskro tchawo. Miro dad an o bolepen kokres djinell les.
40024037	Jaake har i menshe djiwan an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas, jaake djiwenn le an ko tsiro, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella.
40024038	Glan ko tsiro, har o baro pani was, chan un pijan le, romedineran le, un wan romedino. Har o Noa ap o panjeskro ulepaskro djas,
40024039	haiwan le gar, hoi koi djas. O baro pani was pral lende, un jon lauter tassan. Jaake djal kowa ninna ap ko diwes, kai well o Menshengro Tchawo pale.
40024040	Dui budrenn ap i kotar phub. Ko jek well krik lino, ko wawar atchell koi.
40024041	Dui djuwja krenn jarro dran djob. Koi jek well krik lino, koi wawar atchell koi.
40024042	Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar ko diwes, kai tumaro rai pale wella.
40024043	Haiwenn: Te djinals o rai pral i kheer ko tsiro an i rati, kaana o tchorepaskro wella, palle sowals lo gar, un mukals kekes an peskro kheer dre te phagell.
40024044	Doleske penau tumenge: Denn garda! Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, wau pale an i tsiro, kai tumer gar djinenna.
40024045	I latcho budepaskro della mishto garda ap peskro rajeskro kheer, un sowella gar. Leskro rai das peskre tsele budepangren an leskre wasta. Un ko latcho budepaskro dell len hako diwes kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske.
40024046	Bachtelo hi lo, te well leskro rai pale, un dikell, kai job peskri budi mishto kras.
40024047	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Leskro rai dell peskro tselo brawlepen an leskre wasta.
40024048	Job te hi i tchilatcho budepaskro un penell ap peste: Miro rai well gar jaake sik pale,
40024049	un job dell kol wawar budepangren dawa, un chal un pijell pes mato kol matentsa,
40024050	palle well leskro rai pale ap i diwes, kai ko budepaskro gar patsell, te well job. Ap jek kopo hi lo koi,
40024051	un dell ko budepaskres khetne, un anell les kote, kai i chochene hi. Kote rowenn le, un dandrenn i danda khetne i dukatar.
40025001	Un o Jesus penas: Ap ko tsiro, kai wella o Menshengro Tchawo pale, djal kowa jaake har kol deesh tarne tchentsa, kai djan ap i bijab. Jon lan pengre momlia an o wast; un djan ap o drom, kai o bijabeskro hunte wella.
40025002	Pantch lendar hi dinelo, un pantch lendar hi gosewo.
40025003	Kolla pantch dinele lan kek djet peha.
40025004	I gosewe tchen his djet an pengre khore.
40025005	Un ko bijabeskro was gar jaake sik. Doleske wan lauter khino un sowan dre.
40025006	His deesh-te-dujenge an i rat; koi das jek bari gole: O bijabeskro wella! Djan win pash leste!
40025007	Koi stan i tsele tarne tcha pre, un kran i jag an pengre momlia bareder.
40025008	Un kol dinele tcha penan ap kolla gosewe tchende: Denn men djet! Mare momlia djan win.
40025009	Penan i gosewe: Na-a! Maro djet hi gar doha menge un tumenge. Djan pash i bikepangre, un ginenn tumenge djet!
40025010	Har jon kote djan, te ginenn le penge djet, koi was o bijabeskro. Un kolen, kai len djet his, djan leha an o kheer, kai i bijab hi. Un o wudar was pal lende pandlo.
40025011	Un pal i tikno tsiro wan ninna kolla wawar tarne tcha glan o wudar, un penan: Rai, rai, kre menge o wudar pre!
40025012	Penas lo ap lende: Tchatchepaha, me prindjrau tumen gar.
40025013	Doleske penau me tumenge: Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar ko diwes, kai o rai pale wella!
40025014	Kowa hi jaake har pash ko mursheste, kai kamas an i wawar them te djal. Dran kowa das lo peskre budepangren gole, un das len peskro tselo brawlepen an i wast.
40025015	Hakeneste das lo jaake bud lowe, har kowa haiwas, te ginell un te bikrell kol lowentsa. Ko jekeste das lo pantch gone pherdo rup, un ko wawareste das lo dui gone, un pale i wawareste jek gono. Un palle djas lo an o wawar them.
40025016	Un ko mursh, kai kol pantch gone pherdo rup las, kowa djas sik pash i bikepangre, ginas un bikras bud koowa, un anas pantch wawar gone pherdo rup khetne pashal.
40025017	Un ninna kowa, kai kol dui gone peskro rajestar las, kowa las dui wawar gone pashal.
40025018	Ko mursh, kai jek gono peskro rajestar las, djas ap i kotar phub un khatras ko rup an i phub.
40025019	Un pal i raha tsiro was lengro rai pale un mukas peskre budepangren glan leste te anell, te lell lo lendar kol lowe, hoi jon leske khetne anan.
40025020	Un ko budepaskro, kai las lestar pantch gone pherdo rup, djas pash leste, un penas: Mo rai, pantch gone dal man. Un dik, me lom pantch wawar gone pashal.
40025021	Penas o rai ap leste: Kowa kral tu mishto. Tu hal i latcho budepaskro. Me dom tut i tikni budi, un tu kral kai budi mishto. Doleske dau me kanna bud koowa an tire wasta. Ab an miro kheer dre, te wess tu mantsa bachteles!
40025022	Un ko budepaskro, kai las lestar dui gone pherdo rup, kowa djas ninna pash leste, un penas: Mo rai, dui gone dal man. Un dik, me lom dui wawar gone pashal.
40025023	Penas o rai ap leste: Kowa kral tu mishto. Tu hal i latcho budepaskro. Me dom tut i tikni budi, un tu kral lat mishto. Doleske dau me kanna bud koowa an tire wasta. Ab an miro kheer dre, te wess tu mantsa bachteles!
40025024	Un ko budepaskro, kai jek gono pherdo rup las, kowa djas pash leste, un penas: Mo rai, me djinom, tut hi i dji dran bar. Tu leh tuke o djob, hoi i wawar an i phub tchiwas, te was kowa baro. Tu leh kote tuke khetne, kai budral gar.
40025025	Doleske darom tutar, djom win, un khatrom tiro gono pherdo rup an i phub. Un dik, kate hi lo.
40025026	Penas peskro rai ap leste: I tchilatcho budepaskro hal tu. Tu kral tiri budi gar mishto. Tu djinal, te lap mange o djob, hoi me gar an i phub tchiwom, un lap mange kote khetne, kai budrom gar.
40025027	Tu hunte dals mire lowe kolende, kai patsenn i lowe win. Un te woms pale, palle loms budeder lowe pale, har tu len dal.
40025028	Un palle penas o rai ap i wawarende, kai koi tardo hi: Lenn ko jek gono lestar, un denn les koleste, kai hi les kol wawar deesh gone!
40025029	Hakeno, kai hi les bud, kowa lell budeder. Jaake well les bud brawlepen. Un kowa, kai hi les gar bud, kolestar well ninna kowa krik lino, hoi les hi.
40025030	Ko budepaskro, kai tchi moldo hi, witsrenn les an i kali rat win! Kote rowenn le, un dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne.
40025031	Un o Jesus penas: Ap ko diwes, kai well o Menshengro Tchawo an peskro tselo railepen, un leha wenna i tsele bolepangre, palle hi lo o rai pral halauter, un rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende ap i phub.
40025032	Un glan leste wenna i tsele menshe dran hake themma khetne. Un job tchiwell len ap dui riga, jaake har i bakrengro rai tchiwell i bakre ap jek rig un i busnia ap i wawar rig.
40025033	I latche menshe tchiwell lo ap peskri tchatchi rig, un i wawar ap peskri serwi rig.
40025034	Un palle penell o baro rai ap kolende, kai ap leskri tchatchi rig tardo hi: Ap tumende well i bacht miro dadestar an o bolepen. Awenn un djiwenn mantsa khetne an miri harmenationa. Kowa kamas o Dewel jaake raha har o bolepen un i phub koi hi.
40025035	Man his bok. Un tumer dan man te chal. Man his trush. Un tumer dan man te pijell. Me homs kek tumendar. Un tumer lan man an tumare khera.
40025036	Man his kek ripen ap mande. Un tumer dan man i ripen. Me homs nasselo. Un tumer wan pash mande. Me homs an o stilepen. Un tumer wan ninna pash mande.
40025037	Palle putchenn lestar i latche menshe, kai ap peskri tchatchi rig tardo hi: Rai, kaana his tut bok, un mer dam tut te chal? Un kaana his tut trush, un mer dam tut te pijell?
40025038	Un kaana hals tu kek mendar, un mer lam tut an mare khera? Un kaana his tut kek ripen, un mer dam tut jek?
40025039	Un kaana hals tu nasselo un stildo, un mer wam pash tute?
40025040	Un o baro rai penell lenge: Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ko latchepen, hoi tumer jekeske mire tchorwele phralendar kran, ko latchepen kran tumer mange.
40025041	Un palle penell job kolenge, kai ap leskri serwi rig tardo hi: Tumer han tel o Debleskro praassepen tardo! Djan tumenge! Djan an koi jag, hoi chatchella hako tsiro, un hoi hi o bengeske un leskre kurepangre kerdo!
40025042	Man his bok. Tumer dan man tchi te chal. Man his trush. Tumer dan man tchi te pijell.
40025043	Me homs kek tumendar. Un tumer lan man gar an tumare khera dre. Man his kek ripen, un tumer dan man kek. Me homs nasselo un stildo, un tumer wan gar pash mande.
40025044	Un palle penenn jon ap leste: Rai, kaana his tut bok un trush? Kaana hals tu kek mendar? Kaana his tut kek ripen? Kaana hals tu nasselo un stildo, un mer hams gar tuke koi?
40025045	Palle penell lo ap lende: Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ko latchepen, hoi tumer gar jekeske mire tchorwele phralendar kran, ko latchepen kran tumer mange ninna gar.
40025046	Un kol tchilatche len i phagi hako tsireske. I latche len o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
40026001	Un har o Jesus kowa lauter ap i tsele menshende penas, kai kote his, penas lo peskre malenge:
40026002	"Tumer djinenna, an dui diwessa wenn kol bare diwessa, kai Passa kharenna. Un o Menshengro Tchawes well an i wasta kolendar dino, kai les ap o trushel denna, te merell lo."
40026003	Ap ko tsiro wan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder khetne an o kheer o baro rashajestar. Koleskro lab his Kajafas.
40026004	Un jon rodan i drom, har nai taprans le o Jesuses tchorchanes, te marenn le les.
40026005	"Mer taprah les gar ap o Passa," penan le, "te wenn i menshe gar diwjo un chojedo ap mende."
40026006	Un o Jesus his an o gab Betani, an o Simoneskro kheer. Kowa hi ko Simon, kai his les i djungelo nasslepen ap peskro mass.
40026007	Un har o Jesus kote chas, was i djuwel pash leste. Kolat his i tushni an o wast. Kote his kutch djet dre. Ko djet tchoras joi ap leskro shero win, te makell li les dre.
40026008	Un har leskre mala kowa dikan, choiran le pen un penan: "Hoske tchoras li ko djet tchitcheske win?
40026009	Te bikrams ko djet, lams bud lowe. Un kol lowe nai dams mer i tchorwelende."
40026010	Un har o Jesus haiwas, hoi rakran le, penas lo ap lende: "Mukenn koi djuwjat! Joi kras i latcho koowa.
40026011	I tchorwele hi hako tsiro pash tumende. Me hom gar hako tsiro pash tumende.
40026012	Kowa, hoi joi kras, kras li, te makell li man dre ko diweske, kai wau paskedo.
40026013	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap i tseli phub, kai mire laba i menshenge penlo wenna, koi well ninna penlo, hoi koja djuwel mange kras. Joi well gar bistedo."
40026014	Pal kowa djas jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, leskro lab hi Judas Iskariot, pash i bare rashajende,
40026015	un putchas lendar: "Kitse lowe denn man tumer, te dau les an tumare wasta?" Un jon dan les triin-deesh rupene beme.
40026016	Un palle rodas o Judas i latcho tsiro, kai nai dals lo les an lengre wasta.
40026017	O diwes glan ko kurko, kai i bibolde o maro chan, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi, wan i Jesuseskre mala pash leste, un putchan lestar: "Kai kameh tu, te kras o chapen tuke?"
40026018	Koi penas job lenge, pash hawo mursheste an o foro Jerusalem jon hunte djan. "Koleske penenn", penas job, "maro sikepaskro penell tuke: Miro tsiro hi kanna kai. Pash tute kamau te chal o chapen mire malentsa."
40026019	Un o Jesuseskre mala djan kote, un kran les jaake, har job kowa penas. Un jon kran o chapen.
40026020	Ap i rati was o Jesus peskre deesh-te-dui malentsa an ko kheer. Un jon beshan pen, te chan le ko chapen.
40026021	Pash o chapen penas lo ap lende: "Tchatchepaha me penau tumenge: Jek tumendar phukrella ap mande."
40026022	Kowa dukas len an o dji. Un jon putchan lestar, jek pal o wawar: "Mo rai, hom me kawa?"
40026023	Penas lo ap lende: "Ko mursh, kai tchiwell o maro mantsa an jek tcharo, kawa phukrell ap mande.
40026024	O Menshengro Tchawo hunte merella, jaake har hi lestar tchindlo an o Debleskro lab. Hawi bibacht well ap koleste, kai ap leste phukrella! Koleske wals feteder, te wals lo gar boldo."
40026025	Un o Judas, kai ap leste phukrell kamell, putchas lestar: "Sikepaskro, hom me kowa?" Penas o Jesus: "Awa, tu hal kowa."
40026026	Har jon chan, las o Jesus o maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, phagas ko maro, das les peskre malende, un penas: "Ake, lenn ko maro un chan les! Kau maro hi miro mass."
40026027	Palle las lo i khoro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, das lende ko khoro, un penas: "Pijenn halauter lestar!
40026028	Kai mool hi miro rat, hoi me ratau budenge, te lap lengri doosh lendar. Jaake krau i drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna.
40026029	Un me penau tumenge: Me pijau buder gar i mool, bis te well ko diwes, kai me pijau newi mool tumentsa khetne pash miro dadeste an o bolepen."
40026030	Un palle giwan le o Debleske i gili, un djan win pash o djeteskri berga.
40026031	Kote penas o Jesus lenge: "Kai rati nashenn tumer halauter mandar. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penella: Me dau o bakrengro rajes. Un i bakre nashenn penge.
40026032	Pal kowa krell o Dewel man i mulendar djido. Un te djan tumer an o them Galilea, djau glan tumende."
40026033	Koi penas o Petro ap leste: "Ninna te nashenn halauter tutar krik, me mukau tut gar."
40026034	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tchatchepaha me penau tuke: Kai rati dell o bashno gar gole jaake raha har tu man gar triin kope buchoste dal."
40026035	Penas o Petro: "Ninna te hunte meroms tuha, doms tut gar buchoste." Ninna kol tsele wawar penan kowa.
40026036	Un palle djas o Jesus peskre malentsa an i baar, hoi kharella Getsemani. Un job penas ap lende: "Beshenn tumen kate! Me djau kote, te rakrap o Debleha."
40026037	Un job las o Petres un kol dui Zebedeskre tchawen peha, un djas kote. Un leskro dji rowas, un i daar tapras les.
40026038	Koi penas lo ap lende: "Miro dji rowella, un mange hi jaake har te merap. Atchenn kate un sowenn gar dre!"
40026039	Un job djas i kotar drom dureder, witsras pes ap i phub, un mangas o Debles: "Mo dad, te kameh tu, muk kek duka un merepen ap mande te well! Mangau tut: Ma kre, har me kamau! Kre jaake, har tu kameh!"
40026040	Un job djas pale pash lende un dikas, har sowan le, un penas ap o Petreste: "Kate dik, kek tikno tsiro nai atchan tumare jaka pre.
40026041	Ma sowenn dre! Mangenn o Deblestar, te perenn gar miro dromestar tele! Tumen kokres hi kek soor te atchenn pash mande, ninna te kamell kowa tumaro dji."
40026042	Un palle djas lo i duito kopo kote, te mangell lo o Debles. Un job penas pale: "Mo dad, tu te kameh gar kol duka un merepen mandar te lell, palle muk kowa te well, hoi tu kameh!"
40026043	Un job djas pale pash lende un dikas, te sowan le pale. Jon rikran nai pengre jaka gar pre.
40026044	Un job mukas len, un djas pale kote, te mangell lo o Debles, un penas pale kolla laba o Debleske.
40026045	Palle djas lo pash peskre malende pale, un penas: "Kamenn tumer dureder sowell un kate tchiddo atchell? O tsiro hi kai, kai denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta kol tchilatche menshendar.
40026046	Stenn pre! Djas menge kanna! Kanna well kowa, kai phukrell ap mande."
40026047	Un har job jaake rakras, was o Judas, ko jek kol deesh-te-dujendar. Pash leste his bud wawar mursha. Len his chare un kashta an i wasta. Kolen bitchran i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder.
40026048	O Judas kras lentsa win: "Koles, kai tchumrau, kowa hi lo. Koles taprenn!"
40026049	Un sik djas lo pash o Jesuseste un penas ap leste: "Latcho diwes, mo rai!" un tchumras les.
40026050	Penas o Jesus: "Mo maal, hoske wal tu?" Un palle wan kol wawar mursha, tapran o Jesuses, un pandan les.
40026051	Un jek kolendar, kai o Jesuseha djas, las peskro charo un das jek klisteske o kand tele. Un kowa his i klisto, kai budrell o baro rashajeske.
40026052	Koi penas o Jesus: "Tchip tiro charo tele! Hakeno, kai i charo lella un dell i wawares, ko well i chareha mulo dino.
40026053	Me nai mangoms miro dadestar an o bolepen, te bitchrell lo mange budeder har efta-deesh-te-dui serja (72.000) bolepangren, te wenn le ap miri rig.
40026054	Kowa te kroms, palle nai wals kowa gar tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi."
40026055	Un koi pre penas lo ap kol tsele murshende, kai trul leste tardo hi: "Tumer wan i charentsa un i kashtentsa pash mande, har te woms i marepaskro. Hako diwes homs an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikrom i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un tumer tapran man gar.
40026056	Kawa lauter hunte djas, te well tchatcho, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro an pengre lila tchinan." Har peskre mala kowa shunan, nashan le penge lauter lestar.
40026057	Kolla, kai o Jesuses pandan, anan les pash o baro rashajeste, o Kajafas. Un kote wan i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder khetne.
40026058	Dur pal leste djas o Petro leske palla, un was glan o shukar kheer o baro rashajestar. Un job djas an o baro wudar dre, un beshas pes pash i lurdende, te nai dikell lo, hoi krenn le o Jesuseha.
40026059	Un i bare rashaja un i tsele pralstune bibolde rodan murshen, kai anenn chocheno koowa ap o Jesuseste, te nai marenn le les.
40026060	Un jon hatsan tchi, ninna te wan bud mursha pash lende, kai anan chochene koowa ap leste. Palle wan dui mursha pash lende,
40026061	un penan: "Kau mursh penas, te nai phagell lo o Debleskro baro kheer tele, un te nai tchiwell lo les an triin diwessa pale pre."
40026062	Un o baro rashai stas pre un putchas o Jesusestar: "Peneh tu tchi ap kowa, hoi jon ap tute pre anan?"
40026063	O Jesus penas tchi. Pale penas o baro rashai ap leste: "Glan o djido Dewel, pen menge: Hal tu ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Hal tu o Debleskro tchawo?"
40026064	Penas o Jesus: "Awa, hi jaake, har tu penal. Un kanna penau tumenge: Ko tsiro well sik, kai dikenn tumer o Menshengro Tchawes, har hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o sorelo Deblestar, un har well lo ap i wolke dran o bolepen."
40026065	Koi kras o baro rashai peskro ripen paash, te sikrell lo peskri choli, un penas ap i wawar pralstunende: "Job krell pes har o Dewel. Tumer shunan les. Kek hunte penell menge budeder.
40026066	Hoi kamenn tumer leha te krell?" Penan le: "Job hunte well maredo."
40026067	Un palle tchungran le leske an o mui, un dan les ap o shero. Wawar dan les an o mui,
40026068	un penan ap leste: "Tu, baro rai, pen menge, koon das tut?"
40026069	O Petro his win glan o kheer beshdo. Un i budepaskretsa was pash leste, un penas ap leste: "Tu hal ninna jek kolendar, kai o Jesuseha dran o them Galilea was."
40026070	Un job chochas glan kol tsele menshende, kai koi beshdo hi, un penas: "Me haiwau gar, hoi tu peneh."
40026071	Un job djas win pash o baro wudar glan ko kheer. Kote dikas les i wawar budepaskretsa. Un koja penas ap kolende, kai kote tardo hi: "Kowa hi ninna jek kolendar, kai his o Jesuseha dran Nazaret khetne."
40026072	Un pale chochas lo, das pes sowel, un penas ap late: "Me prindjrau kau murshes gar."
40026073	Un pal i tikno tsiro wan kolla pash o Petreste, kai kote tardo hi, un penan ap leste: "Tchatchepaha, tu hal ninna jek kolendar. Tiro rakepen phukrell ap tute."
40026074	Koi tchingras lo, das pes sowel, un penas ap lende: "Me prindjrau kau murshes gar!" Un sik koi pre das o bashno gole.
40026075	Un o Petreske wan o Jesuseskre laba an o shero, hoi job leske penas: "O bashno dell gar gole jaake raha, har tu man gar triin kope buchoste dal." Un o Petro djas dran o baro wudar win, un rowas soreles.
40027001	Sik taissarlake wan i tsele bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder khetne. Un khetne kran le win, te marenn le o Jesuses.
40027002	Un jon pandan les, un anan les pash o themeskro rajeste. Leskro lab his Pilato. Job his i Remari. An leskre wasta dan le o Jesuses.
40027003	O Judas, ko phukepaskro, har haiwas lo, te kran le win, te well o Jesus maredo, khaitas kowa les. Doleske anas job kol triin-deesh rupene beme pale pash i bare rashajende un pash i biboldengre phureder.
40027004	Un job penas ap lende: "Me anom doosh ap mande. Me phukrom ap koleste, kai kek doosh ap peste anas." Penan le: "Kowa hi gar maro koowa. Kowa hi tiro koowa."
40027005	Koi witsras lo kol triin-deesh rupene beme an o Debleskro baro kheer, nashas lendar, tchiwas i dori trul peskri meen, un tassras pes.
40027006	Kol bare rashaja lan kol rupene beme, un penan: "Ap kal lowe hi o rat pre. Mer nai tchiwah kal lowe gar pash o brawlepen an o Debleskro baro kheer. Kowa djal gar pal o biboldengro tchatchepen."
40027007	Un jon rakran khetne, hoi nai krans le kol lowentsa. Un jon penan: "Mer ginah i kotar them, te nai paskrah kote kolen, kai kek bibolde hi." Un jon ginan ko kotar them ko romestar, kai krell pirja dran lolo tchik.
40027008	Doleske dan le ko kotar them o lab: ratli phub. Ninna kau diwes kharell kowa jaake.
40027009	-
40027010	Un jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro Jeremia glan i raha tsiro penas: Jon lan i triin-deesh rupene beme. Kowa his kol lowe, kai i Israeleskre menshe win kran, te plaissrenn le leske. Kol lowentsa ginan le i kotar them kolestar, kai krell pirja dran lolo tchik, jaake har o Dewel mange kowa penas.
40027011	Un o Jesus his glan o themeskro rajeste, o Pilato tardo. Un kowa putchas lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?" Koi penas o Jesus: "Awa, hi jaake, har tu penal."
40027012	Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder anan doosh ap leste pre. O Jesus penas tchi.
40027013	Koi penas o Pilato ap leste: "Shuneh tu gar, hoi jon lauter ap tute pre anenna?"
40027014	O Jesus penas tchi, kek lab. Un o Pilato kras tchatchepaha bare jaka.
40027015	Ap ko tsiro his jaake, te mukas o themeskro rai ap o Passa jekes dran o stilepen win. Koles nai rodan i bibolde penge win.
40027016	An ko bersh his i mursh kote stildo, leskro lab his Barabas. Hakeno djinas, te hi job i tchilatcho mursh.
40027017	Un har jon lauter khetne his, putchas o Pilato lendar: "Kones mukap dran o stilepen win: O Barabes? O Jesuses, kai ninna o Kristo kharella?"
40027018	O Pilato djinas mishto, te silwerenn le ap o Jesuseste. Un dran kowa dan le les an leskre wasta.
40027019	Har o Pilato ap o tchatchepaskro beshepaskro beshdo his, te rakrell lo o tchatchepen pral leste win, mukas leskri romni leske te penell: "Ko mursh anas kek doosh ap peste. Muk les te djal! Taissar rati his man i tchilatchi suni, un man his bare duka dran leste."
40027020	I bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder rakran bud ap kol tsele menshende kote dre, te penenn jon, te well o Barabas dran o stilepen win, un te well o Jesus maredo.
40027021	Un o Pilato putchas lendar: "Kones kol dui murshendar mukap dran o stilepen win?" "O Barabes!" penan le.
40027022	Koi penas o Pilato ap lende: "Hoi krap o Jesuseha, kai kharella ninna o Kristo?" Penan le halauter: "De les ap o trushel!"
40027023	Putchas lo lendar: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job?" Kote dan le bari gole: "De les ap o trushel!"
40027024	Har o Pilato dikas, te nai krell lo tchi, un te wenn le diwjeder, las lo pani, thowas peskre wasta glan i tsele menshende, un penas: "Me anau kek doosh ap mande, te well lo maredo. Koi doosh well ap tumende."
40027025	Un kol tsele menshe penan: "Koi doosh well ap mende un ap mare tchawende!"
40027026	Palle mukas lo o Barabes dran o stilepen win. Un o Jesuses mukas lo i tchupnijaha dawa te dell, un das les an i lurdengre wasta, te denn le les ap o trushel.
40027027	Palle anan o Pilateskre lurde o Jesuses an o baro kheer o themeskro rajestar. Un jon dan i tsele lurden gole, te wenn le kote khetne.
40027028	Un jon riwan leske leskre koola win, un tchiwan leske i loli rajeskri plashka trujal.
40027029	Un jon pandan subjengre kashta khetne, un tchiwan len leske ap o shero, jaake har i baro rai hidjell shereskro sonakai ap peskro shero. Ninna tchiwan le leske i kasht an leskro tchatcho wast. Un jon mukan pen glan leste ap i tchanga te perell, un kran jaake, har te mangans le i baro rajes an. Jon san pral leste, un penan: "Sharedo wess tu, tu baro rai pral i bibolde!"
40027030	Un jon tchungran ap leste, lan leske o kasht dran o wast, un dan les leske ap o shero.
40027031	Har jon san pral leste, riwan le leske koi loli plashka pale win, un riwan leske leskre koola pale an. Un jon anan les win, te denn le les ap o trushel.
40027032	Har jon dran o foro win djan, dikan le i murshes dran o foro Kirene. Leskro lab his Simon. Koles tapran le i sorjaha, un kran, te hidjell lo o Jesuseskro trushel.
40027033	Un har jon ap ko kotar them wan, hoi kharella Golgata, - kowa kharella Muleskro Shero, -
40027034	dan le les mool te pijell, kai tchomone dre hi, hoi Galle kharella. Har job kowa haiwas, kamas lo gar te pijell.
40027035	Un jon dan les ap o trushel. Un palle khelan le pral leskre koola, te dikenn le, hoi hakeno lella.
40027036	Un jon beshan pen kote tele, un dan ap leste jak.
