40027037	Ap o trushel pral leskro shero tchiwan le i kotar kasht, kai tchindlo hi, hoske job hunte meras. Un koi pre his tchindlo: Kawa hi o Jesus, o baro rai pral i biboldende.
40027038	Leha dan le dui marepangren ap o trushel. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar.
40027039	Un kolla, kai kote pashal wan, sikran i gushteha ap o Jesuseste, un praassan les.
40027040	Un jon penan ap o Jesuseste: "Tu kamal o Debleskro baro kheer tele te phagell, un an triin diwessa pale pre te tchiwell. Tu te hal o Debleskro tchawo, kre tuke, hoi kral i wawarenge un ab kau trushelestar tele!"
40027041	Un ninna i bare rashaja, i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder san pral leste, un penan:
40027042	"Wawaren las job dran o merepen win. Pes kokres nai lell lo gar dran o merepen win. Te hi lo o baro rai pral o Israel, palle well lo kanna o trushelestar tele. Palle patsah ap leste.
40027043	Job patsas o Debles, un penas: Me hom o Debleskro tchawo. Te kamell o Dewel les o djijestar, mu well lo, un lell les kanna kau trushelestar tele!"
40027044	Ninna kol dui marepangre praassan les, kolla kai langs leste ap pengro trushel dino wan.
40027045	His deesh-te-dujenge, koi was o diwes kalo har i rat an o tselo them. Un kowa atchas jaake bis trinenge.
40027046	Un har trinenge his, das o Jesus bari gole un penas: Eli, Eli, lema sabachtani? Kowa kharella: Miro Dewel, miro Dewel, hoske mukal man tu?
40027047	Un kolendar, kai kote tardo his, un kowa shunan, penan: "Kawa dell ap o Elija gole."
40027048	Un jek kol lurdendar anas sik tchomone har i kotar thann, kras les pherdo shutli mool, tchiwas les ap i kasht, un das les o Jesuses te pijell.
40027049	Wawar penan: "Muk les, dikas, te well o Elija, un lell les tele."
40027050	O Jesus das pale bari gole, un meras.
40027051	Un ko wudar an o Debleskro baro kheer, hoi his kerdo dran kutch pesso thann, kowa djas paash an dui kotja fun pral bis tele. Un i phub was trisslemen. Un i bare barra phagan an kotja.
40027052	I mulengre khera phagan pre. Un bud kolendar, kai ap o Debles patsan un meran, wan djido,
40027053	un djan dran pengre mulengre khera win. Palle, har ninna o Jesus i mulendar djido was, djan le an o Debleskro foro Jerusalem. Un bud menshe dikan len kote.
40027054	Ko pralstuno lurdo un kol wawar, kai khetne leha ap o Jesuseste jak dan, kolla dikan, te was i phub trisslemen, un hoi lauter koi djas. Koi tapras len i bari daar. Un jon penan: "Kau mursh his tchatchepaha o Debleskro tchawo."
40027055	Bud djuwja his i kotar krik tardo un dikan kowa lauter. Kolla wan o Jesuseha dran o them Galilea, te denn le les chapen un pipen.
40027056	Mashkral lende his i Maria Magdalena, un koi Maria, kai hi o Jakobeskri un o Josefeskri dai. Un o Zebedeskri romni, lakre tchawe his o Jakobo un o Johanni, joi his ninna kote pash lende.
40027057	Har i rat was, was i brawelo mursh dran o foro Arimatia. Leskro lab his Josef. Kowa patsas ninna ap o Jesuseste.
40027058	Job djas pash o Pilateste un mangas les, te dell lo les o mulo Jesuses. Un o Pilato penas i lurdenge, te denn le les leste.
40027059	Un o Josef las o mulo Jesuses, tchiwas les an i djudji plachta,
40027060	un tchiwas les an peskro newo mulengro kheer, hoi job das peske an i baro bar. Palle uleras job i baro bar glan o wudar an ko mulengro kheer, un djas peske.
40027061	Kote his ninna i Maria Magdalena un i wawar Maria. Kolla beshan wergal ko mulengro kheer.
40027062	O wawar diwes his o Debleskro diwes. Un i bare rashaja un i Farisarja wan pash o Pilateste khetne,
40027063	un penan ap leste: "Rai, menge djas an maro shero trujal, te penas ko chocheno, har job djiwas: Pal triin diwessa krell o Dewel man djido.
40027064	Dran kowa pen tire lurdenge, te denn le kol triin diwessa ap ko mulengro kheer jak! Jaake te nai tchorenn leskre mala les gar, un te penenn le i menshenge gar: Job stas i mulendar pre. Kowa wals i bareder chochepen har lauter kowa, hoi job penas."
40027065	Koi penas o Pilato ap lende: "Ake, lenn lurden tumentsa un denn jak ap ko mulengro kheer, jaake har tumer patsenn, te hunte well kowa!"
40027066	Un jon djan pash o mulengro kheer, un kran i sikepen ap ko bar, te dikenn le, te las jek o bar krik. Un kol lurde dan jak ap ko mulengro kheer.
40028001	O Debleskro diwes djas trujal. O wawar diwes, taissarlake, har o kham pre djala, djas i Maria Magdalena, un koi wawar Maria pash o mulengro kheer.
40028002	Ap jek kopo was i phub soreles trisslemen. Un o Debleskro bolepaskro was dran o bolepen, uleras ko baro bar glan o mulengro kheer ap i rig, un beshas pes koi pre.
40028003	Leskro mui chatchas har i soreli momeli. Un leskro ripen his parno har i gib.
40028004	Kol lurde, kai kote jak dan, tapran sawi daar, te peran le ap i phub, un atchan kote tchiddo, har te wans le mulo.
40028005	Un o bolepaskro penas ap kol djuwjende: "Ma darenn! Me djinau, te rodenn tumer o Jesuses, kai ap o trushel dino was.
40028006	Job hi gar kate. O Dewel kras les i mulendar djido, jaake har job penas. Awenn un dikenn, kai job tchiddo his!
40028007	Djan sik pash leskre malende un penenn lenge: O Dewel kras les djido! Shunenn, job djal glan tumende an o them Galilea. Un kote dikenn tumer les pale. Ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge penom!"
40028008	Un jon djan sik krik. Lengro dji his pherdo daar un bacht. Un jon nashan, te penenn le o Jesuseskre malenge kowa lauter.
40028009	Ap o drom was o Jesus pash lende un penas: "Latcho diwes!" Un jon djan pash leste, peran glan leste tele, un tapran leskre pire.
40028010	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Ma darenn! Djan pash mire phralende un penenn lenge, te djan le an o them Galilea! Un kote dikenn le man pale."
40028011	Har i djuwja ap o drom his, djan ninna kol lurdendar, kai ap o mulengro kheer jak dan, an o foro. Un kolla penan i bare rashajenge lauter, hoi koi djas.
40028012	Un i bare rashaja dan i biboldengre phureden khetne gole, un kran lentsa win, te denn le kol lurden bud lowe.
40028013	Un jon penan ap kol lurdende: "Penenn i menshenge: Leskre mala tchoran les an i rat, har mer sowam.
40028014	O themeskro rai, te shunell lo kowa, palle penah mer leske, te anan tumer an ko koowa kek doosh ap tumende. Jaake hunte trashenn tumer gar lestar."
40028015	Un kol lurde lan kol lowe, un kran kowa jaake, har i pralstune lenge penan. Un ko rakepen djal gomme kau diwes mashkral i biboldende trujal.
40028016	Kol deesh-te-jek Jesuseskre mala djan an o them Galilea, ap koi berga, kai o Jesus penas, te wenn le kote.
40028017	Un har jon les dikan kote tardo, peran le glan leste tele, ninna te patsan gar lauter, te hi job tchatchepaha o Jesus.
40028018	Un o Jesus djas pash lende un penas ap lende: "O baro Dewel das man i soor pral o bolepen un pral i phub.
40028019	Doleske djan pash i menshende an hake themma, un penenn lenge mire laba, te patsenn le ap mande! Thowenn len an o pani ap o lab o dadestar, o tchawestar un o Debleskro Ducho!
40028020	Penenn lenge, te rikrenn le ap lauter, hoi me tumenge penom! Tchatchepaha, me hom pash tumende hako diwes jaake raha, har i phub koi hi."
41001001	Kowa hi o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Job hi o Debleskro tchawo.
41001002	Kowa was jaake har o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, glan i raha tsiro an peskro liil tchinas. O Dewel penas ap peskro tchaweste: Shun, me, o Dewel, bitchrau i murshes glan tute ap o drom, te krell lo tuke i drom, te nai wess pash i menshende.
41001003	Koi hi jek an o mulo them, kai dell gole: Krenn maro Debleske o drom, te nai well lo pash i menshende! Lenn halauter krik, hoi o Debleske an o drom tchiddo hi!
41001004	Kowa his o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani. Job his an o mulo them, un penas i menshenge: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom! Djan ap o Debleskro drom! Un mukenn tumen mandar an o pani te tchiwell, te sikrenn tumer hakeneste, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. Un o Dewel lell tumari doosh tumendar krik!"
41001005	Un bud menshe djan pash leste. Jon wan dran o tselo them Judea un dran o foro Jerusalem. Un jon penan o tchilatcho koowa, hoi jon kran. Un o Johanni thowas len an o pani Jordan.
41001006	O Johanneskri plashka his dran fichengre balla. Un i ledertikri dori his trul leste. Un leskro chapen his gwin un stepangre.
41001007	Un job penas i menshenge: "Koi wella i mursh pal mande, kowa hi sorleder har me. Me hom gar moldo, te tchiwap man glan leste tele, te krap leskre tircha pre.
41001008	Me tchiwom tumen an o pani, te well diklo, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. Kowa, kai well pal mande, tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende."
41001009	His an kol diwessa, kai was o Jesus dran o foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea tchiddo hi, un mukas pes o Johannestar an o pani Jordan te thowell.
41001010	Un har o Jesus pes dran o pani hadas, dikas lo, kai djas o bolepen pre, un o Debleskro Ducho was har i parno tchirklo ap leste tele.
41001011	Un i rakepen dran o bolepen penas: "Tu hal miro tchawo, kai me kamau. Pral tute hom bachtelo."
41001012	Un sik pal kowa anas les o Debleskro Ducho an o mulo them.
41001013	Un kote atchas lo star-deesh diwessa. Un o beng kamas les o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Kote his ninna diwje fiche. Un i bolepangre wan un his leske koi.
41001014	Har o Johanni stildo was, djas o Jesus an o them Galilea, un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
41001015	Un job penas: "O tsiro was, kai lell o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win. Mukenn tumaro phuro djipen! Un djan ap o Debleskro drom! Un patsenn ap kau latcho lab!"
41001016	Har o Jesus pash o baro pani an o them Galilea djas, dikas lo o Simones un leskro phrales, o Andreas. Kolla his matchepangre, un witsran pengre matchengre gone an o pani, te taprenn le matchen.
41001017	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Awenn mantsa! Me krau tumendar menshen, kai anenn wawaren pash mande."
41001018	Koi pre mukan le pengre matchengre gone un djan leha.
41001019	Un o Jesus djas dureder, un dikas o Jakobes un leskro phrales, o Johanni. Lengro dad hi o Zebedeo. Jon his an o panjeskro ulepaskro beshdo un kran i matchengre gone tseles.
41001020	Har job len dikas, das lo len gole. Un jon mukan pengro dades, o Zebedeo, an o panjeskro ulepaskro, khetne kolentsa, kai budran leske, un djan o Jesuseha.
41001021	Un jon djan an o foro Kapernaum. Ap o Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus an i biboldengri kangri un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
41001022	Un jon kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job lenge penas. Job rakras bari sorjaha un gar jaake har i biboldengre tchatchepangre rakrenna.
41001023	An koi kangri his ninna i mursh, kai his an leste i beng. Un kowa das gole:
41001024	"Hoi kameh tu mendar, Jesus dran Nazaret? Wal tu, te maress men? Me djinau, koon tu hal: Tu weh o Deblestar."
41001025	Un o Jesus das les trad un penas ap leste: "Ma rake un dja dran leste win!"
41001026	Un ko beng, kai an ko mursheste his, tsardas kau murshes kate un kote, das soreles gole, un djas dran leste win.
41001027	Un lenge atchas o rakepen krik. Un jon putchan mank pende: "Hoi hi kowa? I newo drom sikrell lo men i bari sorjaha. Les hi ninna penepaske pral i benga. Un jon shunenn ap leste, un wenn dran i menshende win."
41001028	Un an i tikno tsiro shunas hakeno lestar an kau tselo them Galilea.
41001029	Har jon dran i biboldengri kangri win wan, djan le an ko kheer, kai o Simon un o Andreas djiwenn. Ninna o Jakobo un o Johanni djan lentsa.
41001030	Un i dai o Simoneskri romjatar his tchiddo ap o tchiben, un lakro shero his tato. Un jon penan o Jesuseske latar.
41001031	Un job was pash late, tapras lat pash o wast un kras, te stell li pale pre. Un o nasslepen djas latar. Un joi anas lenge i chapen.
41001032	Ap i rati, har o kham tele djas, anan jon pash leste i tsele nasselen un kolen, kai his benga an lende.
41001033	Un i tsele menshe dran o foro wan khetne glan o wudar.
41001034	Un job kras bud nasselen sasto, un las bud nasslepen lendar. Ninna bud bengen tradas lo win un mukas len gar rakrell. Jon djinan, koon job hi. Doleske mukas o Jesus len gar te rakrell.
41001035	Un taissarlake, glan o diwes, stas lo pre, un djas kote, kai lo kokres hi. Un kote rakras lo o Debleha.
41001036	Un o Simon un kolla, kai pash leste his, nashan leske sik palla.
41001037	Un har hatsan le les, penan le leske: "Hakeno rodell tut."
41001038	Penas lo ap lende: "Mer djas ninna an i wawar forja, te penap kote i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Doleske wom kai, te penap kowa lenge."
41001039	Un job djas an o tselo them Galilea trujal, un rakras an i biboldengre kangria, un tradas i bengen dran i menshende win.
41001040	I mursh was pash o Jesuseste. Koles his i djungelo nasslepen, kai leskro mass tele merella. Job peras glan leste tele, un mangas lestar: "Te kameh tu, nai kreh man sasto."
41001041	Un o Jesuses khaitas kowa, un job tchiwas peskro wast ap leste, un penas ap leste: "Me kamau, te wess sasto."
41001042	Un har job kowa penas, djas ko nasslepen lestar, un job was sasto.
41001043	Un o Jesus bitchras les pestar un penas soreles ap leste:
41001044	"Shun, pen kekeske, hoi me krom tuke! Dja pash o rashajeste un sike leste, kai tu sasto wal! Un aan kowa glan o Debleste, hoi o Mose penas, te wess erligo kerdo. Kre kowa, te djinenn i menshe, kai tu sasto wal."
41001045	Un ko mursh djas peske, un rakras bud pral kowa, hoi o Jesus leske kras. Un bud shunan kowa, jaake, te nai djas o Jesus buder gar an i forja dre, har job kamas. Un job his win, kote, kai kek menshe djiwan. Un kote wan le pash leste dran i tsele gaba un forja.
41002001	Pal i tikno tsiro djas o Jesus pale an o foro Kapernaum. Un bud shunan, kai job an o kheer his.
41002002	Koi wan jaake bud menshe an o kheer un glan o wudar khetne, te nai djas buder kek an o kheer dre. Un o Jesus penas lenge o Debleskro lab.
41002003	Koi anan le jekes ap o tchiben, kai nai nashell gar. Star mursha hidjan les.
41002004	Kolla anan les nashte gar pash o Jesuseste, jaake bud menshe his trul leste. Koi djan jon ap o kheer pral pre, lan barra win, un mukan ko tchiben o nassleha glan o Jesuseste tele.
41002005	Har o Jesus lengro patsepen dikas, penas lo ap koleste, kai nai nashell gar: "Miro tchawo, me lau tiri doosh tutar."
41002006	Koi his ninna biboldengre tchatchepangre beshdo. Kolla penan an pengre djia:
41002007	"Har nai penell job kowa? Job krell pes har o Dewel! O Dewel kokres nai lell i doosh i menshendar!"
41002008	O Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djas un penas ap lende: "Hoske djal kowa an tumaro shero trujal?
41002009	Hi kowa phareder, te penap ap leste: Me lau tiri doosh tutar, har te penap: Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja khere?
41002010	Me kamau, te djinenn tumer: O Menshengro Tchawes hi i soor ap kai phub, te nai lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik." Palle penas lo ap koleste, kai nasselo hi:
41002011	"Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja khere!"
41002012	Un job stas pre, las peskro tchiben un djas win. Un lauter dikan les, un kran bare jaka. Jon sharan o Debles, un penan: "An maro tselo djipen dikam sawo koowa gar."
41002013	O Jesus djas pale win pash o baro pani. Un bud menshe wan pash leste. Un job sikras len o Debleskro drom.
41002014	Un har job jaake kote djas, dikas lo i murshes, kowa kharas Levi. Leskro dad hi o Alfeo. O Levi his pash ko kheer beshdo, kai las job lowe i Remarjenge dre. Penell o Jesus ap leste: "Am, dja mantsa!" Un job stas pre, un djas leha.
41002015	Un o Jesus djas an leskro kheer un beshas pes tele. Un bud menshe djan leha. Bud his kolendar, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un kolendar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske pale-tchiddo his. Un jon beshan pen tele o Jesuseha un leskre malentsa, te chan le.
41002016	Mank i Farisarja his sawe, kai tchatchepangre hi. Har jon dikan, kai job kolentsa chal, penan le ap leskre malende: "Hoske chal job kolentsa, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un kol wawarentsa, kai hi ninna pale-tchiddo?"
41002017	Har o Jesus kowa shunas, penas job ap lende: "Kolla, kai sasto hi, djan gar pash o dramaskro. Kolla, kai nasselo hi, djan pash leste. Me wom gar, te dap kolen pash mande gole, kai ap o tchatcho drom hi. Na-a! Me wom, te dap kolen pash mande gole, kai djan ap o tchilatcho drom."
41002018	His i diwes, kai chan o Johanneskre mala un i Farisarja tchi, te mangenn le o Debles an. Koi wan mursha pash o Jesuseste, un penan ap leste: "Kolla, kai shunenn ap o Johanneste, ninna kolla, kai shunenn ap i Farisarja, chan i tsiro tchi, te mangenn le o Debles an. Hoske krenn tire mala kowa gar?"
41002019	Penell o Jesus ap lende: "Jaake raha, har o bijabeskro ap i bijab hi, chan un pijenn leskre mala, kai leha ap i bijab hi.
41002020	Ko tsiro wella, kai o bijabeskro lendar krik lino wella. Ap ko tsiro chan le un pijenn le tchi, te mangenn le o Debles an.
41002021	Kek siwell i newo kotar thann ap i phuro ripen. Pash o thopen well o newo kotar tikneder un tsardell pes pale tele, un o phuro ripen djal budeder paash.
41002022	Un kek tchorell newi mool an i phure moljakre gone. I newi mool krell i phure moljakre gone paash. Un koi mool nashell win, un kol moljakre gone djan paash. I newi mool well tchoredo an newe moljakre gone!"
41002023	Ap jek Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus ap i kotar them, kai djob baro was. Un leskre mala lan o djob an i wasta, te chan le.
41002024	Un kol Farisarja penan ap leste: "Hoske krenn tire mala ap o Debleskro diwes sawo koowa, hoi hi gar pal maro tchatchepen?"
41002025	Penas lo ap lende: "Hoi kras o baro rai David peskre malentsa, har jon bokan? Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi?
41002026	An ko tsiro, kai o Abjathar o baro rashai his, djas o David an o Debleskro kheer un chas o Debleskre mare, hoi kote tchiddo his. Pal i biboldengro tchatchepen his kol mare i rashajenge kokres koi. O David chas len, un das ninna kolen, kai pash leste his."
41002027	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "O Debleskro diwes hi i menshenge koi. O mensho was gar kerdo, te hi lo o Debleskro diweske koi.
41002028	Jaake hom me, o Menshengro Tchawo, ninna o rai pral o Debleskro diwes."
41003001	Un o Jesus djas pale an i biboldengri kangri. Koi his i mursh, koles his i bango wast.
41003002	Un jon dikan ap leste, un putchan pendar: "Krell lo kanna kau murshes ap o Debleskro diwes sasto?" Jon rodan tchomone, te nai anenn le les glan i tchatchepangre.
41003003	Un job penas ap kol mursheste, koles i bango wast hi: "Ste pre un am kai!"
41003004	Palle penas lo ap lende: "Hoi kras mer pal maro tchatchepen ap o Debleskro diwes? Hi gar feteder te kras mer latcho koowa har tchilatcho koowa? Hi gar feteder te kras mer i nasselen sasto, har te mukas mer len te merell?" Jon penan tchi.
41003005	Kowa dukas les, kai lengro dji har i bar his. Un job dikas chojemen ap lende un penas ap ko mursheste: "Sike tiro wast!" Un job sikras peskro wast. Un ko wast was sasto.
41003006	Un kol Farisarja djan win, un djan pash kolende, kai shunenn ap o Herodeste, un rakran lentsa, har jon nai marenn les.
41003007	-
41003008	O Jesus un leskre mala djan penge pash o baro pani. Un bud menshe dran o them Galilea djan leske palla. Ninna bud wawar djan pash leste, kai shunan, hoi job lauter kras. Kolla wan dran o them Judea, un dran o foro Jerusalem, un dran o them Idumea un dran o them ap i wawar rig o panjestar Jordan, un dran ko them, kai i forja Tirus un Sidon tchiddo hi.
41003009	-
41003010	Un o Jesus kras bud menshen sasto. Doleske wan lauter, kai nasselo hi, pash leste. Un hakeno kamas les an-taprell, te well lo sasto. Koi penas o Jesus ap peskre malende, te anenn le leske i tikno panjeskro ulepaskro, kai job nai pre djala, te well lo gar paash stakedo.
41003011	Un har kol menshe, kai benga an lende his, les dikan, peran jon glan leste tele, un dan gole: "Tu hal o Debleskro tchawo!"
41003012	Un job penas soreles ap lende, te penenn le kowa kekeske.
41003013	O Jesus djas ap i berga, un das kolen pash peste gole, kai job win rodas. Un kolla wan pash leste.
41003014	Job rodas deesh-te-dujen lendar win, te wenn le leskre bitchepangre. "Me rodom tumen win, te atchenn pash mande," penas lo. "Me bitchrau tumen pash i menshende, te penenn lenge o Debleskro lab.
41003015	Un tumen well i soor, te tradenn i bengen wi."
41003016	Un kol deesh-te-dui his: o Simon, koles das job ko lab Petro,
41003017	un o Jakobo un leskro phraal o Johanni. Lengro dad hi o Zebedeo. Kolen das lo ko lab Boanerges, kowa kharella Mursha pherdo choli.
41003018	Mank kol deesh-te-dujende his ninna o Andreas, un o Filipo, un o Bartolomeo, un o Mateo, un o Thomas, un o Jakobo, koleskro dad hi o Alfeo, un o Tadeo, un o Simon, kai his kol menshendar, kai kharenna Zelotarja,
41003019	un o Judas Iskariot, ko phukepaskro.
41003020	O Jesus djas an i kheer. Koi wan pale bud menshe khetne, jaake, kai his len kek tsiro, te chan le.
41003021	Un har leskre menshe kowa shunan, penan le: "Job hi dinelo!" Un jon kaman les te taprell.
41003022	Un i biboldengre tchatchepangre, kai wan dran o foro Jerusalem tele, penan: "O pralstuno beng hi an leste!" Un jon penan ninna: "O pralstuno beng das les i soor, te nai tradell job i bengen wi."
41003023	Un o Jesus kharas len khetne, un rakras ap lende laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dre hi. Un job penas: Har nai tradell o beng o benges wi?
41003024	Te kurenn pen i bare raja an jek them, palle djal ko them paash.
41003025	Un an jek kheer nai well gar dujen penepaske. Kowa djal gar.
41003026	Te tchingrell jek beng i wawar bengeha, palle nashrell job peskri soor un job djal paash.
41003027	Kek nai djal an i kheer, kai i sorelo mursh djiwella, un tchorell leskro koowa. Job hunte pandell ko sorelo murshes. Palle nai randell lo leskro tselo brawlepen.
41003028	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Hako tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe kran, nai bistrell o Dewel. Ninna te penenn le djungele laba pral leste, nai bistrell lo kowa.
41003029	Koon pral o Debleskro Ducho djungele laba rakrella, kolestar well koi doosh gar krik lino. Leskri doosh atchella hako tsiro.
41003030	Kowa penas lo lenge, har jon penan: "An leste hi i beng!"
41003031	Koi was o Jesuseskri dai un leskre phrala. Jon his win tardo un bitchran jekes pash leste, te kharell lo les.
41003032	Bud menshe his trul leste beshdo. Un leske was penlo: "Dik, tiri dai, tire phrala un tire phenja hi win tardo, un kamenn tuha te rakrell."
41003033	Koi penas job: "Me kamau tumen te sikrell, koon miri dai hi un mire phrala."
41003034	Un job dikas trujal ap kolende, kai his trul leste beshdo, un penas: "Dikenn, koja hi miri dai, un kolla hi mire phrala.
41003035	Kowa, kai krell, hoi o Dewel kamella, kowa hi miro phraal, miri pheen, un miri dai."
41004001	Un pale djas o Jesus pash o baro pani, un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Un pash leste wan jaake bud menshe khetne, te hunte djas job ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, kai an o pani tchiddo his. Un job beshas pes kote, un kol tsele menshe his pash o pani tardo.
41004002	Un job rakras ap lende bud sawe laba, kai hi i khatedo tchatchepen dre. Un job penas ap lende:
41004003	Shunenn, i hacho djas win, te witsrell lo o tikno djob ap peskro kotar phub, te well ko djob baro.
41004004	Un har job o tikno djob ap i phub witsras, peran tikne kotja ap o drom. Koi wan i tchirkle un chan len pre.
41004005	Wawar djob peras ap i barra. Koi his gar bud phub. Dran kowa was ko djob sik dran i phub win.
41004006	Har kanna o kham pre djas, was ko djob, kai gar dur an i phub his, chatchedo un meras tele.
41004007	Wawar tikno djob peras tel i subjengre burra, un kol burra wan baro un tassran les, jaake, kai was ko djob gar baro.
41004008	Wawar tikno djob peras ap i latchi phub, djas pre un was baro. Kowa was triin-deesh kope jaake bud. Wawar tikno djob was shob-deesh kope jaake bud. Un wawar tikno djob was sheel kope jaake bud.
41004009	Un job penas: Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!
41004010	Har his o Jesus kokres peskre deesh-te-dujentsa un wawarentsa peskre malendar, putchan le lestar, hoi job kol labentsa kamell te sikrell.
41004011	Koi penas lo ap lende: O Dewel mukell tumen te haiwell, har kote djal, kai dell lo menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. Kol wawar, kai win hi, ap kolende rakrau sawe labentsa, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi,
41004012	te nai dikenn le kowa pengre jakentsa, un haiwenn les gar, un te nai shunenn le les, un haiwenn les gar, te wenn le gar pash o Debleste, te lell lo lengri doosh lendar.
41004013	Palle penas lo ap lende: Te haiwenn tumer kal laba gar, har kamenn tumer kol tsele wawar laba te haiwell?
41004014	Ko hacho hi har i mensho, kai penell i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
41004015	Ko drom hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn ko lab. Palle well sik o beng, un lell ko lab lendar krik, kai lenge penlo was.
41004016	Ko kotar phub, kai pherde barra hi, hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn ko lab, un lenn les i bachtjatar sik pre,
41004017	un bistrenn les ninna pale sik. Jon mukenn les gar an pengro dji soreles te well. Te well i pharo tsiro ap lende, un te wenn le mange palla lino, palle witsrenn le pengro patsepen ap i rig.
41004018	Wawar menshe hi har ko kotar phub, kai o djob tel i subjengre burra peras. Kal menshe shunan ko lab.
41004019	Palle dikenn le ap i phubjakro koowa. Jon kamenn brawelo te well, un o brawlepen krell len gar bachtelo. Un len hi bok pal bud wawar koowa. Un kowa lauter tassrell ko lab, hoi shunan le. Un ko lab nai rakrell buder gar an lengro dji.
41004020	Koi latchi phub hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn ko lab un krenn kowa, hoi ko lab lenge penella. Pash kolende hi ko lab har o djob, hoi baro was. Un pash jekeste was lo triin-deesh kope jaake bud, un pash i wawareste was lo shob-deesh kope jaake bud, un pale pash i wawareste was lo sheel kope jaake bud.
41004021	O Jesus penas ap peskre malende: Kek chatchell i momeli an, te tchiwell lo lat tel i piri, witar gar tel o tchiben. Na-a, job tchiwell lat ap i momelengri, kai i momeli diklo wella.
41004022	Well i tsiro, kai djinenn i menshe kowa, hoi djinenn le kanna gomme gar. Well i tsiro, kai haiwenn le kowa, hoi haiwenn le kanna gomme gar.
41004023	Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!
41004024	Un job penas ap lende: Denn garda ap kowa, hoi tumer shunenna! Te shunenn gar mishto, hoi penau, haiwenn kowa gar. Te shunenn mishto, haiwenn kowa ninna mishto. Un o Dewel krell tumaro dji pre, te haiwenn gomme feteder.
41004025	Koon kowa, hoi job haiwas, an peskro dji rikrella, kowa haiwell bud un budeder. Koon kowa gar an peskro dji rikrella, kolestar well ninna kowa lino, hoi les hi.
41004026	Un o Jesus penas: Te kharell o Dewel menshen pash peste, te djan le ap leskro drom, hi kowa jaake, har te tchiwell i hacho tikno djob ap i phub.
41004027	Haki rati tchiwell lo pes tele, un taissarlake stell lo pale pre. Un ko tikno djob djal pre un well baro, un ko mursh djinell gar, har kowa lauter djala.
41004028	I phub krell pestar, te well lauter baro. O senlepen well win, palle baro un bareder, un well pherdo tikno djob.
41004029	Ap ko tsiro kai hi ko djob pesso, bitchrell o hacho peskre budepangren, te tchinenn le o djob tele. O tsiro was, te anenn le o djob dre.
41004030	Palle penas o Jesus ap lende: Me penau tumenge kanna, har kowa hi, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom.
41004031	Kowa hi jaake har i djob dran i senftikro ruk. Te well lo an i phub witsedo, hi lo tikneder har ko tselo wawar djob ap i phub.
41004032	Hi lo an i phub, djal lo pre un well bareder har o tselo wawar senlepen. Dran ko tikno djob well i ruk jaake baro, te nai djiwenn i tchirkle ap leste, kote, kai o kham gar jaake tato hi.
41004033	Un o Jesus penas lenge bud sawe laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Job penas lenge o Debleskro lab jaake, har jon nai haiwan kowa.
41004034	Hako kopo, kai job lenge o Debleskro lab penas, rakras lo sawe labentsa, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Job te his pengre malentsa kokres, palle penas lo lenge, hoi kol laba kamenn te sikrell.
41004035	Un ap ko diwes ap i rati penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Uleras wergal!"
41004036	Un jon mukan kol menshen te djal, un djan an ko panjeskro ulepaskro, kai o Jesus hi, un lan les lentsa. Wawar panjeskre ulepangre his ninna koi un uleran lentsa.
41004037	Koi phurdas i baro diwjo ducho pral o baro pani. Un o pani was diwjo un djas pre te tele. Un bud pani was an o panjeskro ulepaskro dre, jaake bud, te was o panjeskro ulepaskro pherdo pani.
41004038	Un o Jesus his pal ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un sowas ap i pernitsa. Un jon djangran les pre, un penan ap leste: "Sikepaskro, putcheh tu gar koi pal, kai mer tassah?"
41004039	Un job stas pre, un das ko sorelo ducho trad, un penas ap ko baro pani: "Atch! Muk tele!" Un ko sorelo ducho phurdas buder gar, un o baro pani das buder kek gole.
41004040	Un job penas ap lende: "Hoske trashenn tumer jaake? Hi tumen kek patsepen?"
41004041	Un kolen was i bari traash, un jon penan mank pende: "Koon hi ko mursh? Ninna o sorelo ducho un o baro pani shunenn ap leste."
41005001	Un jon wan ap o wawar panjeskri rig an o them Gerasa.
41005002	Un har o Jesus dran o panjeskro ulepaskro djas, nashas i mursh pash leste. Kowa was dran i mulengre khera. Les his i beng an peste,
41005003	un djiwas an kol mulengre khera. Un kek nashte pandas les, witar gar i sasterne shellentsa.
41005004	Bud kope pandan le leskre wasta un pire i sasterne shellentsa, un job kras len paash un phagas len pestar tele. Un kek nashte was rai pral leste.
41005005	Hako tsiro ap o diwes un an i rati, his job an i mulengre khera un ap i berge, un das bari gole, un das pes i barentsa.
41005006	Har job o Jesuses dur glan peste dikas, nashas lo pash leste un witsras pes glan leste ap i phub.
41005007	-
41005008	Un o Jesus penas ap o bengeste: "Tu beng, dja wi dran kau mursheste!" Koi das job bari gole: "Jesus, tu tchawo o baro Deblestar, hoi kameh tu mandar? Me mangau tut pash o Debleste: Ma duke man gar!"
41005009	Un o Jesus putchas lestar: "Har khareh tu?" Koi penas lo: "Mer ham bud. Doleske kharau Legioni."
41005010	Un job mangas o Jesusestar, te tradell lo len gar dran ko them win.
41005011	Koi his pash i berga bud bale, hoi kote chan.
41005012	Un kol benga mangan lestar: "Muk men an kol balende dre te djal!"
41005013	Un job mukas len an lende dre te djal. Koi wan kol benga dran o mursheste win, un djan an kol balende. Un kol tsele bale wan diwjo un nashan i berga tele, un stan an o baro pani, un tassan. Kolla his nai dui serja bale.
41005014	Un kolla, kai dan garda ap i balende, nashan penge, un penan kowa i menshenge an i forja un an i gaba. Un kol menshe kaman te dikell, hoi kote djas, un wan pash o Jesuseste,
41005015	un dikan koles kote beshdo, kolestar kol bud benga win wan. Job his an-rido un buder gar diwjo. Har jon kowa dikan, was i traash ap lende.
41005016	Un kolla, kai lauter dikan, penan lenge, hoi koleha djas, un hoi kol balentsa djas.
41005017	Un jon mangan o Jesusestar, te djal lo dran lengro them win.
41005018	Un har job ap o panjeskro ulepaskro djas, mangas lestar ko mursh, kai his i benga an leste, te atchell lo nai pash leste.
41005019	O Jesus kamas gar, te djas job leha, un penas ap leste: "Dja khere pash tire menshende! Pen lenge lauter, hoi o Dewel tuke kras un har latcho job ap tute his!"
41005020	Un kau mursh djas peske, un djas an ko them trujal, kai i deesh forja tchiddo hi, un penas i menshenge, hawo baro koowa o Jesus ap leste kras. Un hakeno kras bare jaka.
41005021	Har o Jesus ap o panjeskro ulepaskro pale wergal uleras, wan kote bud menshe pash leste khetne. Un job his gomme pash o baro pani,
41005022	koi was i pralstuno pral i biboldengri kangri. Leskro lab his Jairo. Har dikas lo o Jesuses, peras lo glan leste tele,
41005023	un mangas les o tselo djijeha un penas: "Miri tchai hi ap o merepen tchiddo. Am un tchip tire wasta ap late, te well li sasto, un te djiwell li!"
41005024	Un job djas leha. Un bud menshe djan leske palla un his trul leste.
41005025	Mank lende his i djuwel. Kolat his i ratlo nasslepen. Deesh-te-dui bersha his li nasseli,
41005026	un das lauter, hoi lat his, i dramangrende. Un kek nashte kras lat sasto. Joi was gomme nassleder.
41005027	Har joi o Jesusestar shunas, was li mashkral i menshende pal leste, un tapras ap leskro ripen.
41005028	Joi penas peske: "Te taprau kokres ap leskro ripen, wau sasto."
41005029	Un ap jek kopo djas kau nasslepen latar. Un joi haiwas, kai hi li sasto.
41005030	Un o Jesus haiwas pestar, kai djas i soor lestar win, un risras pes trujal, un penas ap i menshende: "Koon tapras ap miro ripen?"
41005031	Un leskre mala penan ap leste: "Tu dikeh, har bud menshe trul tute hi, un koi putcheh tu: Koon tapras ap miro ripen?"
41005032	Job dikas pes trujal pal kolate, kai kras kowa.
41005033	Koi djuwel kai djinas, hoi lake djas, trashas un trissas. Un joi was pash leste, un peras glan leste tele ap i phub, un penas leske o tselo tchatchepen.
41005034	Job penas ap late: "Romnija, tiro patsepen kras tut sasto. Dja mo Debleha! Tiro nasslepen well buder gar pale."
41005035	Har job jaake rakras, wan mursha dran o kheer kolestar, kai o pralstuno pral i biboldengri kangri hi, un penan leske: "Tiri tchai meras. Tu hunte mangess o rajes buder gar."
41005036	O Jesus shunas kal laba, un penas ap kol pralstuneste: "Ma traash, pats!"
41005037	Un o Jesus mukas kokres o Petres, un o Jakobes, un koleskro phrales, o Johanni, leha te djal.
41005038	Un jon wan an o kheer kol pralstunestar. Un job dikas kote bud menshen, kai nashan kate un kote un rowan un dan bari gole.
41005039	Un job djas dre, un penas ap lende: "Hoske denn tumer gole un rowenna? Koi tchai meras gar, joi sowella."
41005040	Un jon san pral leste. O Jesus tradas len lauteren win, un las kol tchakro dades un lakri dai peha, ninna kolen, kai pash leste his, un djas dre, kai koi tchai tchiddo his.
41005041	Un job tapras kol tchat pash o wast, un penas ap late an peskro rakepen: "Talita kumi!" Kowa kharella: Tchai, me penau tuke, ste pre!
41005042	Un sik stas koi tchai pre, un djas trujal. Joi his deesh-te-dui bersha phuro. Un kolenge atchas o rakepen pral kowa krik.
41005043	Un job penas lenge soreles: "Ma penenn kowa kekeske!" Un palle penas lo: "Denn lat te chal!"
41006001	O Jesus djas dran ko foro win un was an peskro dadeskro foro. Un leskre mala djan leha.
41006002	Ap o Debleskro diwes djas lo an i biboldengri kangri un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un bud menshe, kai shunan les, kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job penas. Jon penan: "Koon penas leske kowa lauter? Koon das les sawo goswepen? Kai well leskri bari soor, te nai krell lo sawo baro koowa?"
41006003	"Hi kowa gar ko mursh, kai budrell i kashtentsa? Hi leskri dai gar i Maria? Hi leskre phrala gar o Jakobo, o Josef, o Simon, un o Judas? Un ninna leskre phenja djiwenn pash mende." Un jon choiran pen pral leste.
41006004	O Jesus penas ap lende: "Kek Debleskro rakepaskro well kote sharedo, kai job khere hi, witar gar pash peskre menshende un an peskro kheer. An i wawar forja un gaba well lo sharedo."
41006005	Un kote nashte kras job kek baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, kokres i nasslenge tchiwas job i wasta pre un kras len sasto, un kolla his gar bud nassele.
41006006	Un job nai haiwas gar, hoske i menshen kote kek patsepen his. Palle djas lo an kol gaba trujal, un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
41006007	O Jesus das kol deesh-te-dujen pash peste gole, te bitchrell lo len win, dui te dui. Job das len i soor pral i benga, te nai tradenn le len i menshendar win.
41006008	-
41006009	Un job penas lenge soreles: "Lenn tchi tumentsa ap o drom, kokres i kasht un tircha. Lenn kek maro, kek possita, kek lowe, witar gar i duito gad!"
41006010	Un job penas ap lende: "Kote, kai tumer an i kheer dre djana, kote atchenn jaake raha har atchenn an ko foro.
41006011	Kote, kai lenn le tumen gar an pengro kheer dre, un kamenn gar ap tumende te shunell, kote djan dureder, un denn koi tchik tumare pirendar tele! Kowa sikrell kol menshende, kai jon tchilatcho hi."
41006012	Un kol deesh-te-dui djan trujal, un penan i menshenge: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom!"
41006013	Un jon tradan bud bengen i menshendar win, un makan bud nasselen o djeteha dre, un kran len sasto.
41006014	Ninna o baro rai, o Herodes, shunas o Jesusestar. An o tselo them rakran le lestar. I menshe penan: "O Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen an o pani thowas, stas i mulendar pre. Doleske hi les i soor, te krell lo sawo baro koowa."
41006015	Wawar penan: "Kowa hi o Elija." Un pale wawar penan: "Kowa hi i Debleskro rakepaskro har kol wawar Debleskre rakepangre."
41006016	Har kowa o Herodes shunas, penas lo: "Kowa hi o Johanni, kai mukom leske o shero tele te dell. Kowa stas i mulendar pre."
41006017	-
41006018	Kowa was jaake: Glan ko tsiro las o Herodes koi romjat peskro phralestar Filip. Lakro lab his Herodia. Un o Johanni penas leske: "Kowa hi gar mishto, kai tu lal tiro phraleskri romjat." Har o Herodes kowa shunas, penas lo ap peskre lurdende, te taprenn le o Johanni, un te witsrenn le les an o stilepen.
41006019	Un i Herodia his chojedo ap o Johanneste un kamas les te marell, un joi kras les nashte gar.
41006020	O Herodes trashas o Johannestar. Job djinas, kai o Johanni i Debleskro mursh hi, kai djas o tchatcho drom. Doleske das lo garda ap leste un rikras les an o stilepen. Job kamas o Johanneskro rakepen. Hako kopo, kai job les shunas, djinas lo buder gar, hoi te krell lo un te penell lo.
41006021	Koi was i diwes, kai hi mishto i Herodiake. O Herodes was i bersh phureder un mukas i baro chapen te krell. Pash ko chapen wan i pralstune pral peskro them, ninna i pralstune lurde. Un i brawele dran o them Galilea his ninna koi.
41006022	Koi was i Herodiakri tchai pash lende un khelas glan lende. Lakro khelepen his shukar an i jaka o rajestar Herodes un an i jaka kolendar, kai pash leste beshdo hi un chan. Koi penas o Herodes ap koi tchate: "Tu nai mangeh mandar, hoi tu kameh. Me dau kowa tute!"
41006023	Un job das pes sowel: "Hoi tu mandar ninna mangeh, kowa dau tut, ninna te mangeh mandar o paash miro themestar un brawlepen."
41006024	Un koi tchai djas win, un putchas peskri datar: "Hoi mangap lestar?" Koja penas: "O shero o Johannestar, kowa kai thowas i menshen an o pani."
41006025	Koi djas li sik dre pash o Herodeste, un mangas lestar: "Me kamau, te dess man kanna ap i tcharo o shero o Johannestar, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani."
41006026	Har o Herodes kowa shunas, dukas leskro dji. Ninna te khaitas les kowa, kamas lo peskro lab te rikrell, hoi job glan kolende das, kai pash leste trul i chapaskri beshdo his un shunan, har job pes sowel das.
41006027	Doleske bitchras lo i lurdes pash o Johanneste, te dell lo leskro shero tele. Kowa djas an o stilepen, un das leske o shero tele,
41006028	hidjas ko shero ap i tcharo, un das les kol tchate. Un koi tchai das les peskri date.
41006029	Un har shunan o Johanneskre mala kowa, wan le, lan o mules lentsa, un paskran les.
41006030	Un kol deesh-te-dui, kai o Jesus pash i menshende bitchras, kolla wan pale, un penan o Jesuseske lauter, hoi jon kran un penan.
41006031	Kote his jaake bud menshe, kai wan un djan, te his len kek tsiro, te chan le. Un job penas ap lende: "Awenn, djas kote, kai kokres ham, te lenn tumer newi soor!"
41006032	Un jon uleran ap o panjeskro ulepaskro kote, kai jon kokres hi.
41006033	Har kol menshe dikan, kai jon uleran penge, nashan le dran i tsele forja kote khetne, kai o Jesus peskre malentsa djas. Un jon his glan lende koi.
41006034	Un o Jesus djas dran o panjeskro ulepaskro win, un dikas kol bud menshen. Kolla khaitan les. Jon his har bakre, kai hi len kek bakrengro, kai dell garda ap lende. Un job rakras lentsa i raha tsiro.
41006035	Ap i rati wan leskre mala pash leste, un penan: "Kate, kai mer ham, della tchi te chal, un i rati wella.
41006036	Bitche kal menshen tutar, te djan le pash i hachende un an i gaba, te ginenn le penge maro!"
41006037	Koi penas lo ap lende: "Denn tumer len te chal!" Penan le: "Kameh, te las dui-sheel rupene beme, te ginas maro un das len te chal?"
41006038	Penas lo: "Kitse mare hi tumen? Djan koi un dikenn!" Un har jon kowa djinan, penan le leske: "Pantch mare un dui matche."
41006039	Un o Jesus penas lenge, te beshenn le pen lauter kate te kote an o senlepen khetne.
41006040	Un jon beshan pen kate te kote khetne, jaake te his kate sheel beshdo, un kote his paash-sheel beshdo.
41006041	Un job las kol pantch mare un kol dui matche an i wasta, dikas pre ap o bolepen, parkras pes pash o Debleste, un phagas kol mare an kotja. Palle das lo len peskre malende, te denn le kowa i menshende. Un kol dui matche das lo ninna i tsele menshende.
41006042	Un jon chan lauter un wan tchalo.
41006043	Palle hadan le kol kotja pre, hoi atchan pral. Koi wan deesh-te-dui marengre gone pherdo lendar. Un jon hadan ninna kol matchendar pre, hoi pral atchan.
41006044	Un kolla, kai chan kol mare, kolla his pantch serja mursha.
41006045	Un sik pral kowa tradas o Jesus peskre malen, te djan le ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, te ulerenn le glan leste wergal ap i wawar rig pash o foro Betsaida. Job atchas pash i menshende, te bitchrell lo len khere.
41006046	Har job bitchras len pestar, djas lo ap i berga, te rakrell lo o Debleha.
41006047	Ap i rati his ko panjeskro ulepaskro mashkral ap o baro pani. Un job his ap o them kokres.
41006048	Un i sorelo ducho phurdas pral o baro pani, un das ap lende. Un job dikas, har jon pen tele maran ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, te wenn le pash o them. Sik taissarlake, his jaake starenge, was lo pash lende, un djas ap o baro pani, un kamas langs lende te djal.
41006049	-
41006050	Jon lauter dikan les, un i daar tapras len. Jon patsan, kai hi job i mulo, un dan gole i darjatar. Sik penas lo ap lende: "Ma darenn! Me hom. Lauter hi mishto!"
41006051	Un job was pash lende ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un o sorelo ducho mukas tele. Un lenge atchas o rakepen krik.
41006052	Ninna te dikan le, hoi job kol pantch marentsa kras, haiwan le gar, hawi soor les hi. Lengro dji his har bar.
41006053	Un jon uleran wergal pral o pani un djan ap o them pash o foro Genezaret.
41006054	Un har jon dran o panjeskro ulepaskro stan, prindjran les i menshe sik,
41006055	un nashan an o tselo them trujal, un hidjan kol nasselen ap i tchibja kote, kai jon shunan, te hi lo.
41006056	Un kote, kai job djas, an i gaba, an i forja, un ap o them, tchiwan le i nasselen kote, kai i menshe khetne wenna, un mangan lestar, te mukell lo len i kotar leskro ripen an-taprell. Un hakeno, kai ap leskro ripen tapras, was sasto.
41007001	Jek diwes wan i Farisarja un biboldengre tchatchepangre dran o foro Jerusalem khetne pash o Jesuseste.
41007002	Un jon dikan, har mank leskre malende sawe hi, kai thowan gar pengre wasta glan o chapen.
41007003	Kol Farisarja, ninna i tsele wawar bibolde, thowenn pengre wasta glan o chapen. Un jaake rikrenn le kowa, hoi lengre phure lenge penan.
41007004	Te wenn jon dran o foro an lengro kheer pale, thowenn le pen, un palle nai chan le. Un jon rikrenn pen ap bud wawar koowa, un thowenn i khore, i pirja un i sasterne tchare jaake, har lengre phure lenge penan.
41007005	Koi putchan lestar kol Farisarja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre: "Hoske djiwenn tire mala gar pal kowa, hoi mare phure menge penan? Hoske chan le o maro i tchikle wastentsa?"
41007006	Penas lo ap lende: "Tumer rakrenn dui tchipjentsa. O Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, penas o tchatchepen pral tumende, har job tchinas: Jaake penell o Dewel: Kal menshe sharenn man pengre muja. Lengre djia hi dur krik mandar.
41007007	Jon te mangenn man an, hi kowa mange tchi moldo. Jon penenn i menshenge menshengre laba un gar miro lab.
41007008	Tumer krenn, hoi i menshe tumenge penan un gar, hoi o Dewel tumenge penas."
41007009	Un pale penas lo ap lende: "Tumer haiwenn mishto o Debleskre laba ap i rig te tchiwell, te nai krenn kowa, hoi tumare phure tumenge penan.
41007010	O Mose penas: Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto! Un ninna penas o Mose: Koon ap peskro dadeste un ap peskri date i bibacht anella, kowa hunte merella!
41007011	Tumer penenna: Te penell jek ap peskro dadeste un ap peskri date: Korban, kowa kharella: Me dau kowa o Debleste, hoi hunte doms tute,
41007012	palle hunte krell job buder tchi peskro dadeske un peskri dake.
41007013	Un jaake tchiwenn tumer o Debleskro lab ap i rig, un krenn kowa, hoi tumare phure tumenge penan. Un bud sau koowa krenn tumer."
41007014	Un o Jesus das pale i menshen pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Shunenn un haiwenn mishto, hoi me tumenge penau!
41007015	Tchi, hoi an o mensheskro mui dre wella, krell les pale-tchiddo. Kowa, hoi dran leskro dji win wella, kowa krell les pale-tchiddo.
41007016	Shunenn mishto, hoi me tumenge penau!"
41007017	Pale mukas lo kol menshen, un djas an o kheer. Kote putchan leskre mala lestar, hoi job kol labentsa kamas te penell.
41007018	Un job penas ap lende: "Haiwan tumer witar gar? Haiwan tumer gar, kai lauter, hoi an o mensheskro mui dre wella, kowa nashte krell les gar pale-tchiddo.
41007019	Ko chapen djal gar an leskro dji. Ko djal an leskro per, un well pale win." Un kol labentsa penas o Jesus lenge, kai kek chapen pale-tchiddo hi.
41007020	Un job penas: "O tchilatchepen, hoi dran o mensheste win wella, kowa krell les pale-tchiddo.
41007021	Dran o menshengro dji well o tchilatcho koowa, hoi an leskro shero trujal djal. Dran o dji well, te krell lo djungelo bi-pandlo koowa, te tchorell lo, te dell lo i wawares mulo.
41007022	Te chochell i mursh peskri romjat i wawar djuwjaha, un te chochell i djuwel peskro romes i wawar mursheha, well kowa dran lengre djia. Dran o dji well ninna i bok pal i lowe, o chochepen, wi-ladjedo koowa un dinlepen. Dran o dji well ninna, te dikell jek tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi o wawares hi, te hi lo midjak ap o wawareste, te rakrell lo djungeles pral o wawareste, te hadell lo pes pral o wawareste.
41007023	Ko tselo tchilatchepen well dran o mensheskro dji, un krell o menshes pale-tchiddo."
41007024	Un o Jesus stas pre un djas dureder, un was an ko them pash o foro Tirus. Kote djas lo an i kheer. Un job kamas, te djinell kek, kai job hi. Un ninna kote nai atchas lo gar khatedo.
41007025	-
41007026	I djuwel shunas lestar. Kaja his kek biboldetsa. Joi his dran o them Siro-Fenicia. Kolakri tchat his i beng an late. Un koi djuwel was pash leste, un witsras pes glan leste ap i phub, un mangas lestar, te tradell lo ko beng dran lakri tchate win.
41007027	O Jesus penas ap late: "Muk o maro i tchawenge! Jon te hi tchalo, nai chan i wawar. Kowa hi gar mishto, te lell jek o maro i tchawendar krik un witsrell les glan i djuklende."
41007028	Penas li ap leste: "Tiro hi tchatcho, miro rai. Ninna i djukle tel i chapaskri chan i tikne kotja, hoi mukenn i tchawe ap i phub te perell."
41007029	Penas lo ap late: "Hawo baro lab! Doleske penau tuke: Dja khere! Ko beng djas dran tiri tchate win."
41007030	Un joi djas an peskro kheer un hatsas lakri tchat ap o tchiben tchiddo, un ko beng his dran late win.
41007031	Un o Jesus djas win dran o them pash o foro Tirus, un djas an o them pash o foro Sidon, un dureder pash o baro pani an o them Galilea. Un job was mashkral an ko them, kai hi kol deesh forja tchiddo.
41007032	Un jon anan jekes pash leste, kowa nai shunas gar un rakras gar. Un jon mangan o Jesusestar, te tchiwell lo peskro wast ap leste.
41007033	Un job las kol murshes ap i rig, krik kol bud menshendar, un tchiwas peskre gushte an leskre kanna, un tchiwas tchunger ap leskro tchip.
41007034	Palle dikas lo pre ap o bolepen, las i baro ducho, un penas ap leste: Effata! Kowa kharella: Kre tut pre!
41007035	Un ap jek kopo kran pen leskre kanda pre. Un leskro tchip his buder gar pandlo, un job rakras nai mishto.
41007036	Un o Jesus penas kolenge, kai kote his, te penenn le kekeske, hoi job kras. Budeder te penas job, te penenn le tchi i menshenge, budeder rakran jon koi pral.
41007037	Un kolenge, kai kowa shunan, atchas o rakepen krik, un jon penan: "O Jesus kras lauter mishto. Kolen, kai nashte shunenn gar, krell lo, te shunenn le. Un kolen, kai rakrenn nashte gar, krell lo, te rakrenn le."
41008001	An kol diwessa his ninna pale bud menshe pash o Jesuseste. Har kolen buder tchi te chal his, das o Jesus peskre malen pash peste gole, un penas ap lende:
41008002	"Man khaitenn kal menshe. Triin diwessa hi le kate pash mande, un len hi tchi te chal.
41008003	Me te bitchrau len bokles khere, palle perenn le ap o drom khetne. Mank lende hi sawe, kolen hi i dur drom."
41008004	Leskre mala penan ap leste: "Kai hatsas mer maro kate an kau mulo them, te kras len tchalo?"
41008005	"Kitse mare hi tumen?" putchas lo. "Efta," penan le.
41008006	Job penas i menshenge, te beshenn pen le ap i phub. Un job las kol efta mare, parkras pes pash o Debleste, un phagas len an kotja. Un job das len peskre malende, te denn le len i menshende. Un jon kran kowa.
41008007	Un len his ninna tikne matche. Un o Jesus parkras pes pash o Debleste un das len peskre malende, te denn le kolen ninna i menshende te chal.
41008008	-
41008009	Un jon chan un wan tchalo. Koi his nai star serja menshe. Un pal o chapen hadan le kol kotja maro pre, hoi pral atchan. Kolla his efta marengre gone pherdo. Palle mukas lo len khere te djal,
41008010	djas peskre malentsa ap o panjeskro ulepaskro un was an ko them, kai Dalmanuta tchiddo hi.
41008011	Un i Farisarja wan win pash leste, te rakrenn le leha. Jon kaman te taprenn le les leskre labentsa un penan ap leste: "Kre menge i baro koowa, hoi sikrell men, te well tiri soor o Deblestar!"
41008012	Job las i baro ducho un penas: "Hoske kamenn kol menshe, kai djiwenna kau diwes, i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell? Me penau tumenge o tchatchepen: Jon dikenna kek sawo koowa."
41008013	Un job mukas len, djas pale ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleras wergal.
41008014	Un o Jesuseskre mala bistran, te lenn le maro lentsa. Len his jek maro kokres ap o panjeskro ulepaskro.
41008015	Un o Jesus penas soreles ap lende: "Denn jak! O shutlo jarro hi gar mishto, hoi well i Farisarjendar un o Herodestar!"
41008016	Har jon kowa shunan, penan le penge: "Mer lam kek maro. Doleske penas lo kowa menge."
41008017	Un o Jesus haiwas kowa, un penas ap lende: "Hoske rakrenn tumer pral kowa, kai hi tumen kek maro? Dikenn un haiwenn tumer gomme gar? Hi tumen i dji har i bar an tumende?
41008018	Tumen hi jaka, un dikenn tchi. Un tumen hi kanna, un shunenn tchi. Djinenn tumer buder gar,
41008019	har me kol pantch mare phagom, un kol pantch serja menshende dom? Kitse marengre gone pherdo kotja, hoi pral atchan, hadan tumer pre?" Penan le: "Deesh-te-dui."
41008020	Penas lo: "Un har me phagom kol efta mare kol star serja menshenge? Kitse marengre gone pherdo kotja, hoi pral atchan, hadan tumer kote pre?" Penan le: "Efta."
41008021	Un job penas ap lende: "Haiwenn tumer gomme gar?"
41008022	O Jesus un peskre mala wan an o gab Betsaida. Koi anan le i murshes pash leste, kai dikas nai gar. Un jon mangan o Jesusestar, te tchiwell lo peskro wast ap leste.
41008023	Un job las koles, kai dikas nai gar, pash o wast, un anas les win glan o gab. Palle tchiwas lo tchunger ap leskre jaka, tchiwas peskre wasta ap leste, un putchas lestar: "Dikeh tu tchomone?"
41008024	Un job dikas pre un penas: "Me dikau i menshen, har te wenn le ruka, kai nashenn trujal."
41008025	Pale tchiwas o Jesus peskre wasta ap leskre jaka. Un kau kopo dikas ko mursh pre un his sasto. Job dikas lauter mishto.
41008026	Un o Jesus bitchras les khere un penas: "Ma dja dre an o gab!"
41008027	Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa dureder un was an kol gaba pash o foro Cesarea Filipi. Ap o drom putchas lo peskre malendar: "Hoi penenn i menshe, koon me hom?"
41008028	Un jon penan ap leste: "Hi menshe koi, kai penenn, tu hal o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani. Wawar penenna, tu hal o Elija. Un pale wawar penenna, tu hal i Debleskro rakepaskro, kai glan i raha tsiro djiwas."
41008029	Koi putchas lo lendar: "Un tumer, hoi penenn tumer, koon me hom?" Koi penas o Petro ap leste: "Tu hal o Kristo, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."
41008030	Un job das len trad, te penenn le kowa kekeske.
41008031	Un o Jesus penas peskre malenge: "O Menshengro Tchawo hunte lell bud duka ap peste. Un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre un i bare rashaja tchiwenn les ap i rig. Un job hunte well maredo. Un pal triin diwessa stell lo pale i mulendar pre."
41008032	Un kowa lauter penas lo lenge, un rikras tchi pale. Koi las les o Petro ap i rig, un tchingras ap leste.
41008033	Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, dikas ap peskre malende, un das o Petres trad un penas: "Dja tuke, tu beng! Tu kameh gar, hoi o Dewel kamella, na-a, tu kameh, hoi i menshe kamenna."
41008034	Palle das o Jesus kol bud menshen pash peste gole, ninna peskre malen, un penas ap lende: Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala, kowa hunte bistrell, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, un lell peskro trushel ap peste, un djal mantsa.
41008035	Koon kamell peskro djipen te rikrell, kowa nashrell les. Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala un i menshenge miro lab penella, un well doleske mulo dino, kowa lell o djipen pale.
41008036	I mensheske wals kowa gar mishto, te lals lo o tselo brawlepen ap kai phub, un nashrals peskro djipen.
41008037	I mensho nai dell tchi o Debleste, te lell lo ko djipen pale.
41008038	I menshe an kau tsiro hi tchilatcho un mukan o Debles. Kowa, kai ladjell pes mange un mire labenge glan kolende, koleske ladjau me ninna, te wau me, o Menshengro Tchawo, pale ap i phub. Ap ko diwes hi man o railepen, hoi das man miro dad an o bolepen. Un mantsa wenna o Debleskre bolepangre.
41009001	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Mashkral tumende hi sawe menshe, kai merenna gar, bis te dikan le, kai was kowa bari sorjaha, kones o Dewel win rodas, te well lo baro rai."
41009002	Un pal shob diwessa las o Jesus o Petres peha, ninna o Jakobes un o Johannes, un anas len ap i bari berga. Kek wawar djas lentsa. Un glan lengre jaka las lo i bolepaskro railepen.
41009003	Un leskre koola wan railes bijalo, jaake bijalo, har kek ap i phub nai thowell len bijalo.
41009004	Un ap jek kopo dikan le o Elijas un o Moses, kai rakran o Jesuseha.
41009005	Un o Petro penas ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, hi mishto, te ham kate. Muk men triin tikne khera te krell, jek tuke, jek o Moseske, un jek o Elijeske."
41009006	Job djinas gar, hoi rakrell lo koi. I bari traash tapran len.
41009007	Koi was i wolka pral lende tele. Un jon shunan i rakepen dran i wolka: "Kawa hi miro tchawo, koles kamaua o djijestar. Shunenn ap leste!"
41009008	Un ap jek kopo, har jon trul pende dikan, dikan le buder kekes har o Jesuses kokres.
41009009	Har jon pale i berga tele djan, penas o Jesus lenge soreles, te penenn le kekeske, hoi jon dikan, jaake raha har o Menshengro Tchawo gar i mulendar pre stas.
41009010	Un jon rikran ko lab pash pende un putchan mank pende jek o wawarestar: "Hoi hi kowa, te penell job, kai stell lo i mulendar pre?"
41009011	Un jon putchan lestar: "Hoske penenn mare tchatchepangre, kai glan ko tsiro hunte well o Elija?"
41009012	Koi penas lo ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, o Elija well un anell o Debleskre menshen pale khetne. Hoske hi tchindlo pral o Menshengro Tchaweste, kai hunte wenn bud duka ap leste un kai i menshe rikrenn tchi lestar?
41009013	Me penau tumenge: O Elija was, un jon kran leha, hoi jon kaman, jaake har lestar tchindlo hi."
41009014	Un jon wan pash pengre wawar malende, un dikan bud menshen trul lende, ninna biboldengre tchatchepangre, kai rakran lentsa.
41009015	Un har kol bud menshe o Jesuses dikan, kran le bare jaka. Jon nashan pash leste un penan: "Latcho diwes!"
41009016	Un o Jesus putchas lendar: "Hoi rakrenn tumer lentsa?"
41009017	Koi penas jek kolendar, kai kote tardo hi, ap leste: "Rai, me anom miro tchawes kate pash tute. Koles hi i beng an leste. Kowa krella, kai rakrell lo nashte gar.
41009018	Un te taprell lo les, witsrell lo les ap i phub. Un les hi tchunger glan o mui, un dandrell i danda khetne, un well har mulo. Un me rakrom tire malentsa, te tradenn le o benges lestar win, un jon haiwan les gar."
41009019	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Hawe menshe han tumer, kai hi tumen kek patsepen! Har raha hunte atchap pash tumende? Har raha rikrap me pash tumende win? Anenn les kate pash mande!"
41009020	Un jon anan o tchawes pash leste. Har dikas o beng o Jesuses, tsardas lo o tchawes kai te koi. Un o tchawo peras ap i phub, risras pes trujal ap haki rig. Un i tchunger his glan leskro mui.
41009021	Koi putchas o Jesus o tchaweskro dadestar: "Har raha hi les kowa?" Kowa penas: "Jaake raha, har job djiwella.
41009022	Bud kope witsras lo les an i jag un an o pani, te marell lo les. Tu te haiweh tchomone, palle ab menge latches un kre les sasto!"
41009023	O Jesus penas ap leste: "Tu peneh: Te haiweh tu! Me penau tuke: Lauter djal koleske, kai patsella."
41009024	Koi das o tchaweskro dad gole: "Me patsau. Miro patsepen hi gar baro. Kre, te patsap budeder!"
41009025	Un o Jesus dikas, kai nashan bud menshe pash leste khetne. Koi das lo ko benges trad, un penas ap leste: "Tu beng, kai rakreh un shuneh nashte gar, me penau tuke: Dja wi lestar, un dja buder gar an leste dre!"
41009026	Koi das job gole, un tsardas les soreles kai te koi, un djas lestar win. Un ko tchawo his kote tchiddo, har te well lo mulo. Koi penan kol menshe, kai kote tardo hi: "Job meras."
41009027	O Jesus tapras les pash o wast, un mukas les pre te stell. Un job stas pre.
41009028	Har o Jesus khere was; un jon kokres his, putchan leskre mala lestar: "Hoske tradam mer ko benges nashte gar win?"
41009029	Un job penas: "Tumer hunte mangenn kowa o Deblestar. Te mangenn lestar gar, nai tradenn tumer sawe bengen gar wi dran i menshende."
41009030	Un jon djan dureder, un djan an o them Galilea. Un o Jesus kamas gar, te djinell jek, kai jon hi.
41009031	Un job penas peskre malenge: "O Menshengro Tchawo well an i menshengre wasta dino, un jon marenn les. Un ap o triinto diwes pal leskro merepen, stell job pale i mulendar pre."
41009032	Un jon haiwan kol laba gar un trashan, te putchenn le lestar.
41009033	Un jon wan an o foro Kapernaum. Har o Jesus khere his, putchas lo lendar: "Hoi tchingran tumer ap o drom?"
41009034	Un jon penan tchi. His jaake, ap o drom rakran le mank pende, koon lendar o pralstuno hi.
41009035	Koi beshas lo pes, un das kol deesh-te-dujen gole, un penas ap lende: "Jek te kamell o pralstuno te well, hunte well kowa o tikneder lauterender. Un job hunte budrell i wawarenge."
41009036	Un job las i tikno tchawes pash o wast, anas les glan lende, las les an i mussi, un penas ap lende:
41009037	"Kowa, kai lell sawo tchawes pash peste pre an miro lab, kowa lell man pash peste pre. Un koon man pre lella, kowa lell o koles pre, kai bitchras man."
41009038	Koi penas o Johanni ap leste: "Rai, mer dikam i murshes. Kowa tradas bengen wi an tiro lab. Job his kek mendar. Doleske penam leske: Ma kre kowa buder gar!"
41009039	Penas o Jesus ap lende: Mukenn les! Kowa, kai sawo baro koowa krella an miro lab, kowa nai rakrell gar sik koi pal djungeles pral mande.
41009040	Koon krell menge gar tchilatcho koowa, kowa hi ap mari rig.
41009041	Kowa hi o tchatchepen, hoi me tumenge penau: Koon dell tumen i tcharo pani te pijell, un krell kowa doleske, kai han mire mala, koles dell o Dewel ko latchepen pale, hoi job kras.
41009042	Kowa, kai anell jekes kal tiknendar, kai patsenn ap mande, miro dromestar tele, koleske wals feteder, te well leske i baro bar trul i meen pandlo, un te well lo witsedo an o baro pani.
41009043	-
41009044	Te kamell tiro wast, te kress o tchilatcho koowa, de les tele! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress tu jek wast, un djiweh hako tsiro pash o Debleste, har te djas tu dui wastentsa an o bengeskri jag, hoi hako tsireske chatchella.
41009045	-
41009046	Te kamell tut tiro piro ap i tchilatcho drom te anell, de les tele! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress tu jek piro, un djiweh hako tsiro pash o Debleste, har te wess dui pirentsa an o bengeskri jag witsedo.
41009047	Un te kamell tiro jak tchomone te dikell, hoi anell tut ap i tchilatcho drom, palle tchin les win! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress jek jak un djah pash o Debleste an o bolepen, har te wess dui jakentsa an o bengeskri jag witsedo,
41009048	kai i kerme gar merenna, un i jag gar wi djala.
41009049	Hakeno, kai djal mantsa, hunte djiwell peskro tselo djipen o Debleske. Kowa hi jaake har pash i bakro, hoi o Debleske maredo un chatchedo wella. Kowa well tseles chatchedo. Un ap ko chapen, hoi anenn le o Debleske, hunte tchiwan le loon pre. Kowa sikrell: Ko chapen hi o Debleske.
41009050	O loon hi mishto. Te nashras o loon peskri soor, hi lo buder gar mishto. Un tu nai kreh buder tchi, te well lo pale londo. Djiwenn tumaro tselo djipen o Debleske, un tchingrenn tumen gar!
41010001	Un o Jesus djas dureder un was an ko them Judea un an o them ap i wawar rig o panjestar Jordan. Un pale nashan bud menshe pash leste khetne. Un jaake har job bud kope kras, kras lo kote ninna, un penas lenge o Debleskro lab.
41010002	Un i Farisarja wan pash leste, un kaman les leskre labentsa te taprell. Un jon putchan lestar: "Nai mukell i mursh peskri romjat pal maro tchatchepen?"
41010003	Penas lo lenge: "Hoi penas o Mose tumenge?"
41010004	Penan le: "O Mose penas, te tchinell o rom i liil, kai tchindlo hi, kai job mukas lat. Un palle nai mukell lo lat."
41010005	O Jesus penas ap lende: "Tumaro dji hi har bar. Doleske tchinas o Mose, kai nai mukenn tumer tumari romjat.
41010006	Kowa his gar jaake, har o Dewel lauter kras. Ap ko tsiro kras lo o murshes un i djuwjat.
41010007	Doleske mukell o mursh peskro dades un peskri dat, te djiwell lo peskri romjaha khetne. Un kol dui wenna har jek.
41010008	Jaake hi le har jek un buder gar dui.
41010009	Un kowa, hoi o Dewel khetne anas, kowa hunte krell i mensho gar paash!"
41010010	Un khere putchan leskre mala lestar pale pral kowa.
41010011	Un job penas ap lende: "Koon peskri romjat mukella un romedinerell i wawar djuwjat, kowa chochell peskri romjat.
41010012	Un te mukell i djuwel peskro romes, un romedinerell i wawares, chochell li peskro romes."
41010013	Un jon anan tchawen pash leste, te tchiwell lo peskre wasta ap lende. Leskre mala tchingran ap kolende, kai anan len pash leste.
41010014	Har o Jesus dikas kowa, was lo chojedo, un penas ap lende: "Mukenn kol tchawen pash mande te well! Ma rikrenn len pale! Sawe har jon, kolen das o Dewel gole, te djiwenn le khetne leha an o bolepen.
41010015	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon gar ap mande patsella har kal tchawe, kowa nai well gar ap o Debleskro drom."
41010016	Un job las len an i mussi, tchiwas i wasta ap lende, un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral lende win.
41010017	Har djas o Jesus dureder ap o drom, nashas jek pash leste, peras glan leste tele ap i phub, un putchas lestar: "Latcho sikepaskro, hoi hunte krap, te dell man o Dewel o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
41010018	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Hoske peneh tu Latcho sikepaskro ap mande? Kek mensho hi latcho. O Dewel kokres hi latcho.
41010019	Tu djineh, kai o Dewel penas: De kekes mulo! Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Ma tchore! Ma pen chochepen pral i wawarende! Ma rande tchi i wawarestar! Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto!"
41010020	Penas ko mursh ap o Jesuseste: "Me krom kowa lauter fun tiknes pre."
41010021	Un o Jesus dikas kamles ap leste un penas: "Jek hunte kress tu budeder. Bike lauter, hoi tut hi, un de kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi tut i brawlepen an o bolepen. Un dja mantsa!"
41010022	Kol murshes his bud brawlepen. Har job kowa shunas, dukras les kowa. Un job djas dukedes peske.
41010023	Un o Jesus dikas trul peste un penas ap peskre malende: "Har pharo hi i brawelenge, te wenn le ap o Debleskro drom!"
41010024	Pral kal laba atchas o Jesuseskre malenge o rakepen krik. Koi penas o Jesus pale ap lende: "Mire tchawe, har pharo hi i menshenge, te wenn le ap o Debleskro drom!
41010025	Hi gar jaake pharo, te djal i baro ficho an i subjakro kand dre, har te well i brawelo ap o Debleskro drom."
41010026	Jon kran gomme bareder jaka un penan mank pende: "Te hi kowa jaake, koon nai lell o Debleskro djipen?"
41010027	Koi dikas o Jesus ap lende un penas: "Kowa, hoi nashte krenn i menshe gar, kowa nai krell o Dewel. O Dewel nai krell halauter."
41010028	Koi penas o Petro ap o Jesuseste: "Djineh, mer mukam lauter, un djam tuha."
41010029	Un o Jesus penas: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Hakeno, kai mukell mange un mire labenge peskro kheer, peskre phralen, peskre phenjen, peskri dat, peskro dades, peskre tchawen, peskro kotar phub,
41010030	kowa lell sheel kope jaake bud pale. Kanna, an kau tsiro lell lo khera un phralen un phenjen un daja un tchawen, un i kotar phub. Ninna well lo palla lino. An ko tsiro, hoi wella, lell lo o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
41010031	Un bud, kai kanna glan tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes palla tardo. Un bud, kai kanna palla tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes glan tardo."
41010032	Jon his ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem. Un o Jesus djas glan peskre malende. Kolla his dareno. Un kol wawar, kai djan lenge palla, trashan. Un job las pale kol deesh-te-dujen pash peste, un penas lenge, hoi leha djala:
41010033	"Shunenn, mer djah kanna an o foro Jerusalem. Kote denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta kol bare rashajendar un tchatchepangre murshendar. Kolla krenn wi, te well lo maredo. Un jon denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi.
41010034	Kolla praassenn les, tchungrenn ap leste, denn les i tchupnijaha, un marenn les. Pal triin diwessa stell lo pale i mulendar pre."
41010035	Koi djan o Jakobo un o Johanni, - lengro dad hi o Zebedeo, - pash o Jesuseste un penan ap leste: "Rai, mer kamah, te kress menge kowa, hoi mer tutar mangah."
41010036	Penas lo ap lende: "Hoi kamenn tumer, te krap tumenge?"
41010037	Koi penan le ap leste: "Ap ko diwes, kai tu hal o rai pral i tsele menshende, muk men te beshas ap tiri rig; jek ap tiri tchatchi rig un ko wawar ap tiri serwi rig."
41010038	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer djinenn gar, hoi tumer mangenna mandar. Nai lenn tumer kol duka ap tumende, hoi me hunte lap ap mande? Nai djan tumer jaake an o merepen, har me djau?"
41010039	Penan le: "Awa, kowa nai krah mer." Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer hunte lenna bud duka ap tumende, jaake har me hunte lap len ap mande. Un tumer hunte djan an o merepen, jaake har me hunte djap.
41010040	Ninna te hi jaake, nai penap tumenge gar, koon beshell ap miri tchatchi rig un ap miri serwi rig. Kowa hi gar an miro wast. O Dewel rodas kolen wi, kai ap miri rig beshenna."
41010041	Un har kol deesh kowa shunan, wan le chojemen ap kol dujende, ap o Jakobeste un o Johanneste.
41010042	Koi das len o Jesus pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, i bare rajen hi penepaske pral i menshende an lengre themma. Un i pralstune rikrenn pengre menshen sorjaha tele.
41010043	Mank tumende hunte well kowa gar jaake! Koon tumendar kamell, te well lo baro, kowa hunte well tumaro budepaskro.
41010044	Un koon tumendar kamell o pralstuno te well, kowa hunte well hakeneskro budepaskro.
41010045	Ninna o Menshengro Tchawo was gar ap i phub, te budrenn i menshe leske. Na-a, job was ap i phub, te well lo lenge koi, un te merell lo lenge. Un jaake plaissrell lo peskro djipaha, te lell lo bud menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."
41010046	Un jon wan an o foro Jericho. Un har job peskre malentsa un bud wawar menshentsa dran o foro Jericho win djas, his i mangepaskro pash o drom beshdo. Kowa his korelo. Leskro lab his Bartimeo. Leskro dad his o Timeo.
41010047	Un har job shunas, kai kowa o Jesus dran o foro Nazaret hi, kai well kate, das lo gole: "Jesus, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
41010048	Un bud tchingran ap leste, un penan: "Atch! Muk!" Koi das job budeder gole: "Tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
41010049	Un o Jesus atchas tardo un penas: "Denn les gole, te well lo kai!" Un jon dan les gole un penan ap leste: "Ma traash! Ste pre! Job dell tut gole!"
41010050	Un job witsras peskri plashka pestar, stas sik pre, un was pash o Jesuseste.
41010051	Un o Jesus penas ap leste: "Hoi kameh, te krap tuke?" Ko korelo penas ap leste: "Mo rai, te dikap nai pale."
41010052	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Dja koi! Tiro patsepen kras tut sasto." Un ap jek kopo dikas job nai pale, un djas leha ap o drom.
41011001	Un jon wan pash i gaba Betfage un Betani, kai hi gar dur glan o foro. Kol gaba hi tchiddo pash koi djeteskri berga. Un kote penas o Jesus ap dujende peskre malendar:
41011002	"Djan an o gab koi wergal! Un har tumer dre wenna, hatsenn i tarni esla pandlo, ap kolate his gomme kek beshdo. Pandenn lat tele, un anenn lat pash mande!
41011003	Un te penell jek ap tumende: Hoske krenn tumer kowa? palle penenn ap leste: Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job ap late. Un job bitchrell lat sik pale pale."
41011004	Un jon djan kote un hatsan koi tarni esla win ap o drom pandlo ap i wudar. Un jon pandan lat tele.
41011005	His menshe kote tardo, kolla penan ap lende: "Hoi krenn tumer koi? Hoske pandenn tumer koi esla tele?"
41011006	Un jon penan kol laba ap lende, hoi o Jesus lenge penas. Un kol wawar mukan len koi esla te lell.
41011007	Koi anan le koi esla pash o Jesuseste, un tchiwan pengre koola ap late. Un o Jesus beshas pes pral pre.
41011008	Un bud menshe tchiwan pengre koola ap o drom. Wawar tchinan senele kashta i rukendar tele, un tchiwan len ap o drom.
41011009	Un kolla, kai djan glan leste un kolla, kai djan pal leste, dan gole: "Sharas o Debles! Sharedo well kowa, koles o Dewel bitchras.
41011010	Sharas o baro rajes, ko tchawes maro dadestar David, kai wella an peskri soor! Sharas o Debles an o bolepen!"
41011011	Un o Jesus djas dre an o foro Jerusalem, an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un kote dikas lo pes trujal. An i rati djas lo win an o gab Betani peskre deesh-te-dui malentsa.
41011012	Un o wawar diwes, har o Jesus dran o gab Betani djas, las lo bok.
41011013	Un job dikas dur glan peste i faigetikro ruk. Ap leste his patria. Un job djas kote, te hatsell lo faige ap ko ruk. Un har job kote was, hatsas lo tchi har i patria kokres. His gar ko tsiro, kai i faige baro wenna.
41011014	Un job penas ap ko ruk: " Kek chal tutar buder - an kek tsiro!" Un leskre mala shunan kowa.
41011015	Un jon wan an o foro Jerusalem. Un o Jesus djas an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un job tradas kolen win, kai kote bikran un ginan, un witsras i lowengre stamja kolendar trujal, kai i menshenge lowe paran. Ninna i stamja kolendar, kai parne tchirkle bikran, witsras lo trujal.
41011016	Un job mukas gar, te hidjell jek tchomone an o Debleskro baro kheer trujal.
41011017	Un job penas lenge, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, un penas: O Dewel penella: Miro kheer te well i kheer, kai i tsele menshe ap i phub nai wenna, te sharenn le man, un te mangenn le man an. Tumer kran lestar i kheer, kai i menshe chochenna un randenna.
41011018	Un kowa shunan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre. Un jon dikan, har kran i tsele menshe bare jaka pral leskro rakepen. Doleske daran le lestar un rodan, har te nai marenn le les.
41011019	Un ap i rati djas lo peskre malentsa win glan o foro.
41011020	Un har jon taissarlake pash ko faigetikro ruk wan, dikan le, kai ko tselo ruk tele meras.
41011021	Un o Petreske wan o Jesuseskre laba pale an shero, un job penas ap leste: "Sikepaskro, dik, ko ruk, hoi tu praassal, ko meras."
41011022	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Patsenn ap o Debleste!
41011023	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te penell jek ap kai berga "hade tut, un witse tut an o baro pani", un patsell soreles an peskro dji, te djal kowa, hoi job penell, palle well kowa ninna.
41011024	Doleske penau tumenge: Lauter, hoi tumer o Deblestar mangenna, patsenn, te lan les, palle lenn tumer kowa ninna.
41011025	Un te han tumer tardo un mangenn tchomone o Deblestar, bistrenn ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kras, te bistrell tumaro dad an o bolepen ninna ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran.
41011026	Tumer te bistrenn gar ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kras, palle bistrell tumaro dad an o bolepen witar gar ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran."
41011027	Un jon wan pale an o foro Jerusalem. Un har job an o Debleskro baro kheer trujal djas, wan i bare rashaja, i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder pash leste,
41011028	un putchan lestar: "Koon penas tuke, te kress kowa lauter? Koon bitchras tut?"
41011029	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me kamau tumendar ninna tchomone te putchell. Tumer te penenn les mange, palle penau me tumenge ninna, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa lauter.
41011030	Koon bitchras o Johanni, te thowas job i menshen an o pani? Bitchras o Dewel les? Bitchran i menshe les? Penenn les mange!"
41011031	Un jon rakran mank pende, un penan: "Mer te penah leske: O Dewel bitchras les, palle penell lo menge: Hoske patsan tumer les gar?
41011032	Witar gar nai penah mer: I menshe bitchran les." Jon trashan kol bud menshendar. Kolla patsan, te hi o Johanni tchatchepaha i Debleskro rakepaskro.
41011033	Un jon penan ap o Jesuseste: "Mer djinah les gar." Koi penas job ap lende: "Jaake penau tumenge witar gar, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa."
41012001	Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un job penas: His i mursh, koles his i kotar them. Kote tchiwas lo drakengre ruka an i phub. Trul ko kotar them tchiwas lo barra. Un kote kras lo ninna i platsa an i phub, kai nai stakrenn le ap i drake, te well i mool win. Mashkral kol ruka kras lo i kheer, kai kowa beshdo hi, kai dell garda ap i drake. Palle patsas lo ko kotar phub ap i hachende, te budrenn le kote leske. Un job djas peske an i wawar them.
41012002	Har ko tsiro was, te anenn le i drake dre, bitchras lo peskro budepaskres pash i hachende, te lell lo lendar kol drake, hoi leske hi.
41012003	Un i hache dan les kek drake. Jon tapran les, dan les dawa un bitchran les krik.
41012004	Un ko mursh bitchras pale i wawar budepaskres pash lende. Un koles dan jon ap o shero, un praassan les.
41012005	Un job bitchras i wawares, koles maran jon. Un bud wawaren bitchras lo pash lende. Bud lendar dan jon, kol wawaren maran le.
41012006	Les his jek wawar, leskro tchawo, koles kamell job o djijestar. Koi penas ko mursh peske: Miro tchawestar darenn le. Un jaake bitchras lo pal kol tsele wawarende peskro tchawes pash lende.
41012007	Kol hache rakran mashkral pende: Kowa hi leskro tchawo, kai lauter lella pal peskro dadeskro merepen. Awenn, maras les, te well kau kotar them menge, hoi leske hunte wals!
41012008	Un jon tapran les, maran les, un witsran les win glan ko drakengro them.
41012009	Hoi krell kanna ko rai pral ko drakengro them? Job wella, un marell kol hachen, un dell ko drakengro them i wawaren.
41012010	Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi? Kote hi tardo: His i bar, kai i budepangre lestar penan: Kowa hi tchi moldo. Ko bar las o Dewel un tchiwas les jaake an o kheer, te rikrell lo ko tselo kheer khetne.
41012011	O Dewel kras kowa, un kowa hi i baro koowa menge.
41012012	Un jon haiwan, te rakras o Jesus lendar, un kaman les te taprell. Un har trashan le i menshendar, tapran le les gar, un djan krik.
41012013	I Farisarja kran pen khetne kolentsa, kai shunenn ap o Herodes, un bitchran murshen pash o Jesuseste, te taprenn le les an peskro rakepen.
41012014	Un jon wan pash leste, un penan: "Sikepaskro, mer djinah, tu peneh o tchatchepen, un rakreh kekeske pal o mui, ninna te hi les bud penepaske. Awa, tu sikreh mishto i menshende o Debleskro drom. Pen menge, hi mishto pal maro tchatchepen, te das mer o themeskre lowe o baro rajeste an o foro Rom? Plaissras len? Plaissras len gar?"
41012015	Job haiwas, te rakran le dui tchipjentsa, un penas ap lende: "Hoske kamenn tumer man mire labentsa te taprell? Anenn mange i rupeni bema, te dikap lat!"
41012016	Un jon anan jek. Koi penas job: "Koneskro shero un lab hi ap kai bema?" Penan le: "O shero un o lab o baro rajestar an o foro Rom."
41012017	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Jaake denn leste, hoi leskro hi, un denn o Debleste, hoi leskro hi!" Un jon kran bare jaka pral leste.
41012018	Palle wan i Saddukarja pash leste. Jon hi kolla, kai penenna: I mule wenna buder gar djido. Kolla putchan lestar:
41012019	"Sikepaskro, o Mose tchinas an peskre lila: Te merell i rom, kai romedino hi, un les hi kek tchawe, palle hunte romedinerell lat leskro phraal, te well leskro phraleske tchawen boldo.
41012020	Koi his efta phrala. Un o phureder las i romjat, un meras. Les his kek tchawe.
41012021	Un ko duito las lat un meras ninna. Un les his witar kek tchawe. Un ko triinteske djas kowa ninna jaake.
41012022	Un hake efta murshen his kek tchawe. Palle meras ninna koi romni.
41012023	Kanna putchah tutar: Ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, koneskri romni hi li? Hake efta his laha romedino."
41012024	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer prindjrenn gar o Debleskro lab, un o Debleskri soor witar gar. Doleske haiwan tumer tchi.
41012025	Kol mulen, kai o Dewel djido krella, romedinerenn buder gar un wenna gar romedino. Jon hi har i bolepangre an o bolepen.
41012026	Djinenn tumer gar, har an o Moseskro liil tardo hi, te wenn i mule pale djido. O Dewel penas ap o Moseste, har his job tardo pash o bur, hoi chatchas: Me hom o Abrahameskro Dewel un o Isaakeskro Dewel un o Jakobeskro Dewel.
41012027	Un me penau tumenge: Job hi gar o Dewel kolenge, kai mulo hi. Na-a, job hi o Dewel kol djidenge. Tumer haiwan tchi!"
41012028	Jek biboldengro tchatchepaskro his koi pashal un shunas, har kol Saddukarja leha rakran. Har job dikas, kai das o Jesus lenge i mishto lab pale, was lo pash leste un putchas lestar: "Kol tsele laba, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, hawo lab hi o bareder lendar?"
41012029	Penas o Jesus leske: "O bareder lab hi kowa: Shun tu, Israel! Maro Dewel hi o rai, hi kek wawar.
41012030	Tu kamess tiro Debles o tselo djijestar an tiro tselo djipen, an lauter, hoi tu kreh un djineh.
41012031	O duito Debleskro lab hi kowa: Te wess jaake latches ap koleste, kai pash tute hi, har hal latches ap tute kokres. Kek wawar lab, hoi penell, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, hi bareder har kolla dui."
41012032	Un ko biboldengro tchatchepaskro penas ap leste: "Sikepaskro, tu rakral tchatchepaha mishto. Hi jek Dewel kokres un kek wawar.
41012033	Te kamah mer les o tselo djijeha, an lauter hoi krah un djinah, un te ham jaake latcho ap koleste, kai pash mende hi, har ham latcho ap mende kokres, palle hi kowa feteder, har i tsele bakre un grumja, hoi mer marah un chatchrah o Debleske."
41012034	Har o Jesus dikas, kai job mishto rakras, penas lo ap leste: "Tu hal gar dur o Debleskro dromestar." Un jon trashan, te putchenn le lestar budeder.
41012035	Un har o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer i menshenge o Debleskro lab penas, putchas lo i menshendar: Hoske penenn kol biboldengre tchatchepangre, kai ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchrell, o Davideskro tchawo hi?
41012036	O David penas lestar, har o Debleskro Ducho ap leste was: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig, bis te tchiwau kolen tel tire pire, kai hi chojedo ap tute.
41012037	Koi penell o David mo rai ap leste. Har well lo nai leskro tchawo? Un i tsele menshe kaman, te shunenn le o Jesuseskro rakepen.
41012038	Un job rakras ap lende un penas: Denn jak ap tumende! Kowa, hoi kol biboldengre tchatchepangre krenna, hi gar mishto. Len hi lengste koola ap lende, te sikrenn le, te hi le o Debleskre menshe. Te djan le an o foro, kamenn le, te penenn i menshe "Latcho diwes, mo rai" ap lende.
41012039	An i biboldengre kangria kamenn le ap i pralstune beshepangre te beshenn. Un pash i baro chapen kamenn le ap i feteder beshepangre te beshenn.
41012040	Jon lenn i khera kol djuwjendar krik, kolengre romma meran. Jon rakrenn o Debleha i raha tsiro, te dikenn i menshe, har patslo jon hi. Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral lende win, lenn le i sorleder phagi har kol wawar.
41012041	An o Debleskro baro kheer his i lowengri piri tardo, kai i menshe lowe o Debleske dre tchiwan. Un o Jesus beshas pes pashal un dikas, har kol menshe lowe dre tchiwan. Un bud brawele tchiwan bud dre.
41012042	Koi was i tchorweli djuwel, kolakro rom meras. Joi tchiwas dui tikne kotja dre. Kowa his jaake bud har jek bema.
41012043	Koi das job peskre malen pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koi romni das budeder o Debleske, har kol tsele wawar, kai tchiwan lowe dren.
