41012044	Kol tsele wawar dan lowe dran pengro brawlepen. Kai tchorweli romni das halauter, hoi lat his, halauter, hoi lat his djipaske."
41013001	Har o Jesus dran o Debleskro baro kheer win djas, penas jek peskre malendar ap leste: "Sikepaskro, dik, sawe bare barra un sawe shukar khera!"
41013002	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Kal bare khera, hoi tu dikeh, djan paash. Kek bar atchell ap o wawareste!"
41013003	Un job djas ap o djeteskri berga, hoi hi wergal o Debleskro baro kherestar, un beshas pes kote. Un har jon kokres his, putchan lestar o Petro, un o Jakobo, un o Johanni, un o Andreas:
41013004	"Pen menge, kaana well kowa? Har nai dikas mer, kai kowa lauter glan o wudar tardo hi, hoi wella?"
41013005	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: Denn jak! Ma mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell!
41013006	Koi wenna bud mursha, kai penenna: Me hom o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Un bud menshe patsenn ap lengro chochepen.
41013007	An ko tsiro hi kurepen an kol themma, kai hi dur tumendar un ninna an kol themma, kai hi gar dur tumendar. Tumer te shunenn kowa, ma trashenn! Kowa hunte well jaake. Ko tsiro, kai i phub paash djala, well gar jaake sik.
41013008	I pralstune pral bare themma kurenn pen i wawar pralstunentsa. Un i menshe dran jek them marenn i menshen an i wawar them. Un kate un kote well i phub trisslemen. Bud menshen hi gar doha te chal. Kowa lauter wella jaake pral i phub, har i duka wenna pral i djuwjate, kai lell i tarnepen.
41013009	Denn jak ap tumende! Tumer wenn glan i tchatchepangre anlo, un chan dawa an i biboldengre kangria. Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske anenn le tumen glan i pralstunende un glan i bare rajende, te rakrenn jon i phagi wi pral tumende. Te han glan lende tardo, palle nai rakrenn tumer mandar, te shunenn jon pral mande o tchatchepen.
41013010	Glan ko tsiro, kai i phub paash djala, hunte well o latcho lab mandar penlo an i tsele themma.
41013011	Te taprenn le tumen, te anenn le tumen glan i tchatchepangre, ma darenn, hoi hunte penenna! Ap ko diwes, kai han glan lende tardo, sikrell o Dewel tumen, hoi te penenn lenge. Kowa rakrenna! Ma bistrenn, tumer han gar kolla, kai rakrenna. Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho, kai dran tumende rakrella.
41013012	An kol diwessa phukrell o phraal ap peskro phraleste, te well job maredo. Un ninna o dad krell kowa peskro tchaweha. Un i tchawe hadenn pen pral pengre dadende un pral pengre dajende, un denn len an i wasta kolendar, kai marenn len.
41013013	Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske wenn i tsele menshe chojedo ap tumende. Kowa, kai atchell soreles tardo an o patsepen, jaake raha, har job djiwella, kowa lell o Debleskro djipen.
41013014	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo pral ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa. Koon kawa drawerella, kamaus, te haiwell lo les ninna. Ap ko diwes, kai dikenn tumer ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa kote tardo, kai hunte well lo gar tardo, palle hunte nashenn kolla, kai hi an o them Judea, sik ap i berge!
41013015	Kowa, kai hi pral ap o kheer, hunte djal buder gar an peskro kheer dre, te lell lo peske tchomone.
41013016	Un kowa, kai budrella ap i kotar phub, kowa hunte djal buder gar khere, te lell lo peskri baja.
41013017	Koi bibacht hi bari kol djuwjenge, kai hi an wawar koowa, ninna kol djuwjenge, kai hi len i tarnepen.
41013018	Mangenn o Deblestar, te well kowa lauter gar an o wend.
41013019	Kowa, hoi an kol diwessa pral i menshende wella, hi djungleder har ko tselo tchilatcho koowa, hoi ap i menshende was jaake raha, har o Dewel i phub kras. Un ko tsiro, hoi well pal kowa, well witar gar jaake tchilatcho.
41013020	Te krals o Dewel ko tchilatcho tsiro gar tikneder, wals kek mensho dran o tchilatcho tsiro win. Kolen, kai o Dewel peske win rodas, kolenge kras lo o tchilatcho tsiro tikneder.
41013021	Te penell jek ap tumende: Dikenn, kate hi o Kristo! - palle patsenn les gar! Un te penell i wawar: Ake, kote hi lo! - palle patsenn les witar gar!
41013022	Chochene mursha wenna un penenna ap tumende: Me hom o Kristo. Un i chochene rakepangre penenna: Me wom o Deblestar bitchedo. Un jon krenna baro un sorelo koowa, hoi i mensho nashte krell gar dran peskri soor. Te djals kowa, anans le kolen o Debleskro dromestar tele, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas.
41013023	Denn jak ap tumende! Me penom tumenge kowa lauter, te djinenn les ap ko tsiro, kai kowa wella.
41013024	An kol diwessa pal ko tchilatcho tsiro, wella o kham kalo har i rat, un o mondo dikell kek buder.
41013025	Un i bare momlia ap o bolepen perenn tele. Un o bolepaskri soor perell khetne.
41013026	Palle dikenn le o Menshengro Tchawes, har well lo an i wolke bari sorjaha un railepen.
41013027	Palle bitchrell lo i bolepangren pral i tseli phub, te anenn le dran hako them kolen khetne, kai len o Dewel peske win rodas.
41013028	Me kamau te sikrap tumende tchomone. Dikenn ap o faigetikro ruk! Te wenn leskre kashta senelo, un i patria wenn dran lende win, palle djinenn tumer, te well sik o nijal.
41013029	Jaake hi kowa ninna koleha, pral kowa rakrom. Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, palle djinenn tumer, kai job glan o wudar tardo hi.
41013030	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol menshe, kai an ko tsiro djiwenna, dikenna kowa lauter pengre jakentsa.
41013031	O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Mire laba atchenna hako tsiro.
41013032	Kek djinell ko diwes un ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella. I bolepangre an o bolepen djinenn les gar, witar gar o Debleskro tchawo. Miro dad an o bolepen kokres djinell les.
41013033	Denn jak! Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar, kaana hi ko tsiro kai.
41013034	Kowa hi jaake har pash i mursheste, kai djas ap o them. Job mukas peskro kheer un das peskre budepangren lauter an o wast, hakeneste das lo leskri budi. Un penas ap koleste, kai pash o wudar beshdo hi: De garda ap miro kheer! Ma sob!
41013035	Jaake penau tumenge: Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar ko tsiro, kai o rai pral o kheer pale wella. Job nai well ap i rati, nai well mashkral an i rati, nai well ap ko tsiro, kai dell o bashno gole, nai well taissarlake.
41013036	Jaake denn garda, te hatsell lo tumen gar ap o sopen, te well lo ap jek kopo.
41013037	Kowa, hoi me tumenge penaua, ko penau lauterenge: Denn jak un sowenn gar!
41014001	His dui diwessa glan kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa un glan kol diwessa, kai chan i bibolde kek shutlo maro. Un kol bare rashaja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre rodan i latcho tsiro, te taprenn le o Jesuses tchorchanes, te marenn le les.
41014002	Jon penan mashkral pende: "Mer taprah les gar ap o Passa, te wenn i menshe gar diwjo un chojedo ap mende."
41014003	Un o Jesus his an o gab Betani, an o Simoneskro kheer. Kowa hi ko Simon, kai his les i djungelo nasslepen ap peskro mass. Har o Jesus kote chas, was i djuwel pash leste. Kolat his i tushni an o wast. Koi his djudjo un kutch djet dre, kerdo dran ko kasht, hoi kharella Narde. Un joi phagas koi tushni pre, un tchoras ko djet ap leskro shero, te makell li les dre.
41014004	Mank kolende, kai koi pashal his, his sawe, kai choiran pen un penan mashkral pende: "Hoske tchoras li ko djet tchitcheske win?
41014005	Te bikrams ko djet, lams budeder har triin-sheel rupene beme. Un kol lowe nai dams mer i tchorwelende." Un jon tchingran ap late.
41014006	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Mukenn lat! Hoske tchingrenn tumer ap late? Hoi joi mange kras, his mishto.
41014007	I tchorwele hi hako tsiro pash tumende. Un te kamenn tumer, nai krenn tumer lenge latcho koowa. Me hom gar hako tsiro pash tumende.
41014008	Koja kras, hoi nai kras li, un makas man kanna dre ko diweske, kai wau paskedo.
41014009	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap i tseli phub, kai penenn le o latcho lab mandar i menshenge, koi well ninna penlo, hoi koi djuwel mange kras. Joi wella gar bistedo."
41014010	O Judas Iskariot, jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, djas pash kol bare rashajende, te phukrell lo ap o Jesuseste.
41014011	Har jon kowa shunan, his le bachtelo, un penan: "Mer dah tut lowe!" Un job rodas i latcho tsiro, te dell lo les an lengre wasta.
41014012	His jek diwes glan kol diwessa, kai chan i bibolde o maro, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi. Ap ko diwes marenn le i bakren, te chan le len ap ko baro diwes Passa. Koi penan o Jesuseskre mala ap leste: "Kai djas mer, te kras o chapen tuke?"
41014013	Un job bitchras dui peskre malendar un penas ap lende: "Djan an o foro. Koi dikenn tumer i murshes, ko hidjell i khoro pani. Djan leske palla!
41014014	An ko kheer, kai job dre djal, penenn o rajeske an ko kheer: Maro sikepaskro putchell tutar: Kai hi koi isema, kai nai chau me o bakro mire malentsa?
41014015	Un job sikrell tumende i bari isema pral an ko kheer. Kote hi beshepangre un lauter hoi men hunte well. Kote krenn menge o chapen!"
41014016	Un kol mala djan koi, un wan an ko foro un hatsan kowa jaake, har job lenge penas. Un jon kran o chapen.
41014017	Un ap i rati was job kol deesh-te-dujentsa.
41014018	Un har jon pash i chapaskri beshdo his un chan, penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Jek tumendar, kai chal mantsa, kowa phukrella ap mande."
41014019	Ko dukas len. Un jon putchan lestar, jek pal o wawar: "Hom me kowa?"
41014020	Koi penas job ap lende: "Kowa hi jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, kai tchiwell peskro kotar maro mantsa an jek tcharo.
41014021	O Menshengro Tchawo hunte merella jaake, har hi lestar tchindlo an o Debleskro lab. Hawi bibacht well ap koleste, kai ap leste phukrella! Koleske wals feteder, te wals lo gar boldo."
41014022	Har jon chan, las o Jesus o maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, phagas ko maro, das les peskre malende, un penas: "Lenn ko maro un chan les! Kau maro hi miro mass!"
41014023	Palle las lo o khoro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, das len o khoro, un jon pijan halauter lestar.
41014024	Un job penas ap lende: "Kai mool hi miro rat, hoi me ratau budenge. Jaake krau i drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna.
41014025	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Me pijau buder gar i mool, bis te well ko diwes, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral halauter. Palle pijau newi mool pash leste an o bolepen."
41014026	Palle giwan le o Debleske i gili, un djan wi pash o djeteskri berga.
41014027	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Tumer halauter mukenn man. Hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Dewel penas: Me dau o bakrengro rajes. Un i bakre nashenn penge.
41014028	Pal kowa krell o Dewel man i mulendar djido. Un te djan tumer an o them Galilea, palle djau glan tumende."
41014029	O Petro penas ap leste: "Ninna te nashenn halauter tutar krik, me mukau tut gar."
41014030	Penell o Jesus ap leste: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Kai rati dell o bashno gar o duito kopo gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar."
41014031	Penell o Petro soreles: "Ninna te hunte meroms tuha, doms tut gar buchoste." Ninna kol tsele wawar penan kowa.
41014032	Un jon wan an i baar, koi kharas Getsemani. Un o Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Beshenn tumen kate jaake raha, har rakrau o Debleha."
41014033	Un job las o Petres peha, ninna o Jakobes un o Johannes. Un i bari daar was ap leste, un job trissas.
41014034	Un job penas ap lende: "Miro dji rowella un dukell, har te merap. Atchenn kate un sowenn gar!"
41014035	Un job djas i kotar drom dureder, witsras pes ap i phub un mangas o Debles, te well ko pharo tsiro gar ap leste.
41014036	Un o Jesus mangas o Debles: "Tata, halauter nai kreh tu. Muk, te wenn kol duka gar ap mande! Ninna te mangau tut kowa, ma kre, hoi me kamaua! Kre jaake, har tu kameh!"
41014037	Un job djas pale pash peskre malende un dikas, har sowan le, un penas ap o Petreste: "Simon, soweh tu? Nai rikreh tu gar tire jaka i tikno tsiro pre?
41014038	Ma sowenn dre! Mangenn o Deblestar, te perenn gar miro dromestar tele! Tumen kokres hi kek soor, te atchenn pash mande, ninna te kamell kowa tumaro dji."
41014039	Un job djas pale koi, mangas o Debles un penas kol emlige laba.
41014040	Palle djas lo pale pash lende un dikas, te sowenn le. Jon rikran nai lengre jaka gar pre. Un jon djinan gar, hoi te penenn le ap leste.
41014041	Un job was o triinto kopo un penas ap lende: "Kamenn tumer dureder sowell un kate tchiddo atchell? Kanna hi doha! O tsiro hi kai, kai denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta i tchilatche menshendar.
41014042	Stenn pre! Djas menge! Dikenn, ko phukepaskro wella."
41014043	Un har job jaake rakras, was o Judas, ko jek kol deesh-te-dujendar. Pash leste his bud wawar mursha. Len his chare un kashta an i wasta. Kolen bitchran i bare rashaja, un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder.
41014044	O Judas, ko phukepaskro, kras lentsa win: "Koles, kai tchumrau, kowa hi lo. Koles taprenn, anenn les krik un denn garda ap leste!"
41014045	Un o Judas was pash leste, un penas: "Mo rai!" un tchumras les.
41014046	Un kolla tapran les, un rikran les.
41014047	Un jek kolendar, kai koi pashal tardo hi, las peskro charo, un das jek klisteske o kand tele. Kowa his i klisto, kai budrell o baro rashajeske.
41014048	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Tumer wan i charentsa un i kashtentsa pash mande, har te woms i marepaskro.
41014049	Hako diwes homs pash tumende an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikrom i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un tumer tapran man gar. Kau koowa well jaake, te well tchatcho, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro an pengre lila tchinan."
41014050	Har peskre mala kowa shunan, mukan le les lauter un nashan penge.
41014051	I tarno mursh djas o Jesuseske palla. Koles his kokres i laintikro kotar trul peste. Un jon tapran pal leste.
41014052	Koi mukas lo ko laintikro kotar an lengre wasta, un nashas nanges lendar.
41014053	Un jon anan o Jesuses pash o baro rashajeste. Un i tsele bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre wan khetne.
41014054	Dur pal leste djas o Petro leske palla, un was glan o shukar kheer o baro rashajestar. Un job djas an o baro wudar dre un beshas pes pash i lurdende pash i jag un tatsras pes.
41014055	Un i bare rashaja un i tsele pralstune bibolde rodan tchomone, hoi anenn le nai ap o Jesuseste, te nai marenn le les. Un jon hatsan tchi.
41014056	Bud anan ap leste chochepen pre. Un har jek rakras jaake un o wawar jaake, rakran le gar dran jek mui.
41014057	Palle stan mursha pre un anan chochepen ap leste pre un penan:
41014058	"Mer shunam, har job penas: Me phagau kau Debleskro baro kheer tele, hoi i menshe pengre wastentsa kran. Un an triin diwessa krau i wawar Debleskro baro kheer, hoi kek menshe pengre wastentsa kran."
41014059	Ninna kowa, hoi kolla penan, rakran le gar dran jek mui.
41014060	Un o baro rashai stas pre, djas mashkral lende, un putchas o Jesusestar: "Peneh tu tchi ap kowa, hoi jon ap tute pre anan?"
41014061	Un o Jesus penas tchi. Pale putchas o baro rashai lestar: "Hal tu ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Hal tu o tchawo o baro Deblestar?"
41014062	"Me hom kowa," penas o Jesus, "un ko diwes wella, kai dikenn tumer o Menshengro Tchawes, har hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o sorelo Deblestar, un har well lo an i wolke dran o bolepen."
41014063	Koi kras o baro rashai peskre koola paash, te sikrell lo peskri choli, un penas ap i wawar pralstunende: "Kek hunte penell menge budeder.
41014064	Tumer shunan: Job krell pes har o Dewel. Hoi kamenn tumer leha te krell?" Un jon penan halauter: "Job hunte well maredo!"
41014065	Koi wan mursha un tchungran leske an o mui, pandan leske tchomone trul leskre jaka, dan les un penan ap leste: "Pen menge, koon das tut?" Un i lurde dan les an o mui.
41014066	O Petro his glan o kheer beshdo. Koi was i budepaskretsa o baro rashajestar.
41014067	Un har dikas li o Petres, har tatsras pes lo pash i jag, dikas li ap leste, un penas: "Tu hals ninna o Jesuseha dran Nazaret khetne!"
41014068	Un o Petro penas: "Na-a, kowa hi gar tchatcho! Me djinau gar un haiwau gar, hoi tu peneh!" Un job djas win pash o baro wudar glan ko kheer. Un o bashno das gole.
41014069	Un koi budepaskretsa dikas les, un penas pale ap kolende, kai koi pashal tardo his: "Kawa hi jek kolendar!"
41014070	Un job penas pale: "Na-a, me hom kek lendar!" Pal i tikno tsiro penan kolla, kai kote tardo hi, pale ap o Petreste: "Tchatchepaha, tu hal ninna jek kolendar. Tu hal dran o them Galilea."
41014071	Koi tchingras lo, das pes sowel, un penas ap lende: "Me prindjrau ko murshes gar, kolestar rakrenna!"
41014072	Un sik koi pre das o bashno o duito kopo gole. Un o Petreske wan o Jesuseskre laba an o shero, hoi job leske penas: "O bashno dell gar o duito kopo gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar." Kowa djas an leskro dji, un job rowas.
41015001	Sik taissarlake wan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre khetne i tsele pralstune biboldentsa. Un jon rakran khetne, hoi te krenn le o Jesuseha. Un jon pandan les, anan les pash o Pilateste un dan les an leskre wasta.
41015002	Un o Pilato putchas lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?" Penas job ap leste: "Awa, hi jaake, har tu penal."
41015003	Un kol bare rashaja anan bud doosh ap leste pre.
41015004	Un o Pilato putchas lestar pale: "Hoske peneh tu tchi? Shun, har bud doosh anenn le ap tute pre!"
41015005	O Jesus penas buder tchi, jaake te kras o Pilato bare jaka.
41015006	Ap ko tsiro his jaake, te mukas o Pilato hako bersh ap kol diwessa, kai kherenna Passa, jekes dran o stilepen win. Koles nai rodan i bibolde win.
41015007	Koi his jek, ko kharas Barabas. Kowa his stildo kolentsa, kai kran i baro tchingepen, kai wan i menshe diwjo. Koi pashal maran le jekes.
41015008	Un i bibolde djan pash o Pilateste, un mangan lestar, te krell lo jaake, har job ap hako Passa krella.
41015009	Un o Pilato putchas lendar: "Kamenn tumer, te mukap o rajes pral i biboldende wi?"
41015010	O Pilato djinas, te silwerenn i bare rashaja ap o Jesuseste. Un doleske dan le les an leskre wasta.
41015011	Koi kran kol bare rashaja i menshen diwjo, te penenn le o Pilateske: "Mer kamah feteder, te mukess o Barabes wi!"
41015012	O Pilato putchas pale lendar: "Hoi kamenn tumer, te krap me koleha, koles tumer kharenna Baro rai pral i biboldende?"
41015013	Un jon dan pale gole: "De les ap o trushel!"
41015014	Koi putchas o Pilato lendar: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job?" Koi dan le sorleder gole: "De les ap o trushel!"
41015015	O Pilato kamas kowa te krell, hoi kol bud menshe lestar kaman un mukas o Barabes dran o stilepen wi. Un o Jesuses mukas lo i tchupnijaha dawa te dell, un das les an i lurdengre wasta, te denn le les ap o trushel.
41015016	Kol lurde anan les an o baro kheer o themeskro rajestar, un dan i tsele lurden khetne gole.
41015017	Un jon tchiwan leske i loli rajeskri plashka trujal, pandan subjengre kashta khetne, un tchiwan len ap leskro shero, jaake har i baro rai hidjell shereskro sonakai ap leskro shero.
41015018	Un jon penan ap leste: "Mer sharah tut, tu baro rai pral i biboldende!"
41015019	Un jon dan les i kashteha ap o shero, tchungran ap leste, un mukan pen glan leste ap i phub te perell, un kran jaake, har te mangans le i baro rajes an.
41015020	Un har jon san pral leste, riwan le leske koi loli plashka pale wi, un riwan leske leskre koola pale an. Un jon anan les wi, te denn le les ap o trushel.
41015021	Ap o drom tapran le i murshes i sorjaha, te hidjell lo o Jesuseskro trushel. Leskro lab hi Simon, un job his dran ko foro Kirene. Leskre tchawe hi o Alexandro un o Rufo. O Simon budras win ap i kotar phub un his ap o drom pale.
41015022	Un jon anan o Jesuses ap ko kotar them, hoi kharell an o biboldengro rakepen Golgata, ko kharella Muleskro Shero.
41015023	Un jon dan les mool te pijell. An koi mool his i drab dre, ko kharell Myrrhe. Un job pijas gar.
41015024	Un jon dan les ap o trushel. Un palle khelan le pral leskre koola, te dikenn le, hoi hakeno lella.
41015025	His taissarlake enjenge, kai dan le les ap o trushel.
41015026	Un pral leste ap i kasht his tchindlo, hoske job hunte meras. Koi pre his tchindlo: O baro rai pral i biboldende.
41015027	-
41015028	Khetne leha dan le dui marepangren ap o trushel. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar.
41015029	Un kolla, kai kote pashal wan, sikran i gushteha ap leste, un praassan les, un penan: "Tu kamal o Debleskro baro kheer tele te phagell, un an triin diwessa pale pre te tchiwell.
41015030	Kanna, kre tuke, hoi i wawarenge kral, un ab o trushelestar tele!"
41015031	Ninna kol bare rashaja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre san pral leste, un jon penan jek ap o wawareste: "Wawaren las job dran o merepen win. Pes kokres nai lell lo gar dran o merepen win.
41015032	Te hi lo ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchras, ko baro rai pral o Israel, palle nai djals job o trushelestar tele, te dikas mer kowa un te nai patsas ap leste." Un kolla dui, kai wan langs leste ap pengro trushel dino, praassan les ninna.
41015033	His deesh-te-dujenge, koi was o diwes kalo har i rati an o tselo them. Un kowa atchas jaake bis pash trinenge.
41015034	Un har trinenge his, das o Jesus bari gole un penas: Eloi, Eloi, lema sabachtani? Kowa kharella: Miro Dewel, miro Dewel, hoske mukal man tu?
41015035	Un kolendar, kai kote tardo his un kowa shunan, penan: "Shunenn, kawa dell ap o Elija gole."
41015036	Un jek nashas, las tchomone har i kotar thann, kras les pherdo shutli mool, tchiwas les ap i kasht, un das les o Jesuseste te pijell, un penas: "Muk les, dikas, te well o Elija, un lell les tele!"
41015037	Un o Jesus das bari gole, un meras.
41015038	Un ko wudar an o Debleskro baro kheer, hoi his kerdo dran kutch pesso thann, kowa djas paash an dui kotja fun pral bis tele.
41015039	Ko pralstuno lurdo, kai glan o Jesuseste tardo his, dikas, har o Jesus meras. Un job penas: "Tchatchepaha, kau mursh his o Debleskro tchawo!"
41015040	His ninna djuwja i kotar krik tardo, kai dikan kowa lauter. Mashkral lende his i Maria dran o gab Magdala, i Salome un i Maria, kolakre tchawe o tikno Jakobo un o Joses hi.
41015041	Kolla his leha, har job an o them Galilea his, un dan leske chapen un pipen. Un bud wawar djuwja his koi, kolla, kai leha khetne an o foro Jerusalem djan.
41015042	Har i rati was glan o Debleskro diwes,
41015043	was o Josef. Kowa his dran o foro Arimatia, un his jek kol pralstune biboldendar, kolen penepaske his. Un job dikas ninna ap o Debleste, te well ko tsiro, kai hakeno dikell, kai o Dewel o baro rai hi. O Josef las pes khetne, djas pash o Pilateste, un mangas lestar, te dell lo les o mulo Jesuses.
41015044	O Pilato kras bare jaka, har job shunas, kai o Jesus jaake sik meras. Job das ko pralstuno lurdes gole un putchas lestar, har raha job mulo hi.
41015045	Un har job kowa o pralstuno lurdestar shunas, penas lo o Josefeske, te nai lell lo o mulo Jesuses.
41015046	O Josef ginas i plachta, las o Jesuses o trushelestar tele, tchiwas les an koi plachta, un paskras les an i mulengro kheer, hoi his dre dino an i baro bar. Kote glan tchiwas lo i baro bar.
41015047	I Maria dran o gab Magdala un i Maria, koi dai o Josestar, dikan, kai o Jesus tchiddo was.
41016001	Har o Debleskro diwes trujal his, djan i Maria dran Magdala un i Maria, koi dai o Jakobestar, un i Salome un ginan djet, hoi sungella mishto, te makenn le les dre.
41016002	Sik taissarlake pal o Debleskro diwes djan jon pash o mulengro kheer, har o kham pre djas.
41016003	Un jon rakran mashkral pende: "Koon lell menge ko bar krik, hoi glan o mulengro kheer tardo hi?"
41016004	Kowa his i baro bar. Un har jon pash ko mulengro kheer wan, dikan le, kai ko bar krik lino was.
41016005	Un jon djan an o mulengro kheer dre. Kote dikan le i tarno murshes ap i tchatchi rig beshdo, koles his trul peste i lengsto bijalo ripen. Un jon trashan.
41016006	Job penas ap lende: "Ma trashenn! Tumer rodenn o Jesuses dran Nazaret, kai was ap o trushel dino. Job stas i mulendar pre. Job hi gar kate. Dikenn kote, kai job tchiddo his.
41016007	Kanna djan pash leskre malende! Penenn lenge un o Petreske, kai djal job glan tumende an o them Galilea! Kote dikenn tumer les, har job les tumenge penas."
41016008	Un jon djan dran ko mulengro kheer wi, un nashan penge. Jon trissan i trashatar un penan kekeske tchomone, jaake baro his lengri daar.
41016009	Har o Jesus i mulendar pre stas, sik taissarlake pal o Debleskro diwes, his i Maria dran Magdala koi ersti, kolatar mukas lo pes te dikell. Joi hi koja, kolatar job glan i tsiro efta bengen wi tradas.
41016010	Un joi djas pash kolende, kai djan o Jesuseha, un kolengro dji kanna dukas, un kai rowan pral leste. Un joi penas lenge, te dikas li les.
41016011	Un har jon shunan, kai job djiwella, un kai dikas li les, patsan le kowa gar.
41016012	Pal kowa mukas job pes dui wawar peskre malendar te dikell, kai his ap o drom glan o foro. Pash lende dikas lo wawartchandes win har jon les prindjran.
41016013	Un kolla dui djan pale, un penan les kol wawar malenge. Kolen patsan le witar gar.
41016014	Koi pre, har kol deesh-te-jek pash o chapen beshdo his, mukas lo pes lendar te dikell un tchingras ap lende, kai hi lengre djia har barra, un te patsan le gar kolenge, kai les dikan, har job i mulendar pre stas.
41016015	Un job penas ap lende: "Djan pash i tsele menshende ap i phub un sikrenn hakeneste miro drom!"
41016016	"Koon patsell ap mande un well an o pani thodo, te sikrell lo, kai job miro hi, ko djal gar nashedo. Koon gar ap mande patsella, ko djal nashedo!
41016017	Kolla, kai patsenn ap mande, krenn baro koowa an o Debleskri soor. An miro lab tradenn le bengen i menshendar wi, un rakrenn an wawar rakepen.
41016018	Jon te lenn sapa an pengre wasta, un te pijenn le i pipen, kai nai merenn le, palle wenn le gar nasselo. Ap i nasslende tchiwenn le i wasta pre. Un kolla wenn sasto."
41016019	Har o rai Jesus jaake lentsa rakras, was lo pral an o bolepen hadedo, un beshas pes ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig.
41016020	Un jon djan, te penenn le i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar an hake gaba un forja. Un o rai Jesus his pash lende peskri sorjaha, un kras baro koowa, kai nai krell kek mensho. Un jaake dikan i menshe, kai leskro lab tchatcho hi.
42001001	Latcho Theofilo, bud menshe tchinan an i liil, hoi o Dewel mashkral mende kras.
42001002	Jon tchinan pre, hoi kolla penan, kai kote pashal his un kowa lauter dikan.
42001003	Un me ninna putchom i menshendar har kowa lauter his, te djinap kowa lauter mishto. Doleske kamau tuke kowa jaake pre te tchinell, har kowa tchatchepaha his.
42001004	Jaake haiweh tu, kai lauter tchatcho hi, hoi penan le tuke.
42001005	Ap kau tsiro, kai o Herodes o baro rai pral o them Judea his, djiwas i rashai. Kowa his jek kol rashajendar, kai kharan pen pal o rashai Abia. Leskro lab his Zachari. Un leskri romni kharas Elisabet. Joi hi o Aroneskre menshendar
42001006	O Zachari un i Elisabet his latcho an o Debleskre jaka. Un jon shunan ap o Debleste, un kran lauter, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo his.
42001007	Len his kek tchawe. Joi nai las kek. Un jon dui his phuro.
42001008	-
42001009	His i tsiro, kai budran kol rashaja an o Debleskro baro kheer, kolendar o Zachari jek his. Un har pash lende jaake hi, rodan le les win, te djal lo an o Debleskro baro kheer, te chatchrell lo kasht o Debleske, hoi shukar sungella.
42001010	Un ap ko tsiro, har chatchras job ko kasht, hoi shukar sungella, his bud menshe win tardo, un mangan o Debles an.
42001011	Ap jek kopo his o Debleskro bolepaskro tardo ap i tchatchi rig pash o Debleskro sonakaskro bob, kai o Zachari o kasht chatchas.
42001012	Har o Zachari les dikas, las lo traash lestar.
42001013	Koi penas o bolepaskro ap leste: "Ma traash, Zachari! O Dewel shunas tut, har tu mangas lestar, te well tumen i tarnepen. Tiri romni Elisabet lella i mursh tchawes. Un koles dess tu ko lab Johanni.
42001014	Un tiro dji stella i bachtjatar. Un bud menshe wenna bachteles pral ko tarnepen.
42001015	Un job well bares glan o Debleskre jaka. Mool un wawar sorelo pipen pijell job gar. Un har job gomme gar boldo hi, hi lo pherdo Debleskro Ducho.
42001016	Un job anell bud menshen an Israel pash o Debleste.
42001017	Un job hi pherdo Debleskri soor jaake har o Elija, un job krell i drom pre o Debleske. Un job krella, te lenn i dada pale i dji pengre tchawenge. Un kolla, kai shunan gar ap o Debleste, kolen anell job pale ap o tchatcho drom. Un jaake krell lo, te hi i menshen djia, kai pre hi lengro Debleske."
42001018	O Zachari penas ap o bolepaskro: "Har nai djinau me, kai tiro tchatcho hi? Me hom i phuro mursh. Un miri romni hi ninna phuro."
42001019	O bolepaskro penas ap leste: "Me hom o Gabriel, un me hom glan o Debleste tardo. O Dewel bitchras man pash tute, te penap tuke kowa.
42001020	"Ap o tchatcho tsiro well kowa jaake, har tuke penom. Tu patsal mire laba gar, un doleske lell o Dewel tiro rakepen jaake raha krik, bis te well ko diwes, kai kowa lauter wella."
42001021	Un i menshe dikan ap o wudar an o Debleskro baro kheer, un djinan gar, hoske o Zachari jaake raha an o Debleskro baro kheer atchella.
42001022	Un har job kote win was, nai rakras lo buder gar. Job hadas peskro wast, te sikrell lo lende, te nai rakrell job buder gar. Koi pre dikan i menshe, kai o Dewel rakras leha an o Debleskro baro kheer.
42001023	Un har kol diwessa trujal djan, kai job an o Debleskro kheer budras, djas lo khere.
42001024	Un palle was leskri romni Elisabet an wawar koowa, un khatras pes pantch tchon glan i menshengre jaka. Un joi penas:
42001025	"O Dewel dikas latches ap mande un kras, te well man i tarnepen ap ko tsiro, har job kamas, un las miri ladj mandar krik."
42001026	-
42001027	Ap ko tsiro har i Elisabet o shobto tchon an wawar koowa his, bitchras o Dewel o bolepaskres, o Gabrieles, pash i tarni tchate. Lakro lab his Maria. Joi djiwas an o foro Nazaret. Kowa hi i foro an o them Galilea. Un kolakro pirno kharas Josef. O Josef his o Davideskre menshendar.
42001028	Un o Gabriel was pash late an o kheer un penas: "Latcho diwes, Maria! O Dewel hi tuha! Job dikas latches ap tute."
42001029	Joi tapras i daar, har job jaake rakras, un penas peske: "Hoi penell job koi?"
42001030	Un o bolepaskro penas ap late: "Ma traash, Maria! O Dewel hi tuke latcho.
42001031	Shun, tu weh an wawar koowa, un leh i tchawes. Koles dess tu o lab Jesus.
42001032	Kowa well i baro rai. Job well kharedo Debleskro tchawo. Un o Dewel krell lestar i baro rai pral Israel, jaake har jek leskre phurendar, o David, o baro rai his.
42001033	Un job atchell baro rai pral o Jakobeskre menshende hako tsiro. Un les hi penepaske pral lauter un hakeneste. Kowa atchell jaake hako tsireske."
42001034	Koi penas i Maria ap o bolepaskro: "Har djal kowa? Man hi kek mursh."
42001035	O bolepaskro penas ap late: "O Debleskro Ducho un leskri soor well pral tute. Doleske well o tarnepen o Deblestar un well Debleskro tchawo kharedo.
42001036	Shun, i Elisabet, kai tire menshendar hi, hi an wawar koowa an o shobto tchon. Joi hi phuri un latar well penlo, kai lell li nai kek tchawe.
42001037	O Dewel nai krell halauter."
42001038	Koi penas i Maria: "Me kamau o Debleske koi te well. Lauter te well jaake, har tu penal." Koi djas job peske.
42001039	Pal i tikno tsiro djas i Maria jaake sik har djala an i foro an o pralstuno them Judea.
42001040	Un joi djas an o Zachareskro kheer, un penas: "Latcho diwes, Elisabet!"
42001041	Har i Elisabet kowa shunas, stas o tarnepen an late. Un i Elisabet was pherdo Debleskro Ducho,
42001042	un das bares gole: "Sharedi weh tu mashkral i tsele djuwjende, un sharedo well o tarnepen an tute!
42001043	Har djal kowa, te well koi dai miro rajestar pash mande?
42001044	Har me tut shunom, stas o tarnepen i bachtjatar an mande.
42001045	Bachteli hal tu! Tu patsal, te well kowa jaake, hoi o Dewel tuke penas."
42001046	Un i Maria penas: "Me sharau mo Debles.
42001047	Un miro dji dell gole i bachtjatar pral mo Debleste. Job hi ap miri rig.
42001048	Me hom gar moldo, te dikas o Dewel jaake latches ap mande. Un kanna sharenn man i tsele menshe. Un lengre tchawe penenna mandar, kai o Dewel man bachteles kras.
42001049	Baro koowa kras job ap mande. Les hi i tseli soor, un leskro lab hi bareder har hako wawar lab.
42001050	Job kras peskro dji pre kol phurenge un kolengre tchawenge, lauterenge, kai shunenn ap leste, un darenn lestar.
42001051	Un job hadas peskri soreli mussi, un tradas kolen krik, kai kran pen kokres bares.
42001052	Job las i soor i bare rajendar krik, te well len buder tchi penepaske, un hadas i tiknen, te wenn le baro.
42001053	Kolen, kai bok his, das job te chal. Un kol brawelen bitchras lo krik. Un jon nai lan tchi peha.
42001054	Un job bistras gar peskro budepaskres, o Israel, un kras peskro dji leske pre,
42001055	jaake har penas lo mare phurenge, o Abrahameske un leskre tchawenge, te well lo lenge latcho hako tsireske."
42001056	I Maria atchas triin tchon pash i Elisabet. Un palle djas li khere.
42001057	Un ko tsiro was, kai las i Elisabet i tarnepen. Un kowa his i tchawo.
42001058	Lakre menshe un kolla, kai djiwan trul late, shunan kowa, un wan bachteles laha pral ko baro latchepen, hoi o Dewel kras ap late.
42001059	Pal ochta diwessa wan le, te tchinenn le o tarnepas ap o mass. Un jon kaman les ko lab Zachari te dell, jaake har leskro dad kharella.
42001060	Leskri dai penas: "Na-a! Job hunte lell ko lab Johanni."
42001061	Penan le ap late: "Kek tire menshendar kharell jaake."
42001062	Un jon sikran i wastentsa ap leskro dad, te penell kowa, har ko tarnepen hunte kharella.
42001063	Un job kamas, te anenn le leske tchomone, kai nai tchinas job pre. Un job tchinas: "Job kharell Johanni." Koi kran lauter bare jaka.
42001064	Ap jek kopo nai rakras o Zachari pale, un sharas o Debles.
42001065	Un i traash was ap lauterende, kai trul lende djiwan. Un i tsele menshe, hoi an o pralstuno them Judea djiwan, rakran pral kowa.
42001066	Un lauterenge djas kowa an o dji, kai kowa shunan. Un jon penan: "Hoi well dran kau tarnepen?" Un lauter patsan, kai o Debleskri soor ap o tchaweste tchiddo hi.
42001067	Un leskro dad Zachari was pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un penas kol laba, hoi o Dewel an leste tchiwas:
42001068	"Sharas o baro Debles! Job hi o Israeleskro Dewel! Job was pash mende, un las men dran mari bibacht win.
42001069	Job bitchras menge jek soreles, te lell job men dran o tchilatchepen win. Un kawa wella o Davideskre menshendar.
42001070	Glan i raha tsiro penan i Debleskre rakepangre,
42001071	te lell men o Dewel dran i wasta kolendar win, kai kamenn men te marell, awa, te lell lo men dran i wasta kolendar win, kai men gar kamenna.
42001072	Les his i baro dji mare phurenge un bistras gar kowa, hoi job lentsa an o phuro tsiro win kras un peskro wast pre das.
42001073	Glan maro dadeste, o Abrahameste, das job pes sowel,
42001074	te lell lo men dran i tchilatche wasta win, te budrah nai leske, un trashah buder gar,
42001075	jaake te djiwas mer leske i djudjo un latcho djijeha jaake raha, har djiwah.
42001076	Un tu miro tchawo, tu weh ninna i Debleskro rakepaskro. Un tu djah glan o Debleste, un kreh leske i drom pre, te well lo nai pash i menshende.
42001077	Leskre menshende sikreh tu, har nai well lengri doosh krik lino, jaake te djan le gar nashedo.
42001078	Maro Debles hi i baro dji menge. Leskro kamlepen well pash mende. Kowa hi har o kham, hoi djal pre ap o bolepen,
42001079	un well diklo kolendar, kai hi len traash o merepastar. Kai bari momeli anell men ap o drom, kai wella o Debleskri bacht ap mende."
42001080	O Johanni was baro, un haiwas hako diwes feteder, hoi o Dewel kamella. Un job djiwas an o mulo them jaake raha, bis te was ko diwes, kai job glan i menshende an Israel rakras.
42002001	Ap ko tsiro mukas o baro rai Augusto an o foro Rom te penell: "Tchinenn i laba i tsele menshendar an mire themma pre!"
42002002	Kowa his o ersto kopo, kai tchinan le i laba i tsele menshendar an i liil dre. Un kowa his ap ko tsiro, kai o Kwirinio o pralstuno his pral o them Siria.
42002003	Un halauter djan an pengre forja un gaba, kai lengre phure boldo wan, te mukenn le pengre laba pre te tchinell.
42002004	-
42002005	Un o Josef djas peskri pirnjaha, i Maria, dran o foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea tchiddo hi. Un jon djan an o foro Betlehem an o them Judea, te mukenn le kote pengre laba pre te tchinell. An ko foro his o baro rai David glan i raha tsiro boldo. Un o Josef his o Davideskre menshendar. I Maria his ap ko tsiro an wawar koowa.
42002006	Har jon an kau foro wan, was i Mariake ko tsiro, te lell li o tchawes.
42002007	Un lat was i tchawo. Un joi tchiwas pherne trul leste, un tchiwas les kote dre, kai o chapen i fichenge dre tchiddo wella. An i kertchima his lenge kek tchiben.
42002008	Glan o foro Betlehem dan i bakrengre jak ap pengre bakre an koi rat.
42002009	Ap jek kopo his glan lende o Debleskro bolepaskro tardo. Un o Debleskro railepen his trul lende. Un i bari daar was ap lende.
42002010	Un o bolepaskro penas ap lende: "Ma darenn! I bari bacht well ap tumende, un ap i tsele menshende.
42002011	Kau diwes was tumenge an o foro Betlehem kowa boldo, kai lell tumen dran o tchilatchepen win. Job hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
42002012	Un ap kowa dikenn tumer, koon o tarnepen hi: Job hi pandlo an i pherne, un kote dre tchiddo, kai o chapen i fichenge dre tchiddo wella."
42002013	Ap jek kopo his pash ko bolepaskro bud wawar bolepangre. Un jon sharan o Debles, un penan:
42002014	"Baro hi o Debleskro railepen an o bolepen! O Debleskri bacht well ap i phub. Job dikell latches ap i menshende."
42002015	Un palle djan i tsele Debleskre bolepangre pale an o bolepen. Un i bakrengre penan jek ap o wawareste: "Awenn, djas an o foro Betlehem, te dikas, hoi o Dewel menge penas!"
42002016	Un i bakrengre nashan sik an o foro, un hatsan i Mariat un o Josefes. Un o tarnepen his koi dre tchiddo, kai o chapen i fichenge dre tchiddo wella.
42002017	Har jon kowa dikan, penan le lauterenge ko lab, hoi lenge o bolepaskro pral kau tarnepen penas.
42002018	Un lauter kran bare jaka, har jon shunan, hoi i bakrengre lenge penan.
42002019	I Maria rikras kol tsele laba an peskro dji un mukas len an lakro shero trujal te djal.
42002020	Un i bakrengre djan pale pash pengre bakre. Un jon sharan o Debles o tselo djijestar pral kowa, hoi jon shunan un dikan. Lauter kowa his jaake, har o bolepaskro lenge penas.
42002021	Har ochta diwessa trujal his, un o tarnepen ap o mass tchindlo was, dan le les o lab Jesus. Kau lab penas o bolepaskro i Mariake, har joi gomme gar an wawar koowa his.
42002022	Star-deesh diwessa his i Maria pale-tchiddo, jaake har o Mose kowa an peskro liil tchinas. Pal kowa anan o Josef un i Maria kol tarnepas an o Debleskro baro kheer an o foro Jerusalem, te denn le les an o Debleskro wast.
42002023	An o Moseskre lila hi ninna tchindlo: O phureder tchawo, kai boldo wella, hi o Debleske.
42002024	Un o Josef un i Maria anan dui parne tchirkle glan o Debleste, jaake har kowa an i Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, te well i djuwel pale erligo.
42002025	Ap ko tsiro djiwas an o foro Jerusalem i mursh. Leskro lab his Simeon. Kowa patsas ap o Debleste, un djiwas jaake, har o Dewel kowa kamas. Un job dikas ap ko tsiro, kai lell o Dewel i bibacht i Israeleskre menshendar krik. O Simeon his pherdo Debleskro Ducho.
42002026	Un o Debleskro Ducho penas leske, te merell job gar, bis te dikas lo ko baro rajes, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
42002027	Un ap ko diwes, kai anan o Josef un i Maria pengro tchawes, o Jesuses, an o Debleskro baro kheer, te denn le les an o Debleskro wast, har kowa pal o biboldengro tchatchepen jaake his, koi anas o Debleskro Ducho o Simeones ninna an o Debleskro baro kheer.
42002028	Un o Simeon las o tchawes ap i mussi, sharas o Debles, un penas:
42002029	"Miro Dewel, miro rai, kanna nai merau me an o latchepen, jaake har tu penal.
42002030	Me dikom koles, kai tu bitchral, te lell lo i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win.
42002031	Un tu bitchral les i tsele menshenge ap i phub.
42002032	Job hi har i momeli, te sikrell lo kolen tiro drom, kai prindjrenn tut gar. Koleske sharenn jon i menshen an Israel."
42002033	Un o Jesuseskro dad un leskri dai kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi o Simeon pral pengro tchaweste Jesus penas.
42002034	Un o Simeon rakras o Debleskri bacht pral lende win un penas ap i Mariate: "Pral kau tchaweste choirenn pen bud menshe an o them Israel. Ap leste sikrell pes, koon djal ap o Debleskro drom, un koon perell o Debleskro dromestar tele.
42002035	Jaake well diklo, hoi bud menshenge an o shero trujal djala. Un tire duka, Maria, pral tiro tchaweste wenn jaake, har te dell jek i charo an tiro dji."
42002036	An o foro Jerusalem djiwas i phuri Debleskri rakepaskretsa. Joi kharas Hanna. Lakro dad his o Penuel. Job hi kol menshendar, kai wenna pal o Asser. Efta bersha his i Hanna romedino.
42002037	Palle meras lakro rom. Un kanna his li ochta-deesh-te-star bersha phuro. Un joi his o tselo diwes un i tseli rati an o Debleskro baro kheer, te mangell li o Debles an. Un bud kope chas un pijas li tchi o Debleske.
42002038	Ap ko tsiro har i Maria un o Josef pengro tchaweha an o Debleskro baro kheer his, was li ninna kote pash lende. Un joi sharas o Debles o tselo djijeha pral ko tchaweste, un rakras kolestar ap lauterende, kai dikan ap ko tsiro, kai lell o Dewel i menshen an o foro Jerusalem dran o tchilatchepen win.
42002039	Un har i Maria un o Josef lauter jaake kran, har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo his, djan le pale an pengro foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea hi.
42002040	Ko tarnepen was baro un sorelo, un pherdo goswepen. Un hakeno dikas, kai o Dewel pash leste hi.
42002041	-
42002042	Hako bersh, har wan kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa, djan i Maria un o Josef an o foro Jerusalem. Un har o Jesus deesh-te-dui bersha phuro his, lan jon les peha.
42002043	Har kol bare diwessa trujal his, un jon pale khere djan, atchas ko tchawo Jesus an o foro Jerusalem. Un leskro dad un lakri dai djinan kowa gar.
42002044	Jon patsan, kai job mashkral kol wawar menshende hi. Doleske rodan jon les jek diwes mashkral pengre menshende, un mashkral kol wawarende, kai his lentsa khetne ap o drom.
42002045	Un jon hatsan les gar. Koi djan jon pale an o foro Jerusalem, un rodan les kote.
42002046	Pal triin diwessa hatsan le les an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un job his beshdo mashkral i sikepangre. Un job shunas, hoi jon rakran, un job putchas bud lendar.
42002047	Lauter, hoi shunan, hoi job lenge penas, kran bare jaka, jaake gosewo his kau tchawo.
42002048	Un har leskro dad un leskri dai les kote dikan, atchas lenge o rakepen krik. Un leskri dai penas ap leste: "Tchawa, hoske kreh tu mentsa sawo koowa? Me un tiro dad, har rodam tut, hams i darjatar mulo."
42002049	Koi penas lo ap lende: "Hoske rodan tumer man? Djinenn tumer gar, te krap me kowa, hoi miro dad mandar kamella?"
42002050	Jon haiwan gar, hoi job lenge kamas te penell.
42002051	Palle djas lo lentsa pale an o foro Nazaret, un kras lauter, hoi jon penan leske. Leskri dai rikras kol tsele laba, hoi o Jesus penas, an peskro dji.
42002052	Job was gosweder un phureder. Un o Dewel un i menshe dikan latches ap leste.
42003001	His ap ko tsiro, kai o Tiberio an o foro Rom deesh-te-pantch bersha baro rai his. Un o Pontio Pilato his o rai pral o them Judea. Un o Herodes his o rai pral o them Galilea. Un peskro phraal Filipo his o rai pral i themma Iturea un Trakonitia. Un o Lisanio his o rai pral o them Abilene.
42003002	Un o Hannas un o Kajafas his bare rashaja. Ap ko tsiro rakras o Dewel an o mulo them ap o Johanneste. Koleskro dad his o Zachari.
42003003	Un o Johanni djas an o them pash o pani Jordan trujal, un penas i menshenge: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom! Un djan ap o Debleskro drom! Mukenn tumen mandar an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn tumer, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen! Un o Dewel lell tumari doosh tumendar krik."
42003004	Jaake tchinas o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja: Jek dell gole an o mulo them: Krenn maro Debleske o drom, te nai well lo pash i menshende! Lenn halauter krik, hoi o Debleske an o drom tchiddo hi!
42003005	Krenn, te well haki berga tikneder! Un hadenn ko them, hoi mank i berge tchiddo hi! O bango drom te well buder gar bango! Un o djungelo drom te well mishto kerdo.
42003006	Palle dikell hakeno, har o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win lella.
42003007	Bud menshe djan pash o Johanneste, te mukan le pen lestar an o pani te thowell. Job penas lenge: "Tumer han sapa! Tumer nai nashenn gar glan o Debleskri choli krik, hoi wella pral i menshende.
42003008	Sikrenn i menshende, te djan tumer ap o Debleskro drom, un buder gar ap o tchilatcho drom! Ma penenn, kai o Abraham tumaro dad hi! Kowa anell tumen gar dureder. Me penau tumenge: O Dewel nai krell dran kal barra o Abrahameskre tchawen.
42003009	Tumer han har ruka, kai o tower pashal tchiddo hi, te wenn le tele dino. Hako ruk, kai well kek latcho koowa baro pre, well tele dino, un an i jag witsedo."
42003010	Un i menshe putchan o Johannestar: "Hoi te kras mer?"
42003011	"Te hi jekes dui gada," penas lo, "mu dell lo jek gad koleste, kones kek hi. Un kones chapen hi, kowa dell koleste i paash, kones tchi hi."
42003012	Koi wan ninna bibolde pash leste, te mukenn pen le lestar an o pani te thowell. Kolla his mursha, kai lenn kol themeskre lowe i Remarjenge dre. Jon putchan lestar: "Sikepaskro, hoi te kras mer?"
42003013	Penas o Johanni ap lende: "Ma lenn gar budeder lowe dre, har win kerdo hi!"
42003014	Ninna i lurde putchan lestar: "Har hi mentsa? Hoi te kras mer?" Lenge penas lo: "Ma krenn kekeske tchilatcho koowa, un lenn kekestar lowe i sorjaha! Kol lowe, hoi plaissrenn i pralstune tumenge, kol lowe mukenn tumenge doha te well!"
42003015	I menshe dikan, kai o Dewel o Johannes bitchras, un jon putchan pendar: "Hi job ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel glan i raha tsiro penas, te well job?"
42003016	Koi penas o Johanni ap lauterende: "Me thowau tumen an o pani. Jek wella, kowa hi sorleder har me. Me hom gar moldo, te krap leskre tircha pre. Job tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende, un krell tumen djudjo, har i jag o saster djudjo krella.
42003017	Job hi har i hacho, kai rikrell i witsepaskri an peskro wast, te witsrell lo o djob pral, jaake te perell o phuss tele ap i phub. Peskro djob anell lo an peskro djobeskro kheer dre. Un i phuss chatchrell lo an i jag, hoi chatchella hako tsiro."
42003018	Kol labentsa, ninna bud wawar labentsa rakras o Johanni i menshenge an o dji, un sikras lende o Debleskro drom.
42003019	Un o Herodes, ko baro rai pral o them Galilea, las peskro phraleskri romjat, i Herodia, un kras wawar tchilatcho koowa. Un o Johanni penas leske: "Kowa hi tchilatcho, hoi tu kral."
42003020	Har o Herodes kowa shunas, tchiwas lo o Johannes an o stilepen, un anas jaake wawar doosh ap peste.
42003021	Ap ko tsiro, kai thowas o Johanni i menshen an o pani, was ninna o Jesus pash leste, un mukas pes lestar an o pani te thowell. Un har o Jesus o Debles an-mangas, djas o bolepen pre.
42003022	Un o Debleskro Ducho was har i parno tchirklo ap leste tele. Un i rakepen dran o bolepen penas: "Tu hal miro tchawo, kai me kamaua. Pral tute hom bachtelo."
42003023	O Jesus nai his jaake triin-deesh bersha phuro, har job i menshenge o Debleskro lab penas. I menshe patsan, kai o Josef leskro dad hi. O Josefeskro dad his o Eli.
42003024	Koleskre phure his jek pal o wawar: o Matat, o Levi, o Melki, o Jannai, o Josef,
42003025	o Matatias, o Amos, o Nahum, o Hesli, o Naggai,
42003026	o Mahat, o Matatias, o Simi, o Josech, o Joda,
42003027	o Johanan, o Resa, o Serubabel, o Shealtiel, o Neri,
42003028	o Melki, o Addi, o Kosam, o Elmadam, o Er,
42003029	o Josua, o Elieser, o Jorim, o Matat, o Levi,
42003030	o Simeon, o Juda, o Josef, o Jonam, o Eljakim,
42003031	o Melea, o Menna, o Mattata, o Natan, o David,
42003032	o Isai, o Obed, o Boas, o Salmon, o Nason,
42003033	o Aminadab, o Admin, o Arni, o Esrom, o Perez, o Juda,
42003034	o Jakob, o Isaak, o Abraham, o Terach, o Nahor,
42003035	o Serug, o Regu, o Peleg, o Eber, o Shelach,
42003036	o Kainan, o Arpachsad, o Sem, o Noa, o Lamech,
42003037	o Metuselah, o Henoch, o Jered, o Mahalalel, o Kenan,
42003038	o Enosh, o Set, o Adam. Kowa was o Deblestar.
42004001	Un o Jesus his pherdo Debleskro Ducho. Un job mukas o them pash o pani Jordan. Un o Debleskro Ducho anas les an o mulo them.
42004002	Kote atchas lo star-deesh diwessa. Un o beng was pash leste, te anell lo les o Debleskro dromestar tele. An kol diwessa chas o Jesus tchi. Un har kol diwessa trujal his, his les bok.
42004003	Un o beng penas ap leste: "Te hal tu o Debleskro tchawo, pen ap ko bar, te well lestar i kotar maro!"
42004004	Koi penas o Jesus: "An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O maro kokres rikrell i menshes gar djido."
42004005	Palle anas les o beng ap i berga, un sikras leste ap jek kopo i tsele themma ap i phub.
42004006	Un o beng penas leske: "Kol tsele themma un lengro brawlepen kamau me tute te dell. Kawa lauter hi miro, un me dau kowa koneste me kamau.
42004007	Tu te mangeh man an, palle dau me lauter tute."
42004008	Koi penas o Jesus: "An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Tu mangess o Debles an, - job hi tiro rai, - un wess leske kokres koi!"
42004009	Pal kowa anas les o beng an o foro Jerusalem, un tchiwas les ap o Debleskro baro kheer pral pre, un penas ap leste: "Te hal tu o Debleskro tchawo, muk tut tele te perell!
42004010	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penas ap pengre bolepangre, te denn le jak ap tute.
42004011	Un jon hidjenn tut pengre wastentsa, te dukress tire pire gar ap i barra!"
42004012	Koi penas o Jesus ap o bengeste: "O Debleskro lab penella: Rike o Debles gar dineleske, te sikrell lo tut, har sorelo job hi!"
42004013	Har o beng dikas, kai o Jesus gar kras, hoi job kamas, mukas job lestar i tsiro tele.
42004014	Un o Jesus djas pale an o them Galilea. Un o Debleskri soor his an leste. Un an i tsele gaba un forja, kai kote his, shunan le lestar.
42004015	Un job djas an i biboldengre kangria un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un hakeno sharas les.
42004016	Un job was an o foro Nazaret, kai job baro was. Ap o Debleskro diwes djas lo an i biboldengri kangri, har job kowa hako Debleskro diwes kras. Un job stas pre, te drawerell lo an o Debleskro lab.
42004017	Koi dan le les ko liil, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, tchinas. Un job kras kau liil pre, un kote hatsas lo kol laba:
42004018	O Debleskro Ducho hi ap mande. Job rodas man win, te penap i tchorwelenge o Debleskro latcho lab. Un job bitchras man, te penap kolenge, hoi stilde hi, te wenn le dran lengro stilepen win, un kolenge, kai korelo hi, te dikenn le pale, un kolenge, kai pale-tchiddo hi, te wenn le pale erligo,
42004019	un te penap i menshenge: Kawa hi ko bersh, kai o Dewel i menshen bachteles krella.
42004020	Un o Jesus kras kau liil pandlo, un das les pale, un beshas pes. Un i tsele menshe an i biboldengri kangri dikan ap leste.
42004021	Un job penas ap lende: "Kau diwes nai dikenn tumer, te hi kau lab o tchatchepen."
42004022	Lauter rakran lestar mishto, un leskro rakepen his lenge pherdo latchepen. Un jon kran bare jaka. Un jon penan: "Hi kawa gar o Josefeskro tchawo?"
42004023	O Jesus penas: "Tchatchepaha, tumer penenna: Dramaskro, kre tut kokres sasto! Tu kral sau baro koowa an o foro Kapernaum. Kre kowa kate ninna!
42004024	Kawa penau me tumenge: Kek Debleskro rakepaskro well kote sharedo, kai job khere hi.
42004025	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap ko tsiro, kai o Debleskro rakepaskro Elija djiwas, djiwan bud djuwja, kolengre mursha mulo hi, an o them Israel. Ap ko tsiro das triin-te-paash bersha kek brishin. Un i bari bok was an o tselo them.
42004026	Pash kol djuwjende was o Elija gar bitchedo. Job was bitchedo pash jek djuwjate an o foro Sarepta, an o them Sidon, kolakro rom mulo hi.
42004027	Dikenn ninna ap ko tsiro, kai o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Elisa, djiwas. An ko tsiro his bud menshen an o them Israel i djungelo nasslepen ap pengro mass. Kekes lendar kras o Elisa sasto. Kokres o Naaman dran o them Siria kras job sasto."
42004028	Un lauter kolla, kai an i biboldengri kangri his, wan chojedo ap o Jesuseste, har jon kowa lestar shunan.
42004029	Jon stan pre, un tradan les dran o foro win, anan les pral ap i berga, kai lengro foro pre tardo hi, te witsrenn le les tele.
42004030	Job risras pes trujal un djas mashkral lende pale, un djas peske.
42004031	Un job djas an o foro Kapernaum an o them Galilea. Un hako Debleskro diwes penas lo kote i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
42004032	Un job rakras jaake bari sorjaha, te kran le bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job lenge penas.
42004033	Koi his i mursh an i biboldengri kangri, kai his i beng an leste. Un kowa das bari gole:
42004034	"Ah! Hoi kameh tu mendar, Jesus dran Nazaret? Wal tu, te maress men? Me djinau, koon tu hal: Tu hal o Debleskro mursh, koles o Dewel bitchras."
42004035	Un o Jesus das les trad, un penas soreles ap leste: "Ma rake un dja dran leste win!" Un ko beng, kai an ko mursheste hi, witsras ko murshes mashkral i menshende ap i phub, djas dran leste win, un dukras les gar.
42004036	Un halauter kran bare jaka. Un jon rakran jek o wawareha, un penan: "Hawe sorele laba! Job rakrell sorele labentsa ap i bengende, un jon djan dran i menshende win."
42004037	Un an hake gaba un forja, kai kote his, shunan le lestar.
42004038	Un har job dran i biboldengri kangri was, djas lo an o Simoneskro kheer. Un i dai o Simoneskri romjatar his ap o tchiben tchiddi, un lakro shero his tato. Un jon mangan lestar, te krell lo la sasto.
42004039	Un job djas pash late, un penas ap ko nasslepen: "Dja tuke!" Un ko nasslepen djas latar. Un joi stas sik pre, un anas lenge i chapen.
42004040	Un o kham djas tele. Un bud menshe anan i nasselen pash leste. Kolen his bud nasslepen. Un o Jesus tchiwas peskre wasta ap hakeneste lendar, un kras len sasto.
42004041	Un dran bud menshende, kai his benga an lende, djan i benga wi. Un har jon wi wan, dan le gole: "Tu hal o Debleskro tchawo." Un o Jesus das len trad, un mukas len gar te rakrell. I benga djinan, kai job ko baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
42004042	Un o wawar diwes taissarlake, djas o Jesus dran o kheer win, un djas kote, kai job kokres hi. Un bud menshe rodan les, un djan pash leste. Un jon kaman les te rikrell, te djal lo gar peske lendar.
42004043	Un har jon hatsan les, penas lo ap lende: "Me hunte djap ninna an i wawar forja, te penap i menshenge o Debleskro lab, te hi o tsiro kanna kai, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well. Un me wom bitchedo, te penap kowa."
42004044	Un o Jesus djas an o them Judea un rakras kote an i biboldengre kangria.
42005001	His i diwes, kai o Jesus pash o baro pani Genezaret tardo his. Un bud menshe kaman te shunell o Debleskro lab.
42005002	Un job dikas dui tikne panjeskre ulepangre pash o pani tchiddo. I matchepangre djan dran lende win, te thowenn le pengre matchengre gone.
42005003	Koi djas lo ap ko panjeskro ulepaskro, hoi o Simoneske hi, un mangas les, te ulerell lo i tikno kotar ap o pani win. Un job beshas pes an ko panjeskro ulepaskro, un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
42005004	Un pal kowa penas lo ap o Simoneste: "Aan ko panjeskro ulepaskro dureder ap o pani, un witsrenn tumare matchengre gone win, te taprenn tumer i matche!"
42005005	Penas o Simon: "Sikepaskro, mer budram i tseli rat, un tapram tchi. Tu te peneh les mange, palle witsrau i matchengre gone pale win."
42005006	Un har jon kowa kran, tapran jon jaake bud matche, te kaman i matchengre gone paash te djal.
42005007	Un jon dan i wawar matchepangren gole, te tsardenn jon lentsa khetne i matchengre gone dran o pani win. Un jon wan, un khetne kran le kol dui panjeskre ulepangre jaake pherdo matche, te djan i panjeskre ulepangre paash tele.
42005008	Har o Simon Petro kowa dikas, peras lo glan o Jesuseste tele ap i phub, un penas: "Dja tuke mandar, miro rai! Me hom i mursh, kai doosh ap mande hi."
42005009	Har job dikas, te tapran le jaake bud matche, was i bari traash pral leste, un ap kolende, kai pash leste his,
42005010	ninna ap o Jakobo un ap o Johanni, kolengro dad hi o Zebedeo. Kol dui budran o Simoneha khetne. Un o Jesus penas ap o Simoneste: "Ma traash! Me krau tutar jekes, kai anell menshen pash mande."
42005011	Un jon anan kol panjeskre ulepangre ap o them, un mukan lauter tchiddo, un djan leha.
42005012	An jek foro his i mursh, koles his i djungelo nasslepen, kai leskro mass ap leste tele merella. Job dikas o Jesuses, un witsras pes glan leste tele ap i phub, un mangas lestar: "Rai, te kameh tu, nai kreh tu man sasto."
42005013	Un o Jesus tchiwas peskro wast ap leste, un penas: "Me kamau, te wess sasto." Un ap jek kopo djas o nasslepen lestar.
42005014	Un o Jesus penas leske: "De jak, te peness kekeske, hoi me tuke krom! Dja pash o rashajeste un sike leste, kai tiro nasslepen tutar djas. Un aan kowa glan o Debleste, hoi o Mose penas, te djinenn i menshe, kai tu sasto wal!"
42005015	Un bud un budeder menshe shunan o Jesusestar. Un bud wan khetne, te shunenn le les, un te wenn le lestar sasto kerdo.
42005016	O Jesus tsardas pes lendar pale, un djas an o mulo them, un rakras kote o Debleha.
42005017	His i diwes, kai job i menshenge o Debleskro lab penas. Un bud Farisarja un biboldengre tchatchepangre his mashkral lende beshdo. Jon wan dran i themma Galilea un Judea, un dran o foro Jerusalem. Un o Jesus kras i menshen sasto an o Debleskri soor.
42005018	Koi wan mursha un anan i murshes ap o tchiben. Kowa nashte nashas gar. Jon kaman les an o kheer te anell, kai o Jesus hi, un glan leste te tchiwell.
42005019	An kau kheer his jaake bud menshe, te nashte anan le kol nasseles gar dre. Koi djan jon ap o kheer pral pre, lan barra win, un mukan ko tchiben mashkral i menshende glan o Jesuseste tele.
42005020	Un o Jesus dikas lengro patsepen, un penas ap ko mursheste, kai nasselo hi: "Tchawa, me lau tiri doosh tutar."
42005021	Un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja penan jek ap o wawareste: "Koon hi kau mursh, kai krell pes har o Dewel? O Dewel kokres nai lell i doosh i menshendar."
42005022	Un o Jesus haiwas, hoi jon mashkral pende jaake penan. Un job penas ap lende: "Hoske djal kowa an tumaro shero trujal?
42005023	Hi kowa phareder, te penap: Me lau tiri doosh tutar krik, har te penap ap leste: Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja trujal?
42005024	Kanna sikrau tumen, te hi o Menshengro Tchawes koi soor ap i phub, te nai lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik." Palle penas o Jesus ap ko mursheste, kai nai nashell gar: "Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja khere!"
42005025	Un kowa stas sik glan lauterende pre, las peskro tchiben, un djas khere un sharas o Debles.
42005026	Un kolla, kai dikan kowa, kran bare jaka, un sharan o Debles. Un i bari traash was ap lende, un jon penan: "Mer dikam kau diwes i baro koowa."
42005027	Koi pal djas o Jesus dran ko foro win. Un job dikas i murshes pash ko kheer beshdo, kai job i biboldendar lowe i Remarjengre rajenge dre las. Leskro lab hi Levi. Un o Jesus djas pash leste un penas: "Am, dja mantsa!"
42005028	Un job stas pre, un mukas lauter tchiddo, un djas leha.
42005029	Un o Levi kras o Jesuseske an peskro kheer i baro chapen. Un bud kolendar, kai lan i biboldendar lowe i Remarjengre rajenge dre, chan lentsa khetne. Un ninna wawar menshe his koi.
42005030	Un i Farisarja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre his chojemen ap o Jesuseste. Un jon penan ap leskre malende: "Hoske chan tumer kolentsa, kai lenna lowe i Remarjenge dre, un kol wawarentsa, kai ninna tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske pale-tchiddo hi?"
42005031	Koi penas o Jesus: "Kolla, kai sasto hi, djan gar pash o dramaskro. Kolla, kai nasselo hi, djan pash leste.
42005032	Me wom gar, te dap ap kolende gole, kai ap o tchatcho drom hi. Na-a! Me wom, te dap kolen gole, kai djan ap o tchilatcho drom, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom."
42005033	Jon penan ap o Jesuseste: "O Johanneskre mala chan un pijenn bud kope tchi, te mangenn le o Debles. Un ninna kolla, kai shunenn ap i Farisarja, krenn kowa jaake. Hoske chan un pijenn tire mala?"
42005034	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Jaake raha har o bijabeskro ap i bijab hi, denn tumer chapen kolende, kai ap i bijab hi. Tumer mukenn len gar te bokell.
42005035	I tsiro wella, kai o bijabeskro lendar krik lino wella. Ap ko tsiro chan un pijenn le tchi."
42005036	Un job penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: "Kek tchinell i kotar dran i newo ripen win, un siwell les ap i phuro ripen. Kowa krell o newo un o phuro ripen paash.
42005037	Un kek tchorell i newi mool an phure moljakre gone. I newi mool krell i phure moljakre gone paash. Un i mool nashella win. Un i gone hi ninna paash.
42005038	I newi mool well tchoredo an i newe moljakre gone.
42005039	Un kek, kai phuri mool pijas, kamell i newi mool te pijell. Job penella: Koi phuri mool hi latcheder."
42006001	Ap o Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus ap i kotar them, kai o djob bares was. Un peskre mala lan ko djob an i wasta, un kran ko djob pre, te chan le.
42006002	Kote his ninna Farisarja, kai penan ap lende: "Hoske krenn tumer ap o Debleskro diwes kowa, hoi hi gar pal o biboldengro tchatchepen?"
42006003	Penas o Jesus: "Draweran tumer gar an o Debleskro lab, hoi kras o David un leskre mala, har jon bokan?
42006004	Job djas an o Debleskro kheer un las kol mare, kai kote tchiddo hi, un chas len peskre malentsa? Pal i biboldengro tchatchepen his i mare i rashajenge kokres koi."
42006005	Un o Jesus penas: "Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hom ninna o rai pral o Debleskro diwes."
42006006	Un ap i wawar Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus an i biboldengri kangri, te penell lo kote i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Un job dikas kote i murshes, koleskro tchatcho wast his bango.
42006007	I biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja dikan ap o Jesuseste, un putchan pendar: "Krell lo kau murshes ap o Debleskro diwes sasto?" Jon kaman tchomone ap leste pre te anell, te anenn le les nai glan i tchatchepangre.
42006008	O Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djas. Un job penas ap ko mursheste, koles i bango wast hi: "Ste pre un am kai!" Un job stas pre, un djas pash leste.
42006009	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me putchau tumendar: Nai krah mer latcho koowa ap o Debleskro diwes pal maro tchatchepen? Nai krah mer i menshen sasto ap o Debleskro diwes? Nai mukah mer len te merell?"
42006010	Un job dikas ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo his, un penas ap kau mursheste: "Sike tiro wast!" Un job sikras peskro wast, un ko wast was sasto.
42006011	Koi wan jon chojedo ap o Jesuseste, un rakran khetne, hoi jon o Jesuseha nai krans.
42006012	His i diwes, kai djas o Jesus ap i berga, te rakrell lo o Debleha. Un job atchas i tseli rat un rakras leha.
42006013	Har diwes was, das lo peskre malende gole, un rodas deesh-te-dujen lendar win, te wenn le leskre bitchepangre.
42006014	Un kolla his: O Simon, - koleste das job ninna o lab Petro, un leskro phraal Andreas, o Jakobo, un o Johanni, o Filipo, o Bartolomeo,
42006015	o Mateo, o Thomas, o Jakobo, koleskro dad hi o Alfeo, un o Simon, kai hi kol menshendar, kai kharenna Zelotarja
42006016	un o Judas Iskariot, ko phukepaskro.
42006017	Pal kowa djas o Jesus lentsa i berga tele. Un jon wan ap i buchlo kotar them. Koi his bud kolendar khetne, kai leske palla djan, un ap leste shunan. Ninna bud wawar menshe his kote. Un kolla wan dran o tselo them Judea un dran o foro Jerusalem, ninna dran o them, kai i forja Tirus un Sidon tchiddo hi.
42006018	Kolla wan lauter, te shunenn le o Jesuses te rakrell, un kaman sasto te well. Ninna lauter kolla wan sasto, kai his i beng an lende.
42006019	I tsele menshe kaman les an-te-taprell. I bari soor was dran leste, un kras lauteren sasto.
42006020	Un o Jesus dikas ap peskre malende un penas: Bachtele han tumer tchorwele! Tumer djiwenna o Debleha khetne an o bolepen un lenn leskro brawlepen.
42006021	Bachtele han tumer, kai kanna bokenna. Tumer wenna tchalo. Bachtele han tumer, kai kanna rowenna. Tumer sana.
42006022	Bachtele han tumer, te wenn i menshe chojedo ap tumende, un tchiwenn tumen pale, un praassenn tumen, un rakrenn tchilatches pral tumende, un kowa lauter krenn le doleske, te patsenn tumer ap o Menshengro Tchaweste!
42006023	Awenn bachteles ap ko diwes, un khelenn i bachtjatar! O Dewel dell tumen i baro brawlepen an o bolepen. Kowa, hoi i menshe kanna tumentsa krenna, kowa kran ninna lengre phure ap o Debleskre rakepangre an o phuro tsiro.
42006024	Bibacht well ap tumende, kai kanna brawelo han. Tumer lenna tchi buder.
42006025	Bibacht well ap tumende, kai kanna tchalo han. Tumer bokenna. Bibacht well ap tumende, kai kanna sana. Tumer rowenna, un denn gole.
42006026	Bibacht well ap tumende, te rakrenn i tsele menshe tumendar latches. Kolengre phure rakran ninna latches pral i chochene rakepangre, kai penan, te wan le o Deblestar, un wan gar lestar.
42006027	Tumer, kai man shunenna, tumenge penaua: Awenn latches kolenge, kai hi tchilatcho ap tumende! Krenn kolenge latchepen, kai hi chojedo ap tumende!
42006028	Penenn kolenge latche laba, kai tumen khoshenna! Mangenn o Debles kolenge, kai dukrenn tumen!
42006029	Kowa, kai das tut ap jek tcham, koleske rike i wawar tcham ninna koi, te dell lo tut! Te lell jek tutar tiri plashka, de les ninna tiro gad!
42006030	De hakenes, kai tutar mangella! Un te lell jek tutar tchomone, hoi tiro hi, ma mang les pale!
42006031	Lauter, hoi tumer kamenna, te krenn i menshe tumenge, kowa krenn tumer lenge ninna!
42006032	Te wenn tumer latches kolenge, kai hi latches ap tumende, patsenna tumer, kai sharell tumen o Dewel? Na-a! Ninna i tchilatche hi latches ap pengre mala.
42006033	Te krenna tumer kolenge latchepen, kai tumenge latchepen kran, patsenna tumer, kai sharell tumen o Dewel? Na-a! Ninna i tchilatche krenn kolenge latchepen, kai lenge latchepen kran.
42006034	Tumer te patsenn tumare lowe win ap kolende, kai denn tumen kol lowe pale, patsenn tumer, kai sharell tumen o Dewel? Na-a, ninna i tchilatche patsenn pengre lowe kolenge win, kai denn len kol lowe pale.
42006035	Me penau tumenge: Awenn latches kolenge, kai hi tchilatcho ap tumende! Krenn kolenge latchepen! Patsenn tumare lowe win ap kolende, kai tumer gar djinenna, te lenn tumer lendar tchomone pale! Te krenna tumer kowa lauter, palle dell o Dewel tumen peskro brawlepen an o bolepen, un tumer wenna o baro Debleskre tchawe. O Dewel hi ninna latches ap kol menshende, kai tchilatche hi, un kai parkrenn pen gar pash leste.
42006036	Tumen hunte well hakeneske i baro dji, jaake har o Debles hakeneske i baro dji hi.
42006037	Ma sikrenn ap o wawareskri doosh! Un o Dewel dikell gar ap tumari doosh. Ma penenn: Kowa hunte lell i phagi! Un o Dewel dell tumen kek phagi. Bistrenn ko tchilatchepen, hoi i wawar menshe ap tumende kran. Un o Dewel bistrell ko tchilatchepen, hoi tumer kran.
42006038	Denn i menshen latcho koowa! Un o Dewel dell tumen latcho koowa! Awa, job dell tumen jaake bud, te hi tumen budeder har doha. Job dell tumen jaake bud, te nai lenn kowa gar lauter. Doleske penau tumenge: Tumer te denn bud, palle dell o Dewel tumen bud. Tumer te denn gar bud, palle dell o Dewel tumen gar bud.
42006039	Un o Jesus ginas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: Te lell jek korelo i wawar koreles ap o wast, palle perenn jon hake dui.
42006040	Jek, kai djal an o sikepaskro kheer, djinell gar budeder har o sikepaskro. Job te djinell bud, palle hi lo jaake gosewo har peskro sikepaskro.
42006041	Hoske kameh tu i tikno kasht dran tiro phraleskro jak win tsardell, un tu dikeh gar o baro kasht an tiro jak?
42006042	Tu peneh ap leste: Miro phraal, am kai! Me kamau ko tikno kasht dran tiro jak win tsardell. Un tu dikeh gar o baro kasht an tiro jak. Tu chocheno! Tu kreh, har te wals tu latcheder har job. Le ko baro kasht dran tiro jak win, palle nai leh tu o tikno kasht dran tiro phraleskro jak win!
42006043	Kek latcho pawjakro ruk hidjella djungele pawja. Un kek nasselo ruk hidjella latcho koowa.
42006044	Tu prindjreh nai o ruk ap kowa, hoi ap leste baro wella. Ap i subjengro ruk wenna kek faige baro. Witar gar wenna drake baro ap subjengre burra.
42006045	Dran i latcho mensheskro dji wella latcho koowa. Dran i tchilatcho dji wella tchilatcho koowa. I mensho penell kowa, hoi an leskro dji dre hi.
42006046	Hoske penenn tumer: Rai, rai! ap mande un krenn gar, hoi me tumenge penaua?
42006047	Koon well pash mande, un shunell mire laba, un krell, hoi me penau,
42006048	kowa hi har i mensho, kai kras peske i kheer. Job hadas i phub wi, bis te was lo ap i sorelo baro bar. Kote tchiwas job peskro kheer pre. Un o baro pani was, un kamas ko kheer paash te krell. Un kowa djas gar. Ko kheer his ap o sorelo bar tardo.
42006049	Koon shunell mire laba, un krell kowa gar, hoi me penaua, hi har i mensho, kai kras peskro kheer ap i tchik, un gar ap i sorelo baro bar. Un o baro pani was, un o tselo kheer peras khetne. Un i bibacht his baro.
42007001	Un pal ko rakepen djas lo an o foro Kapernaum.
42007002	An ko foro djiwas i pralstuno lurdo. Les his i budepaskro, kai ap o merepen tchiddo hi. Kowa his leske bud moldo.
42007003	Un ko lurdo shunas, kai o Jesus an o foro hi. Un job bitchras i biboldengre phureden pash o Jesuseste, te mangenn le les, te well lo pash leste, un te krell lo o budepaskres sasto.
42007004	Un jon wan pash o Jesuseste, un mangan les, un penan ap leste: "Kau pralstuno lurdo hi moldo, te kress leskro budepaskres sasto.
42007005	Job hi menge latches un kras menge i kheer, kai mangah o Debles an."
42007006	Koi djas o Jesus lentsa. Har job ap o drom his, bitchras ko pralstuno lurdo peskre malen pash leste, te penenn le leske: "Ma kre tuke o drom, te wess pash mande!
42007007	Witar gar hom moldo, te wap me pash tute. Te peneh tu jek lab, jaake well miro budepaskro sasto.
42007008	Jaake har me ninna hunte shunap ap mire pralstunende, jaake hi man ninna lurde, kai hunte krenn, hoi me penau. Me te penau ap jekeste: Dja koi! palle djal lo. Me te penau ap i wawareste: Am kai! palle well lo. Me te penau ap miro budepaskro: Kre kowa! palle krell job kowa."
42007009	Har o Jesus kowa shunas, kras job bare jaka. Un job risras pes trujal, un penas ap kolende, kai leha djan: "Me penau tumenge: Sawo patsepen hatsom me gar an o tselo them Israel."
42007010	Har kol bitchepangre o pralstuno lurdestar khere wan, his ko budepaskro sasto.
42007011	Ap o wawar diwes djas o Jesus an o foro Nain. Peskre mala un bud wawar djan leha.
42007012	Un jon wan pash o baro wudar kau forestar. Un i menshe hidjan i mules dran o foro win. Kowa his o tchawo i djuwjatar, kolakro rom meras. Un lat his ninna kek wawar tchawe. Un bud menshe djan laha.
42007013	Un o Jesus dikas lat, un leskro dji dukas. Un job penas ap late: "Ma rob!"
42007014	Un job djas pash o mochton, un tchiwas peskro wast ap leste. Un kolla, kai o mochton hidjan, atchan tardo. Un job penas: "Tarno mursh, me penau tuke: Ste pre!"
42007015	Un o djipen was pale an leste. Un job hadas pes pre, un rakras. Un o Jesus das les leskri date pale.
42007016	Koi was i traash pral lauterende. Un jon sharan o Debles un penan: "I baro Debleskro rakepaskro hi mashkral mende. O Dewel was pash peskre menshende."
42007017	Un an o tselo them Judea shunan le, hoi o Jesus kras. Un an i wawar themma, kote shunan le kowa ninna.
42007018	Un har o Johanni lauter kowa peskre malendar shunas, das lo dujen lendar pash peste gole,
42007019	un bitchras len pash o Jesuseste, te putchenn le les: "Hal tu kowa, kai hunte well? Hunte dikas mer ap i wawareste, te well lo?"
42007020	Un jon wan pash o Jesuseste, un penan: "O Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen o Debleske an o pani thowas, kamell tutar te djinell: Hal tu kowa, kai hunte wella? Hunte dikas mer ap i wawareste, te well lo?"
42007021	Ap kau tsiro kras o Jesus bud menshen sasto, kai nasselo un korelo hi, ninna kolen, kai benga an lende hi.
42007022	Un job penas o Johanneskre malenge: "Penenn o Johanneske, hoi tumer dikan un shunan: I korele nai dikenn pale. Un i bange nai djan pale. I nassele, kai lengro mass ap lende tele merell, wenna sasto. Kolla, kai nai shunan gar, nai shunenna pale. I mule wenna djido. Un i tchorwele shunenn o Debleskro latcho lab.
42007023	Bachtelo hi kowa, kai choirell pes gar pral mande."
42007024	Har kol mursha, kolen o Johanni bitchras, penge djan, rakras o Jesus pral o Johanneste ap i menshende, un penas: "Hoske djan tumer an o mulo them? Kaman tumer i murshes te dikell, kai hi har i patrin, hoi i sorelo ducho pral i phub phurdella? Na-a, sawo mursh hi lo gar.
42007025	Koon kaman tumer te dikell? Kaman tumer i murshes te dikell, kai an kutch koola rido hi? Na-a, sawo mursh hi lo witar gar. Me penau tumenge: Kolla, kai riwenn raile koola, un djiwenn i shukar djipen, kolla djiwenna an i rajengre bare khera.
42007026	Koon kaman tumer te dikell? Kaman tumer i Debleskro rakepaskro te dikell? Awa, kowa hi o Johanni. Un me penau tumenge: Job hi bareder har i Debleskro rakepaskro.
42007027	Kolestar hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Dewel penas ap peskro tchaweste: Me bitchrau i murshes glan tute ap o drom, te krell lo tuke i drom, te nai wess pash i menshende.
42007028	Me penau tumenge: Kek was boldo ap kai phub, kai hi bareder har o Johanni. Me penau tumenge ninna: O tikneder kolendar, kai patsenn ap mande un mukenn man pengro rai te well, kowa hi bareder har o Johanni.
42007029	Kolla, kai shunan les, un ninna kol bibolde, kai lenn lowe i Remarjenge dre, dan o Debles tchatches, un mukan pen o Johannestar an o pani te thowell.
42007030	Kol Farisarja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre, kran o Debleskro lab penge tchitcheske. Jon mukan pen gar o Johannestar an o pani te thowell."
42007031	Un o Jesus penas: "Me penau tumenge, har i menshe ap kau tsiro hi.
42007032	Jon hi har kol tchawe, kai khelenn an o foro, un denn gole jek ap o wawareste: Mer bashram tumenge. Tumer khelan gar. Mer giwam mulengre gilja. Tumer rowan gar.
42007033	O Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen o Debleske an o pani thowas, chas kek maro, un pijas kek mool. Lestar penan tumer: An koleste hi i beng.
42007034	Un me, o Menshengro Tchawo, me wom, chom un pijom, un mandar penenn tumer: Kawa hi i chapaskro un i pipaskro. Kawa hi i maal kolendar, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un i maal kol wawarendar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske ninna pale-tchiddo hi.
42007035	Me penau tumenge: O Debleskro goswepen dikenn tumer ap kolende, kai djiwenn koi pal."
42007036	Un i Farisari, - leskro lab hi Simon, - mangas o Jesuses: "Ab pash mande te chal!" Un o Jesus djas an leskro kheer, un beshas pes tele, te chal lo leha khetne.
42007037	Kote his i djuwel an kau foro, koja kras djungelo koowa un hi pale-tchiddo. Un joi shunas, te hi o Jesus an ko kheer. Un joi las i tushni, kai kutch djet dren hi, un was an kau kheer.
42007038	Un joi his tardo pal o Jesuseste un rowas. Un lakre swar kran leskre pire sapenes. Un joi khossas len peskre balentsa. Un joi tchumras leskre pire, un makas len o kutch djeteha dre.
42007039	Har o Farisari kowa lauter dikas, penas lo ap peste kokres: "Te wals kau rom tchatchepaha i Debleskro rakepaskro, hunte djinals lo, hawi djuwel les an-tapras. Job hunte djinals, te hi li pale-tchiddi."
42007040	Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Simon, me hunte penap tuke tchomone." "Sikepaskro, pen les mange!" penas lo.
42007041	Koi penas o Jesus: "Dui kran sijaan pash i rajeste kai lowe win patsella. Ko jekes his pantch-sheel (500) rupene beme sijaan, ko wawares pantch-deesh (50).
42007042	Har jon pengro sijaan gar nai plaissran, kamas ko rai kol lowe lendar buder gar pale te lell. Koon kol dujendar kamas o rajes budeder?"
42007043	Penas o Simon leske: "Me patsau, kowa, kai les budeder sijaan his." Penas o Jesus: "Tiro hi tchatcho."
42007044	Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, dikas ap koi djuwjate, un penas ap o Simoneste: "Dik ap koi djuwjate, un ap kowa, hoi joi mange kras! Me wom an tiro kheer. Un tu dal man kek pani, te nai thowom mire pire. Lakre swar kran mire pire sapenes, un joi khossas len peskre balentsa.
42007045	Tu dal man kek tchum. Joi tchumras mire pire jaake raha har joi koi hi.
42007046	Tu makal gar miro shero kutch djeteha dre. Joi makas mire pire kutch djeteha dre.
42007047	Un me penau tuke kanna: Lakri bari doosh hi latar krik lino. Doleske kamell li man o tselo djijeha. Koneske gar bud doosh krik lino wella, kowa kamell gar i tselo djijeha."
42007048	Un o Jesus penas ap late: "Tiri doosh hi tutar krik lino."
42007049	Kolla, kai koi pashal beshdo hi, penan ap pende: "Koon hi kau mursh, kai nai lell i doosh i menshendar krik?"
42007050	O Jesus penas ap late: "Tu patseh ap mande. Doleske hi tiri doosh tutar krik lino. Dja mo Debleha!"
42008001	Un o Jesus djas an i forja un gaba trujal, te penell lo i menshenge o latcho lab, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well. Kol deesh-te-dui mala djan leha.
42008002	Un bud djuwja, kolen job sasto kras, djan ninna leha. Mashkral kol djuwjende his ninna kolla, kai bengen an pende his. Efta benga tradas lo dran i Mariate win, kai kharas ninna Magdalena.
42008003	Ninna i Susanna djas leha, un i Joanna. Lakro rom his o Kuza. Kowa his o pralstuno budepaskro an o Herodeskro kheer. Un bud wawar djuwja djan leha, te denn le len chapen un pipen dran kowa, hoi len hi.
42008004	Dran bud forja wan bud menshe pash leste khetne. Un job rakras ap lende sawe laba, kai hi i khatedo tchatchepen dre."
42008005	Un job penas: "I hacho djas win, te witsrell lo o djob ap peskro kotar them, te well ko djob bares. Un tikne kotja peran ap o drom, un i menshe stakran len khetne. Un i tchirkle chan len pre.
42008006	Un wawar djob peras ap i barra. Kote his gar doha pani. Un har ko djob dran i phub win was, chatchras o kham les.
42008007	Un wawar djob peras mashkral i subjengre burra, un kol burra wan jaake baro, te las o djob kek ducho buder, un job meras.
42008008	Wawar djob peras ap i latchi phub, un was baro, un hidjas sheel kope jaake bud." Pal kowa das o Jesus gole, un penas ap i menshende: "Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!"
42008009	Un o Jesuseskre mala putchan lestar: "Hoi kameh tu menge kal labentsa te penell?"
42008010	Penas lo ap lende: "O Dewel mukell tumen te haiwell, har kote djal, kai dell lo menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. Kowa djinenn i wawar menshe gar. Lenge penau laba, kai o tchatchepen dre khatedo hi. Me rakrau jaake, te dikenn le kowa nai, un haiwenn les gar, un jaake, te shunenn le les nai, un haiwenn les gar.
42008011	Kanna penau tumenge kowa jaake, te haiwenn tumer kowa: O djob hi o Debleskro lab.
42008012	Ko drom hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn o Debleskro lab. Un o beng wella, un lell kowa lenge pale dran o dji win, te patsenn le gar ap o Debleste un wenn gar ap leskro drom.
42008013	Ko kotar phub, hoi hi pherde barra, hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn o Debleskro lab, un lenn les bachteles pre. O lab well gar sorelo an lengre djia. I tikno tsiro patsenn le. Un te well pharo tsiro ap lende, witsrenn le pengro patsepen ap i rig.
42008014	Ko kotar phub, kai o djob mashkral i subjengre burra peras, hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn o Debleskro lab un rikrenn les i tsiro an pengre djia. Te well i daar an lengro djipen, un te well o brawlepen glan lengre jaka, un ko shukar djipen, palle well ko lab lendar tassedo un rakrell buder gar an lengre djia.
42008015	Koi latchi phub hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai o Debleskro lab shunenna, un djiwenn koi pal. An lengre djia well ko lab sorelo. Un jon atchenn soreles an o patsepen tardo."
42008016	"Kek chatchell i momeli an, un tchiwell i piri pral. Un kek chatchell i momeli an, un tchiwell lat tel o tchiben. Na-a, job tchiwell lat ap i momelengri, te well koi momeli diklo hakenestar, kai wella an o kheer.
42008017	Jaake hi kowa ninna o Debleskro labeha. Jek diwes dikenn le kowa, hoi jon kanna gar dikenna. Jek diwes shunenn le un haiwenn le, hoi jon kanna gar djinenna.
42008018	Denn jak, te shunenn tumer ap o Debleskro lab! Koon o Debleskro lab an o dji rikrella, kowa haiwell les bud un budeder. Koon o Debleskro lab gar an o dji rikrella, koleske well ninna kowa krik lino, hoi job patsell, te hi les."
42008019	O Jesus his an o kheer un bud menshe his trul leste. Un leskri dai un leskre phrala kaman pash leste te djal, un nai wan gar pash leste.
42008020	Koi penas jek ap leste: "Tiri dai un tire phrala hi win tardo, un kamenn tut te dikell."
42008021	Penas lo: "Miri dai un mire phrala hi kolla, kai o Debleskro lab shunenna, un kowa ninna krenna."
