42008022	Was i diwes, kai o Jesus peskre malentsa an i panjeskro ulepaskro djas. Un job penas ap lende: "Djas ap i wawar panjeskri rig!" Un jon uleran ap o baro pani.
42008023	Har jon ap o baro pani his, sowas lo dre. Un i baro diwjo ducho phurdas pral o baro pani. Un o pani was diwjo, un djas pre te tele. Un bud pani was an o panjeskro ulepaskro dre, jaake bud, te kamas ko panjeskro ulepaskro tele te djal.
42008024	Un jon djan pash leste, djangran les pre, un penan: "Sikepaskro, sikepaskro, ste pre, mer tassah!" Un job stas pre, un penas ap ko sorelo ducho, hoi phurdas pral o pani: "Atch kanna!" Un ap o diwjo pani penas lo: "Muk tele!" Un o sorelo ducho phurdas buder gar. Un o pani his buder gar diwjo, un das buder kek gole.
42008025	Un job penas ap lende: "Kai hi tumaro patsepen?" Un jon trashan, un penan jek ap o wawareste: "Koon hi kau mursh? Job penell ap o sorelo ducho, te phurdell lo buder gar, un ap o pani, te tchiwell lo pes. Un jon shunenn ap leste."
42008026	Un jon uleran dureder, un wan ap i wawar panjeskri rig an ko them Gerasa. Kawa his wergal o them Galilea tchiddo.
42008027	Un o Jesus djas dran o panjeskro ulepaskro. Kote was i mursh dran o foro. An koleste his benga. I raha tsiro his job nango, un djiwas gar an i kheer. Job djiwas an i mulengre khera.
42008028	-
42008029	Bud kope tapras les o beng. Un i menshe pandan les sasterne shellentsa ap i wasta un ap i pire. Job phagas kol sasterne shelle pestar tele. Un o beng tradas les an o mulo them. Har ko mursh kanna o Jesuses dikas, witsras pes lo glan leste ap i phub. Un o Jesus penas soreles ap o bengeste: "Dja lestar win!" Koi das ko mursh bari gole: "Jesus, tchawo o baro Deblestar, hoi kameh tu mandar? Me mangau tut: Ma duke man!"
42008030	Un o Jesus putchas lestar: "Har khareh tu?" Penas lo: "Legioni." Ko lab sikrella, te his bud benga an leste.
42008031	Un jon mangan les, te bitchrell lo len gar an i telstuni phub.
42008032	Un kote his bud bale ap koi berga, hoi kote chan. Un kol benga mangan lestar: "Muk men an kol balende te djal!" Un job mukas len an lende dre te djal.
42008033	Koi wan kol benga dran o mursheste win, un djan an kol balende. Un kol tsele bale wan diwjo, un nashan i berga tele, un stan an o baro pani, un tassan.
42008034	Kol mursha, kai dan ap i balende jak, dikan kowa, un nashan an o foro un an i gaba, un penan kowa i menshenge.
42008035	Un kol menshe kaman te dikell, hoi kote djas, un wan pash o Jesuseste. Un jon dikan ko murshes, dran koleste i benga win wan. Job his pash o Jesuseste beshdo, his an-rido, un buder gar diwjo. Koi wan jon dareno.
42008036	Un kolla, kai dikan, har kau mursh sasto was, penan kowa kolenge, kai dran i forja un dran i gaba wan.
42008037	Un i bari daar was ap lende. Un kol bud menshe dran o them Gerasa penan ap o Jesuseste: "Mer mangah tut: Dja tuke mendar!" Un job djas an o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleras pale.
42008038	Ko mursh, kai sasto was, mangas lestar, te atchell lo nai pash leste. O Jesus penas ap leste:
42008039	"Dja khere un pen i menshenge, hoi o Dewel tuke kras!" Un kau mursh djas peske, un penas i tsele menshenge an peskro foro, hawo baro koowa o Jesus ap leste kras.
42008040	Un o Jesus was pale ap i wawar panjeskri rig. Un bud menshe his kote tardo, un lan les kamles pre.
42008041	Koi was i mursh pash o Jesuseste. Leskro lab his Jairo. Job his i pralstuno an i biboldengri kangri. Kowa witsras pes glan o Jesuseste tele, un mangas les, te well lo an leskro kheer.
42008042	Leskri tchai, kai his deesh-te-dui bersha phuro, his ap o merepen tchiddo. Un les his kek wawar tchawe har koja. Un o Jesus kamas leha te djal. Un bud menshe his trul leste un djan lentsa.
42008043	Koi pashal his i djuwel. Kolat hi deesh-te-dui bersha i ratlo nasslepen. Koja das lauter, hoi lat his djipaske, i dramangren, un kek nai kras lat sasto.
42008044	Un joi djas pal o Jesuseste, un tapras ap leskro ripen. Ap jek kopo was li sasto.
42008045	"Koon tapras ap miro ripen?" putchas o Jesus. Un hakeno das buchoste. Penas o Petro leske: "Rai, bud menshe hi trul tute, un taprenn tut an."
42008046	Koi penas o Jesus: "Jek tapras man an. Me haiwom, har soor mandar krik djas."
42008047	Har koi djuwel dikas, kai o Jesus lauter djinas, was li glan. Un joi trissas un witsras pes glan leste tele, un penas glan i tsele menshende, hoske joi ap leskro ripen tapras, un kai joi ap jek kopo sasto was.
42008048	Un o Jesus penas ap late: "Romnija, tiro patsepen kras tut sasto. Dja mo Debleha!"
42008049	Un har o Jesus jaake rakras, was jek dran o kheer ko pralstunestar pral i biboldengri kangri, un penas ap leste: "Tiri tchai meras. Tu hunte mangess o rajes buder gar."
42008050	Har o Jesus kowa shunas, penas lo ap ko pralstuneste: "Ma traash! Tiri tchai djiwella. Pats man!"
42008051	Un o Jesus djas an ko kheer. Un o Johanni un o Petro un o Jakobo djan leha. Un o tchakro dad un lakri dai djan ninna lentsa. Un o Jesus mukas kek wawares an kau kheer dre te djal.
42008052	Un halauter rowan, un dan pengre wasta pral o shero khetne. Un job penas ap lende: "Ma rowenn! Joi hi gar muli. Joi sowella."
42008053	Jon djinan, te meras li, un san pral leste.
42008054	Un o Jesus tapras lakro wast, un penas ap late: "Tchai, ste pre!"
42008055	Koi was pale djipen an late, un joi stas pre. Un job penas, te anenn le lake tchomone te chal.
42008056	Lakro dad un lakri dai kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi koi djas. Un o Jesus penas lenge, te penenn le kekeske, hoi job kras.
42009001	Pal kowa das lo peskre deesh-te-dui malen pash peste gole, un das len i soor pral i tsele benga, te nai tradenn le len dran i menshende win, un te nai krenn le i nasselen sasto.
42009002	Un job bitchras len pash i menshende, te penenn le lenge, te hi o tsiro kanna kai, kai o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole della, te djan le ap leskro drom. Un job bitchras len ninna, te krenn le i nasselen sasto.
42009003	Un job penas lenge: "Te djan tumer ap o drom, ma lenn tchi peha: kek kasht, kek possita, kek maro, kek lowe, witar gar i duito gad!
42009004	Te lell jek tumen an peskro kheer dre, atchenn pash leste jaake raha, bis te djan dureder!
42009005	Un te lenn le tumen gar an pengro kheer dre, djan tumenge dran kau foro, un denn koi tchik tumare pirendar tele! Un kowa sikrell i menshende, kai jon tchilatcho hi."
42009006	Un o Jesuseskre deesh-te-dui mala kran pen ap o drom, un djan an jek gab pal o wawar, penan i menshenge o Debleskro lab, un kran i nasselen sasto kote, kai jon ninna djan.
42009007	O Herodes, ko baro rai pral o them Galilea, shunas lauter, hoi o Jesus krella. Un job djinas gar, hoi te patsell lo. His menshe koi, kai penan: "O Johanni stas i mulendar pre."
42009008	Wawar penan: "O Elija was pale." Un ninna wawar penan: "Jek kol phure Debleskre rakepangrendar stas i mulendar pre."
42009009	O Herodes penas: "Me mukom o Johanneskro shero tele te dell. Koon hi kowa, kai shunau sawo koowa pral leste?" Un job kamas les te dikell.
42009010	Un kol deesh-te-dui bitchepangre wan pale, un penan o Jesuseske, hoi jon lauter kran. Un o Jesus las len peha, te well lo lentsa kokres, un djas lentsa pash ko foro Betsaida.
42009011	Har i menshe dikan, te djas o Jesus pash o foro Betsaida, djan bud leske palla. Un job mukas len pash peste te well, un penas lenge, te dell o Dewel len pash peste gole, te djiwell lo lentsa khetne. Un kolen, kai nasselo hi, kras lo sasto.
42009012	Un o kham djas tele, un o Jesuseskre deesh-te-dui mala wan pash leste, un penan leske: "Bitche kal menshen tutar, te djan le an i gaba, un pash i hachende, te lenn le penge tchomone te chal, un te dikenn le kote, kai jon pral i rati nai atchenna! Kate, kai mer ham, della tchi te chal."
42009013	O Jesus penas ap lende: "Denn tumer len tchomone te chal!" Penan le leske: "Men hi gar budeder har pantch mare un dui matche. Kameh tu, te ginas kolenge lauterenge te chal?"
42009014	Kote his nai jaake pantch serja mursha, ninna bud djuwja un tchawe. O Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Krenn, te beshenn pen le jaake khetne, te hi kate pantch-deesh beshdo un kote pantch-deesh beshdo!"
42009015	Un leskre mala kran jaake. Un lauter beshan pen.
42009016	Un job las kol pantch mare un kol dui matche, un dikas pre ap o bolepen, un parkras pes pash o Debleste. Un palle phagas job kol mare un matche an kotja, un das len peskre malende, te denn le len i menshende.
42009017	Un jon chan, un wan lauter tchalo. Un jon hadan kol kotja pre, hoi pral atchan. Koi wan deesh-te-dui marengre gone pherdo.
42009018	His i diwes, kote his o Jesus kokres peskre malentsa, un mangas o Debles an. Un pal kowa putchas lo lendar: "Hoi penenn kol menshe, koon me hom?"
42009019	Penan le leske: "Jon penenna, kai tu hal o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen o Debleske an o pani. Wawar penenn: Kowa hi o Elija. Un pale wawar penenn: Jek kol phure Debleskre rakepangrendar stas i mulendar pre."
42009020	Putchas lo lendar: "Tumer, hoi penenn tumer, koon me hom?" Penas o Petro: "Tu hal o Kristo, ko baro rai, kai menge o Deblestar bitchedo was."
42009021	Koi penas lo lenge, te penenn le kowa kekeske.
42009022	Un job penas: "Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hunte lap bud duka ap mande. I bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre tchiwenn man ap i rig. Un me hunte wap mulo dino, un pal triin diwessa krell man o Dewel djido."
42009023	Un o Jesus penas ap lauterende: "Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala, kowa hunte bistrell, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, un lell peskro trushel hako diwes ap peste un djal mantsa.
42009024	Koon kamell peskro djipen te rikrell, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen mange nashrella, lell les mandar pale.
42009025	I mensheske wals kowa gar mishto, te lals lo o tselo brawlepen ap kai phub, un te wals lo o Debleske nashedo.
42009026	Kowa, kai ladjell pes mange un mire labenge, koleske ladjau me ninna, te wau me, o Menshengro Tchawo, pale. Ap ko diwes hi man ko railepen, kai hi ninna miro dades un o Debleskre bolepangren.
42009027	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kate hi menshe tardo, kolla merenna gar, bis te dikenn le o Debleskro railepen un soor, hoi an mande diklo wella."
42009028	Pal ochta diwessa las o Jesus o Petres, o Johannes, un o Jakobes, un djas lentsa ap i berga, te rakrell lo o Debleha.
42009029	Un har job rakras o Debleha, dikas peskro mui wawartchandes win, un leskre koola wan railes bijalo.
42009030	Ap jek kopo rakran dui mursha leha. Kolla his o Mose un o Elija.
42009031	Kol dujen his i bolepaskro railepen, un rakran leha pral leskro merepen an o foro Jerusalem.
42009032	O Petro un kol dui wawar his jaake khino, te sowan le. Har jon pre djangewan, dikan le o Jesuses, har job an peskro bolepaskro railepen koi tardo his, un kol dui murshen, o Moses un o Elijas, pash leste.
42009033	Un har kol dui mursha kaman penge te djal, penas o Petro ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, hi mishto, te ham kai. Muk men triin tikne khera te krell, jek tuke, jek o Moseske, un jek o Elijeske." Un job djinas gar, hoi rakrell lo kote.
42009034	Un har job jaake rakras, was i wolka pral lende tele. Un len his traash, har jon an koi wolka dre wan.
42009035	Koi shunan le i rakepen dran i wolka, hoi penas: "Kawa hi mo tchawo, job hi o wi-rodedo! Shunenn ap leste!"
42009036	Un har ko rakepen pre-heras, dikan le, kai o Jesus kokres koi tardo hi. Kol triin rikran kowa lauter penge, un penan an ko tsiro kekeske, hoi jon dikan.
42009037	Un o wawar diwes djan le koi berga tele, un bud menshe wan pash leste.
42009038	Mashkral lende his i mursh, kai das bari gole, un penas: "Sikepaskro, me mangau tut: Dik ap miro tchaweste! Man hi kokres kau tchawo, kek wawar.
42009039	I beng taprell les jaake, kai dell lo ap jek kopo bari gole, un perell ap i phub. Un palle well tchunger dran leskro mui. Ko beng kamell les buder gar te djal mukell, un kamell les te marell.
42009040	Me mangom tire malendar, te tradenn le o benges lestar win. Un jon haiwan kowa gar te krell."
42009041	Koi penas o Jesus: "Tumer tchilatche menshe. Tumen hi kek patsepen. Har raha tsiro hunte atchap pash tumende, te marap man tele tumentsa? Aan tiro tchawes pash mande!"
42009042	Har o tchawo was, witsras ko beng o tchawes ap i phub, un tsardas les jek rigatar ap i wawar. Koi das o Jesus ko benges trad, un kras o tchawes sasto, un das les peskro dadeste pale.
42009043	Un lauterenge, kai kote tardo his, atchas o rakepen krik pral koi bari Debleskri soor. Har jon jaake bare jaka kran pral kowa, hoi o Jesus kras, penas lo ap peskre malende:
42009044	"Ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge penaua: Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, wau an i menshengre wasta dino!"
42009045	Kal laba haiwan le gar. Kowa, hoi job lenge kate penas, djas gar an lengro shero dre. Jaake djinan le gar, pral hoi job rakras un trashan, te putchenn le lestar pral kol laba.
42009046	Jek diwes tchingran pen leskre mala koi pral, koon lendar o pralstuno hi.
42009047	Har o Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, las job i tchawes pash peste,
42009048	un penas ap lende: "Kowa, kai lell kau tchawes pash peste pre an miro lab, kowa lell man pash peste pre. Koon man pre lella, kowa lell koles pre, kai bitchras man. Koon mashkral tumende o tikneder hi, kowa hi baro."
42009049	Koi penas o Johanni ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, mer dikam i murshes. Kowa tradas i bengen wi an tiro lab. Un kowa his kek mendar. Doleske penam leske: Ma kre kowa buder!"
42009050	O Jesus penas ap lende: "Mukenn les! Koon hi gar tchilatcho ap tumende, kowa hi ap tumari rig tardo."
42009051	Har ko tsiro kai his, te well o Jesus maredo, kras pes lo ap o drom, te djal lo an o foro Jerusalem. Un kek nai rikras les pale.
42009052	Un job bitchras murshen glan peste ap kau drom. Kolla djan, un wan an i gab an o them Samaria. Kote rodan jon leske i kheer, kai nai atchell lo pral i rati.
42009053	I menshe an ko gab shunan, kai kamell lo an o foro Jerusalem te djal. Doleske lan jon les gar pash pende pre.
42009054	Har leskre mala, o Jakobo un o Johanni, kowa dikan, penan jon ap leste: "Rai, te kameh tu, mukah mer jag dran o bolepen tele te perell, hoi chatchrell len."
42009055	O Jesus risras pes trujal, un tchingras ap lende.
42009056	Un jon djan an i wawar gab.
42009057	Un har jon ap o drom his, penas i mursh ap o Jesuseste: "Me kamau tuha te djal, kai tu ninna djah."
42009058	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "I diwje djuklen hi i tchiben an i phub, kai sowenn le. Un i tchirklen hi i tikne khera ap i ruka. Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, man hi tchi, kai nai tchiwap man tele, te sowap."
42009059	Ap i wawar mursheste penas job: "Am mantsa!" Kowa penas: "Muk man khere te djal, te paskrap miro dades! Pal kowa djau tuha."
42009060	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Muk kol mule pengre mulen te paskrell! Dja un pen i menshenge, kai o tsiro kanna kai hi, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well!"
42009061	Un i wawar mursh penas ap o Jesuseste: "Me kamaus te djap khere, te penap mire menshenge: Atchenn mo Debleha! Un palle kamoms tuha te djal."
42009062	Ap leste penas o Jesus: "Koon kamell o Debleske te budrell, un dikell ap wawar koowa, kowa budrella gar mishto o Debleske. Job hi har i hacho, kai budrell peskri kotar phub, un dikell pal peste. Leskri budi hi tchi moldo."
42010001	Pal kowa rodas o Jesus wawar efta-deesh murshen win. Un job bitchras len ap o drom glan peste, te djan le an i forja un gaba, kai job ninna wella. Hako kopo djan dui mursha khetne.
42010002	Un job penas ap lende: "Bud djob hi win tardo, te well lo an o kheer dre anlo. Jaake hi bud menshe koi, kai kamenn pash o Debleste te well. Un hi gar doha budepangre koi, te anenn le len pash leste. Doleske mangenn o Deblestar, te bitchrell lo budepangren, kai leske budrenna!
42010003	Djan kanna! Me bitchrau tumen har bakre mashkral kol diwje djuklende.
42010004	Lenn kek lowe peha, kek possita, un kek wawar tircha, har kolla, hoi ap tumare pire hi! Un atchenn gar ap o drom tardo, te rakrenn tumer jekeha!
42010005	Te wenn tumer an i kheer, rakrenn o Debleskri bacht pral kol menshende win!
42010006	Te hi i mensho kote, kai kamell koi bacht, hoi o Dewel an leskro dji della, ap koleste well o Debleskri bacht. Te kamell jek gar koi bacht, hoi o Dewel an leskro dji della, kowa lell o Debleskri bacht gar.
42010007	Atchenn an ko kheer, kai jon tumen pre lan! Chan un pijenn kowa, hoi jon tumen denna! Hako budepaskro lell peskro chapen kolendar, kolenge job budrella. Tumer hunte djan gar an jek kheer pal o wawar.
42010008	Te wenn tumer an i foro, un jon lenn tumen pre, chan, hoi jon tumen denna!
42010009	Krenn sasto kol nasselen, kai kote hi! Un penenn i menshenge: O tsiro well sik, kai lell o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win."
42010010	Un job penas dureder: "Te wenn tumer an i foro, un jon lenn tumen gar an i kheer dre, palle djan win ap i dromma un penenn:
42010011	Ninna koi tchik dran tumaro foro, hoi ap mare pire hi, tchiwah mer tele. Kowa sikrell tumen, kai tumer kaman gar, te well o Dewel tumaro rai.
42010012	Me penau tumenge: Ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende ap i phub wi-rakrella, lenna kol menshe, kai lan tumen gar pre, i bareder phagi har kol menshe an o foro Sodom."
42010013	"Bibachtelo wenna tumer menshe an o foro Betsaida! Bibachtelo wenna tumer menshe an o foro Korazin! Te krals jek an i forja Tirus un Sidon sawo baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, har me pash tumende krom, riwans i menshe kote i gono trul pende, un beshans pen an i jagakri tchik, te sikrenn le, kai lengro tchilatchepen khaitell len. Un jon mukans pengro tchilatcho drom, un djans ap o Debleskro drom.
42010014	Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i menshende win, djal kol menshenge an i forja Tirus un Sidon feteder har tumenge kate.
42010015	Un tumer menshe an o foro Kapernaum, patsenn tumer, kai wenn tumer an o bolepen hadedo? Na-a! Tumer wenna tele an o mulengro them witsedo."
42010016	Pale penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Koon ap tumende shunella, kowa shunella ap mande. Un koon tumen gar shunell kamella, kowa kamell man gar te shunell. Kowa, kai shunell gar ap mande, kowa shunell gar ap koleste, kai bitchras man."
42010017	Un kol efta-deesh wan pale pash o Jesuseste. Un jon his bachtelo, un penan leske: "Ninna i benga shunenn ap mende, te penah mer lenge an tiro lab: Djan dran i menshende win!"
42010018	Koi penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Me dikom o benges, har peras lo dran o bolepen har i jag.
42010019	Shunenn: Me dom tumen i soor pral o tselo bengeskri soor. Tumer stakrenna ap i sapa un ap i skorpione. Un kek nai dukrell tumen.
42010020	Awenn gar bachtelo, te shunenn i benga ap tumende! Awenn bachtelo, kai tumaro lab an o bolepen dre tchindlo hi!"
42010021	An ko tsiro das o Debleskro Ducho o Jesuses i bari bacht an o dji. Un job penas: "Tata, tu hal o rai pral o bolepen un i phub, un me sharau tut. Kowa, hoi tu kreh, sikral tu kolende, kai gar bud djinenna. Un kolla, kai gosewo hi un bud djinenna, kolla haiwenn kowa gar. Awa, jaake kamal tu kowa.
42010022	Lauter das miro dad an mire wasta. Un kek djinella, koon o tchawo hi, har kokres o dad. Un kokres o tchawo djinella, koon o dad hi. Un o tchawo sikrell o dades kolende, kai job win rodas."
42010023	Pal kowa penas o Jesus ap penkre malende kokres: "Bachtelo nai han tumer, kai tumer kowa lauter dikenna, hoi o Dewel krella.
42010024	Me penau tumenge: Bud Debleskre rakepangre un bare raja kaman te dikell, hoi tumer dikenna, un dikan les gar. Un jon kaman te shunell, hoi tumer shunenna, un shunan les gar."
42010025	His i diwes, koi was i biboldengro tchatchepaskro pash o Jesuseste. Un kowa putchas lestar tchomone, te djinell lo, har gosewo o Jesus hi. Un job putchas lestar: "Sikepaskro, hoi hunte krap me, te lap o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
42010026	Penas o Jesus leske: "Hoi penell tuke o Debleskro lab? Hoi hi kote tchindlo?"
42010027	Penas ko mursh: "Tu hunte kamess tiro Debles o tselo djijestar, an tiro tselo djipen, tiri tseli sorjaha, un an lauter, hoi tu djineh. Un ap koleste, kai pash tute hi, hunte wess jaake latches, har hal latches ap tute kokres."
42010028	Penas o Jesus leske: "Tiro hi tchatcho. Kre lauter jaake, un tu djiweh!"
42010029	Un ko mursheske his kowa, hoi o Jesus leske penas, gar doha, un job putchas pale: "Koon hi kolla lauter, kai pash mande hi, te wap latches ap lende?"
42010030	Un o Jesus penas ap leste: "I mursh was dran o foro Jerusalem, un kamas te djal an o foro Jericho. Un i tchorepangre peran pral leste, un dan les, un lan leske lauter krik, un mukan les paash-mulo tchiddo.
42010031	Ap ko tsiro djas i rashai ap ko drom. Har job kau murshes dikas, djas lo dureder.
42010032	Ninna i mursh, kai budrell an o Debleskro baro kheer, djas ap ko drom, un dikas kau murshes, un djas dureder.
42010033	Palle djas i mursh, kai was dran o them Samaria ap ko drom, kai ko mursh tchiddo hi. Un har dikas lo les, djas kowa leske phares an o dji.
42010034	Job djas pash leste, tchoras djet un mool kote, kai job dino un tchindlo was, un pandas laintikre kotja trujal. Palle hadas les lo ap peskro grai, un anas les an i kertchima, un dikas, kai well les sopaske un chapaske.
42010035	O wawar diwes taissarlake das lo dui rupene beme o rajeste an koi kertchima, un penas: De les chapen un pipen! Te hi kol lowe gar doha leske, dau tute budeder, te wau pale."
42010036	Un o Jesus putchas: "Hoi patseh, koon kol trinendar kras kowa ap koleste, kai dino un tchoredo was, hoi te kras mer ap kolende, kai pash mende hi?"
42010037	Penas o biboldengro tchatchepaskro ap leste: "Kowa, kai kras peskro dji leske pre." Pale penas o Jesus leske: "Dja, un kre kowa ninna jaake!"
42010038	Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa dureder ap o drom. Un jon wan an i gab. Kote his i djuwel. Kolakro lab his Marta. Koja las les pash peste an o kheer dre.
42010039	Un kolat his i pheen. Koja kharas Maria. Joi beshas pes glan leskre pire, un shunas, hoi job penas.
42010040	I Marta kras peske bud budi, te dell li len te chal un te pijell. Joi djas pash o Jesuseste, un penas: "Rai, hi tuke kowa jek, kai miri pheen mukell man lauter kokres te krell? Pen lake, te budrell li mantsa!"
42010041	Koi penas o rai: "Marta, Marta, tu mareh tut tele, un kreh tuke bud budi.
42010042	Dell jek koowa, hoi bud moldo hi, un i Maria hatsas les. Kowa well latar gar krik lino."
42011001	Jek diwes, har o Jesus o Debleha rakras, penas jek peskre malendar ap leste: "Sike men, har te rakras o Debleha! Ninna o Johanni sikras peskre malende, har jon hunte rakrenn o Debleha."
42011002	Penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Te rakrenn o Debleha, penenn: Maro dad, tiro lab well sharedo. Te well ko tsiro sik, kai tu o rai hal pral i tseli phub!
42011003	De men maro hako diwes!
42011004	Un biste maro tchilatchepen, hoi mer kram! Un ninna mer bistrah o tchilatchepen, hoi i wawar ap mende kran. Ma muk men tiro dromestar tele te djal!"
42011005	Un job penas ap lende: "Te hi jekes tumendar i maal, un kowa djal mashkral an i rati pash leste un penell: Kamlo maal, pats man triin mare!
42011006	I maal mandar was pash mande. Un man hi tchi an o kheer, hoi nai dau les te chal.
42011007	Penals lo ap leste: Tchawa, ma de kek sau gole! O wudar hi klidedo. Un mire tchawe un me hom an o tchiben. Me nai stau gar pre, te dap tut tchomone te chal.
42011008	Me penau tumenge: Job stell pre un dell les jaake bud, har ko wawares hunte well. Kowa krell lo gar doleske, kai hi o wawar leskro maal. Kowa krell lo doleske, kai mangas les o wawar jaake bud un mukas gar tele.
42011009	Doleske penau tumenge: Mangenn o Debles! Un o Dewel dell tumen! Rodenn les! Un tumer hatsenn les. Denn ap o wudar! Un o wudar well tumenge pre kerdo.
42011010	Koon mangella, kowa lella. Koon rodella, kowa hatsella. Un koon ap o wudar della, koleske well pre kerdo.
42011011	"Mashkral tumende hi kek mursh, kai dell peskro tchawes i sap, te mangas job lestar i matcho.
42011012	Witar gar dell kek dad peskro tchawes i skorpiono, te mangas job lestar i jaro.
42011013	Ninna te han tumer tchilatche menshe, denn tumer tumare tchawen latcho koowa. Har bud budeder dell tumaro dad an o bolepen peskro Ducho kolende, kai les mangenna."
42011014	His i diwes, koi tradas o Jesus i benges wi dran i mursheste, kai nai rakras gar. Har ko beng dran leste win djas, nai rakras ko mursh pale. Un kol bud menshe, kai trul lende tardo his, kran bare jaka.
42011015	Mashkral lende his sawe, kai penan: "O pralstuno beng das les koi soor. Doleske nai tradell job kol bengen wi."
42011016	Wawar kaman lestar i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell, te sikrell lo, kai o Dewel les bitchras.
42011017	O Jesus djinas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, un penas ap lende: "Te kurenn pen i bare raja an jek them, palle djal ko them paash, un i tsele khera perenn khetne.
42011018	Te tradell o beng i wawar benges wi, djal leskri soor paash. Tumer penan mange, kai me tradau i bengen dran o bengeskri soor win.
42011019	Putchau tumendar: Me te tradau i bengen dran o bengeskri soor win, har nai tradenn tumare menshe len win? Well i diwes, kai jon penenn tumenge, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi, hoi tumer pral mande rakran.
42011020	Na-a, me tradau i bengen dran o Debleskri soor win. Ap kowa dikenn tumer, kai ko tsiro was, kai o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win lella, un leskri soor mank tumende hi.
42011021	Te dell i sorelo mursh garda ap peskro baro kheer, un les hi i charo an o wast, nai tchorell leske i wawar tchi.
42011022	Jek te well, kai hi sorleder har job, un dell les khetne, palle lell lo leskro charo krik, hoi leskri soor his un lell kowa, hoi ko wawar tchoras un dell les ninna i wawarende.
42011023	Koon hi gar ap miri rig, kowa hi ap ko wawareskri rig. Un koon anell gar mantsa i menshen pash o Debleste, kowa tradell len o Deblestar."
42011024	"Te djas i beng dran i mensheste win, nashell job an i them trujal, kai kek djipen hi, un rodell peske, kai atchell job nai. Job te hatsell tchi, penell lo ap peste: Me kamau pale an miro kheer te djal, dran hoi me win djom.
42011025	Un te well lo pale, hi ko kheer djudjo un shukar.
42011026	Koi rodell lo peske wawar efta bengen, kai hi tchilatcheder har job. Un kol benga djan an ko mensheste dre, un djiwenn an leste. Jaake hi ko mensheha djungleder har glan ko tsiro."
42011027	Bud menshe his trul o Jesuseste tardo. Un har job kowa penas, das i djuwel gole: "Bachteli hi koi dai, kolatar tu boldo wal!"
42011028	Koi penas lo: "Bachtele hi kolla, kai ap o Debleskro lab shunenna, un kowa ninna krenna, hoi o Dewel penella."
42011029	Un budeder menshe wan pash leste, un his trul leste tardo. Un job penas: "Har tchilatcho hi kol menshe, kai djiwenn an kau tsiro! Jon kamenn i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell. Un o Dewel sikrell len tchi wawar har kowa, hoi i menshe ninna ap o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jona, dikan.
42011030	Jaake har i menshe an o foro Ninive dikan, te was o Jona bitchedo o Deblestar, jaake dikenna i menshe an kau tsiro, te was o Menshengro Tchawo o Deblestar bitchedo.
42011031	Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, stella ninna i bari rani dran o foro Saba pre. Un joi penella, te hi kol menshe tchilatcho, kai kanna djiwenna. Glan i raha tsiro, was joi dran i dur them, un was pash o baro rai Salomo, te shunell li leskre gosewe laba. Kawa, kai glan tumende tardo hi, kawa hi bareder har o baro rai Salomo.
42011032	Ap ko tsiro, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende ap i phub, stenna ninna i menshe dran o foro Ninive pre. Un jon penenna, te hi kal menshe, kai kanna djiwenna, tchilatcho. Glan raha tsiro penas o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jona, i menshenge an o foro Ninive o Debleskro lab. Un jon mukan pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom. Kawa, kai glan tumende tardo hi, kawa hi bareder har o Jona."
42011033	"Kek krell i momeli an, un khatrell lat, witar gar tchiwell lo lat tel i piri. Job tchiwell lat pral, te dikell nai hakeno, kai dre wella.
42011034	O mensheskro jak hi har i momeli an i kheer. Te dikeh kokres ap o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te chatchell koi momeli mishto. Te dikeh ap wawar koowa un gar ap o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te chatchell kek momeli an kau kheer.
42011035	Doleske penau tuke: De garda, te chatchell tiri momeli un well gar win kerdo!
42011036	Te chatchell i momeli an o tselo kheer, un tchi atchella an o tamlepen, palle hi kowa jaake, har te dikenn le i momeli dran hake walja."
42011037	Har o Jesus jaake rakras, was i Farisari pash leste un mangas lestar, te well job pash leste, te chal lo leha khetne. Un o Jesus djas leha an leskro kheer, un beshas pes tele, te chal lo.
42011038	Har ko Farisari dikas, te thowas o Jesus gar peskre wasta glan o chapen, har biboldengro koowa hi, kras job bare jaka.
42011039	Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tumer Farisarja, tumer thowenn tumare khore un tchare wrijal. Un tumaro dji hi pherdo tchorepen un tchilatchepen.
42011040	Tumer haiwan tchi! O Dewel, kai kras o tselo menshes, kras ninna leskro dji.
42011041	Denn i tchorwelende kowa, hoi tumen an tumare khore un tchare dren hi! Un tchi hi tumenge pale-tchiddo.
42011042	Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer denna o Debleske o deshto kotar tumaro tselo senlepastar, hoi an tumari baar hi, un tumer bistrenn o tchatchepen un o Debleskro kamlepen. Kawa hunte krenn, un ko wawar gar mukenn!
42011043	Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer kamenn ap i pralstune beshepangre an i biboldengri kangri te beshell. Un tumer kamenn, te penenn i menshe ap o drom: Latcho diwes, mo rai, ap tumende.
42011044	Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer han har i handako, hoi tele an i phub hi. Un i menshe djan pral wergal, un djinenn gar, kai i mule koi paskedo hi."
42011045	Koi penas i biboldengro tchatchepaskro: "Sikepaskro, te peneh tu kal laba, praasseh tu men ninna."
42011046	Koi penas o Jesus: "Tumer tchatchepangre, tumer krenna, hoi gar mishto hi. Tumer krenn i menshenge o djipen pharo. Ko tselo koowa, hoi jon hunte rikrenn, hi har i pharo gono ap lengri phik. Un tumer rikrenn tumen gar ap kowa.
42011047	Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer krenn shukar mulengre khera kolenge, kai his o Debleskre rakepangre. Kolen maran tumare phure.
42011048	Jaake penenn tumer: Awa, mer djinah, hoi mare phure kran. Kowa his mishto. Me penau tumenge: Jon maran o Debleskre rakepangren. Un tumer krenn kolenge i mulengre khera.
42011049	O Dewel djinas kowa. Doleske penas lo glan i raha tsiro: Me bitchrau mire rakepangren un mire bitchepangren pash lende. Un mashkral lende hi sawe mursha, kai wenn lendar maredo, un wawar wenn palla lino.
42011050	Doleske well i tseli bibacht ap kal menshende, kai kanna djiwenna. Jon un lengre phure maran i Debleskre rakepangren, jaake raha har i phub tardo hi.
42011051	O Abel was maredo glan i tsele wawar menshende. Pal leste maran le wawar menshen pale te pale. Pal lauterende wawarende was o Zachari maredo. Kowa was maredo pash i sasterni chapaskri an o Debleskro baro kheer. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: I tseli bibacht well ap kal menshende, kai kanna djiwenna.
42011052	Tumer tchatchepangre, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer lan o klidepaskro krik, hoi krell o wudar ap o Debleskro drom pre. Tumer djan gar ap ko drom. Un kolla, kai kamenn ap o Debleskro drom te djal, mukenn tumer gar koi pre."
42011053	Un har o Jesus djas peske, lan les i tchatchepangre un i Farisarja chojedo palla, un putchan soreles lestar bud koowa.
42011054	Un jon dan jak ap hako lab lestar, te nai taprenn le les leskre labentsa.
42012001	Ap ko tsiro wan bud serja menshe khetne, jaake te stakras jek o wawareske ap i pire. Koi penas o Jesus ap peskre malende, gar ap kol wawarende: Denn garda, te rakrenn gar dui tchipjentsa har i Farisarja! Kowa hi har shutlo jarro, hoi krell o tselo jarro shutlo.
42012002	Well o diwes, kai well kowa diklo, hoi kanna khatedo hi. Well o diwes, kai djinell hakeno kowa, hoi kanna kek djinella.
42012003	Djinenn! Well o diwes, kai shunell hakeno, hoi tumer tchorchanes rakran. Un kowa, hoi tumer pal o pandlo wudar i wawareske an o kand penan, kowa penenn le bari goljaha ap o drom.
42012004	Tumer han mire mala, un me penau tumenge: Ma trashenn i menshendar. Jon nai marenn tumen. Budeder har kowa nai krenn le gar.
42012005	Me kamau tumen te sikrell, konestar hunte tchatchepaha trashenn: Trashenn kolestar, kai les i soor hi, te witsrell lo jekes pal o merepen an o bengeskri jag! Awa, kowa penau tumenge: Kolestar trashenn!
42012006	Pantch tikne tchirkle hi glan i menshende gar budeder moldo har dui beme. Glan o Debleste hi kek lendar bistedo.
42012007	Ninna djinell o Dewel kitse balla ap tumaro shero hi. Doleske ma darenn! Tumer molenna budeder har bud tchirkle.
42012008	Me penau tumenge: Koon glan i menshende penella: O Jesus hi miro rai! kolestar penau me glan o Debleskre bolepangre: Job hi miro.
42012009	Koon man buchoste della glan i menshende, koles dau me ninna buchoste glan o Debleskre bolepangre.
42012010	Koon djungele laba pral o Menshengro Tchaweste penella, koleske nai bistrell o Dewel kol laba, hoi job penas. Koon praassell o Debleskro Duches, koleske nai bistrell o Dewel kol laba gar, hoi job penas.
42012011	Te anenn i menshe tumen glan i tchatchepangre un glan i rajende un pralstunende, ma darenn, hoi tumer hunte rakrenna.
42012012	O Debleskro Ducho sikrell tumen ap ko tsiro, hoi tumer hunte penenna.
42012013	Jek kol bud menshendar, kai kote khetne hi, penas ap o Jesuseste: "Sikepaskro, pen miro phraleske, te dell job mande miro kotar dran ko brawlepen, hoi maro dad menge mukas, har job meras!"
42012014	Penas o Jesus ap koleste: "Romeha, kowa hi gar miri budi."
42012015	Palle penas o Jesus ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo hi: "Denn garda! Ma nashenn bud brawlepen palla! O tselo brawlepen, hoi i mensho khetne anas, krell o mensheskro djipen gar braweles."
42012016	Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un job penas: "His i brawelo hacho. Ap leskro kotar phub was bud djob baro.
42012017	Un ko brawelo penas ap peste: Hoi krap kanna? Djinau gar, kai anau nai o tselo djob dre.
42012018	Un job penas: Kanna djinau, hoi krap. Me phagau mire khera tele, kai miro djob dren hi, un krau len bareder. Kote dre tchiwau miro tselo djob un o wawar latcho koowa, hoi anom khetne.
42012019	Un me nai penau ap mande: Kowa krom mishto. Kanna hi man bud bersha latcho koowa o djipaske un budrap buder gar. Me chau un pijau un krau miro djipen mange mishto.
42012020	O Dewel penell ap leste: Tu dinelo! Kai rat hunte meress tu. Koon lell tiro tselo brawlepen, hoi tu tuke khetne anal?"
42012021	O Jesus penas dureder: "Jaake djal koleske, kai anas peske bud brawlepen khetne, un hi tchorwelo glan o Debleste."
42012022	Un o Jesus penas peskre malenge: "Doleske penau tumenge: Ma darenn tumaro djipaske! Ma darenn, te well tumen tchi te chal, witar gar, te well tumen tchi an-ripaske!
42012023	O djipen hi budeder moldo har o chapen. Un o mensho hi budeder moldo har o ripen.
42012024	Dikenn ap i korakende! Jon tchiwenna kek djob an i phub, te well lo baro. Witar gar anenn le o baro djob dre. Len hi kek khera, kai nai anenn le o djob khetne. O Dewel dell len te chal. Un tumer han budeder moldo har i tchirkle!
42012025	Kek tumendar nai tchiwell jek diwes budeder pash peskro djipen pashal!
42012026	Na-a, sawo tikno koowa nai krenn tumer gar. Hoske trashenn tumer, te well tumen gar doha djipaske?
42012027	Dikenn, har ap o senlepen shukar blume baro wenna! Jon budrenna gar, un krenn penge kek ripja. O baro rai Salomo an peskro tselo railepen his gar jaake shukar an-rido, har jek lendar.
42012028	O Dewel kras o senlepen jaake shukar, hoi kau diwes win tardo hi, un o wawar diwes an o bob witsedo wella. Kitse kope budeder dell job tumen an-ripaske. Har tikno hi tumaro patsepen!
42012029	Ma darenn, hoi tumer taissar chana un pijenna!
42012030	Kowa krenn kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Tumaro dad an o bolepen djinella, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske.
42012031	Dikenn koi pre, te krenn o Debleskri budi! Un job dell tumen lauter, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske.
42012032	Ma darenn! Kate han tumer gar bud un gar an-diklo. O Dewel, kai hi tumaro dad an o bolepen, kowa kamella, te lenn tumer leskro brawlepen un railepen.
42012033	Bikrenn, hoi tumen hi! Denn kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi kowa jaake, har te krenn tumen i lowengro gono, hoi gar paash djala! Jaake krenn tumenge i baro brawlepen, hoi nashrenn nai gar. Kowa hi an o bolepen, kai kek tchorepaskro tumaro koowa hatsella, un kek kerme les nai pre chan!
42012034	Kote, kai tumaro brawlepen hi, kote hi ninna tumaro dji."
42012035	"Awenn hako tsiro mange koi! Un mukenn gar tumari momeli win te djal!
42012036	Awenn har menshe, kai gar sowenna, te well lengro rai i bijabestar pale! Te dell job ap o wudar, nai krenn le leske sik pre.
42012037	Bachtele hi kol budepangre, kai sowenn gar, te well lengro rai pale. Me penau tumenge: O rai penell lenge, te beshenn le pen tele, te chan le. Un job pandell peske i damedira trujal, un hi lenge koi.
42012038	Te well job mashkral an i rat, un jon sowenn gar, hi lengri bacht baro.
42012039	Kowa hunte haiwenn tumer: Te djinals kowa, kai ap o kheer jak della, ko tsiro, kai ko dre-phagepaskro wella, nai phagals kowa gar pash leste dre.
42012040	Doleske penau tumenge: Ma sowenn! Denn jak! Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, wau pale an i tsiro, kai tumer gar djinenna."
42012041	O Petro penas: "Rai, hi kowa, hoi tu kate peneh, menge kokres? Peneh tu kowa i tsele menshenge?"
42012042	Penas o Jesus: "I latcho budepaskro della mishto garda ap peskro rajeskro kheer, un sowella gar. Leskro rai das peskre tsele budepangren an leskre wasta. Un ko latcho budepaskro dell lende hako diwes kowa, hoi len hunte wella djipaske.
42012043	Bachtelo hi job, te well peskro rai pale un dikell, kai job peskri budi mishto kras.
42012044	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Leskro rai dell peskro tselo brawlepen an leskre wasta."
42012045	"Ko budepaskro, te penell lo ap peste: Miro rai well gar jaake sik pale, un job dell kol wawar budepangren dawa, un chal un pijell pes mato,
42012046	palle well leskro rai pale ap i tsiro, kai ko budepaskro gar patsell, te well job. Ap jek kopo hi job koi, un dell ko budepaskres khetne, un anell les kote, kai kolla hi, kai gar ap leste patsenna.
42012047	Ko budepaskro, kai djinella, hoi peskro rai lestar kamella, un krell kowa gar, kowa lell bud dawa.
42012048	Koon kowa krella, hoi gar mishto hi, un djinell kowa gar, lell gar bud dawa. Koon bud o Deblestar las, kolestar kamell job, te krell lo peskri budi mishto. Un kones bud soor un goswepen dino was, kolestar kamell o Dewel, te budrell lo gomme feteder."
42012049	"Me wom, te witsrap i jag ap i phub. Kamoms te chatchals koi jag.
42012050	Glan mande hi i pharo tsiro. Ap mande wenna bare duka. Kamoms, te well ko tsiro pal mande."
42012051	"Me wom gar ap kai phub, te lap o tchingepen krik. Na-a! Me penau tumenge: Mantsa well o tchingepen.
42012052	Kanna well o tchingepen an i kheer, kai djiwenn pantch menshe khetne. Triin hi chojedo ap dujende. Un dui hi chojedo ap trinende.
42012053	O dad well chojedo ap peskro tchaweste. Un o tchawo well chojedo ap peskro dadeste. I dai well chojedo ap peskri tchate. Un i tchai well chojedo ap peskri date. O romeskri dai well chojedo ap o tchaweskri romjate. Un o tchaweskri romni well chojedo ap o romeskri date."
42012054	Pale penas o Jesus ap kol bud menshende, kai pash leste his: "Te well o bolepen tamlo ap koi rig, kai o baro pani hi, penenn tumer: Kanna dell brishin. Un kowa well jaake.
42012055	Un te phurdell i sorelo ducho dran ko tato mulo them, palle penenn tumer: Kanna well tato. Un tumaro hi tchatcho.
42012056	Tumen hi dui djia! Tumer dikenn ap i phub un ap o bolepen un djinenn, hoi wella. Hoske nai haiwenn gar, hoi an kau tsiro glan tumare jaka lauter djala.
42012057	Hoske nai dikenn tumer gar, hoi o tchatchepen hi?
42012058	Te hal tu an o tchingepen jekeha, un hal leha ap o drom pash o tchatchepaskro, palle dik, te wenn tumer pale mishto khetne jaake raha, har hal tu leha ap o drom, te nai dell job tut gar an o tchatchepaskro wast! Un kowa dell tut an o klisteskro wast. Un kowa witsrell tut an o stilepen.
42012059	Me penau tuke: Tu weh gar dran o stilepen win jaake raha, har tu plaissral gar tiri tseli sijaan."
42013001	An ko tsiro wan menshe pash o Jesuseste, un penan leske kol murshendar dran o them Galilea, kai an o Debleskro baro kheer fichen o Debleske maran. Un o Pilato maras kol menshen. Un o menshengro rat un o fichengro rat was lauter khetne.
42013002	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Un kanna putchenn tumer mandar: His kol menshe tchilatcheder har kol wawar an o them Galilea, kai wan jon jaake maredo?
42013003	Na-a, penau me tumenge. Tumer te mukenn gar tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom, palle wenna tumer lauter ninna jaake maredo.
42013004	Hoi hi kol menshentsa, kai ko baro kheer an o gab Siloah ap lende peras un jon meran? Hi kol menshe tchilatcheder har kol wawar an o foro Jerusalem, kai koi djiwan?
42013005	Na-a, penau me tumenge. Te mukenn tumer gar tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom, palle wenna tumer lauter ninna jaake maredo."
42013006	Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un penas: "I murshes his i faigetikro ruk an peskro baar tardo. Un job was bud kope, un rodas faige ap ko ruk un hatsas kek.
42013007	Koi penas job ap koleste, kai dell garda ap ko baar: Triin bersha wom me kanna kai, un rodom faige ap kau ruk, un hatsom kek. De les tele! Ko ruk hi tchitcheske kate tardo.
42013008	Penas o wawar: Rai, muk les kau bersh tardo! Me hadau i phub trul koleste pre, un tchiwau grajengro ful trul leste, te well lo feteder.
42013009	Un te hidjell ko ruk an o wawar bersh faige, kowa hi mishto. Te hidjell lo tchi, de les tele!"
42013010	His i Debleskro diwes, koi his o Jesus an i biboldengri kangri un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
42013011	Mank kol menshende his i djuwel, koja his deesh-te-ochta bersha nasselo. I beng, kai an late was, kras lat bango. Un joi nai hadas pes gar pre.
42013012	Har o Jesus lat dikas, das job lat pash peste gole, un penas ap late: "Romnija, tu hal kanna sasto."
42013013	Un job tchiwas peskre wasta ap late. Koi hadas pes li pre, un sharas o Debles.
42013014	Koi choiras pes ko pralstuno an i biboldengri kangri, kai o Jesus koi djuwjat ap o Debleskro diwes sasto kras. Un kowa penas ap i menshende: "Mer hunte budras shob diwessa. Awenn an kolla diwessa, te mukenn tumen sasto te krell, un gar ap o Debleskro diwes!"
42013015	Penas o Jesus ap koleste: "Tumen hi dui djia! Tumer krenn har te krans kek budi ap o Debleskro diwes. Hakeno tumendar pandell peskri grumni un peskri esla tele, un anell len pash o pani ap o Debleskro diwes.
42013016	Kate hi kai djuwel, kai patsell ap o Debleste jaake, har o Abraham kowa kras: Un joi his deesh-te-ochta bersha o bengestar pandlo. Hoske te well li gar ap o Debleskro diwes sasto kerdo?"
42013017	Har job kowa penas, ladjan lauter, kai chojedo ap leste his. Un kol bud wawar, kai kote tardo hi, his bachtelo pral ko tselo railo koowa, hoi o Jesus kras.
42013018	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me penau tumenge kanna, har kowa hi, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom.
42013019	Kowa hi jaake: I mursh tchiwas i tikno senftikro djob an i phub. Un dran ko tikno djob was i baro ruk. Un i tchirkle djiwan ap leste."
42013020	Un o Jesus penas pale: "Me penau tumenge kanna, har kowa hi, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom.
42013021	Kowa hi jaake: I djuwel las i tikno kotar shutlo jarro, un tchiwas les mashkral an i baro tcharo parno jarro. Un ko tikno kotar shutlo jarro kras ko tselo jarro shutlo."
42013022	Un o Jesus djas dureder ap ko drom, hoi djas an o foro Jerusalem. Un job was an i gaba un i forja, un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
42013023	Un i mursh putchas lestar: "Rai, pen menge: Lell o Dewel bud menshen an o bolepen, te djiwenn le pash leste?"
42013024	Un o Jesus penas pale: "Krenn lauter, te djan an ko tikno wudar dre! Me penau tumenge: Bud kamenn an ko wudar dre te djal. Un haiwenn kowa gar.
42013025	Te stell o rai pral o kheer pre un krell o wudar pandlo, palle han tumer win tardo, un tumer denn gole: Rai, kre menge o wudar pre! Un ko rai penella: Me prindjrau tumen gar.
42013026	Koi penenn tumer: Mer cham un pijam tuha. Un tu penal menge o Debleskro lab ap i dromma an mare forja.
42013027	Koi penell job ap tumende: Me prindjrau tumen gar. Djan mandar, tumer tchilatche!
42013028	Te han tumer win tardo un dikenn, kai o Abraham, un o Isaak, un o Jakob, un kol tsele Debleskre rakepangre pash o Debleste an o bolepen hi, rowenn tumer. Un tumer dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne.
42013029	Dran hako them wenna i menshe pash o Debleste an o bolepen khetne, un beshenn pen tele, te chan le.
42013030	Un bud, kai kanna palla tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes glan tardo. Un bud, kai kanna glan tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes palla tardo."
42013031	Ap kau tsiro har o Jesus kowa penas, wan Farisarja pash leste un penan: "Dja tuke! Khate tut! O Herodes kamell tut te marell."
42013032	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Djan un penenn ko tchilatcho mursheske: Kau diwes un taissar tradau i bengen wi, un krau i menshen sasto. Un pal triin diwessa hi miro tselo koowa kerdo.
42013033	Kau diwes, taissar, un o diwes koi pre hunte djap miro drom, te wap an o foro Jerusalem. Kowa djal gar, te well i Debleskro rakepaskro win glan o foro Jerusalem maredo."
42013034	"Tumer menshe an o foro Jerusalem! Tumer maran o Debleskre rakepangren, un dan kolen i barentsa mulo, kai o Dewel pash tumende bitchras. Bud kope kamom tumen pash mande te lell, te dap garda ap tumende, har i kachni ap peskre tarnende garda della, un lell len tel peskre phora. Un tumer kaman gar.
42013035	Doleske mukell o Dewel peskro kheer pash tumende un djiwell buder gar koi. Un me penau tumenge: Tumer dikenn man jaake raha buder gar, bis te was ko tsiro, kai tumer penenna: Sharedo well kowa, kai hi o Deblestar bitchedo!"
42014001	His i Debleskro diwes, koi djas o Jesus pash i pralstuno Farisari an o kheer te chal. Un kol menshe kote lan les an o jak.
42014002	Kote his i mursh, kai his shuwlo ap i herja un ap i mussja.
42014003	Un o Jesus penas ap i tchatchepangre un ap i Farisarja: "Nai krau menshen sasto ap o Debleskro diwes pal o biboldengro tchatchepen?"
42014004	Jon penan tchi koi pre. Koi tchiwas o Jesus peskro wast ap ko mursheste, kras les sasto, un mukas les te djal.
42014005	Palle penas lo ap kolende, kai kote beshdo hi: "Te hi jekes tumendar i tchawo un kowa perell an o pani dre, tsardenn les tumer gar win, ninna ap o Debleskro diwes? Te hi jekes tumendar i grumni un koja perell an o pani dre, tsardenn lat tumer gar win, ninna ap o Debleskro diwes?"
42014006	Un jon nai penan tchi koi pre.
42014007	Un o Jesus dikas, har kolla, kai an o kheer dre wan, penge i feteder beshepangre win rodan. Doleske penas lo lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas:
42014008	"Te penell jek ap tute: Am ap i bijab! palle besh tut gar ap o feteder beshepaskro kote! Nai well jek mursh, kai hi bareder har tu.
42014009	Un palle well kowa pash tute, kai penas, te wess ap i bijab, un penell ap tute: Muk koles kate te beshell, un besh tut kote tele! Un tu hunte leh ko telstuno beshepaskro, un tut hi i bari ladj.
42014010	Tu te djah ap i bijab, palle besh tut ap o telstuno beshepaskro! Un kowa, kai kamas, te djah tu ap peskri bijab, wella pash tute un penella: Miro maal, besh tut ap i feteder beshepaskro! Un lauter, kai kote ap i bijab hi, dikenn, kai tu i an-diklo mursh hal.
42014011	Koon pes baro krella, koles sharell o Dewel gar. Koon pes gar baro krella, un penella: Me molau tchi, koles krell o Dewel baro."
42014012	Un o Jesus penas ap koleste, kai kamas, te chal lo leha: "Te kreh tu i baro chapen, palle ma khare tire malen un phralen pash tute, witar gar brawele menshe, kai an tiro drom djiwenna! Kolla len tut ninna pash pende pre, un jaake denn le tut pale, hoi tu lenge kral.
42014013	Te kameh tu i baro chapen te krell, palle le kol tchorwelen pash tute pre, ninna kolen, kai bango hi, kolen, kai nashenn nai gar, un kolen, kai korelo hi, un de len te chal!
42014014	Te kreh tu kowa, hal tu bachtelo! Kol menshe nai denn tut tchi pale. Te krell o Dewel kol mulen djido, kai kran, hoi job kamas, palle dell lo tut kowa lauter pale, hoi tu lenge kral."
42014015	Pash i chapaskri his i mursh beshdo. Har kowa shunas, hoi o Jesus rakras, penas lo ap o Jesuseste: "Bachtelo hi kowa, kai chal o maro pash o Debleste an o bolepen."
42014016	Koi penas o Jesus leske: "I mursh kras i baro chapen, un mukas bud menshen te penell, te wenn le pash o chapen.
42014017	Un ap ko tsiro, kai job kamas pes tele te beshell, bitchras lo i budepaskres pash lende, te penell lo: Awenn! Chapen un pipen hi lauter koi.
42014018	Jek pal o wawar penan, te nai wan le gar. Ko jek penas: Me ginom i kotar phub, un me djap koi un dikap, har kowa wi-dikella. Me nai wau gar.
42014019	Ko duito penas: Me ginom deesh grumja, un djau kanna kote, te dikap, har jon wi-dikenna. Me nai wau gar.
42014020	Ko triinto penas: Me romedinerom. Doleske nai wau gar.
42014021	Ko budepaskro was pale, un penas lauter peskro rajeske. Koi was ko rai an i bari choli, un penas ap koleste: Dja ap i tsele dromma an o foro! Aan kol tchorwelen, kol bangen, kol korelen un kolen, kai nai nashenn gar, pash mande!
42014022	Un pal i tsiro was o budepaskro pale un penas: Me krom, hoi tu penal. O kheer hi gar pherdo.
42014023	Un ko rai penas ap koleste: Dja win ap i dromma glan o foro un pash i burra ap o them, kai menshe beshdo hi, un pen lenge, te wenn le pash mande. Rake lenge an o dji, te well miro kheer pherdo!
42014024	Me penau tumenge: Kolenge, kai mukom glan i tsiro te penell, te wenn le pash miro chapen, un kai kaman gar pash mande te well, kolendar mukau kekes an miro kheer dre te well, te chal lo mantsa."
42014025	Har o Jesus ap o drom djas, his bud menshe trul leste. Un job dikas ap lende un penas:
42014026	"Koon pash mande wella, un kamell peskro dades, peskri dat, peskri romjat, peskre tchawen, peskre phralen, peskre phenjen, un peskro djipen budeder har man, kowa nai well gar miro maal.
42014027	Koon lell gar peskro trushel ap peste un djal mantsa, nai well gar miro maal.
42014028	Te kamell jek tumendar i baro kheer te krell, hunte dikell lo, te hi les doha lowe.
42014029	Te tchiwell lo nai kokres i telstune barra, palle san i tsele menshe pral leste.
42014030	Un jon penenn: Ko mursh kamas i kheer te krell. Un kanna nai krell lo les gar dureder.
42014031	Te kamell i baro rai an o kurepen te djal i wawar baro rajeha, hunte putchell lo pestar: Hom me sorelo doha mire deesh serja lurdentsa, te kurap man ko wawar baro rajeha, kai biish serja lurde pash leste hi?
42014032	Te hi lo gar sorelo doha, bitchrell lo murshen pash o wawar baro rajeste jaake raha, har kowa gomme dur lestar hi, un mangell les, te djal kek kurepen.
42014033	Doleske penau tumenge: Kek tumendar nai well miro maal, te dell job gar lauter pre, hoi les hi."
42014034	"O loon hi mishto. Te nashras o loon peskri soor, hi lo buder gar mishto. Un tu nai kreh buder tchi, te well lo pale londo.
42014035	Ko loon molell tchi buder. Tu nai witsreh les krik. Lenn kowa ap tumaro dji, hoi me tumenge penaua!"
42015001	His i diwes, kai wan bud bibolde pash o Jesuseste, te shunenn le les. Kolla his sawe, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un bud wawar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske pale-tchidde hi.
42015002	Kol Farisarja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre his chojemen pral o Jesuseste un penan: "Kau mursh lell i pale-tchidde pash peste pre, un chal lentsa."
42015003	Koi penas o Jesus lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas:
42015004	"Te hi jekes tumendar sheel bakre, un jek lendar djal nashedo, palle mukell lo kol wawaren tardo, un rodell ko jekes jaake raha, te hatsell lo les.
42015005	Un te hatsell lo koles, lell lo les ap i phik, un hi bachtelo.
42015006	Un te well lo khere, penell lo peskre malenge un kol wawarenge, kai trul leste djiwenna: Awenn bachteles mantsa! Me hatsom ko bakres pale, hoi his nashedo."
42015007	Palle penas o Jesus lenge: "Me penau tumenge: Pral ko jek tchilatcho, kai mukas peskro tchilatcho drom un djal ap o Debleskro drom, pral koleste hi bareder bacht an o bolepen, har pral kol wawarende, kai patsenna, te nai atchenn le ap pengro drom."
42015008	Te hi i djuwjat deesh rupene beme, un nashrell jek, krell li i momeli an, un rodell koi bema an o tselo kheer jaake raha, bis te hatsell li lat.
42015009	Un te hatsell li koi rupeni bema, dell li peskre malen gole un kol wawaren, kai pash late djiwenna, un penella: Awenn bachtelo mantsa! Me hatsom miri rupeni bema, kai nashrom.
42015010	Me penau tumenge ninna: O Debleskre bolepangre hi bachtelo pral jekeste, kai mukell peskro tchilatcho drom un djal ap o Debleskro drom.
42015011	Un o Jesus penas: I murshes his dui tchawe.
42015012	Ko tarneder penas ap peskro dadeste: De man kanna kowa, hoi me lau pal tiro merepen! Un o dad das hakenes peskro kotar.
42015013	Pal i tikno tsiro las ko tarneder tchawo peskro tselo brawlepen, un djas an i wawar them, djiwas i shukar djipen, un das peskro tselo brawlepen win.
42015014	Har les his buder tchi, was i bari bok pral ko them un les his buder tchi te chal.
42015015	Koi djas lo pash i hacho un rodas i budi. Kowa bitchras les pash i balende, te dell job garda ap lende.
42015016	Les his bari bok un kamas ninna kowa te chal, hoi i bale chana. Kowa kamas kek les te dell.
42015017	Un job penas ap peste: Miro dades hi bud budepangre. Kolen hi bud te chal, un me merau kate i bokatar.
42015018	Me kamau pash miro dadeste te djal, te penap: Tata, me krom i tchilatcho koowa, kai me djom tutar un o Deblestar krik.
42015019	Me hom gar moldo, te atchap tiro tchawo. Le man pash tute pre, te wap tiro budepaskro!
42015020	Un job stas pre, un djas pash peskro dadeste pale. Har leskro dad les dural dikas, khaitas o tchawo les. Un o dad nashas pash leste, tapras les trujal, un tchumras les.
42015021	Koi penas o tchawo ap leste: Tata, me krom i tchilatcho koowa, kai me djom tutar un o Deblestar krik. Un me hom gar moldo, te atchap tiro tchawo.
42015022	Koi penas o dad ap peskre budepangre: Anenn sik o feteder ripen, un riwenn kowa leske an! Denn les i gustrin un denn les kircha!
42015023	Anenn i tarni thuli grumni! Marenn lat, te chas un was bachtelo!
42015024	Tchatchepaha, miro tchawo his mulo, un was djido. Job his nashedo un was pale. Un jon wan lauter bachtelo.
42015025	Ko phureder tchawo budras win ap i kotar phub. Har job khere djas un pash o kheer was, shunas lo bashepen un khelepen.
42015026	Un job das i budepaskres gole, un putchas lestar, hoi kote djas.
42015027	Kowa penas: Tiro phraal was sasto pale. Doleske maras tiro dad i tarni thuli grumjat leske.
42015028	Koi was job chojedo, un kamas gar an o kheer te djal. Un leskro dad djas win, un mangas les, te well lo an o kheer dre.
42015029	Un ko tchawo penas ap peskro dadeste: Tu djineh, kai me bud bersha tuke budrom, un krom lauter, hoi tu mange penal. Mange maral tu kek bakro, te chap les mire malentsa, un te wap bachtelo.
42015030	Tiro tchawo, kai was kanna pale khere, kowa, kai das tire lowe win i lubjentsa, koleske maral tu i tarni thuli grumni.
42015031	Koi penas o dad ap leste: Miro tchawo, tu hal hako tsiro pash mande, un hoi miro hi, kowa hi ninna tiro.
42015032	Mer hunte was bachtelo. Tiro phraal his mulo un was djido. Job his nashedo un hatsas pale khere.
42016001	O Jesus penas ninna ap peskre malende: "His i brawelo mursh. Koles his i budepaskro, kai chochas les un das leskro brawlepen win. Har ko brawelo kowa shunas,
42016002	mukas lo les gole te dell, un penas ap leste: Hoi shunom me pral tute? Sike mande kol lila, hoi dre tchindlo hi, har bud lowe tu dre lal! Tu nai deh buder gar ap miro brawlepen garda!
42016003	Un ko budepaskro penas ap peste: Te nai budrau buder gar miro rajeske, hoi te krap me kanna? Me nai budrau gar win ap i kotar phub. Un te hunte mangap, ladjau man.
42016004	Me djinau kanna, hoi te krap, te lenn jon man pash pende pre ap ko diwes, kai hi man buder kek budi.
42016005	Un job das kolen pash peste gole, kai hi sijaan pash peskro rajeste. Un jek pal o wawareste was pash leste. Un job putchas hakenestar: Har bud sijaan hi tut pash miro rajeste?
42016006	Un te penas jek: Sheel khoro djet, palle penas lo ap leste: Le ko liil, kai tiro sijaan dre tardo hi. Tchin kanna: paash-sheel!
42016007	Un te putchas lo i wawarestar: Har bud sijaan hi tut? un kowa penas: Sheel gone djob, palle penas lo ap koleste: Le ko liil, kai tiro sijaan dre tardo hi, un tchin kanna: ochta-deesh!
42016008	Un ko rai sharas ko chocheno budepaskres doleske, kai his lo gosewo." "Un kowa hi tchatcho", penas o Jesus, "kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar, djan gosweder trujal i wawar menshentsa har kolla, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom.
42016009	Me penau tumenge: Tumare lowe atchenna gar. Denn len i tchorwelende, te wenn le tumare mala! Te hi kol lowe buder tchi moldo, palle lenn le tumen kote an i khera dre, kai tumer hako tsiro nai atchenna."
42016010	"Koon an i tikno koowa lauter mishto krella, kowa krell ninna an i baro koowa lauter mishto. Koon i tikno koowa gar mishto krella, kowa krell ninna i baro koowa gar mishto.
42016011	Te djan tumer gar mishto trujal kol lowentsa, hoi gar atchenna, koon dell tumen nai ko brawlepen an o wast, hoi atchella?
42016012	Te djan tumer wawar menshengro brawlepen gar mishto trujal, har nai dell tumen o Dewel kowa an tumare wasta, hoi kamell lo tumen te dell?
42016013	Kek budepaskro budrell nai dui rajenge. Te wals kowa jaake, budrals lo ko jekeske mishto, un ko wawareske gar mishto. Ko jekes kamals job gar, ko wawares kamals job o djijestar. Tu nai budreh gar o Debleske un leh tiro brawlepen khetne!"
42016014	Kol Farisarja shunan kowa lauter. Jon his pal i lowe, un jon san pral o Jesuseste.
42016015	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Glan i menshengre jaka kamenn tumer latcho te well. O Dewel prindjrell tumaro dji. Hoi pash i menshende bud molella, hi tchi moldo an o Debleskre jaka.
42016016	An o phuro tsiro rikran pen i menshe ap kowa, hoi o Mose un i Debleskre rakepangre penan. Har was o Johanni, was o Debleskro newo tsiro. Kanna well i menshenge o latcho lab penlo, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne an jek harmenationa. Un hakeno kamell sorjaha jaake dre te well, har job kamella.
42016017	O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Kowa, hoi o Mose un kol Debleskre rakepangre penan, atchella. Ninna o tikneder lab well gar krik lino.
42016018	Koon peskri romjat mukella, un romedinerell i wawar djuwjat, kowa chochell peskri romjat. Un kowa, kai romedinerell i mukli djuwjat, kowa anell doosh ap peste, te las lo i wawareskri romjat."
42016019	Un o Jesus penas pale: Koi his i brawelo mursh. Kowa his hako tsiro shukar un railes rido, un djiwas i shukar djipen.
42016020	Glan leskro wudar his i tchorwelo tchiddo, kai his nasselo ap peskro mass. Leskro lab hi Lazaro.
42016021	Kowa mangas ko brawelestar ko chapen, hoi peras tele ap i phub, te chal lo kowa. Un i djukle wan pash leste, un tcharan leskro nasselo mass tele.
42016022	Ko diwes was, kai ko tchorwelo meras. Un i bolepangre anan les an o bolepen, te beshas lo pes pash o Abraham. I tsiro koi pre meras ninna ko brawelo, un las i shukar paskepen.
42016023	Har job kanna an o mulengro them his, wan bare duka ap leste. Un job dikas pre, un dikas o Abrahames dural, un o Lazaro his pash leste beshdo.
42016024	Koi das ko brawelo gole: Tata Abraham, kre tiro dji mange pre, un bitche o Lazares pash mande! Job hunte tchiwell peskro gushto an o pani, un tchiwell kowa ap miri tchip, te dukrell man kai jag gar!
42016025	Koi penas o Abraham: Tchawa, tuke djas hako tsiro an tiro djipen mishto. O Lazares his kek shukar djipen. Kanna hi job bachtelo un leske djal mishto. Un tut hi kanna bare duka.
42016026	Ninna hi mashkral mende i baro telstunepen, te nai well kek mendar pash tumende, un kek tumendar nai well pash mende.
42016027	Koi penas o brawelo: Me mangau tut, tata Abraham, bitche les an miro dadeskro kheer!
42016028	Man hi pantch phrala. Kolenge hunte penell job, har mange djala, te wenn jon gar koi, kai me hom, un bare duka lom."
42016029	Koi penas o Abraham: Len hi o Moseskre laba un kol lila, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre tchinan. Ap kolende hunte shunenn jon!
42016030	Penas o brawelo: Na-a! Te wals jek i mulendar pash lende, palle mukans le pengro tchilatcho drom.
42016031	Penas o Abraham: Te shunenn le gar ap o Mose un ap kol Debleskre rakepangre, shunenn le witar gar ap jekeste, kai stas i mulendar pre."
42017001	Un o Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Tchatchepaha, menshe wenna, kai kamenn tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Bibacht ap koleste, kai kowa krella!
42017002	Koleske wals feteder, te well leske i pharo bar trul i meen pandlo, un te well lo an o baro pani witsedo, te nai anell lo buder gar jekes kal tiknendar ap o tchilatcho drom.
42017003	Denn jak ap tumende! Te krell tiro phraal tchilatcho koowa ap tute, pen leske, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras! Te khaitell les ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi job ap tute kras, jaake ab buder gar chojedo ap leste!
42017004	Te krell lo efta kope ap o diwes tchilatcho koowa ap tute, un te well lo efta kope pash tute un penella, kai les kowa khaitella, jaake ab buder gar chojedo ap leste!"
42017005	Un kol deesh-te-dui bitchepangre penan ap o Jesuseste: "Kre maro patsepen soreles!"
42017006	Koi penas o rai Jesus ap lende: "Te wals tumaro patsepen ninna tikno har i senftikro djob, nai penans tumer ap ko baro ruk: Witse tut an o pani! Un ko ruk shunals ap tumende."
42017007	"Shunenn, hoi me tumenge penaua: Kek tumendar penella ap peskro budepaskro, kai pal peskri budi ap o kotar them khere wella: Am, besh tut kate tele, cha un pi!
42017008	Ko krenn tumer gar. Tumer penenn leske: Rib tut trujal un kre mange chapaske! Aan ko chapen pash mande! Palle nai chah un pijeh tu ninna.
42017009	Parkrenn tumen pash leste koleske, hoi job kras? Na-a, ko krenn tumer gar.
42017010	Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa. Te kran tumer lauter, hoi o Dewel tumenge penas, palle penenn: Mer ham tire budepangre. Mer kram, hoi hunte kram."
42017011	Har o Jesus ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem his, djas lo mank i themma Samaria un Galilea.
42017012	Un job djas an i gab. Un kote wan deesh nassele mursha pash leste. Kolen his i djungelo nasslepen, kai lengro mass tele merella. Jon his lestar doha dur krik tardo,
42017013	un dan gole: "Jesus, latcho rai, kre tiro dji menge pre!"
42017014	Un o Jesus dikas len, un penas ap lende: "Djan pash o rashajeste, un sikrenn tumen glan leste!" Un har jon djan, wan jon ap o drom sasto.
42017015	Jek lendar, har job dikas, te hi lo sasto, djas lo pash o Jesuseste pale pale, un sharas o Debles o tselo djijeha.
42017016	Job witsras pes glan o Jesuseskre pire tele, un parkras pes. Kowa his i Samaritari.
42017017	Koi penas o Jesus: "Deesh wan sasto. Kai hi kol wawar enja?
42017018	Hi kek wawar koi, kai was pale pale, te sharell lo o Debles har kau Samaritari?"
42017019	Un job penas ap ko mursheste: "Ste pre, un dja khere! Tiro patsepen kras tut sasto."
42017020	Un i Farisarja putchan o Jesusestar: "Kaana well ko tsiro, kai dikah, kai o Dewel o rai hi pral i tseli phub?" Koi penas lo: "Ko tsiro well gar jaake, te nai dikenn kowa.
42017021	Ninna nai penell jek gar: Kanna hi ko tsiro kai." Un o Jesus penas dureder: "Kote, kai i mensho kamella, te well o Dewel leskro rai, kote was ko tsiro."
42017022	Un job penas ap peskre malende: "I tsiro wella, kai tumaro dji kamell o Menshengro Tchawes jek diwes te dikell. Un tumer dikenn les gar.
42017023	Un jon penenn ap tumende: Dikenn, kote hi lo! Dikenn, kate hi lo! Me penau tumenge: Djan gar kote! Patsenn gar, hoi kol menshe penenna!
42017024	Jaake har i Debleskri jag ap o bolepen diklo hi, hoi djal jek rigatar ap i wawar rig an o bolepen, jaake well o Menshengro Tchawo ap peskro diwes diklo.
42017025	Glan ko tsiro hunte lell lo bud duka ap peste. Un i menshe, kai kau diwes djiwenna, tchiwenn les ap i rig.
42017026	Ap ko tsiro, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella, djiwenn i menshe jaake har an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas.
42017027	Kol menshe chan, pijan, un romedineran, bis ap ko diwes, kai o Noa an o panjeskro kheer djas, un o baro pani was, un lauter tassan le.
42017028	Ko tsiro, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella, hi ninna har ko tsiro, kai o Lot djiwas. Jon chan, pijan, jon ginan, bikran, jon budran ap pengro kotar phub, un kran penge khera.
42017029	Ap ko diwes, kai o Lot dran o foro Sodom djas, was jag dran o bolepen, un lauter wan chatchedo.
42017030	Jaake djal kowa ninna ap ko diwes, kai o Menshengro Tchawo diklo wella.
42017031	Koon ap ko diwes ap o kheer hi, un kones peskro koowa an o kheer hi, kowa hunte djal gar tele, te lell lo peskro koowa. Un koon ap peskro kotar phub budrella, hunte djal gar buder khere.
42017032	Ma bistrenn o Loteskri romjat!
42017033	Koon kamell peskro djipen te rikrell, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen nashrella, kowa lell les pale.
42017034	Me penau tumenge: Te hi an koi rati dui menshe an o tchiben tchiddo, well ko jek krik lino, ko wawar atchell koi.
42017035	Dui djuwja krenn dran djob jarro. Koi jek well krik lino, koi wawar atchell koi.
42017036	Dui budrenn ap i kotar phub. Ko jek well krik lino, ko wawar atchell koi."
42017037	Leskre mala putchan lestar: "Rai, kai well kowa?" Penas lo: "Kote, kai i mulo mass tchiddo hi, kote wenn i bare diwje tchirkle khetne te chan le."
42018001	Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, te sikrell lo len, te hunte mangenn le o Debles hako tsiro, un te hunte mukenn le gar tele, te denn le les gole. Un job penas:
42018002	"An i foro djiwas i tchatchepaskro rai. Kowa putchas gar pal o Debleste, un daras kek menshestar.
42018003	An ko foro djiwas ninna i djuwel, kolakro rom meras. Koja was bud kope pash leste, un penas: Ab ap miri rig, te lap miro tchatchepen!
42018004	I raha tsiro kras ko tchatchepaskro rai lake tchi. Pal i tsiro penas lo ap peste: Tchatchepaha, pal o Debleste putchau gar, un witar gar darau i menshendar.
42018005	Koi djuwel mukell gar tele. Doleske kamau te krell, te lell li lakro tchatchepen, te nai tchingrell li gar ap mande."
42018006	Koi penas o Jesus: "Shunenn tumer, hoi ko tchilatcho tchatchepaskro penas?
42018007	Har bud feteder hi o Dewel! Patsenn tumer gar, te well lo ap i rig peskre wi-rodede menshendar, kai diwes un rati ap leste gole denna? Awa, job well ap lengri rig un dell len lengro tchatchepen. Lell lo pes bud tsiro, te well lo ap lengri rig?
42018008	Na-a, penau me tumenge: Jon lenn sik pengro tchatchepen. Hoi penenn tumer mange, te putchau tumendar: Te well o Menshengro Tchawo pale, hatsell job menshen ap i phub, kai patsenn ap leste?"
42018009	His menshe trul o Jesuseste tardo, kai patsan pendar, te hi le latcho un feteder har kol wawar. Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas:
42018010	"Dui mursha djan an o Debleskro baro kheer, te mangenn le o Debles an. Ko jek hi i Farisari, ko wawar hi jek kolendar, kai lenn lowe i biboldendar i Remarjenge dre.
42018011	Ko Farisari tchiwas pes tardo un penas: Mo Dewel, me parkrau man pash tute, te hom gar jaake har kal wawar menshe: tchorepangre, chochene, un har kolla, kai chochenn pengri romjat i wawar djuwjaha, un gar jaake har kowa, kai koi wergal tardo hi: Ko pale-tchiddo.
42018012	Dui diwessa an o kurko chau me tchi, te mangap tut an. Un me dau tut o deshto kotar halauterestar, hoi dre lau.
42018013	Ko pale-tchiddo atchas palla tardo, un hadas gar peskro shero pre. Un job das ap peskro betch, te sikrell lo, kai leskro tchilatcho koowa khaitas les, un penas: Miro Dewel, me hom i tchilatcho mursh. Dik ap mande un ab mange latcho!"
42018014	Un o Jesus penas: "Me penau tumenge: O Dewel dikas ap kaleste, un his leske latcho un gar ko wawareske. Kowa, kai pes bares krella, koles sharell o Dewel gar. Un kowa, kai pes gar bares krella, koles krell o Dewel bares."
42018015	Un i menshe anan tchawen pash leste, te tchiwell lo peskre wasta ap lende. Har peskre mala dikan kowa, tchingran le ap kol menshende.
42018016	Koi das o Jesus peskre malen gole, un penas ap lende: "Mukenn kol tchawen pash mande te well! Ma rikrenn len pale! Sawe har jon, kolen das o Dewel gole, te djiwenn le khetne leha an o bolepen.
42018017	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon gar ap mande patsella har kol tchawe, kowa nai well gar ap o Debleskro drom."
42018018	Koi putchas lestar i pralstuno: "Latcho sikepaskro, hoi hunte krap, te dell man o Dewel o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
42018019	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Hoske peneh tu: Latcho sikepaskro! ap mande? Kek mensho hi latcho. O Dewel kokres hi latcho.
42018020	Tu prindjreh kol deesh Debleskre laba: Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Ma mare kekes! Ma tchore! Ma pen chochepen pral jekeste! Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto!"
42018021	Koi penas job: "Me krom kowa lauter jaake raha, har me djiwau."
42018022	Har o Jesus kowa shunas, penas lo ap leste: "Jek hunte kress tu budeder. Bike lauter, hoi tut hi, un de kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi tut i brawlepen an o bolepen. Un am un dja mantsa!"
42018023	Har o pralstuno kowa shunas, dukas les kowa an o dji. Les hi bud brawlepen.
42018024	Un o Jesus dikas, kai kol laba les dukan. Un job penas: "Har pharo hi i brawelenge, te wenn le ap o Debleskro drom.
42018025	Hi gar jaake pharo, te djal i baro ficho an i subjakro kand dre, har te well i brawelo ap o Debleskro drom."
42018026	Penan kolla, kai pash leste tardo hi, ap leste: "Te hi kowa jaake, koon nai lell o Debleskro djipen?"
42018027	Penas lo: "Kowa hoi i menshe nai krenn gar, kowa nai krell o Dewel."
42018028	Koi penas o Petro: "Mer mukam lauter tchiddo un djam tuha."
42018029	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Hakeno, kai mukell peskro kheer, peskri romjat, phralen, tchawen, dades un dat, te nai budrell lo feteder o Debleske,
42018030	kowa lell an kau tsiro lauter bud kope pale. Un an ko tsiro, kai wella, dell o Dewel les o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella."
42018031	Un o Jesus las i deesh-te-dui ap i rig un penas lenge: "Shunenn! Mer djah kanna an o foro Jerusalem. Kote well lauter tchatcho, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre pral o Menshengro Tchaweste tchinan:
42018032	Jon denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi. Un kolla praassenn les, denn les dawa un tchungrenn ap leste.
42018033	Jon denn les i tchupnijaha, un marenn les. Un pal triin diwessa krell o Dewel les djido."
42018034	Leskre mala haiwan kek lab. Kowa, hoi job lenge kal labentsa kamas te penell, djas gar an lengro shero dre. Un jon djinan gar, pral hoi job rakras.
42018035	Un o Jesus djas pash o foro Jericho. Un i korelo, his pash o drom beshdo, un mangas lowe i menshendar.
42018036	Un job shunas bud menshen, kai djan ap ko drom. Koi putchas lo lendar: "Hoi djal kote?"
42018037	Koi penan le: "O Jesus dran Nazaret djal kote."
42018038	Koi das lo gole: "Jesus, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
42018039	Un kolla, kai djan glan o Jesuseste ap o drom, tchingran ap ko mursheste un penan: "Muk tele un atch!" Job das budeder gole: "Jesus, Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
42018040	Un o Jesus atchas tardo, un penas: "Anenn les pash mande!" Un har ko mursh pash leste was, putchas o Jesus lestar:
42018041	"Hoi kameh tu, te krap tuke?" Penas kowa: "Rai, me kamoms te dikell."
42018042	Penas o Jesus: "Palle dik! Tiro patsepen kras tut sasto."
42018043	Un job dikas nai pale, djas o Jesuseha, un sharas o Debles. Un halauter, kai kowa dikan, sharan o Debles ninna.
42019001	Un o Jesus djas an o foro Jericho.
42019002	Kote his i biboldo, ko his i pralstuno pral kolende, kai lenna i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre. Leskro lab his Zacheo.
42019003	Job kamas o Jesuses te dikell, un nai dikas les gar. Job his tikno, un bud menshe his trul o Jesuseste.
42019004	Doleske nashas lo glan i menshende, un djas ap i ruk, te dikell lo feteder.
42019005	Un o Jesus was koi un dikas pre, un penas ap leste: "Zacheo, am sik koi tele! Kau diwes hunte wap me an tiro kheer."
42019006	Un o Zacheo was sik o rukestar tele, un las o Jesuses an peskro kheer dre, un his bachtelo.
42019007	Har jon kowa dikan, his jon chojemen un penan: "Pash i pale-tchiddo djal job an o kheer."
42019008	O Zacheo his koi tardo un penas ap o Jesuseste: "Mo rai, me dau i tchorwelende i paash lauterestar, hoi man hi. Un te chochom jekes, dau les kanna star kope jaake bud pale."
42019009	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Kau diwes las o Dewel i menshen an kau kheer dran o tchilatchepen win. Ninna kawa rom hi o Abrahameskro tchawo.
42019010	O Menshengro Tchawo was, te rodell lo kolen, kai nashedo hi, un te anell lo kolen ap o Debleskro drom, kai ap o tchilatcho drom hi."
42019011	O Jesus his gar dur o forestar Jerusalem, un i menshe patsan, kai ko tsiro kanna kai hi, kai o Dewel sikrella, te hi lo o rai pral i tseli phub. Koi penas o Jesus lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi,
42019012	un penas: "I pralstuno kamas te well lo baro rai pral peskro them. Doleske djas lo pash koleste, kai hi o wast pral bud themma, te krell kowa les baro rai. Un pal kowa kamas lo an peskro them pale te djal.
42019013	Un job das deesh peskre budepangren gole, das hakeneste i sheel rupene beme, un penas: Budrenn kol lowentsa jaake raha har me gar kai hom. Un job djas peske.
42019014	I menshe an peskro them his chojedo ap leste un bitchran murshen leske palla, te penenn le leske: Mer kamah gar, te wess tu baro rai pral mende!
42019015	Ko mursh was baro rai, un was an peskro them pale. Koi das lo kol budepangren gole, kolen job kol lowe das. Un job kamas dikell, hoi jon kol lowentsa kran.
42019016	I budepaskro was pash leste un penas: Mo rai, me budrom kol lowentsa, hoi tu man dal. Un kanna hi man deesh kope jaake bud.
42019017	Penas lo ap koleste: Kowa kral tu mishto. Tu hal o latcho budepaskro. Me tchiwom i tikno koowa an tire wasta, un tu kral i bari budi koleha. Doleske kamau, te wess tu o pralstuno pral deesh forja.
42019018	Ko duito was pash ko rajeste, un penas: Mo rai, me budrom kol lowentsa, hoi tu man dal. Un kanna hi man pantch kope jaake bud.
42019019	Ap koleste penas lo ninna: Tu weh o pralstuno pral pantch forja.
42019020	Ko triinto was un penas: Mo rai, ake, tire sheel rupene beme. Me khatrom len an i diklo.
42019021	Me darom tutar. Tut hi i dji dran bar. Tu leh, kai dal tchi. Un hoi i wawar ap i kotar phub tchiwas, leh tu lestar krik, te was kowa bares.
42019022	Ap koleste penas o rai: Tu moleh tchi. Tu hal i tchilatcho budepaskro. Tu djinal, kai hi man i dji dran bar, un kai lau, kai dom tchi, un hoi me gar an i phub tchiwom, te well kowa baro.
42019023	Hoske anal tu mire lowe gar pash kolende, kai i lowe win patsenna? Un te woms me pale, loms budeder lowe pale, har tu len dal.
42019024	Un job penas ap kolende, kai koi pashal tardo hi: Lenn kol sheel rupene beme lestar krik, un denn kol lowe koleste, kai hi les deesh kope budeder!
42019025	Un jon penan ap o rajeste: Rai, koles hi deesh kope jaake bud!
42019026	Koi penas o rai: Kones bud hi, kowa lell budeder. Un kowa, kai hi les gar bud, kolestar well kowa ninna krik lino.
42019027	Un job penas dureder: Anenn kolen glan mande, kai hi chojedo ap mande, un kai kaman gar, te wap baro rai pral lende, un denn len glan mire jaka temerl!"
42019028	Har o Jesus kowa penas, djas lo glan lende ap o drom, kai djal an o foro Jerusalem.
42019029	Un job was pash kol gaba Betfage un Betani. Kal gaba his ap koi berga tchiddo, hoi kharella djeteskri berga. Un job bitchras dui peskre malendar glan-wi un penas lenge:
42019030	"Djan an o gab koi wergal. Kote hatsenn tumer i tarni esla pandlo, ap koleste his gomme kek beshdo. Pandenn lat tele, un anenn lat pash mande!
42019031	Un te putchell jek tumendar: Hoske pandenn lat tele? penenn leske: Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job ap late."
42019032	Un kol dui djan an ko gab, un lauter his jaake, har o Jesus lenge penas.
42019033	Har jon koja tarni esla tele pandan, putchas lendar ko mursh, koleske koi esla his: "Hoske pandenn tumer koi tarni esla tele?"
42019034	Un jon penan leske: "Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job ap late."
42019035	Koi anan jon koi esla pash o Jesuseste, un tchiwan pengre koola ap late. Un o Jesus beshas pes pral pre.
42019036	Ap o drom, har job an o foro Jerusalem klissas, tchiwan i menshe pengre koola ap o drom, te nashte klissas job pral wergal.
42019037	Har jon kote wan, kai djal o drom o djeteskri berga tele, dan leskre mala bari gole i bachtjatar, un sharan o Debles pral ko baro koowa, hoi job mashkral lende kras.
42019038	Un jon penan: "Sharas ko baro rajes, koles o Dewel bitchras. O Debleskri bacht well pash mende! Baro hi o Debleskro railepen an o bolepen!"
42019039	Koi his ninna Farisarja mashkral i menshende ap o drom. Kolla penan: "Rai, pen ap tire malende, te mukenn le tele!"
42019040	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me penau tumenge: Jon te rikrenn pengre muja, palle denn i barra gole."
42019041	Un har o Jesus pash o foro Jerusalem was, rowas lo pral i menshende an kau foro,
42019042	un penas: "Bachtelo wans tumer, te djinans tumer kau diwes, koon anell tumenge o Debleskri bacht! Tumer han korelo. Tumer dikenn les gar.
42019043	Ko bibachtelo diwes wella, kai lurde wenna dran i wawar themma. Jon tchiwenn bare barra trul tumaro foro, te wenn tumer buder gar win.
42019044	Un jon marenn tumare menshen, un denn tumare tchawen an ko foro mulo. Mo Dewel kamas tumen peskro latchepen te sikrell. Un tumer kaman gar te krenn tumaro dji leske pre. Doleske atchell kek bar ap ko wawar an kau foro."
42019045	Un o Jesus djas an o Debleskro baro kheer un tradas kol bikepangren win,
42019046	un penas lenge: "An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penella: Miro kheer te well i kheer, kai sharenn man i menshe un mangenn man an. Tumer kran lestar i kheer, kai i menshe chochenna un randenna."
42019047	Hako diwes djas o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. I bare rashaja, i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i wawar pralstune rodan i drom, te marenn le les.
42019048	Jon djinan gar, har nai tapran le les. Bud menshe his trul leste, un kaman hako lab te shunell, hoi job penas.
42020001	His i diwes, kai penas o Jesus i menshenge o Debleskro lab an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder wan pash leste,
42020002	un penan ap leste: "Pen menge, koon penas tuke, te kress tu kowa lauter? Koon bitchras tut?"
42020003	Penas lo: "Kanna kamau tumendar ninna tchomone te putchell pral o Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen o Debleske an o pani thowas:
42020004	Bitchras o Dewel o Johannes, te thowell lo i menshen an o pani? Bitchran i menshe les? Penenn les mange!"
42020005	Un jon tchingran mashkral pende un penan: "Te penah mer leske: O Dewel bitchras o Johannes, palle penell lo menge: Hoske patsan tumer les gar?
42020006	Te penah mer leske: I menshe bitchran les, witsrenn le barentsa ap mende, te marenn le men. Jon patsenn soreles, te hi lo i Debleskro rakepaskro."
42020007	Un jon penan o Jesuseske: "Mer djinah les gar."
42020008	Penas o Jesus lenge: "Jaake penau tumenge witar gar, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa."
42020009	Un o Jesus penas i menshenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: "His i mursh. Koles his i kotar them. Kote tchiwas lo drakengre ruka an i phub, un patsas kau them ap i hachende, te budrenn le kote leske. Un job djas peske an i wawar them i raha tsireske.
42020010	Har ko tsiro was, te anenn le i drake dre, bitchras job i budepaskres pash i hachende, te lell lo lendar kol drake, hoi leske hi. I hache dan les kek drake. Jon dan les dawa un bitchran les krik.
42020011	Koi bitchras ko mursh i wawar budepaskres pash lende. I hache dan les kek drake. Jon dan les ninna dawa, praassan les, un bitchran les krik.
42020012	O mursh bitchras i triinto budepaskres. I hache dan les ninna ratlo, un witsran les win.
42020013	Kanna penas o rai pral o drakengro them ap peste: Hoi krap? Me bitchrau miro tchawes, koles, kai me kamau o tselo djijeha. Koles witsrenn jon gar win.
