42020014	Har i hache les dikan, penan le mashkral pende: Kowa hi leskro tchawo, kai lauter lella pal peskro dadeskro merepen. Maras les, palle hi ko them maro!
42020015	Un jon witsran les dran ko drakengro them win, un maran les. Hoi krell kanna ko rai pral ko drakengro them i hachentsa?
42020016	Job wella, un marell kol hachen, un dell ko drakengro them i wawaren." Har kolla kowa shunan, kai trul o Jesuseste tardo his, penan le: "Kowa wella gar jaake!"
42020017	Un o Jesus dikas ap lende, un penas: "Hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: His i bar, kai i budepangre lestar penan: Kowa hi tchi moldo. Ko bar las o Dewel un tchiwas les jaake an o kheer, te rikrell lo ko tselo kheer khetne.
42020018	Koon ap kau bar perella, kowa merella. Ap koneste kau bar perella, koles dell ko bar khetne."
42020019	Un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i bare rashaja haiwan, kai rakras o Jesus lendar. Un jon kaman te taprenn le les sik pal leskro rakepen, te tchiwenn le les an o stilepen. Jon trashan i menshendar. Doleske tapran le les gar.
42020020	Jon lan o Jesuses an o jak. Un jon bitchran murshen, kai kran, har te wans le latcho. Un kolla putchan bud koowa lestar, te dikenn le, hoi job penals, jaake te nai taprenn le les an leskro rakepen, un te nai denn le les an i Remarjengre wasta.
42020021	Un jaake penan le ap leste: "Sikepaskro, mer djinah, te dareh tu kekestar. Un tu peneh o tchatchepen i menshenge an o mui. Un tu sikreh lende o Debleskro drom.
42020022	Pen menge: Hi mishto pal maro tchatchepen, te das mer o themeskre lowe o baro rajeste an o foro Rom?"
42020023	O Jesus djinas, kai jon gosewo hi, un job penas ap lende:
42020024	"Denn man i rupeni bema. Koneskro shero un lab hi ap kai bema?" Penan le: "O shero o baro rajestar an o foro Rom!"
42020025	Penas lo lenge: "Jaake denn leste, hoi leskro hi, un denn o Debleste, hoi leskro hi!"
42020026	Un kote glan i menshende nai tapran le les gar an leskro rakepen, un kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job penas, un djinan buder gar, hoi te penenn le.
42020027	Koi wan kol rashaja pash leste, kai ninna kharenna Saddukarja. Kolla patsenn gar, kai o Dewel i mulen djido krella. Kolla putchan lestar:
42020028	"Sikepaskro, o Mose tchinas: Te merell tiro phraal, kai romedino hi, un les hi kek tchawe, palle romedineress tu leskri romjat, te well tiro phraleske i tarnepen boldo.
42020029	Koi his kanna efta phrala. Ko phureder romedineras i djuwjat. Un job meras, un les his kek tchawe.
42020030	Un ko duito romedineras lat un job meras. Un les his kek tchawe.
42020031	Un ko triinto romedineras lat un meras. Un les his kek tchawe. Un kol wawar lauter, jek pal o wawar, romedineran lat ninna. Un jon meran lauter. Un lauteren his kek tchawe.
42020032	Pal lende meras ninna koi romni.
42020033	Kanna putchah mer tutar: Ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, koneskri romni hi li? Hake efta his laha romedino."
42020034	Penas o Jesus lenge: "I menshe ap kai phub romedinerenna un mukenn pen te romedinerell.
42020035	Kol mulen, kai o Dewel djido krella, te djiwenn le pash leste, kolla romedinerenn buder gar un wenna gar romedino.
42020036	Jon merenn buder gar, un hi har i bolepangre. Jon stan i mulendar pre. Doleske hi le o Debleskre tchawe.
42020037	Ninna o Mose tchinas, kai o Dewel i mulen djido krella. Har o Mose glan o bur tardo his, hoi chatchas, penas lo ap o Debleste: Tu hal o Abrahameskro Dewel, un o Isaakeskro Dewel, un o Jakobeskro Dewel.
42020038	Un me penau tumenge: Job hi gar o Dewel kolenge, kai mulo hi. Job hi o Dewel kol djidenge. Kalla lauter djiwenn leske."
42020039	Koi penan i biboldengre tchatchepangre: "Rai, kowa hi tchatcho, hoi tu penal."
42020040	Un jon trashan, te putchenn le lestar budeder.
42020041	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Har nai penenn jon, kai o baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well lo, o Davideskro tchawo hi?
42020042	O David tchinas an peskre gilja: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig,
42020043	te tchiwap kolen tel tire pire, kai hi chojedo ap tute!
42020044	Kate penell o David Rai ap leste. Har well lo nai leskro tchawo?"
42020045	Har i tsele menshe shunan, hoi o Jesus rakras, penas job ap peskre malende:
42020046	"Denn jak! Kowa, hoi kol biboldengre tchatchepangre krenna, hi gar mishto. Len hi lengste koola ap lende, te sikrenn le, te hi le o Debleskre menshe. Te djan le an o foro, kamenn le, te penenn i menshe Latcho diwes, mo rai! ap lende. Ninna kamenn le ap i pralstune beshepangre te beshell an i biboldengri kangri un ap i feteder beshepangre pash i baro chapen.
42020047	Jon lenn i khera kol djuwjendar krik, kolengre romma mulo hi. Te mangenn le o Debles, palle rakrenn le leha i raha tsiro, te dikenn i menshe, har patslo jon hi. O Dewel rakrell i phagi pral lende win, un jon lenna i bareder phagi har i wawar."
42021001	Un o Jesus dikas pre un dikas, har i brawele pengre lowe an i lowengri piri an o Debleskro baro kheer dre tchiwan.
42021002	Un job dikas kote ninna i tchorweli romni, kai hi lat buder kek romes. Joi das dui tikne kotja lowe o Debleske.
42021003	Koi penas o Jesus: "Me penau tumenge: Koi romni das budeder har kol tsele wawar, kai brawelo hi.
42021004	Kol wawar dan lowe dran pengro brawlepen. Kai tchorweli romni das halauter, hoi lat hi djipaske."
42021005	Un i menshe, kai trul leste tardo his, penan: "Dik, o Debleskro baro kheer! Hawe shukar barra un kutch koowa jon o Debleske anan." Koi penas o Jesus:
42021006	"Ko tsiro wella, kai lauter, hoi tumer kate dikenna, paash djala. Kek bar atchell ap i wawareste."
42021007	Koi putchan jon lestar: "Sikepaskro, kaana wella kowa? Har nai dikas mer, kai hi ko tsiro kai?"
42021008	Penas lo: "Denn jak! Mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Koi wenna bud mursha, kai penenna: Me hom o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job! Un jon penenn ninna: O tsiro hi kai! Me penau tumenge: Ma nashenn lenge palla!
42021009	An ko tsiro della bud baro kurepen, un i menshe hadenn pen pral pengre themeskre rajende. Ma trashenn! Ko hunte well jaake. Ko tsiro, kai i phub paash djala, well gar jaake sik."
42021010	Palle penas lo ap lende: "Ko tsiro wella, kai kurenn pen i pralstune pral bare themma wawar pralstunentsa. Un i menshe dran jek them marenn kolen an i wawar them.
42021011	Un kai te koi well i phub soreles trisslemen. An bud themma hi i menshen gar doha te chal, un baro nasslepen well ap lende. Un jon dikenn i baro koowa ap o bolepen, hoi krell lenge bari daar.
42021012	Glan ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella, lenn jon tumen palla, un taprenn tumen. Jon anenn tumen glan i tchatchepangre an i biboldengre kangria un witsrenn tumen an o stilepen. Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske anenn le tumen glan i bare rajende un glan i pralstunende, te rakrenn jon i phagi win pral tumende.
42021013	Jon te krenn kowa lauter tumentsa, palle rakrenn nai mandar.
42021014	Ma mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal, hoi tumer hunte penenn kol rajenge!
42021015	Me dau tumen ko goswepen, un penau tumenge, hoi tumer hunte penenn. Un palle djinenn le buder gar, hoi te penenn le.
42021016	Un tumaro dad un tumari dai, tumare phrala un phenja, un tumare wawar menshe phukrenn ap tumende, ninna tumare mala. Un mank tumende hi sawe, kai wenn maredo.
42021017	Hakeno hi chojedo ap tumende doleske, kai patsenn tumer ap mande.
42021018	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kek bal ap tumaro shero djal nashedo.
42021019	Atchenn soreles an o patsepen, un tumer lenn ko tchatcho djipen!"
42021020	"Te dikenn tumer, kai bud lurde trul o foro Jerusalem tardo hi, palle djinenn tumer, kai jon ko foro paash krenna.
42021021	Palle hunte nashenn i tsele menshe dran o them Judea pral an i berge. Un koon an o foro hi, hunte djal jaake sik har djala dran win. Un koon win ap o them hi, hunte djal gar an o foro dre.
42021022	An kol diwessa well o Debleskri choli ap i menshende tele. Palle well lauter tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi.
42021023	Koi bibacht hi bari kol djuwjenge, kai hi an wawar koowa, ninna kolenge, kai hi len i tarnepen. O Debleskri choli well pral i tsele menshende an kau them. Un len hi i pharo tsiro.
42021024	Bud wenna maredo o chareha. Wawar wenna pandlo un wenna an i wawar themma anlo. Un o foro Jerusalem well kol menshendar khetne stakedo, kai wenna dran wawar themma. Kowa djal jaake raha, har o Dewel mukell len kowa te krell."
42021025	"Ap o kham un ap o mondo un ap i bolepangre momlia dikenn tumer baro koowa. Pral i menshende an bud themma well i bari traash, te dikenn le, har well o baro pani diwjo un hadell pes pral un dell bari gole.
42021026	I tsele menshe ap i phub hi paash-mulo i trashatar pral kowa, hoi lauter ap lende wella. I bolepaskri soor perell khetne.
42021027	Un palle dikenn i tsele menshe o Menshengro Tchawes, har well lo ap i wolka bari sorjaha un railepen.
42021028	Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, awenn soreles un trashenn gar! I tsiro hi palle koi, kai o Dewel lell tumen dran o tchilatchepen un dran o merepen win."
42021029	Un o Jesus penas lenge sawe laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: "Dikenn ap o faigetikro ruk un ap i wawar ruka!
42021030	Te wenn i ruka senelo, palle djinenn tumer, te well sik o nijal.
42021031	Jaake hi kowa ninna koleha, pral kowa rakrom. Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, palle djinenn, te well ko tsiro sik, kai o Dewel peskre menshen dran o tchilatchepen win lella, un job o rai pral i tseli phub hi.
42021032	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol menshe, kai an ko tsiro djiwenna, dikenna kowa lauter pengre jakentsa.
42021033	O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Mire laba atchenna hako tsiro."
42021034	"Denn garda, te well tumaro dji gar pherdo phubjakro koowa, jaake te bistrenn o Debles! Pijenn tumen gar mato! Ma darenn tumaro djipaske! Denn jak, te well ko diwes gar ap jek kopo ap tumende jaake, te han tumer tapedo!
42021035	Djinenn! Ko diwes well pral lauterende, kai djiwenna ap i phub.
42021036	Denn jak hako tsiro! Mangenn o Deblestar, te wenn tumer sorelo an o patsepen tardo, un wenn mishto win dran ko tchilatcho tsiro, hoi wella! Jaake hunte trashenn tumer gar o Menshengro Tchawestar, te well lo pale."
42021037	Hako diwes rakras o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer. I rati djas job pash koi berga, hoi kharella djeteskri berga, un atchas koi.
42021038	Taissarlake wan bud menshe an o Debleskro baro kheer, te shunenn jon, hoi o Jesus penella.
42022001	His glan kol diwessa, kai i bibolde kek maro chan, kai shutlo jarro dren hi. Kol diwessa kharenna Passa.
42022002	Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre rodan i drom, har jon nai marenn o Jesuses. Jon kaman les gar glan kol bud menshende te taprell. Kolendar daran le.
42022003	Koi djas o beng an o Judas Iskariot dre. Kowa his jek kol deesh-te-dujendar.
42022004	O Judas djas pash kol bare rashajende un pash i pralstune lurdende, un rakras kolentsa, har job nai phukrell ap leste.
42022005	Un jon his bachtelo pral kowa, un kaman les lowe te dell, te nai taprenn le o Jesuses.
42022006	"Mishto" penas o Judas, un rodas i latcho tsiro, te dell lo les an lengre wasta, jaake te djinenn i menshe kowa gar.
42022007	His an kol diwessa, kai i bibolde ko maro chana, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi. Un ko diwes was, kai hunte marenn le i bakro hako khereske.
42022008	Koi bitchras o Jesus o Petres un o Johannes an o foro Jerusalem, un penas: "Djan an ko foro un krenn o chapen menge!"
42022009	Un jon putchan lestar: "Kai kameh tu, te kras o chapen?"
42022010	Penas lo ap lende: "Shunenn, te wenn tumer an o foro, palle dikenn tumer i murshes. Kowa hidjell i khoro pani. Djan koleste palla an ko kheer, kai job dre djala!
42022011	Kote penenn o rajeske an ko kheer: Maro sikepaskro putchell tutar: Kai hi koi isema, kai nai chau me ko bakro mire malentsa?
42022012	Un job sikrell tumende i bari isema, pral an ko kheer. Kote hi beshepangre tardo. Kote krenn o chapen!"
42022013	Un jon djan kote, un hatsan lauter jaake, har o Jesus lenge penas. Un jon kran o chapen.
42022014	Har ko tchatcho tsiro was, beshas job pes tele. Un kol deesh-te-dui bitchepangre beshan pen leha.
42022015	Un job penas ap lende: "Kawa chapen kamom me o tselo djijestar te chap tumentsa glan ko tsiro, kai me hunte lap bud duka ap mande.
42022016	Me penau tumenge: Me chau kau chapen buder gar jaake raha, bis te well ko tsiro, kai kowa tchatcho was, hoi kau chapen sikrella. Palle chau les tumentsa pash o Debleste an o bolepen."
42022017	Un o Jesus las o khoro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, un penas ap lende: "Ake, lenn un pijenn halauter kai mool!
42022018	Me penau tumenge: Me pijau buder gar i mool jaake raha, bis te well ko diwes, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral halauter."
42022019	Un job las i kotar maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, phagas ko maro, das kowa lende, un penas ap lende: "Ake, chan! Kau maro hi miro mass. Me dau man tumenge. Te hom buder gar koi, krenn kowa pale un pale, te well tumenge an tumaro shero, hoi me krom tumenge!"
42022020	Pal o chapen las lo o khoro un penas: "Kai mool an kau khoro hi miro rat, hoi tumenge ratau. Jaake krau i newo drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna."
42022021	Palle penas o Jesus: "O phukepaskro hi mantsa ap kaja chapaskri beshdo.
42022022	Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hunte merap. Ninna te hi mange glan diklo, te djap kau drom, hawi bibacht well ap koleste, kai ap mande phukrella!"
42022023	Un jek putchas i wawarestar: "Koon hi kowa mendar, kai krell kowa?"
42022024	Un o Jesuseskre mala tchingran pen, koon lendar o bareder hi.
42022025	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "I bare rajen ap kai phub hi penepaske pral i menshende an pengre themma. Kolla hunte shunenn ap lende un hunte budrenn lenge. Un kol pralstune kamenn, te penenn i menshe lenge, har latche mursha jon hi.
42022026	Me penau tumenge: Ma krenn kowa jaake har kolla! O bareder mashkral tumende hunte well jaake har o tikneder tumendar. Un kowa, kai kamell o pralstuno te well, hunte well o telstuno, kai budrell i wawarenge.
42022027	Koon kol dujendar hi bareder: Kowa, kai pash i chapaskri beshdo hi? Kowa, kai tchiwell o chapen ap i chapaskri? Tchatchepaha, kowa, kai pash i chapaskri beshdo hi! Un me hom mashkral tumende har jek, kai tumenge budrella.
42022028	Tumer rikran pash mande win an kol diwessa, har i menshe miro djipen phares kran.
42022029	Un me kamau, te wenn tumer mantsa khetne raja, jaake har miro dad an o bolepen kamella, te wap o baro rai pral i menshende.
42022030	Un tumer chana un pijenna mantsa kote, kai me o baro rai hom, un han beshdo ap rajeskre beshepangre, un penenn o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, kai wenna o deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawendar."
42022031	"Simon, Simon, shun, hoi me tuke penau: O beng las tumen an o jak un kamas te dikell, har sorelo tumaro patsepen hi.
42022032	Me mangom tuke pash mo Debleste, te djas tu gar o Debleskro dromestar tele. Un te djah tu pale ap o tchatcho drom, kre tire phralen soreles an o patsepen!"
42022033	Penas o Petro: "Rai, me djoms tuha an o stilepen un an o merepen."
42022034	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Petro, me penau tuke, kai rati dell o bashno gar gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar."
42022035	Un job penas ap peskre malende: "Har me tumen ap o drom bitchrom, his tumen kek lowe, witar kek gono un kek kircha pash tumende. His tumen bok? His tumen trush?" Penan le: "Na-a, gar jek kopo!"
42022036	Penas lo: "Kanna lenn lowe tumentsa! Lenn ninna i gono peha, kai tchiwenn tumer tumare koola dre! Un bikrenn tumari plashka, te ginenn tumenge i charo!
42022037	Me penau tumenge: Hi tchindlo pral mande an o Debleskro lab: Jon penenn lestar, te hi lo jek lendar, kai tchilatcho hi. Tchatchepaha, lauter, hoi pral mande tchindlo was, wella tchatcho."
42022038	Penan leskre mala ap leste: "Rai, kate hi dui chare." Penas lo: "Kanna hi doha!"
42022039	Un o Jesus djas pash i djeteskri berga, jaake har job kowa bud kope kras. Un peskre mala djan leha.
42022040	Un har jon pash i djeteskri berga wan, penas lo ap lende: "Mangenn o Deblestar, te nai anell tumen tchi o Debleskro dromestar tele!"
42022041	Un o Jesus kokres djas i tikno kotar dureder, un witsras pes ap i tchanga,
42022042	un mangas o Debles: "Tata, te kameh tu, muk kek duka ap mande te well! Kre gar, har me kamau. Kre jaake, har tu kameh!"
42022043	Un i Debleskro bolepaskro was pash leste dran o bolepen un das les soor.
42022044	Un o Jesus mangas o Debles sorleder, un rat nashas leskro sherestar tele ap i phub, jaake soreles was i daar ap leste.
42022045	Un palle stas lo pre un djas pash peskre malende. Jon wan khino un sowan, jaake bibachtelo hi le. Har job dikas, te sowan le,
42022046	penas lo ap lende: "Hoske sowenn tumer? Stenn pre un mangenn o Deblestar, te nai anell tumen tchi o Debleskro dromestar tele!"
42022047	Har o Jesus jaake rakras, koi wan bud menshe. Glan kol menshende djas o Judas. Kowa his jek o Jesuseskre deesh-te-dui malendar. Job djas pash o Jesuseste, un kamas les i tchum te dell.
42022048	O Jesus penas ap leste: "Judas, kameh tu ap o Menshengro Tchaweste phukrell un deh les i tchum?"
42022049	Har o Jesuseskre mala, kai trul leste tardo hi, dikan, hoi koi djas, putchan jon lestar: "Rai, das mer i chareha ap lende pre?"
42022050	Un jek lendar las o charo, un das i klisteske o tchatcho kand tele. Kowa his i klisto, kai budrell o baro rashajeske.
42022051	Koi penas o Jesus: "Muk tele! Kanna hi doha!" Un job tchiwas peskro wast ap o kand ko murshestar, un kras les sasto.
42022052	Un o Jesus penas ap i bare rashajende un ap i pralstunende pral o Debleskro baro kheer un ap i biboldengre phureder, kai pash leste wan: "Tumer wan charentsa un kashtentsa pash mande, har te woms i marepaskro.
42022053	Hako diwes homs pash tumende an o Debleskro baro kheer, un tumer tapran man gar. Kanna hi tumaro tsiro. Kanna hi o benges penepaske."
42022054	Un jon pandan les un anan les an o baro rajeskro kheer. O Petro djas lenge palla, un atchas i kotar pal lende.
42022055	Pash ko kheer kran i lurde i jag, un beshan pen lauter khetne. Un o Petro beshas pes pash lende.
42022056	Un i budepaskretsa his pash i jag beshdo, dikas les un penas: "Kowa his ninna pash o Jesuseste."
42022057	O Petro das buchoste un penas: "Romnija, me prindjrau les gar."
42022058	I tikno tsiro koi pre dikas i wawar ap leste, un penas: "Tu hal ninna jek kolendar." Un o Petro penas: "Romeha, me hom gar jek lendar."
42022059	Un i tsiro koi pre penas pale i wawar: "Tchatchepaha, ko mursh his ninna pash leste. Job hi dran o them Galilea."
42022060	Koi penas o Petro: "Romeha, me djinau gar, hoi tu peneh." Un har job kowa penas, das o bashno gole.
42022061	Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, un dikas o Petres an i jaka. Un o Petreske wan kolla laba an o shero, hoi o Jesus ap leste penas: "O bashno dell gar gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar."
42022062	Un o Petro djas win, un rowas soreles.
42022063	Kol mursha, kai dan garda ap o Jesuseste, san pral leste, un dan les dawa.
42022064	Un jon pandan leskre jaka, un penan: "Pen menge, koon das tut!"
42022065	Un jon praassan les.
42022066	Un har o diwes was, mukan i biboldengre phureder, i bare rashaja un i tchatchepangre o Jesuses pash pende te anell.
42022067	Un penan ap leste: "Hal tu o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Pen menge!" Penas lo: "Me te penau les tumenge, patsenn tumer man gar.
42022068	Un te putchau tumendar tchomone, penenn tumer tchi.
42022069	Ko tsiro well sik, kai me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hom beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o sorelo Deblestar."
42022070	Penan jon: "Hal tu o Debleskro tchawo?" Penas job: "Awa, hi jaake har tumer penan. Me hom kowa."
42022071	Penan le mashkral pende: "Menge hi kanna doha. Mer shunam dran leskro mui, hoi job penas. Kek hunte penell menge budeder."
42023001	Un lauter stan pre, un anan o Jesuses pash o Pilateste.
42023002	Un jon anan bud koowa ap leste pre, un penan: "Kau mursh kras mare menshen diwjo. Job penas, te das mer o baro rajeste an o foro Rom buder kek lowe. Un job penas ninna, kai hi lo o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."
42023003	Koi putchas o Pilato lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?" Penas lo: "Awa, hi jaake har tu penal."
42023004	Koi penas o Pilato ap kol bare rashajende un ap kol wawar menshende, kai kote tardo hi: "Me hatsom kek doosh ap leste."
42023005	Jon mukan gar tele, te anenn le tchilatcho koowa ap o Jesuseste, un penan: "Job kras i menshen diwjo an o them Galilea, un an o tselo them Judea, un an o foro Jerusalem ninna."
42023006	Har o Pilato kowa shunas, putchas job: "Hi kau mursh dran o them Galilea?"
42023007	Un har job shunas, kai o Jesus dran o them Galilea hi, kai o Herodes o baro rai hi, mukas lo o Jesuses pash koleste te anell. O Herodes his an ko tsiro ninna an o foro Jerusalem.
42023008	Un o Herodes his bachtelo, har job o Jesuses dikas. Job shunas lestar un kamas les i raha tsiro te dikell. Job kamas, te krell o Jesus leske i baro koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella.
42023009	Kanna, har o Jesus glan leste tardo hi, putchas job o Jesusestar bud koowa. O Jesus penas tchi pale.
42023010	I bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre his koi pashal tardo, un anan bud tchilatcho koowa ap o Jesuseste.
42023011	Un o Herodes un leskre lurde san pral leste, riwan leske i rajeskri plashka an, un mukan les pale pash o Pilateste te anell.
42023012	Un ap ko diwes wan o Herodes un o Pilato mala. Glan ko diwes his jon chojedo jek ap i wawareste.
42023013	O Pilato das i bare rashajen, i pralstune bibolden, un i tsele menshen khetne gole,
42023014	un penas ap lende: "Tumer anan kau murshes pash mande, un penan mange, te krell lo i menshen diwjo. Me kamom lestar te shunell, hoi job koi pre penella, un hatsom kek doosh ap leste, hoi tumer ap leste pre anan.
42023015	Un o Herodes hatsas witar kek doosh ap leste. Doleske bitchras job les pale pash mende. Un kanna shunenn, hoi me tumenge penau: Kawa mursh kras tchi, te hunte well lo maredo.
42023016	-
42023017	Me mukau les dawa te dell, un mukau les te djal."
42023018	Koi dan i tsele menshe gole: "Mare les, un de men o Barabes!"
42023019	O Barabas his i stildo. Job kras an o foro Jerusalem i baro tchingepen, un das i murshes temerl.
42023020	O Pilato kamas o Jesuses te djal mukell. Un job das gole, te kamell lo o Jesuses te djal mukell.
42023021	I menshe dan pale gole: "De les ap o trushel! Ap o trushel leha!"
42023022	Un o Pilato putchas lendar o triinto kopo: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job? Jaake har me kowa dikau, kras job tchi, te hunte well job maredo. Me dau les dawa, un mukau les te djal."
42023023	Jon dan sorleder gole, te well lo ap o trushel dino. Un har jon gar tele mukan, shunas o Pilato ap lende un penas:
42023024	"Me krau, hoi tumer kamenna." Un job penas i lurdenge, te denn le les ap o trushel, te merell lo kote.
42023025	Un o Pilato mukas koles dran o stilepen win te djal, kai kras i baro tchingepen an o foro un maras jekes. O Jesuses das job an lengre wasta.
42023026	Un har jon o Jesuses krik anan, te well job ap o trushel dino, tapran le i murshes ap o drom. Kowa budras win ap i kotar phub un his kanna ap o drom khere. Leskro lab hi Simon, un job his dran ko foro Kirene. Ap koleste tchiwan jon o trushel, te hidjell lo kowa o Jesuseske palla.
42023027	Un bud mursha un djuwja djan o Jesuseske palla ap o drom. Kolla dan bari gole un rowan.
42023028	Un o Jesus risras pes trujal un penas ap lende: "Djuwjale dran o foro Jerusalem, rowenn gar pral mande! Rowenn pral tumende un pral tumare tchawende!
42023029	Ko tsiro wella, kai i menshe penenna: Bachtele hi kol djuwja, kai lan kek tarnepen.
42023030	Ap ko tsiro penenn le ap i berge: Perenn pral mende!
42023031	Te krenn jon kawa i senelo kashteha, hoi krenn jon palle i phuro kashteha?"
42023032	Ninna dui tchilatche mursha wan o Jesuseha glan o foro anlo, te wenn le kote ap o trushel dino.
42023033	Har jon lauter ap ko kotar them wan, hoi kharella Muleskro Shero, dan jon o Jesuses ap o trushel, un kol dui tchilatche murshen ninna. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar.
42023034	Koi penas o Jesus: "Miro dad, le i doosh kolendar krik, kai man ap o trushel dan! Jon djinenn gar, hoi jon kran." Un i lurde khelan pral leskre koola, te dikenn le, hoi hakeno lella.
42023035	Un i menshe, kai koi pashal tardo his, dikan kowa lauter, hoi o Jesuseha djas. Kol pralstune bibolde, kai kote tardo hi, san pral leste, un penan: "Wawaren las job dran o merepen win. Te hi lo tchatchepaha o Kristo, ko baro rai, kones o Dewel win rodas, te well lo pash mende, palle nai djals job o trushelestar tele."
42023036	Un ninna kol lurde san pral leste, un dan les shutli mool te pijell.
42023037	Un jon penan ap leste: "Tu te hal o baro rai pral i biboldende, ab o trushelestar tele!"
42023038	Un pral leste ap i kasht his tchindlo: Kowa hi i o baro rai pral i biboldende.
42023039	Jek kol tchilatche murshendar, kai ap o trushel dino his, praassas o Jesuses, un penas: "Te hal tu ko Kristo, ab o trushelestar tele, un le men ninna tele!"
42023040	Ko wawar tchingras ap leste un penas: "Muk tele! Dareh tu gar o Deblestar, kanna kai hal ap o trushel?
42023041	Kawa hi mari phagi koleske, hoi kram. Mer anah tchatchepaha doosh ap mende. Kawa mursh kras kek tchilatchepen."
42023042	Un job penas ap o Jesuseste: "Jesus, ma biste man, te hal tu kote, kai tu o baro rai hal!"
42023043	Un o Jesus penas ap leste: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Kau diwes hal tu mantsa an o Debleskri shukar baar."
42023044	His nai deesh-te-dujenge, koi was o diwes kalo har i rati an o tselo them. Un kowa atchas jaake bis trinenge.
42023045	Un o wudar an o Debleskro baro kheer, kai his kerdo dran kutch pesso thann, koja djas an dui kotja mashkral paash.
42023046	Un o Jesus das bari gole: "Miro dad, an tire wasta tchiwau me miro djipen!" Un palle meras lo.
42023047	Har ko pralstuno lurdo dikas, hoi koi djas, sharas lo o Debles un penas: "Tchatchepaha, kawa his i latcho mursh."
42023048	Kol menshenge, kai kote wan un lauter dikan, djas kowa jaake phares an o dji, te dan pen jon ap o betch, un djan penge le.
42023049	Un o Jesuseskre mala un kol djuwja, kai wan leha dran o them Galilea, kolla his i kotar krik tardo un dikan kowa lauter.
42023050	Koi was i mursh, ko kharella Josef. Kowa his tchatcho un latcho. Job his jek kol pralstune biboldendar,
42023051	un kamas gar, te well o Jesus ap o trushel dino. Job his dran i biboldengro foro Arimatia. Un job dikas ap o Debleste, te well ko tsiro, kai hakeno dikell, kai o Dewel o baro rai hi.
42023052	Job djas pash o Pilateste un mangas lestar, te denn le les o mulo Jesuses.
42023053	Un o Josef las o Jesuses o trushelestar tele, un tchiwas les an i laintikro kotar, un tchiwas les an i mulengro kheer, kowa his an i baro bar dino. Kote his gomme kek mensho dre tchiddo.
42023054	Kowa his glan o Debleskro diwes, har o kham tele djas.
42023055	Kol djuwja, kai wan o Jesuseha dran o them Galilea, kolla djan o Josefeske palla, un dikan, har tchiwas lo o mulo Jesuses an i mulengro kheer.
42023056	Un jon djan an o foro pale, un kran kutch djet, hoi mishto sungella, te makenn le les dre. Ap o Debleskro diwes kran le kek budi, jaake har kowa pash i biboldende hi.
42024001	Sik taissarlake, pal o Debleskro diwes, lan le kutch djet, hoi jon kokres kran, un djan pash ko mulengro kheer.
42024002	Kote dikan le, kai ko baro bar buder gar glan o mulengro kheer tchiddo hi.
42024003	Un jon djan dre, un hatsan gar o mulo trupo o rajestar Jesus.
42024004	Har jon koi tardo his, un djinan gar, hoi te krenn le, his kote ap jek kopo dui mursha tardo. Un lengre ripja his railes bijalo.
42024005	Un i traash was ap i djuwjende. Un darjatar dikan le ap i phub. Kol dui mursha penan ap lende: "Hoske rodenn tumer kol djides pash i mulende?
42024006	Job hi gar kai. O Dewel kras les i mulendar djido. Bistran tumer kowa, hoi job tumenge penas, har job an o them Galilea his?
42024007	Job penas tumenge: O Menshengro Tchawo hunte well an i tchilatche wasta dino, un ap o trushel dino. Un pal triin diwessa stell lo i mulendar pre."
42024008	Un kol laba wan pale an lengro shero.
42024009	Koi djan jon krik dran ko mulengro kheer, un djan pale an o foro, un penan kowa lauter kol deesh-te-jek Jesuseskre malenge, un ninna kol tsele wawarenge, kai pash lende hi.
42024010	Kol djuwja his i Maria Magdalena, i Joanna un i Maria, ko Jakobeskri dai un wawar.
42024011	Un kowa, hoi i djuwja penan, his i murshenge dinelo rakepen. Un jon patsan kol djuwjen gar.
42024012	O Petro stas pre, un djas pash ko mulengro kheer, dikas dre, hatsas kol laintikre kotja ap i rig tchiddo, un djas peske. Job djinas gar, hoi te penell lo.
42024013	Ap kau diwes djan dui o Jesuseskre malendar an ko gab Emmaus. Kowa his deesh-te-dui kilometarja glan o foro Jerusalem.
42024014	Ap o drom rakran le pral lauter, hoi an o foro Jerusalem djas.
42024015	Har jon jaake rakran, was o Jesus pash lende, un djas lentsa.
42024016	Jon prindjran les gar, har te wans lengre jaka pandlo.
42024017	Koi putchas lo lendar: "Pral hawo koowa rakrenn tumer?" Koi was lenge ropaske, un jon atchan tardo.
42024018	Un ko jek, kai kharella Kleopas, penas ap leste: "Djineh tu gar, hoi an kal diwessa an o foro Jerusalem lauter djas? Halauter djinenn kowa. Hal tu i wi-themari un djineh kowa gar?"
42024019	Un o Jesus penas: "Hoi djas?" Un jon penan: "Kowa, hoi kran le o Jesuseha dran Nazaret. Job his o Debleskro rakepaskro, ap koleste o Debleskri soor his. O Dewel bitchras les. Kowa dikas hakeno ap kowa, hoi job penas un kras.
42024020	Mare bare rashaja un pralstune rakran i phagi pral leste win, te well lo ap o trushel dino. Un jon dan les ap o trushel.
42024021	Mer patsam, kai o Dewel bitchras les, te lell job i Israeleskre menshen dran i Remarjengre wasta win. Kowa djas lauter glan triin diwessa.
42024022	Un kau diwes penan menge i djuwja tchomone, kai atchas menge o rakepen krik. Kol djuwja his taissarlake pash o mulengro kheer,
42024023	un hatsan o mulo Jesuses gar. Jon wan pale pash mende, un penan: Mer dikam bolepangren, un kolla penan: O Jesus djiwella!
42024024	Mursha mendar djan pash ko mulengro kheer, un lauter his jaake, har kolla djuwja kowa penan. Les dikan jon gar."
42024025	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer haiwan tchi. An tumaro dji djal tchi dre. Hoske patsenn tumer kowa gar, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro penan?
42024026	Kolla penan: O Kristo, ko baro rai, kones o Dewel bitchras, hunte las duka ap peste, te djas lo an peskro railepen."
42024027	Koi penas o Jesus lenge, hoi o Mose un i tsele Debleskre rakepangre pral leste tchinan.
42024028	Un jaake wan le pash o gab Emmaus, un o Jesus kras jaake, har te kamell lo dureder te djal.
42024029	Jon rikran les pale, un penan ap leste: "Atch pash mende! I rati wella, un well tamlo." Koi djas job lentsa an o kheer.
42024030	Har jon chan, las o Jesus ko maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, phagas ko maro an kotja, un das kowa lende.
42024031	Koi haiwan le, kowa hi o Jesus. Un ap jek kopo dikan le les buder gar.
42024032	Un jon penan mashkral pende: "Djas kowa gar an maro dji, har job ap o drom mentsa rakras, un menge penas, hoi an o Debleskro lab pral leste tchindlo hi?"
42024033	Un jon stan pre, un jaake sik har djala, djan le pale an o foro Jerusalem. Kote his kol deesh-te-jek un kol wawar o Jesuseskre malendar khetne.
42024034	Un kolla, kai kote khetne hi, penan lenge: "O Dewel kras tchatchepaha o Jesuses djido, un o Simon dikas les."
42024035	Koi ginan kol dui lenge dre, hoi lenge ap o drom djas, un har jon les prindjran, har job o maro phagas.
42024036	Har jon kowa penan, his ap jek kopo o Jesus mashkral lende tardo, un penas ap lende: "O Debleskri bacht tumenge!"
42024037	Jon patsan, kai dikenn le i mules. Un i daar was ap lende.
42024038	Koi penas lo ap lende: "Hoi dikenn tumer jaake darenes? Hoske putchenn tumen an tumaro shero, koon me hom?
42024039	Dikenn mire wasta un mire herja! Me hom les. Taprenn man an, un haiwenn: Kek mules hi mass un kokale ap peste, har tumer les pash mande dikenna!"
42024040	Un har job kowa penas, sikras job lende peskre wasta un pire.
42024041	Jon nashte patsan gar, kai hi o Jesus glan lende tardo, jaake bachtelo his le. Har djinan le gar, hoi te penenn le, putchas lo lendar: "Hi tumen tchomone te chal?"
42024042	Koi dan le les i kotar peklo matcho.
42024043	Job las kowa un chas les glan lende.
42024044	Un job penas: "Har me pash tumende homs, penom me ap tumende: Halauter hunte well tchatcho, hoi o Mose tchinas, un hoi o Debleskre rakepangre pral mande penan, un hoi an o Debleskre gilja tchindlo hi."
42024045	Un palle das lo len goswepen, te haiwenn le o Debleskro lab,
42024046	un penas ap lende: "Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, kowa hunte lell duka ap peste, un pal triin diwessa stell lo i mulendar pre.
42024047	Un an peskro lab hunte well i menshenge an hake themma penlo, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom, jaake kai lell o Dewel lengri doosh lendar krik. Penenn kowa i menshenge an o foro Jerusalem, un palle an i wawar themma!
42024048	Tumer dikan kowa lauter, un hunte penenn kowa i menshenge dureder!
42024049	Un me bitchrau tumenge koles, kolestar miro dad penas, te well job pash tumende. Atchenn an o foro Jerusalem jaake raha, bis te lan i soor dran o bolepen!"
42024050	Un job djas pash o gab Betani peskre malentsa. Koi hadas lo peskre wasta un penas: "O Dewel atchell tumentsa!"
42024051	Un har job jaake rakras, djas lo lendar un was pral an o bolepen hadedo.
42024052	Un jon sharan les, un djan bachteles pale an o foro Jerusalem.
42024053	Un hako tsiro djan le an o Debleskro baro kheer, un sharan o Debles.
43001001	Har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his, his o Lab koi. Kowa, kai hi o Lab, his pash o Debleste. Un job his o Dewel.
43001002	Job his pash o Debleste, har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his.
43001003	Khetne leha kras o Dewel o bolepen un i phub. Tchi hi koi, hoi gar leha kerdo was.
43001004	An leste his o djipen. Un ko djipen his i bari momeli i menshenge.
43001005	Koi momeli chatchella an i rat. Un i rat nai kras koi momeli gar win.
43001006	Koi was i mursh, ko was o Deblestar bitchedo. Leskro lab his Johanni.
43001007	Job was, te penell lo hakeneske, koon koi bari momeli hi, te patsenn halauter ap koi momeli.
43001008	Job his gar koi momeli. Job was, te penell lo, koon koi momeli hi.
43001009	Koi tchatchi momeli was ap i phub, te chatchell li hakeneske.
43001010	Kowa, kai hi o Lab, his ap i phub, un i phub was leha kerdo. Un i menshe ap i phub prindjran les gar.
43001011	Job was an peskro them, un leskre menshe lan les gar pre.
43001012	Halauter kolla, kai lan les pre un ap leste patsan, kolen das job i soor, te wenn jon o Debleskre tchawe.
43001013	Kowa wan le gar, har jon boldo wan. O newo djipen was gar dran o menshengro kamlepen. Na-a, o newo djipen lan le kokres o Deblestar.
43001014	Ko lab was i mensho, un djiwas pash mende. Un mer dikam leskro railepen un leskri soor, kai o Dewel peskro tchawes das. Kowa his pherdo latchepen un tchatchepen.
43001015	O Johanni rakras lestar, un das gole: "Job hi kowa, kolestar penom: Kowa, kai pal mande wella, hi pral mande. Job his glan mande koi."
43001016	Mer halauter lam pale un pale bud latchepen lestar, kai les jaake bud hi.
43001017	O Mose das men kol laba, kai penenna, har mer djiwas. O Jesus Kristo anas menge o Debleskro latchepen un tchatchepen.
43001018	Kek mensho dikas o Debles. O Debleskro tchawo kokres sikras men, koon o Dewel hi. Job hi jek o Debleha.
43001019	-
43001020	Har bitchran i pralstune bibolde dran o foro Jerusalem i rashajen un i Levitarjen pash o Johanneste, te putchenn le lestar: "Koon hal tu?" penas job glan i tsele menshende, kai kote tardo hi: "Tchatchepaha, me hom gar o Kristo."
43001021	"Koon hal tu?" kaman jon te djinell. "Hal tu o Elija?" putchan le lestar. "Na-a," penas lo, "kowa hom me gar!" "Hal tu o Debleskro rakepaskro, kolestar penlo was, te well job? putchan le lestar." "Na-a," penas job.
43001022	Jon penan ap leste: "Pen menge, koon tu hal, te penas mer kowa kolenge, kai bitchran men. Hoi peneh tu tchatchepaha, koon tu hal?"
43001023	Job penas: "Me hom kowa, kai dell gole an o mulo them: Lenn halauter krik, hoi o Debleske an o drom tchiddo hi. Jaake penas kowa o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, glan i raha tsiro."
43001024	Kolla, kai wan pash o Johanneste, his i Farisarjendar bitchedo.
43001025	Jon putchan lestar: "Te hal tu gar o Kristo, witar gar o Elija, un witar gar ko Debleskro rakepaskro, kolestar penlo was, te well job, hoske thoweh tu i menshen an o pani o Debleske?"
43001026	Penas o Johanni lenge: "Me thowau len an o pani. Mashkral tumende hi jek, koles prindjrenn tumer gar.
43001027	Kowa well pal mande. Me hom gar mishto doha, te krap leskre tircha pre."
43001028	Har o Johanni kowa rakras, his job an o foro Betani ap i wawar rig o panjestar Jordan, kote, kai thowas lo i menshen an o pani.
43001029	Ap o wawar diwes dikas o Johanni, kai o Jesus pash leste wella. Un o Johanni penas: "Dikenn, kawa hi o Debleskro bakro, kai lell i menshengri doosh ap peste.
43001030	Kawa hi ko mursh, kai penom lestar: Pal mande wella i mursh, ko his pral mande. Job his koi, har me gar koi homs.
43001031	Me djinom gar, koon kowa hi. Me wom, te thowap i menshen an Israel an o pani, te sikrap nai len, koon job hi."
43001032	Un o Johanni penas: "Tchatchepaha, me dikom o Debleskro Ducho har i parno tchirklo, kai was dran o bolepen pral tele, un atchas ap leste.
43001033	Un me prindjrom les gar. Kowa, kai bitchras man, te thowap i menshen an o pani, kowa penas ap mande: Tu dikeh, har well o Debleskro Ducho ap i mursheste un atchell ap leste. Kowa hi ko mursh, kai dell i menshen o Debleskro Ducho.
43001034	Me dikom kowa halauter. Doleske nai penau me ninna: Kau mursh hi o Debleskro tchawo."
43001035	O wawar diwes his o Johanni pale koi tardo. Dui leskre malendar his pash leste.
43001036	Un har job dikas, kai o Jesus koi djal, penas lo: "Dikenn, kawa hi o Debleskro bakro!"
43001037	Har kol dui kowa shunan, djan le o Jesuseske palla.
43001038	Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, un dikas len. Un job putchas lendar: "Hoi rodenn tumer?" Penan jon: "Sikepaskro, kai chah un soweh tu?"
43001039	"Awenn un dikenn!" penas job. Koi djan kol dui leha, un dikan, kai job chala un sowella. His deeshenge. Un jon atchan ko diwes pash leste.
43001040	Jek kol dujendar, kai shunan, hoi o Johanni penas, un o Jesuseha djan, his o Andreas. Leskro phraal his o Simon Petro.
43001041	Kowa hatsas peskro phrales Simon, un penas ap leste: "Mer hatsam ko baro rajes, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job." Kowa kharella ap grichtikes Kristo.
43001042	Un o Andreas anas peskro phrales pash o Jesuseste. Har o Jesus koles dikas, penas lo: "Tu hal o Simon, ko Johanneskro tchawo. Tu khareh kanna Kefas." Ko kharella baro bar.
43001043	O wawar diwes kamas o Jesus an o them Galilea te djal. Ap o drom tapras lo o Filipo, un penas ap leste: "Dja mantsa!"
43001044	O Filipo his dran o foro Betsaida. Ninna o Andreas un o Petro his dran ko foro.
43001045	O Filipo hatsas o Natanael un penas ap leste: "Mer hatsam koles, pral koleste o Mose an peskre lila tchinas. Ninna o Debleskre rakepangre tchinan pral leste. Job kharella Jesus un hi dran o foro Nazaret. Leskro dad hi o Josef."
43001046	Un o Natanael penas ap leste: "Dran Nazaret nai well tchi, hoi mishto hi." "Am un dik!" penas o Filipo.
43001047	Har o Jesus dikas, kai o Natanael was, penas job: "Dikenn, koi well i tchatcho Israelitari. Un kek chochepen hi an leste."
43001048	"Har nai djineh tu, koon me hom?" putchas o Natanael lestar. Penas o Jesus: "Har tu tel o faigetikro ruk hals, dikom me tut, glan ko tsiro, kai o Filipo das tut gole."
43001049	"Sikepaskro," penas o Natanael, "tu hal o Debleskro tchawo. Tu hal o baro rai pral Israel."
43001050	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Me penom tuke: Me dikom tut tel ko ruk. Doleske patseh tu. Tu dikeh bareder koowa, har kawa.
43001051	Kowa hi tchatcho, hoi me tumenge penau: Tumer dikenn har o bolepen pre djala. Un o Debleskre bolepangre djan pral un wenn pale tele ap o Menshengro Tchaweste."
43002001	Pal dui diwessa kran le i bijab an o gab Kana an o them Galilea. O Jesuseskri dai his koi.
43002002	Kol bijabengre mangan o Jesuses ninna ap ko bijab te well peskre malentsa, un jaake his lo lentsa ninna ap ko bijab.
43002003	Har len kek mool buder his, penas o Jesuseskri dai ap peskro tchaweste: "Len hi buder kek mool."
43002004	"Romnija," penas o Jesus, "hoi me hunte krap, hi miro koowa un gar tiro koowa. O tsiro hi mange kanna gar koi."
43002005	Leskri dai penas ap i budepangre: "Krenn kowa, hoi job tumenge penella!"
43002006	An ko kheer his shob panjeskre khore dran bar. I bibolde hunte thowan pengre wasta kote, jaake har i biboldengro koowa hi. An hako khoro djas sheel-te-biish litarja dre.
43002007	O Jesus penas ap lende: "Tchorenn pani an kol khore!" Un jon kran len jaake pherdo, kai djas buder tchi dre.
43002008	Un job penas pale ap lende: "Lenn dran kol khore un anenn kowa o rajeske pral o pipen!" Un jon anan les pash leste.
43002009	O rai pral o pipen djinas gar, kai koi mool was. I budepangre kokres, kai tchoran o pani an kol khore, djinan kowa. Har job koi mool pijas, hoi pani his, das lo o pirnes pash peste gole,
43002010	un penas ap leste: "Hakeno dell i latchi mool glan i wawar mool. Un te hi le mato, dell lo len koi mool, kai gar jaake latcho hi. Tu rikral koi latchi mool pale."
43002011	Kowa his o ersto kopo, kai kras o Jesus i baro koowa an o Debleskri soor. Kowa kras lo an o gab Kana an o them Galilea. Kote sikras job peskro railepen un peskri soor. Un leskre mala patsan ap leste.
43002012	Pal kowa djas lo peskri daha, peskre phralentsa un peskre malentsa an o foro Kapernaum. Koi atchan le gar raha.
43002013	Glan kol biboldengre bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa, djas o Jesus an o foro Jerusalem.
43002014	Koi dikas job an o Debleskro baro kheer i bikepangren, kai grumjen, bakren un parne tchirklen bikrenna. Un kolla, kai parenn i lowe trujal, his ninna koi.
43002015	Koi kras job dran shelle i tchupni, un tradas len lengre bakrentsa un grumjentsa dran o Debleskro baro kheer wi. Un kolenge, kai parenn i lowe trujal, witsras lo lengre lowe ap i phub. Un lengre stamja tchiwras lo trujal.
43002016	Ap kolende, kai bikrenn parne tchirklen, penas job: "Hidjenn len win un krenn dran miro dadeskro kheer kek bikepaskro kheer!"
43002017	Koi was o Jesuseskre malenge an o shero, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Miro kamlepen tiro khereske chal man pre har i jag.
43002018	Kol pralstune bibolde putchan lestar: "Hawo baro koowa kreh tu menge an o Debleskri soor, te djinas mer, kai tut o tchatchepen hi, te kress kowa?"
43002019	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Phagenn kau Debleskro kheer tele! Me krau an triin diwessa i newo kheer."
43002020	Penan jon: "An star-deesh-te-shob (46) bersha kran le o Debleskro baro kheer. Un tu kameh kowa te krell an triin diwessa?"
43002021	Har rakras o Jesus pral o Debleskro kheer, rakras lo pral peste kokres.
43002022	Pal i tsiro, har o Jesus i mulendar pre stas, wan leskre malenge kol laba pale an o shero, hoi o Jesus penas. Un jon patsan, kai kowa lauter tchatcho hi, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, un hoi o Jesus penas.
43002023	An kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa, patsan bud menshe an o foro Jerusalem ap o Jesuseste, har dikan le ko baro koowa, hoi kras lo an o Debleskri soor.
43002024	O Jesus das kek patsepen ap lende. Job prindjras lauteren.
43002025	Job djinas, har i menshe hi. Leske hunte penell kek, hoi an o mensheskro dji hi.
43003001	Koi his i Farisari. Leskro lab his Nikodemus. Job his i pralstuno biboldo.
43003002	Kowa was an i rat pash o Jesuseste, un penas: "Rai, mer djinah, kai tu hal i sikepaskro. O Dewel bitchras tut pash mende. Kek nai krell kowa, hoi tu kreh an o Debleskri soor. Ap kowa dikah mer, kai hi o Dewel tuha."
43003003	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Kowa, kai well gar o Deblestar newes boldo, nai djiwell gar leha khetne."
43003004	Putchas o Nikodemus lestar: "Har nai well jek pale newes boldo, te hi lo phuro? Nai djal lo pale an peskro dakro per, un well o duito kopo boldo?"
43003005	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Te well jek gar newes boldo dran o pani un dran o Debleskro Ducho, nai djiwell lo gar khetne o Debleha.
43003006	Koon i menshestar boldo wella, hi i mensheskro tchawo. Koon dran o Debleskro Ducho boldo wella, hi i Debleskro tchawo.
43003007	Kre kek bare jaka, te penau tuke: Tumer hunte wenn o Deblestar newes boldo!
43003008	O sorelo ducho, hoi phurdell pral i phub, djal, kai kamell lo. Tu shuneh les. Kai job wella, un kai job djala, djineh tu gar. Jaake hi pash koleste, kai wella dran Debleskro Ducho boldo."
43003009	"Har djal kowa nai?" putchas o Nikodemus.
43003010	O Jesus putchas lestar: "Tu hal i sikepaskro an o them Israel un djineh kowa gar?
43003011	Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Mer rakrah pral kowa, hoi prindjrah. Hoi mer dikam, kowa penah mer nai ninna. Tumer patsenn gar, hoi mer tumenge penah.
43003012	Te rakrau pral i phubjakro koowa, un tumer patsenn man gar, har nai patsenn tumer man, te rakrau pral o Debleskro koowa?
43003013	Me, o Menshengro Tchawo kokres, nai penau, hoi an o bolepen hi. Me wom dran o bolepen.
43003014	Tu djineh, kai o Mose an o mulo them i sap ap i kasht pre bladas. Hakeno, koon dikas ap ko sap, atchas djido. Jaake hunte well o Menshengro Tchawo ap o kasht bladedo,
43003015	te lell hakeno, kai patsell ap leste, ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43003016	O Dewel kamas i menshen jaake bud, te das lo lenge peskro tchawes. Hakeno, koon patsell ap leste, djal gar nashedo. Job lell ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43003017	O Dewel bitchras peskro tchawes gar ap i phub, te anell job o Debleskri choli pral i menshende. Job was, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
43003018	Koon ap leste patsella, pral koleste well kek phagi wi-rakedo. Koon gar ap leste patsella, pral koleste hi i phagi wi-rakedo doleske, kai patsas lo gar ap o Debleskro tchaweste.
43003019	O Debleskri bari momeli was ap kai phub. Un kol menshe, kai krenn o tchilatchepen, kaman o tamlepen budeder har koi momeli. Doleske hi i phagi pral lende wi-rakedo.
43003020	Kolla, kai o tchilatcho koowa krenna, kamenna gar koi momeli. Jon atchenn penge an o tamlepen, jaake kai dikenn i wawar gar, hawo tchilatcho koowa jon krenna.
43003021	Koon o tchatchepen krella, kowa well pash i momeli. Ap koleste dikenn le, kai job djiwella, har o Dewel kamella."
43003022	Pal kowa djas o Jesus peskre malentsa an ko them Judea, un atchas i tsiro kote, un thowas i menshen an o pani.
43003023	Ninna o Johanni thowas i menshen an o pani pash o gab Ainon, hoi his pash o foro Salim tchiddo. Koi his bud pani. I menshe wan pash leste, un mukan pen lestar an o pani te thowell.
43003024	Ap ko tsiro his o Johanni gar stildo.
43003025	Jek diwes tchingras i biboldo kolentsa, kai djan o Johanneske palla, pral kowa, har kolla, kai pal o biboldengro tchatchepen pale-tchiddo hi, nai wenn pale erligo.
43003026	Un jon djan pash o Johanneste, un penan leske: "Sikepaskro, ko mursh, kai his pash tute ap o wawar panjeskri rig, pral koleste rakral, un bud menshe shunan kowa, kowa hi kate, un thowell i menshen an o pani. Un hakeno djal pash leste."
43003027	Koi penas o Johanni ap lende: "Kek nai lell tchomone, te das les o Dewel kowa gar.
43003028	Tumer halauter shunan, kai penom, kai hom me gar ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. O Dewel bitchras man glan koleste.
43003029	Koles, kai i pirni hi, ko hi ninna o pirno. Un o maal ko pirnestar, kai pashal tardo hi, un shunell o pirneskro gole, hi bachtelo pral kowa. Kai bacht hi man kanna.
43003030	Me hunte wap tikno un tikneder. Un job hunte well baro un bareder.
43003031	Kowa, kai was o Deblestar, hi o rai pral lauter. Kowa, kai well i phubjatar, rakrell pral kowa, hoi ap i phub djala. Kowa, kai was dran o bolepen, hi o rai pral halauter,
43003032	un rakrell nai pral kowa, hoi job dikas un shunas. Kek patsell leske.
43003033	Koon patsell ap leste, kowa sikrell jaake, kai halauter tchatcho hi, hoi o Dewel penella.
43003034	Koles, kai o Dewel pash mende bitchras, kowa rakrell o Debleskre laba. O Dewel dell an leste peskro tselo Debleskro Ducho, un rikrell tchi pale.
43003035	O dad kamell o tchawes, un das halauter an leskro wast.
43003036	Koon ap o tchaweste patsella, koles hi ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Koon ap o tchaweste gar patsella, koles well ko tchatcho djipen gar. O Debleskri choli atchell pral leste."
43004001	I Farisarja shunan, kai bud menshe djan o Jesuseske palla. Jon shunan ninna, kai job thowas budeder menshe an o pani har o Johanni.
43004002	His gar o Jesus, kai thowas len an o pani. Kowa kran leskre mala.
43004003	Har o Jesus shunas, hoi pral leste rakedo was, djas lo dran o them Judea win, un kamas pale an o them Galilea te djal.
43004004	Job hunte djas pral o them Samaria, te well lo an o them Galilea.
43004005	Jaake was lo pash ko foro Sichar an o them Samaria. Ko foro his pash ko kotar phub tchiddo, hoi o Jakob peskro tchaweste Josef das.
43004006	Koi his o Jakobeskro pani. O Jesus was khino ap ko dur drom un beshas pes pash ko pani. His deesh-te-dujenge.
43004007	Koi was i djuwel pash ko pani, te lell li pani. Koja his i Samaritetsa. O Jesus penas ap late: "De man te pijell!"
43004008	Leskre mala his gar koi. Jon his an o foro, te ginenn le chapaske.
43004009	Koi djuwel penas ap leste: "Tu hal i biboldo. Me hom i Samaritetsa. Har nai mangeh tu mandar pani, te dap tut te pijell? I bibolde chan gar khetne i Samaritentsa."
43004010	Penas o Jesus ap late: "Te djinals tu, hoi o Dewel kamell tut te dell, un koon tutar ko pani mangella, mangals tu mandar, te dap tut o pani. Un me doms tut o pani, hoi dell o djipen."
43004011	"Romeha," penas koi djuwel, "tut hi tchi, kai leh ko pani nai win. Un ko pani hi tel an i phub. Kai kameh tu ko pani, hoi dell o djipen, te lell?
43004012	Hal tu bareder har o Jakob, maro kutch dad, kowa, kai hadas i phub kate win, te well kau pani win. Job un peskre tchawe un fiche pijan dran kau pani."
43004013	Penas o Jesus: "Hakeno, kai pijell kau pani, lell pale trush.
43004014	Koon ko pani pijella, hoi me les dau, kowa lell an peskro tselo djipen buder kek trush. Ko pani, hoi me les dau, hi djido un herell gar pre te nashell an leste, un dell les o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella."
43004015	"Romeha, de man ko pani!" penas koi djuwel, "te well man buder kek trush, te wap buder gar kai, te lap kau pani."
43004016	"Dja khere!" penas o Jesus, "de tiro romes gole, un am leha pale kai!"
43004017	"Man hi kek rom," penas koi djuwel. Penas o Jesus ap late: "Tiro hi tchatcho, te peneh tu: Man hi kek rom.
43004018	Pantch romma his tut. Un kowa, kai tut kanna hi, kowa hi gar tiro rom. Koi penal tu o tchatchepen."
43004019	Penas koi djuwel: "Romeha, me dikau, tu hal i Debleskro rakepaskro.
43004020	Mare phure mangan o Debles ap kai berga an. Tumer bibolde penenn menge: Halauter hunte mangenn o Debles an o foro Jerusalem an!"
43004021	Penas o Jesus: "Romnija, pats man, ko tsiro wella, kai mangenn tumer o Debles gar ap kai berga an, witar gar an o foro Jerusalem.
43004022	Tumer djinenn gar, kones tumer an-mangenna. Mer djinah, kones mer an-mangah. I biboldendar wella kowa, kai lell i menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
43004023	Ko tsiro wella, un hi kanna kai, koi della menshe, kai mangenn o dades an o tchatchepen an. Kal menshen hunte well o Debleskro Ducho. O dad rodell kolen, kai mangenn les jaake an.
43004024	O Dewel hi kek mensho, - job hi i ducho. Un kolla, kai mangenn les an, kolen hunte well o Debleskro Ducho. Kowa sikrell len, har te mangenn le les tchatchepaha an."
43004025	Penas i djuwel: "Me djinau, kai well ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, kai kharell ninna o Kristo. Te well job pash mende, penell lo menge halauter."
43004026	Penas o Jesus: "Me hom kowa. Tu rakreh leha."
43004027	Koi wan leskre mala pale dran o foro. Har jon dikan, kai job i djuwjaha rakras, kran le bare jaka. Kek putchas lestar: Hoi kameh tu latar? Un kek putchas lestar witar gar: Hoske rakreh tu laha?
43004028	Kanna mukas koi djuwel ko panjeskro khoro tardo un djas pale an ko foro un penas i menshenge:
43004029	"Awenn un dikenn! Me taprom i murshes, kowa djinas halauter pral mande. Nai hi job ko Kristo?"
43004030	Koi djan kol menshe dran o foro pash o Jesuseste, te dikenn le les.
43004031	Har i djuwel an o foro his, penan leskre mala ap leste: "Sikepaskro, cha tchomone!"
43004032	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Man hi i chapen, kowa prindjrenn tumer gar."
43004033	Koi putchan leskre mala mashkral pende: "Anas leske jek tchomone chapaske?"
43004034	Penas o Jesus lenge: "Me djiwau kolestar, te krap, hoi o Dewel mandar kamella. Un leskri budi krau jaake raha, har job kamella. Doleske bitchras man lo ap i phub.
43004035	Tumer penenna: An star tchon anenn le o djob dre? Krenn tumare jaka pre, un dikenn tumen trujal: O tsiro hi kanna kai. Kanna well o djob dre anlo.
43004036	Kanna anenn i budepangre kolen khetne, kai lenn o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un lengri budi well plaissedo. Jaake hi hake dui bachtelo: Kowa, kai o tikno djob an i phub witsras, un kowa, kai anell o djob dre.
43004037	Ko lab hi tchatcho: Jek witsrell o tikno djob an i phub. Un i wawar anell ko djob dre.
43004038	Me bitchrom tumen, te anenn tumer kote o djob dre, kai i wawar maran pen tele, te witsran le ko tikno djob an i phub. Un tumer nai anenn kanna o djob dre."
43004039	Bud kol menshendar dran o foro Sichar patsan ap o Jesuseste doleske, kai koi djuwel lenge penas: "Halauter, hoi me krom, penas job mange."
43004040	Har i Samaritarja pash o Jesuseste wan, mangan le les, te atchell lo i tsiro pash lende. Un job atchas dui diwessa pash lende.
43004041	Jaake shunan bud menshe, hoi job penas, un patsan ap leste.
43004042	Jon penan koi djuwjake: "Kanna patsah mer ap leste, un gar kokres, hoi tu menge lestar penal. Mer shunam les, un djinah kanna, kai job kowa hi, kai lell i menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."
43004043	Pal kol dui diwessa djas o Jesus dureder un was an o them Galilea.
43004044	Job penas jek kopo: I Debleskro rakepaskro well gar sharedo kote, kai job khere hi.
43004045	Har job an o them Galilea was, lan kol menshe les kamles pre. Ap ko tsiro, har o Jesus an o foro Jerusalem his, his jon ninna kote un dikan lauter, hoi job kras an kol diwessa, kai Passa kharenna. Doleske lan le les kanna kamles pash pende pre.
43004046	Un o Jesus was pale an o gab Kana. Kowa his ko gab an o them Galilea, kai kras job i mool dran o pani. An o foro Kapernaum djiwas i pralstuno, kai budras o baro rajeske pral ko them. Koleskro tchawo his nasselo.
43004047	Har job shunas, kai o Jesus pale dran o them Judea an o them Galilea was, djas job pash leste, un mangas lestar: "Am tele an o foro Kapernaum! Un kre miro tchawes sasto, kai ap o merepen tchiddo hi!"
43004048	O Jesus penas ap leste: "Te dikenn tumer gar bud Debleskro koowa, kai kek mensho nai krella, patsenn tumer gar."
43004049	Ko pralstuno penas pale ap leste: "Miro rai, am tele! Miro tchawo merella."
43004050	"Dja khere," penas o Jesus, "tiro tchawo djiwella!" Ko mursh patsas kowa, hoi o Jesus leske penas un djas khere.
43004051	Job his gomme gar khere, koi wan leskre budepangre pash leste, un penan: "Tiro tchawo djiwella un hi sasto."
43004052	Koi putchas job lendar pal ko tsiro, kai o tchaweha feteder was. Koi penan le: "Taissar, har eftenge his, djas o nasslepen lestar."
43004053	Kanna djinas ko dad, kai kowa ko tsiro his, kai o Jesus ap leste penas: "Tiro tchawo djiwella." Un job patsas peskre tsele menshentsa ap o Jesuseste.
43004054	Kau duito baro koowa kras o Jesus an o Debleskri soor, har job dran o them Judea an o them Galilea was.
43005001	Pal kowa his i baro Debleskro diwes i biboldenge. Un o Jesus djas an o foro Jerusalem.
43005002	An o foro Jerusalem his i pani pash ko foreskro wudar, kai kharella bakrengro wudar. Ko pani kharella ap hebretikes Betesda. Kote his i thopaskro kheer, kai pantch bare iseme dren his, kai pre his.
43005003	-
43005004	Kote his bud nassele tchiddo: Sawe, kai dikenn nai gar, un sawe, kai nashenn nai gar, un bange.
43005005	Mashkral kolende his i mursh, kai his triin-deesh-te-ochta (38) bersha nasselo.
43005006	O Jesus dikas les koi tchiddo, un djinas, kai his job i raha tsiro nasselo. "Kameh tu sasto te well?" putchas lo lestar.
43005007	"Rai," penas ko nasselo, "man hi kek, kai anell man an kau pani, te well djipen dre un djal pre un tele. Un te kamau me an o pani dre te djal, hi i wawar sikeder glan mande an o pani."
43005008	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Ste pre! Le tiro tchiben un dja!"
43005009	Har o Jesus kowa penas, was ko mursh sasto, las peskro tchiben un djas trujal. Ko diwes his i Debleskro diwes.
43005010	Dran kowa penan kol pralstune bibolde ap koleste, kai sasto was: "Kau diwes hi o Debleskro diwes. Kau diwes hidjess tu tiro tchiben gar!"
43005011	Penas job ap lende: "Kowa, kai kras man sasto, penas ap mande: Le tiro tchiben un dja!"
43005012	"Un koon hi ko mursh," putchan jon, "kai penas ap tute: Le tiro tchiben un dja?"
43005013	Kowa, kai sasto was, djinas les gar. O Jesus mukas ko thopaskro kheer, har dikas lo kol bud menshen koi.
43005014	Pal i tsiro tapras o Jesus ko murshes pale an o Debleskro baro kheer. "Tu hal kanna sasto," penas lo ap leste, "kre kek tchilatcho koowa buder, te well gar budeder ap tute har ko nasslepen!"
43005015	Koi djas ko mursh pash kol pralstune biboldende un penas: "Kowa his o Jesus, kai kras man sasto."
43005016	Pal kowa lan i bibolde o Jesuses palla. Jon his chojedo, te kras job i nasseles ap o Debleskro diwes sasto.
43005017	O Jesus penas lenge: "Miro dad budrell o tselo tsiro. Jaake krau me kowa ninna."
43005018	Doleske kaman kol bibolde gomme budeder, te marenn le les. O Jesus kras gar kokres i nasseles ap o Debleskro diwes sasto. Job penas ninna, kai o Dewel leskro dad hi, un kras pes jaake har o Dewel.
43005019	O Jesus penas ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: O tchawo nai krell tchi pestar. Job dikell, hoi o dad krella. Un kowa, hoi krell o dad, kowa krell ninna o tchawo.
43005020	O dad kamell o tchawes un sikrell leste halauter, hoi job krella. Ninna wawar bareder koowa sikrell lo leste, jaake kai krenn tumer bare jaka.
43005021	Har o dad i mulen pre djangrella, un dell len o newo djipen, jaake nai dell ninna o tchawo o newo djipen, kones job kamella.
43005022	O dad rakrell pral kekeste i phagi win. Kowa das lo an peskro tchaweskro wast, te well leskro tchawo o tchatchepaskro rai pral lauterende,
43005023	te sharenn le halauter o tchawes, jaake har sharenn le o dades. Koon o tchawes gar sharella, kowa sharella witar gar o dades, kai bitchras o tchawes.
43005024	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon miro lab shunella, un patsella ap koleste, kai man bitchras, koles hi ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Pral leste well kek phagi wi-rakedo. Job mukas ko merepen pal peste, un djas an o djipen.
43005025	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ko tsiro wella un hi kanna kai, kai i mule shunenn i gole o Debleskro tchawestar. Un kolla, kai shunenn, kai dell job gole, kolla djiwenna.
43005026	An o dadeste hi o djipen. Kowa das lo ninna peskro tchaweste, te well an leste ko djipen.
43005027	Job hi o Menshengro Tchawo. Un o Dewel das an leskro wast, te rakrell lo i phagi win pral i menshende.
43005028	Ma krenn bare jaka, te penau tumenge: Ko tsiro wella, kai i tsele mule shunenna, te kharell lo len.
43005029	Un jon wenna dran i mulengre khera win. Kolla, kai latcho koowa kran, wenn djides kerdo, te lenn le ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un kolla, kai tchilatcho koowa kran, wenn djides kerdo, te lenn le i phagi.
43005030	Mandar nai krau me tchi. Me rakrau o tchatchepen win, jaake har o Dewel mange penella. Kowa, hoi rakrau pral i mensheste win, hi tchatcho. Me krau gar, hoi me kamau. Me krau halauter, hoi kowa kamella, kai bitchras man."
43005031	"Me te penoms kokres pral mande win, wals kowa tchi moldo.
43005032	Man hi jek, kai penell tumenge, koon me hom. Kowa, hoi job penell pral mande, kowa hi tchatcho.
43005033	Tumer bitchran murshen pash o Johanneste, te shunenn lestar pral mande. Un job penas pral mande o tchatchepen.
43005034	Man hunte well kek mensho, kai penell pral mande win. Hi tumenge, kai rakrom pral kowa, hoi o Johanni pral mande penas, te patsenn tumer un wenn dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win lino.
43005035	O Johanni his i momeli, kai chatchas. Un i tikno tsiro hans tumer bachtelo pral kowa, hoi job penas un kras.
43005036	Man hi tchomone, hoi penell tumenge feteder o tchatchepen pral mande win har o Johanni. Kowa hi ko koowa, hoi krau, kolestar o dad mange penas, te krap kowa. Kowa sikrella, kai o dad bitchras man.
43005037	Ninna miro dad, kai bitchras man, penas tumenge, koon me hom. Tumer shunan les gar, witar gar dikan les tumer.
43005038	Tumer patsenn gar an tumare djia, hoi job penas. Doleske patsenn tumer gar, kai me kowa hom, kones o Dewel bitchras.
43005039	Tumer rodenn o djipen an o Debleskro lab un patsenn, kai hatsenn kote ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un tchatchepaha, o Debleskro lab rakrell mandar.
43005040	Pash mande kamenn tumer gar te well, te lenn ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43005041	Hi mange tchi moldo, te wap sharedo i menshendar.
43005042	Me prindjrau tumen un djinau, kai hi gar o Debleskro kamlepen an tumende.
43005043	Miro dad bitchras man pash tumende. Tumer lan man gar pre. Te well i wawar, koles kek bitchras, koles lenn tumer pre.
43005044	Har nai patsenn tumer mange? Tumer rodenna, te well jek i wawarestar sharedo. Te wenn tumer o Deblestar sharedo, kowa hi tumenge tchi moldo.
43005045	Ma patsenn, kai me phukrau ap tumende pash miro dadeste. Koi hi i wawar, kai phukrell ap tumende: O Mose, kolestar patsenn tumer, kai hi lo ap tumari rig.
43005046	Tumer te patsenn tchatchepaha, hoi o Mose tumenge penas, patsans tumer ninna ap mande. Job tchinas pral mande.
43005047	Tumer te patsenn gar, hoi o Mose tchinas an peskre lila, har nai patsenn tumer, hoi me tumenge penau?"
43006001	Pal i tsiro djas o Jesus ap i wawar rig o baro panjestar Galilea. Ko pani kharella ninna Tiberias.
43006002	Bud bud menshe djan leske palla. Jon dikan, hawo baro koowa job an o Debleskri soor kras ap i nasslende.
43006003	Khetne peskre malentsa djas o Jesus ap i berga, un beshas pes lentsa tele.
43006004	His i tikno tsiro glan i biboldengre bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa.
43006005	Har o Jesus dikas, kai bud bud menshe leske palla djan, putchas lo o Filipestar: "Kai nai ginah mer jaake bud mare, te well i tsele menshen chapaske?"
43006006	Job kamas te dikell, har leskro patsepen hi. Doleske putchas job lestar kowa. O Jesus djinas kokres, hoi job kamas te krell.
43006007	O Filipo penas: "Ninna te wals men dui-sheel rupene beme, wals kowa gar doha, te lell hakeno i tikno kotar maro."
43006008	Jek leskre malendar, o Andreas, ko phraal o Simon Petrestar, penas ap o Jesuseste:
43006009	"Kate hi i tchawo. Koles hi pantch mare un dui matche. Kowa hi tchi jaake bud menshenge."
43006010	O Jesus penas: "Penenn i menshenge, te beshenn pen le!" Koi his bud senlepen. Un jon beshan pen koi. Kolla his nai jaake pantch serja (5.000) mursha.
43006011	Un o Jesus las kol mare, parkras pes pash o Debleste un das len i menshende. Kowa kras lo ninna kol matchentsa. Un hakeno las jaake bud, har job kamas.
43006012	Har jon halauter tchalo his, penas job ap peskre malende: "Tchiwenn i tsele kotja khetne, hoi pral atchan, te djal kowa gar nashedo!"
43006013	Koi tchiwan leskre mala halauter khetne, hoi pral atchas kol marendar. Koi wan deesh-te-dui marengre gone pherdo kol pantch marendar.
43006014	Har kol menshe dikan, hoi o Jesus kras an o Debleskri soor, penan le: Kowa hi tchatchepaha ko Debleskro rakepaskro, kolestar penlo was, kai well lo ap kai phub.
43006015	O Jesus haiwas, kai kaman jon les te taprell, te krenn le les lengro baro rai. Doleske djas job dureder pral ap koi berga, te well lo peske kokres.
43006016	Har i rat was, djan leskre mala tele pash o pani,
43006017	djan an o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleran wergal o pani, te wenn le an o foro Kapernaum. His rati, un o Jesus his gar pash lende.
43006018	Koi phurdas i baro sorelo ducho pral o pani. Un o pani was diwjo.
43006019	Har leskre mala pantch, shob kilometarja win ap o baro pani his, dikan le o Jesuses: Job djas ap o pani, un was pash o panjeskro ulepaskro. Un jon lan traash.
43006020	Job penas: "Me hom! Ma darenn!"
43006021	Koi kaman jon les an o panjeskro ulepaskro te lell. Ap jek kopo his le ap i wawar panjeskri rig, kote, kai jon kaman te djal.
43006022	O wawar diwes putchan pendar kol menshe, kai atchan ap i wawar panjeskri rig, kai o Jesus hi. Jon dikan, kai taissar jek panjeskro ulepaskro tchiddo his pash o pani, un kai leskre mala djan penge. Jon djinan, o Jesus his gar pash lende.
43006023	Koi wan wawar panjeskre ulepangre dran o foro Tiberias, un tchiwan pen kote, kai chans le ko maro, koleske o Jesus parkras pes pash o Debleste.
43006024	Har kol menshe haiwan, kai o Jesus buder gar koi hi, witar gar leskre mala, beshan pen jon an kol panjeskre ulepangre, uleran wergal o baro pani, un wan an o foro Kapernaum, te rodenn les le.
43006025	Kote hatsan le les, un putchan lestar: "Sikepaskro, kaana wal tu kate?"
43006026	Penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Tumer rodan man gar doleske, kai dikan i baro koowa, hoi krom an o Debleskri soor. Tumer chan ko maro, un wan tchalo. Doleske rodenn tumer man.
43006027	Ma djiwenn o chapaske, hoi paash djala! Djiwenn jaake, te lenn ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella! O Menshengro Tchawo kokres nai dell tumen kowa. Jaake sikras o Dewel, kai kowa leskro tchawo hi."
43006028	Koi putchan jon lestar: "Hoi hunte kras mer? Hoi kamell o Dewel mendar?"
43006029	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "O Dewel kamella, te patsenn ap koleste, kai job bitchras."
43006030	Penan jon: "Kre menge i baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, te patsas mer ap tute! Sike men, hoi tu haiweh!
43006031	De men hako diwes maro te chal, jaake har mare phure menshe chan o Debleskro maro an o mulo them! Kowa hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Job das len maro dran o bolepen chapaske."
43006032	Penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Hi gar o Mose, kai das tumen o maro dran o bolepen. Kowa hi miro dad, kai dell tumen ko tchatcho maro dran o bolepen.
43006033	O Debleskro maro hi kowa, kai was dran o bolepen, un dell i menshen o djipen."
43006034	"Rai," penan jon, "de men ko maro hako tsiro!"
43006035	O Jesus penas lenge: "Me hom ko maro, kai della ko djipen. Koon pash mande wella, koles hi buder kek bok. Un koon ap mande patsella, koles hi buder kek trush.
43006036	Hi jaake har me tumenge penom: Tumer dikan man, un kamenn gar ap mande te patsell.
43006037	Halauter kolla, kai dell man o dad, wenn pash mande. Un halauter kolla, kai wenn pash mande, kolen witsrau me gar win.
43006038	Me wom gar dran o bolepen te krap kowa, hoi me kamau. Me wom te krap, hoi kowa kamella, kai bitchras man.
43006039	Un o Dewel kamella, te nashrap me kekes kolendar, kai job man das. Job kamella, te krap len i mulendar djido ap o palstuno diwes.
43006040	Kowa kamell miro dad: Hakeno, koon o tchawes dikella, un ap leste patsella, lell o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un me krau les i mulendar djido ap o palstuno diwes."
43006041	I bibolde his chojemen pral kowa, kai job penas: Me hom ko maro, hoi dran o bolepen tele was.
43006042	"Hi kowa gar o Jesus, ko Josefeskro tchawo?" penan jon. "Mer prindjrah leskro dades un leskri da. Har nai penell lo: Me wom dran o bolepen?"
43006043	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Ma choirenn tumen pral kowa, hoi me tumenge penom!
43006044	Kek nai well pestar pash mande. O dad, kai bitchras man, hunte anell les pash mande. Un koon pash mande wella, koles krau me i mulendar djido ap o palstuno diwes.
43006045	An o Debleskro lab tchinan kol Debleskre rakepangre: O Dewel hi o sikepaskro halauterenge. Hakeno, koon ap o dadeste shunella un krell, hoi job kamella, well pash mande.
43006046	Kek dikas o dades. Kowa kokres, kai was o Deblestar, dikas les.
43006047	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon ap mande patsella, koles hi o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43006048	Me hom ko maro, hoi dell tumen ko djipen.
43006049	Tumare phure chan ko maro, hoi o Dewel len das an o mulo them, un jon meran.
43006050	Me hom ko tchatcho maro, hoi dran o bolepen wella. Koon kowa chala, kowa merell gar.
43006051	Me hom ko maro, hoi dell o djipen, un hoi was dran o bolepen. Hakeno, koon chala kau maro, lell o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un ko maro hi miro mass. Me dau les i menshenge, te lenn le ko djipen."
43006052	Kanna tchingran pen kol bibolde, un penan: "Har nai dell men ko mursh peskro mass te chal?"
43006053	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te chan tumer gar o Menshengro Tchaweskro mass, un pijenn gar leskro rat, hi tumen gar o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43006054	Koon chala miro mass, un pijell miro rat, lell o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un me krau les i mulendar djido ap o palstuno diwes.
43006055	Miro mass hi o tchatcho chapen, un miro rat o tchatcho pipen.
43006056	Koon chala miro mass, un pijell miro rat, kowa atchella an mande, un me atchau an leste.
43006057	Jaake har o dad, kai bitchras man, hi djido, un das man o djipen, jaake dau me o djipen kolende, kai chan miro mass.
43006058	Kawa hi ko maro, hoi was dran o bolepen. Koon kau maro chala, lell o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kawa hi i wawar maro har kowa, hoi tumare phure chan."
43006059	Kowa penas job an i biboldengri kangri, har job an ko foro Kapernaum lenge o Debleskro lab penas.
43006060	Har kolla, kai leha djan, kowa shunan, penan bud lendar: "Kowa hi kek shukar koowa, hoi job koi penella. Koon shunell kowa nai?"
43006061	Har o Jesus lendar haiwas, kai jon pen pral leste choirenna, penas lo ap lende: "Choirell tumen kowa?
43006062	Hoi krans tumer, te dikans tumer, te djal o Menshengro Tchawo pale an o bolepen?
43006063	O Debleskro Ducho hi kowa, kai dell o djipen. O mensheskri soor nai krell kowa gar. Mire laba, hoi me tumenge penom, wan dran o Debleskro Ducho. Doleske anenn le tumenge ko djipen.
43006064	Mashkral tumende hi menshe, kai patsenn gar." O Jesus djinas, koon kolla his, kai patsenn gar. Ninna djinas lo, koon ap leste phukrella.
43006065	Un job penas dureder: "Doleske penom me tumenge, kai kek nai well pestar pash mande. O dad kokres nai anell les pash mande."
43006066	Ap ko tsiro tsardan pen bud kolendar pale, kai leske palla djan, un djan buder gar leha.
43006067	Koi putchas o Jesus kol deesh-te-dujendar: "Kamenn tumer man ninna te mukell?"
43006068	"Rai, pash koneste djas mer?" penas o Simon Petro. "Tut hi laba, kai denn men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43006069	Mer patsah un djinah, tu weh o Deblestar. O Dewel bitchras tut."
43006070	O Jesus penas lenge: "Me rodom tumen deesh-te-dujen win. Un an jekeste tumendar hi o beng."
43006071	Job rakras o Judasestar, leskro dad hi o Simon Iskariot. O Judas his jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, kowa kai phukrella ap leste.
43007001	Pal kowa djas o Jesus an o them Galilea trujal. Job kamas gar an o them Judea te djal. I pralstune bibolde kote kaman les te marell.
43007002	-
43007003	I tikno tsiro glan kol biboldengre bare diwessa, hoi kharenna Sukkot, penan leskre phrala ap leste: "Ma atch an o them Galilea! Dja an o them Judea, te dikenn ninna tire mala, hawo baro koowa tu kreh!
43007004	Kek mensho khatrell pes, te kamell lo i menshen te sikrell, hoi job nai krella. Te kreh tu sawo baro koowa, palle muk kowa i tsele menshen te dikell!"
43007005	Leskre phrala patsan gar ap leste. Doleske rakran jon jaake.
43007006	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "O tsiro hi mange kanna gar kai, te djap kote. Tumer nai djan hako tsiro koi.
43007007	I menshe hi gar tchilatcho ap tumende. Ap mande hi le tchilatcho. Me penom lenge, kai kowa, hoi jon krenna, tchilatcho hi.
43007008	Djan tumer ap o festo! Me djau gar peha. O tsiro hi mange kanna gar kai."
43007009	Kowa penas job, un atchas an o them Galilea.
43007010	Har leskre phrala ap o festo his, djas job ninna tchorchanes koi.
43007011	Koi rodan les kol pralstune bibolde mashkral kolende, kai wan ap o festo, un putchan hakenestar: "Kai hi ko mursh?"
43007012	Ninna kol bud menshe, kai wan koi, rakran pral leste. His menshe mashkral lende, kai penan: "Job hi i latcho mursh." Wawar penan: "Na-a, job chochella i menshen."
43007013	I darjatar i pralstune biboldendar rakran le halauter tchorchanes pral leste.
43007014	Har ko festo paash trujal his, djas o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer, un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
43007015	Koi kran i pralstune bibolde bare jaka, un penan: "Har nai djinell job jaake bud? Kek anas leske kowa pashal."
43007016	Penas o Jesus lenge: "Hoi me tumenge penau well gar mandar. Kowa well kolestar, kai bitchras man.
43007017	Koon kowa krella, hoi o Dewel kamella, kowa haiwella, kai mire laba o Deblestar wenna, un gar mandar.
43007018	Koon pral peste mishto rakrella, kowa kamella, te well job sharedo. Koon kamella, te well kowa sharedo, kai bitchras les, kowa hi tchatcho. Un an leste hi kek tchilatchepen.
43007019	O Mose das tumen i lila, kai tchindlo hi, har tumer hunte djiwenna. Kek tumendar djiwell jaake. Hoske kamenn tumer man te marell?"
43007020	"An tute hi i beng", penan kol tsele menshe. "Koon kamell tut te marell?"
43007021	Penas o Jesus: "Jek baro koowa krom me pash tumende an o foro Jerusalem. Un tumer han chojedo pral kowa.
43007022	Te hi tumare mursh tchawe ochta diwessa phuro, tchinenn tumer len ap o mass, ninna ap o Debleskro Diwes. O Mose penas tumenge, te krenn kowa. Un o Mose his gar kokres, kai penas tumenge kowa. Ninna tumare phure, kai djiwan glan leste, penan kowa un rikran pen koi pre.
43007023	Tumer tchinenn tumare tchawen ap o mass ap o Debleskro diwes, te well rikedo, hoi o Mose tchinas an peskre lila. Hoske han tumer jaake chojedo ap mande, kai krom i menshes tseles sasto ap o Debleskro diwes?
43007024	Tumer te penenn, kai i mensho i doosh ap peste anas, palle djan pal o tchatchepen un gar pal kowa, hoi dikenn tumare jakentsa!"
43007025	Koi penan kolla, kai hi dran o foro Jerusalem: "Hi kowa gar ko mursh, kai kaman le les te marell?
43007026	Kanna rakrell lo glan hakeneste. Un kek dell les trad. Dikan mare pralstune kanna dre, kai job ko baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job?
43007027	Mer djinah, dran hawo foro ko mursh wella. Te well ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, djinell kek dran hawo foro job wella."
43007028	O Jesus, kai an o Debleskro baro kheer i menshenge o Debleskro lab penas, shunas kowa, un das gole: "Har nai prindjrenn tumer man, un djinenna, kai wom? Me wom gar mandar kokres! Tchatchepaha, koles, kai bitchras man, prindjrenn tumer gar!
43007029	Me prindjrau les! Me wom lestar! Un job bitchras man!"
43007030	Koi kaman jon les te taprell. Un kek nai hadas o wast ap leste. O tsiro his leske kanna gar koi, kai well job tapedo.
43007031	Bud kol menshendar patsan ap leste un penan: "Te well o baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, nai krell kowa bareder koowa, har kau mursh Jesus?"
43007032	I Farisarja shunan, hoi kol menshe pral o Jesuseste rakran. Un i Farisarja un i bare rashaja bitchran klisten, te taprenn le o Jesuses.
43007033	Koi penas o Jesus: "Me hom buder gar raha pash tumende. Me djau pash koleste, kai bitchras man.
43007034	Tumer rodenn man, un hatsenn man gar. Kote, kai me palle hom, nai wenn tumer gar."
43007035	"Kai kamell job te djal, kai hatsah mer les gar?" putchas jek i wawarestar. "Kamell job pash kol biboldende te djal, kai djiwenn an o grichtikro them, te penell lo kote i menshenge o Debleskro lab?
43007036	Har haiwas mer leskro rakepen: Tumer rodenn man, un hatsenn man gar un kote, kai me palle hom, koi nai wenn tumer gar?"
43007037	Ap ko pralstuno un shukeder diwes, was o Jesus pale glan kol tsele menshende, un das gole: "Kones trush hi, kowa te well pash mande un pijella!
43007038	Koon ap mande patsella, har o Debleskro lab penella, dran koleste well ko pani, kai dell o djipen."
43007039	Job penas kowa pral o Debleskro Ducho, hoi kolla lenna, kai ap leste patsenna. O Debleskro Ducho his gomme gar koi. Ap ko tsiro his o Jesus gomme gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen, te bitchras lo les ap lende.
43007040	Mashkral kolende, kai shunan ko rakepen, his menshe, kai penan: "Kau mursh hi tchatchepaha ko Debleskro rakepaskro, kolestar penlo was, te well job."
43007041	Wawar penan: "Kowa hi ko baro rai, kai well o Deblestar." Un wawar penan: "Well ko baro rai dran o them Galilea? Na-a!
43007042	O Debleskro lab penella, ko baro rai, kai well o Deblestar, kowa hi o Davideskre menshendar, un well an o foro Betlehem boldo har o David."
43007043	Kanna djinan i menshe gar, hoi tchatcho hi. Ko jek penas kawa, ko wawar penas kowa.
43007044	Mashkral lende his ninna sawe, kai kaman les te taprell. Un kek hadas peskro wast pal leste.
43007045	Har i kliste pale pash i bare rashaja un i Farisarja wan, putchan kolla lendar: "Hoske anenn les tumer gar peha?"
43007046	"Har kawa mursh rakras, shunam mer maro tselo djipen gar!" penan i kliste ap lende.
43007047	"Chochas lo tumen ninna?" putchan kol Farisarja.
43007048	"Patsell jek i pralstunendar un i Farisarjendar ap leste? Na-a!
43007049	Kol bud menshe djinenn gar, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi. Jon hi praassedo!"
43007050	O Nikodemus, kai his ninna i Farisari, kowa kai was jek rati pash o Jesuseste, penas ap lende:
43007051	"Pal maro tchatchepen nai dah kekes i phagi, te shunam gar lestar, hoi job rakrell pral kowa win. Mer dah ninna kekes i phagi, te djinah gar, hoi job kras."
43007052	"Hal tu ninna dran o them Galilea?" putchan le lestar. "Tu te drawereh mishto an o Debleskre lila, palle dikeh, kai kek Debleskro rakepaskro wella dran o them Galilea."
43007053	Un hakeno djas khere.
43008001	O Jesus djas pash o djeteskri berga.
43008002	O wawar diwes taissarlake was job pale an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un i tsele menshe wan pash leste. Un job beshas pes tele, un penas lenge o Debleskro lab.
43008003	Koi wan i tchatchepangre un i Farisarja. Kolla anan i romedini romjat pash leste. Koja was tapedo koi pashal, har joi i wawar mursheha khetne his. Jon tchiwan lat mashkral i menshende, jaake, kai dikell lat nai hakeno.
43008004	Un jon penan ap o Jesuseste: "Sikepaskro, kai romni was tapedo, har joi i wawar mursheha khetne his.
43008005	An o Moseskre lila, kai tchindlo hi, har mer djiwas, penas o Mose menge, kai sawe djuwja hunte wenn mulo dino i barentsa. Hoi peneh tu pral kowa?"
43008006	Kowa putchan le lestar, te nai taprenn le les an leskre laba, jaake te nai anenn le i doosh ap leste pre. O Jesus tchiwas pes glan tele, un tchinas o gushteha an i phub.
43008007	Har jon lestar pale putchan, hadas job pes pre, un penas: "Koon kek tchilatcho koowa kras, mu well ko ersto, kai witsrell i bar ap late!"
43008008	Un pale tchiwas pes job glan tele, un tchinas pale an i phub.
43008009	Har jon kowa shunan, djan le penge, jek pal o wawar. I phureder djan sikeder lendar, har kol wawar. Job atchas kokres koi romjaha, kai kote tardo his.
43008010	Kanna hadas pes o Jesus pale pre, un putchas koi romjatar: "Hi kek koi, kai kamell, te less i phagi?"
43008011	"Na-a, miro rai, kek hi koi," penas koi romni. Penas o Jesus: "Jaake kamau me witar gar, te less i phagi. Dja khere, un ma aan buder kek doosh ap tute!"
43008012	Pale rakras o Jesus i menshentsa un penas: "Me hom koi momeli i menshenge. Koon mange palla djala, djal gar an o tamlepen. Me hom koi momeli, kai o djipen della."
43008013	Koi penan kol Farisarja ap leste: "Tu rakreh tutar kokres un peneh, koon tu hal. Doleske hi kowa tchi moldo, hoi tu rakreh."
43008014	Penas o Jesus: "Ninna te rakrau mandar kokres, hi kowa tchatcho, hoi penau. Me djinau, konestar me wom, un kai me djaua. Tumer djinenn gar, konestar me wom, witar gar, kai me djaua.
43008015	Tumer dikenn i menshes tumare jakentsa, un penenn: Kowa anas doosh ap peste! Me krau kowa gar.
43008016	Me te penau: Kowa anas i doosh ap peste! palle hi kowa tchatcho. Me krau kowa gar mandar kokres. Miro dad, kai bitchras man, hi pash mande.
43008017	Ninna an o Moseskre lila hi tchindlo: Te penenn dui pral jekeste win, jaake hi kowa tchatcho.
