43008018	Me penau o tchatchepen pral mande, un miro dad, kai bitchras man, penell ninna o tchatchepen pral mande."
43008019	Putchan jon lestar: "Kai hi tiro dad?" Penas o Jesus: "Tumer prindjrenn man gar, witar gar miro dades. Te prindjrans tumer man, jaake prindjrans ninna miro dades."
43008020	Har job kawa penas, his job an o Debleskro baro kheer, kote, kai i pirja tardo his, kai i menshe lowe o Debleske dre tchiwan. Kote penas job i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Un kek tapras les. I tsiro his leske kanna gar koi.
43008021	Pale penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me djau mange. Tumer rodenn man, un tumer merenn an tumaro tchilatchepen. Kote, kai me djaua, nai wenn tumer gar."
43008022	Penan kol bibolde: "Hoi penell job koi: Kote, kai me djaua, nai wenn tumer gar? Kamell job pes te marell?"
43008023	Penas job ap lende: "Tumer han i phubjatar. Me hom dran o bolepen. Tumer han kai phubjatar. Me hom gar kai phubjatar.
43008024	Doleske penom tumenge: Tumer merenn an tumaro tchilatchepen. Tumer te patsenn gar, kai me kowa hom, koon me hom, palle merenn tumer an tumaro tchilatchepen."
43008025	"Pen menge, koon tu hal!" penan jon ap leste. Penas o Jesus: "Me penom tumenge kowa jaake bud kope.
43008026	Me nai penoms tumenge bud koowa, kai dikom o tchilatchepen ap tumende. Me krau kowa gar. Me penau i menshenge, hoi shunom kolestar, kai bitchras man. Un hoi job penella, hi tchatcho."
43008027	Jon haiwan gar, kai o Jesus o Deblestar, peskro dadestar, rakras.
43008028	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Te hadan tumer o Menshengro Tchawes pral, palle djinenn tumer, koon me hom, un kai me tchi mandar kokres kraua. Hoi o dad mange penas, kowa penau me dureder.
43008029	Un kowa, kai bitchras man, hi pash mande. Job mukas man gar kokres. Me krau hako tsiro, hoi job kamella."
43008030	Har o Jesus kowa penas, patsan bud ap leste.
43008031	Ap kol biboldende, kai kanna ap leste patsan, penas lo: "Tumer te krenna, hoi me tumenge penau, palle han tumer tchatchepaha mire mala, kai mire laba pre lan.
43008032	Un tumer prindjrenna o tchatchepen. Un o tchatchepen krella, te han buder gar pandlo."
43008033	Penan jon: "Mer ham o Abrahameskre tchawe. Un an kek tsiro hams pandle budepangre. Har nai peneh tu menge, te atchenn buder gar pandlo?"
43008034	Penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon o tchilatchepen krella, hi pandlo ap o tchilatchepen.
43008035	I budepaskro atchell gar hako tsiro an peskro rajeskro kheer. O tchawo atchella jaake raha, har job djiwella.
43008036	Te krell o Debleskro tchawo, kai han buder gar pandlo, jaake han tchatchepaha buder gar pandlo.
43008037	Me djinau, kai han o Abrahameskre tchawe. Ninna te hi jaake, kamenn tumer man te marell. Kowa, hoi me tumenge penau, lenn tumer gar pre. Doleske kamenn tumer man te marell.
43008038	Me penau tumenge kowa, hoi pash miro dadeste dikom. Tumer krenna, hoi shunan tumaro dadestar."
43008039	Koi penan jon ap leste: "Maro dad hi o Abraham." Penas o Jesus: "Te wans tumer lestar, krans, hoi job kras.
43008040	Kanna, kai me tumenge ko tchatchepen penom, kai shunom o Deblestar, kamenn tumer man te marell. Kowa kras o Abraham gar.
43008041	Tumer krenn kowa, hoi tumaro dad ninna kras." Penan jon ap leste: "Mari dai hi kek lubni. Men hi jek dad. Kowa hi o Dewel."
43008042	"Te wals o Dewel tumaro dad", penas o Jesus, "kamans man tumer. Lestar wom me. Me wom gar mandar. Hi o Dewel, kai bitchras man.
43008043	Hoske haiwenn tumer miro rakepen gar? Tumaro dji hi pesso. Tumer shunenn nai miro lab gar.
43008044	Tumaro dad hi o beng. Un tumer krenna, hoi tumaro dad ninna kamella. Job hi jek, kai marell i menshen hako tsiro. Un job hi gar an o tchatchepen tardo. O tchatchepen hi gar an leste. Te rakrell job o chochepen, well kowa dran leste. Job hi i chocheno, un anas o chochepen ap kai phub.
43008045	Me penau o tchatchepen. Doleske patsenn tumer man gar.
43008046	Koon tumendar nai penella, kai me jek tchilatcho koowa krom? Me te penau o tchatchepen, hoske patsenn tumer man gar?
43008047	Koon o Deblestar wella, shunella ap kowa, hoi o Dewel penella. Tumer wenn gar lestar. Doleske shunenn tumer gar ap leskre laba."
43008048	"Hi maro gar tchatcho?" penan kol bibolde. "Tu hal i Samaritari un an tute hi o beng, jaake har mer les penam."
43008049	"Na-a," penas o Jesus, "an mande hi kek beng. Me sharau miro dades. Tumer kamenn man gar te sharell.
43008050	Me kamau gar, te sharenn man i menshe. Kowa hi o Dewel, kai kamella, te wap me sharedo. Job rakrell i phagi pral tumende wi.
43008051	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te hi jek koi, kai krella, hoi me penom, kowa merell buder gar."
43008052	Koi penan jon: "Kanna djinah mer, kai hi an tute i beng. O Abraham meras, un o Debleskre rakepangre meran ninna. Un tu peneh: Te krell jek, hoi me kamau, kowa merell buder gar.
43008053	Hal tu budeder har maro dad Abraham, kai meras? Un kol Debleskre rakepangre meran ninna. Hal tu feteder har jon?"
43008054	Penas o Jesus: "Te sharoms me man, wals kowa tchi moldo. Miro dad hi kowa, kai sharell man. Kolestar penenn tumer: Job hi maro Dewel.
43008055	Tumer prindjrenn les gar. Me prindjrau les. Te penaus me, kai prindjrau les gar, woms i chocheno har tumer. Me prindjrau les un krau, hoi job penella.
43008056	O Abraham, tumaro dad, his bachtelo, har job dikas, kai me wau. Job dikas kau diwes, un his bachtelo."
43008057	Penan kol bibolde ap leste: "Tu hal kek pantch-desha bersha phuro un peneh, kai dikal o Abrahames."
43008058	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: O Abraham his gomme gar boldo, koi homs me koi."
43008059	Koi hadan jon barra pre, te witsrenn le kolla ap leste. Un job khatras pes, un djas dran o Debleskro baro kheer win.
43009001	Ap o drom dikas o Jesus i murshes. Kowa was koreles boldo.
43009002	Un o Jesuseskre mala putchan o Jesusestar: "Sikepaskro, koon anas i doosh ap peste, te was kau mursh koreles boldo? Anas job i doosh ap peste? Anas leskro dad un leskri dai i doosh ap pende?"
43009003	"Kek lendar anas i doosh ap peste," penas o Jesus. "Job gar, leskro dad un leskri dai witar gar. Job hi korelo, te well o Debleskri bari soor ap leste diklo.
43009004	Jaake raha har diwes hi, kras mer, hoi o Dewel menge penas, kowa, kai bitchras man. I rati wella: Koi nai krell kek i budi.
43009005	Jaake raha, har me ap kai phub hom, jaake raha hom me koi momeli i menshenge."
43009006	Har job kowa penas, tchungras lo an i tchik, las kowa, un makas leske ap i jaka.
43009007	Un job penas ap leste: "Dja pash ko pani Siloam, un thob tut koi!" Siloam kharella: O Dewel bitchras man. Koi djas job un thowas pes kote. Har job pale was, dikas lo nai.
43009008	Kol menshe, kai pash leste djiwan, un wawar, kai djinan, kai job o mangepaskro his, penan: "Hi kowa gar ko mursh, kai kote beshdo his un mendar lowe mangas?"
43009009	His menshe koi, kai penan: "Kowa hi ko mursh." Wawar penan: "Na-a! Kowa dikell wi har job." Ko mursh penas: "Me hom kowa."
43009010	"Har well kowa, kai tu dikeh nai ap jek kopo?" putchan le lestar.
43009011	Penas job: "O mursh, kai kharell Jesus, makas mange tchomone ap i jaka, un penas: Dja pash ko pani Siloam, un thob tut koi! Me djom kote, un thowom man, un dikom nai."
43009012	"Kai hi job?" putchan le lestar. "Me djinau gar," penas job.
43009013	Un jon anan kol murshes pash i Farisarja.
43009014	His i Debleskro diwes, har o Jesus makas koi tchik ap leskre jaka, un kras, te dikell job.
43009015	Kanna putchan ninna i Farisarja kolestar, kai sasto was: "Har well kowa, kai dikeh nai ap jek kopo?" Un job penas lenge: "Job makas mange tchomone ap i jaka, me thowom man, un kanna nai dikau."
43009016	Kote his Farisarja, kai penan: "Kau mursh was gar o Deblestar. Job budrell ap o Debleskro diwes." Wawar penan: "Har nai krell i tchilatcho mursh sawo baro koowa?" Un mashkral lende djas o tchingepen.
43009017	Un pale putchan le kolestar, kai sasto was: "Hoi peneh tu lestar, kai job tire jaka pre kras? Hoi peneh tu, koon job hi?" "Job hi i Debleskro rakepaskro," penas lo.
43009018	Kol pralstune bibolde patsan gar, kai job nai dikas gar, un kanna dikell job nai. Doleske kharan le leskro dades un leskri da,
43009019	un putchan lendar: "Hi kawa tumaro tchawo, kai penenn lestar: Job was koreles boldo? Har well kowa, kai dikell job nai ap jek kopo?"
43009020	Leskro dad un leskri dai penan: "Mer djinah, kai kawa maro tchawo hi, kai koreles boldo was.
43009021	Har kowa djas, kai job nai dikell kanna, djinah mer gar. Un koon kras, kai job nai dikella, djinah witar gar. Putchenn lestar! Job hi phuro doha. Job nai penell tumenge halauter."
43009022	Len his daar kol pralstune biboldendar. Doleske rakran jon jaake. I pralstune bibolde kaman hakenes pale-tchiddo te krell, kai penella o Jesusestar: Job hi o baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
43009023	Doleske penan o dad un i dai: "Job hi phuro doha. Putchenn lestar!"
43009024	Kol pralstune bibolde dan koles, kai korelo his, o duito kopo gole, un penan ap leste: "Pen kanna o tchatchepen glan o Debleste! Mer djinah, kai djal kau Jesus gar ap o Debleskro drom."
43009025	Koi penas job ap lende: "Djinau gar, te djal job ap o Debleskro drom, witar gar, te djal job gar ap o Debleskro drom. Jek djinau me: Me dikom nai gar. Kanna dikau me nai."
43009026	"Hoi kras job tuha?" kaman jon pale te djinell. "Har kras job tut sasto, kai dikeh nai?"
43009027	"Har kowa was, penom me tumenge," penas job, "haiwan tumer man gar? Hoske kamenn tumer kowa pale te shunell? Kamenn tumer, te well job ninna tumaro sikepaskro?"
43009028	Koi tchingran jon ap leste un penan: "Tiro sikepaskro hi lo. Maro sikepaskro hi o Mose.
43009029	Mer djinah, kai o Dewel o Moseha rakras. Konestar kawa wella, djinah mer gar."
43009030	Ko mursh penas ap lende: "Kowa haiwau me gar. Kau mursh kras, kai dikau nai. Un tumer djinenn gar, konestar job wella.
43009031	Mer halauter djinah, kai o Dewel ap kekeste shunella, kai djal gar ap leskro drom. O Dewel shunell ap koleste, kai darell lestar un djiwell jaake, har job kamella.
43009032	Jaake raha, har i phub tardo hi, shunas kek, kai i mensho jekes sasto kras, kai korelo boldo was.
43009033	Te wals kau mursh gar o Deblestar, nai krals job sawo koowa gar."
43009034	Koi penan jon ap leste: "Tu, kai boldo hal an o tchilatchepen, kameh kanna maro sikepaskro te well?" Un jon witsran les win.
43009035	O Jesus shunas, kai jon les win witsran. Un har job les hatsas, putchas lo lestar: "Patseh tu ap o Menshengro Tchaweste?"
43009036	Penas ko mursh: "Miro rai, koon hi kowa, te patsap ap leste?"
43009037	"Tu dikal les," penas o Jesus ap leste, "job hi kowa, kai rakrell tuha."
43009038	"Rai, me patsaua!" das job gole, un witsras pes glan leste tele.
43009039	Un o Jesus penas: "Me wom ap kai phub, te sikrap i menshen, koon i doosh ap peste anas, un koon kek doosh ap peste anas, jaake kai kolla, kai dikenn nai gar, dikenn nai. Un kolla, kai dikenn nai, kolende sikrau me, kai jon tchi dikenna."
43009040	Kowa shunan i Farisarja, kai his kote pashal tardo. Kolla putchan lestar: "Ham mer ninna korelo?"
43009041	Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Te hans korelo, wals tumen kek doosh. Tumer penenn: Mer dikah. Doleske atchell i doosh ap tumende."
43010001	"Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon gar an o wudar dre djala, te well lo pash i bakrende, un well wawartchandes dre, kowa hi i tchorepaskro un i dre-phagepaskro.
43010002	O bakrengro djal an o wudar dre, te well lo pash lende.
43010003	Leske krell kowa o wudar pre, kai dell garda glan o wudar. Un leskre bakre shunenn leskro rakepen. Un job dell peskre bakren gole lengre labentsa, un anell len win.
43010004	Te hi leskre tsele bakre win, djal job glan lende. Un i bakre djan leske palla. Jon prindjrenn leskro rakepen.
43010005	Jekes, kai prindjrenn jon gar, koleske djan jon gar palla. Jon nashenn penge lestar. Jon prindjrenn gar leskro rakepen."
43010006	Kal laba penas o Jesus lenge. Jon haiwan gar, hoi job kamas lenge te penell.
43010007	Doleske penas o Jesus pale ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Me hom o wudar i bakrenge.
43010008	Lauter kolla, kai wan glan mande, hi tchorepangre un dre-phagepangre. Doleske shunan kol bakre gar ap lende.
43010009	Me hom ko wudar. Te djal jek an kau wudar dre, kowa djal gar nashedo. Job djal dre un wi, un job hatsell shukar senlepen chapaske.
43010010	Ko tchorepaskro wella, te tchorell lo kol bakren, te marell lo len, un te chal lo len. Me wom, te dap len o djipen, budeder har doha.
43010011	Me hom o latcho bakrengro. O latcho bakrengro mukell peskro djipen i bakrenge.
43010012	Jek, kai lell lowe, te dell lo garda ap i bakrende, hi kek bakrengro. Kol bakre hi gar leskre. Te dikell kowa, kai i diwjo djuklo wella, nashell lo peske, un mukell kol bakren kokres. Un o diwjo djuklo perell pral kol bakrende, un tradell len jaake, kai jon buder gar khetne hi.
43010013	Ko mursheske hi kowa jek, hoi dran kol bakrende wella.
43010014	Me hom o latcho bakrengro un prindjrau, koon mire bakre hi. Jon prindjrenn man,
43010015	jaake har o dad man prindjrella, un me o dades prindjrau. Un me dau miro djipen i bakrenge.
43010016	Man hi ninna wawar bakre. Kolla hi kate gar khere. Kolen anap halauter kate. Jon shunenn ap miro rakepen, un me anau len khetne i wawarentsa. Un len hi jek bakrengro.
43010017	Me dau miro djipen, te lap les newes pale. Doleske kamell man miro dad.
43010018	Kek lell miro djipen mandar. Dran mande well kowa, kai dau miro djipen. Kowa hi an miro wast, te dap miro djipen. Un kowa hi an miro wast, te lap les pale. Jaake krau, hoi miro dad mange penas."
43010019	Har o Jesus kowa penas, tchingran pen kol bibolde pale pral kol laba.
43010020	Bud lendar penan: "I beng hi an leste un job hi dinelo. Ma shunenn ap leste!"
43010021	Wawar penan: "Te wals i beng an leste, nai rakrals job gar jaake. Nai krell i beng jekeske, kai dikell nai gar, i jaka sasto?"
43010022	His wend. Un i bibolde an o foro Jerusalem kran i baro chapen, te bistrenn le gar ko diwes, har o Debleskro baro kheer newes kerdo was.
43010023	O Jesus his an o Debleskro baro kheer, un djas an koi isema trujal, hoi kharella Salomoneskri isema.
43010024	Koi wan i pralstune bibolde trul leste un penan: "Har raha kameh tu menge gar te penell, koon tu hal? Tu te hal ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, jaake pen menge kowa an o mui!"
43010025	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Koon me hom, penom tumenge. Tumer patsenn man gar. Halauter, hoi me krau an miro dadeskro lab, kowa hunte sikrell tumende, koon me hom.
43010026	Tumer han gar mire bakre. Doleske patsenn tumer man gar.
43010027	"Mire bakre shunenn ap miro rakepen. Un me prindjrau len. Un jon djan mange palla.
43010028	Un me dau len ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un jon djan gar nashedo. Un kek nai tsardell len dran miro wast win.
43010029	Miro dad, kai das len mande, hi bareder har halauter. Un kek nai tsardell len dran miro dadeskro wast win.
43010030	Me un o dad ham jek."
43010031	Koi hadan kol bibolde pale barra pre, te denn le les kol barentsa mulo.
43010032	O Jesus penas lenge: "Me krom bud latcho koowa. Miro dad penas mange, te krap kowa. Hoi hi ko latcho koowa, koleske kamenn man mulo te dell?"
43010033	Penan kol bibolde ap leste: "Ko latcho koowa, hoi tu kral, koleske kamah mer tut gar mulo te dell. Tu anal ladj ap o Debleste. Tu hal i mensho un kreh, har te wals o Dewel. Doleske kamah tut te marell."
43010034	Penas o Jesus: "An o Debleskro lab, ap koleste tumen rikrenna, kote hi tchindlo: Me, o Dewel penom: Tumer han debla.
43010035	Kolentsa, kai o Dewel rakras, ap kolende penas job debla. Un kowa, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, nai well gar krik lino.
43010036	Man hi o dadeskro wast. Un miro dad bitchras man ap kai phub. Me te penaua, kai hom o Debleskro tchawo, har nai penenna tumer ap mande: Tu kreh, har te wess o Dewel?
43010037	Te krau me gar, hoi o dad mange penas, hunte patsenn tumer man gar.
43010038	Te krau me, hoi o dad mange penas, patsenn ap kowa, hoi me krau! Jaake dikenn un prindjrenn tumer, kai o dad an mande hi un me an leste."
43010039	Koi kaman jon les pale te taprell. Job khatras pes lendar.
43010040	Un job djas pale ap i wawar rig o panjestar Jordan un atchas kote, kai o Johanni i menshen an o pani thowas.
43010041	Koi wan bud menshe pash leste un penan: "O Johanni kras kekes sasto. Halauter, hoi job pral kau mursheste penas, hi tchatcho."
43010042	Un kote wan bud patslo ap o Jesuseste.
43011001	Koi his jek nasselo tchiddo. Leskro lab his Lazaro. Job his dran ko gab Betani, kai ninna i Maria un lakri pheen Marta djiwan.
43011002	I Maria his koi djuwel, kai ko kutch djet ap o Jesuseskre pire tchoras. Un peskre balentsa khossas joi leskre pire. Kolakro phraal his o Lazaro. Kowa his nasselo.
43011003	Kol dui phenja bitchran menshen pash o Jesuseste, te penenn le leske: "Rai, koles, kai tu kameh, hi nasselo."
43011004	Har o Jesus kowa shunas, penas lo: "Kau nasslepen was gar ap leste, te merell lo. Job was nasselo, te dikenn tumer, hawi bari soor o Debles hi, un te well o Debleskro tchawo sharedo."
43011005	O Jesus kamas i Martat un lakri phenjat un o Lazares o djijestar.
43011006	Har job shunas, kai kowa nasselo his, atchas job dui diwessa koi, kai job his.
43011007	Pal kowa penas job ap peskre malende: "Awenn, mer djah pale an o them Judea!"
43011008	Penan leskre mala ap leste: "Sikepaskro, his gar raha, koi kaman tut i bibolde mulo te dell i barentsa. Un pash kolende kameh tu pale te djal?"
43011009	O Jesus penas: "An o diwes hi deesh-te-dui tsirja. Koon ap o diwes trujal nashella, kowa perell gar. Ap o diwes chatchell o kham.
43011010	An i rat chatchell o kham gar. Koon an i rat ap o drom hi, kowa perella."
43011011	Har o Jesus lenge kowa penas, penas lo: "Maro maal Lazaro sowas dre. Me djau koi, te djangrap les pre."
43011012	-
43011013	Kal labentsa penas o Jesus, kai o Lazaro meras. Jon haiwan kowa gar. Jon patsan, kai o Jesus penas, kai job sowella. "Rai," penan le ap leste, "te sowell lo, well lo pale sasto."
43011014	Kanna penas o Jesus lenge an o mui: "O Lazaro meras.
43011015	Doleske hom bachtelo tumenge, kai me gar koi homs, te patsenn nai tumer ap mande kanna. Awenn, mer djah kanna pash leste!"
43011016	Penas o Thomas, koles dan le ninna Didimo gole, ap leskre malende: "Awenn, mer djah ninna leha, te meras leha!"
43011017	Har o Jesus an o gab Betani was, shunas lo, kai o Lazaro star diwessa paskedo his.
43011018	O gab Betani his gar dur o forestar Jerusalem, nai well triin kilometarja.
43011019	Un bud bibolde his pash i Marta un pash i Maria, te rakrenn le lentsa, te hi i duk gar jaake baro pral lengro phraleskro merepen.
43011020	Har i Marta shunas, kai o Jesus wella, djas joi pash leste. I Maria atchas khere.
43011021	"Rai," penas i Marta ap o Jesuseste, "te wals tu kai, merals miro phraal gar.
43011022	Me djinau ninna, hoi tu o Deblestar mangeh, dell job tut."
43011023	Penas o Jesus ap late: "Tiro phraal stella pale i mulendar pre."
43011024	"Me djinau," penas li, "kai job i mulendar pre stella ap ko palstuno diwes, kai hake mule pre stenna."
43011025	Penas o Jesus ap late: "Me hom kowa, kai djangraulen pre dran o merepen un dau len djipen. Koon ap mande patsella, djiwella, ninna te merell job.
43011026	Koon djiwella un patsell ap mande, kowa merell buder gar. Patseh tu kowa?"
43011027	"Awa, rai," penas li, "me patsau, kai tu hal o Kristo, o Debleskro tchawo, kai was ap kai phub."
43011028	Un har joi kowa penas, djas joi pash peskri phenjate un penas tchorchanes ap late: "O sikepaskro hi koi un dell tut gole."
43011029	Har i Maria kowa shunas, stas joi sik pre un was pash leste.
43011030	O Jesus his gomme glan o gab, kai i Marta les tapras.
43011031	Kol bibolde, kai pash i Mariate an o kheer his, te rakrenn le latches laha, dikan, har joi sik pre stas un win nashas. Koi djan le lake palla. Jon patsan, joi djal pash o mulengro kheer, te rowell li koi.
43011032	Har i Maria koi was, kai o Jesus hi, tchiwras pes li glan leste tele un penas: "Rai, te wals tu koi, merals miro phraal gar."
43011033	Har o Jesus dikas, kai joi rowella un kol bibolde ninna, kai laha wan, djas kowa leske phares an o dji. Un leskro dji rowas.
43011034	Un job penas ap lende: "Kai hi job tchiddo?" Jon penan ap leste: "Rai, am un dik!"
43011035	Un o Jesus rowas.
43011036	"Dikenn," penan i bibolde, "job hunte kamas les o djijestar!"
43011037	Mashkral lende his menshe, kai penan: "Job kras ko murshes, kai dikas nai gar, sasto. Job nai krals ninna, te merals o Lazaro gar."
43011038	Kowa djas o Jesuseske pale phares an o dji. Un job was pash ko mulengro kheer, kai o Lazaro paskedo his. Glan ko mulengro kheer his i bar tchiddo.
43011039	"Lenn ko bar krik!" penas o Jesus. I Marta, koi pheen kolestar, kai meras, penas: "Rai, job khandella. Star diwessa hi lo mulo."
43011040	Penas o Jesus ap late: "Penom me tuke gar: Te patseh tu, dikeh tu o Debleskri bari soor?"
43011041	Koi uleran le ko bar ap i rig. Un o Jesus dikas pre, un penas: "Tata, me parkrau man, kai shunal man.
43011042	Me djinau, kai tu man hako tsiro shuneh. Me penau kawa kol bud menshenge, kai hi kai tardo, te dikenn le un te patsenn le, kai tu man bitchral."
43011043	Har job kowa penas, das lo soreles gole: "Lazaro, am wi!"
43011044	Un kowa, kai meras, was wi. Trul leskre herja un wasta his laintikre kotja pandlo. Ninna trul leskro mui his i diklo pandlo. Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Lenn kol kotja lestar lauter tele, un mukenn les te djal!"
43011045	Bud kol biboldendar, kai pash i Mariate wan, dikan kowa, hoi o Jesus kote kras, un jon patsan ap leste.
43011046	Mashkral lende his menshe, kai djan pash kol Farisarja, un penan lenge, hoi o Jesus kras.
43011047	Doleske wan kol bare rashaja un kol Farisarja i pralstune biboldentsa khetne, un penan: "Hoi kras mer? Job krell bud baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krell.
43011048	Te mukah les mer jaake dureder te krell, patsell hakeno ap leste. Un kol Remarja wenna un lenn menge o tselo them un i menshen mendar krik."
43011049	Jek lendar his o Kajafas. Kowa his an ko bersh o baro rashai. Job penas: "Tumer djinenna tchi.
43011050	Tumer haiwenna gar, kai feteder hi, te merell jek mursh i menshenge, har te djan i tsele menshe nashedo."
43011051	O Kajafas penas kowa gar dran peste. An ko bersh his lo o baro rashai, un job penas glan-wi, kai o Jesus hunte merell i biboldenge,
43011052	un gar i biboldenge kokres. Job hunte merella ninna, te anell lo i tsele Debleskre tchawen khetne.
43011053	Kowa his ko diwes, kai wan le o ersto kopo khetne, te rodenn le i drom, har nai marenn jon les.
43011054	Doleske mukas pes o Jesus buder gar te dikell pash i biboldende. Job djas an ko foro, kai kharas Efraim. Kowa his pash o mulo them. Koi atchas job peskre malentsa.
43011055	His i tikno tsiro glan kol bare biboldengre diwessa, kai kharenna Passa. Dran ko tselo them wan i menshe an o foro Jerusalem, te thowenn pen le an o pani glan o Passa, jaake har i biboldengro koowa hi.
43011056	Jon halauter kaman o Jesuses te dikell, un rodan les. Har jon an o Debleskro baro kheer khetne his, putchas jek o wawarestar: "Hoi peneh tu? Well job ap o festo Passa?"
43011057	Kol bare rashaja un kol Farisarja penan, te djinell jek, kai job hi, hunte penell job les, te taprenn jon les nai.
43012001	Shob diwessa glan ko festo Passa was o Jesus pale an o foro Betani, kai o Lazaro djiwella. Koles kras o Jesus i mulendar djido.
43012002	Koi kran le leske i chapen. I Marta anas lenge ko chapen. O Lazaro his jek lendar, kai chas leha.
43012003	Un i Maria las i tushni, kai bud latcho un kutch djet dren hi, un tchoras kowa pral o Jesuseskre pire. Peskre balentsa khossas joi leskre pire. Un an o tselo kheer his o latcho sungepen o djetestar.
43012004	Jek leskre malendar, o Judas Iskariot, kowa, kai phukrella ap leste, penas:
43012005	"Hoske was ko djet gar bikedo un mer lams triin-sheel rupene beme? Un kol lowe nai dams i tchorwelende."
43012006	Job penas kowa gar, te krell lo i tchorwelenge latcho koowa. Job his i tchorepaskro. Kol tsele lowe, hoi i menshe lende dan, his pash leste. Un job las peske kol lowendar tchomone krik.
43012007	"Muk lat!" penas o Jesus. "Joi kras kowa, te makell li man dre ko diweske, kai wau paskedo.
43012008	I tchorwele hi hako tsiro pash tumende. Me hom buder gar raha pash tumende."
43012009	Bud bibolde shunan, kai o Jesus an o gab Betani hi, un wan koi. Jon wan gar, te dikenn le o Jesuses kokres. O Lazares kaman le ninna te dikell, koles, kai o Jesus i mulendar djides kras.
43012010	-
43012011	Jaake djan bud bibolde pash o Lazareste, un patsan ap o Jesuseste. Doleske rodan kol bare rashaja i drom, har nai marenn jon ninna o Lazares.
43012012	O wawar diwes shunan kol bud menshe, kai ap ko Passawan, kai o Jesus an o foro Jerusalem wella.
43012013	Koi lan le patria, kai phagan le tele, un djan dran o foro pash leste, un dan gole: "Sharas o Debles! Sharedo well kowa, koles o Dewel bitchras, o baro rai pral Israel!"
43012014	Un o Jesus hatsas i tarni esla, un beshas pes ap late, jaake har tardo hi an o Debleskro lab:
43012015	"Tumer menshe an o foro Jerusalem, ma darenn! Tumaro baro rai wella un hi beshdo ap i tarni esla."
43012016	Ap ko tsiro djinan o Jesuseskre mala gar, kai kowa lestar glan i raha tsiro penlo was. Har o Jesus an o Debleskro railepen djas, haiwan le, kai i menshe kran leha jaake, har pral leste tchindlo his.
43012017	Kol bud menshe, kai pashal his, har o Jesus o Lazares dran o mulengro kheer gole das, un i mulendar djides kras, penan kowa dureder.
43012018	Doleske nashan ninna jaake bud menshe pash leste. Jon kaman koles te dikell, kai ko baro Debleskro koowa kras.
43012019	Un i Farisarja rakran mashkral pende: "Tumer dikenna, kai wah jaake gar dureder. I tsele menshe nashenn leske palla."
43012020	Mashkral i biboldende, kai wan an o foro Jerusalem, te mangenn le o Debles an ap o festo Passa, his ninna menshe dran o grichtikro them.
43012021	Kolla wan pash o Filipo, kai dran o gab Betsaida an o them Galilea his. Un penan ap leste: "Rai, mer kamah o Jesuses te dikell."
43012022	Koi djas o Filipo pash o Andreas un penas leske kowa. Un o Andreas un o Filipo djan pash o Jesuseste un penan les leske.
43012023	O Jesus penas ap lende: "Ko tsiro hi kanna kai, kai o Dewel sikrell o Menshengro Tchaweskro railepen.
43012024	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te well o djob gar an i phub un merell tele, anell lo nai kek newo djob. Te merell lo tele, anell job bud newo djob.
43012025	Koon peskro djipen kamella, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen ap kai phub gar kamella, kowa lell o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43012026	Koon kamell mange koi te well, kowa hunte djal mantsa. Kote, kai me hom, hi ninna kowa, kai mange koi hi. Kowa, kai mange koi hi, well sharedo miro dadestar.
43012027	Man hi daar an miro dji. Hoi nai penap me? Tata, le mandar kowa krik, hoi ap mande wella? Na-a, me wom ap kai phub, te lap kowa ap mande, hoi kanna wella.
43012028	Tata kre, te sharell hakeno tiro lab!" Koi was i rakepen dran o bolepen un penas: "Me krom, kai well job sharedo. Un kowa krau me pale."
43012029	Bud menshe, kai koi pashal tardo hi un shunan kowa, penan: "O bolepen das gole." Wawar penan: "Kowa his i Debleskro bolepaskro, kai rakras leha."
43012030	Penas o Jesus: "Ko rakepen was tumenge rakedo, gar mange.
43012031	Kanna well i phagi pral i tseli phub wi-rakedo. Kanna witsrell o Dewel koles win, kai hi o rai pral kai phub.
43012032	Te hom pral I phub habedo, tsardau lauteren pash mande."
43012033	Kowa penas job, te sikrell lo, har job merella.
43012034	Koi penan i menshe ap leste: "Dran o Debleskro lab shunam, kai ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, atchell hako tsiro. Har nai peneh tu, kai o Menshengro Tchawo hunte well ap o trushel dino? Koon hi ko Menshengro Tchawo?"
43012035	Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Koi momeli hi gar buder raha pash tumende. Djan tumaro drom jaake raha, har koi momeli pash tumende hi, te well gar i rati pral tumende! Koon an i rati djala, djinell gar, kai job djala.
43012036	Patsenn ap koi momeli, jaake raha har tumen koi momeli hi! Palle wenn tumer menshe, kolen hi i momeli ap pengro drom un djiwenn gar an o tamlepen." Har o Jesus kowa ap lende penas, djas lo peske, un khatras pes lendar.
43012037	Ninna te kras job bud baro un sorelo koowa glan lende, kai kek mensho nai krella, patsan jon gar ap leste.
43012038	Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Jesaja, ko Debleskro rakepaskro, glan i raha tsiro penas: Rai, koon patsell men, hoi mer penah? Koon haiwella o Debleskri bari soor?
43012039	O Jesaja penas ninna glan-wi, hoske jon nai gar patsenna:
43012040	O Dewel kras, kai dikenn jon nai gar. Un lengro dji kras job pandlo. Kowa kras job, te dikenn jon nai tchi pengre jakentsa, un te djal tchi dre an lengro dji. Te nai mukenn le gar pengro tchilatcho drom un wenn pash o Debleste, te krell lo len sasto.
43012041	Glan i raha tsiro dikas o Jesaja o Jesuseskro railepen un rakras lestar. Doleske penas job kowa glan-wi.
43012042	Ninna bud kol pralstune biboldendar patsan ap leste. Un jon penan tchi i wawarenge, kai jon ninna ap o Jesuseste patsenna. Jon daran i Farisarjendar, te wenn le lendar gar pale-tchiddo kerdo.
43012043	Lenge his budeder moldo, te wenn jon sharedo i menshendar har o Deblestar.
43012044	Un o Jesus das soreles gole: "Koon ap mande patsella, kowa patsell gar ap mande kokres. Kowa patsell ninna ap koleste, kai bitchras man.
43012045	Un koon man dikella, kowa dikell koles, kai bitchras man.
43012046	Me hom koi bari momeli, hoi was ap kai phub. Hakeno, koon ap mande patsella, atchell gar an i rati.
43012047	Te shunell jek mire laba un krell gar, hoi me penom, hom gar me, kai rakrau i phagi pral koleste win. Me wom gar ap i phub, te dap i menshen i phagi. Me wom, te lap len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
43012048	Koon lell man gar pre, un kamell gar mire laba te shunell, kowa lell peskri phagi. Kol laba, hoi me rakrom, denn les i phagi ap ko diwes, kai o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende wi-rakedo wella.
43012049	Kowa, hoi me penom, well gar mandar. O dad, kai bitchras man, penas mange, hoi me penap un rakrap.
43012050	Me djinau, leskro lab dell tumen o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Doleske rakrau me kowa jaake, har miro dad les mange penas."
43013001	His o diwes glan kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa. O Jesus djinas, kai leskro tsiro was, te mukell lo i phub, te djal lo pale pash peskro dadeste. O tselo tsiro kamas lo kolen o djijestar, kai leskre his. Un job mukas gar tele, te kamell lo len.
43013002	Ap koi rati, har jon chan, das o beng o Judases an o dji, te phukrell lo ap leste. O Judaseskro dad his o Simon Iskariot.
43013003	O Jesus djinas, kai o Dewel, leskro dad, halauter an leskre wasta tchiwas, un kai job o Deblestar was, un kai job pale pash o Debleste djala.
43013004	Doleske stas job pre, riwas peskre pralstune ripja wi un pandas peske i damedira trujal.
43013005	Pal kowa tchoras job o pani an i piri, un thowas peskre malenge i pire. Un job las koi damedira, hoi job trul peste pandas, un khossas lengre pire.
43013006	Har job pash o Simon Petreste was, penas kowa ap leste: "Rai, thoweh tu mire pire?"
43013007	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Hoi me kraua, haiweh tu kanna gar. Pal i tsiro haiweh tu kowa."
43013008	Penas o Petro ap leste: "An kek tsiro kamau me, te thowess mire pire!" "Te thowau tut gar," penas o Jesus, "hal tu gar miro."
43013009	"Rai," penas o Simon Petro, "thob mange gar i pire kokres! Thob mange ninna i wasta un o shero!"
43013010	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Koon tseles thodo hi, hunte well buder gar thodo. Job hi djudjo. Leskre pire kokres hunte thowell lo. Tumer han djudjo, jek kokres hi gar djudjo."
43013011	O Jesus djinas, koon ap leste phukrella. Doleske penas job: "Jek kokres hi gar djudjo."
43013012	Har lengre pire thodo his, las o Jesus peskre pralstune ripja, beshas pes pale tele un penas ap lende: "Djinenn tumer, hoi me tumenge krom?
43013013	Tumer penenn ap mande: Sikepaskro un Rai. Un kowa hi tchatcho. Me hom kowa.
43013014	Te thowom me, tumaro rai un sikepaskro, tumare pire, jaake hunte thowenn tumer ninna tumenge i pire, jek o wawareske.
43013015	Me krom tumenge kowa glan, te krenn tumer kowa ninna, jek o wawareske.
43013016	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: I budepaskro hi gar bareder har leskro rai. Un jek, kai was bitchedo hi gar bareder har kowa, kai les bitchras.
43013017	Tumer djinenn kowa kanna halauter. Te krenn tumer kowa, han bachtelo.
43013018	Kowa penau me gar tumendar halauterendar. Me djinau, kones me win rodom. Kowa hunte well jaake, har an o Debleskro lab tardo hi: Kowa, kai chal kanna o maro mantsa, stakrell pal mande.
43013019	Me penau tumenge kowa kanna, te patsenn tumer, te wella kowa. Ap ko tsiro djinenn tumer, kai me hom kowa, koon me hom.
43013020	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon jekes an peskro kheer lella, koles me bitchrom, kowa lell man an peskro kheer. Un koon man an peskro kheer lella, kowa lell koles an peskro kheer, kai bitchras man."
43013021	Har o Jesus kowa penas, dukas les kowa an o dji, un job penas: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Jek tumendar phukrella ap mande."
43013022	Koi dikan leskre mala darenes jek ap o wawareste. Jon djinan gar, konestar job rakrella.
43013023	Jek lendar, koles, kai kamas o Jesus o djijestar, his pash leste beshdo.
43013024	Lestar mangas o Simon Petro te putchell lo o Jesusestar, koon kowa hi, kai phukrella ap leste.
43013025	Koi tchiwas pes kowa pale ap o Jesuseskro betch un putchas lestar: "Rai, koon mendar hi kowa?"
43013026	Penas o Jesus: "Me tchiwau i kotar maro an ko tcharo, un koneste me ko maro dau, kawa hi kowa, kai phukrella ap mande." Har job ko maro dran ko tcharo win las, das job kowa o Judases, koleskro dad hi o Simon Iskariot.
43013027	Har o Judas ko kotar maro las, was o beng an leste. "Hoi kameh te kress, kowa kre sik!" penas o Jesus ap leste.
43013028	Kek, kai koi pashal beshdo his, djinas, hoske job kowa leske penas.
43013029	Mashkral lende his kolla, kai haiwan, har te penals o Jesus ap leste, te ginell job tchomone dre, hoi len hunte well ap o festo. Kol wawar haiwan, har te penals o Jesus, te dell job tchomone i tchorwelende. O Judas his kowa, kai hidjas koi possita lengre lowentsa pash peste.
43013030	Har o Judas ko maro chas, djas lo sik win. His rati.
43013031	Har o Judas win djas, penas o Jesus: "Kanna well o Menshengro Tchaweskro railepen un leskri soor diklo. Un o Debleskro railepen un leskri soor well diklo ap leste.
43013032	Te was o Debleskro railepen un leskri soor ap leste diklo, dell o Dewel leste peskro railepen. Un ko tsiro hi kanna kai.
43013033	Tchowale, me hom gar buder raha pash tumende. Tumer rodenn man, un kowa, hoi me kol biboldenge penom, penau me kanna ninna tumenge: Kai me djau, nai djan tumer gar.
43013034	Kowa hi newo, hoi me tumenge kanna penau: Te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar, jaake har me kamau tumen o djijestar!
43013035	Ap kowa dikell hakeno, kai tumer mire mala han, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar."
43013036	"Rai, kai djah tu?" putchas o Simon Petro lestar. Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Kote, kai me kanna djaua, nai djah tu gar peha. Pal i tsiro weh tu ninna koi."
43013037	"Rai, hoske nai wau me kanna gar tuha?" putchas o Petro lestar. "Me meroms tuke ninna."
43013038	"Tu kameh mange te merell?" putchas o Jesus lestar. "Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: O bashno dell gar gole jaake raha, har tu man gar triin kope buchoste dal."
43014001	"Tumaro dji hunte trashell gar. Patsenn ap o Debleste un patsenn ap mande!
43014002	An miro dadeskro kheer hi bud iseme. Te wals kowa gar jaake, penoms me kowa gar. Me djau koi un dikau, te wenn kol iseme tumenge kerdo.
43014003	Un te krom halauter jaake, te nai tsardenn dre, wau me pale, un lau tumen pash mande, te wenn tumer kote, kai me hom.
43014004	Tumer djinenn ko drom, kai me djaua."
43014005	"Rai," penas o Thomas ap leste, "mer djinah gar, kai tu djah. Har nai djinah ko drom?"
43014006	"Me hom o drom, un o tchatchepen un o djipen," penas o Jesus. "Dell kek wawar drom pash o dadeste, har man.
43014007	Te prindjrans man, prindjrans ninna miro dades. Un kanna prindjrenn les tumer un dikan les."
43014008	"Rai," penas o Filipo ap leste, "sike mende o dades! Kowa hi menge doha."
43014009	"Jaake raha hom pash tumende un tu prindjreh man gar, Filipo?" penas o Jesus. "Koon man dikella, kowa dikell o dades. Har nai peneh tu: Sike mende o dades?
43014010	Patseh tu gar, kai me an o dadeste hom un o dad an mande hi? Hoi me tumenge penau, kowa well gar mandar. Na-a! O dad, kai an mande hi, krell kowa halauter.
43014011	Patsenn man, kai me an o dadeste hom, un kai o dad an mande hi. Te patsenn tumer kowa gar, palle patsenn ap kowa, hoi me krau!
43014012	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon ap mande patsella, krell ninna kowa, hoi me krau. Un job krell bareder koowa har me, kanna, kai djau me pash o dadeste.
43014013	Un hoi tumer an miro lab mangenna, kowa kamau me te krell tumenge. Kowa, hoi o tchawo krella, sikrell i menshende o Debleskro railepen un leskri soor.
43014014	Kowa, hoi tumer mangenn an miro lab, kamau me tumenge te krell."
43014015	"Te kamenn tumer man o djijestar, krenn tumer, hoi me tumenge penom.
43014016	Un me mangau o dadestar, te bitchrell job tumenge i rakepaskres, kai well ap tumari rig. Job djal buder gar krik tumendar.
43014017	Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho, kai penell i menshenge o tchatchepen pral o Debleste. Kolla, kai patsenn gar ap o Debleste, nai lenn les gar. Jon dikenn les gar un prindjrenn les gar. Tumer prindjrenn les. Job atchell pash tumende, un hi an tumende.
43014018	Me mukau tumen gar kokres, har te well tumen kek dad. Me wau pash tumende.
43014019	An i tikno tsiro dikenn man i menshe ap kai phub buder gar. Tumer dikenn man. Me djiwau. Doleske djiwenn tumer ninna.
43014020	Ko diwes wella, kai tumer djinenna, kai me an miro dadeste hom, un tumer an mande han, un me an tumende hom.
43014021	Koon mire laba shunella un krell, hoi me penau, kowa kamell man tchatchepaha o djijestar. Un koon man kamella, koles kamell miro dad. Un me kamau les ninna o djijestar un me sikrau leste, koon me hom."
43014022	"Rai, hoske kameh tu mende te sikrell, koon tu hal, un gar i wawar menshende?" putchas lestar o Judas, kowa, kai his gar o Judas Iskariot.
43014023	Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Te kamell man jek o djijestar, kowa krell, hoi me penau. Koles kamell miro dad. Un mer wah pash leste un atchah pash leste.
43014024	Koon man gar kamella, kowa krell witar gar, hoi me penau. Un hoi me penau, well gar mandar. Kowa well miro dadestar, kai bitchras man.
43014025	Kau koowa penom me tumenge, jaake raha har me pash tumende homs.
43014026	Me te hom buder gar pash tumende, bitchrell o dad tumenge o rakepaskres, kai well ap tumari rig. Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho. Un job penell tumenge halauter jaake, te nai haiwenn kowa mishto. Un job mukell tumenge halauter an o shero te well, hoi me tumenge penom.
43014027	Ninna te hom me gar pash tumende, atchell koi bacht, hoi me dom tumen, an tumare djia. Me dau tumen miri bacht. Koi bacht nai denn tumen gar i menshe ap kai phub. Ma trashenn! Ma awenn dareno!
43014028	Tumer shunan, hoi me penom: Me djau mange un wau pale pash tumende. Te kamans man o djijestar, wans tumer bachtelo, kai me pash o dadeste djau. Miro dad hi bareder har me.
43014029	Me penau tumenge kawa kanna, te patsenn tumer ap ko tsiro, kai kowa wella, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi me tumenge penom.
43014030	Man hi buder gar bud tsiro, te rakrap tumentsa. O beng, kai hi o rai pral kai phub, wella. Les hi kek soor pral mande.
43014031	Me krau, hoi miro dad mange penas, te dikenn i menshe ap kai phub, kai kamau les o djijestar. Stenn pre, te djas menge!"
43015001	"Me hom ko tchatcho drakengro ruk. Un miro dad hi ko hacho, kai budrella an koi baar, kai i drakengre ruka tardo hi.
43015002	Hako senelo kasht ap mande, hoi anell kek drake, tchinell job tele. Un ko kasht, hoi anell drake, krell job djudjo, te anell lo budeder drake.
43015003	Tumer han djudjo. Mire laba, hoi penom tumenge, kran tumen djudjo.
43015004	Atchenn an mande un me atchau an tumende! Te atchenn tumer gar an mande, well kek latcho koowa dran tumende, jaake har ko kasht nai anell dran peste kek drake. Job hunte atchell ap o ruk.
43015005	Me hom ko drakengro ruk. Un tumer han kol kashta. Koon atchell an mande un me an leste, dran koleste well bud latchepen. Tumer te han gar mantsa khetne, nai krenn tumer tchi.
43015006	Koon atchell gar an mande, kowa well win witsedo, har kol kashta, kai tele tchindlo hi. Jon wenn khetne rodedo un an i jag tchiddo, te chatchrenn le.
43015007	Te atchenn tumer an mande un krenn kowa, hoi me penom, palle nai mangenna mandar, hoi kamenna. Un kowa lenn tumer.
43015008	Te well bud latchepen dran tumende, well miro dad sharedo. Un tumer wenn mire mala.
43015009	Har miro dad man o djijestar kamella, jaake kamau me tumen ninna o djijestar. Atchenn an miro kamlepen!
43015010	Te krenn tumer kowa, hoi me tumenge penom, atchenn tumer an miro kamlepen jaake, har me kowa krau, hoi miro dad mange penas. Un me atchau an leskro kamlepen.
43015011	Kowa penom me tumenge, te well miri bacht an tumende jaake baro, har djal gar bareder.
43015012	Kowa kamau tumendar, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar jaake har me tumen kamau o djijestar.
43015013	Kekes hi bareder kamlepen har kowa, kai merell peskre malenge.
43015014	Te krenn tumer, hoi me tumenge penom, han mire mala.
43015015	Tumer han mange buder gar budepangre. I budepaskro djinell gar, hoi leskro rai krella. Tumenge penom halauter, hoi shunom miro dadestar. Doleske han tumer kanna mire mala.
43015016	Tumer rodan man gar wi. Me rodom tumen wi, te djiwenn jaake, te well dran tumaro djipen latcho koowa, hoi atchella. Un o dad dell tumen halauter, hoi mangenn lestar an miro lab."
43015017	"Krenn, hoi me tumenge penau: Kamau, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar!
43015018	Te kamenn tumen i menshe ap kai phub gar, ma bistrenn, kai jon kaman man witar gar.
43015019	Te hans tumer menshe kai phubjatar, palle kamans le tumen. Jon kamenn kolen, kai hi jaake har jon. Tumer han gar kolendar. Me rodom tumen dran lende wi. Doleske kamenn le tumen gar.
43015020	Rikrenn an tumaro shero, hoi me tumenge penom: I budepaskro hi gar bareder har leskro rai. Lan man jon palla, lenn jon tumen ninna palla. Te shunan jon ap kowa, hoi me lenge penom, shunenn jon ninna, hoi tumer lenge penenna.
43015021	Tumer han miro. Doleske hi jon tchilatcho ap tumende. Jon prindjrenn koles gar, kai bitchras man.
43015022	Te woms me gar pash lende, un penoms lenge gar halauter, lans le kek doosh ap pende. Kanna nai penenn jon gar: Mer djinam gar, kai kowa, hoi kram, tchilatcho hi.
43015023	Koon man gar kamella, kowa kamell witar gar miro dades.
43015024	Te kroms me gar glan lengre jaka ko baro koowa, hoi nai kek wawar kras, wals len kek doosh. Kanna dikan jon kowa. Un ninna te dikan le les, hi le tchilatcho ap mande un ap miro dadeste.
43015025	Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Jon hi tchilatcho ap mande, ninna te krom kek tchilatchepen ap lende.
43015026	"Te hom pash o dadeste, palle bitchrau tumenge o rakepaskres, kai wella ap tumari rig. Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho. An leste hi o tchatchepen. Job wella o dadestar, un penell o tchatchepen pral mande.
43015027	Ninna tumer, kai hans o tselo tsiro pash mande, penenn i menshenge mandar, hoi tumer dikan un shunan."
43016001	"Kowa halauter penom me ap tumende, te denn tumer gar tumaro patsepen ap mande pre.
43016002	Jon krenn tumen pale-tchiddo. Un ko tsiro wella, kai denn jon tumen mulo un penenn: O Dewel kamas kowa jaake.
43016003	Jon prindjrenn o dades gar un man witar gar. Doleske krenn jon kowa.
43016004	Te well ko tsiro, hunte djinenn tumer, kai kowa jaake wella, har me les tumenge penom. Me penom tumenge kowa gar, har homs pash tumende. Kanna penau tumenge kowa.
43016005	Kanna djau me pash koleste, kai bitchras man. Un kek tumendar putchell mandar: Kai djah tu?
43016006	Kowa, hoi tumenge penom, dukell tumen an o dji.
43016007	Patsenn man: Hi mishto tumenge, te djap mange. Te djau me gar, nai well ko rakepaskro gar pash tumende, kai wella ap tumari rig. Me te djau mange, bitchrau les pash tumende.
43016008	Job te wella, palle krell job i menshenge i jaka pre pral lengri doosh, pral o Debleskro tchatchepen un pral o Debleskri choli, hoi wella pral kai phub.
43016009	Lengri doosh hi, kai patsenn le gar ap mande.
43016010	O Debleskro tchatchepen dikenn le ap kowa, kai me djau pash o dadeste, un tumer dikenn man buder gar.
43016011	Kai o Debleskri choli pral kai phub wella, dikenn le ap kowa, kai i phagi pral o rajeste pral kai phub wi-rakedo hi.
43016012	Me kamoms tumenge jaake bud te penell. Tumer haiwenn nai kowa kanna gar.
43016013	Te well o Debleskro Ducho, kai o tchatchepen an leste hi, sikrell lo tumende o tselo tchatchepen. Job rakrell gar dran peste. Hoi job shunella, kowa rakrell job. Un hoi wella, penell job tumenge glan-wi.
43016014	Job sharell man. Halauter, hoi job penell tumenge, well mandar.
43016015	Halauter, hoi o dades hi, hi ninna miro. Doleske nai penau me: Lauter, hoi job penell tumenge, well mandar.
43016016	Pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man buder gar. Un pale pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man tumer pale."
43016017	"Hoi penell lo," putchan leskre mala jek o wawarestar, "te penell lo ap mende: Pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man buder gar; un pale pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man tumer pale; un me djau pash o dadeste?
43016018	Hoi hi kowa, te penell lo: I tikno tsiro? Mer djinah gar, hoi job rakrella."
43016019	O Jesus haiwas lendar, kai kaman le lestar kowa te putchell, un job penas ap lende: "Kamenn tumer te djinell, hoi kowa hi, kai penom: Pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man buder gar; un pale pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man tumer?
43016020	Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Well i tsiro, kai tumer rowenna, un denn i wasta pral o shero khetne. Un i menshe, kai gar ap mande patsenna, hi bachtelo. Ninna te rowell tumaro dji ap ko diwes, djinenn: Tumaro ropen well tumendar krik lino, un tumer wenna bachtelo.
43016021	I djuwel, kai lell i tarnepen, kolat hi duka. Te hi ko tarnepen koi, bistrell li kol duka. Jaake bari hi lakri bacht, kai joi las i tarnepen.
43016022	Kanna rowell tumaro dji. Un me penau tumenge kanna: Me wau pale pash tumende. Un tumer wenn bachtelo. Un koi bacht nai lell tumendar kek krik.
43016023	Ap ko diwes, putchenn tumer mandar tchi. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te mangenn tumer miro dadestar tchomone an miro lab, kowa dell job tumen.
43016024	Bis kanna mangan tumer tchi an miro lab. Mangenn un job dell tumen, te well tumari bacht jaake bari, bareder djal gar!
43016025	Kowa penom me tumenge gar an o mui. O diwes wella, kai me rikrau buder tchi pale. Palle rakrau tumentsa miro dadestar jaake, kai haiwenna halauter.
43016026	Ap ko diwes mangenn tumer o dades an miro lab. Me penau gar, kai me mangau miro dades tumenge.
43016027	Miro dad kamell tumen ninna jaake har me kamau tumen. Tumer kamenn man o djijestar un patsenna, kai me o Deblestar wom. Doleske kamell tumen miro dad ninna o djijestar.
43016028	Me wom o dadestar, un wom ap kai phub. Un me mukau pale kai phub, un djau pash miro dadeste."
43016029	Koi penan leskre mala ap leste: "Kanna rakreh tu jaake, kai haiwah kowa. Tu rikreh buder tchi pale.
43016030	Kanna djinah mer, kai tu halauter djineh. Tu djineh glan-wi, hoi i menshe kamenn tutar te putchell. Doleske patsah mer, kai tu o Deblestar weh."
43016031	"Kanna patsenn tumer?" penas o Jesus.
43016032	"Dikenn, ko tsiro wella un hi koi, kai nashenn tumer halauter mandar. Hakeno djal pale khere. Un man mukenn tumer kokres. Ninna te mukenn man, hom me gar kokres. O dad hi pash mande.
43016033	Kowa lauter penom tumenge, te well tumen i bari bacht an o dji pral kowa, kai han mire. Kate ap kai phub hi tumen daar. Ma darenn! Me hom sorleder har halauter ap kai phub."
43017001	Pal kol laba dikas o Jesus pre an o bolepen un penas: "Tata, o tsiro hi kai. Sike, hawo railepen un hawi soor tu tiro tchaweste dal, te sikrell job ninna tiro railepen un tiri soor!
43017002	Tu dal les i soor pral i tsele menshende, te dell job lauteren, kai tu les dal, o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
43017003	Kowa hi ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella: Te prindjrenn jon tut, kai tu hal o tchatcho Dewel, un te prindjrenn jon o Jesus Kristes, koles tu bitchral ap kai phub.
43017004	Me sikrom kol menshen tiro railepen un tiri soor ap i phub. Un me krom halauter, hoi tu mange penal.
43017005	Un kanna, tata, de man ko railepen un koi soor, hoi his man pash tute, har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his!
43017006	Tu dal menshen dran kai phub gole un dal len mande. Kolende sikrom, koon tu hal. Jon his tiro un tu dal len mande. Un jon rikran pen ap tiro lab.
43017007	Jon djinenna kanna, kai halauter, hoi tu man dal, tchatchepaha tutar well.
43017008	Hoi tu mange penal, penom me lenge dureder. Un jon lan mire laba pre un haiwan, kai me tchatchepaha tutar wom. Un jon patsan, kai tu man bitchral.
43017009	Kolenge mangau me. Me mangau gar kol wawar menshenge ap kai phub. Me mangau kolenge, kai tu man dal. Jon hi tire.
43017010	Halauter, hoi miro hi, hi ninna tiro. Un hoi tiro hi, hi ninna miro. Ap lende well miro railepen un miri soor diklo.
43017011	An i tikno tsiro hom buder gar ap kai phub. Me wau pash tute. Jon hi ap kai phub. Miro dad, tu hal o baro Dewel, rike len an tire wasta, te atchenn jon pash tute, te wenn jon jek, jaake har mer ham!
43017012	Jaake raha har me pash lende homs, dom garda ap lende an tiri soor, kai tu man dal. Me rikrom len, te djan jon gar krik tutar. Kek lendar djas nashedo. Jek kokres djas nashedo, jaake te was tchatcho, hoi lestar tchindlo was.
43017013	Kanna wau me pash tute. Kowa rakrau lauter jaake raha, har hom me ap kai phub, te well koi bacht an lengre djia jaake bari, bareder djal gar.
43017014	Me penom lenge tire laba. Jon hi gar kai phubjatar, jaake har me hom witar gar kai phubjatar. Doleske hi i menshe ap kai phub chojemen ap lende.
43017015	Me mangau tutar gar, te less len tu dran kai phub win. Me mangau tut, te rikress tu o benges lendar pale.
43017016	Jon hi gar kai phubjatar, jaake har me hom witar gar kai phubjatar.
43017017	Muk len tiro tchatchepen te dikell, te djiwenn le pengro tselo djipen tuke kokres! Tiro lab hi o tchatchepen.
43017018	Me bitchrau len pash i menshende, jaake har tu man pash i menshende bitchral.
43017019	Me dau tut miro tselo djipen. Kowa krau lenge, te wenn jon ninna tire an o tchatchepen.
43017020	Me mangau gar lenge kokres. Me mangau ninna kol menshenge, kai shunenna, hoi jon mandar penenna, un dran kowa ap mande patsenna.
43017021	Me mangau tutar, te wenn le halauter jek, jaake har tu, tata, an mande hal, un me an tute hom. Jaake te wenn jon jek an mende, te patsenn i menshe, kai tu man bitchral.
43017022	Me dom len ko railepen un koi soor, hoi tu man dal, te wenn jon jek, jaake har mer jek ham.
43017023	Me djiwau an lende. Un tu djiweh an mande. Jaake te wenn jon jek. Un i menshe dikenna, kai tu man bitchral, un kai tu len jaake kameh, har tu man kameh.
43017024	Tata, me kamau, te wenn kolla, kai tu man dal, pash mande, kote, kai me hom, te dikenn le miro railepen un miri soor, hoi tu man dal. Tu kamal man o djijestar, har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his.
43017025	Tata, tu hal an o tchatchepen tardo! I menshe ap kai phub prindjrenn tut gar. Me prindjrau tut. Un kalla haiwan, kai tu man bitchral.
43017026	Me sikrom lende, koon tu hal. Kowa krau me dureder, te well tiro kamlepen, hoi hi tut mange, ninna an lende. Jaake djiwau me an lende."
43018001	Har o Jesus kowa penas, djas job peskre malentsa wi. Un jon djan wergal ko pani, hoi kharella Kidron. Koi his i baar. Koi dre djas o Jesus peskre malentsa.
43018002	Kote his lo bud kope peskre malentsa. Doleske prindjras ninna o Judas, ko phukepaskro, koi baar.
43018003	Un o Judas djas kote. Leha wan kol lurde un kliste, kolen i bare rashaja un i Farisarja bitchran. Len his chare un kashta un hidjan momlia un jag.
43018004	O Jesus djinas halauter, hoi ap leste wella un djas wi pash lende un putchas lendar: "Kones rodenn tumer?"
43018005	"O Jesuses dran Nazaret," penan jon ap leste. "Me hom kowa!" penas o Jesus. O Judas, ko phukepaskro, his pash lende tardo.
43018006	Har o Jesus ap lende penas "Me hom kowa," djan jon i kotar pale un peran ap i phub.
43018007	Pale putchas o Jesus lendar: "Kones rodenn tumer?" "O Jesuses dran Nazaret," penan jon.
43018008	"Me penom tumenge, kai me kowa hom," penas o Jesus. "Te hom me kowa, koles tumer rodenna, palle mukenn kol wawaren te djal."
43018009	Kowa penas o Jesus, te well tchatcho, hoi job glan-wi penas: "Tata, me nashrom kekes kolendar, kai tu man dal."
43018010	O Simon Petro, koles his i charo pash peste. Job las peskro charo, un das jek klisteske o tchatcho kand tele. Kowa kharas Malcho un his i klisto, kai budras o baro rashajeske.
43018011	Koi penas o Jesus ap o Petreste: "Tchip tiro charo pale! Djap me gar ko drom, kai miro dad kamell, te djap les, ninna te wenn kote bare duka ap mande?"
43018012	Un i lurde pengro pralstuneha un i biboldengre kliste tapran o Jesuses un pandan les.
43018013	Un anan les pash o Hannas. Kowa his o dad o Kajafeskri romjatar. O Kajafas his an kau bersh baro rashai.
43018014	Job his kowa, kai penas i biboldenge: "Wals feteder menge, te merals jek i tsele menshenge."
43018015	O Petro un i wawar o Jesuseskre malendar djan o Jesuseske palla, har job an o kheer o baro rashajestar anlo was. O baro rashai prindjras ko wawar males. Doleske djas nai job o Jesuseha an ko kheer.
43018016	O Petro atchas win glan o wudar tardo. Koi was ko wawar pale, kowa, kai his o baro rashajestar prindjedo, un rakras koi djuwjaha, kai das garda glan o wudar, un las o Petres dre.
43018017	Koi djuwel, kai das glan o wudar garda, putchas o Petrestar: "Hal tu gar jek kol malendar ko murshestar koi?" "Na-a, me gar!" penas job.
43018018	Koi his budepangre un kliste tardo, kai kran i jag. Lenge his shila un jon tatsran pen. O Petro his ninna pash lende tardo, te tatsrell lo pes.
43018019	Kanna putchas o baro rashai o Jesuses win pral leskre malende un pral kowa, hoi job i menshenge penas.
43018020	O Jesus penas ap leste: "Me rakrom glan i tsele menshende jaake, kai hakeno kowa nai shunas. Hako tsiro rakrom an i biboldengri kangri un an o Debleskro baro kheer, kai i tsele bibolde khetne wan. Me penom tchi tchorchanes.
43018021	Hoske putcheh tu mandar? Putch kolendar, kai shunan man. Jon djinenna, hoi me penom!"
43018022	Har job kowa penas, das jek kol biboldengro klistendar, kai koi pashal tardo his, o Jesuses an o mui un penas: "Har nai rakreh tu jaake o baro rashajeha?"
43018023	Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Nai peneh tu, kai me tchilatcho koowa rakrom? Te penom me lauter, hoi tchatcho hi, hoske dal tu man?"
43018024	O Hannas anas les pandlo pash ko baro rashajeste Kajafas.
43018025	O Petro his koi tardo un tatsras pes. Koi penan le ap leste: "Hal tu gar jek leskre malendar?" Job das buchoste un penas: "Me hom kowa gar."
43018026	"Dikom me tut gar an i baar pash leste?" penas jek klisto, kai budrell ko baro rashajeske. Kau klisto his jek koleskre menshendar, koleske o Petro o kand tele das.
43018027	Pale das o Petro buchoste, un penas: "Me homs gar pash leste." Kanna das o bashno gole.
43018028	Kanna anan le o Jesuses dran o Kajafeskro kheer wi, un anan les an o baro kheer o themeskro rajestar, kai i Remari his. His taissarlake. I bibolde djan gar leha an ko baro kheer dre, te wenn le gar pale-tchiddo. Jon kaman te nai chan le ko chapen ap ko baro diwes, kai kharella Passa.
43018029	O themeskro rai, - leskro lab his Pilato - djas pash lende wi un putchas lendar: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job?"
43018030	Jon penan ap leste: "Te wals kau mursh gar tchilatcho, anams les gar pash tute."
43018031	"Ake, lenn les un denn les tumer i phagi pal o biboldengro tchatchepen!" penas o Pilato ap lende. "Mer nai marah kekes pal o Remarjengro tchatchepen," penan kol bibolde.
43018032	Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Jesus pral peskro merepen glan-wi penas.
43018033	O Pilato djas pale an peskro kheer, un mukas o Jesuses dre te anell, un putchas lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?"
43018034	"Peneh tu kowa dran tute wi? Penan kowa tuke wawar mandar?" putchas o Jesus.
43018035	"Hom me i biboldo?" penas o Pilato. "Tire menshe un i bare rashaja dan tut an mire wasta. Hoi kral tu?"
43018036	Koi penas o Jesus: "Miro them un i menshe, kolengro rai me hom hi gar kai phubjatar. Te wals miro them kai phubjatar, un ninna i menshe, kolengro rai me hom, palle kurans pen mire budepangre i biboldentsa, te perap me gar an kolengre wasta. Me penau tuke: Miro them un mire menshe, kolengro rai me hom, hi gar kai phubjatar."
43018037	Putchas o Pilato lestar: "Hal tu tchatchepaha i baro rai?" Penas o Jesus: "Awa, hi jaake har tu penal. Me hom i baro rai. Me wom boldo ap kai phub, te penap o tchatchepen. Koon an o tchatchepen tardo hi, kowa shunell ap mande."
43018038	"Hoi hi o tchatchepen?" putchas o Pilato lestar. Un har job kowa penas, djas lo pale wi pash i biboldende un penas ap lende: "Me hatsau kek doosh ap leste.
43018039	Shunenn, pash tumende well hako bersh ap kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa, i stildo dran o stilepen muklo. Kamenn tumer, te mukap o baro rajes pral i biboldende te djal?"
43018040	Jon dan pale gole: "Gar koles! Mer kamah, te mukess o Barabes dran o stilepen win!" Kowa his i marepaskro.
43019001	Koi las o Pilato o Jesuses, un mukas les i tchupnijaha te dell.
43019002	I lurde pandan subjengre kashta khetne un tchiwan len leske ap o shero jaake, har i baro rai hidjell shereskro sonakai ap peskro shero. Un jon tchiwan leske i loli rajeskri plashka trujal.
43019003	Un wan glan leste un penan: "Sharedo wess tu, baro rai pral i biboldende!" Un jon dan les an o mui.
43019004	Un pale djas o Pilato pash i biboldende win, un penas ap lende: "Me anau les pash tumende win, te dikenn tumer, kai hatsau kek doosh ap leste."
43019005	Un o Jesus was wi. Un ap leskro shero his i pandle subjengre kashta, un koi loli kutch plashka his ap leste. Un o Pilato penas ap lende: "Dikenn, hawo mensho hi lo!"
43019006	Har kol bare rashaja un kol kliste o Jesuses dikan, dan jon gole: "De les ap o trushel! De les ap o trushel!" "Lenn tumer les," penas o Pilato, "un denn les ap o trushel! Me hatsau kek doosh ap leste."
43019007	"Pal maro biboldengro tchatchepen hunte well lo mulo dino," penan i bibolde ap o Pilato. "Job penas, kai hi lo o Debleskro tchawo."
43019008	Har o Pilato kowa shunas, was i bari daar ap leste.
43019009	Job djas pale an peskro kheer un putchas o Jesusestar: "Kai weh tu?" O Jesus penas tchi koi pre.
43019010	Koi putchas o Pilato lestar: "Rakreh tu mantsa gar? Djineh tu gar, kai kowa an mire wasta hi, te mukap tut te djal. Un te dap tut ap o trushel, hi ninna an mire wasta?"
43019011	Penas o Jesus: "Tut wals kek soor pral mande, te dals tut o Dewel koja gar. Doleske hi koles, kai das man an tire wasta, bareder doosh har tut."
43019012	Koi kamas o Pilato o Jesuses mukell te djal. Kol bibolde dan gole: "Te mukeh tu koles te djal, hal tu kek maal o baro rajestar an o foro Rom! Hakeno, koon krell pes har te well job i baro rai, kowa hadell pes pral leste."
43019013	Har o Pilato kol laba shunas, anas job o Jesuses wi un beshas pes ap ko tchatchepaskro beshepaskro, hoi kharella Barengri Phub. Ap o biboldengro rakepen kharella kowa Gabbata.
43019014	His jaake deesh-te-dujenge, jek diwes glan kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa. Un o Pilato penas ap kol biboldende: "Dikenn, kowa hi tumaro baro rai!"
43019015	Jon dan gole: "Mare les! Mare les, un de les ap o trushel!" Koi putchas o Pilato lendar: "Kamenn tumer te dap tumaro baro rajes ap o trushel?" "Men hi kek wawar rai har o baro rai an o foro Rom kokres," penan kol bare rashaja.
43019016	Kanna das job o Jesuses an lengre wasta, te denn le les ap o trushel. Un o Jesus was krik anlo.
43019017	Un job hidjas peskro trushel, un djas dran ko foro win ap ko kotar them, hoi kharella muleskro shero. Kowa kharella ap o biboldengro rakepen Golgata.
43019018	Kote dan le les ap o trushel, un dui wawar mursha ninna. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar. Un o Jesus his mank lende.
43019019	O Pilato tchinas ap i kotar kasht: O Jesus dran Nazaret, o baro rai pral i biboldende. Ko kotar kasht was pral ap o trushel dino.
43019020	Kowa, hoi koi pre tchindlo hi, draweran bud bibolde. Ko kotar them, kai dan le o Jesuses ap o trushel, his gar dur o forestar tchiddo. Un kol laba his tchindlo ap hebretikes, lataintikes, un grichtikes.
43019021	Koi penan kol bare rashaja ap o Pilateste: "Ma tchin: O baro rai pral i biboldende! Tchin, kai job penas: Me hom o baro rai pral i biboldende!"
43019022	"Kowa atchell jaake, har me kowa tchinom!" penas o Pilato.
43019023	Kol lurde, kai o Jesuses ap o trushel dan, lan leskre ripja, un kran dran lende star kotja. Un hakeno las i kotar. Ko telstuno ripen his gar khetne sido. Kowa his an jek kotar.
43019024	Koi penan jon jek ap o wawareste: "Mer mukah ko ripen jaake, har kowa hi. Mer khelah, koon les lella." Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Hakeno las i kotar mire ripjendar. Un koon miro telstuno ripen lella, khelan jon win. Jaake kran i lurde.
43019025	Tel ko trushel, kai o Jesus pre dino his, his leskri dai un kolakri pheen tardo. Ninna i Maria, kolakro rom o Kleopas hi, un i Maria Magdalena his koi tardo.
43019026	Har o Jesus peskri dat dikas un pash late peskro males, koles, kai job o djijestar kamas, penas lo ap peskri date: "Romnija, dik, kowa hi kanna tiro tchawo!"
43019027	Ap peskro maleste penas lo: "Dik, koja hi kanna tiri dai!" Koi las ko maal lat pash peste an peskro kheer.
43019028	Pal kowa, har o Jesus djinas, kai job halauter kras, penas lo: "Man hi trush!" Kowa penas job, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab glan-wi penlo was.
43019029	Koi his i khoro tardo. Kowa his pherdo shutli mool. Un jon lan tchomone har i kotar thann, kran les pherdo shutli mool, tchiwan kowa ap i baro kasht, hoi kharella Ysop, un rikran leske kowa glan o mui.
43019030	Har pijas o Jesus koi shutli mool, penas lo: "Me krom lauter, hoi hunte krom." Un job tchiwas peskro shero glan tele, un meras.
43019031	His o diwes glan o Debleskro diwes. Ko Debleskro diwes his i baro diwes. Doleske kaman i pralstune bibolde gar, te atchenn i mule ap ko Debleskro diwes ap o trushel. Un jon mangan o Pilatestar, te wenn i herja kolendar phagedo, kai ap o trushel dino wan, te merenn le sikeder. I bibolde kaman, te lenn le len sik tele.
43019032	Koi wan i lurde un phagan i herja kol dui wawarendar, kai kote ap i trushel dino wan.
43019033	Har jon pash o Jesuseste wan un dikan, kai job mulo hi, phagan jon leskre herja gar.
43019034	Jek kol lurdendar das les peskro chareha an i rig tchurje. Koi was pani un rat win.
43019035	Un kowa, kai dikas kowa halauter, penas i wawarenge, hoi job dikas. Un kowa, hoi job penas, hi tchatcho. Un job djinella, kai job o tchatchepen penella, te patsenn tumer ninna.
43019036	Kowa was halauter jaake, har an o Debleskro lab glan-wi penlo was: Kek kokalo was leske phagedo,
43019037	un ninna: Jon dikenn koles, kai dan le an i rig tchurje.
43019038	Pal kowa djas o Josef, kowa, kai dran o foro Arimatia his, pash o Pilateste, un mangas lestar, te dell job les o mulo Jesuses. O Josef patsas ap o Jesuseste tchorchanes i darjatar i pralstune biboldendar. Un o Pilato penas, kai job o Jesuses o trushelestar nai tele lella. Un jaake djas job pash o trushel, un las les tele.
43019039	Ninna o Nikodemus, kowa, kai was jek kopo an i rat pash o Jesuseste, was kote un anas jaake triin-deesh kilo kutch djet, kerdo dran Myrrhe un dran Aloe.
43019040	Un jon lan o mulo Jesuses un pandan les an laintikre kotja, kai tchiwan le ko kutch djet dre, hoi sungella mishto, jaake har i bibolde kowa krenna.
43019041	Kote, kai o Jesus ap o trushel dino was, his i baar. An koi baar his i newo mulengro kheer. Koi his kek mensho dre tchiddo.
43019042	Un har dikan le, kai ko mulengro kheer gar dur hi, tchiwan le kote o Jesuses dre. Len his kek tsiro. O Debleskro diwes wals sik.
43020001	Sik taissarlake, pal o Debleskro diwes, har gomme rati his, was i Maria Magdalena pash ko mulengro kheer, un dikas, kai ko bar buder gar glan o wudar hi.
43020002	Koi nashas joi pash o Simon Petreste un pash ko wawareste kol deesh-te-dujendar, koles, kai kamas o Jesus o djijestar, un penas ap lende: "Jon lan o rajes dran ko mulengro kheer win. Un mer djinah gar, kai jon les tchiwan."
43020003	Koi djas o Petro un ko wawar pash ko mulengro kheer.
43020004	Kol dui nashan khetne. Ko wawar nashas sikeder har o Petro. Jaake was job glan leste pash o mulengro kheer,
43020005	dikas koi dre, un dikas kol laintikre kotja kote tchiddo. Job djas gar dre.
43020006	Pal leste was o Simon Petro un djas an ko mulengro kheer dre, un dikas kol laintikre kotja kote tchiddo.
43020007	Ko diklo, kai trul o Jesuseskro shero pandlo his, his gar pash kol wawar laintikre kotja tchiddo. Kowa his khetne pandlo, un his kokres tchiddo.
43020008	Kanna djas ninna ko wawar o Jesuseskre malendar dre, kai glan leste pash ko mulengro kheer was. Un job dikas un patsas.
43020009	Jon haiwan gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tardo hi, kai job hunte stella i mulendar pre.
43020010	Pal kowa djan kol dui pale khere.
43020011	I Maria his win glan o mulengro kheer tardo un rowas. Har joi jaake rowas, dikas li an o mulengro kheer dre.
43020012	Kote, kai o Jesus tchiddo his, dikas joi dui bolepangren an parne ripja beshdo. Ko jek his kote, kai leskro shero tchiddo his, un ko wawar, kai leskre herja his.
43020013	"Hoske roweh tu, romnija?" putchan kol bolepangre i Mariatar. "Jon lan miro rajes krik," penas li, "un me djinau gar, kai jon les tchiwan."
43020014	Un har joi kowa penas, risras pes li trujal, un dikas o Jesuses. Job his glan late tardo, un joi prindjras les gar.
43020015	Koi penas o Jesus ap late: "Romnija, hoske roweh tu? Kones rodeh tu?" I Maria patsas: Job hi kowa, kai budrell an i baar. Doleske penas li: "Romeha, te anal tu les krik, pen mange, kai tu les tchiwal, te djap koi, un lap les pale!"
43020016	"Maria!" penas o Jesus. Koi risras pes li trujal, un penas ap hebretikes: "Rabuni!" Kowa kharella Sikepaskro.
43020017	Penas o Jesus ap late: "Ma tape ap mande! Me djom gomme gar pash o dadeste pale. Dja pash mire phralende un pen lenge: Me djau pash miro dadeste un pash tumaro dadeste un pash miro Debleste un pash tumaro Debleste."
43020018	Koi djas i Maria Magdalena pash o Jesuseskre malende, un penas lenge: "Me dikom maro rajes!" Un joi penas lenge, hoi job lake penas.
43020019	Har rati his ap kau diwes, - kowa his i kurko, - his o Jesuseskre mala khetne. I darjatar kol biboldendar his lengro wudar klidedo. Ap jek kopo was o Jesus dre, un djas mashkral lende, un penas ap lende: "O Debleskri bacht tumentsa!"
43020020	Har job kowa penas, sikras job lende peskre wasta, un peskri rig. Koi wan o Jesuseskre mala bachtelo, kai dikan le pengro rajes.
43020021	Pale penas o Jesus ap lende: "O Debleskri bacht tumentsa! Har miro dad man bitchras, jaake bitchrau me tumen."
43020022	Un har job kowa penas, phurdas job ap lende, un penas: "Lenn o Debleskro Ducho!
43020023	Ap koneste tumer penenna: Tiri doosh hi krik lino, koleske well li krik lino. Un ap koneste tumer penenna: Tiri doosh atchell ap tute, ap koleste atchell li."
43020024	O Thomas, jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, koles dan le ninna Didimo gole, his gar koi pashal, har o Jesus pash lende was.
43020025	Ap leste penan i wawar kol deesh-te-dujendar: "Mer dikam maro rajes!" Job penas ap lende: "Te dikau me gar leskre wasta, kai saster dre dino was, un te tchiwau me gar miro gushto koi dre un miro wast an leskri rig, patsau me kowa gar."
43020026	Un pal ochta diwessa his o Jesuseskre mala pale khetne an ko kheer. Un o wudar his klidedo. Kau kopo his o Thomas pash lende. Ap jek kopo his o Jesus mashkral lende tardo, un penas: "O Debleskri bacht tumentsa!"
43020027	Pal kowa penas job ap o Thomas: "Tchip tiro gushto ap mire wasta, un tchip tiro wast an miri rig. Atch gar har jek, kai patsell gar. Pats kanna!"
43020028	Koi penas o Thomas ap leste: "Miro rai un miro Dewel!"
43020029	"Kanna, kai dikal man, patseh tu," penas o Jesus. "Bachtele hi kolla, kai patsenna, ninna te dikenn le man gar."
43020030	Bud wawar baro koowa kras o Jesus an o Debleskri soor glan peskre malende, kai gar an kau liil tchindlo hi.
43020031	Kawa was tchindlo, te patsenn tumer, kai o Jesus ko baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Job hi o Debleskro tchawo. Un te patsenn ap leste, lenn tumer o tchatcho djipen lestar.
43021001	Pal kowa mukas pes o Jesus glan peskre malende pale te dikell, har jon pash o baro pani Tiberias his. Un kowa was jaake:
43021002	O Simon Petro un o Thomas, kowa, kai dan le les Didimo gole, un o Natanael dran o gab Kana an o them Galilea, un kol Zebedeskre tchawe un wawar dui o Jesuseskre malendar his koi khetne.
43021003	Un o Simon Petro penas ap lende: "Me djau te matchrell." "Mer kamah tuha te djal," penan kol wawar. Jon djan wi un djan an o panjeskro ulepaskro dre. Un koi rati tapran le tchi.
43021004	Sik taissarlake his o Jesus pash o pani tardo, un leskre mala prindjran les gar.
43021005	Un o Jesus putchas lendar: "Tapran tumer tchi?" "Na-a," penan le.
43021006	Penas o Jesus: "Witsrenn tumare matchengre gone tchatches win pash o panjeskro ulepaskro! Un tumer taprenna i matche." Koi witsran jon i matchengre gone win, un tapran jaake bud matche, kai tsardan le nai i matchengre gone buder gar dran o pani win.
43021007	Koi penas ko jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, koles o Jesus o djijestar kamas, ap o Petreste: "Kowa hi maro rai." Har o Simon Petro kowa shunas, riwas lo peskro pralstuno ripen an, hoi riwas lo win, un witsras pes an o pani, te well lo sikeder ap o them.
43021008	Kol wawar mala wan an ko panjeskro ulepaskro, un tsardan ko matchengro gono pal pende. Jon his gar dur o themestar, nai well sheel metarja.
43021009	Har jon dran o panjeskro ulepaskro djan, dikan le i jag. Koi his pekle matche pre. Maro his ninna koi.
43021010	Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Anenn kol matchendar, kai tumer kanna tapran!"
43021011	Koi djas o Simon Petro pale an o pani dre, un tsardas ko matchengro gono ap o them. Koi his sheel-te-pantch-deesh-te-triin (153) bare matche dre. Ninna te his jaake bud matche koi dre, djas o matchengro gono gar paash.
43021012	"Awenn un chan!" penas o Jesus ap lende. Kek lendar putchas lestar: Koon hal tu? Halauter djinan, kai job lengro rai hi.
43021013	O Jesus was pash lende, las ko maro, un das les lende. Jaake kras job ninna kol matchentsa.
43021014	Kowa his o triinto kopo, kai mukas pes o Jesus glan peskre malende te dikell pal kowa, har job i mulendar djido was.
43021015	Pal o chapen penas o Jesus ap o Simon Petreste: "Simon, tu o Johanneskro tchawo, kameh tu man budeder har kal tsele wawar man kamenna?" "Awa, rai!" penas job ap leste. "Tu djineh, kai me kamau tut o djijestar." "De mire tikne bakren te chal!" penas o Jesus.
43021016	I duito kopo putchas o Jesus lestar: "Simon, tu, o Johanneskro tchawo, kameh tu man o djijestar?" "Awa, rai!" penas job. "Tu djineh, kai me kamau tut o djijestar." "De garda ap mire bakre!" penas o Jesus ap leste.
43021017	O Jesus putchas lestar o triinto kopo: "Simon, tu, o Johanneskro tchawo, kameh tu man o djijestar?" Koi was o Petreske ropaske pral kowa, kai job triin kope putchas: Kameh tu man o djijestar? Un job penas: "Rai, tu djineh halauter. Tu djineh, kai me tut kamau o djijestar." Penas o Jesus: "De mire bakren te chal!
43021018	Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Har tu tarno hals, pandal tu tiri dori kokres trul tiro ripen, un djal kote, kai tu kamal. Te wal tu phuro, rikreh tu tire wasta glan tute, un i wawar pandell tire wasta khetne, un anell tut kote, kai tu gar kameh te djal."
43021019	Jaake kamas o Jesus o Petreste te sikrell, har job merella un an peskro merepen o Debles bares un railes krella. Pal kowa penas o Jesus ap leste: "Am mantsa!"
43021020	O Petro risras pes trujal, un dikas koles kol deesh-te-dujendar, kai o Jesus les o djijestar kamas. Job his kowa, kai tchiwas pes ap o Jesuseskro betch an koi rati, har jon khetne chan, un putchas lestar: "Rai, koon mendar phukrella ap tute?"
43021021	Har o Petro koles dikas, putchas job o Jesusestar: "Rai, hoi well dran koleste?"
43021022	Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Te kamau me, te atchell job djido, bis te wau pale, palle hi kowa gar tiro koowa. Am tu mantsa!"
43021023	Jaake was mashkral kol patslende penlo: Kowa merella gar. O Jesus penas gar, kai kowa gar merella. Job penas: "Te kamau me, te atchell job djido, bis te wau pale, palle hi kowa gar tiro koowa!"
43021024	Kau maal o Jesusestar hi kowa, kai nai penell, kai kowa lauter tchatcho hi. Job dikas kowa un tchinas les an kau liil. Un mer djinah, kai kowa, hoi job penas, tchatcho hi.
43021025	Hi ninna bud wawar koowa, hoi o Jesus kras. Te wals kowa lauter an i lila tchindlo, jek pal o wawar, wals i phub gar baro doha kol tsele pesse lilenge, patsau me.
44001001	Latcho Theofilo, an miro ersto liil tchinom tuke lauter, hoi o Jesus kras, un i menshende sikras,
44001002	jaake raha har job gomme gar an o bolepen djas. Glan kowa, kai djas lo an o bolepen, rakras lo kolentsa, kolen job win rodas, te wenn le peskre bitchepangre, un penas lenge an i soor, hoi das les o Debleskro Ducho, hoi jon hunte krenna.
44001003	Pal peskro merepen, djiwas lo star-deesh (40) diwessa kate ap kai phub, un mukas pes lendar te dikell bud kope. Un tchatchepaha jon dikan, kai hi job djido. Un job rakras lentsa pral o tsiro, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral i tsele menshende.
44001004	Har job lentsa khetne his, penas job lenge soreles: "Atchenn an o foro Jerusalem, un djan gar krik, jaake raha har bitchras miro dad an o bolepen gomme gar peskro Ducho ap tumende, jaake har penom les tumenge.
44001005	O Johanni tchiwas tumen an o pani, te well diklo, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. O Dewel tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende. Un o tsiro well sik, kai kowa wella."
44001006	Kolla, kai khetne wan, putchan lestar: "Rai, kreh tu an kau tsiro o them Israel pale baro un sorelo?"
44001007	Koi penas o Jesus: "Ko tsiro, kai o dad kowa krella, hi leskro koowa. Tumer hunte djinenn kowa gar.
44001008	Ap tumende well o Debleskro Ducho un dell tumen i bari soor. Palle rakrenn tumer mandar an o foro Jerusalem, un an o tselo them Judea, un an o them Samaria, un ap i tseli phub."
44001009	Har job kowa penas, was job glan lengre jaka an o bolepen hadedo, un i wolka las les pre.
44001010	Har jon leske palla dikan, har job an o bolepen djas, his dui mursha an bijale ripja pash lende tardo.
44001011	Kolla penan: "Murshale dran o them Galilea, hoske han tumer koi tardo, un dikenn an o bolepen? Kau Jesus, kai djas tumendar krik an o bolepen, kowa well jaake dran o bolepen pale har dikan tumer les an o bolepen te djal."
44001012	Palle djan jon o djeteskri berga tele un pale an o foro Jerusalem. Koi berga his gar dur kau forestar krik.
44001013	An o foro Jerusalem djan le an ko kheer, an koi pralstuni isema, kai jon khetne atchan: O Petro, o Johanni, o Jakobo, o Andreas, o Filipo, un o Thomas, o Bartolomeo, un o Mateo, un o Jakobo, koleskro dad o Alfeo hi, un o Simon, kai hi kol menshendar, kai kharenna Zelotarja, un o Judas, o Jakobeskro tchawo.
44001014	Kalen lauteren his jek dji un jek djipen un mangan o Debles an. Pash lende his ninna djuwja, un i Maria, o Jesuseskri dai, un o Jesuseskre phrala.
44001015	An kolla diwessa wan bud patsle khetne, sheel-te-biish menshe. Mashkral lende stas o Petro pre un penas:
44001016	Mire phrala, kowa, hoi an o Debleskro lab pral o Judas tchindlo hi, hunte was jaake. Glan raha tsiro penas o Debleskro Ducho o Davideske kowa, hoi wella pral o Judaseste. O Judas sikras o drom kolende, kai tapran o Jesuses.
44001017	Job his jek mendar. O Jesus rodas men khetne win, te was mer leskre bitchepangre.
44001018	O Judas ginas peske i kotar phub kol lowentsa, hoi job las, har job ap o Jesuseste phukras. Job peras o shereha glan tele ap koi phub, hoi job peske ginas, un leskre tsele buke wan dran leskro per wi. Un job meras.
44001019	I tsele menshe an o foro Jerusalem shunan kowa. Doleske penenn jon ap ko kotar phub, kai o Judas meras: Hakeldamach. Kowa kharella ap lengro rakepen ratli phub.
44001020	An o Debleskre gilja hi tchindlo: Leskro kheer hunte djal paash, un kek mensho djiwella koi dre. Un leskri budi hunte krell i wawar.
44001021	Doleske hunte rodas i wawar murshes win. Kowa hunte well i mursh, kai o tselo tsiro mentsa khetne his, har o rai Jesus mank mende his,
44001022	ko tsirestar, kai thowas les o Johanni an o pani bis ap ko diwes, kai was lo mendar an o bolepen lino. Kau mursh hunte penell mentsa khetne i menshenge, kai o Jesus i mulendar pre stas.
44001023	Un jon rodan dui murshen win: o Matias un o Josef, koles dan le ninna Barsabas un Justo gole.
44001024	Palle mangan jon o Debles un penan: "Rai, tu prindjreh i tsele menshengre djia. Sike mende, kones tu kol dujendar win rodal,
44001025	te penell job i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar un krell koi budi, hoi o Judas mukas. Kowa mukas men un djas peske."
44001026	Un jon witsran i kashta, un jek kasht sikras ap o Matias. Un job was o Jesuseskro bitchepaskro jaake har i wawar deesh-te-jek Jesuseskre bitchepangre.
44002001	Ap i biboldengro baro diwes, hoi kharella Pfingsta his jon lauter an jek kheer khetne.
44002002	Ap jek kopo phurdas i sorelo un diwjo ducho dran o bolepen an ko tselo kheer, kai jon khetne his.
44002003	Koi dikan le tchomone, hoi hi har jagakre tchipja. Un ap hakeneste tchiwas pes jek tchip.
44002004	Un jon wan lauter pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un rakran an wawar rakepen. Un jon rakran ko rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das.
44002005	Ap ko tsiro his an o foro Jerusalem bibolde dran bud themma, kai mangan o Debles an.
44002006	Har jon ko baro un sorelo ducho shunan, wan jon lauter koi khetne, un kran bare jaka, har hakeno shunas len an leskro rakepen te rakrell.
44002007	"Kowa dell gar!" dan i bibolde gole. "Kolla, kai rakrenn kote, hi dran o them Galilea.
44002008	Har well kowa, kai jon an maro rakepen rakrenna, har te wans le an maro them boldo?
44002009	-
44002010	Mer wah dran i themma Partia, Media, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Kappadocia, Pontus, Asia, Frigia, Pamfilia, Egiptia, dran o foro Kirene, kai hi an o them Libia, un ninna dran o foro Rom.
44002011	Wawar mendar wan dran i themma Arabia un Kreta. Mer shunah len an maro rakepen te rakrell, hawo baro koowa o Dewel kras!"
44002012	Un i bibolde dan i wasta pral o shero khetne, un djinan gar buder, hoi kowa hi. Un jek putchas i wawarestar: "Hoi well kowa?"
44002013	Wawar san len win, un penan: "Kol mursha hi mato!"
44002014	Koi stas o Petro un kol wawar deesh-te-jek Jesuseskre bitchepangre pre, un o Petro das gole, un penas ap i biboldende: "Murshale dran o them Judea, un tumer tsele wawar, kai djiwenn kanna an o foro Jerusalem, me kamau tumenge te penell, hoi kate lauter djala kolentsa, kai rakrenna an wawar rakepen. Shunenn, hoi tumenge penau!
44002015	Kol mursha hi gar mato, har tumer penenna. Hi enjenge taissarlake.
44002016	Kowa, hoi tumer kate dikenna, penas o Debleskro rakepaskro Joel glan i raha tsiro:
44002017	Ko tsiro wella, penell o Dewel, kai me tchiwau miro Debleskro Ducho ap i tsele menshende. Un tumare tchawe un tcha dikenn nai glan-wi, hoi wella. Un i tarne mursha dikenn kowa, hoi o Dewel len sikrell, un i phure mursha denn suni.
44002018	Ninna ap mire budepangre, mursha har djuwja, tchiwau me miro Debleskro Ducho. Un jon penenn i menshenge mire laba.
44002019	Un me kamau baro un sorelo koowa te krap, an o bolepen un ap i phub. Tumer dikenn rat, un jag, un tampa.
44002020	O kham well kalo, un o tchon well lolo har o rat. Koi djinenn tumer, te well ko baro diwes sik, kai well o rai Jesus pale.
44002021	Un koon ap o Jesuseste gole della, koles lell lo dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
44002022	Murshale dran Israel, shunenn kal laba, hoi penau tumenge! O Dewel bitchras ko murshes, o Jesuses dran Nazaret, pash tumende. Kowa kras baro un sorelo koowa mank tumende, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Jaake sikras o Dewel, kai o Jesus lestar was. Tumer djinenn kowa, un dikan kowa lauter.
44002023	Tumer dan o Jesuses an i wasta kolendar, kai gar ap o Debleste patsenna. Un kolla dan les ap o trushel, un kote meras job. Un hoi tumer leha kran, kowa his jaake glan-diklo o Deblestar.
