44002024	Ko Jesuses kras o Dewel djido. Job las les i mulendar win, un kek soor nai rikras les pash i mulende pale.
44002025	Ninna o David rakras o Jesusestar, har job penas: Me dikau hako tsiro ap o Debleste, miro rajeste. Job dell man soor, te rikrap man ap leste.
44002026	Doleske hom me bachtelo an o dji un me giwau. Ninna te merau, djinau:
44002027	Tu mukeh man gar pash i mulende, un kameh gar, te ferdjal miro mass.
44002028	Tu sikral mange ko drom, hoi dell man o djipen. Un pash tute hom me bachtelo."
44002029	Un o Petro penas dureder ap lende: "Murshale, mire phrala, mukenn man tumenge te penell, hoi man ap o dji hi. Maro baro rai David meras, un was paskedo. Leskro muleskro kheer nai dikenn tumer kau diwes.
44002030	O David his i Debleskro rakepaskro, kai nai dikas glan-wi, hoi wella. O David djinas, hoi o Dewel leske penas, te well jek pal leste, hoi well o baro rai. Un kowa wella leskre menshendar. O Dewel das pes sowel, te well kowa jaake.
44002031	Un o Dewel mukas o David glan-wi te dikell, kai o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre stella. Lestar penas o David, te atchell job gar pash i mulende, un te ferdjal gar leskro mass.
44002032	Kau Jesuses mukas o Dewel i mulendar pre te stell. Kowa djinah mer. Mer halauter dikam les djido.
44002033	Un o Dewel kras les rai pral halauter, un tchiwas o Debleskro Ducho ap leste, jaake har job penas. Un ko Debleskro Duches tchiwas o Jesus ninna ap mende. Kawa shunenn un dikenn tumer kate.
44002034	O David djas gar pre an o bolepen. Jaake rakras job gar pral peste, har job penas: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig,
44002035	bis te tchiwau kolen tel tire pire, kai kamenn tut gar.
44002036	I tsele menshe an Israel hunte djinenna, o Dewel kras, te hi kau Jesus, koles tumer ap o trushel dan, o rai pral halauter. Job hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."
44002037	Har kol menshe kowa shunan, djas lenge kowa an lengro dji. Un jon putchan o Petrestar un kol wawar Jesuseskre bitchepangrendar: "Murshale, mire phrala, hoi kras mer?"
44002038	Koi penas o Petro ap lende: "Tumer anan doosh ap tumende. Mangenn tumen tele glan o Debleste! Un mukenn tumen an o Jesus Kristeskro lab an o pani te thowell, te lell o Dewel tumari doosh tumendar tele, un te lenn tumer o Debleskro Ducho!
44002039	O Dewel penas, te dell lo peskro Ducho tumende, un tumare tchawende, ninna kolende lauterende, kai kanna dur lestar hi, un kai job pash peste gole della."
44002040	Un bud wawar labentsa rakras o Petro lentsa, un mangas len, un penas ap lende: "Mukenn tumen win te lell dran o tchilatchepen, te lenn gar koi phagi, hoi well pral kal tchilatche menshende, kai djiwenn an kau tsiro."
44002041	Kolla, kai lan leskre laba an pengro dji pre, mukan pen lestar an o pani te thowell. Un ap ko diwes wan triin serja menshe ap o Jesuseste patslo.
44002042	Un hako tsiro wan le khetne un shunan, hoi o Jesuseskre bitchepangre lenge penan. Un jon chan o maro khetne, un mangan o Debles an.
44002043	Un o Jesuseskre bitchepangre kran bud baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Un i traash was pral i menshende.
44002044	Kolla, kai patslo wan, atchan lauter khetne. Un jon tchiwan pengro tselo brawlepen khetne, un kowa his lauterenge koi.
44002045	Jon bikran kowa, hoi len his, i kotar phub un wawar kutch koowa, un dan les kol patslende, kai len tchi his.
44002046	Hako diwes wan le khetne an o Debleskro baro kheer. Jon chan o maro khetne an i khera. Un jon his bachtelo, te dan jon nai i phralen ninna te chal. Kowa kran le o djijestar.
44002047	Jon sharan o Debles, un i tsele menshe dikan latches ap lende. Un hako diwes wan wawar menshe koi pashal, hoi patslo wan.
44003001	His jek diwes, his trinenge, koi djan o Petro un o Johanni an o Debleskro baro kheer, te mangenn le o Debles an.
44003002	Kote his i mursh, kowa his bango jaake raha har djiwell lo. Leskre menshe beshan les hako diwes glan o shukar wudar glan o Debleskro baro kheer, te nai mangell lo lowe kolendar, kai djan an o Debleskro baro kheer dre.
44003003	Har job o Johannes un o Petres dikas, har jon an o Debleskro baro kheer kaman te djal, mangas job lendar lowe.
44003004	Jon dikan soreles ap leste, un o Petro penas ap leste: "Dik ap mende!"
44003005	Un job dikas ap lende. Job patsas, te denn le les tchomone.
44003006	O Petro penas: "Rup un sonakai hi man gar. Hoi man hi, dau me tut. An o lab o Jesus Kristestar dran Nazaret penau me tuke: Ste pre un dja trujal!"
44003007	Un o Petro tapras les pash o tchatcho wast, un har job les pre tsardas, wan leskre pire sorelo un sasto.
44003008	Job stas sik pre, nai djas, un djas lentsa an o Debleskro baro kheer, nashas un stas trujal un sharas o Debles.
44003009	Un i tsele menshe dikan, kai stas job trujal, un sharas o Debles.
44003010	Un jon prindjran les pale, kai job ko mangepaskro his, kai glan o Debleskro baro kheer beshdo his, glan ko wudar, kai kharell shukar wudar. Un jon kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi jon dikan, hoi leha djas.
44003011	Un kau mursh djas buder gar lendar krik. Un i tsele menshe nashan pash lende khetne an koi isema, hoi kharell Salomoneskri bari isema, un jon kran bare jaka.
44003012	Har o Petro kolen dikas, penas lo ap lende: "Murshale dran Israel, hoske krenn tumer sawe bare jaka, un dikenn ap mende? Kowa kras gar mari soor, witar gar maro patsepen, te nai nashell kawa mursh.
44003013	Na-a! O Dewel o Abrahamestar, un o Isaakestar un o Jakobestar, ko Dewel mare dadendar sikras tumende kate, hawi bari soor un railepen job peskro budepaskres, o Jesuses, das. Koles dan tumer an o Pilateskre wasta, un dan les buchoste, har o Pilato kamas les te djal mukell.
44003014	Tumer dan koles buchoste, kai was o Deblestar, un kai his kek tchilatchepen an leste. Un tumer mangan o Pilatestar, te mukell lo koles dran o stilepen te djal, kai maras jekes.
44003015	Ko rajes, kai o djipen della, maran tumer. Koles mukas o Dewel i mulendar pre te stell. Kowa djinah mer, mer dikam les.
44003016	Mer patsah ap leste. Doleske was kau mursh sasto. Tumer prindjrenn les lauter un djinenn, kai job nashas nai gar. Job patsas ap o Jesus Kristeste, un kowa kras les sasto.
44003017	Me djinau, mire phrala, kai tumer djinan gar, hoi tumer koi kran o Jesuseha. Un tumare pralstune djinan kowa witar gar.
44003018	Lauter was jaake, har o Dewel kowa penas. Leskre rakepangre penan glan i raha tsiro, kai hunte merell ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job un lell i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win.
44003019	Mukenn tumaro phuro djipen un awenn pash o Debleste, te lell job tumari doosh tumendar!
44003020	Palle well ko latcho tsiro, kai dell tumen o Dewel newi soor. Job bitchrell tumenge koles, kai was tumenge glan i raha tsiro win rodedo. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo.
44003021	Job atchell an o bolepen jaake raha, bis te well ko tsiro, kai wella lauter newes kerdo. Kowa penan menge o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro. O Dewel penas les lenge.
44003022	O Mose penas: I Debleskro rakepaskro har me hom, sawes bitchrell o Dewel pash tumende. Kowa hi jek tumare menshendar. Shunenn ap hako lab, hoi job tumenge penella!
44003023	Koon gar ap koleste shunella, koles hunte tchiwenn tumer pale, te nai well lo buder gar pash tumende.
44003024	Ninna o Samuel un kol wawar rakepangre, kai pal leste wan, rakran pral kal diwessa, kai mer kanna djiwah.
44003025	Kowa, hoi kol Debleskre rakepangre i menshenge penan, hi tumenge. Tumer han i tchawe kolendar. Un ko lab, hoi o Dewel tumare phurenge penas, un peskro wast pre das, hi ninna tumenge. Job penas ap o Abrahameste: Koi bacht, hoi dau tire menshende, djal dureder ap i tsele menshende, kai ap i phub hi.
44003026	Doleske bitchras o Dewel peskro budepaskres, o Jesuses, glanstunes pash tumende, te anell job tumenge o Debleskri bacht, te djal hakeno tumendar peskro tchilatcho dromestar tele."
44004001	Har o Petro un o Johanni kowa i menshenge penan, wan i rashaja pash lende, ninna ko pralstuno kol klistendar an o Debleskro baro kheer, un i Saddukarja.
44004002	Jon his chojemen pral o Petreste un o Johanneste, te sikran kalla i menshende o Debleskro drom un penan, kai o Jesus i mulendar pre stas.
44004003	Doleske tapran le len un tchiwran len i rati an o stilepen.
44004004	Bud kolendar, kai shunan kol laba, hoi o Petro penas, wan patslo. Nai his pantch serja menshe.
44004005	O wawar diwes, taissarlake, wan i biboldengre pralstune un phureder un tchatchepangre an o foro Jerusalem khetne.
44004006	Ninna o Hannas, ko baro rashai, un o Kajafas, un o Johanno, un o Alexandro, un kol tsele wawar, kai his kol bare rashajengre menshendar, his koi pashal.
44004007	Un jon mukan o Jesuseskre bitchepangren glan pende te anell, un jon putchan lendar: "An koneskri soor un an koneskro lab kran tumer kowa?"
44004008	Un o Petro, pherdo Debleskro Ducho, penas ap lende: "Tumer pralstune un tumer phureder, shunenn!
44004009	Mer kram i latcho koowa ap i nasselo mensheste. Un doleske ham kanna glan tumende tardo. Tumer putchenn mendar, har job sasto was.
44004010	Jaake hunte djinenn tumer un i tsele menshe an o them Israel: O Jesus Kristo dran Nazaret, koles tumer ap o trushel dan, kras kau murshes sasto. Kau Jesuses mukas o Dewel i mulendar pre te stell.
44004011	Kowa hi ko bar, kai tumer ap i rig witsran. Kowa was i bar, kai hidjell o tselo kheer.
44004012	Kek wawar har o Jesus kokres nai anell men pash o Debleste. Ap i tseli phub das o Dewel kek wawares, kai nai lell men dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."
44004013	Har jon dikan, har o Petro un o Johanni rakran, kai kek traash an lende his, kran le bare jaka. Un jon haiwan, kai kolla kek bare rakepangre un gosewe mursha hi, un djinan ninna, kai jon o Jesuseha khetne his.
44004014	Ninna dikan le ko murshes, kai sasto was, pash lende tardo, un nai penan buder tchi.
44004015	Koi bitchran le len win, un rakran mank pende un penan:
44004016	"Hoi kras mer kal menshentsa? Hakeno an o foro Jerusalem djinell kanna, kai kran kolla i baro koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Mer nai dah kowa gar buchoste.
44004017	Das len soreles trad, te penenn jon kekeske buder tchi o Jesusestar, te djal ko rakepen gar dureder pash i tsele menshende!"
44004018	Un jon dan len gole, dan len trad, un penan ap lende: "Ma rakrenn buder tchi o Jesusestar! Ma penenn i menshenge tchi, hoi job tumenge penas!"
44004019	O Petro un o Johanni penan ap lende: "Penenn menge, hi kowa mishto glan o Debleste, te shunas mer budeder ap tumende har ap o Debleste?
44004020	Mer nai rikrah gar maro mui pral kowa, hoi dikam un shunam."
44004021	Koi dan le len soreles trad, un mukan len te djal. Jon hatsan tchi ap lende, kai nai dans jon lenge i phagi. I menshe sharan o Debles pral kowa, hoi koi djas.
44004022	Ko mursh, kai sasto was, his star-deesh bersha phuro.
44004023	Un har kolla mukan len te djal, wan jon pash i patslende, un penan lenge, hoi kol bare rashaja, un kol biboldengre phureder ap lende penan.
44004024	Har i patsle kowa shunan, mangan jon khetne o Debles an, un penan: "Rai, tu kral o bolepen un i phub, un o baro pani, un lauter, hoi djiwella.
44004025	O Debleskro Ducho rakras dran o Davideskro mui: Hoske hi i menshe ap kai phub tchilatcho? Hoske krenn jon kowa, hoi tchitcheske hi?
44004026	I bare raja ap kai phub un i bare pralstune wan lauter khetne. Jon hi chojemen ap o Debleste un ap ko baro rajeste, kones o Dewel bitchras.
44004027	Tchatchepaha, jon wan lauter an kau foro khetne: O Pilato, o Herodes, i Remarja, un i tsele bibolde dran bud themma. Jon hi chojemen ap tiro budepaskro Jesus, kai tutar was. Koles rodal tu win, maro Dewel, te well lo baro rai.
44004028	Jaake kran jon kowa, hoi tu glan i raha tsiro penal, te well kowa lauter jaake.
44004029	Rai, shuneh tu, kai jon men kanna trad denna? Mer ham tire budepangre. De men koi soor, te nai rakras tutar!
44004030	Sike lende tiri soor! Kre i nasselen sasto, un kre bud baro un sorelo koowa an ko lab o Jesusestar, kai tutar was un tiro budepaskro hi!"
44004031	Ap jek kopo, har jon o Debles an-mangan, trissas i phub kote, kai jon his. Un o Debleskro Ducho was ap lauterende. Un jon penan o Debleskro lab, un kek traash his an lende.
44004032	Kol tsele patslen his jek dji un jek djipen. Kek lendar penas: Ko brawlepen, hoi man hi, hi mange kokres. Na-a, kowa his lauterenge koi!
44004033	Bari sorjaha penan o Jesuseskre bitchepangre i menshenge, kai o Jesus i mulendar pre stas, un i menshe haiwan o Debleskro latchepen.
44004034	Hakenes his doha djipaske. Kolen, kai hi len i kotar phub, i kheer, un wawar koowa, bikran kowa,
44004035	un anan kol lowe pash i Jesuseskre bitchepangre. Un jon dan hakenes jaake bud, te his hakenes doha djipaske.
44004036	Jaake kras kowa ninna o Josef. Kowa his i Levitari un was dran o them Ciprus. O Jesuseskre bitchepangre dan les ninna Barnabas gole. Ko kharella ap lengro rakepen: O mursh, kai rakrell i menshentsa latcho, te hi lengro dji pharo.
44004037	Un koles his i kotar phub. Ko kotar phub bikras job, un anas kol lowe pash o Jesuseskre bitchepangre, te denn le kol lowe i patslende.
44005001	I mursh, kai kharas Ananias, leskri romni kharas Safira, jon khetne bikran i kotar phub.
44005002	Un job rikras lowe peske pale. Leskri romni djinas kowa. Un jon anan gar i tsele lowe glan o Jesuseskre bitchepangre.
44005003	O Petro penas ap o Ananias: "Hoske kral tu o bengeske tiro dji pre? Hoske chochal tu o Debleskro Duches, un rikral lowe tuke?
44005004	Tu nai rikrals tiro kotar phub. Un har bikral les, nai rikrals kol lowe ninna. Har nai kral tu sawo koowa? Tu chochal gar i menshen. Tu chochal o Debles."
44005005	Har o Ananias kol laba shunas, peras job khetne un meras. Un i bari traash was ap kolende, kai shunan kowa.
44005006	Koi stan i tarne mursha pre, un tchiwan pral leste i kotar plachta, hidjan les win un paskran les.
44005007	Pal i tsiro was leskri romni dre un djinas gar, hoi koi djas.
44005008	O Petro putchas latar: "Lan tumer jaake bud lowe, har tumer koi kotar phub bikran?" "Awa, jaake bud lowe lam," penas li.
44005009	O Petro penas ap late: "Hoske kran tumer kowa win, un chochan o Debles? Kol mursha, kai paskran tiro romes, hi glan o wudar tardo, un hidjenn ninna tut win."
44005010	Koi peras li khetne un meras. Un har i tarne mursha dre wan, hatsan le lat mules, hidjan lat wi, un paskran lat pash lakro romeste.
44005011	Koi was i bari traash pral i tsele patslende un pral kolende, kai shunan kowa.
44005012	Un o Jesuseskre bitchepangre kran bud baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor ap i menshende. Un i tsele patsle his an o Salomoneskri bari isema an o Debleskro baro kheer khetne.
44005013	Kol wawar, kai gar patsle his, trashan, te beshenn le pen pash lende. Ninna te trashan le lendar, rakran le lendar mishto.
44005014	Bud mursha un djuwja patsan ap o Jesuseste un wan i patslentsa khetne.
44005015	Un i menshe hidjan pengre nasselen ap i dromma, un tchiwan len kote ap o tchiben. Jon penan penge, te well o Petro koi pashal un leskro shatto perell ap lende, wenn le sasto.
44005016	Ninna dran wawar forja, hoi trul o foro Jerusalem tchiddo his, anan jon i nasselen un kolen, kai an lende benga his. Un lauter wan sasto.
44005017	Ko baro rashai un kol Saddukarja, kai pash leste his, kolla silweran ap o Jesuseskre bitchepangre,
44005018	un tapran len, un witsran len an o stilepen.
44005019	An i rati was i bolepaskro o Deblestar un kras kol wudja an o stilepen pre, un anas len win, un penas ap lende:
44005020	"Djan an o Debleskro baro kheer, un penenn i menshenge halauter pral o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella."
44005021	Har jon kowa shunan, djan jon taissarlake an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikran i menshende o Debleskro drom. Ko baro rashai un kolla, kai pash leste his, dan i pralstune bibolden khetne gole, ninna i tsele phureden an o them Israel. Un jon bitchran i klisten an o stilepen, te anenn le len glan lende.
44005022	Un har jon an o stilepen djan, his jon buder gar kote. Un kol kliste wan pale un penan:
44005023	"Ko stilepen his pandlo, un kol lurde his glan o wudar tardo. Un har i lurde menge pre pandan, his kek dre."
44005024	Har ko pralstuno klisto pral o Debleskro baro kheer un kol bare rashaja kowa shunan, djinan jon gar, hoi te patsenn le, un putchan pendar har kowa dureder djala.
44005025	Koi was jek un penas lenge: "Kol mursha, kai tumer stildo tchiwan, hi an o Debleskro baro kheer tardo, un penenn i menshenge o Debleskro lab."
44005026	Koi djas ko pralstuno klisto kol wawar klistentsa an o Debleskro baro kheer, un lan i Jesuseskre bitchepangre win. Kowa kran le kek sorjaha. I kliste daran i menshendar, te marenn le len i barentsa.
44005027	Un jon anan len glan kol tsele pralstunende, kai khetne wan. Un o baro rashai penas ap lende:
44005028	"Mer dam tumen soreles trad, te rakrenn tumer tchi buder o Jesusestar. Un kanna well lestar rakedo an o tselo foro Jerusalem. Un tumer penenn, kai mer maram les. Kamenn tumer, te well leskro rat pral mende?"
44005029	O Petro un i wawar Jesuseskre bitchepangre penan: "Mer hunte shunas ap o Debleste budeder har ap i menshende.
44005030	Ko Dewel mare phurendar mukas o Jesuses i mulendar pre te stell, koles, kai tumer ap o trushel dan un maran.
44005031	Koles hadas o Dewel un beshas les ap peskri tchatchi rig, te well lo rai un lell i menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win. Kowa kras o Dewel, te mukenn i menshe an o them Israel pengro phuro djipen, jaake te nai lell lo lengri doosh lendar krik.
44005032	Kowa dikam mer un penah nai tumenge, un o Debleskro Ducho ninna. Koles dell o Dewel kolende, kai shunenn ap leste."
44005033	Har jon kowa shunan, wan jon chojemen ap lende, un kaman len te marell.
44005034	Mank kol pralstunende his i Farisari, leskro lab his Gamaliel. Job his i biboldengro tchatchepaskro un an-diklo pash i tsele biboldende. Un kowa stas pre un penas: "Bitchrenn len i tikno tsiro win!"
44005035	Un pale penas lo: "Murshale an Israel, denn garda un dikenn, hoi tumer kal menshentsa kamenn te krell!
44005036	Glan i tsiro his i mursh, kowa kharas Thoidas. Job patsas pestar, te his lo i baro. Star-sheel mursha his pash leste, kai shunan ap leste. Palle was lo mulo dino. Un har job mulo his, atchan jon gar khetne. Un kek rakrell buder lendar.
44005037	Koi pal was i mursh dran o them Galilea, kowa kharas Judas. Kowa his an ko tsiro har i laba i biboldendar pre tchindlo wan. Kowa anas bud menshen ap peskri rig, te krenn le i kurepen i Remarjentsa. Ko Judas was ninna mulo dino, un kolla, kai pash leste his, hi gar buder koi. Un kek rakrell buder lendar.
44005038	Un kanna penau me tumenge: Mukenn tumare wasta kal menshendar! Mukenn len te djal! Te hi ko koowa i menshendar, palle atchella ko koowa gar.
44005039	Te hi ko koowa o Deblestar, palle nai phagenn les gar. Denn jak, te tchingrenn tumer gar ap o Debleste." Un jon shunan ap o Gamaliel.
44005040	Palle dan jon o Jesuseskre bitchepangren gole, dan len dawa i tchupnijaha, un dan len trad, te rakrenn le buder gar o Jesusestar. Un palle mukan le len te djal.
44005041	Koi djan jon penge i pralstunendar. Un jon his bachtelo, te hi le o Debleske jaake bud moldo, te rodas lo len win, te chan le dawa o Jesuseske.
44005042	Jon mukan gar tele, te penenn le o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Hako diwes djan le an o Debleskro baro kheer un pash i menshende an i khera, un sikran len o Jesuseskro drom.
44006001	An kol diwessa, kai i patsle budeder wan, djas i tchingepen mashkral i patslende, kai rakran hebretikes, un kol patslende, kai rakran grichtikes. Mashkral kolla, kai rakran grichtikes, his djuwja, kolengre romma mulo his. Un kolla lan gar jaake bud chapaske har kolla, kai rakran hebretikes. Doleske his kolla, kai rakran grichtikes, chojedo ap kolende, kai rakran hebretikes.
44006002	Koi dan kol deesh-te-dui Jesuseskre bitchepangre kol tsele patslen khetne gole, un penan: "Hi gar mishto, te das mer o chapen win, un men wals buder kek tsiro, te penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
44006003	"Doleske, mire phrala, rodenn mashkral tumende efta murshen win! Kolla hunte wenn mursha, kai hi pherdo Debleskro Ducho un goswepen. Kolla hunte lenn koi budi ap pende.
44006004	Mer kamah o Debles an-mangell, un i menshenge o Debleskro lab te penell."
44006005	Ko rakepen his i tsele patslenge mishto. Jon rodan o Stefanes win, koles his i sorelo patsepen un his i mursh pherdo Debleskro Ducho. Jon rodan ninna win o Filipo, o Prokoro, o Nikanor, o Timon, o Parmenas un o Nikolaus. Kowa his i gricho dran o foro Antiochia, kai las i biboldengro patsepen an un patsas kanna ap o Jesuseste.
44006006	Kol murshen anan le pash o Jesuseskre bitchepangre. Kolla tchiwan i wasta ap lende, un mangan o Debles, te dell lo len soor un goswepen an lengri budi.
44006007	O Debleskro lab was bud un budeder menshenge penlo, un bud wan patslo. An o foro Jerusalem wan ninna bud rashaja patslo.
44006008	O Stefano his i mursh pherdo Debleskro latchepen un Debleskri soor. Job kras bud baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor mank i biboldende.
44006009	Kote wan bibolde pash leste. Kolla wan dran bud biboldengre kangria. Jon his Libertarja, mursha dran i forja Kirene un Alexandria, un dran i themma Cilicia un Asia. Un jon rakran o Stefaneha un tchingran pen leha.
44006010	O Debleskro Ducho das les goswepen, te nai rakras kek lendar leske pale.
44006011	Palle anan le murshen ap lengri rig. Un kolla anan chochepen ap o Stefaneste pre. Jon penan: "Mer shunam, kai penas job djungele laba pral o Moseste un pral o Debleste."
44006012	Jon kran kol tsele menshen diwjo, ninna kol biboldengre phureden un tchatchepangren. Un jon wan ap leste pre, tapran les, un anan les glan i pralstune biboldende.
44006013	Kolla, kai chochepen ap leste pre anan, kolla penan: "Kau mursh mukell gar tele te rakrell lo djungele laba pral o Debleskro baro kheer un pral o Moseskre laba.
44006014	Mer shunam, har job penas: O Jesus dran Nazaret phagell o Debleskro baro kheer tele un krella, te hunte rikras mer buder gar ap kowa, hoi o Mose menge penas."
44006015	Un kol tsele pralstune dikan ap o Stefaneste, har leskro mui was jaake har i Debleskro bolepaskro.
44007001	Koi putchas ko baro rashai lestar: "Hi kowa tchatcho, hoi kolla penan?"
44007002	Koi penas o Stefano: "Tumer phrala un dada, shunenn! Maro baro un railo Dewel mukas pes maro dadestar Abraham te dikell an o them Mesopotamia. Ap ko tsiro djiwas o Abraham gomme gar an o foro Haran.
44007003	Un o Dewel penas ap leste: Dja dran tiro them! Muk tire menshen, un dja an ko them, hoi me tuke sikrau!
44007004	Koi djas o Abraham dran ko them Kaldea, un djiwas an o foro Haran. Un har leskro dad meras, anas o Dewel les an ko them, kai tumer kanna djiwenna.
44007005	O Dewel das les kek kotar phub an kau them, witar gar i tikno kotar. Un o Dewel das les peskro lab, te dell lo leskre tchawende i them. An ko tsiro his o Abrahames kek tchawo.
44007006	O Dewel penas ap leste: Tire tchawe, kai pal tute wenna, hi wi-themarja an i them, kai gar lengro hi. Star-sheel bersha hunte budrenn le i wawarenge tel duka un bare dawa.
44007007	Un kolla, kai len dan un dukran, kolen dau me i phagi. Un pal kowa djan le dran ko them win, un mangenn man kate an kau them an.
44007008	Un o Dewel das o Abrahameste peskro lab, te hi lo leskro Dewel un o Dewel lauterenge, kai pal leste wenna. Un job penas o Abrahameske, te mukell job pes ap peskro mass te tchinell. Ninna i tsele mursh tchawe, kai pal leste wenna, hunte wan tchindlo ap pengro mass. Un o Abraham las i tchawes, o Isaak. Un o Abraham tchinas les ap o mass, har job efta diwessa phuro his. Un o Isaak tchinas o Jakobes, un o Jakob peskre deesh-te-dui tchawen. Kolla hi mare phure dada, kolendar mer wam.
44007009	Mare phure dada silweran ap o Josefeste, un bikran les an o them Egiptia. Un o Dewel his pash leste,
44007010	un las les win dran halauter, hoi o Josefeske pharo his. Un o Dewel das les bud goswepen un kras, te dikas o baro rai pral o them Egiptia latcho ap o Josefeste. Ko baro rai kras, te was o Josef o rai pral o tselo them Egiptia un pral o tselo rajeskro kheer.
44007011	Un palle was i tsiro, kai bokan le an o tselo them Egiptia un an o them Kanaan. Un mare phure hatsan tchi te chal an o them Kanaan.
44007012	Har o Jakob shunas, kai an o them Egiptia djob della, bitchras job peskre tchawen an ko them, te ginenn le penge djob, un pal i tsiro bitchras lo len i duito kopo.
44007013	Har jon o duito kopo an o them Egiptia wan, prindjran le o Josefes. Koi djinas o baro rai pral o them, hawe menshendar o Josef his.
44007014	O Josef mukas peskro dades, un peskre tsele menshen an o them Egiptia te well. Kolla his efta-deesh-te-pantch menshe.
44007015	Jaake was o Jakob an o them Egiptia, un kote djiwas lo peskre tchawentsa. Kolla hi mare phure. Un kote meran le ninna.
44007016	Un lengre tchawe anan len an o them Kanaan un paskran len an o foro Sichem ap ko kotar phub, hoi ginas o Abraham kol menshendar, kolengro phuro dad o Hamor his.
44007017	Palle was ko tsiro, kai kowa was, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameske penas. I Israelitarja wan hako diwes budeder an o them Egiptia.
44007018	Koi was i wawar mursh baro rai pral o them Egiptia. Kowa djinas tchi o Josefestar,
44007019	un rodas i drom, har te rikrell lo mare menshen tele. Un jon hunte budran tel dawa, un hunte mukan pengre tikne tchawen, te merenn jon.
44007020	An ko tsiro was o Mose boldo. Un job his shukar an o Debleskre jaka. Triin tchon his job an peskro dadeskro kheer, un jon dan garda ap leste.
44007021	Un palle nai khatran le o Moses buder gar an o kheer. Un kote, kai tchiwan le les, hatsas les i tchai o baro rajestar pral o them Egiptia. Un joi las les pash peste un tsardas les pre, har te wals lo lakro tchawo.
44007022	Un gosewe Egiptarja sikran leste lauter, hoi jon djinan, jaake te was lo gosewo an lauter, hoi job rakras un kras.
44007023	Har o Mose star-deesh bersha phuro his, kamas lo pal peskre menshende, i Israelitarja, te dikell. Un job djas kote, kai budran le.
44007024	Un kote dikas job, kai jek leskre menshendar dawa chas. Un job djas koi, te well lo ap leskri rig, un das koi Egiptares pale un das les mulo.
44007025	O Mose patsas, kai peskre menshe haiwenna, kai o Dewel les bitchras, te lell lo len dran lengri bibacht win. Jon haiwan kowa gar.
44007026	O wawar diwes was job pash peskre menshende, har dui lendar tchingran. Un job das len trad, te tchingrenn le pen gar, un penas: Murshale, tumer han phrala, hoske tchingrenn?
44007027	Kowa, kai kras ko tchingepen das les i spildini un penas: Hal tu i tchatchepaskro un i rai pral mende, te hunte shunas ap tute?
44007028	Kameh tu man ninna mulo te dell, har tu taissar ko Egiptares mulo dal?
44007029	Har o Mose kowa shunas, nashas job peske, un djas an ko them Midian. Koi wan leske dui tchawe boldo.
44007030	Star-deesh bersha pal kowa his o Mose an o mulo them pash koi berga Sinai. Koi mukas pes i Debleskro bolepaskro glan leste te dikell an i subjengro bur, hoi chatchas.
44007031	Hoi job kote dikas, nai patsas lo gar. Jaake djas lo pash ko bur, te nai dikell lo feteder, hoi kowa hi. Kote rakras o Dewel ap leste:
44007032	Me hom o Dewel tire phurendar, o Dewel o Abrahamestar, o Isaakestar, un o Jakobestar. Un i bari traash was ap o Moseste, har job kowa shunas, un darjatar nai dikas lo gar kote pre.
44007033	Un o Dewel penas ap leste: Rib tire tircha win! Kote, kai tardo hal, hi o Debleskro them.
44007034	Me dikom, har mire menshe chan dawa an o them Egiptia. Un me shunom lengri gole un lengro ropen, un wom dran o bolepen tele, te lap len dran kau them win. Un me kamau, te djas tu an o them Egiptia.
44007035	O Dewel bitchras kau Moses, kai pash peskre menshende tchi moldo his. Kowa dikah mer koi pre, har jon penan: Koon kras tut pral mende tchatchepaskro un rai, te hunte shunas mer ap tute? O Dewel bitchras les, te well lo rai pral lende, un te anell lo len dran ko them win, kai jon pandle budepangre his. Kowa penas leske ko bolepaskro, kai dran i subjengro bur ap leste rakras.
44007036	Kau Mose anas i Israelitarjen wi un kras baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor an o them Egiptia, un pash o lolo pani, un star-deesh bersha an o mulo them.
44007037	Kowa his o Mose, kai ap lende penas: O Dewel bitchrell tumenge i Debleskro rakepaskres har me hom. Kowa hi jek tumare menshendar.
44007038	Un har kol Israelitarja an ko mulo them pash koi berga Sinai glan o Debleste khetne wan, his o Mose ap i berga Sinai tardo mashkral o bolepaskro un mare phurende. Un o bolepaskro das les kol Debleskre laba, hoi denn o djipen, te anell o Mose len pash mende.
44007039	Mare phure kaman gar ap leste te shunell un kran, hoi jon kaman. Jon kaman te djiwell, har jon an o them Egiptia djiwan.
44007040	Ap o Aron penan le: Kre menge i dewel, kai dell garda ap mende un sikrell mende o drom! Mer djinah gar, hoi djas o Moseske, kai anas men dran o them Egiptia win.
44007041	An ko tsiro kran le i grumni dran sonakai, te well kaja lengro dewel. Un jon anan fichen, maran len un chatchran len lake, un wan bachtelo pral kowa, hoi jon kran.
44007042	O Dewel djas peske lendar un mukas len. Koi mangan jon i momlia an o bolepen an. Jaake was kowa, hoi tchindlo hi an o liil, kai o Debleskre rakepangre tchinan. Kote penell o Dewel: Murshale an Israel, mange chatchran tumer kek fichen, un anan kek chapen glan mande an kol star-deesh bersha, har hans an o mulo them.
44007043	Tumer hidjan ko kheer trujal, kai o Moloch dren hi. Ninna hidjan koi bolepaskri momeli tumentsa, kai Refan kharedo wella. Kol dujen kran tumer tumare wastentsa, te nai mangenn len an. Doleske tradau me tumen dran tumaro them win, un anau tumen pandlo an o them Babilonia, un dureder.
44007044	O Stefano penas dureder: Mare phuren his o Debleskro tikno kheer, hoi his kerdo dran fichengre balla, un hidjan les lentsa, har djan le an o mulo them trujal. Kau kheer kran le jaake, har o Dewel kowa o Moseste ap i berga sikras.
44007045	Mare phure hidjan kau kheer lentsa, bis te anas len o Josua an o them Kanaan. Kote djiwan wawar menshe, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Kolen tradas o Dewel win, un das ko them mare phurende. O Debleskro tikno kheer dran fichengre balla atchas an o them Kanaan un his gomme koi, har o David o baro rai was.
44007046	Ap koleste dikas o Dewel latches. Un o David mangas lestar, te nai krell lo leske i kheer dran barra, kai i tsele Israelitarja nai mangenn les an.
44007047	His gar o David, na-a, kowa his leskro tchawo, o Salomo, kai kras o Debleske i baro kheer dran barra.
44007048	O baro Dewel djiwell gar an khera, kai i menshe kran pengre wastentsa. Kowa penas glan raha tsiro o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja:
44007049	O Dewel penas: O bolepen hi miro beshepaskro, un i phub hi tel mire pire tchiddo. Hawo kheer kamenn tumer mange te krell tumare wastentsa, kai djiwap dre?
44007050	Me krom o bolepen un i phub mire wastentsa."
44007051	Un o Stefano penas dureder ap lende: "Tumer kamenn tchi te haiwell. Tumaro dji hi har bar. Tumare kandentsa shunenn tchi, un kamenn gar ap o Debleskro Ducho te shunell. Jaake kran tumare phure. Jaake krenn ninna tumer.
44007052	Penenn mange: Dell jek Debleskro rakepaskro, kai lan tumare phure gar palla? Jon maran kolen, kai glan-wi penan, te well ko jek, kai hako tsiro o tchatchepen krella. Job was, un tumer phukran ap leste un maran les.
44007053	I bolepangre anan tumenge kol laba, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella. Un tumer rikran tumen gar ap lende."
44007054	Har jon kowa shunan, hoi o Stefano lenge penas, djas lenge kowa an o dji, un i bari choli tapras len.
44007055	O Stefano, pherdo Debleskro Ducho, dikas an o bolepen pre, un dikas o Debleskro railepen un o Jesuses ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig tardo.
44007056	Un o Stefano penas: "Me dikau o bolepen pre, un o Menshengro Tchawes ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar tardo."
44007057	Koi dan jon soreles gole, tchiwan pengre wasta ap i kanda, te shunenn le gar, un djan ap leste,
44007058	tradan les dran o foro win, un witsran barentsa ap leste. Un kolla, kai witsran i barra, riwan pengre koola win, un i tarno mursh, kai kharas Saulo, das ap lende jak.
44007059	Har jon ap leste i barentsa witsran, das o Stefano gole: "Rai Jesus, le man pash tute!"
44007060	Un job peras ap i phub tele, un das pale gole: "Rai, le koi doosh lendar!" Har job kowa penas, meras lo.
44008001	His mishto an o Sauleskre jaka, te maran le les. Pal ko diwes lan le i patslen soreles palla an o foro Jerusalem. Un i patsle nashan an o them Judea un an o them Samaria. I Jesuseskre bitchepangre atchan an o foro Jerusalem.
44008002	Un mursha, hoi ap o Debleskro drom djan, paskran o Stefanes un rowan bud pral leskro merepen.
44008003	O Saulo kras lauter, te nai marell lo i tsele patslen. Job djas an i khera, las len koi win, murshen har djuwjen, un witsras len an o stilepen.
44008004	Kol patsle, kai ap o nashepen his, djan trujal un penan o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
44008005	O Filipo djas an ko foro Samaria un rakras kote o Jesus Kristestar.
44008006	Kol menshe dan jak ap kowa, hoi o Filipo penas un kras an o Debleskri soor.
44008007	Bud menshendar tradas lo bengen wi. Kolla dan soreles gole, har jon lendar win djan. Un bud menshe, kai his bango un nai djan gar, wan sasto.
44008008	Un hakeno an kau foro his bachtelo pral kowa, hoi koi djas.
44008009	An ko foro Samaria his ninna i mursh, kowa his i durkepaskro. Leskro lab his Simon. Job penas pestar, te hi lo i baro mursh. Un i menshe an ko foro kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job kras.
44008010	Un halauter shunan ap leste, un penan: "Ap ko mursheste hi o Debleskri bari soor."
44008011	Peskro durkepaha tsardas lo len lauter ap peste. Doleske rikran jon bud lestar.
44008012	Har kanna o Filipo lenge o Jesus Kristestar penas, koles o Dewel bitchras, te anell lo len pash o Debleste, patsan djuwja un mursha ap kowa, hoi o Filipo lenge penas. Un jon mukan pen lestar an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, te patsenn le ap o Jesuseste.
44008013	Koi was ninna o Simon patslo, un mukas pes lestar an o pani te thowell. Palle atchas lo pash leste. Un har o Simon ko baro un sorelo koowa dikas, hoi o Filipo an o Debleskri soor kras, atchas leske o rakepen krik.
44008014	Un kol Jesuseskre bitchepangre an o foro Jerusalem shunan, kai kol menshe an o them Samaria patslo wan. Un jon bitchran o Petres un o Johannes pash lende.
44008015	Kolla wan an o them Samaria, un mangan o Deblestar, te dell lo i patslende o Debleskro Ducho.
44008016	Kol patsle his kokres ap ko lab Jesus an o pani thodo. O Debleskro Ducho peras gomme gar ap lende.
44008017	Koi tchiwan o Petro un o Johanni i wasta ap lende, un o Debleskro Ducho peras ap lende.
44008018	Har o Simon dikas, kai o Debleskro Ducho ap lende was, har o Jesuseskre bitchepangre i wasta ap lende tchiwan, kamas job len lowe te dell,
44008019	un penas ap lende: "Denn man ninna koi soor, te lell hakeno, koneske me o wast pre tchiwau, o Debleskro Ducho!"
44008020	O Petro penas ap leste: "Dja pash o bengeste, tu un tire lowe! Tu patseh tchatchepaha, te nai gineh tu i lowentsa o Debleskri soor!
44008021	Kau koowa, hoi mer krah, hi o Debleskro koowa un gar tiro koowa. Tiro dji hi gar tchatcho glan o Debleste.
44008022	Kanna, muk tiro tchilatcho drom, un pen o Debleske, te khaitell tut ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tu kral. Un mange lestar, te lell lo koi doosh tutar!
44008023	Me dikau, kai hal pherdo tchilatcho koowa, un ko tchilatchepen hi o rai pral tute."
44008024	Koi penas o Simon ap lende: "Mangenn o Deblestar, te well kowa gar pral mande, hoi tumer penan!"
44008025	Har o Petro un o Johanni i menshenge penan, hoi o Jesus penas un kras, djan jon pale an o foro Jerusalem. Ap lengro drom pale wan le an bud gaba an ko them Samaria un sikran kote i menshende o Jesuseskro drom.
44008026	O Debleskro bolepaskro penas ap o Filipo: "Ste pre un dja ap ko drom, kai djal dran Jerusalem tele an ko foro Gaza. Ap ko drom hi gar bud menshe."
44008027	Koi stas lo pre un djas kote. Ap ko drom his ninna i mursh dran o them Etiopia. Ap kau tsiro his i bari rani i rajetsa pral o them Etiopia. Un ko mursh his i pralstuno an lakro them un das garda ap lakro tselo brawlepen. Kowa was an o foro Jerusalem, te mangell job o Debles an.
44008028	Har job pale ap o drom his, te djal lo khere, his job an peskro wurdin beshdo, un draweras ko liil, kai o Debleskro rakepaskro Jesaja tchinas.
44008029	Koi penas o Debleskro Ducho ap o Filipeste: "Dja pash ko wurdin un atch koi pashal!"
44008030	Un o Filipo nashas koi, un shunas, har kowa ko liil draweras, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro Jesaja tchinas. Un o Filipo putchas lestar: "Haiweh tu, hoi tu drawereh?"
44008031	"Na-a," penas lo, "har nai haiwap, te penell mange kek, hoi koi tchindlo hi?" Un job mangas o Filipes, te well job pash leste an o wurdin, te beshell lo pes pash leste.
44008032	Kol laba, hoi job draweras, his kolla: Job his har i bakro, kai djal kote, kai well lo maredo. Job kras peskro mui gar pre har i tarno bakro, koleske tchinenn le i balla tele.
44008033	Jon kran leha, har te wals lo tchi moldo un rakran gar o tchatchepen, har anan le les glan i tchatchepangre. Kek nai rakrell leskre tchawendar. Leskro djipen was kai phubjatar krik lino.
44008034	Har ko pralstuno kowa draweras, putchas lo o Filipestar: "Konestar rakrell o Debleskro rakepaskro? Rakrell job pestar? Rakrell job i wawarestar?"
44008035	Koi penas o Filipo leske, hoi kol laba kamenn te penell, un penas leske o latcho lab o Jesusestar.
44008036	Koi wan le pash o pani, un ko pralstuno penas: "Koi hi pani. Hi mange tchomone an o drom tchiddo, te mukap man tutar an o pani te thowell?"
44008037	"Te patseh tu o tselo djijestar ap o Jesus Kristeste, nai krau me kowa," penas o Filipo. Penas ko pralstuno: "Me patsau, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o Debleskro tchawo."
44008038	Un job penas, te atchell ko wurdin tardo. Un kol dui, o Filipo un o pralstuno, djan khetne an o pani, un o Filipo thowas les an o pani.
44008039	Har jon dran o pani win djan, las o Debleskro Ducho o Filipes ap jek kopo kote krik. Un ko pralstuno dikas les buder gar. Un job djas bachteles peskro drom dureder.
44008040	O Filipes hatsan le an o foro Ashdod. Un job djas trujal, un penas o latcho lab o Jesusestar an kol tsele forja. Un jaake was lo an o foro Cesarea.
44009001	An ko tsiro his o Saules i bari choli ap kolende, kai djan o Jesuseskro drom, kamas len te marell, un djas pash ko baro rashajeste,
44009002	un mangas kolestar lila, te nai djal lo an i biboldengre kangria an o foro Damaskus, te nai taprell job kote kolen, murshen har djuwjen, kai ap o Jesuseskro drom djana, te anell lo len an o foro Jerusalem.
44009003	Har o Saulo ap ko drom his, kai djas an o foro Damaskus, was ap jek kopo i soreli momeli dran o bolepen trul leste.
44009004	Un job peras ap i phub un shunas i rakepen. Kowa penas ap leste: "Saulo, Saulo, hoske leh tu man palla?"
44009005	Penas lo: "Rai, koon hal tu?" Kowa penas: "Me hom o Jesus, koles, kai tu palla leh.
44009006	Ste pre un dja an ko foro! Koi penenn le tuke, hoi te kress."
44009007	Kol mursha, kai pash leste his, kolenge atchas o rakepen krik. Jon shunan i rakepen un dikan kekes.
44009008	Har o Saulo pre stas un i jaka pre kras, his lo korelo. Jon lan les pash o wast un anan les an o foro Damaskus.
44009009	Triin diwessa nai dikas lo gar, un chas un pijas tchi.
44009010	An o foro Damaskus his i patslo mursh. Kowa kharas Anania. Kolestar mukas pes o rai Jesus an i suni te dikell. Un job penas: "Anania!" Un o Anania penas: "Ake, hom, mo rai."
44009011	Un o rai Jesus penas ap leste: "Ste pre un dja ap ko drom, kai kharell o tchatcho drom. Putch an ko kheer o Judasestar pal i mursheste, kai kharell Saulo dran Tarsus. Job mangell o Debles an,
44009012	un dikas tut, Anania, an i suni, har wal tu pash leste un tchiwal leske i wasta pre, te nai dikell lo pale."
44009013	O Anania penas: "Rai, me shunom bud pral ko mursheste, hawo tchilatcho koowa job kol patslenge an o foro Jerusalem kras.
44009014	Mer shunam ninna, kai las job lila kol bare rashajendar, te nai taprell job men un tchiwell men stildo, lauter kolen, kai tut an-mangenna."
44009015	Penas o rai Jesus leske: "Dja pash leste! Me rodom koles win, te well job mange koi, te djal lo pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, pash lengre bare rajende, un pash kol tsele biboldende, te penell lo lenge mandar.
44009016	Me kamau leste te sikrell, kai hunte lell job bud duka mange ap peste."
44009017	O Anania djas koi, was an ko kheer, tchiwas i wasta ap o Sauleste un penas: "Miro phraal Saulo, maro rai Jesus bitchras man, kowa, kai mukas pes ap ko drom tutar te dikell. Job kamell, te dikess tu nai pale, un te wess pherdo Debleskro Ducho."
44009018	Ap jek kopo, har te perals ko tamlepen leskre jakendar tele, dikas lo nai pale, stas pre un mukas pes an o pani te thowell, te sikrell lo, kai patsell lo ap o Jesuseste.
44009019	Palle chas un pijas o Saulo un was pale sorelo. Un o Saulo atchas i tsiro pash kol patslende an o foro Damaskus,
44009020	un rakras an i biboldengre kangria, un sikras len, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi.
44009021	Lauter kolla, kai shunan kowa, atchas o rakepen krik, un jon penan: "Hi kowa gar ko mursh, kai las an o foro Jerusalem i tsele patslen palla, un kamas len te marell, kolen, kai denn o Jesuseskro lab an-gole? Was job gar kate, te anell job i patslen pandlo glan kol bare rashajende an o foro Jerusalem?"
44009022	O Saulo rakras bari sorjaha un sikras len, kai hi o Jesus o Kristo, kai was o Deblestar bitchedo, jaake te nai penan i bibolde, kai an o foro Damaskus djiwan, tchi buder.
44009023	Pal budeder diwessa wan kol bibolde khetne, rakran pral ko koowa, un penan: "Mer marah les."
44009024	Kowa was o Sauleske penlo. I rati un ap o diwes dan i bibolde jak glan kol foreskre wudja, te taprenn le les, un te marenn le les.
44009025	Doleske anan leskre mala les an i rati pash koi barengri baar, kai trul o foro hi, un mukan les an i korba pral i barra tele, te was lo dran o foro win.
44009026	Un job djas an o foro Jerusalem, un kote kamas lo pash kol patslende te djal. Kolla trashan lestar lauter un patsan gar, kai job ap o Jesuseskro drom djala.
44009027	O Barnabas las les pash peste un anas les pash kol Jesuseskre bitchepangre, un penas lenge, har o Saulo ap ko drom, kai djal an o foro Damaskus, o rai Jesuses dikas, un kowa leha rakras, un har job an o foro Damaskus i menshenge o Jesusestar penas, un les kek daar his, te rakrell lo lestar.
44009028	Un o Saulo atchas an o foro Jerusalem, un djas pash i patslende dre un win, un sikras i menshende o Jesuseskro drom un trashas gar, te rakrell lo o Jesusestar.
44009029	Job rakras ninna kol biboldentsa, kai rakrenn grichtikes, un tchingras lentsa pral kowa, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi. Kal bibolde kaman les te taprell un te marell.
44009030	Har kol patsle kowa shunan, anan le les an o foro Cesarea, un bitchran les dureder an o foro Tarsus.
44009031	I patsle an i themma Judea, Galilea un Samaria, kolen his kanna i latcho tsiro, kek las len buder palla. Un o Debleskro Ducho kras len soreles an o patsepen. Un jon shunan ap o Debleste un bud un budeder menshe wan patslo.
44009032	Har o Petro an o tselo them trujal djas, was job ninna pash kol patslende an o foro Lidda.
44009033	Koi hatsas lo i murshes, leskro lab hi Aneas. Kowa his ochta bersha ap o tchiben tchiddo, un nai nashas gar.
44009034	O Petro penas ap leste: "Aneas, o Jesus Kristo krell tut sasto. Ste pre un kre kokres tiro tchiben!" Koi stas job sik pre.
44009035	Koi dikan le les lauter, kai an i forja Lidda un Saron djiwenna. Un jon dan pengro djipen o Jesuseste, maro rajeste.
44009036	An o foro Joppe djiwas i patsli. Lakro lab his Tabita ap hebretikes un Dorkas ap grichtikes. Koja kras bud latcho koowa, un das bud lowe kol tchorwelende.
44009037	An ko tsiro was joi nasseli un meras. Koi thowan jon lat un tchiwan lat an koi pralstuni isema.
44009038	O foro Joppe his pash o foro Lidda tchiddo. Un har i patsle shunan, kai o Petro an ko foro his, bitchran jon dui murshen pash leste, un mangan les, te well job jaake sik har djala pash lende.
44009039	O Petro stas pre un djas lentsa. Har job kote was, anan jon les an koi pralstuni isema, kai koi muli djuwel tchiddo hi. Bud djuwja, kolengre romma mulo hi, his kote un rowan. Kolla wan pash leste un sikran leste kol ripja, kai i Tabita kras, har joi djiwas.
44009040	Un o Petro tradas len win, djas ap i tchanga glan o Debleste, mangas o Debles, un djas pash koi muli djuwjate un penas: "Tabita, ste pre!" Koi kras joi peskre jaka pre. Har joi o Petres dikas, beshas pes li pre.
44009041	Un job das lat o wast un hadas lat pre. Palle das job kol patslen gole, ninna kol djuwjen, kolengre romma mulo his. Un joi his djido glan lende tardo.
44009042	Kowa shunan i tsele menshe an o foro Joppe, un bud wan patslo ap o rai Jesuseste.
44009043	Un o Petro atchas bud diwessa an o foro Joppe pash ko mursheste, kai kharell Simon. Kowa his jek, kai budrell fichengre mortsi.
44010001	An o foro Cesarea djiwas i mursh, ko kharas Kornelio. Kowa his i Remarjengro pralstuno pral sheel lurdende. Kolen kharan le i lurde dran Italia.
44010002	Kowa his i latcho mursh un patsas ap o Debleste peskre tsele menshentsa. Job das bud i tchorwelende, un mangas o Debles hako diwes an.
44010003	His i diwes. His trinenge. Koi dikas ko mursh i Debleskro bolepaskres, har kowa pash leste dre was. Ko bolepaskro penas ap leste: "Kornelio!"
44010004	Koles his daar, har job dikas les, un penas ap leste: "Hoi kameh tu mandar, rai?" Un kowa penas ap leste: "O Dewel shunas, har tu les an-mangal. Un job dikas ko latchepen, hoi tu kral i tchorwelenge. Un job bistras kowa gar.
44010005	Bitche kanna murshen an o foro Joppe, te anenn le o Simones pash tute. Kowa kharella ninna Petro.
44010006	Job hi an o kheer, kai ko Simon djiwella, kai budrell i fichengri mortsi. Leskro kheer hi pash o baro pani tchiddo."
44010007	Har o bolepaskro peske djas, kharas o Kornelio dui budepangren un i patslo lurdes pash peste kolendar, kai his hako tsiro pash leste.
44010008	Kolenge penas job lauter, hoi o bolepaskro penas, un bitchras len an o foro Joppe.
44010009	O wawar diwes, har jon pash o foro Joppe wan, djas o Petro ap o kheer pral pre, te mangell lo o Debles an. His chapaskro tsiro.
44010010	Koi las job bok un kamas te chal. Har kran le leske i chapen, mukas o Dewel les tchomone te dikell.
44010011	Job dikas, har o bolepen pre djas un tchomone pral tele was ap i phub. Kowa his har i bari plachta. Koja was ap hake star riga rikedo.
44010012	Koi dren his bud fiche: fiche star herjentsa, sapa, un tchirkle.
44010013	Un o Petro shunas, har jek penas: "Petro, ste pre, kre len mulo un cha!"
44010014	O Petro penas: "Na-a, miro rai! An miro tselo djipen chom me tchi, hoi pale-tchiddo hi."
44010015	Un job shunas i duito kopo, har jek leha rakras un penas: "Ma kre pale-tchiddo, hoi o Dewel erligo kras!"
44010016	Kowa djas triin kope jaake. Palle djas koi plachta pale an o bolepen.
44010017	O Petro haiwas gar, hoske job kowa dikas, un putchas pestar, hoi kamas o Dewel leske te penell. Koi his i mursha, kai o Kornelio pal o Simoneskro kheer bitchras, glan o wudar tardo.
44010018	Jon dan gole un putchan: "Hi o Simon Petro pash tumende?"
44010019	Har djas o Petreske kowa an o shero trujal, hoi job dikas, koi penas o Debleskro Ducho ap leste: "Dik, triin mursha rodenn tut.
44010020	Ste pre, dja tele, un dja lentsa! Pats, hoi jon tuke penenn! Me bitchrom len."
44010021	Koi djas o Petro tele pash lende un penas: "Me hom kowa, kai tumer rodenna. Hoske han tumer kai?"
44010022	Penan le: "O Kornelio, ko pralstuno i lurdendar, bitchras men. Kowa hi i latcho mursh, un patsell ap o Debleste. I tsele bibolde rakrenn latches pral leste. I Debleskro bolepaskro penas ap leste, te lell job tut an peskro kheer, un te shunell job, hoi tu leske kameh te penell."
44010023	Un o Petro mukas len an o kheer te well, un das len i isema, te atchenn le kote. O wawar diwes djas job lentsa an o foro Cesarea. Un wawar patsle dran o foro Joppe djan ninna leha.
44010024	O diwes koi pre was job an o foro Cesarea. Kote his o Kornelio peskre menshentsa un malentsa khetne. Job das len gole, te shunenn le halauter, hoi o Petro lenge penella.
44010025	Un har o Petro dre was, djas o Kornelio pash leste, witsras pes glan leskre pire tele, un mangas les an.
44010026	O Petro hadas les pre un penas: "Ste pre! Me hom i mensho har tu."
44010027	Un har jon jaake rakran, djan jon an o kheer, un hatsan bud menshen kote, kai khetne wan.
44010028	Un o Petro penas ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, te hi kowa i biboldeske pale-tchiddo, te djal lo an o kheer dre, hoi gar i biboldeskro hi. Un kek wi-themari well pash i biboldeste an o kheer dre. Mande sikras o Dewel, te rikrap kekes pale-tchiddo.
44010029	Doleske rikrom man gar pale, te wap pash tumende, har tumer man kharan. Me putchau tumendar kanna, hoi kamenn mandar."
44010030	Koi penas o Kornelio: "Glan star diwessa, his trinenge, mangom o Debles an miro kheer an. Koi his ap jek kopo i mursh glan mande tardo. Koleskre koola his bijalo.
44010031	Un job penas ap mande: Kornelio, o Dewel shunas tut, un hoi tu dal kol tchorwelende, dikas o Dewel ninna.
44010032	Kanna bitche murshen an o foro Joppe, te anenn le o Petres pash tute. Kowa hi an o kheer, kai ko Simon djiwella, kai budrell i fichengri mortsi. Leskro kheer hi pash o baro pani tchiddo.
44010033	Un me bitchrom murshen pash tute. Un kowa his mishto, kai tu wal. Kanna ham mer lauter glan o Debleste khetne, te shunas lauter, hoi o Dewel, maro rai, tuke penas."
44010034	-
44010035	Un o Petro penas: "Kanna haiwau me tchatchepaha: O Dewel dikell gar koi pre, hawe menshendar jek wella: te well lo i biboldendar, - te well lo kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi. Job dikell latches ap hakeneste, kai trashell lestar, un kai krell o tchatchepen.
44010036	Job mukas i biboldenge o latcho lab te penell, te hi o Jesus Kristo kowa, kai anell len pash o Debleste. Job hi gar lengro rai kokres, na-a, job hi o rai pral halauter.
44010037	Tumer djinenna, hoi djas an o them Galilea, un palle an o tselo them Judea pal ko tsiro, har mukan pen i menshe o Johannestar an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, kai mukan le pengro phuro djipen.
44010038	Tumer djinenn, har das o Dewel o Jesuseste dran Nazaret peskro Ducho un peskri soor. Un job djas trujal un kras latcho koowa, un kras lauteren sasto, kai o beng pandas. O Dewel his pash leste.
44010039	Mer dikam lauter, hoi job an o biboldengro them un an o foro Jerusalem kras. Koles dan le ap o trushel, un maran les.
44010040	Pal triin diwessa kras o Dewel les i mulendar djides. Un o Jesus mukas pes i menshendar te dikell.
44010041	Job mukas pes gar i tsele menshendar te dikell. Na-a. Men rodas o Dewel win, te dikas les. Un har job i mulendar djido was, cham un pijam mer leha. Kowa penah i menshenge, un kowa hi tchatcho.
44010042	Job penas menge, te penas mer i tsele menshenge, kai o Dewel rodas les win, te hi lo o tchatchepaskro rai, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, pral kolende, kai djiwenna, un ninna pral i mulende.
44010043	Kolestar rakrenn i tsele Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila. Jon penenn, kai lell o Dewel i doosh hakenestar krik, koon ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella."
44010044	Har o Petro jaake rakras, peras o Debleskro Ducho ap lauterende, kai les shunan.
44010045	Kol patsle biboldenge, kai o Petreha wan, atchas o rakepen krik, har jon dikan, kai peras o Debleskro Ducho ninna ap kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.
44010046	Jon shunan, har kol menshe an i wawar rakepen rakran, un o Debles sharan. Koi penas o Petro ap lende:
44010047	"Kolla lan o Debleskro Ducho jaake har mer. Nai rikrah mer len pale, te wenn le an o pani thodo, te sikrenn le, kai patsenn le ap o Jesuseste?"
44010048	Un job penas: "Mukenn tumen an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn tumer, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste!" Pal kowa mangan le o Petres, te atchell lo triin, star diwessa pash lende.
44011001	Kol Jesuseskre bitchepangre un kol wawar patsle an o them Judea shunan, kai ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, ap o Debleskro lab patsan.
44011002	Har o Petro an o foro Jerusalem was, tchingran kol patsle bibolde leha.
44011003	Un jon penan ap leste: "Tu djal pash kolende, kai hi gar bibolde, un chal lentsa."
44011004	Koi penas o Petro lenge, jek pal o wawar, hoi koi djas:
44011005	"Me homs an o foro Joppe," penas job, "un mangom o Debles an. Koi mukas o Dewel man tchomone te dikell. Me dikom tchomone har i bari plachta. Koja was ap star riga rikedo, un was tele dran o bolepen pash mande.
44011006	Har me dre dikom, dikom me bud fiche: star-herjengre fiche, sapa un tchirkle.
44011007	Un jek rakras ap mande: Petro, mare len un cha len!
44011008	Penom me: Na-a, rai! An miro tselo djipen chom me tchi, hoi hi pale-tchiddo.
44011009	Ko rakepen dran o bolepen penas pale: Ma kre pale-tchiddo, hoi o Dewel erligo kras!
44011010	Kowa djas triin kope. Un halauter djas pale an o bolepen.
44011011	Ap jek kopo his triin mursha tardo glan ko kheer, kai djiwom. Kolla wan dran o foro Cesarea pash mande.
44011012	Un o Debleskro Ducho penas ap mande: Pats, hoi jon tuke penenna! Dja lentsa! Un me djom shob phralentsa an o kheer ko murshestar, kai kol triin murshen pash mande bitchras.
44011013	Kowa penas menge, har dikas job i bolepaskres an peskro kheer, un kai kowa ap leste penas: Bitche murshen an o foro Joppe, te lenn le o Simones. Job kharella ninna Petro.
44011014	Kowa penell tuke, har leh tu un i menshe an tiro kheer o Debleskro djipen.
44011015	Har me, o Petro, lentsa rakrom, peras o Debleskro Ducho ap lende. Kowa his jaake har pash mende an o foro Jerusalem, har o Debleskro Ducho ap mende peras.
44011016	Koi djan kol laba an miro shero trujal, hoi menge maro rai Jesus penas: O Johanni tchiwas i menshen an o pani. Ap tumende tchiwell o Dewel peskro Debleskro Ducho.
44011017	Me dikom, o Dewel das lende ninna peskro Ducho, jaake har job mende das, har mer patsam ap o rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste. Koon hom me, te rikrap me o Debles pre?"
44011018	Har jon kowa shunan, tchingran le buder gar ap o Petreste. Jon sharan o Debles un penan: "O Dewel sikras ninna kolende peskro drom an o newo djipen, kai hi kek bibolde. Jon nai mukenn pengro tchilatcho drom un wenn ap o Debleskro drom."
44011019	An ko tsiro, kai o Stefano maredo was, wan i patsle palla lino. Kolla nashan dran o foro Jerusalem, un djan an i themma Fenicia un Ciprus, un an o foro Antiochia. Un jon penan kote kokres i biboldenge o Debleskro lab, un kek wawarenge.
44011020	Mashkral kol patslende his ninna mursha dran Ciprus un Kirene. Kolla wan an o foro Antiochia, un penan ninna kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi, o latcho lab o rai Jesusestar.
44011021	Un o rajeskri soor his lentsa. Un bud kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi, wan patslo, un wan ap o Jesuseskro drom.
44011022	Un i patsle an o foro Jerusalem shunan kowa, un bitchran o Barnabes an o foro Antiochia.
44011023	Har job koi his un dikas, hoi o Dewel an peskro baro latchepen kote lauter kras, was lo bachtelo un mangas len, te atchenn le pengro tselo djijeha pash o Jesuseste.
44011024	O Barnabas his i latcho mursh. Job his pherdo Debleskro Ducho. Un les his i baro patsepen. Un bud wan patslo ap o rai Jesuseste.
44011025	Un o Barnabas djas an o foro Tarsus, te rodell lo o Saules.
44011026	Har o Barnabas les hatsas, anas lo les an o foro Antiochia. Un kol dui atchan i tselo bersh kote pash i patslende, un penan bud menshenge o Debleskro lab. Kote dan jon i patslen ko lab Kristarja.
44011027	An kol diwessa wan Debleskre rakepangre dran o Jerusalem an o foro Antiochia.
44011028	Jek lendar his o Agabo. Job stas mashkral i patslende pre, un penas glan-wi, hoi o Debleskro Ducho leske penas, te well i bari bok pral i tseli phub. Un har o Klaudio o baro rai an o foro Rom his, was kowa jaake.
44011029	Koi penan kol patsle an o foro Antiochia: "Mer dah mare phralen an o them Judea jaake bud lowe, har hakeno nai della."
44011030	Un jon dan o Barnabes un o Saules kol lowe, te denn jon kol lowe kolende, kai hi i phureder mank i patslende an o them Judea.
44012001	An ko tsiro mukas o baro rai Herodes i patslen te stilell, un mukas len dawa te dell.
44012002	Job maras o Johanneskro phrales, o Jakobes, o chareha.
44012003	Har o Herodes haiwas, kai kowa mishto his an i biboldengre jaka, mukas job ninna o Petres te taprell. Kowa his an ko tsiro, kai chan i bibolde kek shutlo maro.
44012004	Har jon les tapran, witsran le les an o stilepen. Un o Herodes penas, te denn star kope star lurde jak ap leste. Star lurde dan i paash diwes jak ap leste. Un pal i paash diwes dan wawar star lurde jak ap leste. Un ninna jaake djas kowa ratsjakro. Pal kol diwessa, kai Passa kharenna, kamas o Herodes les glan i menshende te anell, te dell lo les glan lende i phagi.
44012005	Har o Petro an o stilepen his, mangan i tsele patsle pengro tselo djijeha o Debles leske ap i rati un ap o diwes.
44012006	An i rat glan ko diwes, kai kamas o Herodes les win anell, te dell lo les i phagi, sowas o Petro mashkral dui lurdende. Job his pandlo dui sasterne shellentsa, un dui lurde dan jak glan o wudar.
44012007	Ap jek kopo his an ko stilepen i soreli momeli, un o Debleskro bolepaskro his koi tardo, un das o Petres an i rig, djangras les pre, un penas: "Ste sik pre!" Un kol sasterne shelle peran leskre wastendar tele.
44012008	Un ko bolepaskro penas ap leste: "Tchip tiri dori trul tiro ripen, un rib tire kircha, un tchip tiri plashka trul tute, un am mantsa!" Un job kras kowa.
44012009	Un o Petro djas leha dran o stilepen win. Job djinas gar, kai kowa lauter tchatchepen hi. Job patsas, te dell lo suni.
44012010	Dui kope djan le pash kol lurdende pashal, kai jak dan. Un kolla dikan len gar. Un jaake wan jon pash i baro sasterno wudar. Kowa his ko wudar, hoi djas an o foro. Ko wudar djas kokres pre. Jon djan win, un wan ap o drom. Har djan le i kotar drom, his ap jek kopo ko bolepaskro gar buder koi.
44012011	Kanna djinas o Petro, kai kowa kek suni his, un job penas: "Kanna djinau tchatchepaha, kai bitchras o rai Jesus peskro bolepaskres mange. Un kowa las man dran o Herodeskre wasta win, ninna dran halauter, hoi kaman i bibolde mantsa te krell."
44012012	Har kowa an leskro shero was, djas job pash i Mariakro kheer. Lakro tchawo his o Johanni, kai ninna Marko kharedo wella. Kote his bud patsle khetne un mangan o Debles.
44012013	O Petro das o wasteha ap o wudar, un i budepaskretsa was. Lakro lab his Roda. Joi kamas te shunell, koon koi hi.
44012014	Un har joi shunas, kai kowa o Petro hi, kras li i bachtjatar o wudar gar pre, nashas pale un penas: "O Petro hi glan o wudar tardo."
44012015	Koi penan jon ap late: "Hal tu dinelo?" Joi atchas koi pashal, kai kowa jaake hi. Koi penan jon: "Kowa hi o bolepaskro, kai dell jak ap leste."
44012016	O Petro mukas gar tele, te dell lo ap o wudar. Har jon kanna pre kran, dikan jon les. Koi atchas lenge o mui pre.
44012017	I wastentsa sikras lo len, te denn le kek gole, un penas lenge, har o rai Jesus les dran o stilepen win las. Un ninna penas o Petro lenge: "Penenn kowa o Jakobeske, un kol wawar phralenge!" Palle djas job win, un djas peske an i wawar foro.
44012018	Taissarlake dikan i lurde, kai his o Petro buder gar an o stilepen un putchan pendar, hoi leha djas. Un i bari daar was ap lende.
44012019	Har o Herodes penas, te well o Petro win anlo, un job buder gar koi his, mukas lo les te rodell. Un jon hatsan les gar. Koi putchas lo i lurdendar, kai dan jak glan o wudar, har was nai o Petro win. Un palle mukas job kolen te marell. Palle djas o Herodes dran o them Judea, un was an o foro Cesarea, un atchas i tsiro kote.
44012020	O Herodes was chojemen ap i menshende an i forja Tirus un Sidon. Kolla lan pengro chapen dran o Herodeskro them. Doleske bitchran le khetne murshen pash leste, te well lo pale latcho lenge. Kolla rakran koleha, kai das jak ap o Herodeskro kheer, leskro lab his Blasto, un penan leske, te kamenn le buder kek tchingepen, un mangan lestar, te penell job kowa o Herodeske.
44012021	I diwes was win kerdo, kai kamas o Herodes lentsa te rakrell. Ap ko diwes riwas o Herodes peskre rajengre koola an, beshas pes ap peskro railo beshepaskro, un rakras i baro rakepen.
44012022	Kol menshe dan gole: "Jaake rakrell kek mensho. Jaake rakrell i dewel!"
44012023	Jaake mukas pes o Herodes i menshendar te sharell, har te wals job o Dewel. Un har job kowa kras, das les o Debleskro bolepaskro i nasslepen, te chan i kerme les pre, un job meras.
44012024	An bud gaba un forja was o Debleskro lab penlo. Un budeder un budeder menshe patsan ap o rai Jesuseste.
44012025	O Barnabas un o Saulo anan kol lowe i patslenge an o foro Jerusalem. Palle wan le pale an o foro Antiochia. Lentsa djas o Johanni Marko.
44013001	Mashkral i patslende an o foro Antiochia his Debleskre rakepangre un sikepangre. Kolla his o Barnabas un o Simon, ap koleste penan le Kalo, ninna o Lucio dran o foro Kirene, un o Manaen. Kowa his i maal o baro rajestar Herodes Antipas. Un o Saulo his ninna mank lende.
44013002	His i diwes, kai sharan le o Debles un chan tchi, te wenn le leske feteder koi. Koi penas lenge o Debleskro Ducho: " Bitchrenn o Barnabes un o Saules win, te krenn le koi budi, hoi me len dau. Me dom len gole, te krenn le kowa."
44013003	Un jon chan gomme i tikno tsiro tchi un mangan o Debles an. Palle, tchiwan le i wasta ap lende un penan: "Atchenn mo Debleha!" un mukan len te djal.
44013004	O Debleskro Ducho bitchras o Barnabes un o Saules an o foro Seleucia. Un palle uleran le ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Ciprus.
44013005	Un har jon an ko foro Salamis wan, penan le o Debleskro lab kote an i biboldengre kangria. Un o Johanni Marko budras lentsa.
44013006	Jon djan an o tselo them Ciprus trujal, un wan ap i wawar rig ko themestar un djan an o foro Pafos. Kote tapran le i biboldes. Kowa kharas Bar-Jesus un his i durkepaskro. Job penas pestar, te hi lo i Debleskro rakepaskro. Kowa his i chochepen.
44013007	Job his pash ko pralstuneste pral o them Ciprus. Leskro lab his Sergio Paulo. Kowa his i gosewo mursh. Job mukas o Barnabes un o Saules gole te dell, te penenn jon leske o Debleskro lab.
44013008	Ko durkepaskro, o Elimas, - jaake his leskro lab ap grichtikes, - kamas kowa gar un kras lauter, te rikrell lo ko pralstunes pale, te well job gar patslo.
44013009	O Saulo, kai kharell ninna Paulo, pherdo Debleskro Ducho, dikas ap leste,
44013010	un penas: "Tu bengeskro tchawo! Tu hal pherdo tchilatchepen. Un chochepen hi an tute. Tu kameh gar o tchatchepen. Un mukeh gar tele o Debleskre tchatche dromma banges te krell.
44013011	Kanna dikeh tu, har o rai Jesus tuke i phagi della. Tu weh korelo, un dikeh i tsiro o kham buder gar." Ap jek kopo was lauter tamlo glan leskre jaka. Un job djas trujal, te nai rodell lo jekes, kai lell les pash o wast.
44013012	Har ko pralstuno kowa dikas, was job patslo, un kras bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job pral o rai Jesuseste shunas.
44013013	Pal kowa djas o Paulo un kolla, kai pash leste his, dran o foro Pafos. Ap o panjeskro ulepaskro uleran jon an o foro Perge. Kowa hi an ko them Pamfilia tchiddo. O Johanni Marko djas peske lendar, un djas pale an o foro Jerusalem.
44013014	Jon djan dran o foro Perge dureder, un wan an o foro Antiochia. Kowa hi an ko them Pisidia tchiddo. Ap ko Debleskro diwes djan jon an i biboldengri kangri, un beshan pen kote tele.
44013015	Koi pal, har i bibolde dran kol lila glan draweran, hoi o Mose un o Debleskre rakepangre tchinan, mukan lenge kol pralstune pral i biboldengri kangri te penell: "Mare phrala, te kamenn tumer menge i lab te penell, hoi krell men sorelo an o patsepen, penenn les menge!"
44013016	Koi stas o Paulo pre, hadas o wast, te atchenn jon pokone, un job penas: "Murshale dran Israel, un ninna tumer tsele wawar, kai mangenn o Debles an, shunenn, hoi me tumenge penau!
44013017	O Dewel, koles mer Israelitarja an-mangah, kowa rodas mare phuren win. Un jon wan bud, har jon an o them Egiptia wi-themarja his. Kote anas lo len bari sorjaha win.
44013018	Star-deesh bersha rikras len o Dewel an o mulo them ap o djipen.
44013019	Palle tradas job efta natione dran ko them Kanaan win, un das kau them mare menshende.
44013020	Kowa his star-sheel-te-paash (450) bersha pal ko tsiro, har mare phure an o them Egiptia wan. Har wan le an o them Kanaan, tchiwas o Dewel tchatchepangren pral lende. Kolla his lengre pralstune jaake raha, bis te was o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Samuel.
44013021	Ap ko tsiro mangan le les, te dell lo len i baro rajes. Un o Dewel das len o Saules. Leskro dad his o Kis. Kowa his i mursh kol menshendar, kai wenna pal o Benjamin. Star-deesh bersha his o Saul o baro rai pral mare menshende.
44013022	Palle tchiwas o Dewel o Saules ap i rig te atchell lo buder gar baro rai, un las peske o Davides, un kras les baro rai. Kolestar penas job: Me hatsom i murshes, pral leste hom bachtelo. Job hi o David, koleskro dad hi o Isai. Me rodom o Davides win, te krell lo lauter, hoi me leske penau.
44013023	Dran o Davideskre menshende mukas o Dewel o Jesuses te well, har job kowa glan i raha tsiro penas. O Jesus hi kowa, kai lell mare menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
44013024	Glan ko tsiro, kai o Jesus ap i menshende rakras, penas o Johanni i tsele menshenge an o them Israel, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom, un te mukenn pen le an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, kai mukan le pengro phuro djipen.
44013025	Har o Johanni lauter kras, hoi o Dewel leske penas, penas job: Patsenn tumer, kai me hom ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchras tumenge? Me penau tumenge: Me hom kowa gar. O baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchrell tumenge, well pal mande. Me hom gar mishto doha, te pandap leskre kircha pre.
44013026	Mire phrala, tumer, kai han o Abrahameskre menshe, un tumer wawar, kai mangenn o Debles an, tumenge penau: O Dewel bitchras tumenge peskro latcho lab, hoi dell tumen o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
44013027	Kolla, kai djiwenn an o foro Jerusalem, un lengre pralstune haiwan gar, koon o Jesus hi. Jon haiwan witar gar kol laba, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre pral leste penan, ninna te wenn kal laba hako Debleskro diwes an i biboldengre kangria drawedo. Har jon o Jesuses ap o trushel dan, kran jon kowa, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro penan.
44013028	Ninna te hatsan le kek doosh ap leste, te nai maran le les, penan le o Pilateske, te dell lo les ap o trushel.
44013029	Har kowa kerdo was, hoi an o Debleskro lab glan i raha tsiro tchindlo was, lan jon les o trushelestar tele, un tchiwan les an o mulengro kheer.
44013030	Job his mulo. Un o Dewel kras les i mulendar djido.
44013031	O Jesus mukas pes bud kope peskre malendar te dikell. Jon hi kolla, kai pash leste an o them Galilea his, un leha khetne an o foro Jerusalem wan. Kolla dikan, kai job pale djido was, un penenn kowa kanna i menshenge.
44013032	-
44013033	Un mer penah tumenge: Ko lab, hoi o Dewel mare phurenge penas, was kanna tchatcho, an kau tsiro, kai mer, lengre tchawe, djiwah. O Dewel kras o Jesuses i mulendar djido. An i duiti Debleskri gili hi tchindlo: Tu hal miro tchawo. Kau diwes wom tiro dad.
44013034	O Dewel kras o Jesuses i mulendar djido. Un job merell buder gar. Ap mare phurende penas o Dewel: Me kamau tumen miro latchepen un miro kamlepen te dell, har me o Davideske penom, te dap leste.
44013035	O David penell an i wawar Debleskri gili pral koleste, kai hi hako tsiro o Debleske koi: Tu, o Dewel, kameh gar, te ferdjal leskro mass tel i phub.
44013036	Un o David his an peskro djipen o Debleske koi. Un job meras un was paskedo pash peskre menshende. Un leskro mass ferdjas tel i phub.
44013037	O Jesus his mulo, un o Dewel kras les djido. Leskro mass ferdjas gar.
44013038	Mire phrala, tumenge well kai diwes penlo, kai o Jesus kowa hi, kai lell tumari doosh tumendar. Tumaro tchatchepaskro, o Mose, nai las gar tumari doosh tumendar.
44013039	Koon ap o Jesuseste patsella, koleskri doosh lell o Dewel lestar krik.
44013040	Krenn lauter, te well gar kowa pral tumende, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila penan:
44013041	Jaake penas o Dewel: Tumer, kai rikrenn o Debles dineleske, krenn bare jaka i darjatar un merenn! Shunenn, me krau i baro koowa an tumaro tsiro. Kowa patsenn tumer gar, te penell tumenge kowa jek."
44013042	Har o Paulo un o Barnabas dran i biboldengri kangri win djan, mangan i menshe lendar un penan: "Awenn pale ap o wawar Debleskro diwes, un penenn menge o Debleskro lab!"
44013043	Un har i menshe dran i biboldengri kangri win djan, nashan bud lendar o Pauleske un o Barnabeske palla. Kolla his bibolde un sawe, kai lan i biboldengro patsepen an. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas rakran budeder lentsa un penan lenge: "Rikrenn ap ko patsepen, kai o Dewel i doosh kolendar krik lella, kai patsenn ap leskro tchaweste."
44013044	O wawar Debleskro diwes wan bud bud menshe dran ko foro khetne, te shunenn le o Debleskro lab.
44013045	Har i bibolde kol bud menshen dikan, silweran le ap kol dujende. Jon tchingran ap o Pauleste, un rakran i djungele laba pral leste.
44013046	O Paules un o Barnabes his kek traash lendar, un penan lenge: "Tumenge hunte was o Debleskro lab glan kol tsele wawar menshende penlo. Har kamenn tumer kanna tchi kolestar te djinell, sikrenn tumer, te han gar moldo, te lenn ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Doleske djah mer kanna pash kolende, kai hi kek bibolde.
44013047	Kowa penas menge o Dewel: Me krom, te wenn tumer i momeli kol menshenge, kai hi gar bibolde. Penenn lenge, te lau me len dran o tchilatchepen un dran o merepen win!"
44013048	Har kolla, kai hi kek bibolde, kowa shunan, wan le bachtelo, un sharan o Debleskro lab. Un lauter kolla wan patslo, kai o Deblestar win rodedo wan, te lenn jon ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
44013049	Un an ko tselo them penan le o Debleskro lab.
44013050	Koi djan i pralstune bibolde pash kol brawele djuwjende, kai lan i biboldengro patsepen an, ninna pash kol pralstunende an ko foro, rakran lentsa un kran, te wan le chojedo ap o Pauleste un ap o Barnabeste. Un khetne lentsa lan le len palla un tradan len dran ko foro win.
44013051	Un o Paulo un o Barnabas dan koi tchik pengre pirendar tele, te djinan kolla an ko foro, hawo djungelo koowa jon kran. Un pal kowa djan o Paulo un o Barnabas an o foro Ikonion.
44013052	Un kolla, kai wan patslo, wan pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un lengro dji his bachtelo.
44014001	An o foro Ikonion djas o Paulo un o Barnabas pale an i biboldengri kangri, un penan i menshenge o Debleskro lab jaake, kai wan bud bibolde patslo, ninna bud wawar, kai kek bibolde hi.
44014002	Kol bibolde, kai wan gar patslo, penan, te wals kowa gar tchatcho, hoi o Paulo penas, un kran, te wan kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, chojedo ap i patslende.
44014003	Un o Paulo un o Barnabas atchan i raha tsiro an ko foro. Un len his kek traash, te sikren le i menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Un o rai Jesus das len i soor, te kran le baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar nai kras. Jaake sikras job, kai kowa, hoi jon pral leskro baro latchepen penan, tchatcho hi.
44014004	I menshe an ko foro djinan gar, koneske te patsenn le. His sawe, kai rikran kol biboldentsa khetne. Wawar rikran pen ap o Jesuseskre bitchepangre.
44014005	Kowa djas jaake dur, kai tchiwan pen i bibolde khetne kolentsa, kai kek bibolde hi. Un khetne lengre pralstunentsa kaman le ap kol dujende pre te djal, te denn le len i barentsa mulo.
44014006	Har o Paulo un o Barnabas kowa haiwan, nashan le penge an ko them Likaonia, an kol forja Listra un Derbe.
44014007	Un jon penan i menshenge an ko them o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
44014008	An o foro Listra his i mursh beshdo. Koles his nassele pire, un nai nashas gar jaake raha har job djiwas.
44014009	Kowa shunas, hoi o Paulo rakras. Un har o Paulo haiwas, kai job patsella, kai o Jesus nai krell les sasto, dikas lo ap leste,
44014010	un das gole ap leste: "Ste pre! Atch ap tire pire tardo!" Un job stas pre, un djas trujal.
44014011	Har kol menshe dikan, hoi o Paulo kras, dan jon ap pengro rakepen Likaontikes gole, un penan: "O dewel Zois un o dewel Hermes wan dran o bolepen tele pash mende!"
44014012	Jon penan ap o Barnabas: "O Zois", un ap o Paulo: "O Hermes". O Paulo his o rakepaskro. Doleske kharan le les jaake.
44014013	Glan ko foro his ko kheer tardo, kai mangan i menshe ko debles an, kai kharas "Zois". Koleskro rashai anas grumjen un shukar senlepen glan ko foreskro wudar. Job un kol menshe kote kaman kau koowa glan o Pauleste un glan o Barnabeste te anell, har te wans le i dewel.
44014014	Har o Barnabas un o Paulo kowa shunan, kran le pengre ripja paash un stan mashkral kol menshende, un dan gole:
44014015	"Murshale, hoi krenn tumer kote? Mer ham menshe har tumer, un penah tumenge o latcho lab o djido Deblestar. Job kamell, te wenn tumer ap leskro drom, un mangenn buder gar kol chochene deblen dran kasht un bar an. Job hi ko Dewel, kai kras o bolepen un i phub, un o baro pani, un lauter, hoi djiwella.
44014016	An o phuro tsiro mukas job i menshen, kai kek bibolde hi, jaake te djiwell, har jon kaman.
44014017	Ninna te djinans tumer tchi lestar, hunte dikans, kai o Dewel djiwella. Job kras bud latcho koowa tumenge. Job dell tumen o brishin dran o bolepen, te well lauter ap i phub baro. Job dell tumende te chal, un i bacht an tumaro dji."
44014018	Fote o Paulo un o Barnabas jaake rakran, kaman i menshe lenge fichen te marell. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas mangan len pengro tselo djijestar, te krenn le kowa gar.
44014019	Koi wan bibolde dran i forja Antiochia un Ikonion an kau foro. Kolla lan bud menshen ap pengri rig, lan barra, witsran i barentsa ap o Pauleste, tsardan les dran o foro win, un dikan ap leste, un penan: "Kowa hi mulo."
44014020	Har o Pauleskre mala trul leste tardo his, stas job pre un djas an ko foro. Ap o wawar diwes djas lo o Barnabeha an o foro Derbe.
44014021	An ko foro penan le o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un bud menshe wan patslo. Palle djan jon pale an kol forja Listra, Ikonion un Antiochia,
44014022	djan pash i patslende un dan len soor an o dji, un rakran lenge an o dji, te atchenn jon an o patsepen. Un jon penan ap kol patslende: "Ap maro drom pash o Debleste an o bolepen krenn menge i menshe o djipen phares."
44014023	Un an hake gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wan, rodas o Paulo un o Barnabas phralen win, te wenn le phureder mank i patslende. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas lan penge i tsiro, kai chan le tchi o Debleske, un mangan o Debles lauterenge, kai ap leste patslo wan, te dell lo ap lende jak.
44014024	Palle djan le an i themma Pisidia un Pamfilia.
44014025	Jon penan i menshenge an o foro Perge o Debleskro lab, un djan dureder an o foro Attalia.
44014026	Kote djan le ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un wan an o foro Antiochia. Kowa his kau foro, kai bitchran i patsle o Paules un o Barnabes an wawar forja, te penan jon kote o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un jon mangan o Debles, te djal lo lentsa. Kai budi his kanna kerdo.
44014027	Un o Paulo un o Barnabas wan kanna pale pale an ko foro. Kote dan le i patslen khetne gole, un penan lenge, kai o Dewel lentsa his, un har bud koowa job kras, un har job ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi, pash peste gole das, un jon ap leskro drom wan.
44014028	Un o Paulo un o Barnabas atchan i raha tsiro pash kol patslende.
44015001	Koi wan mursha dran o them Judea an o foro Antiochia tele, un penan kol patslenge, kai kek bibolde hi: "Tumer hunte mukenn tumen ap o mass te tchinell, har o Mose kowa an peskre lila tchinas. Te mukenn tumen gar ap o mass te tchinell, palle nai wenn tumer gar o Debleskre tchawe."
44015002	Har o Paulo un o Barnabas kowa shunan, penan le kol murshenge: "Hi gar tchatcho, hoi tumer i patslenge penan!" Koi his len i baro tchingepen lentsa. Koi pre penan lenge i phrala, te djan jon dui i wawar phralentsa an o foro Jerusalem pash o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un pash i phureder mank i patslende, te putchenn le lendar, hoi jon pral kowa penenna.
44015003	Un i phrala penan ap o Pauleste un ap o Barnabeste: "Djan o Debleha!" Un kol dui kran pen ap o drom un wan an i themma Fenicia un Samaria. Un kote penan le i menshenge, har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, patslo wan. Koi pral wan i tsele patsle bachtelo.
44015004	Palle was o Paulo un o Barnabas pash i patslende an o foro Jerusalem. Un i phureder un o Jesuseskre bitchepangre his ninna kote, un lan len o djijestar pash pende pre. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas penan lenge, kai o Dewel lentsa his, un har bud koowa job mashkral kolende kras, hoi kek bibolde hi.
44015005	His Farisarja koi, kai ap o Jesuseste patslo wan. Kolla penan ap i phralende: "Kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, hunte wenn ap o mass tchindlo, un lenge hunte well penlo, te rikrenn le pen ap o Moseskre laba."
44015006	Un i Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende wan khetne, te rakrenn le pral ko koowa.
44015007	Har jon pen i raha tsiro tchingran, stas o Petro pre, un penas: "Mire phrala, tumer djinenna, kai o Dewel rodas man glan raha tsiro win, un kamas, te penap me o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Un kolla shunan un patsan.
44015008	O Dewel, kai prindjrell i menshengre djia, sikras mende, kai das job ninna kolen o Debleskro Ducho, kai kek bibolde hi.
44015009	Leske hi jon gar wawartchandes har mer, i bibolde. Jon te patsenn ap leste, palle krell lo lengro dji djudjo.
44015010	Kamenn tumer, te well o Dewel chojedo ap tumende? Ma tchiwenn pharo koowa ap lende, kai nai hidjan mare phure gar, un mer witar gar!
44015011	Mer patsah, te dell men maro rai Jesus ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella tchitcheske, - kokres dran leskro latchepen. Ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi, dell lo kau djipen tchitcheske, - kokres dran leskro latchepen."
44015012	Koi tchingran kol tsele menshe buder gar lentsa, un shunan ap o Pauleste un o Barnabeste, har kolla lenge penan, hawo baro un sorelo koowa o Dewel mashkral kolende kras, kai kek bibolde hi.
44015013	Pal lengro rakepen stas o Jakobo pre, un penas: "Mire phrala, shunenn, hoi kamau te penap!
44015014	O Simon ginas menge dre, hoi o Dewel lauter kras, te wenn ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, leskre menshe, un te wenn le leske koi.
44015015	Kowa hi ninna an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: O Dewel penas:
44015016	Pal kowa wau me pale pash tumende, te krap o Davideskro kheer pale newes, kowa, hoi khetne peras.
44015017	Kowa krau, te putchenn lauter, kai pral atchan, pal mande. Ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, denn man an-gole. Un jon wenn miro, un wenn mange koi.
44015018	O Dewel krell kowa kanna, hoi job glan i raha tsiro penas."
44015019	"Doleske penau me" penas o Jakobo, "mer hunte tchiwas gar o biboldengro tchatchepen ap i patslende, kai kek bibolde hi, te krenn le lauter jaake, har i bibolde krenna.
44015020	Mer tchinah lenge i liil, un penah lenge, te chan le kek mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi i menshe an-mangenn, har te wals li o Dewel; te sowenn i mursha gar wawar djuwjentsa, witar gar i djuwja wawar murshentsa; te chan le kek mass i fichendar, kai o rat gar win nashas, te pijenn le lendar witar kek rat.
44015021	Kowa, hoi o Mose penas, kowa well i menshenge an hake forja penlo. Hako Debleskro diwes wenn o Moseskre laba an i biboldengre kangria glan-drawedo."
44015022	O Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende, khetne i tsele patslentsa rodan murshen mashkral i patslende win, te djan jon o Pauleha un o Barnabeha an o foro Antiochia. Kol mursha his o Judas, koles his ninna ko lab Barsabas, un o Silas. Kolla his pralstune mursha mashkral kol patslende.
44015023	An ko liil, hoi jon peha lan, his tchindlo: "Kau liil tchinan o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende. Mer ham tumare phrala un tchinah kau liil ap i patslende, kai kek bibolde hi, un kai djiwenna an kol themma Antiochia, Siria un Cilicia.
44015024	Mer shunam, te wan menshe mendar pash tumende, un kran tumen dineles, jaake te lan tumer traash. Djinenn, kolen bitchram mer gar pash tumende.
44015025	Doleske wam mer khetne, un penam jek djijeha: Mer rodah murshen win, un bitchrah len pash tumende. Lentsa wenn ninna mare latche phrala, o Paulo un o Barnabas.
44015026	Kolla hi mursha, kai budrenna maro rajeske, o Jesus Kristeske, un lengri budi leske hi lenge budeder moldo har lengro djipen.
44015027	Kol dui murshen, kai bitchram kanna pash tumende, o Judas un o Silas, kolla penenn tumenge kol emlige laba, hoi mer tchinam:
44015028	O Debleskro Ducho un mer kamah gar tumaro djipen phares te krell. Mer penah tumenge tchi wawar har kawa:
