44015029	Chan kek mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi i menshe an-mangenn, har te wals li o Dewel. Pijenn kek rat! Chan kek mass i fichestar, kai o rat gar win nashas! I murshenge penah, te sowenn le gar wawar djuwjentsa. Un i djuwjenge penah, te sowenn le gar wawar murshentsa. Te rikrenn tumen ap kowa, hi kowa mishto. Atchenn o Debleha!"
44015030	Koi djan le an o foro Antiochia, lan i patslen khetne, un dan len ko liil.
44015031	Har kolla ko liil draweran, wan jon lauter bachtelo pral kol laba.
44015032	O Judas un o Silas his o Debleskre rakepangre. Jon rakran kol patslentsa, un mangan len, te atchenn le an o patsepen. Un lengre labentsa dan jon len soor, te djan jon dureder ap o Jesuseskro drom.
44015033	-
44015034	Un har jon i tsiro an o foro Antiochia his, mukan kol patsle len te djal. Un jon djan pale an o foro Jerusalem pash kolende, kai bitchran len.
44015035	O Paulo un o Barnabas atchan an o foro Antiochia. Un jon khetne bud wawarentsa sikran i menshende o Jesuseskro drom, un penan lenge, hoi o rai Jesus lenge penas un kras.
44015036	Pal jek tsiro penas o Paulo ap o Barnabeste: "Djas pale pale an kol tsele forja, kai mer o Debleskro lab i menshenge penam! Dikas pal mare phralende an i wawar themma, har lenge djala!"
44015037	O Barnabas kamas ninna o Johanni Markes peha te lell.
44015038	O Paulo penas ap o Barnabeste: "Kowa hi gar mishto, te las o Markes peha. Job mukas men an o them Pamfilia kokres, djas peske, un budras gar mentsa."
44015039	Un kote tchingran pen o Paulo un o Barnabas pral o Markeste jaake, kai djas hakeno peskro drom. O Barnabas las o Markes peha, un jon uleran ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Ciprus.
44015040	O Paulo rodas peske o Silases win, un djas peske leha. Un kol patsle penan lenge: "O Dewel djal tumentsa!"
44015041	Un o Paulo un o Silas djan an i themma Siria un Cilicia, un jon dan i tsele patslen soor an o patsepen.
44016001	Jon wan ninna an i forja Derbe un Listra. Koi his i tarno patslo mursh. Kowa kharas Timoteo. Leskri dai his i biboldetsa. Un joi his patslo. Leskro dad his kek biboldo.
44016002	O Timoteo his i mursh, pral koleste rakran i patsle mishto an i forja Listra un Ikonion.
44016003	Koles kamas o Paulo peha te lell ap o drom. Job las les un tchinas les ap o mass, har kowa pash i bibolde hi, te tchingrenn i bibolde gar koi pral. I bibolde djinan lauter, kai leskro dad kek biboldo hi.
44016004	An kol forja, kai jon wan, dan jon i phralen ko liil, kai dre tchindlo hi, hoi o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende an o foro Jerusalem win kran. Un jon penan lenge, te rikrenn le pen ap kol laba.
44016005	Un i tsele patsle wan sorleder an o patsepen, un hako diwes wan budeder patslo.
44016006	O Paulo un o Silas djan dureder. Un har o Debleskro Ducho gar kamas, te penan le o Debleskro lab an o them Asia, djan le an i themma Frigia un Galatia.
44016007	Har jon an o them Misia wan, kaman le dureder an o them Bitinia te djal. Un o Jesuseskro Ducho mukas len gar kote te djal.
44016008	Koi djan le mank o them Misia tele an o foro Troas.
44016009	Koi dikas o Paulo an i suni i murshes dran o them Macedonia. Kowa mangas les un penas: "Am wergal an o them Macedonia, un pen menge o Debleskro lab!"
44016010	Koi pre rodam mer sik i panjeskro ulepaskro, kai lell men peha an o them Macedonia. Mer djinam, kai das men o Dewel gole, te penas kote i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
44016011	Mer uleram dran o foro Troas krik, un wam an o foro Samotrake. Ap o wawar diwes djam an o foro Neapolis.
44016012	Palle uleram dureder an o foro Filipi. Kowa hi i foro an ko them Macedonia. Kote djiwan bud Remarja. Mer atcham i tsiro an ko foro.
44016013	Ap o Debleskro diwes djam mer win glan o foro pash o pani. Mer patsam, te wenn pash o pani menshe khetne, kai mangenn kote o Debles an. Koi besham men tele, un rakram kolla djuwjentsa, kai kote wan.
44016014	Koi his i djuwel, kai mangas kote o Debles an. Joi his i bikepaskretsa un bikras ripja dran lolo thann. Koja kharas Lidia. Joi his dran o foro Tiatira. Kolake kras o rai Jesus o dji pre. Un joi shunas, hoi o Paulo penas, un was patslo.
44016015	Un joi mukas pes peskre menshentsa an o pani te thowell, te sikrell li, te patsell li ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste. Un joi mangas men soreles un penas: "Te patsenn tumer, kai me ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste patsau, awenn an miro kheer un atchenn kote!" Un joi mangas men o tselo djijestar, te was mer an lakro kheer.
44016016	Jek diwes, har mer djam pale pash o pani, kai jon mangan o Debles an, tapram mer i rakli, an kolate his i beng, kowa das lat o durkepen. Lakro durkepaha anas li lakre rajenge bud lowe dre.
44016017	Koja las o Paules un men palla, un das gole: "Kalla mursha budrenn ko baro Debleske! Kalla sikrenn tumenge o drom pash leste."
44016018	Kowa das li gole hako diwes. O Paulo was chojedo, un risras pes trujal, un penas ap ko bengeste, kai hi an late: "Me penau tuke an o Jesus Kristeskro lab: Dja dran late win!" Koi djas o beng dran kai rakli win.
44016019	Har lakre raja dikan, kai nashte anas joi lenge buder kek lowe, wan le tchilatcho, un tapran o Paules un o Silases. Un jon anan len an o foro glan i pralstunende.
44016020	I pralstune anan i tchatchepangren an ko foro khetne, un penan: "Kalla anenn tchingepen an maro foro. Jon hi bibolde,
44016021	un penenn menge, te rikras ap sawe laba, hoi mer nai krah gar. Mer ham Remarja."
44016022	Bud menshe, kai his koi, wan tchilatcho ap o Pauleste un ap o Silaseste. Un kol tchatchepangre mukan lenge i koola tele te tsardell, un penan, te denn le len i kashtentsa.
44016023	Pal kowa har jon len soreles dawa dan, witsran le len an o stilepen, un penan ap o rajeste pral o stilepen: "De mishto jak ap lende!"
44016024	Har jon kowa ap leste penan, witsras job len an o palstuno stilepen, un tchiwas lengre pire an o kasht, un pandas len.
44016025	Deesh-te-dujenge an i rat sharan o Paulo un o Silas o Debles, un giwan leske i gili. Un kol wawar stilepangre shunan kowa, har jon giwan.
44016026	Ap jek kopo trissas i phub, un ko kheer, kai o stilepen his, peras khetne. I wudja stan pre, un ap i stilepangre peran i sasterne shelle tele.
44016027	Har o rai pral o stilepen pre djangewas un dikas, kai kol wudja an o stilepen pre his, patsas lo, kai kol stilde nashan penge. Koi las job peskro charo, un kamas pes te marell.
44016028	Koi das o Paulo soreles gole: "Ma mare tut! Mer ham lauter kate!"
44016029	Un o rai pral o stilepen mangas i momeli, un djas sik pash i stilepangre. Les his i bari daar, har mukas job pes glan o Pauleste un o Silaseste tele te perell.
44016030	Un job anas len win, un penas ap lende: "Rajale, hoi krap, te lap o Debleskro djipen?"
44016031	Penan le ap leste: "Pats ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste! Jaake leh tu un tire menshe o Debleskro djipen."
44016032	Un o Paulo un o Silas penan leske, un kol tsele wawarenge an leskro kheer, o Debleskro lab.
44016033	An koi rati thowas o rai pral o stilepen lengro rat tele, un mukas pes un peskre tsele menshen an o pani te thowell, te sikrell lo, te patsell lo ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste.
44016034	Job las len dre an peskro kheer, das len te chal un te pijell, un his bachtelo peskre tsele menshentsa, kai wan jon patslo ap o Debleste.
44016035	Har diwes was, bitchran kol tchatchepangre pengre klisten pash o rajeste pral o stilepen un penan leske, te mukell lo o Paules un o Silases te djal.
44016036	Kowa was pash o Pauleste un penas leske: "I tchatchepangre bitchran man, te penap tumenge, te han tumer gar buder stildo. Awenn win un djan tumaro drom. Kek krell tumenge tchilatchepen!"
44016037	O Paulo penas ap kol klistende: "Mer ham Remarja. Tumare pralstune mukan men dawa te dell glan i tsele menshende. Jon rakran kek tchatchepen pral mende win, un witsran men an o stilepen. Un kanna kamenn jon men tchorchanes dran o stilepen win te anell. Jaake djal kowa gar, har jon kamenna. Kolla tchatchepangre, kai kran kowa, kolla hunte wenna pash mende un hunte anenn men dran o stilepen win. Kowa penenn lenge!"
44016038	Kol kliste penan kowa i tchatchepangrenge. Har kolla shunan, kai o Paulo un o Silas Remarja hi, lan jon traash,
44016039	un djan pash lende, mangan pen tele glan lende, anan len dran o stilepen win, un mangan len, te djan le dran o foro win.
44016040	Un o Paulo un o Silas djan pale an o kheer, kai i Lidia djiwell. Un har jon kote pengre phralen dikan, penan jon lenge: "Ma trashenn! Atchenn o Debleha!" Palle djan jon dran ko foro win.
44017001	Un o Paulo un o Silas wan an i forja Amfipolis un Apolonia un djan dureder an o foro Tessalonika. Koi his i biboldengri kangri.
44017002	Har pash o Pauleste kowa jaake his, djas lo pash lende dre, un penas lenge ap triin Debleskre diwessa o Debleskro lab.
44017003	Job sikras lende, kai an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, har ko baro rai, kai o Deblestar wella, hunte las bud duka ap peste, un stas i mulendar pre. "Un me penau tumenge," penas o Paulo, "kau Jesus, kolestar rakrau, kowa hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."
44017004	Mank i biboldende his sawe, kai patsan kowa, hoi o Paulo lenge penas. Un jon rikran pen ap i rig o Paulestar un o Silasestar. Ninna bud, bud griche, kai lan o biboldengro patsepen an, patsan kowa, hoi o Paulo penas. Mank lende his ninna bud an-dikle djuwja.
44017005	I bibolde, kai gar ap o Jesuseste patsan, silweran ap o Pauleste un ap o Silaseste. Un jon djan ap o drom, rodan tchilatche murshen, un lentsa kran le i menshen an ko foro diwjo. Un jon djan pash ko kheer, kai djiwas o Jason. Jon patsan, te wans o Paulo un o Silas pash leste. Un i bibolde un i tchilatche kaman len dran o kheer win te anell glan i tsele menshende.
44017006	Har jon kol dujen gar hatsan, lan le o Jason un wawar patslen, un anan len glan kolende, kai his pralstune pral ko foro, un dan gole: "Kalla menshe krenn ap i tseli phub tchingepen. Kalla wan kanna ninna kate pash mende,
44017007	un djiwenn pash o Jason. Jon krenn gar, hoi o baro rai an o foro Rom lenge penella, un penenn: I wawar hi o baro rai. Leskro lab hi Jesus."
44017008	Har kol menshe un kol pralstune pral ko foro kowa shunan, wan le chojedo.
44017009	O Jason un i wawar patsle hunte dan len lowe, te mukan le len te djal.
44017010	An koi rat bitchran kol patsle o Paules un o Silases an o foro Berea. Har jon koi wan, djan jon an i biboldengri kangri.
44017011	I bibolde an o foro Berea shunan feteder ap o Debleskro lab, har kol bibolde an o foro Tessalonika. Jon shunan o Debleskro lab pengro tselo djijeha, un rodan hako diwes an o Debleskro lab, te djinenn le, te hi kowa tchatcho, hoi o Paulo penas.
44017012	Bud lendar wan patslo, ninna bud brawele griche, djuwja har mursha.
44017013	Har shunan kol bibolde an o foro Tessalonika, te penas o Paulo ninna i menshenge an o foro Berea o Debleskro lab, wan le kote un kran tchingepen. Jon kaman, te wenn i menshe chojedo ap lende.
44017014	Koi bitchran kol patsle o Paules sik dureder pash o baro pani. O Silas un o Timoteo atchan an o foro Berea.
44017015	Kolla, kai djan o Pauleha, anan les an o foro Athen. Glan kowa, har jon khere djan penas o Paulo lenge, te penenn le ap o Silaseste un ap o Timoteste, te wenn jon jaake sik har djala pash leste.
44017016	Jaake raha kamas o Paulo an o foro Athen te atchell. Kote dikas lo bud barengre murshen, djuwjen un fichen, hoi kran i menshe pengre wastentsa, un hoi jon an-mangenna. Un kowa dukas les an peskro dji.
44017017	Job rakras an i biboldengri kangri ap i biboldende, un ninna ap kol grichende, kai lan o biboldengro patsepen an. Un hako diwes rakras lo mashkral an o foro ap kol menshende, kai job kote dikas.
44017018	Mank lende his ninna sikle mursha, kai kharan Stoikarja un Epikurarja. Kolla tchingran leha. Har rakras o Paulo pral o Jesuseste, un penas, kai kras o Dewel o Jesuses i mulendar djido, penan le: "Hoi kamell ko dinelo rakepaskro te penell?" Wawar penan: "Job rakrell pral wawar deblende, kolen mer gar prindjrah."
44017019	Jon lan o Paules peha, un anan les ap i platsa, hoi kharella Areopag. Un jon penan: "Nai peneh tu menge, hawo newo patsepen hi kowa, hoi tu peneh kate i menshenge?
44017020	Kowa, hoi tu menge peneh, hi menge newo. Mer kamah te djinell, hoi hi kowa."
44017021	I tsele menshe an o foro Athen, ninna kol wi-themarja, kai djiwenn pash lende, kolen his tchi wawar an o shero, har te shunenn le i newo koowa, un te rakrenn le pral kowa.
44017022	Un o Paulo his mashkral lende ap o Areopag tardo, un penas: "Murshale an o foro Athen, me dikau, kai hi tumenge tumare debla bud moldo.
44017023	Me djom an tumaro foro trujal, un dikom ko koowa, hoi tumenge mulno hi, un hoi tumer an-mangenna. Un me hatsom i bar, kai anenn le chapen i debleske. Ap ko bar hi tchindlo: Ko debleske, kai prindjrah gar. Un me penau tumenge: Ko Dewel, kones tumer an-mangenna, ninna te prindjrenn les gar, pral koleste rakrau me kanna.
44017024	Ko Dewel kras o bolepen un i phub, un lauter, hoi koi pre hi. Job hi o rai pral o bolepen un i phub. Job djiwell gar an i Debleskre khera, kai i menshe pengre wastentsa kran.
44017025	Mer hunte anas les tchi te chal un te pijell. Job das lauteren o djipen, un job dell len lauter kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske.
44017026	Ko Dewel kras ko jek menshes, o Adames. Kolestar wan i tsele menshe an hake themma ap i phub. Job das len i tsiro, har raha jon djiwenna, un ninna an hawo them jon djiwenna.
44017027	Kowa lauter kras o Dewel, te rodenn le les, un te haiwenn le, kai job kai hi, un te hatsenn le les. Un job hi gar dur hakenestar mendar.
44017028	An leste djiwah mer, un halauter, hoi mer krah, krah mer an leste. Un mer ham an leste. Ninna tumare gosewe mursha penan: Mer wah o Deblestar.
44017029	Mer te wah o Deblestar, palle hi kowa dinlepen, te patsenn tumer, kai hatsenn o Debles an kowa, hoi tumer tumare wastentsa kran dran sonakai, rup un barra.
44017030	An o phuro tsiro djinan i menshe gar, kai kowa, hoi jon kran, i doosh his. Un o Dewel das len kek phagi. Kanna penell o Dewel, te mukenn i menshe pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap leskro drom.
44017031	O Dewel djinell ko diwes, kai rakrell lo o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, un job djal pal o tchatchepen. O Dewel rodas i murshes win, te well job tchatchepaskro rai. Koles kras job i mulendar djido. Jaake sikras o Dewel hakeneste, kai job kau murshes win rodas."
44017032	Har shunan le, kai rakrell o Paulo pral i mursheste, kai mulo his un pale djido was, his lenge sapaske. Wawar penan: "Tu te peness menge pral ko koowa i wawar kopo budeder."
44017033	Palle djas peske o Paulo lendar.
44017034	His mursha koi, kai djan leha un wan patslo. Mashkral lende his ninna o Dionisio, i pralstuno ap o Areopag, un i djuwel, kai kharas Damaris, un ninna wawar.
44018001	Pal kowa djas o Paulo dran o foro Athen, un djas an o foro Korint.
44018002	Koi tapras job i biboldes dran o foro Pontus. Leskro lab his Akwila. Kowa was glan i tikno tsiro peskri romjaha, i Priska, dran o them Italia. O baro rai an o foro Rom, o Klaudio, penas, te djan i tsele bibolde dran o foro Rom win. Pash lende djas o Paulo kanna.
44018003	Un har job koi emligi budi kras har jon, atchas lo pash lende un budras lentsa.
44018004	Hako Debleskro diwes djas job an i biboldengri kangri un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un hoi job penas, sikras i biboldende un kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, kai o Jesus hi o Kristo, ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchras.
44018005	Har o Silas un o Timoteo dran o them Macedonia wan, tchiwas o Paulo peskri budi ap i rig, te nai penell lo i menshenge o Debleskro lab. An o Debleskro lab sikras lo i biboldende, kai o Jesus ko baro rai hi, koles o Dewel bitchras.
44018006	Jon shunan gar ap leste un praassan les. Palle das job koi tchik dran peskre koola tele, un penas ap lende: "Tumaro rat well ap tumaro shero. Man hi kek doosh. Kanna djau me pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi."
44018007	Job djas peske, un was an o kheer jekestar, kai las i biboldengro patsepen an. Leskro lab his Titio Justo. Koleskro kheer his pash i biboldengri kangri.
44018008	O Krispo, ko pralstuno pral i biboldengri kangri, was peskre tsele menshentsa patslo ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste. Ninna bud menshe an o foro Korint wan patslo. Un jon mukan pen an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, kai patsenn le ap o Jesus Kristeste.
44018009	I rati penas o rai Jesus an i suni ap o Pauleste: "Ma traash! Rake mandar un muk gar tele!
44018010	Me hom pash tute un kek nai dukrell tut. An kau foro hi bud menshe, kai kamenna ap mande te patsell."
44018011	Un o Paulo atchas jek bersh un shob tchon an kau foro, un penas lenge o Debleskro lab.
44018012	An ko tsiro, har his o Gallio o pralstuno un tchatchepaskro rai pral ko them Achaja, tchiwan pen kol bibolde khetne, un anan o Paules glan leste,
44018013	un penan koleske: "O Mose sikras men, har mer hunte mangas o Debles an. Un kanna well kau mursh un penell menge, te mangas mer o Debles wawartchandes an."
44018014	Har o Paulo kamas tchomone te penell, koi penas o Gallio ap i biboldende: "Te krals o Paulo i tchilatcho koowa, kai hunte lals lo i phagi, palle shunoms me tumen.
44018015	Tumer tchingrenn pral o biboldengro patsepen, un pral o Moseskre laba. Doleske anenn les glan tumare tchatchepangre! Me dau les gar i phagi."
44018016	Un job tradas len pestar.
44018017	Koi tapran kol bibolde o Sostenes, kol pralstunes pral i biboldengri kangri, un dan les dawa glan o Gallio, un kowa dikas kowa, un kras tchi.
44018018	O Paulo atchas i tsiro an o foro Korint. Koi pal penas lo i patslenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Un job uleras ap o panjeskro ulepaskro pral o baro pani an o them Siria. I Priska un o Akwila his pash leste. Glan kowa, har jon an o foro Kenchrea ap o panjeskro ulepaskro djan, das pes o Paulo sowel un mukas peskre balla tele te tchinell.
44018019	Pal kowa wan le an o foro Efesus. Un o Paulo mukas o Akwiles un i Priskat koi. Job djas an i biboldengri kangri un rakras koi i biboldentsa.
44018020	Jon mangan les, te atchell job budeder tsiro pash lende. Job kamas gar te atchell.
44018021	Har djas lo peske, penas lo ap lende: "Te kamell o Dewel, wau pale pash tumende." Un job djas win dran o foro Efesus, un uleras ap o panjeskro ulepaskro pral o baro pani,
44018022	un was an o foro Cesarea. Kote was lo i patslentsa khetne. Palle djas lo tele an o foro Antiochia.
44018023	Un har job i tsiro koi his, djas lo dureder an i themma Galatia un Frigia, un das i tsele patslen soor an o patsepen.
44018024	Koi was i biboldo an o foro Efesus. Leskro lab his Apollo. Kowa was dran o foro Alexandria. O Apollo djinas o Debleskro lab mishto, un his i latcho rakepaskro.
44018025	Job djinas ninna tchomone pral o Jesuseskro drom. Un peskro tselo djijeha rakras lo lestar. Un lauter, hoi job pral leste penas, his tchatcho. Ninna te djinas lo kowa lauter, djinas job kokres, har o Johanni i menshen an o pani thowas.
44018026	O Apollo djas an i biboldengri kangri, un les his kek traash, te penell lo kote i biboldenge o Jesusestar. Har o Akwila un i Priska les shunan, lan le les pash pende khere, un sikran leste o Debleskro drom feteder un budeder.
44018027	Palle kamas o Apollo an o them Achaja te djal. Un i patsle an o foro Efesus dan les i liil peha. An ko liil mangan le i phralendar an o them Achaja, te lenn jon o phrales Apollo pash pende pre. Un har job kote was, djas lo pash kolende, kai patslo wan dran o Debleskro latchepen, un sikras len o Debleskro drom feteder un budeder.
44018028	Job penas i biboldenge o Debleskro lab kote, kai job djas. Un job sikras lende an o Debleskro lab, kai hi o Jesus ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel glan i raha tsiro penas, te well job.
44019001	Har o Apollo an o foro Korint his, djas o Paulo an i themma Galatia un Frigia, un palle was lo an o foro Efesus. Koi hatsas job ninna patslen.
44019002	Ap kolende penas job: "Was o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende, har wan patslo?" Koi penan jon ap leste: "Mer shunam gar, kai hi o Debleskro Ducho kai."
44019003	Un job putchas lendar: "Ap hawo lab wan tumer an o pani thodo?" Penan jon: "Mer wam jaake an o pani thodo, har o Johanni kowa kras un penas."
44019004	Koi pre penas lenge o Paulo: "O Johanni thowas kolen an o pani, kai kaman te sikrell, kai mukan le pengro phuro djipen. Un job penas i menshenge, te hunte patsenn le ap koleste, kai pal leste wella. Un kowa hi o Jesus."
44019005	Har kol patsle kowa shunan, mukan pen le ap o lab o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, an o pani te thowell.
44019006	Un o Paulo tchiwas i wasta ap lende, un o Debleskro Ducho was ap lende. Un jon rakran an wawar rakepen, un penan kowa, hoi o Dewel lende sikras.
44019007	Koi his nai deesh-te-dui mursha khetne.
44019008	Triin tchon atchas o Paulo kote un rakras an i biboldengri kangri. Un les his kek traash un penas i menshenge i bari sorjaha, kai o Dewel o Jesus Kristes bitchras, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win.
44019009	Koi his ninna menshe pashal, kai kaman o Jesusestar tchi te djinell un kaman gar ap leste te patsell. Un glan i menshende rakran le djungelo koowa pral o patsepen ap o Jesuseste. Koi mukas o Paulo kol wawar patslentsa i biboldengri kangri, un rakras hako diwes an ko sikepaskro kheer, kai o Tiranno o sikepaskro hi.
44019010	Kowa kras job dui bersha, te shunan i bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, an o them Asia o Debleskro lab.
44019011	Un o Dewel his pash o Pauleste, un job nai kras bud baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor.
44019012	Hi jaake, kai lan i menshe ninna i koola un meenjakre dikle, hoi ap o Pauleste his, un tchiwan len ap kol nasslende, un o nasslepen djas lendar. Un i benga djan dran i menshende win, un jon wan sasto.
44019013	Kote his bibolde, kai nashan an o them trujal, un tradan i bengen dran i menshende win. Jon kaman ninna an o Jesuseskro lab kol bengen wi te tradell, un jon penan ap lende: "Mer penah tumenge an o lab ko Jesusestar, kolestar o Paulo rakrella: Awenn dran ko mensheste win!"
44019014	Kolla, kai kowa kran, his i efta tchawe i biboldestar. Kowa kharas Skewas un his i baro rashai.
44019015	Har kaman jon i benges wi tradenn, penas job ap lende: "O Jesuses prindjrau me, un o Paulestar shunom ninna. Koon han tumer?"
44019016	Un ko mursh, kai o beng an leste hi, stas ap lende pre, un das len jaake dawa, kai nashan jon ratles un nanges dran o kheer.
44019017	I menshe, kai an o foro Efesus djiwan, shunan kowa lauter. Un i bibolde, ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, lan bari traash. Un ko lab o rai Jesusestar was soreles sharedo.
44019018	Wan ninna bud kolendar, kai patslo wan, un penan glan i menshende, hoi jon tchilatches kran.
44019019	Bud durkepangre lan pengre lila un chatchran len glan halauterende. Kol lila his nai pantch-deesh serja (50.000)rupene beme moldo.
44019020	Jaake shunan bud un budeder o Jesusestar, maro rajestar. Un job kras, te was peskro lab sorelo mank lende.
44019021	Pal kau koowa kamas o Paulo pral i themma Macedonia un Achaja an o foro Jerusalem te djal, un penas: "Un pal kowa hunte dikap me o foro Rom ninna."
44019022	Un job bitchras dujen, kai budran leske, o Timotes un o Erastes, an o them Macedonia. Job atchas i tsiro an o them Asia.
44019023	Ap ko tsiro was i baro tchingepen an o foro Efesus pral o newo patsepen ap o Jesuseste.
44019024	Koi his i mursh, kowa kharas Demetrio. Kowa kras tikne rupene khera, hoi wi-dikan har o kheer, kai mangan i menshe i debletsa an, kai Artemis kharella. O Demetrio anas peske un peskre budepangre bud lowe dre.
44019025	Un job das kol tsele murshen khetne gole, kai kran ninna koi budi, hoi job kras un penas ap lende: "Murshale, tumer djinenna, kai anell men koi budi bud lowe dre.
44019026	Tumer dikan un shunan, kai o Paulo i menshenge penella: I dewel, kai i wastentsa kerdo wella, hi kek dewel. I menshe an o foro Efesus un an o them Asia shunenn ap o Pauleskro rakepen.
44019027	Nai well, te rakrenn le djungelo koowa pral mari budi. Un mari debletsa Artemis, un lakro baro kheer hi lenge buder tchi moldo. I menshe bistrenn lakro railepen, kai well sharedo an o them Asia un ap i tseli phub."
44019028	Har jon kowa shunan, was i bari choli ap lende, un jon dan gole: "Bari hi i debletsa Artemis an o foro Efesus!"
44019029	Un i tsele menshe an kau foro wan diwjo. Un jon tapran kol dui murshen, o Gajes un o Aristarches, kai wan o Pauleha dran o them Macedonia. Un lauter khetne nashan le an o khelepaskro kheer un tsardan kol dui murshen sorjaha peha.
44019030	O Paulo kamas pash kol menshende an o khelepaskro kheer te djal. Leskre mala rikran les pale.
44019031	Ninna mank i pralstunende an ko them Asia his mursha, kai ap o Pauleste latcho his. Kolla mukan leske soreles te penell, te djal job gar an o khelepaskro kheer.
44019032	An kau kheer dan halauter gole. Ko jek das kowa gole un ko wawar das wawartchandes gole. Bud djinan gar, hoske wan le khetne.
44019033	Mashkral lende his menshe, kolla djan pash o Alexandro, un penan leske, hoske i menshe jaake diwjo hi. Un i bibolde mangan lestar, te rakrell job ap halauterende. Job hadas i wasta pre, te sikrell lo len, kai job kamas te rakrell lentsa.
44019034	Har jon haiwan, kai o Alexandro i biboldo his, dan jon i raha tsiro jaake gole, har te well kowa dran jek mui: "Bari hi i debletsa Artemis an o foro Efesus!"
44019035	Pal kowa har o moskero lenge penas, te mukenn le tele, penas job ap lende: "Murshale an o foro Efesus, hako mensho djinella, kai an maro foro i menshe garda denna ap i bari debletsa Artemis un ap lakro baro kheer. Un ninna djinell hakeno, kai peras koi bareskri debletsa, kai koi tardo hi, dran o bolepen tele.
44019036	Kek nai penella, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi. Kanna atchenn un mukenn! Ma krenn tchomone, hoi khaitell tumen!
44019037	Hoske anan tumer kal menshen kate an o khelepaskro kheer? Jon rakran kek djungele laba pral mari debletsa un tchoran tchi dran lakro kheer.
44019038	O Demetrio un kolla menshe, kai leha khetne budrenn, jon te trashenn, te lenn le buder kek lowe dre, palle nai djan le pash i tchatchepangre un moskere. Kolenge nai penenn le lengro koowa.
44019039	Tumer, te hatsenn wawar koowa ap kal murshende, palle hunte well kowa win kerdo ap i tsillo.
44019040	Kau diwes kran tumer i menshen diwjo tchitcheske. Kanna hunte trashas mer, te well kowa glan i tchatchepangre. Un mer nai penah lenge tchi, hoske kram kowa."
44019041	Un har job kowa penas, bitchras lo len khere.
44020001	Har i menshe buder gar diwjo his, das o Paulo i patslen pash peste gole, un das len soor an lengro patsepen. Palle penas lo lenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" un djas peske, te djal lo an o them Macedonia.
44020002	Kote djas lo an i gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna, un das len soor an lengro patsepen. Koi pal was lo an o grichtikro them.
44020003	Har job triin tchon an kau them his, kamas lo ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Siria te ulerell. Koi shunas lo, kai kamenn i bibolde les te marell. Doleske djas lo pale pale an o them Macedonia.
44020004	Khetne leha djas ninna o Sopater dran o foro Berea, leskro dad his o Pirro. Dran o foro Tessalonika djas o Aristarcho un o Sekundo lentsa. Dran o foro Derbe was o Gajo lentsa. Ninna o Timoteo djas lentsa. Un o Tichiko un o Trofimo wan dran ko them Asia lentsa.
44020005	Kolla uleran glan-wi, un atchan an o foro Troas, bis te wam ninna kote.
44020006	Har i diwessa trujal his, kai i bibolde kek shutlo maro chan, uleram mer ap o panjeskro ulepaskro dran o foro Filipi win, un wam pal pantch diwessa an o foro Troas. Kote atcham efta diwessa.
44020007	Ap o kurko wam mer khetne, te phagas o maro. Un o Paulo penas o Debleskro lab i menshenge. Un o wawar diwes kamas job ap o panjeskro ulepaskro dureder te ulerell. Doleske rakras job jaake raha bis deesh-te-dujenge an i rati.
44020008	An koi pralstuni isema, kai mer khetne hams, his bud momlia.
44020009	Pash i wochni his i tarno mursh beshdo. Kowa kharas Euticho. Har o Paulo jaake raha rakras, sowas o Euticho dre, un peras dran i pralstuni wochni ap i phub. Un har jon les pre hadan, his job mulo.
44020010	O Paulo djas tele, tchiwas pes ap leste, tapras les trujal, un penas: "Ma trashenn! Job djiwella."
44020011	Koi djas o Paulo pale pre, phagas o maro, chas les lentsa, un rakras i tseli rat lentsa, un palle djas lo peske.
44020012	Un kol wawar anan kol tarno murshes djides pale an o kheer, un lauter his bachtelo.
44020013	O Paulo kamas kokres o tselo drom an o foro Assos te nashell. Mer wawar djam lauter ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleram glan-wi an o foro Assos. Kote kamam mer o Paules ap o panjeskro ulepaskro te lell. Jaake kamas o Paulo kowa mendar.
44020014	Har job men an o foro Assos tapras, lam les mer pash mende, un palle djam mer khetne an o foro Mitilene.
44020015	O wawar diwes wam pash o foro Kios. Palle wam an o foro Samos. Un i diwes koi pal wam an o foro Milet.
44020016	O Paulo kamas gar an o foro Efesus te djal, te nashrell lo an ko them Asia kek tsiro. Job kamas jaake sik har djala an o foro Jerusalem te djal, te well lo kote ap o baro diwes, kai kharella Pfingsta.
44020017	Har hams an o foro Milet, bitchras o Paulo jek phrales an o foro Efesus, un mukas kol phureden mank i patslende gole te dell, te wenn le pash leste.
44020018	Har jon pash o Pauleste wan, penas lo ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, har djiwom un hoi krom o tselo tsiro, har homs pash tumende an o them Asia.
44020019	Me krom man gar bareder har me hom. Me hom o rai Jesuseske koi. His mange jek, te djal mange djungeles. I bibolde lan man palla, un bud kope his mange ropaske.
44020020	Man his kek daar, te penap tumenge o tselo tchatchepen, har me tumende o Debleskro drom sikrom. Un me penom o Debleskro lab an tumare khera.
44020021	Me penom i biboldenge un kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un te djan le ap o Debleskro drom, un te patsenn le ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste.
44020022	Un kanna penell mange o Debleskro Ducho, te djap an o foro Jerusalem. Un me hunte shunap ap leste. Hoi i bibolde an o foro Jerusalem mantsa krenna, kowa djinau gar.
44020023	O Debleskro Ducho penas mange an hako foro, kai djom, kai wau stildo un kai duka ap mande wenna.
44020024	Me dau tchi buder ap miro djipen. Jek koowa kamau me an miro djipen te krell: Me kamau koi budi te krell, hoi das man maro rai Jesus: Job penas mange, te penap i menshenge, har latcho o Dewel lenge hi, un har kras job i drom, te nai wenn le pash leste.
44020025	Me djom pash bud menshende un penom lenge, te dell o Dewel len pash peste gole, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win. Kanna shunenn: Me djinau, kai dikenn tumer halauter man buder gar pale.
44020026	Jek penau me tumenge kau diwes: Man hi kek doosh, te djal jek tumendar nashedo.
44020027	Me mukom gar tele, te penap tumenge halauter, hoi o Dewel tumenge kras.
44020028	Denn garda ap tumende un ap kol tsele patslende! Kolen ginas o Dewel peskro tchaweskro rateha. O Debleskro Ducho das len an tumare wasta, te denn garda ap lende. Tumer han lengre bakrengre.
44020029	Jek djinau, te hom me gar buder koi, wenn diwje djukle pash tumende un marenn bud tumendar.
44020030	Ninna dran tumende wenna mursha, kai penenn i patslenge chochene laba, hoi gar o Deblestar wella. Un jon tsardenn i patslen ap pengri rig.
44020031	Doleske denn jak! Un rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Triin bersha homs me pash tumende, un rowom hako diwes un haki rat ap tumende, te krenn tchi, hoi gar mishto hi an o Debleskre jaka. Ma bistrenn kowa!
44020032	Me tchiwau tumen kanna an o Debleskro wast, te dell job jak ap tumende. Atchenn pash o Debleste un pash leskro lab! Leskro lab sikrell tumende o Debleskro latchepen. Les hi i soor, te krell lo tumen soreles an o patsepen. Un o Dewel dell tumen jek brawlepen an o bolepen. Kowa hi o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa dell job lauterende, kai leskre tchawe hi.
44020033	-
44020034	Tumer djinenna: Me mangom kekestar tumendar tchomone: kek sonakai, kek rup, kek an-ripaske. Mire wastentsa budrom, te well man un kolen, kai pash mande hi, te chal.
44020035	Jaake sikrom tumende, kai hunte budras, te nai dah ninna i tchorwelende tchomone. Ma bistrenn kol laba, hoi o rai Jesus penas: Kowa, kai della, hi bachtleder har kowa, kai lella."
44020036	Har o Paulo kowa penas, djas lo lauterentsa ap i tchanga un mangas o Debles lenge.
44020037	Koi rowan le lauter soreles, tapran les trujal un tchumran les.
44020038	Ko lab, hoi o Paulo penas, te dikenn le les buder gar pale, kras len bare duka an o dji. Palle djan le leha pash o panjeskro ulepaskro.
44021001	Mer penam ap lende "Atchenn o Debleha," un uleram ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Kos. Un o wawar diwes wam ap ko kotar them an o pani, hoi Rhodos kharella. Un palle uleram dureder an o foro Patara.
44021002	Un kote hatsam mer i wawar panjeskro ulepaskro, djam dre, un uleram an o them Fenicia.
44021003	Har wam jaake dur, te dikam nai o them Ciprus, mukam kowa serwes tchiddo, un uleram ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Siria, un wam an o foro Tirus. Koi anan jon o tselo koowa, hoi o panjeskro ulepaskro hidjas, an o foro.
44021004	Kote rodam i patslen, un har hatsam len, atcham efta diwessa pash lende. O Debleskro Ducho penas kote i patslenge, te wenn bare duka ap o Pauleste an o foro Jerusalem. Koi penan jon ap leste, te djal lo gar an o foro Jerusalem.
44021005	Pal efta diwessa djam mer dureder. Mentsa djan i phrala pengre romjentsa un i tchawentsa dran o foro win pash o pani. Un kote djam mer ap i tchanga un mangam o Debles an.
44021006	Palle penam lenge: "Atchenn o Debleha," un jon djan pale khere, un mer djam ap o panjeskro ulepaskro.
44021007	Mer wam an o foro Ptolemais. Kote uleras o panjeskro ulepaskro gar buder dureder. An kau foro atcham mer jek diwes pash i patslende.
44021008	O wawar diwes djam mer dureder, un wam an o foro Cesarea. Kote djam an o kheer, kai o Filipo djiwell, un atcham pash leste. Kowa his i mursh, kai penell i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Job his jek kol eftendar, kai his wi-rodedo an o foro Jerusalem, te denn le i tchorwele patslende chapaske.
44021009	Koles his star tcha, kai gar romedino his. Kolla tcha his pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un jon penan i patslenge, hoi o Dewel lende sikras.
44021010	Har mer budeder diwessa koi hams, was i Debleskro rakepaskro dran o them Judea. Leskro lab his Agabo.
44021011	Un job was pash mende, las koi dori, hoi o Paules trul peskro ripen his, un pandas peskre pire un wasta, un penas: "Kowa penas mange o Debleskro Ducho: Ko mursh, koneske kai dori hi, koles pandenn i bibolde an o foro Jerusalem, un denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi."
44021012	Har mer kowa shunam, mangam mer, un kol wawar patsle an ko foro, o Paulestar, te djal job gar an o foro Jerusalem.
44021013	O Paulo penas: "Hoske rowenn tumer, un krenn mange miro dji pharo? Me kamau koi budi te krap, hoi o rai Jesus man das, ninna te pandenn le man i shellentsa, ninna te marenn le man an o foro Jerusalem."
44021014	Hako lab, hoi mer ap o Pauleste rakram, his tchitcheske. Koi penam mer: "Mu te well kowa jaake, har o Dewel kamella."
44021015	I tsiro koi pre djam mer an o foro Jerusalem.
44021016	Mentsa djan ninna patsle dran o foro Cesarea. Jon anan men pash o Menason. Kowa his i patslo, kai was dran o them Ciprus, un was glan o raha tsiro patslo. Pash leste atcham nai i tsiro.
44021017	Har wam an o foro Jerusalem, lan men kol patsle kote bachteles pre.
44021018	O wawar diwes djas o Paulo mentsa pash o Jakobeste. Un i tsele phureder mank i patslende wan kote.
44021019	O Paulo penas lenge "Latcho Diwes!" Un palle penas lo lenge halauter, jek pal o wawar, hoi o Dewel leha mashkral kol menshende kras, kai kek bibolde hi.
44021020	Har jon kowa shunan, sharan le o Debles, un penan ap o Pauleste: "Miro phraal, tu dikeh har bud serja bibolde patslo wan, un lauter rikrenn pen pengri tseli sorjaha ap kowa, hoi o Mose an peskre lila penas.
44021021	Lenge was pral tute penlo, kai tu kol biboldenge an i wawar themma penals, te mukenn le pengre tchawe buder gar ap o mass te tchinell, un te djiwenn le buder gar pal o Moseskre laba.
44021022	Hoi krah kanna? Jon shunan, kai tu pash mende hal.
44021023	Doleske shuness tu, hoi mer tuke penah: Men hi star mursha. Kolla dan pen sowel, kai pijenn jon i tsiro kek mool un mukenn pengre balla gar tele te tchinell.
44021024	Ko tsiro hi sik trujal. Le len pash tute, un thob tut lentsa khetne pal o biboldengro tchatchepen, un de len lowe, te mukenn jon pengre balla tele te tchinell! Jaake dikenn i tsele bibolde, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi, hoi jon pral tute penan. Un jon dikenna, kai tu pal o biboldengro tchatchepen djiweh.
44021025	Kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi un patslo wan, tchinam mer i liil. An ko liil hi tardo, - te chan le kek mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi i menshe an-mangenn, har te wals li o Dewel; - te pijenn le kek rat; - te chan le kek mass i fichestar, hoi was tassedo; - te sowenn i mursha gar wawar djuwjentsa, witar gar i djuwja wawar murshentsa."
44021026	Koi las o Paulo kol murshen pash peste. Un o wawar diwes thowas lo pes lentsa khetne pal o biboldengro tchatchepen. Palle djas job an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un kote penas lo i rashajenge: "Mer thowam men pal o biboldengro tchatchepen. An efta diwessa anah mer fichen hakeneske mendar, te wenn le maredo o Debleske. Koi tsiro hi kanna trujal, ap hoi mer men sowel dam."
44021027	Har his kolla efta diwessa trujal, dikan i bibolde dran o them Asia o Paules an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un jon kran, te wan bud menshe chojedo ap leste. Un jon tapran les,
44021028	un dan gole: "Murshale dran o them Israel, awenn pash mende! Kawa hi ko mursh, kai i tsele menshen ap i phub dinelo krella. Job rakrell djungeles pral i biboldende, pral o Moseskre lila, un pral o Debleskro baro kheer. Kanna anas job ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi, an o Debleskro baro kheer, un kras maro Debleskro baro kheer pale-tchiddo."
44021029	Glan kowa, kai dikan le les an o Debleskro baro kheer, dikan le les an o foro khetne jekeha, kai was dran o foro Efesus. Kowa his o Trofimo. Dran kowa patsan le, kai las o Paulo les peha an o Debleskro baro kheer. Kowa his gar tchatcho.
44021030	I tsele menshe an o foro Jerusalem wan chojemen ap o Pauleste, nashan khetne, tapran o Paules, un tsardan les dran o Debleskro baro kheer win. Har jon win his, pandan le sik i wudja an o Debleskro baro kheer.
44021031	I menshe djan ap o Pauleste pre un kaman les te marell. Koi was o pralstuneske pral i lurdende penlo, kai halauter an o foro Jerusalem diwjo wan.
44021032	Un o pralstuno lurdo las sik wawar pralstunen un lurden peha, un nashas kote, kai i menshe khetne wan. Har kolla kol pralstunes un kol lurden dikan, dan le o Paules kek dawa buder.
44021033	Un ko pralstuno lurdo djas pash o Pauleste, tapras les, mukas les dui sasterne shellentsa te pandell, un putchas halauterendar: "Koon hi kowa? Un hoi kras kowa?"
44021034	Ko jek das kawa gole, ko wawar das kowa gole. Un o pralstuno lurdo haiwas kek lab, hoi jon leske penan. Pale mukas lo o Paules an o lurdengro kheer te anell.
44021035	-
44021036	Kol bud menshe lan les palla, un dan gole: "Denn les mulo!" Har o Paulo glan ko lurdengro kheer was, hunte hidjan i lurde les, jaake diwjo his i menshe, kai kaman les te marell.
44021037	Har jon o Paules an o lurdengro kheer kaman te anell, putchas lo ko pralstunestar: "Nai rakrau tuha?" Kowa penas: "Rakreh tu grichtikes?
44021038	Hal tu gar ko mursh dran o them Egiptia, kai glan i tsiro i tchingepen kras, un anas star-sheel marepangren an o mulo them win?"
44021039	"Na-a," penas o Paulo, "me hom i biboldo un wau dran o foro Tarsus, dran o them Cilicia. Me mangau tut: Muk man kal menshentsa te rakrell!"
44021040	Un o pralstuno lurdo penas ap o Pauleste: "Palle rake!" O Paulo his tardo pral glan o kheer un hadas peskro wast, te wenn le pokone. Har jon buder gar gole dan, rakras job lentsa ap hebretikes.
44022001	Tumer mursha, phrala un dada, shunenn, hoi kamau tumenge te penell!
44022002	Har jon shunan, kai rakrell job hebretikes, dan le buder gar gole. Un job penas:
44022003	Me hom i biboldo, un wom boldo an o foro Tarsus, an ko them Cilicia. Baro wom an o foro Jerusalem. Miro sikepaskro his o Gamaliel. Kowa sikras mande, te djiwap jaake, har mare phure djiwan. Jaake har tumer pal o Moseskre laba djiwenna, djiwom me ninna o tselo djijestar.
44022004	Me lom kolen palla, kai djan ap ko newo drom - me lom len jaake palla, te marom len. Murshen un djuwjen pandom, un witsrom len an o stilepen.
44022005	Ko baro rashai un kol tsele biboldengre phureder nai penenn, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi penau kate. Har kamom an o foro Damaskus te djal, dan man i rashaja lila peha i biboldenge an ko foro, te nai pandap ninna kote kolen, kai djan ap ko newo drom, te anap len an o foro Jerusalem, te lenn le kote pengri phagi.
44022006	Jaake djom ap o drom an o foro Damaskus. Har me homs i paash diwes glan o foro Damaskus, was ap jek kopo i bari momeli dran o bolepen trul mande.
44022007	Me perom ap i phub, un shunom, har jek ap mande penas: Saulo, Saulo, hoske leh tu man palla?
44022008	Me penom: Koon hal tu, mo rai? Un job penas ap mande: Me hom o Jesus dran Nazaret, koles tu palla leh.
44022009	Kolla mursha, kai pash mande his, dikan nai koja momeli. Jon shunan gar kol laba, hoi job ap mande penas.
44022010	Me putchom: Rai, hoi krap? Un o rai penas ap mande: Ste pre un dja an o foro Damaskus! Kote well tuke penlo, hoi tu hunte kress.
44022011	Koi bari momeli his jaake soreli, kai kras li man korelo. Un kolla, kai pash mande his, lan man ap o wast, un anan man an o foro Damaskus.
44022012	Koi his i patslo mursh. Kowa kharas Anania. Job rikras pes ap kowa, hoi an o Moseskre lila tardo hi. Kowa his an-diklo pash i tsele biboldende, kai kote djiwan.
44022013	Kowa was pash mande un penas: "Miro phraal Saulo, tu dikess pale." Un ap jek kopo dikom me pale.
44022014	Palle penas lo ap mande: "Ko Dewel mare dadendar rodas tut win, te djiness tu, hoi job kamella, un te dikess tu koles, kai hi kek tchilatchepen an leste, un shuness, hoi job penella.
44022015	Tu hunte rakress lestar glan i tsele menshende un peness, hoi tu dikal un shunal.
44022016	Un kanna ste pre! De leskro lab an-gole! Un muk tut an o pani te thowell, un tiri doosh tele te thowell!"
44022017	"Har me pale an o foro Jerusalem wom, un an o Debleskro baro kheer o Debles an-mangom, was o Debleskro Ducho soreles ap mande.
44022018	Un me dikom o Jesuses, un job rakras ap mande: Dja jaake sik har djala dran o foro Jerusalem. Kal menshe kate patsenn gar, hoi tu pral mande peneh.
44022019	Me penom: Rai, jon djinenna, kai me kolen, kai ap tute patsan, an o stilepen witsrom, un me mukom len an i biboldengre kangria i tchupnijaha te dell.
44022020	Me homs bachtelo, har maran le o Stefanes, koles, kai tutar rakras. Me homs pashal tardo, har maran le les. Un kolla, kai maran les, ap kolengre koola dom jak.
44022021	O rai Jesus penas ap mande: Dja dran o foro Jerusalem win! Me bitchrau tut an i wawar themma pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.
44022022	Har kol tsele menshe o Pauleskre laba shunan, dan le lauter gole: "Anenn les krik un denn les mulo!"
44022023	Jon dan bari gole, tsardan pengre koola i choljatar pendar tele un witsran tchik an o bolepen.
44022024	Koi penas ko baro lurdo, te anenn le o Paules an o lurdengro kheer, un te denn le les dawa i tchupnijaha, te penell job, hoske kol bibolde jaake chojemen ap leste hi.
44022025	Har jon les pandan, te denn le les i tchupnijaha, penas o Paulo ap ko baro lurdeste, kai kote pashal tardo hi: "Nai denn tumer jekes i tchupnijaha, kai hi i Remari, un was gomme gar glan i tchatchepangre anlo?"
44022026	Ko baro lurdo djas pash peskro pralstuneste, un penas ap leste: "Hoi kameh te krell? Kau mursh hi i Remari."
44022027	Koi djas ko pralstuno pash o Pauleste, un putchas lestar: "Pen mange: Hal tu i Remari?" Penas lo: "Awa!"
44022028	Koi penas ko pralstuno: "Me dom bud lowe, te wap i Remari." Penas o Paulo: "Me wom jaake boldo."
44022029	Un kolla, kai kaman les dawa te dell, djan penge sik. Un ko pralstuno daras, har shunas lo, kai hi o Paulo i Remari, un te mukas lo i Remares te pandell.
44022030	O wawar diwes kamas o pralstuno lurdo win te hatsell, hawi doosh kol bibolde ap o Pauleste pre anan. Un job las les dran o stilepen win, un penas, te wenn kol bare rashaja un kol tsele pralstune bibolde khetne. Un job anas o Paules glan lende.
44023001	O Paulo dikas ap kol pralstune biboldende, un penas: "Tumer mursha, mire phrala, o tselo djipen budrom o Debleske, un man hi i djudjo dji."
44023002	Ko baro rashai Anania penas ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo hi, te denn le o Paules ap o mui.
44023003	Koi penas o Paulo ap leste: "O Dewel mu te dell tut! Tu rakreh i menshenge pal o mui. Tu hal kate beshdo, te rakress o tchatchepen pral mande win pal o biboldengro tchatchepen. Un tu mukeh man dawa te dell. Kowa hi gar pal o biboldengro tchatchepen."
44023004	Kolla, kai koi pashal tardo his, penan ap o Pauleste: "Tu praasseh o Debleskro baro rashajes."
44023005	O Paulo penas: "Mire phrala, me djinom gar, kai job ko baro rashai hi. Me djinau, kai an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Te praassess gar o pralstunes tumare menshendar!"
44023006	Har o Paulo haiwas, kai i paash kol murshendar Saddukarja his, un i wawar paash Farisarja, das job ap kolende gole: "Tumer mursha, mire phrala, miro dad his i Farisari un me hom i Farisari. Me patsau, kai o Dewel i mulen djides krella. Dran kowa hom kanna glan tumende tardo, te rakrenn tumer i phagi pral mande win."
44023007	Har job kowa penas, was i baro tchingepen mashkral kol Saddukarja un kol Farisarja. Un jon rakran buder gar jek tchipjaha.
44023008	Kol Saddukarja patsenn gar, kai o Dewel i mulen djides krella. Un jon patsenn witar gar, te dell bolepangre un wawar, kai nai wenn gar diklo. I Farisarja patsenn kowa lauter.
44023009	Halauter dan bari gole, un kol tchatchepangre, kai ninna Farisarja his, stan pre un tchingran, un penan: "Mer hatsah kek tchilatchepen ap leste. Te rakras i bolepaskro ap leste, hoi krah mer palle? Te rakras i mulo ap leste, hoi krah mer palle?"
44023010	Ko tchingepen was jaake baro, te trashas ko pralstuno lurdo, te tsardans jon nai o Paules an kotja. Dran kowa das job peskre lurden gole, te anenn le les pale an o lurdengro kheer.
44023011	An koi rati mukas pes o rai Jesus glan o Pauleste te dikell, un penas ap leste: "Ma traash, Paulo! Jaake har tu mandar an o foro Jerusalem rakral, jaake hunte rakress mandar ninna an o foro Rom."
44023012	-
44023013	Taissarlake wan budeder har star-deesh bibolde khetne, un dan pen sowel, te chan le un te pijenn le tchi jaake raha, bis te jon o Paules maran.
44023014	Kolla djan pash kol bare rashajende un pash kol biboldengre phureder, un penan lenge: "Mer dam men sowel, kai chah un pijah tchi, bis te maram o Paules.
44023015	Bitchrenn jekes pash ko pralstuno lurdeste, un penenn leske an o lab kol tsele pralstune biboldendar, te anell lo o Paules pale kate pash tumende. Penenn ap o pralstuno lurdeste, te kamenn tumer budeder pral o Pauleste win te hatsell. Un ap o drom kate marah les.
44023016	Har o Pauleskri phenjakro tchawo shunas, kai kamenn jon o Paules te marell, djas lo an o lurdengro kheer, un penas kowa o Pauleske.
44023017	O Paulo das i baro lurdes pash peste gole, un penas: "Aan ko tarno murshes pash ko pralstuneste! Job kamell leske tchomone te penell."
44023018	O baro lurdo las les, un anas les pash ko pralstuneste, un penas leske: "Ko Paulo, kai stildo hi, das man pash peste gole, un mangas mandar, te anap kal tarno murshes pash tute. Kowa kamell tuke tchomone te penell."
44023019	Koi las les ko pralstuno ap o wast, anas les ap i rig, un putchas lestar: "Hoi kameh tu mange te penell?"
44023020	Job penas: "Kol bibolde kran win, te mangenn le tutar, te aness o Paules pale glan kol pralstune biboldende, te nai hatsans le feteder win, hoi job kras.
44023021	Tu patsess len gar. Budeder har star-deesh mursha lurenn ap leste ap o drom. Kolla dan pen sowel, te chan le tchi, te pijenn le tchi, bis te maran le les. Jon hi koi khatedo te nai marenn le les jaake sik, har tu mukeh les win te anell."
44023022	Koi penas ko pralstuno ap leste: "Phuke kekeske, kai penal mange kawa!" Palle mukas lo o tarno murshes te djal.
44023023	O pralstuno lurdo das dui bare lurden pash peste gole, un penas lenge: "Lenn dui-sheel lurden tumentsa, te djan tumer enjenge an i rat an o foro Cesarea. Lenn ninna efta-deesh lurden tumentsa, kai ap i graja klissenna, un dui-sheel wawar lurden.
44023024	Anenn graja o Pauleske, beshenn les ap jek grai, un anenn les pash o themeskro rajeste Felix! Denn jak ap leste ap o drom!"
44023025	O pralstuno tchinas ninna i liil, koi his dre tardo:
44023026	"Me, o Klaudio Lisias, sharau tut, ko themeskro rajes Felix, un penau tuke: Latcho diwes!
44023027	Kau murshes tapran i bibolde, un kaman les te marell. Koi wom me mire lurdentsa, un lom les lendar krik. Me shunom, kai job i Remari hi.
44023028	Me kamom te djinell, hawi doosh jon ap leste pre anenn. Jaake anom les glan lengre pralstune tchatchepangre.
44023029	Me hatsom win, te haiwell lo i biboldengro tchatchepen wawartchandes har jon. Kowa hi leskri doosh. Me hatsom tchi, te nai marams les, witar kek doosh, te nai tchiwams les an o stilepen.
44023030	Har me shunom, kai kamenn le ko murshes tchorchanes te marell, bitchrom les sik pash tute. Me penom ninna kolenge, kai anan i doosh ap leste pre, te penenn jon tuke, hawi doosh jon ap leste hatsan."
44023031	I lurde lan o Paules, har lenge penlo was, un anan les rati an o foro Antipatris.
44023032	O wawar diwes djan kol lurde, kai nashenna, pale an o foro Jerusalem. Kol wawar klissan o Pauleha dureder.
44023033	Har wan jon an o foro Cesarea, dan le o Felixes ko liil. Un o Paules anan le ninna glan leste.
44023034	O Felix draweras ko liil, un putchas o Paulestar dran hawo them job hi. Un har job shunas, kai o Paulo dran o them Cilicia hi, penas job ap leste:
44023035	"Jon te hi kate, kai anan i doosh ap tute pre, palle kamau te shunell, hoi tu peneh." Un job tchiwas les stildo an o Herodeskro kheer.
44024001	Pal pantch diwessa was ko baro rashai Anania an o foro Cesarea. Khetne leha wan i biboldengre phureder un ko rakepaskro Tertulo. Jon djan pash o themeskro rajeste, o Felix, te penenn le leske, hoske jon kaman o Paules i phagi te dell.
44024002	Har jon o Paules pash pende gole dan, rakras o Tertulo, te sikrell lo hawi doosh o Paulo ap peste anas: "Mer sharah tut, maro latcho un baro rajes Felix! An tiro goswepen kral tu, kai nai djiwah mer bachteles tumentsa. Un tu kral menge ninna bud latcho koowa.
44024003	Doleske parkrah men mer pash tute hako tsiro, kai hal jaake latcho ap mende.
44024004	Me kamau tut gar jaake raha pre te rikrell. Mangau tutar, te less i tikno tsiro, te shuness an tiro baro latchepen ap mande, hoi me kanna kamau tuke te penell.
44024005	Mer djinah, kai kau mursh tchilatcho hi, un kai job tchingepen krella mashkral kol tsele biboldende, kai ap i tseli phub djiwenna. Job hi i pralstuno rakepaskro kolendar, kai patsenna ap o Jesus dran Nazaret.
44024006	Job kamas o Debleskro baro kheer praassedo te krell. Koi pashal tapram les.
44024007	Har kaman les i phagi te dell pal maro tchatchepen, was ko pralstuno lurdo, o Lisias, un tsardas les sorjaha dran mare wasta.
44024008	Tu te shuneh, hoi job penella, palle haiweh tu, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi mer pral leste penam."
44024009	Ninna i wawar bibolde rakran jaake, un penan, kai kowa lauter jaake hi, har o Tertulo penas.
44024010	Kanna sikras o Felix o wasteha ap o Pauleste, te rakrell job. Un o Paulo penas: "Me djinau, kai hal tu, o Felix, bud bersha o tchatchepaskro rai an kau them. Doleske hi man kek traash, te penap tuke, har lauter was.
44024011	Hi gar budeder har deesh-te-dui diwessa, kai wom an o foro Jerusalem, te mangap o Debles an. I wawar nai penenn tuke, kai kowa tchatcho hi.
44024012	Kek dikas, kai tchingroms man jekeha an o Debleskro baro kheer. Witar gar krom i tchingepen mashkral i menshende, gar an i biboldengre kangria, witar gar an kau foro.
44024013	Jon nai sikrenn tut witar gar, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi jon pral mande penan.
44024014	Kawa penau tuke: Hi tchatcho, kai me djau ap ko newo drom, hoi hi kolenge i chocheno drom. Ap kau newo drom mangau me ko Debles an, koles ninna mire phure an-mangan. Un me patsau halauter, hoi o Mose un o Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila tchinan.
44024015	Me patsau ninna har jon, kai kolla, kai meran, pale djido wenna: kol latche un kol tchilatche.
44024016	Doleske krau lauter te djiwap jaake, te well man hako tsiro i djudjo dji glan o Debleste un glan i menshende.
44024017	Bud bersha homs an i wawar themma. Kanna wom pale an o foro Jerusalem, te anap mire menshenge lowe, hoi wawar dan. Ninna wom, te chatchrap fichen o Debleske an o Debleskro baro kheer.
44024018	Har homs an o Debleskro baro kheer un thowom man pal o biboldengro tchatchepen, his gar bud menshe pash mande, witar kek, kai his chojedo un diwjo.
44024019	Kote dikan man bibolde, kai wan dran o them Asia. Kolla hunte wans kanna kate glan tute, te penenn le tuke, hoi me krom, te nai anans le doosh ap mande.
44024020	Tu putcheh nai ninna kal murshendar kate, hawi doosh jon ap mande hatsan, har me glan kol pralstune biboldende tardo homs.
44024021	Jek koowa nai anans le ap mande pre. Kowa hi ko lab, hoi me glan lende gole dom: Me patsau, kai o Dewel i mulen djides krella. Doleske hom kate glan tumende tardo, te rakrenn tumer i phagi pral mande win."
44024022	O Felix, kai bud djinas ko newo dromestar, tchiwas o tselo koowa ap o wawar diwes, un penas: "Te well ko pralstuno lurdo Lisias pash mende, palle penau me, hoi me krau o Pauleha."
44024023	Un job mukas o Paules pale an o stilepen te anell, un penas ap ko baro lurdeste, te krell job o Pauleske o djipen gar phares, un te well nai hakeno leskre malendar pash leste, te anell lo leske chapaske.
44024024	Diwessa koi pre was o Felix peskri romjaha Drusilla. Koja his i biboldetsa. Un o Felix mukas o Paules glan leste te well. Un o Felix un leskri romni kaman lestar pral o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste te shunell.
44024025	Un o Paulo penas lenge, te hunte rikrenn le pen ap o Debleskro tchatchepen, te krenn le kek wi-ladjedo koowa, un te well ko tsiro, kai hakeno glan o Debleste tardo hunte well. Un o Felix las traash, un penas ap o Pauleste: "Kau kopo nai djah tu. Un te hi man tsiro, mukau tut pale gole te dell."
44024026	Job patsas, te dell les o Paulo lowe, te mukell les lo dran o stilepen win. Doleske mukas job les bud kope glan peste te well, un rakras leha.
44024027	Har dui bersha trujal his, was o Festo Porcio an o foro Cesarea, un kras kanna koi budi, hoi o Felix glan leste kras. O Felix kamas tchomone te krell, hoi his mishto an i biboldengre jaka. Doleske mukas lo o Paules an o stilepen.
44025001	Pal triin diwessa djas o Festo dran o foro Cesarea an o foro Jerusalem.
44025002	Kote wan kol bare rashaja un kol pralstune bibolde pash leste, un anan doosh ap o Pauleste pre.
44025003	Un jon mangan o Festestar soreles, te krell lo lenge i latchepen, te mukell lo o Paules an o foro Jerusalem te anell. Mank pende kran i bibolde win, te marenn le o Paules ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem.
44025004	Koi penas o Festo ap lende: "O Paulo atchell an o foro Cesarea stildo! Me djau an i tikno tsiro kote pale.
44025005	Kolla, kai len pash tumende tchomone penepaske hi, kolla wenn mantsa, un nai penenn mange kote, hawi doosh job ap peste anas."
44025006	O Festo atchas ochta diwessa an o foro Jerusalem. Pal kowa djas lo pale an o foro Cesarea. O wawar diwes beshas pes lo ap ko beshepaskro, kai o tchatchepaskro rai beshdo hi, un mukas o Paules glan peste te well.
44025007	Har o Paulo glan leste was, his trul leste kol tsele bibolde tardo, kai dran o foro Jerusalem wan. Kolla anan bud tchilatcho koowa glan, hoi job krals. Un kek nai penas, kai o Paulo kowa tchatchepaha kras.
44025008	O Paulo mukas kowa gar ap peste, un penas: "Me krom tchi, hoi pal o biboldengro tchatchepen tchilatcho hi. Un me krom gar o Debleskro baro kheer praassedo. Un me penom kek tchilatcho koowa pral o baro rajeste an o foro Rom."
44025009	O Festo kamas tchomone te krell, hoi hi mishto an i biboldengre jaka. Doleske penas lo ap o Pauleste: "Kameh tu, te anap tut an o foro Jerusalem, te penap kote i phagi pral tute win?"
44025010	O Paulo penas ap leste: "Me hom kate glan o tchatchepaskro tardo, koles o baro rai an o foro Rom an peskri budi tchiwas. Kote hunte well o tchatchepen pral mande win kerdo. I biboldenge krom kek tchilatcho koowa. Un kowa djineh tu mishto!
44025011	Te kroms me i tchilatcho koowa, kai hunte marans le man, mangoms tutar gar, te atchap djido. Te krom me kowa gar, hoi jon pral mande penan, palle nai tchiwenn tumer man gar an lengre wasta. Me kamau, te well miro koowa glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom."
44025012	Koi rakras o Festo kolentsa, kolen leha khetne penepaske hi. Palle penas lo ap o Pauleste: "Pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom kameh tu te djal. Palle dja pash leste!"
44025013	Pal budeder diwessa, was o biboldengro baro rai Agrippa peskri phenjaha Bernike an o foro Cesarea, te djan le pash o Festeste.
44025014	Un jon atchan budeder diwessa koi. Un o Festo rakras leha pral o Pauleste un leskro koowa, un penas ap leste: "O Felix, kai kras koi budi glan mande, mukas mange i murshes kate an o stilepen.
44025015	Har me an o foro Jerusalem homs, wan kol bare rashaja un kol biboldengre phureder glan mande, un mangan mandar, te dap les i phagi.
44025016	Kolenge penom: Jaake krah mer Remarja kowa gar. Mer dah kekes i phagi, kai dikas kolenge gar an o mui, kai anan doosh ap leste pre. Job hunte penas nai, har job ko koowa dikella.
44025017	Un har jon kate khetne wan, nashrom kek tsiro. O wawar diwes mukom kau murshes glan mande te anell, te shunap les.
44025018	Har kol bibolde penan, hawi doosh jon ap leste hatsan, his kowa kek sawo tchilatcho koowa, har me patsom.
44025019	Jon tchingran pen pral o biboldengro patsepen un pral i mursheste, kai kharas Jesus, un kai meras. Un kolestar penas o Paulo, te hi lo djido.
44025020	Me prindjrau man an ko koowa gar wi. Doleske putchom me o Paulestar, te kamell lo an o foro Jerusalem te djal, te well kote o tchatchepen pral leste wi-rakedo.
44025021	Kowa kamas lo gar. Job kamas, te anap les glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom, te lell lo kolestar peskro tchatchepen. Jaake raha kamas lo stildo te atchell. Koi penom me, te rikrenn le les kate stildo jaake raha, bis te bitchroms nai les pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom."
44025022	O Agrippa penas ap o Festo: "Me kamau ko murshes ninna te shunell." Koi penas o Festo ap leste: "Taissar shuneh les."
44025023	O wawar diwes was o Agrippa un i Bernike railes an-rido an o shukar baro kheer, kai i pralstune khetne wenna. Un kol pralstune lurde, un wawar foreskre pralstune wan lentsa kote khetne. Un o Festo mukas o Paules gole te dell.
44025024	Un o Festo penas: "Baro rai Agrippa un tumer lauter, kai han mentsa kate: Dikenn kau murshes! I tsele bibolde an o foro Jerusalem un an kau foro wan pash mande un dan gole: Mare les!
44025025	Me hatsom tchi ap leste, te nai marap les. Job kokres kamell pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom te djal. Un jaake penom, te well lo kote anlo.
44025026	Me hunte tchinap i liil o baro rajeske an o foro Rom, te penap leske, hawi doosh kau mursh ap peste anas. Un me djinau gar, hoi te tchinap. Doleske anom les kate glan tumende lauterende, un glan tute, baro rai Agrippa, te shunap, hoi job tuke penella. Jaake djinau me, hoi hunte tchinap.
44025027	Kowa wals dinlepen, te bitchroms i stildes pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom, un nai penau leske gar, hawo tchilatcho koowa job kras."
44026001	O Agrippa penas ap o Pauleste: "Tu nai rakreh kanna tuke." Koi hadas o Paulo o wast, un penas:
44026002	Baro rai Agrippa, me hom bachtelo, te nai penap tuke kau diwes lauter, hoi i bibolde ap mande pre anan.
44026003	Me djinau, kai tu prindjreh o biboldengro patsepen. Tu djineh, har i bibolde djiwenna. Un tu djineh ninna pral hawo koowa jon pen tchingrenna. Doleske mangau tutar: De man ko tsiro, te penap tuke halauter!
44026004	I tsele bibolde prindjrenn miro djipen, un har me i tarno tchawo homs, un har me mashkral mire menshende an o foro Jerusalem djiwom.
44026005	Jaake raha prindjrenn le man. Un jon te kamenn, palle nai penenn le tuke, kai homs i Farisari, un rikrom man o tselo djijeha ap i phurengre laba un ap o Moseskre laba.
44026006	Un me patsau ap kowa, hoi o Dewel mare phurenge penas. Doleske hom me kate glan o tchatchepaskro tardo.
44026007	Mare menshe, kai wenna i deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawendar, kolla mangenn o Debles diwes un rati, te well kowa, hoi job mare phurenge penas. Baro Agrippa, me patsau, kai kowa was, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Doleske kamenn man i bibolde i phagi te dell.
44026008	Hoske patsenn tumer gar, te krell o Dewel i mulen djides?
44026009	His i tsiro, kai kamom me ninna miri tseli sorjaha kau newo patsepen ap o Jesuseste dran Nazaret paash te krell.
44026010	Kowa krom me an o foro Jerusalem, un anom bud patslen an o stilepen. Kol bare rashaja dan an miro wast, te krap kowa. Un har kaman le len te marell, penom me ninna: Awa, krenn kowa!
44026011	An i tsele biboldengre kangria mukom me kol patslen dawa te dell i tchupnijaha, un kamom, te denn le pengro patsepen pre. Me homs jaake chojedo ap lende, te lom len ninna an forja an wawar themma palla.
44026012	Jaake bitchran man i bare rashaja an o foro Damaskus, un dan man lila mantsa, te nai taprau i patslen kote.
44026013	Me homs ap o drom, baro Agrippa, har dikom mashkral o diwes i bari momeli dran o bolepen. Un koja was trul mande un trul kolende, kai pash mande his. Koi momeli his sorleder har o kham.
44026014	Un mer lauter peram ap i phub. Un me shunom jekes, kai penas ap hebretikes ap mande: Saulo, Saulo, hoske leh tu man palla? Tiro kurepen hi tchitcheske. Me hom sorleder har tu.
44026015	Me penom: Rai, koon hal tu? O rai penas: Me hom o Jesus, koles tu palla leh.
44026016	Ste pre un atch ap tire pire tardo! Me mukom man tutar te dikell, te wess miro budepaskro, un te peness i menshenge, hoi tu dikal. Un lauter, hoi me tut sikrau, hunte peness.
44026017	Me bitchrau tut pash i biboldende un pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un me dau garda ap tute.
44026018	Tu kress lenge i jaka pre, te wenn jon dran o tamlepen pash i momeli, te less len dran o bengeskro wast win, un te aness len pash o Debleste. Te patsenn le ap mande, palle lell o Dewel lengri doosh lendar krik. Un jon wenn o Debleskre tchawe, un djiwenn leha an o bolepen khetne lauterentsa, kai Debleskre tchawe hi.
44026019	Doleske krom kowa, baro Agrippa, hoi ko rakepen dran o bolepen mange penas.
44026020	Me djom an o foro Damaskus, un palle an ko foro Jerusalem. Un i tsiro koi pre djom an ko them Judea. Un pal kowa djom pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un penom lauterenge, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un te djan le ap o Debleskro drom, un te djiwenn le jaake, kai i wawar dikenna, kai jon pengro phuro djipen mukan.
44026021	Doleske tapran man kol bibolde an o Debleskro baro kheer, un kaman man te marell.
44026022	O Dewel his hako diwes pash mande. Un kanna hom kate tardo, un penau barenge un tiknenge, hoi o Dewel kras. Me penau tchi wawares, har kol Debleskre rakepangre un o Mose glan i raha tsiro penan.
44026023	Kolla penan: Ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchrella, hunte lell bud duka ap peste, un hunte well maredo. Un job hi o ersto mensho, koles o Dewel i mulendar djido kras. Un job sikrell i biboldende un kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, i bari momeli, hoi anell len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."
44026024	Har o Paulo kowa rakras, te sikrell lo, kai hi kek doosh ap leste, das o Festo gole: "Paulo, tu hal dinelo! Tu hal jaake gosewo, te wal narwelo."
44026025	O Paulo penas: "Railo Festo, hom gar narwelo! Hoi me rakrau, hi tchatcho un kek dinlepen.
44026026	O baro rai Agrippa djinell kowa lauter. Man hi kek traash, te rakrap leha pral halauter. Me djinau, job shunas kowa lauter. Kowa, hoi koi djas, atchas gar khatedo.
44026027	Patseh tu, baro rai Agrippa, hoi kol Debleskre rakepangre penan? Me djinau, kai tu kolen patseh.
44026028	Koi penas o Agrippa ap o Pauleste: "Rakreh tu kate ap mande, te djap me ninna ap o Jesuseskro drom, un kawa an sawo tikno tsiro?"
44026029	O Paulo penas ap leste: "Tikno tsiro, raha tsiro, - me mangau o Debles, te wess tu un kol tsele wawar, kai man kate shunan, patslo har me patslo hom. Hoi gar kamau, hi, te wess pandlo, har me."
44026030	Un o baro rai Agrippa peskri phenjaha Bernike, un o themeskro rai Festo, un kolla, kai pash lende beshdo his, stan pre.
44026031	Har jon penge djan, rakran jon tel pende: "Kau mursh kras tchi, te hunte well lo maredo, witar tchi, te well lo stildo."
44026032	O Agrippa penas ap o Festo: "Kau murshes mukams mer nai dran o stilepen win te djal, te penals job gar, te kamell lo glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom te djal, te rakrell kowa o tchatchepen pral leste win."
44027001	Har kran le win, te ulerah mer ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Italia, dan le o Paules un wawar stilden an i wasta i baro lurdestar. Leskro lab his Julio. Kowa his i pralstuno pral kol lurdende, kai o baro rajeskre lurde kharedo wenna.
44027002	Mer djam ap o panjeskro ulepaskro. Kowa was dran o foro Adramition un uleras an kol forja, kai pash o pani an o them Asia tchiddo hi. Mentsa was ninna i mursh dran o foro Tessalonika. Leskro lab his Aristarcho.
44027003	O wawar diwes wam an o foro Sidon. O Julio his kamlo ap o Pauleste, un mukas les pash peskre malende te djal, te wenn kolla leske koi.
44027004	Har mer dureder uleram, phurdas i baro ducho pral o baro pani. Doleske uleram mer ap koi rig ko themestar Ciprus, kai ko baro ducho gar jaake soreles phurdas.
44027005	I themma Cilicia un Pamfilia mukam mer tchatches tchiddo, un wam an ko them Licia an o foro Mira.
44027006	Koi hatsas ko baro lurdo i panjeskro ulepaskro, hoi was dran o foro Alexandria, un kamas an o them Italia te ulerell. Un mer djam ap ko panjeskro ulepaskro.
44027007	Bud diwessa wam gar sik dureder, un maram men tele, te was pash ko foro Knidus. O baro ducho phurdas jaake soreles pral o pani, te nashte djam gar, kai kamam. Jaake uleram pash o them Kreta, un dureder trul ko kotar them, kai kharella Salmone.
44027008	Menge his phares, te was dureder. Palle wam ap i wawar rig, kai kharella Latchi platsa. Koi pashal hi o foro Lasea tchiddo.
44027009	Har kote wam, nashram bud tsiro. O wend his glan o wudar, un mer lam daar, te uleras dureder. Doleske penas o Paulo ap lende:
44027010	"Murshale, te ulerah mer ap o pani dureder, dikau me, te wella bud bibacht ap mende. Gar kokres o panjeskro ulepaskro nai djal paash un kowa, hoi koi pre hi, djal nashedo. Ninna bud mendar nai tassen."
44027011	Ko baro lurdo shunas budeder ap koleste, kai ulerell ko panjeskro ulepaskro un ap koleste, kai hi o rai pral ko panjeskro ulepaskro, har ap o Pauleste.
44027012	Kote, kai maro panjeskro ulepaskro tchiddo his, his gar mishto, te atchas mer pral o wend. Doleske kaman i budester mursha dureder te ulerell, te wenn jon glan o wend an o foro Fenix. Kawa his o feteder foro an o them Kreta, kai jon nai atchans pral o wend.
44027013	Har i latcho baro ducho phurdas, patsan le, kai ko tsiro was, te nai uleras dureder. Un jon uleran, jaake nesh har djala, langs ko them Kreta.
44027014	Pal i tikno tsiro phurdas o baro ducho soreles dran i wawar rig. Ko ducho kharella Eurakulon.
44027015	Kau sorelo ducho tapras o panjeskro ulepaskro, un mer nai rikram les buder gar, jaake sorelo his lo. Koi mukam mer o panjeskro ulepaskro jaake te djal, har ko baro ducho kowa kamas.
44027016	Mer uleram dureder ap o pani pash ko them Kauda, un maram men tele, te nashras gar o tikno bero.
44027017	Jon tsardan les pre, un palle pandan le shelle trul o tselo panjeskro ulepaskro, te djal lo gar paash. Halauter daran, te nai ulerals o panjeskro ulepaskro ap i barra, kai glan o them Libia tel o pani hi. Doleske witsran le ko sasterno shello an o pani tele, hoi rikrell o panjeskro ulepaskro pale, te djal lo gar jaake sik. Un jon mukan o panjeskro ulepaskro jaake te djal har o baro ducho les pral o pani phurdas.
44027018	Ko baro ducho phurdas jaake soreles, kai witsran le o wawar diwes bud koowa an o pani, hoi kaman le an wawar forja te anell.
44027019	O triinto diwes witsran jon kowa an o pani, hoi ap o panjeskro ulepaskro his, te nai ulerell lo.
44027020	Bud diwessa nai dikam o kham un i bolepangre momlia gar, jaake sorelo phurdas o baro ducho pral o baro pani, un das sorelo brishin. Koi patsam mer, kai nashrah mer maro djipen.
44027021	Har chan le i raha tsiro tchi, djas o Paulo mashkral lende, un penas: "Murshale, tumer hunte shunans ap mande, un atchans an o them Kreta. Jaake wals i tseli bibacht gar pral mende.
44027022	Kanna penau me tumenge: Denn gar pre! Kek tumendar merella. Kokres kau panjeskro ulepaskro djal paash.
44027023	Kai rat was i bolepaskro pash mande. Koles bitchras miro Dewel, koleske budrau.
44027024	Kowa penas ap mande: Ma traash, Paulo! Tu hunte wess glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom anlo. O Dewel shunas tut: Kek ap kau panjeskro ulepaskro merella.
44027025	Doleske murshale, ma trashenn! Me patsau o Debles, lauter wella jaake, har job mange penas.
44027026	O baro ducho phurdell men ap i tikno kotar them an o baro pani."
44027027	Mer hams deesh-te-star diwessa ap o baro pani Adria. An koja rat patsan kol budepangre ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, te dikenn le i kotar them.
44027028	Koi witsran jon i saster an o pani, hoi ap i shello pandlo hi, te dikenn le, har dur kowa tele djala. Kowa djas star-deesh metarja dur tele. I kotar dureder kran jon kowa pale, un dikan, kowa djas triin-deesh metarja dur tele.
44027029	Koi trashan le, te ulerenn le ap i bare barra, hoi tel o pani his. Un jon witsran star sasterne shelle, pal o panjeskro ulepaskro an o pani, te well lo gar krik tsardedo. Un o panjeskro ulepaskro atchas kote tchiddo, bis te was o wawar diwes.
44027030	Kol budepangre ap o panjeskro ulepaskro kaman penge tchorchanes mendar te djal, un penan chochenes ap i wawarenge: "Mer mukas ko tikno bero an o pani, te nai witsras ninna glan o panjeskro ulepaskro sasterne shelle an o pani."
44027031	O Paulo penas ap ko baro lurdeste un ap kol lurdende: "Te atchenn kolla gar ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, ham mer lauter nashedo."
44027032	Koi dan i lurde kol shelle tele, un mukan ko tikno bero an o pani te perell.
44027033	Un har buder gar jaake tamlo his, penas o Paulo ap lauterende, te chan jon tchomone: "Tumer maran tumen deesh-te-star diwessa tele," penas job, "un an ko tselo tsiro chan tumer tchi.
44027034	Doleske mangau me tumen: Chan kanna tchomone! Kowa hunte krenn, te atchenn djido. Kek tumendar nashrell i bal ap o shero."
44027035	Un har job kowa penas, las job o maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste glan lauterende, phagas o maro, un chas.
44027036	Har jon kowa dikan, tapran le newi soor un chan ninna.
44027037	Mer hams lauter khetne ap o panjeskro ulepaskro dui-sheel-efta-deesh-te-shob (276) mursha.
44027038	Un har jon lauter tchalo his, witsran le o tselo djob an o pani, te well o panjeskro ulepaskro buder gar jaake pharo.
44027039	Har diwes was, dikan kol budepangre ap o panjeskro ulepaskro i kotar them an o pani. Kowa prindjran jon gar. Kote dikan le i kotar phub, kai o panjeskro ulepaskro tchiddo nai wals. Un jon penan penge: Te djal kowa, djah kote ap o them.
44027040	Un jon dan kol sasterne shelle tele, un witsran len an o pani, un pandan kol shelle pre, hoi rikran ko kasht, hoi o ulepaskro ap i tchatchi rig anell. Palle tsardan le ko baro thann pre, te phurdell o baro ducho koi dre un anell len ap o them.
44027041	Ap jek kopo uleran le ap i barra, hoi tel o pani hi. Un o panjeskro ulepaskro his glanstunes soreles ap i barra beshdo. Un o sorelo pani kras o palstuno kotar paash.
44027042	Koi kaman i lurde i stilden te marell, te nashell kek peske.
44027043	Ko baro lurdo kamas gar, te well o Paulo mulo dino. Job djas koi mashkral un penas, te stenn kanna kolla an o pani, kai nai rikrenn pen pral o pani, te wenn le wergal ap o them.
44027044	un te tchiwenn pen i tsele wawar ap i kashta an o pani, te nai wenn le halauter wergal ap o them. Jaake wam mer lauter djido ap o them.
44028001	Har mer halauter ap o them wam, shunam, kai ko kotar them an o pani Malta kharella.
44028002	Kolla, kai kote djiwan, lan men kamles pre. Brishin das, un his shila. Doleske kran le i jag, un lan men pash pende.
44028003	Har o Paulo kashta khetne las, un ap i jag witsras, was i sap dran i kashta win, un dandras leske an o wast.
44028004	Har kol menshe ko themestar ko sap ap leskro wast dikan, penan le: "Kawa hi jek, kai maras jekes. Dran o baro pani was job djido win, un kanna lell lo peskri phagi."
44028005	O Paulo witsras koi sap an i jag, un leske djas tchi.
44028006	Koi patsan le, te well leskri mussi pesso, un te perell lo mules trujal. Har jon i raha tsiro ap leste dikan, un haiwan, kai leske tchi djas, rakran le wawartchandes un penan: "Kawa hi i dewel."
44028007	Gar dur djiwas o themeskro pralstuno. Les his kote bud them. Job kharas Publio. Kowa las men pash peste triin diwessa kamles pre.
44028008	Leskro dades his i djungelo nasslepen an o per. Leskro tselo shero his tato, un job his an o tchiben tchiddo. O Paulo djas pash leste, mangas o Debles leske, tchiwas peskre wasta ap leste, un kras les sasto.
44028009	Koi wan ninna kol wawar nassele dran ko them pash o Pauleste, un mukan pen sasto te krell.
44028010	-
44028011	Un jon sharan men bud. Triin tchon atcham kote. Un har mer dureder uleram, dan le men chapen un pipen peha. Mer uleram dureder ap i panjeskro ulepaskro, hoi atchas pral o wend ap ko them, hoi kharella Malta. Kau panjeskro ulepaskro was dran o foro Alexandria un kharas Dioskuro.
44028012	Mer wam an o foro Sirakus, un atcham kote triin diwessa.
44028013	Palle uleram dureder an o foro Region. Un har o wawar diwes i latcho baro ducho phurdas, wam an dui diwessa an o foro Puteoli.
44028014	Kote hatsam patslen. Kolla mangan mendar, te atchas efta diwessa pash lende. Palle djam dureder an o foro Rom.
44028015	Un har kol patsle an o foro Rom shunan, te wah mer, djan le dran o foro win, te tapran le men mashkral i forja Forum Appii un Tres-Tabernae. Har o Paulo len dikas, parkras lo pes pash o Debleste, un las newi soor.
44028016	Har wam an o foro Rom dre, nai las peske o Paulo i isema an i kertchima. Un i lurdo das garda ap leste.
44028017	Pal triin diwessa das o Paulo kol pralstune bibolden pash peste gole. Har jon lauter khetne his, penas o Paulo ap lende: "Tumer mursha, mire phrala, mare menshenge krom tchi, hoi tchilatcho his. Witar gar rakrom djungeles pral kowa, hoi mare phure menge penan. Un ninna te krom lenge kek tchilatchepen, tchiwan le man stildo an o foro Jerusalem, un dan man an i Remarjengre wasta.
44028018	Kol Remarja shunan, hoi penom, un hatsan tchi ap mande, kai nai marans le man. Jon kaman man te djal mukell.
44028019	Kol bibolde kaman kowa gar. Koi hunte penom me, te kamap pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom te djal, te rakrell job o tchatchepen pral mande win. Me wom gar kate, te anap doosh ap mire menshende pre.
44028020	Kawa kamom tumenge te penell. Doleske dom tumen gole, te wenn pash mande. Mer bibolde dikah ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel koles bitchrella, kai anell o Israel dran i bibacht win. Ap koleste patsau me. Doleske hom kanna pandlo kol shellentsa."
44028021	Penan i bibolde ap leste: "Kek dran o them Judea tchinas menge i liil pral tute. Kek lendar was pash mende, kai penas djungelo koowa pral tute.
44028022	Mer kamah tutar te shunell, hoi tu peneh menge. Mer djinah, te rakrenn le djungeles pral kau newo drom, hoi tu sikreh."
44028023	Un i bibolde un o Paulo kran penge i diwes win, kai wenn le pale khetne an koi kertchima. Har ko diwes was, wan bud pash leste. Un o Paulo penas lenge, te was ko tsiro, kai o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole della, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win. Un job sikras lende, hoi o Mose un o Debleskre rakepangre pral o Jesuseste tchinan. Un pral kowa rakras o Paulo lentsa o tselo diwes.
44028024	Bud lendar patsan leske un penan: "Leskro hi tchatcho." Wawar lendar patsan leske gar.
44028025	Jon tchingran pral kowa, hoi o Paulo penas, un djan penge, har o Paulo kau lab penas: "Me dikau, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi o Debleskro Ducho ap o Jesaja penas, te penell job kowa mare phurenge. O Debleskro Ducho penas:
44028026	Dja pash kol menshende un pen lenge: I kandentsa shunenn tumer, un haiwenn tchi. I jakentsa dikenn tumer, un dikenn tchi.
44028027	Kol menshengre djia hi har bar, un lengre kandentsa shunenn jon tchi. Lengre jaka hi pandlo, te nai dikenn jon tchi. Jon kamenn pengre jakentsa tchi te dikell, un pengre kandentsa tchi te shunell. Un pengre djijeha kamenn le tchi te haiwell. Jon kamenn gar pengro phuro djipen te mukell, un ap miro drom te djal. Doleske nai lau len gar dran o tchilatchepen win."
44028028	Un o Paulo penas: "Djinenn! Kanna well o Debleskro latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un jon shunenna."
44028029	Har job kowa penas, djan i bibolde penge, un tchingran pen pral kowa, hoi o Paulo lenge penas.
44028030	O Paulo atchas dui bersha an peskri isema, hoi job peskre lowentsa plaissras, un las lauteren pash peste pre, kai wan pash leste.
44028031	Job rakras lentsa pral o Debleste un pral o djipen, hoi o Debleskre menshe khetne o Debleha djiwenna. Un job penas lenge lauter, hoi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo lenge kras. Un les his kek traash, te penell lo kowa. Un kek was, kai penas, te nai krell lo kowa gar.
45001001	Me, o Paulo, o budepaskro o Jesus Kristestar, tchinau kau liil. Job das man gole, te wap leskro bitchepaskro, un rodas man win, te sikrap i menshende leskro drom.
45001002	Pral kau drom tchinan glan raha tsiro o Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila, te well i tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i drom i menshenge, te nai wenn le pash leste.
45001003	-
45001004	Ko drom hi o Debleskro tchawo. Kowa was i mensho un was o Davideskre menshendar. Job was ninna o Deblestar. O Dewel sikras i bari sorjaha, te hi lo leskro tchawo, har kras lo les i mulendar djido. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo, maro rai.
45001005	Job das man koi Debleskri budi te djap pash i menshende an i tsele themma. Job bitchras man, te penap lenge, te patsenn le ap leste un shunenn ap leste.
45001006	Mank kol menshende han tumer ninna an o foro Rom. O Jesus Kristo das tumen gole, te wenn pash leste.
45001007	Ap tumende halauterende tchinau kau liil. O Dewel kamell tumen o djijestar, un das tumen gole, te djiwenn leha khetne. Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo!
45001008	Glan hake wawar laba, hoi kamau tumenge te tchinap, penau tumenge: Hako tsiro, kai rakrau o Jesus Kristeha, parkrau man pash miro Debleste tumenge lauterenge. Ap i tseli phub rakrenn le pral tumaro patsepen.
45001009	Miro Dewel, koleske budrau o tselo djijeha un penau i menshenge leskro tchawestar, job djinella, me penau o tchatchepen: Me mukau gar tele, te mangap les tumenge.
45001010	Un hako tsiro mangau lestar, te krell lo mange i drom, te nai wap pash tumende.
45001011	O tselo djijeha kamau tumen te dikell, te nai sikrap tumende, hoi o Debleskro Ducho mande sikras, te krap tumaro patsepen soreles.
45001012	Te dikah o patsepen, hoi an o wawareste hi, wah mer khetne soreles an maro patsepen.
45001013	Mire phrala, tumer hunte djinenn, bud kope kamom pash tumende te well, un nai wom gar. Me kamoms ninna an tumaro foro menshen ap o Jesuseskro drom te anell, jaake har me kowa ninna krom an i wawar themma.
45001014	Me hunte sikrap kau drom i tsele menshende: kolen an o grichtikro them, ninna kolen an i wawar themma, kolen, kai siklo hi un kolen, kai gar siklo hi.
45001015	Doleske kamoms ninna pash tumende an o foro Rom i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar te penell.
45001016	Me ladjau gar glan i menshende, te penap lenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. An kau lab hi o Debleskri soor. Un o Debleskri soor lell kolen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win, kai ap ko lab patsenna, - i bibolden un kolen, kai kek bibolde hi.
45001017	An kau lab sikrell o Dewel, koon glan leste tchatcho hi: Kolla, kai patsenna un denn gar pre. Lengro tchatchepen well dran o patsepen. Jaake hi kowa tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Kowa, kai patsella, kowa well tchatcho glan o Debleste un djiwella.
