45001018	O Debleskri choli well dran o bolepen tele ap kol tsele menshende, kai kamenn lestar tchi te djinell un krenn o tchilatchepen. Un lengro tchilatchepen rikrell o tchatchepen tele.
45001019	Kowa, hoi jon haiwans nai o Deblestar, kowa sikras len o Dewel.
45001020	Ninna te dikenn le o Debles gar, nai dikenn le leskri bari soor an halauter, hoi job kras. Kowa well diklo jaake raha har i phub tardo hi. Jon nai djinenn, te hi i Dewel koi, un nai penenn gar: "Mer djinam kowa gar."
45001021	Ninna te djinan le o Deblestar, sharan le les gar un parkran pen gar pash leste. Na-a, jon djan pal kowa, hoi an lengro shero hi un tchi moldo hi. Un lengre djia haiwan buder gar, hoi mishto hi.
45001022	Kal menshe penenn pendar, te hi le gosewo. Dran kowa peran le an o dinlepen.
45001023	O baro Debles, kai hako tsiro atchella, sharenn le gar. Na-a, jon mangenn kol murshen un djuwjen an, kai merenna. Ninna wawar koowa, har i tchirkle, i star-herjengre fiche un i sapa mangenn le an.
45001024	Doleske mukas o baro Dewel len an pengro djungelo koowa te perell, hoi an lengre djia hi, te krenn le wi-ladjedo koowa jek o wawareha.
45001025	Jon tchiwan o Debleskro tchatchepen ap i rig, un patsan ap kowa, hoi chochepen hi, un sharan i menshen un i fichen, un mangan len an, har te wans le o Dewel. Un o baro Dewel, kai lauter kras un djipen das, koles sharan le gar un mangan les gar an. Un job hi kowa, kai moldo hi, te well lo sharedo hako tsiro. Amen
45001026	Doleske mukas o Dewel len an wi-ladjedo koowa te perell. Lengre djuwja kamenn djuwjen un kek murshen.
45001027	Emligo hi i mursha tato un chatchenn ap i murshende. Jaake krenn le pengro djipen paash un lenn pengri phagi ap pende kokres.
45001028	Jon kaman tchi o Deblestar te djinell. Doleske mukas o Dewel len te perell, te djiwenn le pal pengro tchilatcho shero, un krenna, hoi gar mishto hi.
45001029	Jon hi pherdo tchilatchepen, djunglepen, ninna bok pal i lowe. Jon hi tchilatcho un silwerenn, tchingrenn, chochenn, marenn, un dukrenn i wawaren. Jon rakrenn djungeles pral i wawarende,
45001030	un rakrenn chochepen pral lende. Jon praassenn o Debles un i menshen. Jon hadenn pen pre un hi sharedo. Jon rodenn, har te krenn le o tchilatchepen. Jon shunenn gar ap pengro dadeste un pengri date.
45001031	Jon kamenn tchi te haiwell. Jon rikrenn gar pengro lab. Len hi kek kamlepen, witar kek dji i wawarenge.
45001032	Jon djinenna, o Dewel dell kolen i phagi, kai jaake djiwenna. Un koi phagi hi o merepen. Ninna te djinenn le kowa, krenn le ko tchilatcho koowa, un sharenn kolen, kai kowa ninna krenna.
45002001	Tu te peneh kolendar, har baro hi lengri doosh, nai peneh gar tutar: "Man hi kek doosh ap mande." Ko tchilatchepen, hoi tu ap o wawareste dikeh, hi ninna an tute. Tu te sikreh ap o wawareskri doosh, rakreh tu o tchatchepen pral tute win.
45002002	Mer djinah, o Dewel djal pal o tchatchepen, te dell lo kolen i phagi, kai sawo tchilatcho koowa krenna.
45002003	Tu te sikreh ap i wawarende, kai sawo koowa krenna, un tu kreh kowa ninna, patseh tu tchatchepaha, tu nai nasheh o Debleskri choljatar krik?
45002004	Hi tuke o Debleskro baro latchepen tchi moldo? Les hi i baro dji un dell i menshen gar sik pre. Djineh tu gar o Debleskro latchepen, hoi kamell tut ap leskro drom te anell?
45002005	Un tu kameh gar pash leste te well. Tiro dji hi har i bar. Doleske well o Debleskri choli baro un bareder, hoi ap tute wella ap ko diwes, kai hi o Dewel o tchatchepaskro rai un rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende.
45002006	Ap ko diwes dell lo hakenes pal kowa, hoi job kras.
45002007	Kolen, kai mukan gar tele, te krenn le o latchepen, dell lo o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Jon hi kolla, kai tchiwan pengro dji koi pre, te dikell o Dewel kamles ap lende, un te lell lo len pash peste an leskro railepen, kai dell lo len o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
45002008	Ap kol wawarende well leskri choli. Lenge hi lo gar latches. Jon hi kolla, kai djiwan pal pengro shero un shunan gar ap o Debleskro tchatcho lab, un kran, hoi lengro tchilatcho dji lenge penas.
45002009	Bibacht un daar well ap i tsele menshende, kai o tchilatchepen kran, gar kokres ap i biboldende, na-a, ninna ap kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.
45002010	Railepen, tchatchepen un bacht dell o Dewel kolen, kai kran o latchepen, - gar kokres i bibolden, na-a, ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi.
45002011	O Dewel dikell gar ap jekeste, koon job hi.
45002012	Kolla, kai kran o tchilatchepen, djan nashedo, ninna te prindjran le gar o Moseskre laba, kai penenn, har jon hunte djiwenn. Un lauter, kai prindjran kol laba un kran o tchilatchepen, lenn ninna pengri phagi.
45002013	Glan o Debleste hi kolla tchatcho, kai krenna, hoi job kamella, un gar kolla, kai shunenn kol laba un krenn gar, hoi kol laba penenna.
45002014	Mank i menshende, kai prindjrenn gar o Moseskre laba, hi sawe, kai krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella, ninna te was kowa lende gar siklo. Lenge penell lengro dji, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi.
45002015	Jaake dikah, an lengre djia hi tchindlo, hoi o Dewel kamella. Te kran le o tchilatcho koowa, penell lenge lengro dji: Kowa his gar mishto, hoi kral. Te kran le latcho koowa, penell lenge lengro dji: Kowa his mishto, hoi kral.
45002016	Lauter kowa, hoi an o mensheskro dji hi, well diklo ap ko diwes, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o tchatchepaskro rai un rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i menshende. Jaake penell les o Debleskro lab, hoi me i menshenge penau.
45002017	Hoi krenn tumer, i bibolde? Tumer sharenn tumen un penenn: "Me hom i biboldo un prindjrau o Moseskre laba. O baro Dewel hi miro Dewel.
45002018	Me djinau, hoi job kamella, un dikau an o Moseskre laba, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi.
45002019	Me nai anau i korelen ap o Debleskro drom, ninna kolen, kai an i kali rat djana.
45002020	Me hom i sikepaskro kolenge, kai tchi djinenna un haiwenna. An o Moseskre laba hi man o tselo goswepen un tchatchepen."
45002021	Hoi te penap tumenge? Tumer sikrenn i wawarende o Debleskro drom. Un tumenge kokres penenn tumer gar: Djan ap o Debleskro drom! Tumer penenn i wawarenge: Ma tchorenn! Un tumer kokres tchorenn.
45002022	Tumer penenn: Ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Un tumer krenn kowa. Tumer penenn: Kowa hi gar mishto, te mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles, un tumer tchorenn ko koowa.
45002023	Tumer sharenn tumen un penenn: "Mer djinah, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna," un tumer krenn kowa gar. Doleske anenn tumer ladj ap o Debleste.
45002024	Jaake hi kowa tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Dran tumende rakrenn i wawar menshe djungeles pral o Debleste.
45002025	Ninna te han bibolde un ap tumaro mass tchindlo, hunte rikrenn tumen ap kowa, hoi o Dewel an o Moseskre lila penas. Te krenn tumer, hoi kote tchindlo hi, pale hi tumenge bud moldo, te han bibolde. Te krenn kowa gar, han tumer glan o Debleste har jek, kai hi kek biboldo.
45002026	Jek, kai hi kek biboldo, te krell job kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella, palle dikell o Dewel jaake latches ap leste, har te wals lo i biboldo.
45002027	Un jaake well kowa, kai kek biboldo hi, i tchatchepaskro rai pral tumende, i biboldende. Job kras, hoi o Dewel kamella, un tumer kran gar, hoi o Dewel kamella, ninna te hi tumen kol tsele tchindle laba, hoi penenn, har te djiwenn, un han tchindlo ap tumaro mass.
45002028	I tchatcho biboldo hi gar kowa, kai hi tchindlo ap peskro mass.
45002029	Na-a! Kowa hi i tchatcho biboldo, koles o Debleskro Ducho i newo dji das. Kowa nai krenn tchindle laba gar. Sawo biboldo rodell gar, te well lo i menshendar sharedo. Job well o Deblestar sharedo.
45003001	Kanna putchau tumendar: Hi kowa i biboldenge bud moldo, te hi le win rodedo mank i wawar menshende un tchindlo ap pengro mass?
45003002	Awa, kowa hi lenge bud moldo. Jon lan o Debleskre laba an lengre wasta.
45003003	Ninna te djan le gar lauter ap o Debleskro drom, rikras o Dewel peskro lab, un tchiwas len gar ap i rig.
45003004	Na-a, kowa kras lo gar. O Dewel hi tchatcho. Hako mensho hi i chocheno. An i Debleskri gili hi tchindlo: Tu, mo Dewel, lauter, hoi rakreh, hi tchatcho. Kek nai well te penell, kai tire laba gar tchatcho hi.
45003005	Kanna putchau tumendar: Hi i menshen gar tchatcho, te penenn le: "Hi maro tchilatchepen baro, well o Debleskro latchepen bareder. Doleske hi o Debles gar tchatcho, te dell lo men i phagi."
45003006	Na-a, len hi gar tchatcho! O Dewel djal pal o tchatchepen. Te djals o Dewel gar pal o tchatchepen, nai rakrals lo gar o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende.
45003007	I menshe nai penans ninna: "Mer te chochah, palle well diklo, har baro o Debleskro tchatchepen hi. Un job well sharedo. Hoske dell lo men i phagi?
45003008	Kras tchilatcho koowa, te well latcho koowa dran koleste!" Hi menshe koi, kai rakrenn djungeles pral mende un penenn, mer penams i menshenge: "Kras tchilatcho koowa, te well latcho koowa dran koleste!" Kowa penah mer gar! Tchatchepaha, kolla, kai penenn kowa, lenn pengri phagi.
45003009	Hoi hi kanna? Hi i bibolde feteder glan o Debleste tardo har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi? Na-a, jaake har penom: I bibolde, har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, halauter kran tchilatcho koowa.
45003010	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Kek mensho hi tchatcho glan o Debleste, kek.
45003011	Kek mensho hi gosewo. Kek rodell o Debles.
45003012	Halauter mukan o tchatcho drom un molenn tchi. Kek krell, hoi mishto un latcho hi, kek.
45003013	Dran lengro mui well merepen. Ap lengri tchip hi chochepen. Lengro rakepen anell o merepen har i sapa, hoi dandrenna.
45003014	Jon hi pherdo koshepen un praassepen.
45003015	Jon hi sik, te marenn le.
45003016	Kote, kai jon djana, mukenn le bibacht un ropen pal pende.
45003017	Ko drom, kai i menshe pen gar tchingrenna, prindjrenn le gar.
45003018	O Deblestar darenn le gar. Lestar kamenn le tchi te djinell.
45003019	Mer djinah: Kowa, hoi an o Moseskre laba penlo hi, hi kolenge penlo, kai lan kol laba. Kolla hi i bibolde. Jaake nai penell kek mensho, witar kek biboldo: Man hi kek doosh. Kek mensho krell o tchatchepen. Doleske hi kek mensho tchatcho glan o Debleste.
45003020	Te kamell lo te krell, hoi o Dewel an o Moseskre laba penell, haiwell lo ninna, te nai krell lo kowa gar. Kol laba sikrenn les, te hi lo tchilatcho glan o Debleste.
45003021	-
45003022	Un kanna, ap kau tsiro, sikras men o Dewel, har krell lo i menshen tchatcho glan peste. Jon wenn gar tchatcho, te rikrenn le pen ap o Moseskre laba, kai penenna, har te djiwenn le. Na-a, o Dewel krell hakenes tchatcho glan peste, kai patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste. Jaake hi kowa an o Moseskre lila tchindlo. Ninna o Debleskre rakepangre penan kowa i menshenge glan i raha tsiro. Doleske hi i bibolde gar feteder har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi.
45003023	Lauter kran o tchilatchepen un wan pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste.
45003024	Un o Dewel krell len tchitcheske tchatcho un erligo dran leskro baro latchepen. O Jesus Kristo plaissras lenge peskro rateha.
45003025	O Dewel bitchras les, te merell lo ap o trushel kolenge, kai ap leste patsenna. Leskro rateha, hoi job ap o trushel ratas, thowas o Dewel mari doosh mendar krik. Jaake dikah, o Dewel hi latcho un tchatcho un lell i menshendar lengri doosh krik.
45003026	I raha tsiro rikras o Dewel peskri choli pale, un das len kek phagi. Kanna, ap kau tsiro meras o Jesus lenge, un las lengri phagi ap peste. Jaake sikrell o Dewel peskro tchatchepen. Job hi tchatcho. Ninna krell lo koles tchatcho, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella.
45003027	Koon nai sharell pes kanna? Kowa, kai rikras pes ap kol laba, hoi penenna, har te djiwas? Na-a, les hi tchi, te sharell lo pes. Kowa hi tchatcho glan o Debleste, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella.
45003028	Jaake djinah, o mensho well tchatcho glan o Debleste, te patsell lo ap o Jesus Kristeste, un gar, te djiwell lo pal kol laba, hoi penenn, har te djiwas.
45003029	O Dewel hi gar kokres i biboldengro Dewel. Na-a, job hi ninna o Dewel kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi.
45003030	Job hi ko jek Dewel. Kowa krell kolen tchatcho, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna: i bibolden har kolen, kai kek bibolde hi.
45003031	Witsrah mer kanna kol laba ap i rig, kai o Dewel penella, har te djiwas? Na-a, kanna, kai patsah, nai krah tchatchepaha, hoi o Dewel kamella.
45004001	Kowa hi jaake har pash maro phuro dadeste, o Abrahameste, kolestar i bibolde wenna. Har was lo tchatcho glan o Debleskre jaka?
45004002	Kras lo lauter, hoi mishto hi? Palle nai sharals pes lo glan i menshende, gar glan o Debleste.
45004003	Hoi hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab? Kote hi tardo: O Abraham patsas o Debles, un doleske tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen.
45004004	I mensho, kai marell pes tele, te well lo tchatcho, hi har i budepaskro, kai hunte budrella, te well lo plaissedo. Leskre lowe lell lo gar tchitcheske.
45004005	I mensho, kai patsell ap o Debleste, hunte marell pes gar tele, te well lo tchatcho. Leskro patsepen tchiwell les an o tchatchepen. Job patsell ap koleste, kai krell i tchilatchen tchatcho.
45004006	Jaake rakras o baro rai David i bacht pral kolende win, kolen o Dewel tchatcho kras, ninna te kran le gar lauter, hoi mishto hi.
45004007	O David penas: Bachtelo hi kolla, kolenge i doosh krik lino was, un kolengro tchilatchepen o Dewel bistras.
45004008	Bachtelo hi ko mensho, koleske o Dewel leskro tchilatchepen gar glan i jaka rikrella.
45004009	Koi bacht hi gar kolenge kokres, kai hi tchindlo ap pengro mass. Na-a. Koi bacht hi ninna kolenge, kai hi gar ap o mass tchindlo. Kowa hi jaake, har me tumenge penom: O Abraham patsas o Debles, un doleske tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen.
45004010	Putchau tumendar: Hawo tsiro tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen? Tchiwas lo les an o tchatchepen ap ko tsiro, kai job ap o mass tchindlo was? Na-a. Job tchiwas les an o tchatchepen, har job gomme gar ap o mass tchindlo his.
45004011	Tchindlo was o Abraham, te well diklo: Job hi tchatcho dran o patsepen, hoi glan kau tsiro an leste his. Doleske was lo kharedo: O dad lauterendar, kai patsenn ap o Debleste, ninna te hi le gar ap o mass tchindlo. Lengro patsepen tchiwell len an o tchatchepen.
45004012	Job hi ninna o dad kolendar, kai hi tchindlo ap o mass, te djiwenn le an o patsepen jaake, har o Abraham djiwas glan ko tsiro, kai job ap o mass tchindlo was.
45004013	Glan raha tsiro das o Dewel o Abrahames peskro lab, te lenn leskre tchawe i tseli phub. Ap ko tsiro penas o Dewel leske gar: Tu te kreh lauter, hoi tutar kamau, palle leh tu kowa lauter. Na-a. Job penas leske: Tu patsal ap mande, doleske hal tchatcho glan mande.
45004014	Te lans kolla i tseli phub, kai rikrenn pen ap o Moseskre laba, palle wals o patsepen tchi moldo. Un ko lab, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameske das, wals witar tchi moldo.
45004015	Te djinell jek gar, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, un krell i tchilatcho koowa, nai djinell lo gar, kai kowa tchilatcho hi. Kolla, kai djinenn, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella un krenn kowa gar, pral kolende well o Debleskri choli. Jaake anenn o Moseskre laba, hoi menge penenna, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, tchatchepaha o Debleskri choli pral i menshende.
45004016	Doleske krell o Dewel kolen tchatcho, kai ap leste patsenna. Leskro tchatchepen dell o Dewel tchitcheske lauterenge, kai ap leste patsenna. Jaake atchell ko lab, hoi job o Abrahameste das, lauterenge, kai wenna pal o Abrahameste, i biboldenge har kolenge, kai djiwenn dran o patsepen har o Abraham. Kowa hi o dad mendar lauterendar.
45004017	Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Me krom tut o dad bud menshendar an bud themma. O Abraham dikas ap o Debleste un patsas, te nai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, un nai krell kowa, hoi gomme gar koi his.
45004018	O Dewel penas o Abrahameske: Tu leh i tchawes. Kolestar wenna bud bud menshe, jaake bud, te djiwenn le an bud themma. Ninna te dikas o Abraham tchi kolestar, hoi o Dewel leske penas, patsas lo o Debles.
45004019	Ap ko tsiro his o Abraham sheel bersha phuro. Leskri romni Sara his ninna bud phuro. Ninna te dikas o Abraham, har phuro jon his, atchas lo sorelo an o patsepen.
45004020	Job rikras pes ap kowa, hoi o Dewel leske penas, un job patsas gar i paash djijestar. Jaake was leskro patsepen gomme sorleder. Un job sharas o Debles.
45004021	Peskro tselo djijeha djinas lo, o Dewel nai krell kowa, hoi job penas.
45004022	Doleske tchiwas leskro patsepen les an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste.
45004023	Kowa was gar leske kokres an i liil tchindlo.
45004024	Kowa was ninna menge tchindlo, kai patsah ap o Debleste, kai kras o Jesuses, maro rajes, i mulendar djido. Mer te djinas: Maro patsepen tchiwell men ninna an o tchatchepen.
45004025	O Jesus Kristo hi kowa, koles o Dewel bitchras, te merell lo menge, un te lell lo mari doosh mendar krik. Un o Dewel kras les i mulendar djido, te nai krell lo men tchatcho glan leste.
45005001	Maro patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste, kras men tchatcho glan o Debleste. Un o Debleskri choli well buder gar ap mende.
45005002	O Jesus Kristo anas men ap o Debleskro drom un kras menge o wudar pre, te djiwas o Debleha khetne. Jaake latcho his lo menge. Un mer djinah: O diwes wella, kai djiwah leha khetne an leskro railepen. Pral kowa ham bachtelo.
45005003	Kowa hi gar lauter. Ninna ham bachtelo pral i duka, hoi hunte las mer ap mende. Mer djinah, kol duka krenna, te dikas ap o Debleste.
45005004	Te dikah ap o Debleste, jaake atchah ap leskro drom, un jaake well maro patsepen sorleder.
45005005	Un kau patsepen mukell jekes gar nashedo te djal. O Dewel kamell men o tselo djijeha. Kowa sikras men o Debleskro Ducho, hoi o Dewel an mende das.
45005006	O Jesus Kristo meras menge, har djiwam gomme dur o Deblestar. Men kokres his kek soor, te was pash leste.
45005007	Kek merell i tchatcho mensheske. Nai well, te merell jek i latcho mensheske.
45005008	O Dewel sikras, har baro leskro kamlepen menge hi, har meras o Jesus Kristo menge, har mer gomme tchilatche hams.
45005009	Leskro rateha kras lo men tchatcho glan o Debleste. Doleske nai djinah soreles: O Debleskri choli well buder gar ap mende. O Jesus Kristo kras lauter mishto.
45005010	Dikenn! Ap ko tsiro, kai kamam o Deblestar tchi te djinell, meras o Debleskro tchawo menge. Leskro merepen anas men pash o Debleste, te djiwas pale leha khetne. Un kanna ham o Debleskre mala. Un leskro tchawo djiwella, te djas mer gar nashedo.
45005011	Un kowa hi gar lauter. Mer ham jaake bachtelo, te was o Dewel maro Dewel. Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, anas men leha khetne.
45005012	Hi jaake: O tchilatchepen was ap i phub, har jek mensho, o Adam, tchomone kras, hoi o Dewel gar kamas. O tchilatchepen anas o merepen ap i phub. Jaake was o merepen pash i tsele menshende. Lauter kran o tchilatchepen, un lauter hunte merenn.
45005013	Glan raha tsiro, har shunan i menshe gomme gar, har te djiwenn le, anan le kek doosh ap pende, te kran le o tchilatchepen.
45005014	Ninna te dikas o Dewel gar ap lengro tchilatchepen, hunte meran le lauter: o Adam un kolla, kai pal leste wan, bis te was o Mose. Ninna kolla hunte meran, kai kran gar o emligo tchilatcho koowa har o Adam. Jaake har o Adam i bibacht anas, jaake hunte was i wawar, kai lauter mishto krella.
45005015	Ko wawar mensho hi o Jesus Kristo. O Adam kras o tchilatchepen, un bud menshe hunte meran. O Jesus Kristo anas o Debleskro latchepen, un las bud menshen win dran o merepen. Jaake dikah, o Debleskro latchepen hi bud bareder har o mensheskro tchilatchepen.
45005016	Kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge kras, hi gar har kowa, hoi o Adam ap mende anas. Ko jek mensho kras o tchilatchepen. Un doleske hunte meras lo, ninna lauter, kai pal leste wan. O Jesus Kristo sikras men o Debleskro latchepen un las mari bud doosh mendar, te krell lo men tchatcho glan o Debleste.
45005017	Jaake har ko jek mursh, o Adam, i tchilatcho koowa kras, un o merepen anas ap i tsele menshende, jaake anas ninna jek mensho, o Jesus Kristo, o Debleskro djipen. Ko djipen len kolla, kolen o Dewel dran peskro baro latchepen tchatcho kras glan leste.
45005018	Jaake dikah: O Adam kras i tchilatcho koowa, un doleske wan le lauter pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste un hunte meran. O Jesus Kristo kras i tchatcho koowa, un doleske wenn le lauter tchatcho glan o Debleste un lenn o Debleskro djipen.
45005019	O Adam shunas gar ap o Debleste. Doleske tchiwas o Dewel lauteren pale. O Jesus Kristo shunas ap o Debleste, un doleske kras o Dewel kol bud menshen tchatcho un erligo glan peste.
45005020	O Dewel kamas i menshende te sikrell, har baro lengri doosh hi. Doleske das lo len peskre laba. Kolla penan lenge, hoi latcho un hoi tchilatcho hi. Jaake dikan le, har bud tchilatcho koowa jon kran. Un kote, kai o tchilatchepen baro was, kote was o Debleskro latchepen gomme bareder.
45005021	O menshengro tchilatchepen his sorelo, un anas o merepen. O Debleskro latchepen hi sorleder. Kanna, kai ham tchatcho glan leste, dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa kras maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, menge.
45006001	Hoi te kras kanna? Djiwas dureder an o tchilatchepen, te well o Debleskro latchepen bareder? Na-a!
45006002	Kowa kras mer gar! Mer ham har mulo. Un o tchilatchepen hi buder gar o rai pral mende.
45006003	Djinenn tumer gar, har wam ap o Jesus Kristeskro lab an o pani thodo, meram leha?
45006004	Kote hi maro phuro djipen leha paskedo, te djiwas mer kanna i newo djipen, jaake har o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre stas, har o Dewel, maro dad, peskri bari sorjaha les djido kras.
45006005	Mer te meram leha khetne, stah mer ninna i mulendar pre, jaake har job i mulendar pre stas.
45006006	Mer djinah, maro phuro djipen was leha ap o trushel dino un meras, te well o tchilatchepen buder gar o rai pral mende.
45006007	Kowa, kai meras, hi buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen.
45006008	Mer patsah: Te meram mer o Jesus Kristeha, palle djiwah mer ninna leha.
45006009	Ninna djinah, job was i mulendar djido un merell buder gar. O merepen hi buder kek soor pral leste.
45006010	Jek kopo meras lo i tchilatchenge. Un kanna djiwell lo o Debleske.
45006011	Doleske dikenn jaake ap tumende, har te wans mulo, un te nai krans buder gar o tchilatchepen. Djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha khetne o Debleske!
45006012	Mukenn gar o tchilatchepen o rai pral tumende te well! Tumer djinenn, kai well o diwes, kai hunte merenn. Ma krenn ko djungelo koowa, hoi an tumaro dji hi!
45006013	Denn jak, te krenn tchi tumare wastentsa, herjentsa, jakentsa un mujentsa, hoi krell o tchilatchepen ap kai phub sorleder! Djiwenn o tselo djijeha o Debleske, har sawe, kai his mulo, un wan pale djido. Krenn kowa lauter, hoi krell o latchepen sorleder!
45006014	Tumer hunte rikrenn tumen buder gar ap o Moseskre laba. O Dewel kras tumen tchatcho glan leste dran peskro latchepen. Doleske nai well o tchilatchepen buder gar o rai pral tumende.
45006015	Kanna djiwah mer buder gar pal o Moseskre laba. Kanna djiwah dran o Debleskro latchepen. Kras mer kanna o tchilatchepen? Na-a, kowa kras mer gar!
45006016	Tumer djinenna: Koon tumaro rai hi, ap koleste hunte shunenn. Koleskre budepangre han tumer. Te shunenn tumer ap o tchilatchepen, palle hi o tchilatchepen o rai pral tumende, un tumer merenna. Te shunenn tumer ap o Debleste, palle krell lo tumen tchatcho.
45006017	Me sharau o Debles. Tumer hans pandlo ap o tchilatchepen, un kanna shunenn tumer o tselo djijeha ap o latcho lab, hoi mer tumenge o Jesus Kristestar penam.
45006018	Kanna han buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Kanna han tardo an o tchatchepen, un krenn kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella.
45006019	Me penom tumenge kowa jaake, te haiwenn man nai. Har hans gomme gar patslo, kran tumer djungelo un tchilatcho koowa. Un o tchilatchepen an tumende was baro un bareder. Kanna hi kowa wawartchandes. Doleske krenn kowa, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi! Jaake djiwenn tumer o Debleskro djipen.
45006020	Ap ko tsiro, har his o tchilatchepen tumaro rai, hans gar tardo an o tchatchepen.
45006021	Kowa, hoi kran, his tchi moldo. Tumer kran sawo koowa, koleske kai diwes ladjenn tumen. Sawo koowa anell an o merepen dre.
45006022	Kanna han tumer buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Tumer wan o Debleskre budepangre. Un tumer djiwenn o Debleskro djipen. Un kowa anell tumen an o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
45006023	Kowa, kai krell o tchilatchepen, lell peskri phagi. Koi phagi hi o merepen. Kowa, kai patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste, maro rajeste, koles dell o Dewel tchitcheske o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
45007001	Mire phrala, tumer prindjrenn o Moseskre laba. Tumer djinenn, i mensho hi pandlo ap kol laba jaake raha, har job djiwella.
45007002	Kol laba penenn menge: I romni hi pandlo ap peskro romeste jaake raha har job djiwella. Te hi lakro rom mulo, palle hi li buder gar pandlo ap peskro romeste.
45007003	Te djal li pash i wawar mursheste jaake raha har hi lakro rom djido, palle chochas li peskro romes. Te hi lakro rom mulo, hi li buder gar pandlo ap leste un chochell les gar, te romedinerell li i wawares.
45007004	Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa, mire phrala. Har o Jesus Kristo meras, meran tumer leha. O Moseskre laba hi buder gar o rai pral tumende. Kol labenge han mulo. Kanna hi tumen i wawar rai. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo, koles o Dewel i mulendar djido kras. Kanna nai djiwah jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo!
45007005	Har djiwam maro phuro djipen, was o tchilatchepen soreles an mende. O Moseskre laba, hoi menge penan, hoi te kras mer gar, kol laba kran, te was o bok pal o tchilatchepen bares an mende. Jaake kram mer kowa, hoi an o merepen anella.
45007006	Kanna hi o Moseskre laba, kai pandan men, buder gar o rai pral mende. Len hi buder kek soor pral mende. Mer djah kanna ap o newo drom un djiwah jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho men sikras, un gar jaake har an kol Moseskre lila tchindlo hi.
45007007	Hoi sikras men kowa? Hi o Moseskre laba tchilatcho? Na-a. Kowa hi gar jaake. Te wans kol laba gar koi, djinams gar, hoi tchilatcho hi. Kol laba penenn menge: Tiro dji te djal gar pal kowa, hoi o wawareske hi! Te djinoms kol laba gar, djinoms gar, kai kowa tchilatcho hi.
45007008	Har shunom kol laba, was i bok pal ko koowa, hoi tchilatcho hi, baro an mande. Jaake kran kol laba o tchilatchepen an mande djido. Te djinoms kol laba gar, wals o tchilatchepen an mande mulo.
45007009	His i tsiro, kai prindjrom o Moseskre laba gar un djiwom, har me kamom. Palle, har shunom, hoi o Dewel mandar kamella, haiwom, kowa, hoi krom, his tchilatcho,
45007010	un me djinom: Me hunte merap! Un kol laba, hoi o Dewel das, te djiwap, kolla anan man an o merepen.
45007011	Me nai rikrom kol laba gar. Jaake hatsas o tchilatchepen i drom te chochell lo man, un te anell lo man an o merepen.
45007012	Mer djinah: O Moseskre laba wenna o Deblestar. Lauter, hoi job mendar kamella, well lestar, un hi tchatcho un latcho.
45007013	Kanna putchau tumendar: Anell man kowa, hoi latcho hi, an o merepen? Na-a. Kowa hi gar jaake. O tchilatchepen, hoi krom, kowa anell man an o merepen. Kol laba, hoi penenn menge, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, kol laba sikran man, hoi tchilatcho hi, te dikap me, har djungelo o tchilatchepen hi.
45007014	Mer djinah, o Moseskre laba wenna o Deblestar. Ninna djinah, mer ham menshe un pandlo ap o tchilatchepen.
45007015	Me haiwau gar, hoske krau tchilatcho koowa. Kowa, hoi kamau te krell, kowa krau gar. Kowa, hoi me gar kamau te krell, kowa krau.
45007016	Me te krau gar kowa, hoi kamau, palle penau: Awa, o Moseskre laba hi tchatcho un latcho.
45007017	Doleske hom me kowa gar, kai o tchilatchepen krella. Na-a. Kowa hi o tchilatchepen, hoi an mande djiwella.
45007018	Me djinau, kek latchepen djiwella an mande - an miro mass. Me kamau o latchepen te krell, un man hi kek soor, te krap les.
45007019	Ko latchepen, hoi me kamau, kowa krau me gar. Ko tchilatchepen, hoi me kamau gar, kowa krau.
45007020	Te krau me kowa, hoi me gar kamau, palle hom gar me, kai krau kowa. Na-a. Kowa hi o tchilatchepen, hoi djiwell an mande.
45007021	Jaake dikau: An miro djipen hi kowa jaake: Ninna te kamau o latchepen te krell, krau me o tchilatchepen.
45007022	Miro dji kamell te krell, hoi o Dewel penella.
45007023	Un me nai krau les gar. Me dikau, an mande hi i wawar o rai. Kowa pandell man un mukell man gar te krap, hoi kamau. Kowa hi o tchilatchepen, hoi an mande djiwella.
45007024	Me bibachtelo! Koon nai lell man dran miro phuro djipen win, hoi anell man an o merepen?
45007025	O Dewel well sharedo! Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, kras kowa! Pral miro dji hi o Dewel o rai, un me hom leske koi. Un pral miro mass hi o tchilatchepen o rai.
45008001	Jaake djal kek nashedo, kai djiwell o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
45008002	Un o Debleskro Ducho, koles o Jesus Kristo men das, hi kanna o rai pral mende. Un kowa dell men o djipen un lell men win dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.
45008003	O Moseskre laba nai dan ko djipen gar. I menshe nai kran kowa gar, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi. Ko tchilatchepen, hoi an lende his, mukas len gar te krell, hoi o Dewel lendar kamas. Doleske penas o Dewel: "O tchilatchepen hunte merell." Un job bitchras peskro tchawes, te well lo i mensho har mer, kai tchilatcho ham. Job las maro tchilatchepen ap peste un meras. Un jaake meras o tchilatchepen leha un nashras peskri soor pral mende.
45008004	Kowa kras o Dewel, te was mer jaake tchatcho glan leste, har job mendar kamella. Job kras kowa menge, kai djiwah kanna o newo djipen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho men das, un buder gar maro phuro djipen.
45008005	Kolla, kai djiwenn pengro phuro djipen, djiwenn jaake, har jon kamenna. Kolla, kai djiwenn o newo djipen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das, kolla kamenn kowa te krell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho kamella.
45008006	Kolla, kai djiwenn jaake, har jon kamenna, kolla merenna. Kolla, kai krenna, hoi o Debleskro Ducho lenge penella, kolla len o Debleskro djipen un leskri bacht.
45008007	Koon kamell jaake te djiwell, har job kamella, kowa kamell gar o Debles. Job shunell gar ap kowa, hoi o Dewel penella. Job nai krell les witar gar.
45008008	Kolla, kai pengro phuro djipen djiwenna, pral kolende nai well o Dewel gar bachtelo.
45008009	Tumer djiwenn buder gar tumaro phuro djipen. Na-a. Te hi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende, djiwenn tumer ko newo djipen, hoi job tumende das. Kones hi gar o Jesus Kristeskro Ducho an leste, kowa hi gar i Debleskro tchawo.
45008010	Te djiwell o Jesus Kristo an tumende, han tumer tchatcho glan o Debleste, un o Debleskro Ducho dell tumen o djipen, ninna te well ko diwes, kai hunte merell tumaro mass. O tchilatchepen an i menshende kras, te hunte merell o mass.
45008011	O Dewel kras o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido. Te djiwell leskro Ducho an tumende, palle krell lo tumen ninna djido. O Debleskro Ducho, kai an tumende hi, krell kowa.
45008012	Mire phrala, kanna hunte djiwas buder gar maro phuro djipen.
45008013	Te djiwenn tumer tumaro phuro djipen, merenn tumer. Te djiwenn tumer jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho kowa kamella, un penenn na-a ap o tchilatchepen, hoi an tumaro shero hi, palle djiwenna.
45008014	Kolla, kai shunenn ap o Debleskro Ducho, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe.
45008015	O Dewel das tumen gar peskro Ducho, te darenn lestar, har i budepangre darenna pengro rajestar. Na-a, tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Un o Debleskro Ducho krell, te penah mer: "Tata" ap o Debleste.
45008016	Un o Debleskro Ducho penell menge an o dji, te ham mer o Debleskre tchawe.
45008017	Gar kokres leskre tchawe ham mer. Mer lah ninna lestar ko tselo latchepen, hoi les menge hi an o bolepen. Kowa lah khetne o Jesus Kristeha. Te wenn duka ap mende, jaake har wan duka ap o Jesus Kristo, palle krell men o Dewel ninna baro un railo leha.
45008018	Me patsau soreles, kol duka, hoi an kau tsiro ap mende wenna, hi bud bud tikneder har ko baro railepen, hoi o Dewel men della an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
45008019	I phub un lauter, hoi o Dewel kras, dikell peskro tselo djijeha ap ko tsiro, kai o Dewel halauteren sikrella, koon leskre tchawe hi.
45008020	I phub un halauter, hoi o Dewel kras, hunte djal paash, ninna te kamenn le kowa gar. O Dewel kamas kowa jaake. Jaake kras lo ninna, te dikenn le ap ko tsiro,
45008021	kai hunte merenn le buder gar un wenn jaake newo un railo har o Debleskre tchawe newo un railo wenna.
45008022	Mer djinah, i phub un lauter, hoi o Dewel kras, rowell un dell gole i dukatar bis kau diwes.
45008023	Un gar i phub kokres, na-a, men ninna hi duka un dikah o tselo djijeha ap ko tsiro, kai wah tchatchepaha Debleskre tchawe un merah buder gar. Ninna te hi men kanna o Debleskro Ducho an mende, dikah ap ko tsiro, kai merah buder gar.
45008024	Ninna te djinah, o Debleskro djipen hi maro, dikah mer ap ko tsiro, kai lah les tchatchepaha. Men te wals ko djipen, palle hunte dikams buder gar ap ko tsiro, kai mer lah les.
45008025	Maro dji nashell pal kowa, hoi glan mende hi, un hoi dikah nai gomme gar. Doleske wah mer gar khino an mare djia bis te lah les.
45008026	Ninna well o Debleskro Ducho ap mari rig, kai ham gar sorelo. Te kamah mer te rakras o Debleha un djinah gar, hoi te mangas lestar, palle rakrell o Debleskro Ducho menge i labentsa, hoi kek nai rakrell win.
45008027	Un o Dewel, kai djinell, hoi an o menshengro dji hi, djinell ninna, hoi o Debleskro Ducho lestar menge mangella.
45008028	Mer djinah, halauter well mishto kolenge, kai o Debles kamenna. Glan raha tsiro his o Debles an peskro dji, te dell lo menshen gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne.
45008029	Har rodas lo len win, his an leskro dji, te wenn le jaake har peskro tchawo. Kowa te well o phureder mank bud phralende un phenjende.
45008030	Kolen job win rodas, kolen das lo ninna gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne. Un kolen, kai job gole das, kolen tchiwas lo an o tchatchepen. Un kolen, kai job an o tchatchepen tchiwas, kolen kras lo ninna erligo, te djiwenn le leha khetne an leskro railepen.
45008031	Hoi te penas mer budeder? O Dewel hi ap mari rig! Koon nai krell menge i tchilatchepen? Kek!
45008032	O Dewel rikras peskro tchawes gar pash peste. Job das les menge lauterenge an o merepen. Patsenn tumer gar, te dell lo men khetne leha kowa lauter, hoi job menge penas?
45008033	Kek nai anell i doosh ap kolende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas. O Dewel tchiwas len an o tchatchepen.
45008034	Kek nai penell ap mende: Tu djal nashedo! O Jesus Kristo meras menge. Un kowa hi gar lauter. O Dewel kras les ninna i mulendar djido. Un job hi ap leskri tchatchi rig, un rakrell menge mishto.
45008035	Tchi nai lell mendar o Jesus Kristeskro kamlepen krik! Kek duka, kek daar. Ninna te lenn le men palla, ninna te hi men tchi te chal un tchi an ripaske, ninna te kamenn le men tchilatchepen te krell, ninna te marenn le men, ko tselo koowa nai lell gar o Jesus Kristeskro kamlepen mendar krik.
45008036	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Mer ham tiro. Doleske kamenn le men hako tsiro te marell. Jon dikenn ap mende, har te wams bakre, hoi wenn maredo.
45008037	O Jesus Kristo, kai kamell men o tselo djijestar, job krell men soreles an lauter kowa hoi ap mende wella.
45008038	Me djinau soreles: Tchi nai lell o Debleskro kamlepen mendar krik: kek merepen, kek djipen, kek bolepangre, witar kek tchilatche sorja. Tchi, hoi ap mende wella, kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi wella,
45008039	tchi, hoi pral an o bolepen hi un tchi, hoi tele an i phub hi, un kek wawar, hoi djiwella, nai krell, te kamell men o Dewel buder gar. Kowa, hoi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, menge kras, sikrell men, har baro o Debleskro kamlepen hi.
45009001	Glan o Jesus Kristeste penau tumenge: Kowa, hoi tumenge kanna penau, hi o tchatchepen un kek chochepen. Ninna o Debleskro Ducho an miro dji penell mange kowa.
45009002	-
45009003	Job djinell, miro dji rowella un dukella hako tsireske mire phralenge, kai bibolde hi har me. Mange wals tchatcho, te woms me mire phralenge praassedo o Deblestar, te wenn jon pash leste, ninna te woms me palle buder gar o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
45009004	Jon hi Israelitarja. Kolen rodas o Dewel win, te wenn le leskre tchawe. Lende sikras lo peskro railepen. Lentsa kras lo win, te well lo lengro Dewel un jon peskre menshe. Lende das lo peskre laba, hoi penenna, har te djiwenn le, ninna kol laba, hoi sikrenna, har te budrenn le leske an peskro kheer. Lentsa rakras lo pral o djipen un o brawlepen, hoi kamell lo len te dell an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
45009005	Lengre phure hi o Abraham, o Isaak un o Jakob. Ninna o Jesus Kristo was i Israelitari, har was lo boldo. Sharas o Debles pral kowa lauter hako tsireske. Amen!
45009006	Kanna penau kate gar, te hi o Debleskro lab buder tchi moldo, hoi job ap i Israelitarja penas. Na-a! Hoi kamau te penell, hi kowa: I tsele Israelitarja hi gar lauter o Debleskre menshe.
45009007	Witar gar wenn halauter, kai wan pal o Abrahameste, leskre tchawe kharedo. O Dewel penas ap o Abrahameste: Kolla, kai o Isaakestar boldo wenna, kolla hi tire tchawe.
45009008	Jaake dikah, kolla, kai wenna o Abrahamestar, hi gar lauter leskre tchawe. Na-a, kolla hi leskre tchawe, kolendar o Dewel penas, te hi le kowa,
45009009	jaake har das o Dewel o Abrahameste peskro lab un penas: Kau tsiro an o wawar bersh wau pale. Palle las i Sara i tchawes.
45009010	Kowa hi gar kate kokres jaake. Na-a, ninna pash i Rebekka hi kowa jaake. I Rebekka las dui tchawen, kolengro dad his maro phuro dad, o Isaak.
45009011	-
45009012	Har i tchawe gomme gar boldo his, penas o Dewel lake: I tsiro wella, kai budrell o phureder tchawo o tarneder tchaweske. Har job kowa penas, kras kek lendar i latcho koowa, witar kek tchilatcho koowa. Jaake dikah, lauter wella, har o Dewel kamella. Te rodell lo jekes win, krell lo kowa jaake, har job kamella. Job dikell gar ap kowa, hoi jek kras.
45009013	Jaake hi kowa an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: Me kamom o Jakobes. O Esaues kamom gar.
45009014	Hoi te penas mer kanna: Djal o Dewel gar pal o tchatchepen? Na-a! Kowa hi gar jaake.
45009015	Job penas ap o Moseste: Me hom latches koleske, ap koleste me kamau te wap latches. Un man hi i baro dji koleske, ap koleste man i baro dji hi.
45009016	Jaake nai krell kek mensho dran peste, te well o Dewel latcho ap leste, ninna te kamell lo kowa. Na-a, lauter well dran o Debleskro kamlepen.
45009017	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, har mukas o Dewel ap o baro rajeste pral o them Egiptia te penell: Me krom tut bares, te sikrap miri soor ap tute, jaake te well miro lab ap i tseli phub prindjedo.
45009018	Lauter krell lo jaake, har job kamella. Ap koneste job latches kamell te well, ap koleste hi lo latcho. Koneske job i dji dran bar kamell te dell, koleske dell lo i dji dran bar.
45009019	Kanna putcheh tu mandar: Te hi kowa jaake, hoske tchingrell lo mentsa pral maro tchilatchepen? Mer nai krah gar wawartchandes. O Dewel kamas les jaake.
45009020	Palle penau tuke: Tu hal i mensho. Tu nai peneh gar ap o Debleste: Hoi kreh tu kote? Job kras tut. Tu nai peneh gar ap leste: Hoske kral man tu jaake?
45009021	Kowa hi jaake har pash i mensheste, kai krell tchare un pirja dran jek kotar loli phub. Te kamell lo, krell lo i shukar tcharo, hoi bud moldo hi. Un te kamell lo, krell lo i wawar tcharo, kai tchiklo koowa dre tchiddo wella.
45009022	Jaake hi kowa ninna o Debleha. Job kamas, te sikrell lo peskri soor, un te well peskri choli pral i menshende, kai nashedo hi. Ninna te kamas lo kowa te krell, rikras lo peskri choli i raha tsiro lendar pale.
45009023	Kowa kras lo, te sikrell lo peskro baro railepen ap kolende, kai lan leskro kamlepen. Kolen rodas lo win, te djiwenn le leha khetne an leskro railepen.
45009024	Un mank kolende ham mer. Dran i tsele menshende rodas lo men win, gar dran i bibolde kokres.
45009025	O Debleskro rakepaskro, o Hosea, penas, hoi o Dewel leste sikras: Kolla, kai hi kanna gar mire menshendar, kolen rodau me win, te wenn le mire menshe. Un kolen, kai kek kamas, kolen kamau me o tselo djijestar.
45009026	Kote, kai ap lende penlo was: Tumer han gar mire menshendar, kote wenn le kharedo: I tchawe o djido Deblestar.
45009027	Pral i Israelitarja rakras o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, kol laba: Ninna te wans i Israelitarja jaake bud har i tikne barra pash o baro pani, kol budendar atchella jek wast pherdo pral, un well dran o Debleskri choli win.
45009028	Kowa, hoi o Dewel penas, well sik pral i phub. Job rakrell i phagi soreles wi pral i menshende.
45009029	Kowa hi jaake har o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, penas: Te mukals o Dewel, ko rai pral o bolepen un i phub, gar tchawe mendar pral atchenna, palle merans mare tsele menshe jaake har i menshe an i forja Sodom un Gomorra.
45009030	Jaake nai penah: Kol menshe, kai hi kek bibolde, rodan gar pal o tchatchepen. Un kolen tchiwas o Dewel an o tchatchepen. Jon patsan ap leste. Un doleske kras lo len tchatcho glan peste.
45009031	Kowa his wawartchandes pash i Israelitarja. Kolla kaman jaake te djiwell, har o Moseskre laba penenna, te wenn le tchatcho glan o Debleste. Un jon nai djiwan gar jaake, un wan gar tchatcho glan o Debleste.
45009032	Hoske gar? Jon kaman tchatcho te well dran pengri soor, un kaman gar te patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste. Un jaake wan le har menshe, kai perenn pral i baro bar, hoi ap lengro drom tchiddo hi.
45009033	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Dikenn, me tchiwau i baro bar an o foro Zion. Pral koleste perenn le, un ap koleste choirenn le pen. Un kowa, kai ap leste patsella, kowa hunte ladjell pes gar glan mande.
45010001	Mire phrala, miro tselo djijeha kamoms, te wenn i bibolde dran o Debleskri choli win. Un kowa mangau o Deblestar soreles.
45010002	Me djinau tchatchepaha, jon krenn bud koowa o tselo djijeha o Debleske. Ninna te krenn le kowa, djinenn le tchatchepaha gar, hoi o Dewel kamella.
45010003	Jon haiwenn gar, har o Dewel i menshen an o tchatchepen tchiwella. Un jon djan ap pengro drom, un djiwenn pal pengro tchatchepen. Jaake krenn le gar, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella.
45010004	Job bitchras o Jesus Kristes. Koon ap leste patsella, kowa hi tchatcho glan o Debleste. O Moseskre laba hi buder gar o drom pash o Debleste.
45010005	Kowa, kai rikrell pes ap o Moseskre laba, te well lo tchatcho glan o Debleste, hunte krell kowa, hoi kote tchindlo hi. O Mose tchinas an peskre lila: Ko mensho lell o djipen o Deblestar, kai krell, hoi kote tchindlo hi.
45010006	Hi wawartchandes kolenge, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste. Dran lengro patsepen wan le tchatcho glan o Debleste. O Debleskro lab penell: Ma pen an tiro dji: Jek hunte djal an o bolepen, te anell lo o Jesus Kristes tele! Mer djinah: o Jesus Kristo was ap i phub.
45010007	Ninna hunte penell kek: "Jek hunte djal pash i mulende, te anell lo o Jesus Kristes i mulendar ap i phub." Mer djinah: Job stas i mulendar pre.
45010008	Tu hunte rodess buder gar, har te nai weh pash o Debleste. O Debleskro lab penell tuke: Kowa, hoi o Dewel tuke penas, hi pash tute: an tiro mui un an tiro dji. Kau lab rakrell pral o patsepen. Kowa penah mer i menshenge.
45010009	Un tu te peneh i menshenge: O Jesus hi o rai, un te patseh tu an tiro dji, te kras les o Dewel i mulendar djido, palle dell lo tut o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
45010010	Koon o tselo djijestar ap leste patsella, koles tchiwell o Dewel an o tchatchepen. Un koon i menshenge penella: O Jesus hi o rai, koleste dell o Dewel o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
45010011	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Kowa, kai ap leste patsella, kowa hunte ladjell pes gar glan mande.
45010012	Kau lab hi i tsele menshenge: i biboldenge, ninna kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Len halauteren hi jek rai. Un job dell o djipen lauterende, kai les mangenna.
45010013	Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Halauter, kai o Jesus Kristes mangenna, kolen dell lo o djipen.
45010014	Te patsenn jon gar ap o Jesus Kristeste, nai denn le les witar gar an-gole. Te shunan le lestar gar, nai patsenn le gar ap leste. Te penell kek lenge o Jesus Kristestar, nai shunenn le gar lestar.
45010015	Te well kek bitchedo pash lende, nai penell lenge kek o Jesus Kristestar. O Debleskro lab penella: Har bachtelo ham pral kolende, kai wenn pash mende un penenn menge o latcho lab!
45010016	Gar halauter shunenn ap ko latcho lab. O Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja penas: Rai, koon patsas kowa, hoi mer lenge penam?
45010017	Kolla, kai patsan ko lab, patsan les, har shunan le les. Un ko lab rakras o Jesus Kristestar.
45010018	Kanna putchau tumendar: Shunan i bibolde ko lab gar? Awa! Jon shunan kowa lauter. Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Ap i tseli phub shunan le ko rakepen. An i tsele themma was ko lab penlo.
45010019	Putchau tumendar: I Israelitarja, haiwan le ko lab gar? Awa! Jon haiwan ko lab. O Mose penell menge, hoi o Dewel penas: Me krau, te silwerenn tumer ap kolende, kai hi gar mire menshe. Un tumer wenn chojedo pral kolende, kai tchi mandar djinenna.
45010020	O Jesaja trashas gar te penell, hoi o Dewel pral lende penas: Me mukom man kolendar te hatsell, kai rodan man gar. Un sikrom man kolende, kai gar pal mande putchan.
45010021	Pral i Israeleskre menshende penas o Dewel: O tselo diwes homs latcho ap lende, un jon kamenn gar ap mande te shunell un kamenn gar te krell, hoi me lenge penau.
45011001	Me putchau tumendar kanna: Tchiwas o Dewel kol menshen infam, kai job peske win rodas? Na-a! Kowa hi gar jaake. Me hom ninna i Israelitari, i tchawo o Abrahamestar, un mire menshe hi Benjaminarja.
45011002	Glan raha tsiro rodas o Dewel i Israelitarjen wi, te wenn le leskre menshe. Doleske tchiwell lo len gar infam. Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab pral o Elija tchindlo was? Job was glan o Debleste, un rakras leha pral o tchilatchepen, hoi i Israelitarja kran.
45011003	Mo rai, penas lo, jon maran tire rakepangren. Un i barra, hoi wan tuke pre tardo, kran le paash. Me kokres atchom djido, un man kamenn le ninna te marell.
45011004	Hoi penas o Dewel leske? Job penas: Efta serja mursha atchan mange pral. Kolla tchiwan pen gar tele ap i tchanga glan o Baal.
45011005	Jaake djal ninna kanna an kau tsiro. Hi menshe koi, kai o Debleske pral atchan. Kolen rodas o Dewel win dran peskro kamlepen.
45011006	Kran jon latcho koowa? Un doleske rodas lo len win? Na-a! Te krals lo kowa, wals peskro kamlepen gar o tchatcho kamlepen.
45011007	Hoi kanna? Kowa, hoi kaman i Israelitarja te lell, kowa lan le gar. Kolen kokres, kai o Dewel peske win rodas, kolla lan kowa. I tsele wawaren hi i dji dran bar.
45011008	Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Dewel bitchras i sopaskro ducho ap lende, kai kras len khino. Pengre jakentsa dikenn le les gar, un pengre kandentsa shunenn le les gar. Kowa hi jaake bis ap kau diwes.
45011009	Un o baro rai David penas lendar: Jon chatchrenn fichen o Debleske un patsenn, te dikell o Dewel latches ap lende. Jaake hi kowa gar. O Dewel dikell gar latches ap lende. Na-a. Well o diwes, kai lenn le pengri phagi.
45011010	Korelo wenn lengre jaka, te dikenn le buder tchi. Lengro trupo hunte well bango hako tsiro.
45011011	Me putchau tumendar kanna: Peran jon o Debleskro dromestar tele, te nai stenn le buder gar pre? Na-a. Kowa hi gar jaake. Har peran jon o Debleskro dromestar tele, was o Debleskri bacht pash kolende, kai hi kek bibolde, jaake te silwerenn i bibolde ap kolende.
45011012	Har i bibolde peran o Debleskro dromestar tele, was o Debleskri bacht pash i tsele menshende ap i phub. Un kowa, hoi i biboldenge gar mishto hi, was i bacht kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Te hi kowa jaake, har bud bareder hi koi bacht, te wenn i tsele bibolde pale ap o Debleskro drom!
45011013	Tumer han kek bibolde. Un tumenge penau me: Man hi o Jesuseskro wast. Job bitchras man pash tumende. Un me parkrau man pash leste, te nai sikrap tumende leskro drom.
45011014	Me kamaus, te silwerenn mire menshe ap tumende, te anap nai kolendar ninna ap o Jesuseskro drom.
45011015	Har jon ap i rig tchiddo wan, nai wan i wawar menshe ap i phub pash o Debleste. Jaake was dran i tchilatcho koowa i latcho koowa. Har bud shukeder well kowa, te wenn i bibolde pale pash o Debleste. Kowa hi jaake shukar, har te wans le mulo un palle djido.
45011016	Hako bersh well o djob tchindlo, un dell newo maro. Te denn le i kotar newo maro o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te well o tselo maro o Debleste dino. Jaake hi ninna pash o ruk. Te was leskro drab o Debleste dino, palle hi ninna leskre kashta o Debleske.
45011017	I bibolde hi har i latcho djeteskro ruk. Ko latcho djeteskro rukestar wan kashta tele tchindlo. Tumer han har i kasht o diwjo rukestar. Un tumer wan ap ko djeteskro ruk dre tchiddo, un djiwenn lestar, un lenn i soor lestar.
45011018	Dran kowa penau tumenge: Ma sharenn tumen pral kol kashta, hoi tele tchindlo wan. Tumer hidjenn gar o djeteskro ruk. Na-a. O djeteskro ruk hidjell tumen.
45011019	Kanna nai penenn tumer mange: Kol kashta tchinas o Dewel tele, te was mer dre tchiddo kote, kai kol kashta his, hoi wan tele tchindlo.
45011020	Kowa hi tchatcho. I bibolde patsan gar o Debles. Jaake hi le har kol kashta, hoi wan tele tchindlo. Tumer han har wawar kashta, hoi wan dre tchiddo ap ko rukeste kokres dran tumaro patsepen. Doleske ma krenn tumen bares! Denn jak!
45011021	Te tchinas o Dewel i tchatche kashta ko djeteskro rukestar tele, palle nai tchinell lo tumen ninna tele.
45011022	Jaake dikah, o Dewel nai well latcho, un job nai dell i phagi. Kolla, kai peran leskro dromestar tele, kolen dell lo i phagi. Latcho hi lo ap tumende, kai djiwenn dran leskro latchepen. Te djiwenn tumer buder gar dran leskro latchepen, tchinell lo tumen ninna tele.
45011023	Kol bibolde, kai wenn pale ap o Debleskro drom, un patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, hi har kashta, kai tchiwell o Dewel pale dre an ko djeteskro ruk. O Dewel haiwell te krell kowa.
45011024	Job tchinas tumen o diwjo rukestar tele, un tchiwas tumen dre an ko latcho ruk, kolestar tumer gar wan. Kitse budeder tchiwell lo kol tchatche kashta pale ap o djeteskro ruk, kolestar jon wan.
45011025	Mire phrala, me kamau tumenge i baro tchatchepen te penell, hoi djinenn i menshe gar. Te djinenn tumer kowa, palle penenn tumer gar: "Har gosewo ham mer!" Tumer hunte djinenn, hoske hi bud bibolden i dji dran bar, un patsenn gar ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kowa atchella jaake raha, bis te wan kol tsele menshe dran i wawar themma ap o Jesuseskro drom, kolendar o Dewel kamell, te wenn le pash leste.
45011026	Pal kowa wenn i tsele bibolde ninna ap o Jesuseskro drom. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Dran o foro Zion well kowa, kai lell o tselo tchilatchepen o Jakobeskre tchawendar krik.
45011027	Ap ko tsiro, kai lau lengro tchilatchepen lendar krik, penell o Dewel, hi kowa kerdo, hoi me lenge penom, un miro wast pre dom.
45011028	Te dikau, har patsenn i bibolde gar ap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, hunte penap: Jon hi gar o Debleskre mala. Kowa was jaake, te nai wenn tumer pash o Debleste. Te dikau, har rodas o Dewel lengre phuren an o phuro tsiro win, hunte penap, kai leskro kamlepen lenge his.
45011029	Kowa, hoi job della, lell lo gar pale, un kones job gole della, un win rodella, koles tchiwrell lo gar ap i rig.
45011030	Glan i tsiro shunan tumer gar ap o Debleste. Un palle was o Debleskro kamlepen ap tumende. Kowa was an kau tsiro, kai i bibolde gar ap leste shunan.
45011031	Kanna shunenn i bibolde gar ap o Debleste. Un jaake, har o Debleskro kamlepen ap tumende was, jaake well o Debleskro kamlepen ninna ap lende.
45011032	O Dewel mukas i tsele menshen i tsiro, kai shunan le gar ap leste, te nai well lo lauterenge latches.
45011033	Har baro hi o Debleskro latchepen ap lauterende! Har baro hi leskro goswepen! Job djinell halauter, hoi kek wawar nai djinella. Kek nai djinell, har job rakrell o tchatchepen win. Kek nai haiwell leskre tsele dromma.
45011034	Kek haiwell lauter kowa, hoi hi an o Debleskro dji. Job hi o rai. Kek nai penell leske, hoi job hunte krella.
45011035	Koon das les tchomone, hoi job hunte dell pale? Kek.
45011036	Lestar was halauter. Halauter djiwell lestar, un halauter djal pale pash leste. Sharas o Debles kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.
45012001	Mire phrala, o Dewel hi kamlo ap tumende. Doleske mangau tumen o tselo djijestar: Djiwenn tumaro djipen o Debleske, un wenn leske kokres koi, jaake te well o Dewel bachtelo pral tumende. Te djiwenn tumer jaake, sharenn tumer les. Un kowa hi tumari budi.
45012002	I menshe ap kai phub djiwenn pal pengro shero. Ma djiwenn jaake har jon! Mukenn tumen o Deblestar newes te krell, te haiwenn tumer, hoi job kamella: kowa, hoi hi latcho un mishto un tchatcho.
45012003	O Dewel his latcho ap mande, un das man miri budi, te penap leskro lab. Doleske penau hakeneske tumendar: Kek te hadell pes pral o wawareste un rikrell pes bareder un feteder! Hakeno las peskro patsepen o Deblestar. Doleske hunte well lo gosewo, te dikell lo un te haiwell lo, hoi les o Deblestar dino was.
45012004	I menshes hi jaka, wasta, pire. Un hako kotar krell gar i emligi budi.
45012005	Jaake ham mer bud patsle un djah khetne ap o Jesuseskro drom, un jaake hi jek o wawareske koi.
45012006	O Dewel das hakenes mendar i wawar budi leske te krell, jaake har job an peskro latchepen les mishto rikras. Koi hi sawe patsle, kai penenn i menshenge i lab, hoi o Deblestar wella. Koi budi hunte krenn le jaake, har maro patsepen penella.
45012007	Wawar patsle haiwenn, har te wenn le nai i wawarenge koi. Koi budi hunte krenn le. Wawar haiwenn i menshenge o Debleskro drom te sikrell. Kolla hunte krenn kowa ninna.
45012008	Pale wawar haiwenn i patslen an o dji te rakrell, te krenn le len soreles an lengro patsepen. Kolla hunte krenn kowa. Pale wawar denn i tchorwelende tchomone. Koon kowa krella, hunte krell les dran i latcho dji. Kote, kai i patsle khetne wenna, hi ninna pralstune pral lende. Kolla hunte krenn pengri budi o tselo djijestar. Wawar patsle rikrenn pen ap i rig kolendar, kai djal lenge gar mishto. Koon kowa krella, hunte krell les i bachtelo djijeha.
45012009	An tumaro kamlepen hunte well kek chochepen! Mukenn o tchilatchepen un krenn o latchepen!
45012010	Kamenn i phralen un i phenjen o tselo djijestar! Hakeno hunte rikrell o wawares bareder har pes kokres.
45012011	Ma awenn khino! Krenn tumari budi i tseli sorjaha! Halauter, hoi tumer krenna, krenn o Jesuseske, maro rajeske!
45012012	Awenn bachtele un dikenn ap o latchepen, hoi ap tumende wella an ko tsiro, hoi wella! Te well tumaro djipen pharo, rikrenn win! Mangenn o Debles hako tsiro!
45012013	Denn kol tchorwele patslen, hoi len hunte well djipaske! Kolla, kai pash tumende wenna, kolen lenn an tumare khera dre, un denn len te chal un te pijell!
45012014	Rakrenn latche laba ap kolende, kai lenn tumen palla! Mangenn o Debles lenge, un khoshenn len gar!
45012015	Awenn bachteles kolentsa, kai bachtelo hi! Rowenn kolentsa, kai rowenna!
45012016	Awenn tumen jek dji un jek djipen! Ma krenn tumen bares! Awenn i mala kolendar, ap kolende i wawar tele dikenna! Ma penenn, te han kokres gosewo!
45012017	Te hi jek tchilatcho ap tumende, palle wenn gar tchilatcho ap leste! Krenn, hoi latcho hi an i tsele menshengre jaka!
45012018	Jaake bud har djala un ap tumende hi, djiwenn lauterentsa kamles khetne!
45012019	Mire kamle phrala un phenja, ninna te kras jek tumenge tchilatcho koowa, ma denn leske pale! Mukenn les! O Dewel dell les i phagi. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penas: Me dau len pale. Me dau len i phagi.
45012020	Krenn kowa jaake har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Te bokell kowa, kai kras tchilatchepen ap tute, palle de les te chal! Te hi les trush, de les te pijell! Tu te kreh kowa jaake, palle ladjell lo pes tutar.
45012021	Ma muk o tchilatchepen o rai pral tute te well! Muk o latchepen sorleder te well har o tchilatchepen!
45013001	Hakeno hunte shunell ap i pralstunende, kai hi len penepaske pral o them. I tsele themengre pralstune lan pengri soor o Deblestar. O Dewel tchiwas len an pengri budi.
45013002	Koon krell gar kowa, hoi kol pralstune penenn, kowa krell gar, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, un lell peskri phagi.
45013003	Kolla, kai krenn latcho koowa, hunte darenn kol pralstunendar gar, na-a, kolla kai krenn tchilatcho koowa, hunte darenn lendar. Te kameh tu gar te djiwess an i daar kol pralstunendar, palle kre o latchepen! Palle sharenn le tut.
45013004	O Dewel das len pengri budi, te djal tuke latches. Tu te kre tchilatcho koowa, palle hunte daress tu lendar. Hi gar tchitcheske, te well len i soor, te denn le i phagi. O Dewel das len koi budi, te denn le kolen i phagi, kai kran i tchilatcho koowa.
45013005	Doleske hunte shuness ap lende, gar kokres dran i daar glan i phagi, na-a, ninna dran tiro dji, hoi tuke penell, te kress tu o latchepen.
45013006	Dran kowa denn tumer ninna kol themeskre lowe, hoi o themeskre pralstune tumendar kamenna. Te mangenn le kol lowe tumendar, krenn le koi budi, hoi o Dewel len das.
45013007	Denn hakeneste kowa, hoi leske hi: themeskre lowe, ninna wawar lowe, hoi jon tumendar mangenna. Shunenn ap kolende, kai hi len penepaske, un dikenn pre ap lende!
45013008	Te hi tumen i sijaan pash jekeste, ma atchenn an koi sijaan: Plaissrenn lat pale! Jek koowa nai krenn tumer gar doha: Te kamell jek o wawares o tselo djijestar! Koon kowa kras, kras kowa, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.
45013009	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Ma mare kekes! Ma tchore! Ma dik tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi o wawareskro hi! Lauter kowa, hoi o Dewel tutar kamella, hi an ko jek lab khetne lino: Ab jaake latches ap o wawareste har hal latcho ap tute!
45013010	Koon kamell o wawares o tselo djijestar, kowa krell leske kek tchilatcho koowa. Tu te kameh o wawares o djijestar, jaake kreh tu kowa lauter, hoi o Dewel tutar kamella.
45013011	Denn jak, te krenn kowa! Tumer haiwan, hawo tsiro kanna hi. O diwes well sik, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale. Har wan tumer patslo, his ko tsiro dur tumendar. Kanna hi ko diwes buder gar dur tumendar. Doleske hunte was gar har menshe, kai sowenna.
45013012	Kau tsiro kanna hi har i rati. Sik hi i rati buder gar kai. Un o diwes wella. Dran kowa djiwas gar har i menshe, kai djiwenn an i rati. Te kras buder gar tchilatcho koowa! Kanna hunte kras mer kowa, hoi mishto hi, te well o tchilatchepen gar o rai pral mende.
45013013	Djiwas jaake djudjo, har djiwenn i menshe ap o diwes. Te djas gar kote, kai chan le pen nasselo un pijenn pen mato! Te kras gar wi-ladjedo koowa! Te tchingras gar, un dikas gar tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi o wawares hi!
45013014	Djiwas jaake har maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, djiwas! Te kamell o djungelo koowa an tumaro shero te well, palle penenn: Na-a!
45014001	Lenn ninna koles latches pre, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen. Ma tchingrenn leha pral o patsepen!
45014002	Ko jek patsell, kek chapen hi pale-tchiddo. Ko wawar, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen, kowa patsell, te nai chal lo kek mass.
45014003	Kowa, kai chal o mass, hunte rikrell pes gar feteder har ko wawar, kai chal kek mass. Kowa, kai chal kek mass, hunte penell ko wawareske gar: "Kowa, hoi tu kreh, hi pale-tchiddo koowa." O Dewel tchiwas hake dujen an o tchatchepen.
45014004	Kowa hi gar tiro koowa, te peneh pral i wawareskro budepaskro: "Kowa, hoi job kras, hi gar mishto." Leskro rai kokres nai penell: "Kowa hi mishto, kowa hi gar mishto." Un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, les hi i soor, te rikrell lo les pash peste, jaake te atchell lo tardo an o patsepen.
45014005	Jekeske hi jek diwes i Debleskro diwes, ko wawareske hi lo kowa gar. Hakeno hunte djinella peske, kowa, hoi job krella, hi tchatcho un latcho.
45014006	Koon rikrell o Debleskro diwes bareder har i wawar diwessa, krell kowa o Debleske. Koon patsell, te nai chal lo lauter, krell kowa o Debleske un parkrell pes pash leste. Koon patsell, te nai chal lo gar lauter, kowa krell les ninna o Debleske, un sharell o Debles ninna.
45014007	Kek mendar djiwell peske kokres, un kek mendar merell peske kokres.
45014008	Te djiwah, djiwah o Debleske. Te merah, merah o Debleske. Hako tsiro ham mer leskro, - an o djipen har an o merepen.
45014009	O Jesus Kristo meras, un was pale djido, te well lo o rai pral kolende, kai mulo hi, un pral kolende, kai djido hi.
45014010	Kek tumendar hunte penell pral i wawar patsleste: "Kowa djal gar mishto ap o Debleskro drom." Kek tumendar hunte dikell tele ap i wawar patsleste. Ko diwes wella, kai rakrell o Dewel pral hakeneste mendar o tchatchepen win.
45014011	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penell: Jaake har tchatcho hi, te djiwau, jaake perell hakeno glan mande tele, te sharell lo man. Un hakeno penella: Tu hal o baro Dewel.
45014012	Ap ko diwes well hakeno mendar glan o Debleste un hunte penell leske, hoi job kras un hoske job kowa kras.
45014013	Doleske hunte penell kek mendar ap o wawareste: "Tu djal gar mishto ap o Debleskro drom." Denn jak, te tchiwenn tumer i wawar patsleske tchi an o drom, jaake te djinell lo buder gar, har te djal lo ap o Debleskro drom.
45014014	Me djinau soreles, - maro rai Jesus sikras man kowa: Dell tchi, hoi hi pale-tchiddo an peste. Kowa kokres, kai patsell, te krell tchomone les pale-tchiddo, koleske hi kowa pale-tchiddo.
45014015	Te dikell tiro phraal, te chah tu halauter, un kowa dukell les an peskro dji, palle kameh tu les gar o djijestar. O Jesus Kristo meras ninna koleske. Doleske de jak, te anell sawo tikno koowa les gar o Debleskro dromestar tele.
45014016	Krenn tchi, te rakrenn i wawar djungeles pral kowa, ninna te hi kowa mishto an tumare jaka!
45014017	Kolla, kai o Dewel o rai pral lende hi, kolla tchingrenn gar pral kowa, hoi jon chana un hoi jon pijenna. Na-a. Jon djiwenn pal o tchatchepen, hoi o Deblestar wella un tchingrenn gar, un o Debleskro Ducho dell len bacht an o dji.
45014018	Koon jaake djiwella, kowa sharell o Jesus Kristes. Ap leste dikell o Dewel latches. Un pash i menshende hi lo an-diklo.
45014019	Kanna kras lauter, te well kek tchingepen mank mende. Kras kowa, hoi krell men lauter soreles an o patsepen.
45014020	Ma krenn kowa paash, hoi o Dewel kras! Ninna te hi kek chapen pale-tchiddo an peste, nai well jekes i pharo dji, te chal lo tchomone, hoi leske pale-tchiddo hi. Un kowa hi gar mishto.
45014021	Hi feteder, te chah tu kek mass un te pijeh tu kek mool un kreh tchi, hoi anell tiro phrales o Debleskro dromestar tele.
45014022	Kowa, hoi tu patseh an kau koowa, djineh tu un o Dewel kokres. Tu hunte sikress les lende gar. Bachtelo hal tu, te kreh lauter jaake, te hunte peness tuke gar: Kowa, hoi krom, his gar mishto.
45014023	Koon chal tchomone, un leskro dji well pharo koi pashal, kowa kras tchomone, hoi was gar dran o patsepen. Doleske anas lo doosh ap peste. Kowa, hoi well gar dran o patsepen, anell doosh ap mende.
45015001	Mer, kai ham sorelo an o patsepen, hunte dikas ap kolende, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen, te hidjas mer lentsa, hoi lenge pharo hi. Mer hunte dikas gar ap mende kokres, te djal menge mishto.
45015002	Hakeno mendar hunte djiwell jaake, te dikell o wawar latches ap leste un well sorleder an o patsepen.
45015003	Ninna o Jesus Kristo dikas gar ap peste, te djal leske mishto. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo pral leste: O praassepen kol menshendar, kai o Debles praassan, peras ap leste.
45015004	Lauter kowa, hoi an o phuro tsiro an o Debleskro lab tchindlo was, was tchindlo, te las mer newi soor dran o Debleskro lab, un das maro patsepen gar pre, un dikas ap ko latchepen, hoi o Dewel men della, an ko tsiro hoi wella.
45015005	Un o Dewel, koon dell i newi soor un krell tumen soreles, te denn tumaro patsepen gar pre, lestar mangau me, te well tumen jek dji un jek djipen, jaake har o Jesus Kristo kowa tumendar kamella.
45015006	Palle nai sharenn tumer o baro Debles halauter khetne. Job hi o dad maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar.
45015007	Jaake har hi o Jesus Kristes i dji tumenge, jaake hunte well tumen i dji jek o wawareske! Palle well o Dewel sharedo.
45015008	Un me penau tumenge: O Jesus Kristo was i biboldenge, te dikenn le, o Dewel rikrell ap peskro lab, hoi das job lengre phurende.
45015009	Un job was tumenge, kai han kek bibolde, te sikrell lo tumende o Debleskro baro latchepen, jaake te sharenn tumer o Debles. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, har penell o Jesus Kristo ap o Debleste: Doleske sharau tut mank kolende, kai hi kek bibolde, un giwau gilja tuke.
45015010	Kote hi ninna tchindlo: Tumer, kai han kek bibolde, awenn bachteles khetne i biboldentsa. Jon hi kol menshe, kolen job peske win rodas!
45015011	Un ninna hi tchindlo: Tumer lauter, kai han kek bibolde, sharenn o Debles! Tumer, kai wenna dran i tsele themma, giwenn leske gilja!
45015012	Un o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, penas glan i raha tsiro: Koi well i mursh i menshendar, kolengro dad hi o Isai, kowa well o rai pral i menshende an i tsele themma. Ap koleste dikenn le, te well lo lenge latches.
45015013	Un o Dewel, kolestar o tselo latchepen wella, ap koleste dikah, lestar mangah, te wenn tumer tchalo i bachtjatar an o dji dran tumaro patsepen, jaake te djinenn tumer: Ko latchepen, hoi dell men o Dewel an o tsiro, hoi wella, kowa well tchatchepaha. Un o Debleskro Ducho dell tumen i soor, te dikenn bud un budeder ap o Debleste.
45015014	Mire phrala, me djinau tchatchepaha, tumaro dji hi pherdo latchepen. Un tumer djinenn lauter, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella. Jaake nai sikrell ko jek o wawareste o tchatcho drom.
45015015	Ninna te djinau kowa, tchinom tumenge pral bud koowa an kau liil. Me tchinom sorele labentsa, te bistrenn kowa gar. Koi budi das man o Dewel an peskro latchepen.
45015016	Job bitchras man, te budrap o Jesus Kristeske un te djap pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te sikrap len o Debleskro drom. Jaake hom har i rashai, kai anell kol menshen, kai kek bibolde hi, pash o Debleste. Un o Dewel dell len peskro Ducho, te wenn le leskro. Un job dikell latches ap lende.
45015017	O Jesus Kristo das man kai budi. Doleske ladjap gar, te rakrap pral kowa, hoi krau o Debleske.
45015018	Me kamau gar te rakrap pral wawar koowa har pral kowa, hoi kras o Jesus Kristo mank kolende, kai kek bibolde hi. Dran maro rakepen un mari budi anas o Jesus Kristo len pash peste, te shunenn le ap leste.
45015019	Un job sikras peskri soor, har kras o Debleskro Ducho baro koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Jaake penom o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar an o tselo them trul o foro Jerusalem bis an o them Illirikum.
45015020	Ap o tselo drom penom ko lab kokres kote, kai o Jesus Kristo gar prindjedo his, jaake te penell kek ap mande: "Tu budreh kote, kai i wawar glan tute budras."
45015021	Jaake krom kowa, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Kolenge tchi lestar penlo was, kolla prindjrenn les kanna. Kolla, kai lestar tchi shunan, kolla haiwenn kanna.
45015022	Doleske his man kek tsiro te wap pash tumende.
45015023	Kanna hi miri budi an kol themma kerdo. Un me nai wau pash tumende. Jaake kamom me kowa glan bud bersha te krap.
45015024	Ap miro drom an o them Spania, kamoms te dikap tumen, un te atchap i tikno tsiro pash tumende. Te hom tumentsa khetne, lau newi soor. Palle djau dureder, un tumer nai denn man lauter, hoi man hunte well ap o drom.
45015025	-
45015026	Glan kowa, kai wau pash tumende hunte djap an o foro Jerusalem, te anap kote i tchorwele patslenge kol lowe, hoi i patsle an i themma Macedonia un Achaja kolenge khetne tchiwan.
45015027	Kol lowe dan le pengro tselo djijestar. I patsle an o foro Jerusalem penan o Debleskro latcho lab kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Jaake hunte denn i patsle, kai kek bibolde hi, i biboldende lauter kowa, hoi hunte well len djipaske. Koja hi lengri sijaan.
45015028	Te dom i patslen an o foro Jerusalem kol tsele lowe, palle kamau ap o drom an o them Spania pash tumende te well.
45015029	Un me djinau, te wau pash tumende, anau tumenge i tseli bacht, hoi wella o Jesus Kristestar.
45015030	Mire phrala, mangau tumendar an o lab maro rajestar o Jesus Kristestar, un an o kamlepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho men das: Mangenn mantsa khetne o Debles o tselo djijeha,
45015031	te wap me gar dino an i wasta kolendar, kai patsenn gar ap o Debleste an o them Judea. Mangenn les ninna, te lenn kol patsle an o foro Jerusalem kol lowe latches pre, hoi anau lenge.
45015032	Palle nai wau bachteles pash tumende, jaake har kamell o Dewel, te lap newi soor pash tumende.
45015033	O Dewel djal tumentsa lauterentsa un dell tumen peskri bacht an o dji! Amen.
45016001	-
45016002	Te well mari pheen, i Febe, pash tumende, mangau tumendar, len lat latches pash tumende pre. Joi hi o Debleskri budepaskretsa an o foro Kenchrea. Lenn lat jaake latches pash tumende pre, har maro rai Jesus kowa i patslendar kamella. Denn lat lauter kowa, hoi lat hunte well djipaske! Joi his bud patslenge koi, ninna mange.
45016003	Penenn latche laba mandar ap i Priska un ap o Akwila! Jon budrenn mantsa o Jesus Kristeske.
45016004	Har kaman man i menshe te marell, wan le ap miri rig. Lengro djipen his lenge tchi moldo. Pash lende parkrau man gar kokres, na-a, ninna i tsele patsle, kai kek bibolde hi, parkrenn pen pash lende.
45016005	Penenn ninna latche laba mandar ap kol patslende, kai an lengro kheer khetne wenna, un ap miro latcho maal, o Epaineto. Job was o ersto patslo an o them Asia.
45016006	Penenn ninna latche laba mandar ap i Mariat! Kaja budras jaake bud tumenge.
45016007	Penenn ninna latche laba mandar ap o Androniko un i Junia! Kolla hi ninna bibolde har me un his mantsa an o stilepen. Jon hi an-diklo mank kolende, kolen o Jesus Kristo win bitchras, te penenn le leskro lab. Kol dui wan glan mande ap leste patslo.
45016008	Penenn ninna latche laba ap o Ampliato, miro latcho maal an o patsepen,
45016009	un ap o Urbano, kai mentsa khetne o Jesus Kristeske budrella, un ap miro latcho maal, o Stachis.
45016010	Penenn ninna latche laba ap o Apelles! Kowa sikras, te hi lo soreles tardo an o patsepen. Penenn ninna latche laba ap o Aristobolo un ap kolende, kai djiwenn an leskro kheer.
45016011	Penenn latche laba ap o Herodion, kai hi i biboldo har me, un ap o Narzisso un kol patslende an leskro kheer.
45016012	Penenn latche laba ap i Trifena un i Trifosa! Kolla budrenn o Jesuseske, maro rajeske. Penenn latche laba ap miri latchi pheen, i Persis! Koja kras i bari budi i patslenge.
45016013	Penenn latche laba ap o Rufo, koles maro rai Jesus wi rodas, un ap leskri date. Kaja hi mange jaake har miri dai.
45016014	Penenn latche laba ap o Asinkrito, i Flegonta, o Hermes, o Patrobas, o Hermas un ap i patslende, kai pash lende hi.
45016015	Penenn latche laba ap o Filologo un i Julia, o Nereo un leskri pheen, un ap o Olimpas un kol tsele patsle, kai pash lende hi.
45016016	Taprenn tumen trujal, un denn tumen i tchum! Kowa sikrella hakeneste, tumer han phrala un phenja an o patsepen. I tsele patsle, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna, penenn tumenge: Atchenn maro Debleha!
45016017	Mire phrala, me mangau tumen, denn jak, te shunenn tumer gar ap kolende, kai anenn tchingepen mank i patslende un sikrenn o Debleskro drom wawartchandes har kowa, hoi tumende siklo was, un krenn tumaro patsepen paash! Rikrenn tumen lendar pale!
45016018	Sawe menshe budrenn gar maro rajeske, o Jesus Kristeske. Na-a, jon krenn, hoi lenge kokres mishto hi. Shukar labentsa un baro rakepen anenn le kolen o Debleskro dromestar tele, kai denn gar jak.
45016019	Bud menshe shunan, kai tumer ap o Debleste patsenn un ap leste shunenn. Doleske hom me bachtelo pral tumende. Un me kamau o tselo djijestar, te haiwenn tumer bud un budeder, hoi latcho hi, un te krenn kek tchilatcho koowa.
45016020	O Dewel, kai dell tumen peskri bacht an o dji, krell o bengeskri soor paash. Un ko tsiro well sik. O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa!
45016021	O Timoteo, kai mantsa budrella, penell tumenge latche laba. Ninna o Luka, un o Jason, un o Sosipater, - kolla hi lauter bibolde har me, - jon penenn tumenge latche laba.
45016022	Me, o Tertio, tchinom an kau liil kowa, hoi o Paulo mange penas, un me penau tumenge ninna latche laba.
45016023	O Gajo, - kowa las man an leskro kheer dre, - penell tumenge latche laba. An leskro kheer wenn i tsele patsle khetne. Ninna o Erasto, kai dell garda ap o foreskre lowe, un o Kwarto, miro latcho phraal an o patsepen, penenn tumenge latche laba.
45016024	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa lauterentsa! Amen.
45016025	Sharedo well o baro Dewel! Les hi i soor, te krell lo tumaro patsepen soreles. Jaake penell les o latcho lab, hoi me penau i menshenge, ko latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Kate well siklo o drom pash o Debleste. Kowa djinan le i raha tsiro gar.
45016026	Kanna well ko drom diklo. Ko dromestar tchinan i Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila, jaake har o baro Dewel kamas. Kowa djiwella hako tsiro, un kamas i tsele menshendar ap i phub, te patsenn le un shunenn le ap leste.
45016027	Job kokres hi gosewo, un bitchras menge o Jesus Kristes. Sharedo well job hako tsiro! Amen.
46001001	Kau liil tchinau me, o Paulo. O Jesus Kristo rodas man win, te wap leskro bitchepaskro. Kowa kamas o Dewel jaake. Un me un maro phraal Sostenes tchinah kau liil
46001002	ap i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab an o foro Korint. Kolen rodas o Dewel win, te wenn le leskre tchawe, un te djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha khetne. Kau liil hi ninna kol tsele wawarenge, kai o Jesus Kristes an hake gaba un forja an-mangenna. Job hi lengro un maro rai.
46001003	Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo!
46001004	Me parkrau man hako tsiro tumenge pash miro Debleste. Job hi tumenge jaake latcho un kras, te prindjrenn tumer o Jesus Kristes.
46001005	Job das tumen bud goswepen, te nai penenn o Debleskro lab, un te haiwenn tumer, hoi job kamell tumenge te penell.
46001006	O lab o Jesus Kristestar kras tumen soreles an o patsepen.
46001007	Tumen hi haki soor, hoi o Debleskro Ducho della. Un tumer dikenn ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale.
46001008	Job dell tumen i soor, te atchenn an o patsepen, bis te well lo pale. Un kek nai anell i doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes.
46001009	Kowa, hoi o Dewel penella, kowa rikrell job ninna. O Dewel das tumen gole, te wenn hako tsiro peskro Tchaweha, o Jesus Kristeha, khetne. Un kowa hi maro rai.
46001010	-
46001011	Mire phrala, me shunom, kai hi tchingepen mashkral tumende. Kowa penan mange kolla dran i familja koi djuwjatar Kloe. Kanna mangau tumen an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar: Ma tchingrenn tumen buder! Atchenn khetne un rikrenn khetne an kowa, hoi tumer krenna un patsenna!
46001012	Pash tumende hi menshe, kai penenna: "Mer krah kowa, hoi o Paulo menge penella." Wawar penenna: "Mer rikrah men ap o Apollo." Un pale wawar penenna: "O Kefas hi maro sikepaskro." Un pale wawar penenna: "Mer rikrah men ap o Jesus Kristeste."
46001013	Nai djal kowa? Hi o Jesus Kristo an budeder kotja? Djas o Paulo tumenge ap o trushel? Wan tumer ap o Pauleskro lab an o pani thodo?
46001014	Me parkrau o Debles, kai thowom kek wawares tumendar an o pani, har o Krispo un o Gajo.
46001015	Jaake nai penell kek, tumer wans ap o Pauleskro lab an o pani thodo.
46001016	Kowa bistrom: Me thowom ninna o Stefanes un leskri familja an o pani. Budeder djinau me gar, kai thowom me jekes an o pani.
46001017	O Jesus Kristo bitchras man gar, te thowap i menshen an o pani. Job kamell te penap o latcho lab lestar i menshenge. Me penau kowa gar gosewe labentsa. Te rakroms me gosewe labentsa, merals o Jesus Kristo tchitcheske ap o trushel.
46001018	Maro rakepen pral o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel hi dinlepen kolenge, kai djan nashedo. Mer, kai ham ap maro drom an o bolepen, dikah an ko lab o Debleskri bari soor.
46001019	O Dewel penella an peskro lab: Pash mande molell o menshengro goswepen tchi. Un kolla, kai penenn, te djinenn le bud, kolende sikrau, kai kowa tchi moldo hi, hoi jon djinenna.
46001020	Hoi nai penah mer pral kol gosewe menshende? Un hoi nai penah pral kolende, kai hi tchinepangre un rakepangre ap kai phub? Jon prindjrenn o Debles gar. Doleske hi lengro goswepen an o Debleskre jaka dinlepen.
46001021	Ninna te dikenn i menshe o Debleskro goswepen an halauter, hoi job kras, prindjran jon pengro goswepaha o Debles gar. Doleske hatsas o Dewel i wawar drom. Job lell kol menshen dran o tchilatchepen win, kai patsenn ap o rakepen pral o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel. Kol wawar menshe, kai gar patsenna, penenna: "Kowa hi i dinelo rakepen, hoi tumer kate rakrenna."
46001022	I bibolde kamenn baro un sorelo koowa te dikell. Kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, rodenn goswepen ap kai phub.
46001023	Mer penah i menshenge, kai o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel hunte meras. Pral kowa hi i bibolde chojemen. Un i wawar menshenge hi kowa dinlepen.
46001024	Mank kolende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas, hi bibolde un sawe, kai kek bibolde hi. Jon te shunenn o lab o Jesus Kristestar, palle dikenn le an leste o Debleskri soor un leskro goswepen.
46001025	Ninna te penenn i wawar menshe: "Kowa, hoi o Dewel krella, hi dinlepen," hi job gosweder har i menshe. Ninna te penenn le: "O Debles hi kek soor," hi job sorleder har jon.
46001026	Dikenn ap tumende, mire phrala: Mank tumende hi gar bud gosewe menshe, gar bud pralstune un gar bud, hoi mishto an-diklo hi.
46001027	O Dewel rodas kolen win, kai an i menshengre jaka gar gosewo hi, te dikenn i gosewe menshe, kai lengro goswepen tchi molella. Job rodas kolen win, kai hi len kek soor an i menshengre jaka, te dikenn i sorele, kai lengri soor tchi molella.
46001028	O Dewel rodas kolen win, kai an i menshengre jaka tchi molenna, un kai gar mishto an-diklo hi, te sikrell lo, kowa, hoi pash i menshende bud molella, hi pash leste tchi moldo.
46001029	Jaake sharell pes nai kek mensho glan o Debleste.
46001030	O Dewel kras, te wan tumer ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom. Kanna djinah, hoi tchatchepaha goswepen hi. O Jesus Kristo kras men tchatcho glan o Debleste. Job rodas men win, te was leske koi, un las mari doosh mendar krik.
46001031	Kanna well kowa jaake, har o Debleskro lab penella: Te kamell pes jek te sharell, nai sharell lo kowa, hoi o Dewel leske kras.
46002001	Mire phrala, har wom pash tumende, te sikrap tumende o Debleskro drom, hoi tumer gar prindjran, krom me kowa gar bare un gosewe labentsa.
46002002	Jaake raha, har homs pash tumende, kamom me pral kek wawar koowa te rakrell, har o Jesus Kristestar un pral leskro merepen ap o trushel.
46002003	Un har me pash tumende homs, his kek soor an mande, un man his traash.
46002004	Me rakrom tumentsa gar sorele un gosewe labentsa, te anap tumen ap o Debleskro drom. Na-a, o Debleskro Ducho rakras soreles ap tumende,
46002005	jaake te was tumaro patsepen dran o Debleskri soor un gar dran i menshengro goswepen.
46002006	Kowa, hoi mer penah i patslenge, hi o Debleskro goswepen. Kau goswepen hi gar har ko goswepen, kai well kol menshendar, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar, witar gar har o goswepen kolendar, kai hi raja ap kai phub. Kolla hunte merenn.
46002007	Mer rakrah pral o Debleskro goswepen, hoi i menshe gomme gar prindjrenna. O bolepen un i phub his gomme gar koi, har his o Debles an o dji, te djiwas mer leha khetne an leskro railepen.
46002008	Kowa prindjran i raja ap kai phub gar. Te nai dikans le an o Debleskro dji, dans le o Jesuses, ko rajes pral i tsele rajende, gar ap o trushel.
46002009	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Ko latcho koowa, hoi kek jak dikas, un hoi kek kand shunas, un hoi an kek mensheskro dji dre was, kowa lauter dell o Dewel kolen, kai les o djijestar kamenna.
46002010	Men das o Dewel peskro Ducho. Un o Ducho sikrell men kowa, hoi hi o Debles an o dji. O Debleskro Ducho dikell an halauter, ninna an o Debleskro dji.
46002011	Hoi an o mensheste hi, djinell kokres leskro dji. Hoi an o Debleste hi, kowa djinell kokres o Debleskro Ducho.
46002012	An maro shero hi buder gar ko koowa, hoi hi kol menshen an pengro shero, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Mer lam o Debleskro Ducho. Doleske djinah, hoi o Dewel menge kras.
46002013	Kau koowa penah i menshenge. Kowa krah mer gar labentsa, hoi wenna dran o menshengro goswepen. Na-a, mer rakrah kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho menge penella. Job krell, te haiwas mer o Debleskro koowa, un sikrah kowa kolende, kolen ninna o Debleskro Ducho hi.
46002014	I mensho, koles o Debleskro Ducho gar hi, haiwell gar, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella. O Debleskro koowa hi leske dinlepen. Ko mensho nai dikell gar, har o Dewel kowa dikella.
46002015	I mensho, koles o Debleskro Ducho hi, kowa dikell ap lauter jaake, har o Dewel kowa dikella. Kol menshen, kai o Debleskro Ducho gar hi, kolla nai haiwenn kol menshen gar, kolen o Debleskro Ducho hi.
46002016	Kowa hi jaake, har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Kek djinella, hoi an o Debleskro dji hi. Kek nai well leskro sikepaskro. Mer, kai patsle ham, men hi o Jesuseskro Ducho.
