46003001	Mire phrala, me nai rakrom tumentsa gar har patslentsa, kai djiwenn jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho kamella. Me hunte rakrom tumentsa har kolentsa, kai djiwenn pengro phuro djipen. Tumer hans har tikne tchawe an o patsepen.
46003002	Me dom tumen thud te pijell, un kek mass te chal. Kowa nai dandran tumer gar. Ninna kanna nai chan kowa gar.
46003003	Tumer djiwenn jaake har te prindjrenn o Jesus Kristes gar. Te hi tchingepen mank tumende, un te silwerenna, palle djiwenna jaake har i menshe, kai prindjrenn o Jesus Kristes gar.
46003004	Jek tumendar penella: "Me krau, hoi o Paulo penella." Un ko wawar penella: "Me rikrau man ap o Apolleste." Me penau tumenge: Jaake rakrenn kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar.
46003005	Dikenn, koon hi o Apollo, un koon hom me, o Paulo! O Debleskre budepangre ham mer un kram, kai wan tumer patslo. Hakeno mendar kras koi budi, har o Dewel leste das.
46003006	Me hom har i hacho, kai witsras o djob an i phub. O Apollo hi har jek, kai tchoras o pani pre. Un o Dewel mukas o djob bares te well.
46003007	Kowa, kai o djob an i phub witsrella, hi gar bareder har kowa, kai o pani pre tchorella. O Dewel hi bareder, kai mukell o djob bares te well.
46003008	Kowa, kai o djob an i phub witsrella hi jaake baro har kowa, kai pani pre tchorella. Un o Dewel dell hakenes, hoi leskri budi moldo hi.
46003009	Mer ham o Debleskre budepangre. Tumer han o Debleskri hachetikri phub. Un tumer han har i kheer, hoi o Dewel peske krella.
46003010	O Dewel his latches ap mande un das man i budi, te budrap ap ko kheer. Jaake tchiwom me i telstune barra. Me krom kowa, har i gosewo budepaskro, koon haiwella khera te krell. Ap kol telstune barra tchiwell i wawar budepaskro wawar koowa pre. Hakeno hunte dell garda, hoi job pre tchiwella.
46003011	Kek nai tchiwella i wawar telstuno bar, har ko bar, hoi tchiddo hi. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo.
46003012	Hi budepangre, kai tchiwenn sonakai, rup, kutch barra, pre. Wawar tchiwenn kasht, phuss, khass pre.
46003013	Well ko diwes, kai dikenn le, hoi hakeno pre tchiwas. Ap ko diwes well lauter an i jag. Un koi jag sikrella, hoi haki budi moldo hi.
46003014	Te chatchrell kowa gar krik, hoi jek pre tchiwas, lell job tchomone o Deblestar.
46003015	Te chatchrell kowa an i jag krik, hoi job pre tchiwas, nashrell job lauter. Job kokres djal gar nashedo. Job hi har jek, kai nashell dran i kheer win, hoi chatchella.
46003016	Djinenn tumer gar, kai han tumer o Debleskro kheer, un kai o Debleskro Ducho an tumende djiwella?
46003017	Koon o Debleskro kheer paash krella, koles phagella o Dewel. O Debleskro kheer hi o Debleske. Un kau kheer han tumer.
46003018	Ma chochenn tumen kokres! Koon patsella, te hi lo gosewo ap kai phub, kowa hunte dikell dre, te molella leskro goswepen tchi.
46003019	Kowa, hoi pash i menshende goswepen hi, hi an o Debleskre jaka dinlepen. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel taprell kolen an lengro chochepen, kai penenn pendar, kai jon gosewo hi.
46003020	Hi ninna tchindlo: O Dewel djinella, hoi an i menshengro dji glan djala, kai lengro goswepen tchi molella.
46003021	Doleske hunte sharell pes kek mensho, koon peskro sikepaskro hi. Lauter hi tumaro:
46003022	o Paulo, o Apollo, o Kefas. Un tumaro hi ninna: kai phub, o djipen, o merepen, kowa, hoi kanna hi, un kowa, hoi wella. Lauter hi tumaro.
46003023	Tumer han o Jesus Kristeskre. O Jesus Kristo hi o Debleskro.
46004001	Hakeno hunte dikell ap mende, te ham mer o Jesus Kristeskre budepangre. Job das men koi budi, te penas i menshenge, hoi o Debles an o dji hi, un hoi i menshe gomme gar djinenna.
46004002	Un i budepaskro hunte krell peskri budi mishto.
46004003	Mange hi jek, hoi tumer mandar penenna. Ninna kowa, hoi i tchatchepangre mandar penenna, hi mange jek. Me dikau witar gar ap mande te penap mange, har miri budi krom.
46004004	Me djinau gar, te anom doosh ap mande. Ninna te djinom kowa gar, krell man kowa gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. Kowa, kai o tchatchepen pral mande wi-rakrella, hi kokres maro rai Jesus.
46004005	Dran kowa penau, ma penenn jekestar: Kowa krell peskri budi gar mishto. Kanna hi gar o tchatcho tsiro, te rakrenn jaake. Ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, sikrell lo halauteren, hoi kanna khatedo hi. Un lauter, hoi an o dji dren hi, well palle diklo. Un palle well hakeno sharedo o Deblestar pal koi budi, hoi job kras.
46004006	Mire phrala, hoi me kanna penom, rakrau me mandar un o Apollestar. Ap mende dikenn tumer, har te atchenn ap kowa, hoi an i lila tchindlo hi. Kek tumendar hunte phurdell pes pre un penell: "Me rikrau man ap o feteder sikepaskro."
46004007	Koon penas tuke, te hal tu feteder har ko wawar? Kowa, hoi tut hi, hi tut o Deblestar. Te das job tut lauter, hoske shareh tut?
46004008	Tumer krenn, har te wans tchalo un djinans halauter. Tumer krenn, har te wans brawelo. Tumer krenn, har te wans raja. Mer ham kek raja. Me kamoms, te wans tchatchepaha raja. Palle wams mer tumentsa khetne raja.
46004009	Mer, kai ham o Jesus Kristeskre bitchepangre, menge hi jaake, har te anals men o Dewel kote, kai ham tchi moldo an i menshengre jaka. Mer ham har i kurepangre, kai hunte kurenn pen, bis te wenn le mulo dino. Un i menshe un i bolepangre dikenn kowa.
46004010	Mer rakrah o Jesus Kristestar. Un doleske ham dinele glan i menshengre jaka. Tumer patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, un doleske han gosewe. Mer ham gar sorele, un tumer han sorele. Men sharenn le gar. Tumen sharenn le.
46004011	Un kau tselo tsiro hi men bok un trush. Un an-ripaske hi men witar tchi. Mer chah dawa. Un men hi kek isema, kai nai atchah.
46004012	Mer marah men tele mare wastentsa, te well men tchomone te chal. Jon praassenn men, un mer rakrah o Debleskri bacht pral lende win. Jon te lenn men palla, rikrah mer win.
46004013	Te rakrenn jon djungeles mentsa, rakrah mer latches lentsa. Mer ham har tchik hako mensheske, har tchik ham lenge bis kanna.
46004014	Me tchinau tumenge kowa gar, te krap tumenge ladj. Na-a! Tumer han mire kamle tchawe. Doleske penau tumenge kowa, te atchenn ap o tchatcho drom.
46004015	Ninna te wals tumen deesh serja sikepangre, kai sikrenn tumen, har te djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom, hi tumen jek dad kokres an o patsepen. Kowa hom me. Me penom tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar un tumer lan ko lab pre.
46004016	Me mangau tumen: Djiwenn jaake har me djiwau!
46004017	Me bitchrom o Timoteste pash tumende. Kowa hi miro kamlo un latcho tchawo an o patsepen. Job penell tumenge, har me ko drom djau, hoi o Jesus Kristo sikras mande, un har rakrau lestar an hake gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna.
46004018	Pash tumende hi menshe, kai phurdenn pen pre un krenn, har te woms gar pale pash tumende.
46004019	Djinenn! Te kamell o Dewel, wau me jaake sik har djala pash tumende. Koi kamau me gar te shunell, har bares jon rakrenna. Me kamau lengri soor an o patsepen te dikell.
46004020	Kote, kai i menshe o Debleha khetne djiwenna, well gar kokres rakedo, na-a, kote well o Debleskri soor diklo.
46004021	Hunte wap me o kashteha pash tumende? Hi tumenge gar feteder, te wap me i djijeha pherdo kamlepen un latchepen pash tumende?
46005001	Me shunom, te hi pash tumende i mursh, kai peskri dadeskri romjaha sowella. Sawo tchilatcho koowa shunom me gomme gar pash kolende, kai gar patslo hi.
46005002	Tumer han pre-phurdo. Tumer hunte rowans pral ko koowa, un hunte tchiwans koles pale, kai kras ko koowa.
46005003	Ninna te hom me gar pash tumende, hi miro dji pash tumende. Un jaake, har te woms pash tumende, rakrom me i phagi pral koleste win, kai kras sawo koowa:
46005004	Te han tumer lauter khetne an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, un me hom miro djijeha pash tumende, palle krenn kowa jaake: An i soor maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, denn ko murshes an o bengeskre wasta,
46005005	te merell leskro phuro djipen an leste, jaake te djal ko mensho gar nashedo ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale.
46005006	Tumer sharenn tumen. Un kowa hi gar mishto. Djinenn tumer gar, te krell i tikno kotar shutlo jarro ko tselo wawar jarro shutlo?
46005007	Tchiwenn ko shutlo jarro tumendar krik, te wenn tumer har i newo maro, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi! Un tchatchepaha tumer han har i newo maro! O Jesus Kristo was menge maredo, te lell lo mari doosh mendar krik, jaake har i bibolde maran i bakro ap pengro baro diwes, kai Passa kharella.
46005008	Un jaake har tchiwan jon ko shutlo jarro krik un chan sau maro, kai kek shutlo jarro dren his, jaake hunte djiwas mer maro newo djipen an o djudjepen un an o tchatchepen. Mer hunte mukas maro phuro djipen, un djiwas buder gar an o tchilatchepen.
46005009	Glan i tsiro tchinom me tumenge i liil. Un an ko liil penom tumenge, te wenn tumer gar mala kol menshendar, kai krenn wi-ladjedo koowa.
46005010	An ko liil rakrom me i patslendar un gar lauterendar ap kai phub, kai krenna wi-ladjedo koowa, kai hi boklo pal i lowe, kai hi tchorepangre, un kai mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles. Kolendar rakrau me kate gar. Te rakroms kolendar, hunte mukans tumer kai phub.
46005011	An ko liil tchinom tumenge, te wenn tumer kek mala kolendar, kai penenn pendar: "Me hom patslo" un krenn wi-ladjedo koowa, hi boklo pal i lowe, mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles, praassenn i wawaren, hi pipangre un tchorepangre. Te hi jek mashkral tumende, kai krell sawo koowa, koleha chan gar khetne!
46005012	-
46005013	Kowa hi gar maro koowa, te rakras o tchatchepen pral kolende win, kai gar patslo hi. Kowa krell o Dewel. Tumer hunte rakrenn o tchatchepen pral kolende win, kai patsle hi. Witsrenn koles dran tumende wi, kai krell ko tchilatcho koowa!
46006001	Te hi jekes tumendar i tchingepen i wawar patsleha un kamell peskro tchatchepen, har nai anell lo ko koowa glan i tchatchepangre, kai gar patslo hi? Hoske djal lo gar pash i patslende?
46006002	Well jek tsiro, koi rakrenn i patsle o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende ap kai phub. Djinenn tumer kowa gar? Tumer te krenn o tchatchepen win pral kol tsele menshende ap kai phub, hoske nai rakrenn tumer kanna gar o tchatchepen win pral kol phralende, kai i tikno djungelo koowa kran?
46006003	Djinenn tumer gar, te well ko tsiro, kai rakrah mer o tchatchepen win pral i bolepangre? Te hi kowa jaake, palle nai rakrah ninna o tchatchepen win pral i phralende, kai tchingrenn pen pral i tikno phubjakro koowa.
46006004	Hoske anenn tumer ko tikno koowa glan kol tchatchepangre, kai hi tchi penepaske pral i patslende, un kamenn kolendar tumaro tchatchepen?
46006005	Kowa, hoi tumer kran, hi i bari ladj. Hi kek gosewo mursh mank tumende, koon nai penella, kones tchatcho hi?
46006006	Tumer han phrala. Un tumer tchingrenn tumen glan kol tchatchepangre, kai gar patslo hi!
46006007	Tumaro tchingepen hi i tchilatcho koowa an peste. Hoske rikrenn tumer gar win, hoi kol wawar tumentsa krenna? Hi feteder te nashrenn tumaro koowa, har te djan glan i tchatchepangre.
46006008	Un kowa hi gar lauter! Tumer krenn i wawarenge ninna tchilatchepen un lenn tumenge lendar kowa krik, hoi len hi. Un kowa krenn tumer ninna i patslentsa.
46006009	Tumer hunte djinenn, kolla, kai tchilatcho koowa krenna, wenn gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen, un lenn gar ko latcho koowa, hoi o Debles peskre tchawenge hi. Ma chochenn tumen kokres! Kolla, kai wi-ladjedo koowa krenna, wenn gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen, witar gar kolla, kai mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles, witar gar kol mursha, kai chochenn pengri romjat i wawar djuwjaha, witar gar i djuwja, kai chochenn pengro romes i wawar mursheha, witar gar kol mursha, kai krenn wi-ladjedo koowa wawar murshentsa un tchawentsa,
46006010	witar gar i tchorepangre, witar gar kolla, kai ap i lowe pandlo hi, i dre-phagepangre, i pipangre un kolla, kai praassenn i wawaren, - kolla lauter wenna gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen.
46006011	Hi menshe mank tumende, kai kran sawo koowa. Kanna was tumari doosh tele thodo. Un tumer wan erligo kerdo glan o Debleste, un han tchatcho glan leskre jaka. Kowa lauter kras maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, un o Debleskro Ducho tumenge.
46006012	Tumer penenn: "Mer nai krah halauter." Me penau: Gar lauter, hoi tumer krenna, hi tumenge mishto. Ninna te nai krau halauter, hunte wap me gar pandlo ap kowa, hoi krau.
46006013	O chapen hi koi, te djal lo an o per. Un o per hi o chapaske koi. Well jek diwes, kai krell o Dewel, te hi o chapen un o per buder gar koi. O Dewel kras men gar, te luberas mer trujal. Mer ham koi o Jesuseske, maro rajeske. Un job hi ninna o rai pral maro mass.
46006014	Jaake har o Jesus meras, un o Dewel les djido kras, jaake krell leskri bari soor men ninna djido.
46006015	Djinenn tumer gar, kai han jek o Jesus Kristeha? I mensho, kai hi jek o Jesus Kristeha, nai well gar khetne i lubjaha. Kowa djal gar!
46006016	Djinenn, te djal jek pash i lubni, wenn kol dui jek. O Debleskro lab penella: Kol dui wenna jek.
46006017	Ko mensho, kai djal o Jesuseha, maro rajeha, koles hi jek ducho leha.
46006018	Doleske penau me tumenge: Ma luberenn trujal! Te kreh tu sawo koowa, tchineh tu tuke kokres an o mass. Hako wawar tchilatchepen kreh tu ap i wawarende. Te lubereh trujal, kreh tu o tchilatchepen ap tute.
46006019	Djinenn tumer gar, kai han tumer o kheer, kai o Debleskro Ducho djiwella? Kowa hi an tumende un well o Deblestar. Un tumer han leskre, un nai krenna buder gar, hoi kamenna.
46006020	O Dewel plaissras tumenge peskro tchaweskro rateha. Doleske sharenn les tumaro tselo djipaha!
46007001	Tumer putchan mandar an tumaro liil: "Wals mishto i mursheske, te romedinerals job gar?" Un koi pre penau me:
46007002	Hi feteder, te hi hako murshes peskri romni un haki djuwjat peskro rom, har te krenn le wi-ladjedo koowa.
46007003	O rom te well peskri romjake koi. Un i romni te well peskro romeske koi.
46007004	Koi romjat hi gar pral peste penepaske. Ko tchatchepen hi o romes. Witar gar hi ko romes pral peste penepaske. Ko tchatchepen hi i romjat.
46007005	Kek tumendar te rikrell pes kol wawarestar pale! Tumer nai rikrenn tumen i tikno tsiro pale, te kamenn tumer dui kowa, te mangenn o Debles an. Un pal kowa awenn pale khetne har rom un romni! Te krenn tumer kowa gar, palle nai well, te han buder gar o rai pral tumende un perenn an o bengeskro wast.
46007006	Me penau tumenge kowa, te nai krenn kowa jaake, un gar, te hunte krenn les.
46007007	Ninna te kamoms, te wals hakeno gar romedino, jaake har me gar romedino hom, kowa djal gar. Mer ham gar jek har o wawar. Jaake har o Dewel kamella, hi jek romedino un ko wawar romedinerell gar.
46007008	Kolenge, kai gar romedino hi, penau me: Tumenge wals mishto, te romedinerenn tumer gar. Kol djuwjenge, kolengre romma meran, penau me: Tumenge hi feteder, te romedinerenn tumer buder gar.
46007009	Tumer te djiwenn nai gar kokres, palle romedinerenn. Hi feteder, te romedinerenn tumer, har te dukell o mursheskro dji pal i djuwjate un i djuwjakro dji pal i mursheste.
46007010	-
46007011	Kolenge, kai romedino hi, penell o rai Jesus, gar me, te mukell i romni peskro romes gar. Witar gar hunte tradell i rom peskri romjat pestar. Te mukas i romni peskro romes, hunte atchell joi peske kokres. Te kamell li gar kokres te atchell, palle rakrell li pes peskro romeha win, un djal pash leste pale.
46007012	Kol wawarenge penau me, gar o rai Jesus: Te hi i patslo phrales i romni, kai gar patslo hi, un joi kamell pash leste te atchell, palle tradell job lat gar krik.
46007013	Un te hi i patsli romjat i rom, kai gar patslo hi, un job kamell pash late te atchell, hunte mukell joi les gar.
46007014	O Dewel dikell latches ap o romeste, kones i patsli romni hi. Un o Dewel dikell latches ap i romjate, kai lat i patslo rom hi. Te wals kowa gar jaake, wans tumare tchawe har i tchawe kolendar, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Kowa hi gar jaake. Glan o Debleste hi le har tchawe, kolengro dad un dai, kolla dui, patslo hi.
46007015	Te kamell kowa, kai gar patslo hi, o patsles te mukell, jaake nai djal lo peske. Ko patslo hi gar pandlo ap leste. O Dewel kamell gar, te tchingrenn tumen.
46007016	I patsli djuwel nai djinell gar, te anell li nai peskro romes ap o Jesuseskro drom. Un o patslo mursh nai djinell witar gar, te anell lo nai peskri romjat ap o Jesuseskro drom.
46007017	Kowa, hoi tumenge kanna penau, penau me i tsele patslenge, kote, kai jon khetne wenna. Mer lauter hunte djiwas maro djipen ap koi platsa, kai maro rai Jesus men tchiwas, un hunte atchas koi pashal, hoi mer hams, har o Dewel men gole das:
46007018	Te was jek ap o mass tchindlo pal i biboldengro tchatchepen, atchell lo pashal. Te was jek gar ap o mass tchindlo, mukell pes job gar te tchinell.
46007019	Kolla hi gar budeder moldo, kai ap o mass tchindlo hi, har kolla, kai gar tchindlo hi ap o mass. Glan o Debleste molella, te rikress tut ap leskro lab.
46007020	Hakeno hunte atchell koi pashal, hoi job his, har o Dewel les gole das.
46007021	Te hals tu i pandlo budepaskro, har o Dewel tut gole das, hunte dukrell tuke kowa gar! Te penell tiro rai, kai tu leske budreh: "Tu nai dja tuke!" palle nai djah tuke tu, un hal buder kek pandlo budepaskro!
46007022	Koon i pandlo budepaskro his ap ko tsiro, har o Jesus Kristo les gole das, kowa hi glan leste buder kek pandlo budepaskro. Un koon kek pandlo budepaskro his ap ko tsiro, har o Jesus Kristo les gole das, kowa hi kanna o Jesus Kristeskro budepaskro.
46007023	O Dewel plaissras tumenge peskro tchaweskro rateha. Ma denn tumen an i menshengre wasta!
46007024	Mire phrala, hakeno atchell o Debleha un atchell pashal, hoi job his, har o Dewel les gole das.
46007025	Pral kol tarnende, kai gar romedino hi, hi man kek lab, hoi maro rai Jesus mange penas. Me penau, har me kowa dikau. Un maro rai Jesus his jaake kamlo ap mande un kras dran mande i mursh, ap koleste i menshe shunenna. Doleske nai patsenn man.
46007026	Me penau tumenge: An kau pharo tsiro hi feteder, te atchell hakeno jaake, har job hi.
46007027	Hal tu romedino, atch pash tiri romjate un ma dja krik latar! Te hal tu gar romedino, rode tuke kek romjat!
46007028	Te romedinereh, jaake aneh tu kek doosh ap tute. Un te romedinerella i tchai, anell li kek doosh ap peste. Kolenge well bud pharo koowa an lengro djipen. Un me kamau, te well kowa gar ap tumende. Doleske rakrau jaake.
46007029	Kowa penau me tumenge, mire phrala: Hi buder gar bud tsiro. Kanna hunte djiwell i romedino mursh jaake, har te wals les kek romni, jaake te nai budrell lo o Debleske.
46007030	Un kolla, kai lenge ropaske hi, djiwenn jaake, har te wans lenge gar ropaske. Un kolla, kai bachtelo hi, djiwenna jaake, har te wans jon gar bachtelo. Un kolla, kai tchomone o djipaske dre ginenna, krenn kowa jaake, har te nai rikrans jon kowa gar.
46007031	Kai phub un lauter, hoi koi pre hi, atchella gar. Doleske pandenn tumen gar ap ko koowa, hoi i menshenge ap kai phub jaake bud moldo hi!
46007032	Me kamoms, te well tumaro dji gar pharo. Koon gar romedino hi, nai well o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, o tselo djijestar koi.
46007033	Koon romedino hi, koleskro dji hi pherdo phubjakro koowa. Job dikell ap kowa, hoi leskri romni kamella. I paash djijeha hi lo pash peskri romjate, ko wawar paash hi pash o Jesuseste.
46007034	Un koi djuwel, kai gar romedini hi, dikella, hoi nai krell joi o Jesuseske, maro rajeske. Un joi krell kowa peskri tseli sorjaha, un kamell peskri tselo djijeha leske koi te well. I djuwel, kai romedini hi, kolakro dji hi pherdo phubjakro koowa. Joi dikell ap kowa, hoi lakro rom kamella.
46007035	Kowa penau me tumenge gar, te krap tumaro djipen phares. Na-a, kowa penau, te djal tumenge mishto. Kamoms, te djan o tchatcho drom, te djiwenn o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un te atchenn soreles pash leste.
46007036	Te penell jek: "Kowa hi gar mishto, te romedinerap me miri pirni gar, kai lat jaake soreles kamau," koleske penau me: Te romedinereh lat, aneh tu kek doosh ap tute.
46007037	Te hi i murshes ap peskro dji, te romedinerell lo gar, un leske hi kowa gar pharo, te atchell lo kokres, koleske hi mishto, te romedinerell lo gar.
46007038	Kowa hi jaake: Te romedinerell jek, hi kowa mishto. Te romedinerell job gar, hi kowa feteder.
46007039	I romni hi ap peskro romeste pandlo jaake raha har job djiwella. Te merell o rom, hi li buder gar pandlo ap leste. Un joi nai romedinerell, kones joi kamella. Ap jek koowa hunte rikrell li pes: Joi hunte lell peske i patslo romes.
46007040	Joi hi bachtleder, patsau me, te atchell joi peske kokres un romedinerell gar. Jaake dikau me ko koowa. Un man hi ninna o Debleskro Ducho.
46008001	Tumer putchan mandar: "Nai chah mer, kai patslo ham, ko mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi mangenn le an, har te wals li i dewel?" Hi tchatcho, mer halauter ham gosewo un djinah tchomone pral kau koowa. Koon patsell, te hi les bud goswepen, kowa patsell sik, te hi lo bareder har ko wawar. Koon o djijestar o wawares kamella, koles krell job sorelo un gar tikno.
46008002	Koon patsella, te hi lo gosewo, kowa djinell gar, hoi tchatcho goswepen hi.
46008003	Koon tchatchepaha gosewo hi, kowa kamell o Debles o djijestar. Un o Dewel prindjrell les.
46008004	Nai chah mer kanna ko mass, hoi anan le glan i figura, hoi mangenn le an, har te wals li i dewel? Mer djinah halauter, kai hi i figura kek tchatcho dewel. Dell jek Dewel un kek wawar.
46008005	Ninna te hi sawo koowa an o bolepen un ap i phub, hoi i menshe an-mangenna, un ninna te dell bud, ap kolende i menshe penenna "mo dewel" un "mo rai",
46008006	hi men jek Dewel. Kowa hi maro dad an o bolepen, un dran leste well halauter. Un mer ham leske koi. Un men hi jek rai, kowa hi o Jesus Kristo. Lestar was halauter. Un lestar lam mer o newo djipen.
46008007	Hakeno haiwas kawa gar. Hi patsle, te chan jon ko mass, hoi glan i figura anlo was, hi kowa lenge, har te mangans le koi figura an, jaake har an ko tsiro, har his le gar patslo. Un lengre djia, kai gar soreles an o Debleste hi, penenn lenge, te anan le doosh ap pende.
46008008	Kolenge penau me: O chapen krell men gar pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Te ham dareno, te chas jek chapen, ham gar tikneder glan o Debleste. Te ham gar dareno, te chas kowa, ham gar feteder glan leste.
46008009	Kowa hi tumaro koowa, hoi tumer krenna. Ninna te hi kowa jaake, denn jak ap kolende, kai gomme gar soreles an o patsepen hi, te perenn jon gar o Debleskro dromestar tele!
46008010	Tu patseh, tu hal gosewo an o patsepen un haiwal, te nai chah ko mass, hoi glan i figura anlo was, un tu djah an ko kheer, kai mangenn le kolat an, un chah ko mass. Djineh tu, hoi nai wella, te dikell tut jek, kai gar soreles an o patsepen hi? Kowa nai well jaake, te chal job ninna ko mass, ninna te penell leskro dji leske: "Ma kre kowa!"
46008011	Un ko phraal, koleske o Jesus Kristo meras, un kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen, nashrell peskro patsepen doleske, kai tu patseh, te hal gosewo.
46008012	Me penau tumenge: Tumer te krenn sawo tchilatcho koowa ap tumare phralende un krenn, te well len i djungelo dji, palle krenn tumer i tchilatcho koowa ap o Jesus Kristeste.
46008013	Doleske, te dikell miro phraal, kai chau ko mass, un doleske well lo o Debleskro dromestar tele, palle kamoms me miro tselo djipen buder kek mass te chal.
46009001	Dikenn ap mande, har me hom! Me nai kroms, hoi me kamau, un me krau les gar. Hom me gar o Jesuseskro bitchepaskro? Awa, me hom o Jesuseskro bitchepaskro. Me dikom o Jesuses, maro rajes. Tumer djinenna, koon tumen ap o Debleskro drom anas. Kowa homs me.
46009002	Wawar penenna, te hom me gar o Jesusestar bitchedo. Tumer djinenna, kai man o Jesus Kristo bitchras. Un har me ap tumende lestar rakrom, wan tumer patslo.
46009003	Kolla, kai kamenn doosh ap mande te anell, kolendar putchau:
46009004	Hi men gar ko tchatchepen, te chas un te pijas pash tumende?
46009005	Hi men gar ko tchatchepen, te romedinerah nai i patsli djuwjat, un te las lat mentsa, jaake har krenna kol wawar Jesuseskre bitchepangre un leskre phrala un o Petro?
46009006	Me putchau tumendar: Hunte budrap me un o Barnabas maro chapaske kokres?
46009007	Kek tsardella an o kurepen un plaissrell pes kokres. Kek tchiwell i drakengre ruka an i phub, un chal gar i drake. Kek dell peskre bakren senlepen te chal, un pijell gar lengro thud.
46009008	Hoi me penau, well gar i menshendar. Kowa penell menge o Debleskro lab.
46009009	An o Moseskre lila hi tchindlo: I grumni, hoi budrell, te dell li o djob dran o phuss, ma pande lakro mui! Hi o Debleske i grumni ap o dji tchiddo? Na-a!
46009010	Ap mende penell o Dewel kowa. Doleske hi ninna menge tchindlo: Ko hacho, kai budrell ap peskro kotar phub, krell kowa, te anell lo bud djob dre. Un kowa, kai dell o djob dran i phuss, budrella, te nai chal lo kolestar.
46009011	Te anam mer tumenge o Debleskro lab, nai denn tumer men ninna te chal.
46009012	Te hi i wawaren ko tchatchepen ap kowa lauter, hi men ko tchatchepen ninna. Ninna te hi kowa jaake, lah kowa gar menge. Me kamoms gar, te rakrell jek pral mende, te penah i menshenge o Jesus Kristestar, te was mer plaissedo.
46009013	Djinenn tumer gar, kai kolla, kai an o Debleskro baro kheer budrenna, kote lenna, hoi len hunte well djipaske? Un kolla, kai anenn marede fichen glan o Debleste, kolla nai chan ninna i kotar kolestar, hoi o Debleste dino wella.
46009014	Jaake penas maro rai Jesus ninna, te lenn kolla, kai leskro lab i menshenge penenna, kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske.
46009015	Kau tchatchepen lom mange gar: Me lom tchi tumendar. Me tchinau kowa gar, te wap me kanna tumendar plaissedo. Feteder wals, me meroms, har te penenn i menshe mange palla, te plaissrenn tumer man. Me nai sharau man, te penau i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesusestar tchitcheske.
46009016	Me sikrau i menshende leskro drom gar, te wap sharedo. Na-a, me hunte rakrap lestar. Har bibachtelo woms, te kroms kowa gar!
46009017	Te kroms me kowa mandar, palle nai loms me kowa plaissedo. Me krau kowa gar mandar. O Dewel das man koi budi.
46009018	Hoi lau me koleske? Me lau tchi. Mange hi shukeder te penap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar tchitcheske, har te wap me plaissedo.
46009019	Kek mensho hi miro rai. Ninna te krau nai, hoi kamau, krom me man budepaskro lauterenge, te anap nai jaake bud menshen pash o Jesuseste har djala.
46009020	Te hom pash i biboldende, palle djiwau har i biboldo, un rikrau man ap o Moseskre laba, te anap i bibolden pash o Jesuseste, ninna te hom me gar tel o Moseskre laba tardo.
46009021	Te hom me pash i menshende, kai rikrenn pen gar ap o Moseskre laba, palle djiwau me har jon, te anap len pash o Jesus Kristeste, ninna te rikrau me man ap o Debleskro tchatchepen. Un kowa hi o Jesus Kristeskro lab.
46009022	Pash kolende, kai hi gar soreles an o patsepen, djiwau me jaake har jon djiwenna. Kowa krau me, te well lengro patsepen ap o Jesuseste soreles. Me wom lauterenge jaake har jon, te rodap i drom, te anap len pash o Jesus Kristeste.
46009023	Kowa lauter krau me, te patsenn bud ap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, te lap ninna kowa, hoi mange o Dewel an peskro lab penella.
46009024	Haiwenn! Kol nashepangre nashenn lauter, un hakeno kamell o glanstuno te well. Jek kokres well o glanstuno. Tumer patsle, hunte nashenn jaake ap tumaro patsepaskro drom, har te kamans o glanstuno te well! Palle lenn tumer o shukar koowa, hoi o glanstuno lella!
46009025	Kol nashepangre rikrenn pen lauterestar pale, hoi len khino krella. Ko shukar koowa, hoi kolla lenna, kowa atchell gar hako tsiro. Hoi mer patsle lah, kowa atchella hako tsireske.
46009026	Me nashau jaake har jek, kai djinella, kai job nashella. Me kurau man gar har jek, kai dell trul peste.
46009027	Un me dau jak ap mande, te wap o rai pral miro mass. Me kamau gar te penap i menshenge, hoi jon hunte krenna, un me kokres krau les gar.
46010001	-
46010002	Mire phrala, ma bistrenn, har djas mare phurenge, har djan jon an o mulo them. I wolka djas glan lende lauterende un sikras lende, kai o Dewel pash lende his. Un jon halauter djan o Moseste palla mashkral o baro pani ap i wawar rig. Mer nai penams: Har wan jon an i wolka un an o baro pani, wan le ap o Moseskro lab an o pani thodo.
46010003	Un jon halauter chan ko jek chapen, hoi was o Deblestar.
46010004	Un jon pijan lauter ko jek pipen, kai was o Deblestar. Jon pijan ko pani, kai was dran i baro bar win, kai lentsa djas. Ko bar his o Jesus Kristo.
46010005	Ninna te his jaake, nai dikas o Dewel gar latches ap bud lendar. Un jon meran an o mulo them.
46010006	Kowa, hoi kote djas, kamell menge soreles te penell, te djal maro dji gar pal o tchilatcho koowa, jaake har kolengro dji pal o tchilatchepen djas.
46010007	Ma mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles! Mank kolende an o phuro tsiro his sawe, kai kran kowa. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Jon beshan tele, te chan le un pijan le un stan pre, te khelenn le glan o sonakaskro ficho.
46010008	Mer te luberas witar gar trujal. Mank kolende his sawe, kai kran kowa, un lendar meran biish-te-triin serja menshe ap jek diwes.
46010009	Ma choirenn o Jesus Kristes, har kolla an o phuro tsiro o Debles choiran, har kran le, har te wals les kek soor. Un i sapa dandran len. Un jon meran.
46010010	Ma penenn, kai kowa gar mishto un doha hi, hoi o Dewel tumen das. Jaake rakran kol wawar pale te pale. Un jon wan mulo dino.
46010011	Kowa lauter, hoi ap lende was, sikrell men, hoi nai wella. Un mer, kai djiwah kau diwes un djinah, te atchell kau tsiro buder gar raha, menge was kowa tchindlo an i lila, te das mer jak ap mende.
46010012	Doleske, koon penella, kai job soreles an o patsepen hi, dell jak, te perell lo gar.
46010013	Della sawo koowa, hoi kamell tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Dikenn, sawo koowa was ninna ap wawar menshende. Te well pharo koowa ap tumende, dell o Dewel tumen koi soor, te nai hidjenn kowa. Job hatsell i drom, te wenn pale kote win.
46010014	Doleske, latche mala, denn jak, un mangenn gar wawar koowa an har o Debles!
46010015	Me rakrau tumentsa har menshentsa, kai gosewe hi. Putchenn tumaro dji, te hi kawa lauter tchatcho, hoi me penau!
46010016	Te wah khetne, te pijas dran o Jesuseskro khoro, parkrah men koleske pash o Debleste, un djinah, o Jesus Kristo ratas un meras menge un las mari doosh mendar krik. Te phagah ko maro un chah les, rikrell men kowa o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
46010017	Mer chah jek maro. Doleske hi men jek djipen khetne o Jesuseha, ninna te ham bud patsle.
46010018	Kowa hi jaake, har pash i menshende an Israel. Jon wan khetne un chan kol fichendar, kai anan le o Debleske. Lauter kolla, kai chan, his khetne. Un o Dewel his mank lende.
46010019	Me kamau tumendar te putchell: Hi i figura i tchatcho dewel? Na-a! Hi ko mass, hoi anan le glan late, wawartchandes har wawar mass? Na-a!
46010020	Kowa, hoi i menshe kol deblen dran kasht un bar denna, anenn jon i bengenge, gar o Debleske. Un me kamau gar, te wenn tumer i bengentsa khetne.
46010021	Tumer nai pijenn gar dran o Jesuseskro khoro un dran o bengeskro khoro. Tumer nai chan gar o Jesuseskro chapen un o bengeskro chapen.
46010022	Ma choirenn o Debles! Mer ham gar sorleder har job.
46010023	Tumer penenn: "Lauter nai krah mer." Me penau: Gar lauter hi latcho. Lauter nai krah mer. Gar lauter, hoi mer krah, hi mishto menge un i wawarenge.
46010024	Dikenn gar ap tumende kokres! Pash halauter, hoi tumer krenna, dikenn ninna ap o wawareste, hoi leske mishto hi!
46010025	Tumer nai chana hako mass, hoi bikedo wella. Ma putchenn, konestar ko mass wella, te well tumenge gar phares an o dji!
46010026	Djinenn, i phub un lauter, hoi koi pre hi, hi o Debleskro.
46010027	Te penell tumenge jek, kai gar patslo hi: "Awenn pash mande un chan mantsa," palle djan koi! Un chan pash leste lauter, hoi job tumenge anella! Ma putchenn, kai ginas lo ko chapen, te well tumenge gar phares an o dji!
46010028	Kowa hi wawartchandes, te penell tumenge jek: "Kau chapen was i debleste dran kasht un bar dino." Palle ma chan ko mass, te well koleskro dji gar djungeles, kai kowa tumenge penas. Job nai penals: "Hi mishto, te chap ko chapen."
46010029	Me rakrau gar tumendar, rakrau ko wawarestar, te wals kowa gar mishto leske, te chals job ko mass. Mange nai penell kek wawar, hoi me nai krap un hoi gar.
46010030	Te chau i chapen un parkrau man koleske pash o Debleste, nai praassell man kek, te chau me ko chapen.
46010031	Hoi tumer ninna krenna un chana un pijenna, kowa krenn lauter jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo.
46010032	Djiwenn jaake, te choirell pes kek pral tumende: kol bibolde gar, un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi witar gar, un witar gar kol patsle, kai wenn tumentsa khetne.
46010033	Me krau lauter, te djiwap jaake, har hakeneske mishto hi un rodau gar, hoi mange mishto hi. Me kamau kowa te krell, hoi budenge mishto hi, te djan jon gar nashedo.
46011001	Krenn kowa jaake, har me kowa krau! Un me krau kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo kras.
46011002	Me hom bachtelo pral tumende, te bistran tumer gar, hoi me tumenge penom. Kowa, hoi shunom un tumenge penom, krenn tumer.
46011003	Me kamau te djinenn tumer, kai o Jesus Kristo hi o pralstuno pral hako mursheste. Un o rom hi o pralstuno pral peskri romjate. Un o Dewel hi o pralstuno pral o Jesus Kristeste.
46011004	Hako mursh, kai mangell o Debles an, un hako mursh, kai penella, hoi o Dewel leste sikras, un les hi i stadi ap o shero, kowa anell ladj ap peste.
46011005	Haki romni, kai mangell o Debles an, un haki romni, kai penella, hoi o Dewel late sikras, un kowa krell li, te hi lat tchi ap o shero, koja anella ladj ap peste. Kowa hi jaake, har te wans lake i balla tele tchindlo.
46011006	Te kamell i romni tchi ap peskro shero te tchiwell, nai mukell joi ninna peskre balla tele te tchinell. Te wenn lake i balla tele tchindlo, un lat hi buder kek balla ap o shero, hi kowa lake i ladj. Doleske hunte tchakrell li peskro shero.
46011007	I mursh hunte tchiwell kek stadi ap peskro shero. Job was kerdo pal o Debleste. Un o Dewel sharell pes leha. Jaake sharell pes o rom peskri romjaha.
46011008	O mursh hi gar i djuwjater. I djuwel hi o murshestar.
46011009	O Dewel kras o murshes gar i djuwjake. Na-a! Job kras i djuwjat o mursheske.
46011010	Doleske hunte tchakrell koi romni peskro shero, te dikenn i bolepangre, kai lakro rom o pralstuno pral late hi.
46011011	Pash i patslende hi kowa jaake: O rom hi tchi peske kokres. Un i romni hi tchi peske kokres.
46011012	I djuwel well o murshestar. Un o mursh well i djuwjatar boldo. Un jon dui wenna o Deblestar.
46011013	Me putchau tumendar: Hi kowa latcho, te mangell i romni o Debles an, un lat hi tchi ap peskro shero? Na-a!
46011014	Hakeno djinella: Te hi i murshes lengste bal, hi kowa i ladj leske.
46011015	Un te hi i djuwjat lengste bal, hi joi shukar. Lakre balla hi lake har i diklo.
46011016	Te hi jek pash tumende, kai kamell pes pral kowa tchingrell, jaake hunte djinell job, kai mer tchingrah men pral sawo koowa gar, un kote, kai i patsle o Debleske khetne wenna, witar gar.
46011017	Kanna hunte penap tumenge tchomone, kai nai sharau tumen gar. Te wenn tumer patsle khetne, krenn tumer budeder, hoi tumenge gar mishto hi, har te krans kowa, hoi tumenge mishto hi.
46011018	Me shunom, te wenn tumer khetne, palle tchingrenn tumer khetne, un ko jek penell: Me krau, hoi kawa penella, un ko wawar penell: Me krau hoi kowa penella. Un me patsau, i paash kolestar, hoi pral tumende shunom, hi tchatcho.
46011019	Kowa hunte well jaake, te dikell hakeno, koon tumendar an o patsepen mishto tardo hi.
46011020	Me shunom ninna, te wenn tumer khetne, palle chan tumer o Jesuseskro chapen gar jaake, har maro rai Jesus kowa kamella.
46011021	Hakeno chal peskro chapen kokres, hoi job peha las, un dell kek wawares tchomone. Doleske hi mashkral tumende phrala un phenja, kai hi len bok un trush. Un wawaren hi jaake bud te pijell, te wenn le mato.
46011022	Nai chan un pijenn tumer gar khere? Hi kol patsle, kai o Debleske khetne wenna, tchi moldo an tumare jaka? Kamenn tumer ladj ap kolende te anell, kolen tchi hi? Hoi penap me tumenge? Sharap me tumen? Na-a! Doleske sharau me tumen gar.
46011023	Hoi me tumenge penom, kowa penas mange maro rai Jesus. Koi rati, kai was ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste, phukedo, las job ko maro,
46011024	parkras pes pash o Debleste, un phagas ko maro un penas: "Kawa hi miro mass, hoi tumenge dino wella. Hako kopo, kai phagenn tumer o maro, ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge krom!"
46011025	Un pal o chapen las job ko khoro un penas: "Kai mool an kau khoro hi miro rat, hoi tumenge ratau. Jaake krau i newo drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna. Hako kopo, kai pijenn tumer dran ko khoro, ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge krom!"
46011026	Hako kopo, kai chan tumer ko maro, un kai pijenn tumer dran ko khoro, penenn tumer dureder, kai maro rai Jesus meras. Kowa krenn tumer jaake raha, bis te job pale wella.
46011027	Koon chal ko maro, un pijell dran o rajeskro khoro jaake, te well maro rai gar sharedo, kowa anell doosh ap peste. Job kras har te wals o Jesuseskro mass un rat tchi moldo.
46011028	Doleske hunte dikell hakeno ap peste, har hi lo an o patsepen tardo. Un palle chal job ko maro un pijell dran ko khoro.
46011029	Koon chal ko maro, un pijell dran ko khoro, un leske hi tchi moldo, hoi o rai Jesus leske kras, kowa anell doosh ap peste un lell i phagi.
46011030	Doleske hi bud nassele mashkral tumende, ninna sawe, kai hi len kek soor an lende. Un bud meran ninna.
46011031	Te dah jak ap mende, har mer an o patsepen tardo ham, lah kek phagi.
46011032	Te lah mer i phagi o Deblestar, palle krell job kowa, te djas mer gar khetne i wawar menshentsa nashedo.
46011033	Doleske, mire phrala, te wenn tumer khetne, te chan o rajeskro chapen, denn jak jek ap o wawareste, te lenn ko chapen khetne.
46011034	Te hi jekes bok, palle mu te chal job khere, jaake te anenn kek doosh ap tumende. Ko wawar penau tumenge, te wau pash tumende.
46012001	Mire phrala, kanna kamau me pral kowa te rakrell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwas.
46012002	Har tumer gomme gar patslo hans, tsardas tumen bari sorjaha pash kol figure, kai nashte rakrenn gar, kolen i menshe an-mangenna, har te wans le o Dewel.
46012003	Doleske kamau te djinenn tumer, hoi wella o Deblestar, un hoi well gar lestar. Un me penau tumenge: Te rakrell jek, hoi o Debleskro Ducho leske an o mui tchiwell, nai praassell lo gar o Jesuses. Un kek nai penella: "O Jesus hi miro rai!" te hi o Debleskro Ducho gar an leste.
46012004	O Debleskro Ducho dell i patslende koi soor, te nai budrenn le o Debleske. Ninna te hi koi soor pash hakeneste wawartchandes, hi jek Debleskro Ducho, kai dell jekes kawa un ko wawares kowa.
46012005	Della budeder budi, hoi krenn i patsle o Debleske. Jon lauter budrenna ko jek rajeske.
46012006	Un della bud dromma, har o Debleskro Ducho an i patslende budrella. Hi jek Dewel, kolestar kowa lauter wella.
46012007	An hakeneste budrell o Debleskro Ducho jaake, kai hi kowa i tsele patslenge mishto.
46012008	Ko jekes dell o Debleskro Ducho i gosewo lab, un i wawares, te haiwell lo, hoi o Dewel kamella. Un job penell kowa i wawarenge dureder. Hi jek Debleskro Ducho, kai kowa lauter krella.
46012009	I wawares dell job i baro patsepen. Un pale i wawares dell job i soor, te nai krell lo i nasselen sasto. Hi jek Debleskro Ducho, kai kowa lauter della.
46012010	I wawares dell job koi soor, te krell job baro koowa, hoi kek kokres pestar nai krella. Un pale i wawar penell i menshenge, hoi o Dewel leste sikras. Un pale i wawar haiwella, hoi o Deblestar wella, un hoi gar o Deblestar wella. Wawar rakrenn an wawar rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das. Un pale wawar penenn, hoi koi rakedo was.
46012011	Kowa krell lauter ko jek Debleskro Ducho, un job dell hakenes kowa jaake, har job kamella.
46012012	O mensho hi dran budeder kotja, har mussja, herja, un wawar. Ninna te hi lo dran bud kotja, hi lo jek mensho. Jaake hi ninna o Jesus Kristeha un kolentsa, kai ap leste patsenna.
46012013	Kolla, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna hi bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, hi raja un budepangre. Kolla lauter lan o Debleskro Ducho. Ko Ducho anas len lauteren khetne.
46012014	O mensho hi gar dran jek kotar. Job hi dran budeder kotja.
46012015	Te penals i heri: "Me hom kek wast," hi li palle kek kotar o menshestar? Na-a, i heri hi i kotar o menshestar.
46012016	Te penals o kand: "Me hom kek jak," hi lo palle kek kotar o menshestar? Na-a, o kand hi i kotar o menshestar.
46012017	Te wals o tselo mensho i jak, kai wals palle o kand, hoi shunella? Te wals o tselo mensho i kand, kai wals palle o nak, hoi sungella?
46012018	O Dewel tchiwas hako kotar jaake an o mensheste, har job kamas.
46012019	Te wals o tselo mensho i heri, hawo mensho wals kowa?
46012020	Bud kotja krenna jek mensho.
46012021	O jak nai penell gar ap o wast: "Me haiwau kowa kokres. Dja tuke!" Un ninna o shero nai penell gar ap i herja: "Me krau kowa kokres. Djan tumenge!"
46012022	O menshes hi ninna kotja, kai gar sorelo hi. Te wans kolla gar, nai djiwals lo gar.
46012023	Kol kotja, kai menge gar shukar hi, kolla riwah shukar an. Un kol kotja, kai khatrah, ap lende dah mishto garda.
46012024	Kol kotja, kolen mer gar khatrah, ap kolende das mer gar jaake mishto garda. O Dewel kras o menshes jaake, te das mer budeder garda ap kol kotja, hoi gar jaake shukar hi har kol wawar.
46012025	Job kamas gar, te tchingrenn pen i kotja. Job kamas, te well ko jek o wawareske koi.
46012026	Te dukell jek kotar, palle dukenn kol tsele wawar ninna. Un te well jek kotar sharedo, hi kol tsele kotja bachtele.
46012027	Tumen hi lauter jek djipen o Jesus Kristeha, un hakeno tumendar hi i kotar lestar.
46012028	Kote, kai i patsle khetne wenna, das o Dewel hakenes i budi. Peskre bitchepangren das lo koi budi, te penenn le i menshenge peskro lab. Un wawar hi o Debleskre rakepangre, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel len sikras. Koi hi ninna sikepangre, kai sikrenn i menshende o Debleskro drom, un kolla, kai krenn baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, kai kek kokres pestar nai krella. Wawaren das job i soor, te krenn le i nasselen sasto. Hi patsle, kai hi o wawarenge koi, un ninna wawar, kai rikrenn i patslen khetne, un pale wawar, kai rakrenn nai an i wawar rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das.
46012029	Gar halauter hi o Deblestar bitchedo, te penenn le i menshenge leskro lab. Gar halauter hi o Debleskre rakepangre. Gar halauter hi sikepangre. Gar hakeno nai krell i baro koowa an o Debleskri soor.
46012030	Gar halauter lendar lan koi soor o Deblestar, te krenn le i nasselen sasto. Gar halauter lendar nai rakrenn an i wawar rakepen, un gar hakeno nai penell, hoi koi rakedo was.
46012031	Mangenn o Deblestar, te tchiwell leskro Ducho kol sorja an tumende, kai i patslenge i feteder hi. Un kanna sikrau me tumen i drom, hoi pral hako wawar drom hi.
46013001	Ninna te rakroms me nai an hako rakepen, hoi i menshe un i bolepangre rakrenna, un te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an miro dji, palle woms me har i bashepaskro, kai bashrell gar mishto. Leskro bashepen molella tchi.
46013002	Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te penoms me i menshenge, hoi o Dewel mande sikras. Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te djinoms halauter, hoi i wawar gar djinenna un te haiwoms ko tselo Debleskro drom. Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te wals man jek sorelo patsepen, te penoms me ap i berge: Hadenn tumen, un jon hadenna pen.
46013003	Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te doms miro tselo brawlepen kol tchorwelende, un te mukoms man me djides pre te chatchrell.
46013004	Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa rikrella lauter wi. Job hi latcho un silwerella gar. Job krell pes gar bares un sharell pes gar.
46013005	Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa krell kek wi-ladjedo koowa; un dikell gar ap peste kokres. Job dikell ninna ap i wawarende, te djal lenge mishto. Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa mukell pes gar chojedo te krell. Job bistrell o tchilatchepen, hoi i wawar leske kran.
46013006	Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa hi gar bachtelo pral o tchilatchepen. Job hi bachtelo pral o tchatchepen.
46013007	Te hi les o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji un i menshe dukrenn les, hi job gar chojedo pral kowa. Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa patsell halauter. Job dell o wawares gar pre, un rikrell lauter wi.
46013008	Well i tsiro, kai tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho i patslenge buder kek lab an o dji. Well i tsiro, kai dell lo len buder kek wawar rakepen. Well i tsiro, kai hunte well men buder kek goswepen. Jek atchella: o Debleskro kamlepen.
46013009	Kanna djinah gar lauter o Deblestar, i tikno kotar kokres. Un kowa, hoi sikrell lo mende pestar, hi i tikno kotar kokres.
46013010	Jek tsiro wella, kai dikah lauter lestar un buder gar tikne kotja kokres.
46013011	Har homs i tikno tchawo, rakrom me har i tchawo, un dikom lauter har i tchawo. Un man his tchawengro koowa an o shero. Har wom i mursh, tchiwom ko tchawengro koowa krik.
46013012	Kanna dikah o Debleskro koowa gar mishto. Mer dikah kowa jaake har an o phuro blenderi. Jek diwes wella, kai dikah mer o Debles, har job hi. Lauter, hoi me kanna lestar djinau, hi tikne kotja. Well ko diwes, kai prindjrau les jaake, har job man prindjrella.
46013013	Kanna atchenna menge kalla triin: - O patsepen ap o Debleste; - i bacht, te djinah mer, te well lauter mishto; - o Debleskro kamlepen. O bareder kol trinendar hi o Debleskro kamlepen.
46014001	Krenn lauter, te lenn o Debleskro kamlepen an tumaro dji! Un rodenn i tselo djijestar kol sorja, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwella, te nai budrenna o Debleske! Budeder har hako wawar koowa rodenn koi pal, te penenn nai i menshenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar.
46014002	Kowa, kai rakrella an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho les das, un hoi kek haiwella, kowa rakrell gar i menshenge. Job krell kowa o Debleske. O Debleskro Ducho dell les koi soor, te rakrell lo, hoi kek mensho djinella.
46014003	Kowa, kai penell i menshenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar, kowa rakrell jaake ap i menshende, te well lengro patsepen soreles, un te wenn lengre djia bachteles un soreles.
46014004	Kowa, kai rakrella peske an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho les das un hoi kek haiwella, koleske djal feteder an peskro dji. Kowa, kai penell i patslenge i lab, hoi o Deblestar wella, krell kowa, te well kolengro patsepen soreles.
46014005	Ninna te kamoms me, te rakrans tumer lauter an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho das, kamoms me budeder, te penans nai tumer lauter i menshenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar. Hi budeder moldo, te penell jek i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar, har te rakrell jek an i wawar rakepen, hoi kek haiwella. Hi wawartchandes, te hi jek koi, kai penell nai, hoi an ko wawar rakepen rakedo was, jaake te wenn i patsle soreles an o patsepen.
46014006	Kanna, mire phrala, har wals kowa, te woms me pash tumende, un rakroms an i rakepen, hoi kek haiwella? Kowa molals tumenge tchi. Tumenge hi budeder moldo, te rakrap an i rakepen, hoi tumer haiwenna, un te penap tumenge, hoi o Dewel mande sikras, un hoi lestar djinau. Un tumenge hi ninna budeder moldo, te penap tumenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar, un te sikrap tumen, har te djan ap o Debleskro drom.
46014007	Kowa hi jaake har o bashepen. Te bashrell jek gar mishto, haiwell kek, hoi bashedo wella.
46014008	Te djan i lurde an o kurepen, palle phurdell jek ap i bashepaskri. Un job te phurdella jaake djungeles, te haiwell les kek, palle djal kek an o kurepen.
46014009	Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa. Te rakrenn tumer an i rakepen labentsa, hoi kek haiwella, har nai haiwell jek, hoi tumer penenna? Tumer rakrenn tchitcheske.
46014010	Dell bud menshe an bud themma. Un hakenes hi peskro rakepen.
46014011	Te haiwau me gar ko wawareskro rakepen, hom me koleske i wi-themari. Un ninna job hi mange i wi-themari.
46014012	Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa. Tumer kamenn o tselo djijestar kol sorja te lell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho della. Krenn lauter, te lenn bud kolestar, hoi krell i patslen soreles an o patsepen!
46014013	Hi jaake: Koon an i rakepen rakrella, hoi das les o Debleskro Ducho, kowa hunte mangell o Deblestar, te nai penell lo i menshenge kowa, hoi koi rakedo was.
46014014	Me te rakrau an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho man das, palle krell kowa o Debleskro Ducho an mande. Un me haiwau gar, hoi me penom.
46014015	Hoi hunte krap me kanna? Me kamau te rakrap o Debleha an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho man das. Ninna kamau me te rakrap leha i labentsa, hoi me haiwau. Un me kamau leske te giwap, har o Debleskro Ducho mukell man te giwell. Un ninna kamau te giwap i labentsa, hoi me haiwau.
46014016	Te shareh tu o Debles an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tut das, un koi hi jek, kai haiwell kowa gar, har nai penell job Amen ap kowa, hoi tu penal?
46014017	Leskro dji well gar soreles, ninna te parkral tut tu o djijestar pash o Debleste.
46014018	Me parkrau man pash o Debleste, kai rakrau budeder har tumer lauter an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho man das.
46014019	Te hom me mank i patslende, te sikrap len o Debleskro drom, kamau kote feteder pantch laba te rakrell, hoi hakeno haiwella, har deesh serja laba an i rakepen, hoi kek haiwella.
46014020	Mire phrala, ma awenn har tikne tchawe, kai gomme gar bud djinenna. Awenn gosewo har i phure! Pash tchilatcho koowa, awenn har tikne tchawe, hoi o tchilatchepen gar haiwenna!
46014021	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Me kamau te rakrap ap kal menshende an o wawar rakepen. Un wi-themarja penenn lenge mire laba. Un ninna palle shunenn le gar ap mande, penell o Dewel.
46014022	Jaake dikenn tumer: O Debleskro Ducho dell o wawar rakepen, te sikrell o Dewel peskri soor kolende, kai gar patsenna, un gar i patslende. Hi wawartchandes, te penell jek i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar. Ko lab hi i patslenge un gar kolenge, kai patsenna gar ap o Debleste.
46014023	Dikenn, te wans i tsele patsle khetne, un rakrans lauter an i wawar rakepen, un koi wals jek, kai gar patslo hi un kai prindjrell kowa gar, penals kowa: "Kalla hi lauter narwele!"
46014024	Hi wawartchandes, te lell hakeno i lab o Deblestar, un penell les glan i wawarende, un koi wella jek, kai gar patsella un o tselo koowa gar prindjrella, koleske djal lauter an leskro dji, un leske djan i jaka pre pral peskri doosh.
46014025	Hoi an leskro dji khatedo hi, well diklo. Un job mukell pes glan tele perell ap i phub un mangell o Debles an, un penell: "O Dewel hi tchatchepaha pash tumende!"
46014026	Mire phrala, hi jaake: Te wenn tumer khetne, sharell ko jek o Debles i giljaha. I wawar sikrell, har te djan ap o Debleskro drom. Ninna i wawar penell, hoi o Dewel les sikras. Pale i wawar rakrell an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho les das. Un i wawar nai penell, hoi koi rakedo was. Lauter kowa krenn, te wenn i patsle soreles an o patsepen!
46014027	Te hi menshe koi, kai rakrenn an i wawar rakepen, mukenn te rakrenn dui te triin, gar budeder har triin, jek pal o wawareste! Un jek hunte penell, hoi rakedo was.
46014028	Te hi kek koi, kai penell nai, hoi koi rakedo was, palle mukenn kekes an i wawar rakepen te rakrell. Job nai rakrell khere peske kokres un o Debleske.
46014029	Kolla, kai penenna i menshenge i lab, hoi o Deblestar wella, kolendar mukenn te rakrenn dui te triin! Un kol wawar denn garda, te hi kowa tchatcho, hoi rakedo wella!
46014030	Te penell jek i lab o Deblestar, un o Dewel sikrell tchomone ap i wawareste, kai koi pashal beshdo hi, hunte mukell ko ersto koles te rakrell.
46014031	Tumer lauter nai penenn jek pal o wawareste i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar. Jaake dikenn lauter, har te djan o Debleskro drom. Un lauter wenna soreles an o patsepen.
46014032	Kones i lab well o Deblestar, kowa nai rikrell pes pale, jaake raha har ko wawar rakrella.
46014033	O Dewel kamell kek tchingepen. Job kamell, te djal lauter mishto. Kowa hi jaake an hake forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna.
46014034	Te wenn tumer khetne an o Debleskro kheer, ma mukenn i djuwjen te rakrell. Jon hunte shunenn ap kowa, hoi penlo wella. Jaake hi ninna tchindlo an o Moseskre lila.
46014035	Te kamell i djuwel tchomone te djinell, putchell li khere peskro romestar. Kowa hi gar mishto, te rakrell i djuwel an o Debleskro kheer.
46014036	Was o Debleskro lab tumendar? Na-a! Was o Debleskro lab pash tumende kokres? Na-a!
46014037	Te patsell jek tumendar, kai o Dewel rakrell leha, un kai o Debleskro Ducho les o Debleskro koowa sikrell, jaake haiwell job, te hi kawa gar mandar, hoi me kate tchinau. Kawa hi o Deblestar.
46014038	Koon kowa gar kamell te dikell, ap koleste dikenn witar gar!
46014039	Mire phrala, mangenn o Debles, te nai penenn i menshenge i lab, hoi lestar wella! Un mukenn kolen te rakrell, kai kamenna an ko rakepen te rakrell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das!
46014040	Krenn kawa jaake, te djal kowa lauter mishto un shukar!
46015001	Mire phrala, ma bistrenn o latcho lab o Jesusestar, hoi me tumenge penom! Tumer lan ko lab pre, un tumer djiwenn pal kowa.
46015002	Te rikrenn tumen ap o latcho lab o Jesusestar, jaake har me les tumenge penom, djan tumer gar nashedo. Te wals kowa wawartchandes, wals tumaro patsepen tchitcheske.
46015003	Ko bareder lab, hoi mange penlo was, un hoi me tumenge penom, hi kawa: O Jesus Kristo meras menge, te lell lo mari doosh mendar krik, jaake har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi.
46015004	Un job was paskedo, un was djido pal triin diwessa, jaake har kowa an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi.
46015005	Un pal kowa sikras lo pes o Petreste. Un pal koleste sikras lo pes peskre deesh-te-dui malende.
46015006	Pal lende dikan les budeder har pantch-sheel phrala ap jek kopo. Bud lendar djiwenna gomme kai diwes.
46015007	Pal lende dikas les ninna o Jakobo, un palle ninna i tsele wawar bitchepangre.
46015008	Pal lende mukas job pes mandar te dikell. Pal mande dikas les buder kek. Un me homs gar moldo, te dikap les.
46015009	Me lom i patslen palla, te marap len. Doleske hom me o tikneder mashkral lende, kolen o Jesus bitchras, te penenn le i menshenge o latcho lab lestar. Un me hom gar moldo, te penenn jon, kai me jek lendar hom.
46015010	O Dewel kamas an peskro baro latchepen, te wap me kowa, hoi me kanna hom. Un leskro baro latchepen, hoi job man das, his gar tchitcheske. Me budrom budeder har kol tsele wawar. Gar me kokres, o Debleskro latchepen an mande budras mantsa, te krap nai koi budi.
46015011	Kowa hi jek, koon mendar penas tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Mer halauter rakrah lestar. Un jaake patsan tumer ap leste.
46015012	Mer penam tumenge, kai o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre stas. Har nai penenn menshe mank tumende: "Ko della gar, kai i mule pre stenna."
46015013	Te dell kowa gar, kai i mule pre stenna, jaake stas o Jesus Kristo witar gar i mulendar pre.
46015014	Te stals o Jesus Kristo gar i mulendar pre, wals kowa tchitcheske, hoi mer o Jesus Kristestar rakrah. Un tumaro patsepen wals ninna tchitcheske.
46015015	Palle nai penans le mendar, te ham mer chochene. Mer penam, kai kras o Dewel o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido. Te wals kowa gar tchatcho, te krell o Dewel i mulen djido, palle nashte kras job o Jesus Kristes witar gar djido.
46015016	Te stenn i mule gar pre, palle stas o Jesus Kristo witar gar i mulendar pre.
46015017	Te stas o Jesus Kristo gar i mulendar pre, jaake hi tumaro patsepen tchitcheske. Un ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran, hi gomme ap tumende.
46015018	Te stas o Jesus Kristo gar i mulendar pre, palle hi kolla nashedo, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsan un meran.
46015019	Te wals maro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste buder tchi moldo pal o merepen, wams i tchorwleder i tsele menshendar.
46015020	Ko tchatchepen hi: O Jesus Kristo hi o ersto, koles o Dewel i mulendar djido kras.
46015021	Jaake har was o merepen jek menshestar, jaake well ninna jekestar, kai stenn i mule pale pre.
46015022	Jaake har was o Adamestar, kai hunte merenn lauter, jaake well o Jesus Kristestar, te krell o Dewel len lauter djido:
46015023	Hakeno ap peskro tsiro: O Jesus Kristo hi o glanstuno. Te well lo pale, stenn kolla pre, kai ap leste patsan.
46015024	Pal kowa herell kau tsiro pre. Hako rai, hako pralstuno un hakeno, koles hi penepaske, koleske lell o Jesus Kristo i soor krik un dell lauter o Debleste, peskro dadeste, te well o Dewel kokres o rai pral halauter.
46015025	O Jesus Kristo hunte well o rai jaake raha, bis te tchiwell o Dewel lauteren, kai les gar kamenna, tel leskre pire.
46015026	Ko palstuno, kolendar o Jesus Kristo i soor krik lella, hi o merepen.
46015027	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Lauter tchiwas o Dewel tel leskre pire. Ninna te hi kate penlo, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o rai pral lauterende, hi lo gar pral o Debleste tardo. O Dewel hi kowa, kai kras, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o rai pral lauterende.
46015028	Te was o Jesus Kristo o rai pral halauter, tchiwell job pes ninna tel o Debleskro wast, te well o Dewel ninna o rai pral o tchaweste. Un o Dewel kokres hi o rai pral halauter.
46015029	Kanna rakrau pale pral kolende, kai penenn, te stenn i mule gar pre. Tumer djinenn, hi patsle koi, kai mukenn pen i mulenge an o pani te thowell. Putchau tumendar: Te stenn i mule buder gar pre, hoske mukenn le pen palle i mulenge an o pani te thowell?
46015030	Un hoi hi mentsa? Hoske penah mer o Debleskro lab dureder, te djinah mer, te nai wah mer hako tsiro mulo dino?
46015031	Hako diwes nai nashrau me miro djipen. Mire phrala, kowa hi tchatcho, jaake har tchatcho hi, kai hom bachtelo pral tumende, kai me anom tumen pash o Jesus Kristeste, maro rajeste.
46015032	An o foro Efesus kurom man me menshentsa, kai jaake hi har diwje fiche. Te patsoms me gar, kai i mule pre stenna, kroms me kowa gar. Te stenna i mule gar pre, hi kol wawaren tchatcho, te penenn le: "Chas un pijas! Taissar nai ham mulo!"
46015033	Ma patsenn, kai lengro tchatcho hi! Ma krenn kowa, hoi jon krenna!
46015034	Djan o tchatcho drom! Ma pijenn tumen mato! Djiwenn buder gar an o tchilatchepen! Mank tumende hi menshe, kai djinenn gar, koon o Dewel hi. Un kowa penau tumenge, te ladjenn tumen.
46015035	Kanna nai well jek, kai putchella: "Har nai stenn i mule pre? Un har dikenn le win?"
46015036	Me, o Paulo, penau tuke: Har nai putcheh tu jaake dineles? Dik ap o djob, hoi tu an i phub tchiweh! Kowa hunte merell, te well lo djido un baro.
46015037	Un kowa, hoi tu an i phub tchiweh, hi gar ko baro djob. Na-a! Tu tchiweh les an i phub, te hi lo tikno. Un jaake kreh tu kowa ninna o wawar senlepaha.
46015038	O Dewel mukell les bares te well un jaake win te dikell, har job kamell. Un hako senlepen krell lo wawartchandes.
46015039	Hako djipen ap i phub dikell wawartchandes win. I menshe dikenn wawartchandes win har i tchirkle. Un i tchirkle dikenn wawartchandes win har i matche.
46015040	Un kolla, kai an o bolepen hi, dikenn wawartchandes win, har kolla, kai ap i phub hi. Un kolla, kai an o bolepen hi, len hi i wawar railepen, har kolla, kai ap i phub hi.
46015041	O kham, les hi i wawar railepen har o tchon. Un o tchon, les hi i wawar railepen, har i bolepangre momlia. Un kek lendar dikell win har koi wawar.
46015042	Jaake hi ninna, te stenn i mule pre. Kowa, hoi an i phub tchiddo wella, ferdjala. Kowa, kai i mulendar pre stella, merell buder gar.
46015043	Kowa, hoi an i phub tchiddo wella, hi djungelo. Kowa, kai i mulendar pre stella, hi shukar. Kowa, hoi an i phub tchiddo wella, koles hi kek soor. Te stell lo i mulendar pre, djal kowa i bari sorjaha.
46015044	Kowa, hoi paskedo wella, his i mensho dran mass un rat. Kowa, kai i mulendar pre stella, hi i newo mensho, koles o Debleskro Ducho djido kras. Jaake har della o menshes dran mass un rat, - kowa merella -, jaake della ninna o newo menshes, koles o Debleskro Ducho djido kras. Kowa merella buder gar.
46015045	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O ersto mensho, o Adam, las o djipen. Un o Jesus Kristo, - koles nai kharams mer o duito mensho, - job hi i djido ducho, kai dell o djipen.
46015046	Ko djipen, hoi job della, well pal o djipen, hoi hi men kanna ap kai phub.
46015047	O ersto mensho was i phubjatar un dran tchik kerdo. O duito mensho, o Jesus Kristo, was dran o bolepen.
46015048	Jaake har ko phubjakro mensho, o Adam, his, jaake hi kolla, kai ap i phub hi. Jaake har ko bolepaskro mensho, o Jesus Kristo, hi, jaake hi kolla, kai an o bolepen hi.
46015049	Kanna dikah wi har kowa, kai was kerdo dran tchik. Te wah an o bolepen, dikah wi har kowa, kai was dran o bolepen.
46015050	Mire phrala, kowa penau me tumenge: Menshe dran mass un rat nai wenn gar an o bolepen. Witar gar well kowa, hoi mulo hi, kote, kai i djide hi.
46015051	Shunenn, me penau tumenge, hoi kek djinella: Mer merah gar lauter. Well i tsiro, koi lell men o Dewel win dran kowa, hoi mer kanna ham, un krell men wawartchandes.
46015052	Kowa well ap jek kopo, jaake sik, har kek nai dikella. Ap ko tsiro shunah mer i bashepaskri, kai jek dre phurdell. Te shunah mer koi bashepaskri, stenn i mule pre, un wenn djido. Un mer, kai gomme djiwah, wah win lino dran kowa, hoi mer kanna ham, un wawartchandes kerdo.
46015053	Hi jaake: I mule wenn djido. Un i djide hunte merenn buder gar.
46015054	Te hi ko tsiro koi, kai i mule djido wenna, un i djide buder gar merenna, palle well kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: O merepen nashras peskri soor. Lestar trashah mer buder gar.
46015055	Merepen, tiri soor hi krik! Merepen, tu dukreh kekes buder!
46015056	O merepen lell peskri soor dran o tchilatchepen, hoi o mensho krella. Hoi tchilatcho hi, djinah mer dran o Moseskre lila, kai tchindlo hi, har te djiwas.
46015057	Kanna parkrah men pash o Debleste. O merepen nashras peskri soor pral mende. Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, his sorleder har o merepen, un las leskri soor krik.
46015058	Doleske, mire kamle phrala, atchenn soreles an o patsepen! Ma mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Awenn hako tsiro o Debleske koi, un budrenn leske mishto! Tumer djinenna: Kai budi, hoi leske krenna, hi gar tchitcheske.
46016001	Kanna kamau te rakrell pral i lowe, hoi tumer khetne tchiwenn i patslenge. Krenn kowa jaake, har me les ninna penom kol patslenge an o them Galatia.
46016002	Hako kurko tchiwell hakeno tumendar jaake bud lowe ap i rig, har leske djala. Jaake hunte tchiwenn kol lowe gar khetne ap ko diwes, kai wau me pash tumende.
46016003	Te wom me pash tumende, rodenn tumenge murshen win, kai hi mishto an tumare jaka. Un me bitchrau len kol lowentsa an o foro Jerusalem, un dau len lila peha, hoi dre tchindlo hi, koneske kol lowe hi un konestar.
46016004	Te wals mishto, te djap me ninna koi, palle nai djan le mantsa.
46016005	Miro drom pash tumende djal pral o them Macedonia. Kote atchau gar, wau jaake sik har djala pash tumende.
46016006	Kamau i tsiro pash tumende te atchell. Te djala, ninna pral o wend. Te djau me dureder, palle wals shukar, te wenn tumer mantsa i tikno kotar drom.
46016007	Kau kopo kamau gar te wap pash tumende i tikno tsireske. Me kamoms te atchap i raha tsiro pash tumende, te kamell o Dewel kowa ninna.
46016008	Kate an o foro Efesus atchau, bis te well ko baro diwes, hoi kharella Pfingsta.
46016009	Kate nai budrau me mishto o Debleske, ninna te hi kate bud menshe, kai krenn mange miri budi phares.
46016010	-
46016011	Te well o Timoteo pash tumende, palle len les jaake mishto pre, te well les kek traash. Un te dikell kek ap leste tele! Job budrell ninna o Debleske har me. Te well lo pale pash mande, djan i kotar drom leha! Me un i phrala, kai pash mande hi, atchah kate jaake raha, bis te was lo pash mende pale.
46016012	Bud kope penom me ap maro phraleste Apollo, te well job kol wawar phralentsa pash tumende. Job kamell kowa kanna gar. Te well i mishto tsiro, well lo pash tumende.
46016013	Denn garda, te atchenn an o patsepen! Ma trashenn! Atchenn soreles!
46016014	Lauter, hoi tumer krenna, krenn dran o kamlepen o tselo djijestar!
46016015	Mire phrala, tumer prindjrenn o Stefano un kolla, kai an leskro kheer djiwenna. Jon hi kol patsle, kai glan i tsele wawarende an o them Achaja ap o Jesuseste patsan. Jon budrenna pengri tseli sorjaha i patslenge. Mangau tumen,
46016016	shunenn ap kolende un ap sawende har jon, kai budrenn o Debleske pengri tseli sorjaha!
46016017	Me hom bachtelo, kai was o Stefano, un o Fortunato, un o Achaiko pash mande. Tumer nai wan gar. Doleske hom bachtelo, te nai wan jon pash mande.
46016018	Jon kran miro dji soreles, jaake har jon ninna tumare djia soreles kran. Rikrenn tumen ap sawe menshende!
46016019	I tsele patsle an o them Achaja penenn tumenge latche laba. Ninna kol dui, o Akwila un i Priska, un kol wawar patsle, kai khetne wenna an lengro kheer, penenn bud latche laba ap tumende, kai han lengre phrala un phenja an o patsepen.
46016020	I tsele patsle penenn tumenge latche laba. Penenn tumenge latche laba, un taprenn tumen trujal, un denn tumen i tchum. Koleha sikrenn tumer, te han phrala un phenja an o patsepen.
46016021	Atchenn o Debleha! Kowa tchinau me, o Paulo, miro wasteha.
46016022	Koon o Jesuses, maro rajes, gar kamella, ap koleste well i bibacht! Maranatha!
46016023	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, djal tumentsa!
46016024	Me kamau tumen lauteren o djijestar. Mer ham jek an o Jesus Kristeste.
47001001	Kau liil tchinau me, o Paulo. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro bitchepaskro, jaake har o Dewel kowa kamell. Un me un maro phraal, o Timotheo, mer tchinah kau liil ap i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab an o foro Korint. Kau liil hi ninna i tsele Debleskre tchawenge an o them Achaja.
47001002	Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo!
47001003	Sharas o Debles, o dades maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar. Job hi i latcho dad, un les hi i baro dji menge, un mukell men gar kokres.
47001004	Ninna te well bud pharo koowa ap mende, hi lo pash mende un krell mare djia soreles, te penas mer kolenge latche laba, ap kolende ninna pharo koowa wella, te wenn jon pale soreles, jaake har kras o Dewel mare djia soreles.
47001005	Jaake har well bud pharo koowa ap mende o Jesus Kristeske, jaake dell lo men ninna bud soor an o dji.
47001006	Te well pharo koowa ap mende, well kowa, te wenn tumare djia soreles, un te lenn tumer o Debleskro djipen. Te kras o Dewel mare djia soreles, wenna ninna tumare djia soreles. Un tumer nai rikrenn kol duka win, hoi ap mende ninna hi.
47001007	Tumenge penah: Mer djinah un patsah, te well pharo koowa ap tumende, palle krell o Dewel ninna tumare djia soreles.
47001008	Mire phrala, tumer hunte djinenn, har hams an o them Asia, his maro djipen jaake pharo, te his men buder kek soor un patsam, mer hunte meras.
47001009	Maro merepen his glan mare jaka. Kau pharo koowa was ap mende, te dikas buder gar ap mende, na-a, te dikas ap o Debleste, kai krell i mulen djido.
47001010	Un job mukas men gar te merell, un krell kowa witar gar an ko tsiro, hoi glan mende hi. Awa, ap leste dikah, te lell lo men pale te pale win dran o merepen an ko tsiro, hoi gomme glan mende hi.
47001011	Ninna mangan tumer o Debles menge. Te mangenn bud menshe les menge, palle parkrenn pen ninna bud pash leste, te dikenn le o latchepen, hoi job men das.
47001012	Maro dji penell menge, mer djiwam maro djipen tchatches un djudjes, jaake har o Dewel kamella. Doleske nai sharah men. Mer rakram pral o Debleskro latchepen un penam tchi, hoi wella dran maro menshengro goswepen. Tumer djinenna, jaake djiwam gar kokres mank i wawar menshende, na-a, ninna pash tumende.
47001013	-
47001014	Ninna kowa, hoi tchinah tumenge an mare lila, nai haiwenn tumer jaake, har kowa tchindlo hi. Me patsau, te haiwenn tumer men budeder un feteder, ninna te haiwenn tumer kanna gomme gar lauter. Ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, nai sharenn tumen mentsa, un mer nai sharah men tumentsa.
47001015	Kowa patsau soreles. Dran kowa his an miro dji, te wap dui kope pash tumende, te anap tumenge dui kope o Debleskro latchepen.
47001016	Ap miro drom an o them Macedonia kamom pash tumende te well. Un ninna te djau pale, kamom pash tumende te well. Palle nai dans tumer man kowa, hoi man hunte well djipaske ap o drom an o them Judea.
47001017	Kanna nai penans tumer, me hom i mursh, kai rikrell gar peskro lab, un hom jek har bud wawar, kai penenna Mer krah kowa, un krenn les gar.
47001018	O Dewel djinella: Kowa hoi mer penah, kowa krah ninna.
47001019	O Debleskro tchawo, o Jesus Kristo, kolestar o Silwano, o Timoteo un me tumenge penam, job rikras ninna peskre laba. Lauter hi tchatcho, hoi job penas.
47001020	Lauter, hoi mukas o Dewel glan i raha tsiro menge te penell, kowa kras o Jesus Kristo menge. Dran kowa penah mer Amen, te well o Dewel sharedo.
47001021	O Dewel krell men, ninna tumen lauteren, soreles an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste. Job rodas men peske win,
47001022	un das men peskro Ducho. Ko Ducho, hoi an mende hi, sikrell men, kai ham leskro. Doleske djinah, job dell men gomme bud bareder latcho koowa an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
47001023	Kanna penau tumenge, hoske djom gar pash tumende. Me kamom tumen gar pale te dukrell. Glan o Debleste penau tumenge kawa pash mo djipen.
47001024	Mer kamah te kras tumen bachtelo, un rodah gar koi pal, te was raja pral tumaro patsepen. Na-a, mer djinah: Tumer han soreles an o patsepen tardo.
47002001	Kamom gar, te well tumenge ropaske. Doleske wom buder gar pash tumende.
47002002	Me te krau, te well tumenge ropaske, palle hi mange kek koi, kai krell man pale bachtelo.
47002003	Doleske tchinom tumenge ko liil. Kamom gar, te rowap pral kolende, kai man bachteles hunte krans. Un me patsau soreles, te han tumer bachtele pral kowa, te nai krenna tumer man bachtelo.
47002004	Doleske tchinom tumenge ko liil bud ropaha un traash an miro dji. Kamom gar, te dukrap tumen. Na-a, me kamom, te dikenn tumer, kai kamau tumen o tselo djijestar.
47002005	Tumer djinenn, pash tumende hi jek, kai dukras tumen an o dji. Job dukras gar man. Na-a, job dukras bud tumendar. Me nai penau gar, te dukras job tumen halauteren.
47002006	Tumer dan les i phagi. Un kowa hi doha.
47002007	Kanna hunte bistrenn ko koowa, hoi job kras. Rakrenn latches leha, te well leske gar buder ropaske.
47002008	Me mangau tumen: Sikrenn leste, te kamenn les!
47002009	Ko liil tchinom tumenge ninna, te dikap, har shunenn ap mande an hako koowa.
47002010	Te bistrenn tumer o tchilatchepen, hoi o wawar ap tumende kras, palle bistrau me kowa ninna. Awa, te dals tchomone, hoi hunte bistroms me, palle bistrom me kowa tumenge. Kowa djinell o Jesus Kristo.
47002011	Me kamau gar te taprell men o beng. Mer djinah mishto, hoi koles hi an leskro shero.
47002012	Har wom me an o foro Troas, te penap kote o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, kras o Dewel i menshengre djia pre.
47002013	Miro phraal, o Tito, kamas ninna an kau foro te well. Har was lo gar, was man i daar, un me penom lenge: "Atchenn mo Debleha!" un djom mange an o them Macedonia.
47002014	Me parkrau man pash o Debleste, te dell lo men i soor, te djas ap o Jesuseskro drom. Khetne o Jesuseha ham hako tsiro sorleder har o tchilatchepen. Un kote, kai penah i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesusestar, hi kowa jaake, har te well i latcho sungepen pash bud menshende.
47002015	Te rakrah o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, hi o Dewel bachtelo pral kowa. Kowa hi leske har i shukar sungepen, hoi djal pash kolende, kai len o Debleskro djipen un ninna pash kolende, kai djan nashedo.
47002016	Kolenge, kai djan nashedo, hi kowa har i djungeli khand, hoi anell len an o merepen. Kolenge, kai len o Debleskro djipen, hi kowa i latcho sungepen, hoi anell len an o djipen. Kaja hi i bari budi. Koon nai krell kowa lauter mishto? Kek.
47002017	Bud rakepangre penenn o Debleskro lab, te lenn le i menshenge lowe lendar tele. Jaake ham mer gar. Mer penah o Debleskro lab tchitcheske. Kowa krah o Jesus Kristeske. Mare laba wenna o Deblestar. Un job shunell, hoi rakrah.
47003001	Tumer penans nai: Kanna sharenn le pen pale glan mende. Kowa krah mer gar. Witar gar hunte anas mer tumenge lila, kai dre tardo hi, har mishto mari budi hi. Wawar menshe krenn kowa, mer hunte kras kowa gar. Witar gar kamah tumendar, te tchinenn tumer menge sawe lila.
47003002	Tumer han o feteder liil menge, tchindlo an mare djia. Ap tumende nai dikenn i tsele menshe, har kram mer mari budi.
47003003	Dran mari budi wan tumer pash o Jesus Kristeste. Un kanna han har i liil, hoi wella o Jesus Kristestar. Kau liil tchinas o Ducho o djido Deblestar, un kek mensho. Kau liil was gar tchindlo ap i barra. Na-a. Kau liil was tchindlo an i menshengre djia, an tumare djia.
47003004	Mer patsah soreles, te krell o Dewel sawo liil dran tumende. Kau patsepen das men o Jesus Kristo.
47003005	Dran mari soor nai krams mer mari budi gar mishto. Kai budi krah mer dran o Debleskri soor. Un kowa, hoi haiwah, well o Deblestar.
47003006	Job kras dran mende peskre budepangre, te sikras mer i menshende o newo drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna. Ap o phuro drom hunte rikrenn le pen ap i tchindle laba. Kol phure tchindle laba anenn i menshen an o merepen. Ap o newo drom lenn le o Debleskro Ducho, hoi dell len o djipen.
47003007	Kol phure tchindle laba, hoi anenn i menshen an o merepen, his tchindlo ap i barra. Har anas o Mose i menshenge kol barra, was leskro mui jaake railes, te dikan nai i Israelitarja gar ap leste. Jaake dikah, ninna ap o phuro drom was o Debleskro railepen diklo, ninna te djas ko railepen pal i tikno tsiro krik.
47003008	Kitse shukeder hi o newo drom, kai lenn le o Debleskro Ducho!
47003009	Kau newo drom, kai wenn i menshe tchatcho glan o Debleste, hi bud bud shukeder har ko phuro drom, kai djan i menshe nashedo, ninna te was kote i tikno kotar railepen diklo.
47003010	Tchatchepaha, o railepen ap o newo drom hi bud bud bareder har ko railepen ap o phuro drom.
47003011	Kowa djas krik pal i tikno tsiro. Har bud raileder hi kowa, hoi atchella!
47003012	Mer djinah soreles, te hi kowa jaake. Doleske hi men kek traash, te penas kowa jaake i menshenge.
47003013	Mer krah kowa gar har o Mose: Kowa tchiwas i diklo glan peskro mui, te dikenn kol Israelitarja gar, har leskro railepen krik djas.
47003014	Kolengre djia wan har bar. Ninna kau diwes haiwenn i bibolde gar, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi pral o phuro drom, te shunenn le kol laba an i biboldengre kangria. Kowa hi jaake, har te well i diklo ap lengre jaka tchiddo, te dikenn le gar. O Jesus Kristo kokres nai lell ko diklo lengre jakendar tele.
47003015	Ninna kau diwes hi kowa jaake. Te shunenn le o Moseskre laba, hi ko diklo ap lengre djia, te haiwenn le len gar.
47003016	Ap ko diwes, kai mukenn i Israelitarja pengro drom un djan ap o Jesuseskro drom, lell job ko diklo lendar krik.
47003017	Maro rai Jesus un o Debleskro Ducho hi jek. Te djiwell o Debleskro Ducho an jekeste, hi ko mensho buder gar pandlo, un hunte djal buder gar ap o phuro drom.
47003018	Mer lauter, kai patslo ham, dikah o Debleskro railepen jaake mishto, har te dikah an i dikepaskri. Kek diklo hi ap mare jaka tchiddo. Un har mer dikah ap leste, wah mer bud un budeder jaake, har job hi. Kowa krell o Debleskro Ducho an mende.
47004001	O Debles hi i baro dji menge, un das men kai budi, te sikras i menshende leskro drom. Doleske wah gar khino, te kras kowa.
47004002	Djungelo koowa, hoi krenn i menshe tchorchanes, kowa krah mer gar. Mer chochah kek menshen un penah o Debleskro lab jaake har tchindlo hi, un gar wawartchandes. Jaake djiwah glan o Debleste un rakrah o tchatchepen, te haiwell nai hakeno, kowa, hoi penah, hi tchatcho.
47004003	Hi menshe koi, kai haiwenn gar, har latcho ko lab o Jesus Kristestar hi, hoi mer penah. Jon hi kolla, kai djan nashedo.
47004004	Jon patsenn gar ap leste. O beng, kai o rai hi pral kai phub, kras len korelo, te dikenn le gar, hawo latchepen well dran o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Ko lab sikrell men o Jesuseskro railepen. Un job hi jaake har o Dewel.
47004005	Lestar rakrah mer, un gar mendar. Mer penah i menshenge, o Jesus Kristo hi o rai. Un mer ham leskre budepangre un budrah tumenge.
47004006	An o phuro tsiro, kai his halauter kali rat, penas o Dewel, te well diwes. Un koi was diwes. Jaake kras lo ninna mare djia pre, te atchas gar tamlo an mare djia, te haiwas mer o Debleskro railepen. Kowa dikah, te dikah ap o Jesus Kristeste.
47004007	O latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar hi i baro brawlepen, hoi mer hidjah an mende. Mer kokres ham har tchare, hoi tchi moldo hi, jaake te dikell hakeno, koi bari soor well o Deblestar, un gar mendar.
47004008	Ninna te well haki rigatar pharo koowa ap mende, krell men kowa gar paash. Ninna te djinah bud kope gar, hoi te kras, dah mer gar pre.
47004009	Ninna te lenn le men palla, hi o Dewel pash mende. Ninna te witsrenn le men tele, stah pale pre.
47004010	Jaake har o Jesus hunte meras, merella ninna hako tsiro i kotar mendar. Kowa hi jaake, te well ninna leskro djipen ap mende diklo.
47004011	Hako tsiro ham mer glan o merepen tardo. Te merah, merah o Jesuseske, te well ninna o djipen diklo, hoi o Jesus men della, ninna te meras.
47004012	Jaake hi o merepen an mende, un o djipen an tumende.
47004013	Mer patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste. Doleske rakrah lestar. Jaake krah mer har ko mursh, kai tchinas an o Debleskre gilja: Me patsom o Debles. Doleske rakrom lestar.
47004014	Mer djinah, kowa, kai kras o Jesuses, maro rajes, i mulendar djido, kowa krell men ninna i mulendar djido. Un job anell men khetne tumentsa glan peste.
47004015	Kowa lauter, hoi lah ap mende, krah tumenge. Mer kamah, te well o Debleskro kamlepen pash bud menshende prindjedo, te parkrenn pen bud un budeder pash leste, un sharenn les.
47004016	Doleske wah mer gar khino, ninna te mukell men mari soor. Ko djipen, hoi o Dewel an mende das, well hako diwes pale newes.
47004017	Ko pharo koowa, hoi mer kanna hidjah, hi tikno un djal peske. Pal kowa well i baro railepen. Kowa hi shukeder har halauter, hoi kanna djinah, un djal peske gar.
47004018	Kau railepen hi menge. Mer dikah gar ap kowa, hoi i menshe nai dikenna. Na-a, mer dikah ap kowa, hoi kanna kek nai dikella. Kowa, hoi jon kanna dikenna, hi jek kopo buder gar koi. Kowa, hoi jon gar dikenna, kowa atchella hako tsireske.
47005001	Mer djinah, maro djipen ap kai phub atchell gar. Pal maro merepen lah i newo trupo. Ko newo trupo hi har i kheer, hoi kras o Dewel un kek mensho. Ko kheer atchell hako tsiro an o bolepen.
47005002	Kate ap kai phub hi menge ropaske, un mer kamah o tselo djijestar, te las ko newo bolepaskro trupo ap mende.
47005003	Kowa hi jaake, har te wals i ripen ap mende. Te lah ko newo trupo gar ap mende, palle wams mer nango koi tardo.
47005004	Jaake raha, har djiwah ap kai phub, hi menge ropaske un hi men duka. Mer kamah ko phuro trupo gar tele te tchiwell, kamah budeder ko newo trupo an-riwell, hoi buder gar merella.
47005005	O Dewel das men gole, te las ko newo djipen an o bolepen, un job das men peskro Ducho, te djinas, kowa well jaake.
47005006	Doleske atchell maro dji sorelo. Mer djinah: Jaake raha, har djiwah ap i phub, ham gar khere pash maro rajeste, o Jesuseste.
47005007	Mer djiwah dran o patsepen, un djiwah gomme gar an ko tsiro, kai dikah les.
47005008	Tchatchepaha, maro dji hi sorelo, un mer kamams, te mukas i phub, te was khere pash o Debleste.
47005009	Doleske kamah lauter te krell, te well job bachtelo pral mende kate ap kai phub, un ninna kote pash leste.
47005010	Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Jesus Kristo o tchatchepen pral mende win, hunte was mer halauter glan leste tardo. Un hakeno lell pal kowa, hoi job kras, har djiwas lo ap i phub: latcho koowa har tchilatcho koowa.
47005011	Mer djinah, har trashas maro rajestar. Doleske rakrah i menshenge an o dji, te patsenn le ap leste. O Dewel djinell, te djah mer o tchatcho drom. Kamoms, te djinenn an tumare djia kowa ninna.
47005012	Kowa penah gar, te sharas mer men pash tumende. Na-a, kowa penah, te nai sharenn tumen mentsa. Jaake djinenn tumer, hoi te penenn nai kol menshenge, kai dikenn ap kowa, hoi pash i menshende bud moldo hi. I djudjo dji hi lenge tchi moldo.
47005013	Te penell jek, mer ham narwelo, -mishto. Te ham narwelo, ham kowa o Debleske. Te ham gar narwelo un rakrah jaake, te haiwenn le men, palle hi kowa mishto tumenge.
47005014	O baro kamlepen, hoi o Jesus Kristo men das, bitchrell men pash i menshende. Un mer djinah, te meras jek menge, hi kowa jaake, har te merans le lauter.
47005015	O Jesus meras halauterenge. Un kanna hunte djiwenn kolla, kai lan leskro djipen, buder gar penge kokres. Na-a, jon hunte djiwenn koleske, kai meras lenge, un was o Deblestar djido kerdo.
