47005016	Doleske dikah kanna buder gar jaake ap i mensheste har an o tsiro, har hams gomme gar patslo. Ninna prindjrah mer o Jesus Kristes kanna wawartchandes har an ko tsiro, har djiwas lo ap i phub.
47005017	Kanna djinah: Koon o Jesus Kristeha djiwella, kowa hi i newo mensho, un djiwell buder gar peskro phuro djipen. I newo koowa was an leskro djipen.
47005018	Kowa lauter well o Deblestar. Job bitchras o Jesus Kristes menge an o merepen, te lell lo kowa krik, hoi his tardo mank mende un o Debleste, te nai was mer kanna pash leste. Un mende das lo koi budi, te penas i menshenge, te nai wenn le pash leste.
47005019	O Dewel his an peskro tchaweste, o Jesus Kristeste, un kras, te nai wenn i menshe leha khetne. Lengri doosh las lo lendar krik. Jaake was kowa krik lino, hoi his mank lende un o Debleste tardo. Mende das lo kai budi, te penas kal latche laba i menshenge.
47005020	Jaake ham mer o Debleskre bitchepangre. Men hi o Jesus Kristeskro tchatcho wast. Doleske mangah i menshendar, te wenn le pash leste. Un kowa hi jaake, har te dell len o Jesus Kristo gole: "Awenn pash o Debleste! Awenn leskre mala!"
47005021	O Dewel tchiwas mari tseli doosh ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste, kai job kek tchilatchepen kras, te was mer tchatcho un erligo glan o Debleskre jaka.
47006001	Mer ham o Debleskre budepangre. Doleske penah tumenge: Ma witsrenn gar o Debleskro latchepen an i tchik!
47006002	O Dewel penell an peskro lab: "Ap o tchatcho tsiro shunau tut, ap ko diwes lau tut dran o tchilatchepen win un dau tut o newo djipen." Shunenn, kanna hi o tchatcho tsiro kai! Kanna lell lo tumen dran o tchilatchepen win!
47006003	Kowa hi ap miro dji, te djiwas jaake, te hatsell kek i doosh ap mende, te rakrell nai kek djungeles pral mari budi.
47006004	Mer kamah, te dikenn le hako tsiro ap mende, kai ham o Debleskre budepangre. Doleske dah gar pre, ninna te well bud pharo koowa ap mende. Ninna te hi men gar doha djipaske, te well i daar ap mende, rikrah win.
47006005	Ninna te denn le men dawa, te witsrenn le men an o stilepen, te lenn le men palla, dah mer gar pre. Mer marah men tele, un della diwessa, kai sowah gar un chah gar.
47006006	Maro djipen sikrella, te ham o Debleskre budepangre. Mer djiwah i djudjo djipen un djinah, hoi o Dewel kamella. Mer wah gar khino an mare djia, ham kamlo, un krah, hoi o Debleskro Ducho menge penella. Un an maro kamlepen hi kek chochepen.
47006007	Mer penah i menshenge o Debleskro tchatchepen un rakrah dran leskri soor. Kowa, hoi krah un rakrah, hi tchatcho. Jaake hi maro djipen un maro rakepen har i charo, koleha i kurepaskro kurell pes peskro rajeske.
47006008	Hi menshe koi, kai sharenn men, un wawar, kai praassenn men. Hi menshe, kai rakrenn djungeles pral mende, un wawar, kai rakrenn kamles pral mende. Ko jek penell: "Chochene!" ap mende, kol wawar djinenn, mer penah o tchatchepen.
47006009	Pash jekeste ham prindjedo, pash i wawarende ham gar prindjedo. Ninna te hi o merepen glan mare jaka, ham gomme djido. Mer lam dawa un meram gar.
47006010	Menge hi ropaske, un mer nai sah. Mer ham tchorwelo, un krah i wawaren brawelo. Men hi tchi ap kai phub, un lauter hi menge.
47006011	Mire phrala an o foro Korint, mer penam tumenge lauter jaake, har kowa hi. Mer kram mare djia dur pre tumenge.
47006012	Maro kamlepen tumenge hi gar tikno. Tumaro kamlepen menge was tikno.
47006013	Me rakrau tumentsa har i dad peskre tchawentsa. Krenn tumer ninna tumare djia menge pre!
47006014	Ma tchiwenn tumen khetne kolentsa, kai patsenn gar ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kolla, kai djiwenn an o tchatchepen un kolla, kai djiwenn gar an o tchatchepen, nai djiwenn gar khetne. O diwes un i rati nai wenn gar khetne. Jaake nai well o latchepen un o tchilatchepen witar gar khetne.
47006015	Hoi hi o Jesus Kristes i bengeha khetne? Tchi! Nai wenn i patslen jek dji un jek djipen kolentsa, kai patsenn gar? Na-a!
47006016	An o Debleskro baro kheer well o djido Dewel kokres sharedo un kek wawar koowa. Mer halauter ham o djido Debleskro baro kheer. O Dewel penas: Me kamau te djiwap pash lende un mashkral lende. Me kamau lengro Dewel te well, un jon hi mire menshe.
47006017	Doleske penell o Dewel: Djan kolendar krik, kai sharenn wawar koowa! Ma awenn lentsa khetne! Lenn tchi an tumare wasta, hoi hi pale-tchiddo glan mire jaka! Palle lau tumen kamles pash mande pre.
47006018	Un me kamau tumaro dad te well, un tumer han mire tchawe un mire tcha. Kowa penell o baro Dewel, kai hi o rai pral o bolepen un i phub.
47007001	Mire phrala, kol latche labentsa penas o Dewel, hoi kamell lo menge te krell. Doleske mukas mer kol tselo djungelo koowa, un kras mare djia djudjo, te djiwas latches un tchatches glan o Debleste, jaake har job mendar kamella.
47007002	Krenn tumare djia menge pre! Mer kram kekes i tchilatcho koowa un dukram kekes, un chocham kek menshes.
47007003	Me penau kowa gar, te anap i doosh ap tumende. Na-a, me penom tumenge, men hi i baro dji tumenge. Mer ham tumentsa khetne an o djipen un an o merepen.
47007004	Me patsau ap tumende. Un me sharau man tumentsa. Ninna te well bud pharo koowa ap mende, hi miro dji sorelo un man hi i bari bacht an mande pral tumende.
47007005	Har wam an o them Macedonia, was haki rigatar pharo koowa ap mende. His menshe koi, kai tchingran pen mentsa. Un men his i bari daar. Jaake lam kek newi soor.
47007006	Kolen buder kek soor hi, kolen dell o Dewel newi soor. Un job das men newi soor an o dji, har was o Tito pash mende.
47007007	Gar kokres, kai job was, kras men sorelo. Na-a, mer lam budeder soor, har shunam, hawe latche laba tumer leske penan. Job penas menge, te kamenn tumer man o tselo djijestar pale te dikell. Job penas ninna, har tumer rowan un lauter krenn, te wenn mange ap i rig. Har shunom kowa lauter, wom gomme bachtleder.
47007008	Tumenge his ropaske pral ko liil, hoi tumenge tchinom. Kowa khaitas man. Kanna khaitell man gar, te tchinom o liil, ninna te his tumenge i tikno tsiro ropaske pral ko liil.
47007009	Kanna hom bachtelo, gar pral kowa, kai his tumenge ropaske. Na-a, hom bachtelo, te anas tumen koi duk pral ko tchilatcho koowa pale ap o tchatcho drom. Har his tumenge ropaske pral tumari doosh, dikas o Dewel latches ap tumende. Doleske his ko liil, hoi tchinom, tumenge mishto.
47007010	Te hi jekes ropaske pral peskri doosh, un o Dewel dikell latches ap leste, anell les kowa ap o Debleskro drom, un o Dewel dell les o djipen. Un kowa khaitell kekes. Te hi jekes ropaske pral i phubjakro koowa anell les kowa an o merepen.
47007011	Tumenge his ropaske pral ko koowa, hoi mank tumende djas, un o Dewel dikas latches ap tumende. Kanna dikenn, hawo latcho koowa dran kowa was: Tumer kamenn lauter mishto te krell, un kamenn te sikrell, te hi tumen kek doosh. Tumer wan chojedo pral koleste, kai ko koowa kras. Un tumen his daar miri choljatar. O tselo djijestar kaman tumer kowa te krell, hoi mishto hi an mire jaka. Doleske dan tumer koles i phagi, kai doosh ap leste his. Jaake sikran, kai his tumen kek doosh pral ko koowa.
47007012	Tchatchepaha, har tchinom tumenge ko liil, krom kowa gar koleske, kai kras ko tchilatcho koowa. Witar gar tchinom ko liil koleske, ap koleste ko wawar o tchilatcho koowa kras. Na-a, me tchinom ko liil, te sikrenn tumer o Debleste, kai kamenn tumer lauter te krell, hoi me tumenge penom.
47007013	Un kowa kran tumer. Un doleske was newi soor an mare djia. Awa, mare djia wan pale soreles un mari bacht was gomme bareder, har dikam, har bachtelo o Tito his, har was lo tumendar pale. Tumer lauter kran leskro dji soreles.
47007014	O Tito dikas ko latcho koowa, hoi leske tumendar penom, kowa his kek chochepen. Jaake har lauter tchatcho hi, hoi tumentsa rakram, jaake hi ninna ko tselo latchepen tchatcho, hoi leske penom tumendar.
47007015	Kanna hi leskro kamlepen gomme bareder tumenge. Job dikas tumari traash har tumer les pre lan, ninna dikas lo, kai kran tumer lauter, hoi me tumenge penom.
47007016	Me hom bachtelo, te krenn tumer lauter, hoi me tumenge penom.
47008001	Mire phrala, mer kamah tumenge te penell, hawo latchepen o Dewel kote kras, kai i patsle an o them Macedonia khetne wenna.
47008002	Ninna te was bud pharo koowa ap lende, his le bachtelo an pengre djia. Lengri bacht his jaake baro, te dan le bud lowe i wawar patslenge, ninna te djiwan le an baro tchorwlepen.
47008003	Kowa hi tchatcho, hoi penau: Jon dan jaake bud har djala, ninna budeder. Kowa kran jon pendar o tselo djijestar.
47008004	Jon mangan men o tselo djijeha, te mukas mer len latcho koowa te krell i patslenge an o foro Jerusalem.
47008005	Kowa, hoi jon kran, his budeder har mer patsam. Jon tchiwan pen an o wast o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, un pal kowa an mare wasta, jaake har o Dewel kowa kamas.
47008006	Har kowa dikam, mangam mer maro phrales, o Tites, te djal lo pale pash tumende, te lell lo kol lowe, hoi tumer khetne tchiwan, jaake har job kowa ninna glan i tsiro kras. Jaake well kai latchi budi kanna lauter kerdo.
47008007	Tumer han brawelo an hako koowa: tumaro patsepen hi baro; tumer haiwenn har te penenn o Debleskro lab un djinenn bud pral o Debleste; tumer krenn i bari budi o Debleske. Un o kamlepen, hoi ap mende dikan, was ninna bares an tumende. Doleske kamah, te sikrenn tumaro baro dji ninna an kau koowa un tchiwenn jaake bud lowe khetne har djala i wawar patslenge.
47008008	Kowa mangau tumen. Me penau gar, te hunte krenn les. Te dikau, hawo latcho koowa i wawar patsle an o them Macedonia kran, jaake kamau te dikap, te well tumaro kamlepen dran o dji.
47008009	Tumer djinenn, har latcho maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, ap tumende his. Job his brawelo, un was tumenge tchorwelo. Kowa was lo, te wenn tumer brawelo.
47008010	Me patsau, kowa hi mishto tumenge, te tchiwenn tumer lowe pale khetne, jaake har kran kowa glan jek bersh.
47008011	Kanna krenn pale, hoi tumenge an o shero his, un denn jaake bud lowe har nai denna.
47008012	Te dell jek o djijestar jaake bud har nai dell lo, dikell o Dewel latches ap leste. Job kamell gar, te dell lo budeder, har les hi.
47008013	Tumer hunte denn gar jaake bud, te djiwenn i wawar i shukar djipen un tumer bokenna. Na-a, lauteren te well doha djipaske!
47008014	Kau diwes hi tumen bud, un tumer nai denna kol wawaren tchomone. I wawar kopo, kai hi kolen budeder, nai denn jon tumen tchomone. Jaake hi lauteren doha.
47008015	Kowa hi jaake har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Koon bud ap i rig tchiwas, koles his gar budeder, har les hunte was chapaske. Un koon gar bud ap i rig tchiwas, koles his doha chapaske.
47008016	Me parkrau man pash o Debleste, te das job maro phrales, o Tites, i baro dji tumenge.
47008017	Har mangam o Titestar te djal lo pash tumende, kamas lo kowa o tselo djijestar te krell, un was pestar pash tumende.
47008018	Khetne leha bitchram i wawar phrales. Kowa haiwell mishto o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar te penell. Dran kowa hi lo an-diklo an hake gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna.
47008019	Un kowa hi gar lauter! I patsle rodan les win, te djal lo mentsa khetne ap maro drom pash kol patslende, kolen mer kol lowe anah. Kowa krah, te well o Dewel sharedo, un te dikenn kol patsle kote maro kamlepen, hoi men lenge hi.
47008020	Te djal ko phraal mentsa, nai rakrell kek djungeles pral mende, har nai wals kowa, te anams kol bud lowe kokres.
47008021	Mer dikas, te well lauter tchatches kerdo, gar kokres glan o Debleste, ninna glan i menshende.
47008022	Khetne kol dujentsa bitchram i wawar phrales pash tumende. Kowa sikras bud kope, har mishto job o Debleskri budi kras. Kanna kamas lo o tselo djijestar pash tumende te djal. Jaake bud rikrell job tumendar.
47008023	O Tito hi miro maal un budrell mantsa tumenge. Kol wawar phrala wan kol patslendar bitchedo, kai an wawar gaba un forja khetne wenna. Kal dui phrala hi mursha, kai krenn o Debleske kek ladj, na-a, jon budrenn jaake, te well o Jesus Kristo sharedo.
47008024	Lenn len pre an o tselo kamlepen, te dikenn i tsele patsle, kai khetne wenna, kai mer sharam tumen gar tchitcheske glan lende.
47009001	Pral ko latchepen, hoi mer hunte kras i patslenge, hunte tchinap tumenge gar.
47009002	Me djinau, tumer kamenn o tselo djijestar kol patslenge an o foro Jerusalem lowe khetne te tchiwell. Dran kowa sharom tumen pash kolende an o them Macedonia un penom: "Glan jek bersh lan kol phrala an o them Achaja lowe khetne." Har jon kowa shunan, kaman bud lendar jaake te krell, har tumer kran.
47009003	Kanna bitchrau mare phralen pash tumende, te well tchatcho, hoi tumendar sharom an kau koowa, un te well lauter jaake kerdo, har tumendar penom.
47009004	Palle, ap ko diwes, kai wenn kolla dran o them Macedonia mantsa khetne pash tumende, hatsenn le lauter jaake har penom. Te hatsans le kowa gar jaake, hawi ladj wals kowa mange un tumenge ninna!
47009005	Doleske mangom kol phralen, te djan jon glan mende, un lenn kol lowe, hoi tumer khetne tchiwan. Jaake hunte tchiwenn tumer gar kol lowe sik khetne ap ko diwes, kai mer wah. Un kol lowe, hoi tumer denn, well o djijestar, un gar dran o boklepen.
47009006	Kowa hi jaake har pash i hacho: Koon tchiwell gar bud djob an i phub, kowa lell witar gar bud dran i phub win. Un koon tchiwell bud an i phub, kowa lell bud dran i phub win.
47009007	Hakeno hunte dell jaake bud lowe, har leskro dji leske penella. Les hunte khaitell kowa gar, hoi job das! Job dell kowa pestar un gar, har te kaman le les lestar. O Dewel kamell kol menshen, kai denn o djijestar.
47009008	O Dewel nai dell tumen jaake bud, kai hi tumen hako tsiro doha halauterestar, jaake te nai denn tumer i wawaren tchomone.
47009009	Palle rakrenn le tumendar, har an o Debleskro lab tardo hi: Job das bud i tchorwelende. Ko latchepen, hoi job kras, atchella hako tsiro.
47009010	O Dewel, kai dell o haches i djob, ninna o maro chapaske, kowa dell tumen ninna, un krell budeder dran kowa, hoi tumen hi, jaake te well bud latchepen dran kowa, hoi tumer krenna.
47009011	Job dell tumen jaake bud, te nai denn ninna kolen, kai len tchi hi. Te lenn jon kowa, hoi mer anah lenge, palle parkrenn pen bud menshe pash o Debleste.
47009012	Kowa, hoi kran tumer i tchorwele patslenge, hi lenge mishto. Un kowa hi gar lauter. Jon parkrenn pen pash o Debleste. Te parkrenn pen bud menshe pash o Debleste, hi kowa ninna bud moldo.
47009013	Koleske, hoi tumer lenge latches kran, sharenn le o Debles. Jon dikenn, kai shunenn tumer ap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un kai hi jon, ninna i tsele wawar patsle, tumenge phrala un phenja.
47009014	Te dikenn le, har baro o Debleskro latchepen mank tumende hi, mangenn le o Debles tumenge un kamenn tumentsa khetne te well.
47009015	Parkras men pash o Debleste! Job das men peskro baro kamlepen, kai hi jaake baro, te nai rakrah les gar win.
47010001	Me, o Paulo, rakrau tumentsa kamles un latches, jaake har o Jesus Kristo kamles un latches hi. Hi menshe mank tumende, kai penenna: "Me te hom pash tumende, nai rakrau kek triin laba. Te hom dur tumendar krik, palle rakrau sorele labentsa."
47010002	Me mangau tumen: Ma krenn, te sikrap tumen, har sorelo hom, te wau pash tumende! Man hi kek daar te rakrap soreles kolentsa, kai penenn mendar, te krams mer o Debleskri budi dran mari soor.
47010003	Ninna te ham menshe, krah gar o Debleskri budi dran mari soor.
47010004	An maro budi o Debleske lah mer kek charo an o wast, har i menshe ap kai phub krenna. Na-a, o Dewel dell men i soor, te nai rakras jaake kol menshentsa, kai chocheno koowa pral leste patsenna, te dikenn le, kai kowa, hoi jon jaake raha patsan, tchi moldo hi.
47010005	Te penenn jon, te dals kek Dewel, sikrah mer, kai lengre pre-phurde laba gar tchatcho hi. Halauter, hoi lenge an o shero trujal djal un hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste pre, dah mer paash.
47010006	Te dikah mer, kai tumer shunenn mishto ap lauter, hoi mer tumenge penam, palle rikrah men gar pale, te das lauter kolen i phagi, kai kamenn gar te shunell.
47010007	Haiwenn, har kowa hi! Jek, kai penell: O Jesus Kristo hi leskro rai, kowa hunte dikell ninna, te hi o Jesus Kristo ninna miro rai.
47010008	Me nai penoms gomme budeder mandar, te das man maro rai Jesus peskro tchatcho wast. Te penoms me kowa, wals kowa tchatcho. Job das man peskro tchatcho wast, te krap tumen soreles an o patsepen, gar te krap tumen paash.
47010009	Kowa penau tumenge, te dikenn tumer: Me kamom tumenge kek traash te krell mire lilentsa.
47010010	Hi menshe mank tumende, kai penenna: An peskre lila rakrell job bare laba, un hi sorelo. Te hi job pash mende, hi job tikno, un an leskro rakepen hi kek soor.
47010011	Koon jaake rakrella, koleske penau me: Har mer an mare lila ham, kai ham dur krik tumendar, jaake ham mer ninna, te wam pash tumende.
47010012	Mer krah men gar jaake bares, te penas, mer ham har kolla, kai penenn pendar, har mishto jon hi. Jon krenn pengro tchatchepen kokres win un patsenn, kowa, hoi jon krenna, hi mishto. Doleske haiwenn jon tchi.
47010013	Mer kamah men gar jaake bud sharell. Kokres pral koi budi, hoi das men o Dewel, sharah mer men. Un mari budi anas men pash tumende.
47010014	Te wams gar pash tumende, palle wals maro sharepen gar tchatcho. Kanna hi wawartchandes: Mer wam tchatchepaha pash tumende un penam tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
47010015	Jaake nai sharah men mer pral i budi, hoi mer kram, un gar pral kowa, hoi i wawar kran. An maro dji djinah, ap ko tsiro, kai was o patsepen an tumende baro, sharenn le men ninna pral kowa, hoi mer mank tumende kram.
47010016	Mer kamah te penas o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar ninna kolenge, kai djiwenn an wawar themma, un gar kote, kai rakran i wawar o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Mer kamah men gar te sharell pral kowa, hoi i wawar kran.
47010017	Koon kamell pes te sharell, kowa hunte sharell kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo kras.
47010018	Kowa mensho kras peskri budi mishto, kones maro rai Jesus sharell. Un gar kowa kras peskri budi mishto, kai pes kokres sharell.
47011001	Mukenn man jek kopo jaake te rakrap, har te woms dinelo! Shunenn, hoi kamau tumenge te penell!
47011002	Jaake har o Dewel kamell, kamau me ninna o tselo djijestar, te djan tumer gar o Jesus Kristestar krik. Tumer han mange har i tchai, kai dom jek mursheste, te well li leskri pirni. Ko jek mursh hi o Jesus Kristo. Kamau te anap leske i djudji tarni djuwel ap ko diwes, kai romedinerell lo lat.
47011003	Me darau, te was wawar koowa an tumaro shero, un tumer djiwenn buder gar djudjes un kokres o Jesus Kristeske. Me darau, te djas tumenge har i Evake, har o gosewo sap chochas lat, un joi mukas o tchatcho drom.
47011004	Hi jaake: Te well jek pash tumende un sikrell tumen i wawar drom, har ko drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, palle nashenn tumer leske palla. Te rakrell lo pral i wawar Jesus un i wawar Debleskro Ducho, har kowa, hoi an tumende was, palle shunenn tumer mishto ap ko chocheno mursheste.
47011005	Me djinau, me molau ninna jaake bud har kol bare rakepangre pash tumende, kai penenn, te hi le bitchedo o Jesus Kristestar.
47011006	Ninna te nai rakrau gar jaake mishto har kol wawar, djinau ninna jaake bud har jon. Kowa nai dikan tumer hako kopo, kai rakrom, un an hako koowa, hoi krom.
47011007	Krom man me baro, har lom kek lowe tumendar, har penom tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab? Lom me doleske i doosh ap mande? Na-a, me krom tumen baro.
47011008	Kote, kai wawar patsle khetne wenna, lom lowe lendar un djiwom dran lengri possita, te nai budrom pash tumende.
47011009	Har me pash tumende homs, un mange his gar doha djipaske, mangom kekestar tumendar tchomone. I patsle phrala, kai wan dran o them Macedonia, anan mange jaake bud, te nai djiwom pash tumende. Jaake perom kekeske tumendar ap i possita. Un jaake kamau kowa ninna te krell an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
47011010	An kau koowa sharenn man i menshe. Un pash o Jesus Kristeskro tchatchepen, hoi an mande hi, penau tumenge: Kek mensho an ko tselo them Achaja lell kau sharepen mandar krik!
47011011	Hoske penau me kowa jaake? Hi man kek kamlepen tumenge? O Dewel djinella, kai kamau tumen o djijestar.
47011012	Te lau tchi tumendar an ko tsiro hoi wella, palle doleske, te wap gar har kolla, kai lenn tumendar lowe. Kamau gar, te nai sharenn le pen un penenn: Jon hi jaake har mer.
47011013	Tchatchepaha, jon wan gar o Jesus Kristestar bitchedo. Jon hi chochene, un krenn, har te bitchrals len o Jesus Kristo.
47011014	Pral kolende hunte krenn tumer kek bare jaka. Ninna o beng krell jaake, har te wals job o Debleskro bolepaskro.
47011015	Doleske hunte kras mer kek bare jaka, te krenn ninna leskre budepangre har te wans jon o Debleskre budepangre. Jon len pengri phagi o Deblestar.
47011016	Me penau pale: Kamau gar, te penell jek, me hom dinelo. Un ninna te patsenn tumer, te hom dinelo, palle mangau tumen: Lenn man pre har i dineles, te sharap man me nai ninna i tikno kotar!
47011017	Me te sharau man kanna, palle wenn mire laba gar maro rajestar, o Jesusestar. Na-a, me rakrau kanna jaake, har te woms me dinelo.
47011018	Bud menshe hi koi, kai sharenn pen pral kowa, hoi jon krenna. Doleske kamau me kowa kanna ninna te krell.
47011019	Tumer patsenn, te han gosewo, un nashenn hako dineleske palla!
47011020	Te hadell jek pes pral tumende, krenn tumer, hoi job penell. Te kamell job tumare lowe te lell, un kamell tumen ap peste te pandell, un ninna job te dukrell tumen, un dell tumen an o mui, mukenn tumer kowa tumentsa te krell.
47011021	Me ladjau man te penap: Kowa nai anoms me gar pral o dji! Kanna rakrau tchatchepaha har i dinelo: Te patsell jek, te nai krell lo pes baro, palle nai krau man me ninna baro.
47011022	Jon hi Hebrearja. Me hom ninna jek. Jon hi bibolde. Me hom ninna jek. Jon wenna pal o Abraham. Me ninna.
47011023	Jon penenn, te hi le o Jesus Kristeskre budepangre. Kanna rakrau har i dinelo: Me hom budeder har jon leskro budepaskro. Me budrom budeder. Me wom budeder stildo. Me lom budeder dawa. Man his budeder o merepen glan i jaka har jon.
47011024	I biboldendar lom me pantch kope triin-deesh-te-enja (39) dawa i tchupnijaha.
47011025	Triin kope lom dawa i kashteha. Jek kopo witsran le barentsa ap mande, te denn le man mulo. Triin kope djas o panjeskro ulepaskro tele, ap hoi me homs, un jek diwes un jek rati homs ap i kasht tchiddo an o baro pani.
47011026	Ap miro drom an bud wawar forja un themma his bud kope o merepen glan mire jaka. Me nai tassoms an i diwje panja, un kol tchorepangre nai dans man mulo. Un i bibolde, un ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, kolla lan man palla. An o mulo them un an o baro pani, kai homs, his o merepen glan mire jaka, un ninna, har homs mank kol phralende, kai hi kek tchatche phrala.
47011027	Me marom man tele un man his bud budi. Bud kope sowom gar. Man his trush un bok. Bud kope chom tchi. Mange his shila un man his tchi an-ripaske.
47011028	Me nai penoms gomme budeder: Hako diwes well newo koowa ap mande. Un miro dji dukella, te djinau gar, har kowa kote hi, kai i patsle khetne wenna.
47011029	Te hi jek gar sorelo, hom me witar gar sorelo. Te perell jek o Debleskro dromestar tele, hi man bari duk an o dji.
47011030	Me te sharap man, palle kamau te sharap man koleha, te hom gar sorelo.
47011031	O Dewel, ko dad o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, djinella, kai penau o tchatchepen. Les sharas mer hako tsiro.
47011032	An ko tsiro, har me an o foro Damaskus homs, his kote i moskero, koles tchiwas o baro rai Aretas an peskri budi. Ko moskero tchiwas klisten glan ko foro pash kol bare wudja, te taprenn le man.
47011033	Trul o foro his i bari barengri baar. Un i patsle tchiwan man an i korba un mukan man dran i wochni, hoi an koi barengri baar dren hi, tele ap i phub. Jaake nai tapran jon man gar.
47012001	Tumer kamenn, te sharap man, ninna te molell kowa tchi. Jaake kamau te rakrap pral o bolepaskro koowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo i menshes mukell te dikell.
47012002	Me prindjrau i menshes, kai djiwell o Jesus Kristeha. Kowa was glan deesh-te-star bersha an o triinto bolepen dre anlo. His lo tchatchepaha koi pral? Me djinau les gar. Dikas lo kowa an i suni? Me djinau les gar. Kowa djinell o Dewel kokres.
47012003	-
47012004	Me djinau, ko mensho was hadedo an o Debleskri shukar baar, un shunas sawe shukar laba, hoi nai penell kek mensho. His lo tchatchepaha koi pral? Me djinau les gar. Dikas lo kowa an i suni. Me djinau les gar. O Dewel djinell kowa.
47012005	Ko menshes sharau me. Me sharau man gar. Te sharau man, sharau kowa, hoi sikrella, kai hi man kek soor.
47012006	Ninna te sharoms me man, rakroms kek dinelo koowa. Kowa, hoi penoms, wals o tchatchepen. Kamau gar, te rikrenn i menshe budeder mandar har kowa, hoi dikenn le un shunenn le mandar. Doleske sharau me man gar.
47012007	O Dewel kamella, te wap gar pre-phurdo pral ko baro bolepaskro koowa, hoi mukas lo man te dikell. Doleske mukas o Dewel tchomone ap mande te well, hoi dukrell man har i subjengro kasht an miro mass. Kowa hi har te dals man i bengeskro kurepaskro dawa, te wap gar pre-phurdo.
47012008	Triin kope mangom me o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, te well kowa mandar krik lino.
47012009	Un job penas ap mande: "Muk tuke miro latchepen doha te well! Miri soor hi bari an kolende, kai gar sorelo hi." Un me, o Paulo, penau tumenge: Doleske kamau man me te sharell, kai hi man kek soor. Jaake nai dikell hakeno, o Jesus Kristo peskri sorjaha hi pash mande.
47012010	Doleske hom gar bibachtelo, te hi man kek soor, te lau dawa, te well pharo koowa ap mande, te lenn jon man palla, te well i traash ap mande. Me djinau, te hi man kek soor, palle dell man o Jesus Kristo soor.
47012011	Tumer kran, te rakrom har i dinelo. Me hunte sharoms man gar. Na-a, tumer hunte sharans man. Ninna te woms me tchi, woms me jaake bud moldo har kol bare rakepangre pash tumende, kai penenn, te hi le bitchedo o Jesus Kristestar.
47012012	Har homs pash tumende, nai dikan tumer, kai o Jesus Kristo bitchras man. Me budrom mank tumende, un dom gar pre. Me krom baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, jaake te kran i menshe bare jaka.
47012013	Me krom tumenge jaake bud, har krom ninna i wawar patslenge, kai an wawar forja khetne wenna. Jek koowa hi wawartchandes: Tumendar lom kek lowe. Te his kowa i doosh, mangau tumendar, bistrenn koi doosh!
47012014	Me wau kanna o triinto kopo pash tumende. Ninna kau kopo kamau tchi tumendar te lell. Me kamau tumen un gar tumare lowe. O dad un i dai denn pengre tchawen te chal, un gar i tchawe pengro dades un pengri dat.
47012015	Tumenge doms me lauter, hoi man hi, ninna miro djipen. Miro dji hi baro tumenge. Hi tumen doleske kek kamlepen mange?
47012016	Tumer djinenna, me djiwom gar dran tumari possita. Kanna penenn mange: Taprom tumen un chochom tumen? Na-a!
47012017	Kolla, kai pash tumende bitchrom, tchoran kolla tumare lowe? Na-a!
47012018	Me mangom o Tites, te djal lo pash tumende, un bitchrom i wawar phrales leha. Nai penenn tumer, kai o Tito tumendar tchomone tchoras? Na-a! O Tites hi o emligo baro dji tumenge har man. Mer dui djah ninna ko emligo drom.
47012019	Patsenn tumer, te rodah mer maro tchatchepen glan tumende? Kowa hi gar jaake. Mer djiwah o Jesus Kristeha un djinah, o Dewel shunell, hoi mer rakrah. Mire phrala un phenja, mer rakrah jaake, te well tumaro patsepen soreles.
47012020	Me trashau, te wau pash tumende, dikau sawo koowa pash tumende, hoi kamau gar. Palle hom me witar gar jaake har tumer kamenna. Me trashau te dikau tchingepen mank tumende, ninna silwepen, choli, praassepen, djungelo rakepen pral o wawareste, pre-phurdepen, bi-pandlo djipen, un jek kamell feteder te well har o wawar.
47012021	Me trashau te ladjap man tumenge glan o Debleste ap ko diwes, kai wau pale pash tumende, un te well mange ropaske pral budende, kai kamenn pengro phuro djipen gar pre te dell, un djiwenn an djungelo un wi-ladjedo koowa un luberenn trujal jaake har kran le an ko tsiro, har jon gomme gar patslo his.
47013001	Kowa hi o triinto kopo, kai wau pash tumende. Ma bistrenn, hoi tchindlo hi: Te kamell jek i doosh ap i wawareste pre te tchiwell, hunte wenn dui, triin koi pashal, kai penenn win, hoi jon djinenna.
47013002	Te wau kau kopo, rikrau man gar pale, te dap kolen i phagi, kai kran tchilatcho koowa. Kowa penom, har homs o duito kopo pash tumende, un kanna, kai hom dur tumendar krik, penau les pale tumenge.
47013003	Palle dikenn tumer mishto, te was miro rakepen o Jesus Kristestar. Job hi sorelo pash tumende, un sikrell tumen peskri bari soor.
47013004	Har job ap o trushel dino was, his job gar sorelo. Kanna djiwell job dran o Debleskri soor. Jaake har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel gar sorelo his, ham mer witar gar sorelo. Un jaake har job djido was, ham mer leha ninna djido un sorelo dran o Debleskri soor. Kowa nai dikenn, te hom pash tumende!
47013005	Dikenn ap tumende, har tumer an o patsepen tardo han! Hi tumaro patsepen tchatcho? Djiwell o Jesus Kristo mank tumende? Te haiwenn tumer gar, te hi lo mank tumende, palle hi tumaro patsepen tchi moldo.
47013006	Me kamoms, te dikenn tumer, kai mari budi o Debleske mishto hi.
47013007	Mer mangah o Deblestar, te krenn tumer kek tchilatcho koowa. Kowa mangah lestar gar, te sikras, har mishto mari budi kram. Na-a, mer kamah, te krenn tumer o latchepen, ninna te well mendar penlo, kai mari budi tchi moldo hi.
47013008	Mer nai krah kokres sawo koowa, hoi krell, te well o Debleskro tchatchepen diklo un shunlo. Un mer nai krah tchi, hoi rikrell o tchatchepen pale.
47013009	Ninna te ham mer gar sorelo, ham bachtelo, te han tumer sorelo. Mer kamah, te wenn tumer an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste tardo, un kowa mangah lestar.
47013010	Kawa tchinau me tumenge kanna, kai hom dur krik tumendar. Te wau pash tumende, kamau gar te tchingrell tumentsa i sorjaha, hoi das man maro rai Jesus. Kai soor das lo man, te krap tumen soreles, gar te krap tumen paash.
47013011	Kanna, mire phrala, awenn bachteles, un awenn pale pale ap o tchatcho drom! Shunenn ap kol laba, hoi me tumenge penom. Rikrenn khetne un tchingrenn tumen gar! Un o Dewel, kai dell kamlepen un bacht an o dji, well tumentsa!
47013012	Taprenn tumen trujal, un denn tumen i tchum! Kowa sikrella hakeneste, tumer han phrala un phenja an o patsepen. I tsele patsle penenn tumenge. "Atchenn maro Debleha!"
47013013	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa! Un o Debleskro kamlepen well an tumende! Un o Debleskro Ducho atchell pash tumende!
48001001	Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil ap i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o them Galatia. O Jesus Kristo das an miro wast, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Me hom gar i menshendar bitchedo. Kowa, kai bitchras man, hi o Jesus Kristo un o Dewel, maro dad. Kowa kras les i mulendar djido.
48001002	Me un i tsele phrala, kai pash mande hi, mer penah tumenge:
48001003	Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Ko dell tumen o Dewel, kai maro dad hi, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.
48001004	Job meras, te lell lo mari doosh ap peste. Kowa kras lo, te lell lo men win dran ko tchilatcho tsiro, an hoi mer djiwah. Kowa kamas o Dewel, maro dad jaake.
48001005	Koles sharas kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.
48001006	Mange atchas o rakepen krik, har me shunom, kai tumer mukan jaake sik o Jesuseskro drom. O Dewel das tumen gole, te patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, kai his jaake latcho ap tumende. Un kanna shunenn tumer ap menshende, kai kamenn tumen ap i wawar drom te anell.
48001007	Tchatchepaha, dell kek wawar drom, te wenn tumer pash o Debleste! Kolla menshe kamenn tumen dinelo te krell. Jon risrenn o tchatchepen pral o Jesus Kristeste trujal.
48001008	Kowa, kai penell, te dell i wawar drom har ko drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, kowa te well praassedo o Deblestar, ninna te wams mer kowa, ninna te wals i bolepaskro dran o bolepen pash tumende un penals kowa.
48001009	Jaake har mer jek kopo penam, penau me kanna pale: Te well jek pash tumende un penell tumenge, te dell i wawar drom pash o Debleste har ko drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, kowa te well praassedo o Deblestar!
48001010	Penenn mange, rakrau me kanna jaake, har kamenn i menshe kowa te shunell? Na-a! Me rakrau jaake, har o Dewel kowa kamella. Me kamau gar, te sharenn man i menshe. Te wals kowa jaake, woms gar o Jesus Kristeskro budepaskro.
48001011	Mire phrala, djinenn, o Jesuseskro drom hoi me tumende sikrom, hi gar i menshengro koowa.
48001012	Me shunom kowa gar i menshendar. I mensho sikras les mande witar gar. O Jesus Kristo kokres sikras les mande.
48001013	Tumer shunan, har me djiwom an o biboldengro patsepen, un lom kolen palla, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, un kamom, te marap len.
48001014	Me rikrom man ap i biboldengro patsepen feteder har bud wawar bibolde, kai jaake phuro his har me. Miri tseli sorjaha kamom kowa te krell, hoi mare phure penan.
48001015	-
48001016	O Debles his i wawar drom mange. Job kamas mande peskro tchawes te sikrell, te djinap, koon job hi. Har me gomme gar boldo homs, rodas job man win. Un job his mange latcho un das man gole, te djap pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te penap lenge leskro tchawestar. Har o Dewel man pash lende bitchras, putchom gar i menshendar, te penenn le mange, hoi te krap,
48001017	djom witar gar an o foro Jerusalem pash kolende, kai glan mande o Jesusestar bitchedo wan, te penenn le i menshenge leskre laba. Lendar putchom gar, hoi te krap. Na-a, me djom an o them Arabia un wom pale pale an o foro Damaskus.
48001018	Pal triin bersha wom me an o foro Jerusalem, te dikap o Kefases. Deesh-te-pantch diwessa atchom pash leste.
48001019	Kol wawar bitchepangren, kai o Jesus Kristo glan mande pash i menshende bitchras, kolendar dikom me kekes kote har o Jakobo kokres, o Jesuseskro phraal.
48001020	O Dewel djinella, kai kawa lauter tchatcho hi, hoi me tumenge tchinau. Me chochau gar.
48001021	Pal kowa wom me an i themma Siria un Cilicia.
48001022	An o them Judea prindjran man kol patsle gar.
48001023	Jon shunan, hoi wawar pral mande penan: "Ko mursh, kai men palla las un kamas o patsepen ap o Jesuseste paash te krell, ko mursh penell kanna i menshenge, te djan le ap o Jesuseskro drom."
48001024	Un jon sharan o Debles pral halauter, hoi job ap mande kras.
48002001	-
48002002	Pal deesh-te-star bersha djom me pale an o foro Jerusalem. O Dewel sikras mande, te djap koi. O Barnabas djas mantsa. Un o Tito his ninna pash mande. An o foro Jerusalem djom pash i pralstunende mank i patslende, un penom lenge, har sikrau me o Debleskro drom kol menshende, kai kek bibolde hi. Me kamom te djinell, te hi kowa lenge mishto, hoi me penau, te well koi budi, hoi me krau un krom, gar tchitcheske.
48002003	O Tito, kai kek biboldo hi, his pash mande. Un kol patslengre pralstune penan gar, kai hunte well job ap o mass tchindlo.
48002004	His wawar mursha koi. Jon kran, har te wans le patsle. Jon kaman te dikell, har kol patsle djiwenna, kai buder gar ap o Moseskre laba pandlo hi. Mer, kai ham buder gar pandlo ap kol laba, djiwah kanna pal o Jesuseskre laba. Un kol mursha, kai djiwenn gar pal o Jesuseskre laba, kaman, te was mer pale pandlo ap o Moseskre laba.
48002005	Mer kram kowa gar, hoi jon kaman. Mer kamam, te djinenn tumer soreles: O Jesuseskro drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, kowa hi o tchatcho drom.
48002006	Kol phrala, kai hi pralstune mank i patslende, kolla penan gar, kai kowa, hoi me i menshenge penau, gar tchatcho hi. Te rakrau kol pralstunendar, hi mange jek, hoi jon his. O Dewel dikell gar ap kowa, har i mensho an-diklo hi.
48002007	Jon haiwan, kai mange o Jesus penas, te djap pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te sikrap lende leskro drom, jaake har o Petro o Jesuseskro drom i biboldende sikrella.
48002008	Kowa, kai bitchras o Petres pash i biboldende, hi kowa, kai man bitchras pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.
48002009	Kol pralstune mank i patslende his o Jakobo, un o Kefas, un o Johanni. Har jon haiwan, kai o Dewel mange latcho hi un man koi budi das, dan jon man un o Barnabes o tchatcho wast, te dikenn halauter, kai ham mer phrala. Mer kram win, te djas mer pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un jon te djan pash i biboldende.
48002010	Hi jek koowa, hoi jon mendar mangan, te bistras mer gar i tchorwelen mank lende. Ap kowa rikrom man i tselo djijeha.
48002011	-
48002012	An ko tsiro, har o Kefas an o foro Antiochia his, chas job kol patslentsa, kai kek bibolde hi. Koi wan patsle bibolde koi pashal dran o Jakobeskri kangri. Kolla rikran pen ap o Moseskre laba un chan gar kolentsa, kai kek bibolde hi. Un o Kefas trashas lendar, un tsardas pes pale, un kamas buder gar kol patslentsa khetne te well, kai kek bibolde hi. Koi penom me leske an o mui, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras.
48002013	Jaake har o Kefas dui tchipjentsa rakras, kran ninna kol wawar patsle bibolde. Har o Barnabas len dikas, kras job ninna jaake har jon, un tsardas pes kol patslendar pale, kai kek bibolde hi, te well lo an-diklo pash i biboldende.
48002014	Har me dikom, kai jon gar ap o tchatcho drom djan, jaake har o Jesus les mende sikras, koi penom me ap o Kefaseste glan hakeneste: Ninna te hal i biboldo, djiweh tu gar har i biboldo. Hoske kameh i sorjaha, te djiwenn kol patsle, kai kek bibolde hi, har i bibolde?
48002015	-
48002016	Mer ham bibolde. Jaake wam mer boldo. Un ham gar kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi un gar ap o Debleskro drom djana. Ninna te ham gar kolendar, djinah, kai kek mensho tchatcho wella glan o Debleste, te djiwell lo pal o Moseskre laba. Na-a, o Dewel krell koles tchatcho glan peste, koon patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste. Doleske patsah mer o tselo djijestar ap o Jesus Kristeste, te was tchatcho glan o Debleste.
48002017	Mer ninna, kai ham bibolde, kamah, te krell men o Dewel tchatcho glan peste. Kol labentsa penah mer, kai ham pale-tchidde un tchilatche glan o Debleste, jaake har i tsele wawar menshe ap i phub. Penau kanna, kai o Jesus Kristo men ap o tchilatcho drom anas? Na-a!
48002018	Me woms tchatchepaha ap o tchilatcho drom tardo, te penoms kanna, te rikras men pale ap o Moseskre laba, kai me glan i tsiro penom, te hunte rikras men gar ap kol laba.
48002019	Har krom gar, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna, penan kol laba mange: Tu hunte meress. Jaake hom lenge mulo un nai djiwau kanna o Debleske. Me merom o Jesuseha ap o trushel.
48002020	Kowa hom gar me, kai djiwau kanna. Hi o Jesus Kristo, kai djiwell an mande. Un ko djipen, hoi kanna djiwau, djiwau me an o patsepen ap o Debleskro tchaweste. Job kamas te djiwap, un das peskro djipen mange an o merepen.
48002021	Jaake tchiwrau o Debleskro latchepen gar ap i rig. Te djiwoms me pal o Moseskre laba, un kolla krans mange tchatcho glan o Debleste, meras o Jesus Kristo tchitcheske.
48003001	Hoske kamenn tumer patsle an Galatia kowa gar te haiwell? Koon kras tumenge dinelo? Tumenge was o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel penlo, har te dikans kowa tumare jakentsa!
48003002	Kowa kamau me tumendar te djinell: Har djas kowa, kai lan o Debleskro Ducho? Lan tumer les, har tumer kran, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna? Na-a, tumer lan les, har shunan o Jesusestar un patsan ap leste.
48003003	Har well kowa, kai haiwenn tumer kowa gar? Dran o Debleskri soor wan tumer patslo. Kamenn tumer kanna dran tumari soor tchatcho glan leste te well?
48003004	Tumer djan ap o Jesuseskro drom. Un doleske kran i menshe tumenge o djipen phares. His kowa lauter tchitcheske?
48003005	O Dewel das tumen peskro Ducho un kras pash tumende bud baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Kras lo kowa, har djiwan tumer pal o Moseskre laba? Na-a! Job kras kowa, har tumer shunan o Jesusestar un ap leste patsan.
48003006	Jaake his kowa ninna o Abrahameha. Job patsas o Debles. Doleske tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen.
48003007	Tumer dikenn kanna: O Abrahameskre tchatche tchawe hi kolla, kai o Debles patsenna.
48003008	O Debleskro lab penas glan i raha tsiro, kai o Dewel ninna kolen tchatcho krella, kai kek bibolde hi, te patsenn le ap leste. Doleske penas lo ap o Abrahameste: Kai bacht, hoi me dau tut, djal dureder ap i tsele menshende ap i phub.
48003009	Jaake har o Abraham o Debles patsas un o Dewel das les peskri bacht un soor, jaake lenna kolla lauter o Debleskro djipen, kai les patsenna.
48003010	Kol wawar, kai rikrenn pen ap o Moseskre laba, un kamenn jaake tchatcho te well glan o Debleste, kolla hi tel o Debleskro praassepen. O Debleskro lab penella: Hakeno hi praassedo, koon gar lauter krella, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna.Un kek mensho hi koi, kai krell lauter, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna.
48003011	Koon rikrell pes ap o Moseskre laba, well dran kowa gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. An o Debleskro lab hi ninna tchindlo: Kowa, kai patsella, kowa well tchatcho glan o Debleste un djiwella.
48003012	Te rikrell jek pes ap o Moseskre laba, hi kowa gar ko emligo, har te patsals lo ap o Jesus Kristeste. Pral o Moseskre laba hi tchindlo: Koon krell hako koowa, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna, kowa djiwella.
48003013	Mer nashte rikram kowa lauter gar. Un dran kowa wam tel o Debleskro praassepen. Un o Jesus Kristo las ko praassepen mendar krik, har job ap o trushel dino was, un jaake menge praassedo was. O Debleskro lab penella: Hakeno, koon ap o trushel dino wella, hi praassedo.
48003014	Un kowa kras o Jesus Kristo, te well o Debleskri soor pash i tsele menshende, jaake har o Dewel glan i raha tsiro o Abrahameske penas. Kanna nai lah mer lauter o Debleskro Ducho, te patsah mer ap o Jesuseste.
48003015	Mire phrala, kanna rakrau pral tchomone, hoi tumer lauter prindjrenna. Te krenn dui menshe tchomone win un denn pengro dadeskro wast koi pre, nai penell kek: Kanna hi kowa buder tchi moldo. Witar gar nai tchiwell jek tchomone koi pashal.
48003016	Jaake hi kowa o labeha, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameste das. O Dewel penas ap o Abrahameste, te dell lo peskri bacht un soor ap leste un ap leskro tchaweste, kai wella jek diwes pal leste. Kate rakrell o Dewel jek tchawestar. Job rakrell gar kol bud tchawendar, kai wenna pal o Abraham. Ko jek tchawo hi o Jesus Kristo.
48003017	Me kamau tumenge kawa te penell: O Dewel das o Abrahameste peskro lab, un tchiwas peskro wast koi pre, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi job penas. O Moseskre laba wan star-sheel-te-triin-deesh (430) bersha palla un nai lenn ko lab gar krik, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameste das.
48003018	Te lals jek o Debleskro brawlepen un djipen, te rikrals lo pes ap o Moseskre laba, palle tchiwals o Dewel peskro lab ap i rig, hoi job o Abrahameste das. Kowa hi gar jaake. O Dewel rikrell peskro lab, un doleske das job o Abrahameste peskro brawlepen tchitcheske.
48003019	Hoske hi o Moseskre laba koi? O Dewel das len mende, te dikas mer, har baro maro tchilatchepen hi. O Moseskre laba atchan tardo jaake raha, bis te was o Abrahameskro tchawo, ko jek, konestar o Dewel penas, te well job. I bolepangre anan kol laba o Moseske. Kowa his tardo mank i menshende un o Debleste. Un o Mose das kol laba i menshende.
48003020	His wawartchandes, har o Dewel o Abrahameste peskro lab das. O Dewel kokres das les peskro lab. Un kek hunte was tardo mank leste un o Abrahameste.
48003021	Penenn o Moseskre laba, kai hi ko lab buder tchi moldo, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameske penas? Na-a! Kowa hi gar jaake. Te wals o newo djipen dran o Moseskre laba, palle wals tchatchepaha ko mensho tchatcho glan o Debleste, kai rikrell pes ap kol laba. Kowa hi gar jaake.
48003022	O Debleskro lab penella, kai hi hako mensho pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Ko jek drom, kai anell men win dran o tchilatchepen, hi o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kowa penas o Dewel.
48003023	Jaake raha, har patsam gar ap o Jesus Kristeste, hams pandlo ap o Moseskre laba. Palle sikras men o Dewel i newo drom pash leste: Kowa hi o patsepen.
48003024	O Moseskre laba sikran men maro tchilatchepen. Jaake anan le men pash o Jesus Kristeste, te patsas ap leste, un te was tchatcho glan o Debleste.
48003025	Kanna, kai patsah ap leste, hunte daras buder gar koi phagi, hoi o Moseskre laba pral mende wi-rakrenna.
48003026	Dran tumaro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste han lauter Debleskre tchawe.
48003027	Har wan tumer ap o Jesus Kristeskro lab an o pani thodo, his kowa jaake, har te riwans tumer o Jesus Kristes an, - jaake har i ripen.
48003028	Jaake djiwah lauter o Jesuseha khetne. Kanna hi jek, koon tumer han: bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, budepangre un raja, mursha un djuwja. An o Jesus Kristeste hi jek har o wawar.
48003029	Te djan tumer o Jesus Kristeha, han tumer ninna o Abrahameskre tchawe. Un tumer lenn kowa, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameskre tchawende della, jaake har penas lo.
48004001	Me penau tumenge: O tchawo, kai lell jek diwes lauter peskro dadestar, koles hi tchi penepaske pral peskro brawlepen, jaake raha har job tikno hi. Job hi har i budepaskro, ninna te hi ko tselo brawlepen leskro.
48004002	Job hi an i wasta kolendar, kai denn garda ap leste, bis te well ko tsiro, kai leskro dad penas, te lell job ko brawlepen.
48004003	Jaake djas menge kowa ninna. An ko tsiro, har gomme gar patslo hams, hams har tikne tchawe un hams tel i soor kolendar tardo, kai hi i raja pral kai phub, un hams ap lende pandlo.
48004004	Har ko tchatcho tsiro was, bitchras o Dewel peskro tchawes. Kowa was i mensho, un pandlo ap o Moseskre laba.
48004005	Job was, te lell lo kolen win, kai hi pandlo ap o Moseskre laba, jaake te was mer o Debleskre tchawe.
48004006	Kanna ham leskre tchawe. Doleske das o Dewel peskro tchaweskro Ducho an mare djia. Kowa dell gole: Tata, miro dad!
48004007	Kanna hal tu buder gar har i budepaskro, kai les tchi hi. Tu hal kanna o Debleskro tchawo. Un doleske leh tu ninna kowa, hoi o Dewel peskre tchawende della.
48004008	An ko tsiro, kai prindjran tumer o Debles gar, hans wawarenge koi, har te wans le o Dewel.
48004009	Kanna prindjrenn tumer o Debles. Feteder hi, te penau me: O Dewel prindjrell tumen. Har nai tchiwenn tumer tumen pale tel kol sorja, ap kolende i menshe pandlo hi? Tumer shunenn pale ap laba, hoi tchi moldo hi, un an lende kek soor hi.
48004010	Tumer denn jak ap diwessa, tchonna, bersha un bare tsirja un rikrenn len dre.
48004011	Me trashau tumenge, kai miri budi pash tumende tchitcheske his.
48004012	Mire phrala, me mangau tumen, wenn jaake, har me hom! Me wom ninna jaake har tumer, wom jek, kai hi gar pandlo ap o Moseskre laba. Hans tumer tchilatcho ap mande,
48004013	har me o ersto kopo pash tumende homs? Na-a, kowa hans gar. Tumer djinenna, har me tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab penom, koi djas mange gar mishto.
48004014	Ninna te his miro nasslepen tumenge gar shukar, dikan tumer gar tele ap mande, witar gar bitchran man tumendar krik. Na-a! Tumer lan man pre, har te woms o Debleskro bolepaskro, har te woms o Jesus Kristo kokres.
48004015	Tumer hans jaake bachtelo ap ko tsiro! Kai atchas tumari bacht? Ap ko tsiro lans tumare jaka win un dans len mande.
48004016	Kanna, kai penau tumenge o tchatchepen, han tumer tchilatcho ap mande?
48004017	Kowa hi gar mishto, hoi kol menshe krenna, kai nashenn tumenge palla, te shunenn tumer ap lende. Jon kamenn tumen mandar krik te lell, te nashenn tumer lenge palla.
48004018	Me penau tumenge: Nashenn kowa palla, hoi latcho hi! Krenn kowa hako tsiro, ninna te hom me gar pash tumende!
48004019	Mire phrala! Me kamau tumen o djijestar, har te wans mire tchawe. Jaake har i djuwjat duka hi, te lell li i tarnepen, jaake hi man pale duka tumenge, bis te well o Jesus Kristo diklo an tumende.
48004020	Me kamoms, te woms kanna nai pash tumende un te rakroms nai jaake, te djal kowa an tumaro dji! Me hom kate tardo un djinau gar, hoi te krap.
48004021	Tumer kamenn jaake te djiwell har o Moseskre laba penenna. Djinenn tumer gar, hoi kol laba penenna?
48004022	Kote hi tchindlo: O Abrahames his dui tchawe. Ko jekeskri dai his i budepaskretsa, i Hagar. Un ko wawareskri dai his i rajetsa, i Sara.
48004023	I budepaskretsa las o tchawes, har menshe kowa kaman. I rajetsa las o tchawes, har o Dewel kowa penas.
48004024	Kal dui djuwja hi har dui koowa, hoi o Dewel i menshentsa an Israel win kras. Jek koowa kras o Dewel lentsa win ap i berga Sinai. Kote lan i menshe o Moseskre laba. Kol laba hi o rai pral lende, jaake har his i rai pral i Hagar tardo.
48004025	I Hagar hi har i berga Sinai an Arabia. Jaake har kote i menshe ap o Moseskre laba pandlo wan, jaake hi kanna o foro Jerusalem peskre menshentsa ap o Moseskre laba pandlo.
48004026	Hi ninna i foro Jerusalem an o bolepen. Ko Jerusalem hi har i rajetsa, i Sara. Lakre tchawe hi gar pandlo ap o Moseskre laba. Joi hi mari dai.
48004027	Latar hi tchindlo: Ab bachtelo, ninna te nai lal tu kek tchawe! De gole i bachtjatar, ninna te was tutar kek tarnepen boldo! Kanna hi tut budeder tchawe har koja, kai his o romeha khetne.
48004028	Mire phrala, tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Tumer wan boldo, har o Dewel kowa kamas, jaake har o Isaak boldo was, har o Dewel kowa penas.
48004029	An ko phuro tsiro his jaake: Ko tchawo, kai was boldo, har i menshe kowa kaman, kowa las koles palla, kai was boldo dran o Debleskri soor. Kowa hi kau diwes ninna jaake.
48004030	O Debleskro lab penell koi pral: Trade koi budepaskretsa peskro tchaweha tutar krik, te lell job gar peskro dadeskro brawlepen. Ko brawlepen lell ko tchawo, koleskri dai i rajetsa hi.
48004031	Mire phrala, mer ham gar i tchawe kolatar, kai hi i budepaskretsa. Mer ham i tchawe kolatar, kai hi i rajetsa!
48005001	O Jesus Kristo las men win dran hako koowa, ap kowa pandlo hams. Atchenn soreles un mukenn tumen buder gar te pandell!
48005002	Shunenn ap mire laba! Me, o Paulo, penau tumenge: Hakeno, koon mukell pes ap o mass te tchinell, jaake har i bibolde kowa kamenna, koleske meras o Jesus Kristo tchitcheske.
48005003	Un pale penau me hakeneske: Kowa, kai mukell pes ap o mass te tchinell, kowa hunte krell ninna lauter, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna.
48005004	Koon mank tumende djiwell pal o Moseskre laba, te well lo tchatcho glan o Debleste, kowa mukas o Jesus Kristes. Leskro kamlepen hi buder gar leske koi.
48005005	Mentsa hi wawartchandes. Mer patsah, te tchiwell men o Dewel an o tchatchepen, te patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste. Ko patsepen dell men o Debleskro Ducho.
48005006	O Jesus Kristeske molell tchi, te hi i mursh ap o mass tchindlo, witar gar, te hi lo gar tchindlo. Kowa, hoi hi budeder moldo har lauter, hi o patsepen. Ko patsepen dikah mer ap o kamlepen, kai jekes hi i wawareske.
48005007	Tumer nashan mishto ap o Debleskro drom. Koon rikras tumen pale, te shunenn buder gar ap o tchatchepen?
48005008	Kowa, hoi sawo mensho tumenge penas, well gar o Deblestar, kai das tumen gole, te wenn leskre tchawe.
48005009	Tumer djinenna, i tikno kotar shutlo jarro krell o tselo jarro shutlo.
48005010	Me prindjrau tumen mishto un patsau, kai shunenn ap mande, un o Jesus Kristo anell tumen pale ap o tchatcho drom. Kowa, kai anas tumen o tchatcho dromestar tele, kowa lell peskri phagi. Hi jek, koon job ninna hi.
48005011	Mire phrala, me te penoms i menshenge, te mukenn pen jon ap o mass te tchinell, lans i bibolde man gar palla. Palle choirans le pen gar pral kowa, kai rakrau pral o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel, un penau lenge, kai job kokres men pash o Debleste anella.
48005012	Kolla, kai krenn tumen dineles, kamaus, te tchinenn pen le paash!
48005013	Mire phrala, o Dewel das tumen gole, te djiwenn i djipen, kai han buder gar pandlo ap tchomone. Kal labentsa penau gar, te krenn tumer nai, hoi kamenna, un djiwenn nai tumaro phuro djipen. Na-a, awenn jek o wawareske koi! Krenn kowa dran o kamlepen!
48005014	Te well jek jaake latcho ap o wawareste har job latcho ap peste hi, palle krell lo lauter, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.
48005015	Te dandrenn tumen tumer har midjak djukle, denn jak, te chal jek kol wawares gar pre!
48005016	Me penau tumenge: Djiwenn jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho tumenge penella! Job te hi tumentsa, palle krenn gar o tchilatchepen, hoi an tumende hi.
48005017	Kowa, hoi an mende hi, kamell gar kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho kamella. Un kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho kamella, hi gar kowa, hoi an mende hi. Kol dui sorja tchingrenn pen jaake, kai nai krenn tumer gar ko latchepen, hoi kamenn tumer te krell.
48005018	Te krenn tumer kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tumenge penella, palle hi o Moseskre laba kek soor pral tumende.
48005019	Tumer lauter djinenna, har kol menshe djiwenna, kai krenn ko tchilatchepen, hoi an lende hi: I mursha sowenn wawar djuwjentsa. Un i djuwja sowenn wawar murshentsa. I menshe krenn djungelo koowa un wi-ladjedo koowa.
48005020	Jon mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles. Jon durkrenna. Jon kurenn pen un tchingrenn pen. Jon silwerenna, un len hi choli ap i wawarende. Jon dikenn ap pende kokres, te djal penge mishto, un dikenn gar ap i wawarende, te djal lenge ninna mishto. Jon mukenn pengre phralen un djan wawarentsa khetne.
48005021	Jon kamenn kowa, hoi o wawares hi. Jon hi pipangre un chapangre. Un bud wawar tchilatcho koowa krenn jon. Me penom tumenge un penau pale: Koon jaake djiwella, well gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen un lell gar ko latcho koowa, hoi o Debles peskre tchawenge hi.
48005022	Kones hi o Debleskro Ducho an peskro dji, dran koleste wella latchepen: Les well o Debleskro kamlepen un bacht an o dji. Job kamell kek tchingepen. Job rikrell lauter wi. Job hi latches ap i wawarende. Les hi i baro dji i wawarenge. Kowa, hoi job penell, ap kowa rikrell pes job.
48005023	Job krell pes gar bares un lell pes khetne. O Moseskre laba, kolen hi kek soor pral koleste, koon jaake djiwella.
48005024	Kolla, kai djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha, kolla anan ko tsele tchilatcho koowa, hoi jon kran, pash o Jesuseste. Un kanna penenn le na-a, ap o djungelo koowa, hoi kamell an lengro dji te well.
48005025	O Debleskro Ducho das men o newo djipen. Doleske djiwas jaake, har job kamella.
48005026	Mer rodas gar pal kowa, te was bareder un feteder har kol wawar. Mer tchingras gar un dikas gar tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi ko wawares hi!
48006001	Mire phrala, nai well, kai krell jek tumendar i tchilatcho koowa. Anenn kol menshes pale ap o tchatcho drom! Rakrenn leha latches! Jaake sikrenn tumer, kai djiwenn jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho kowa kamella. Denn jak ap tumende, te perenn tumer gar ninna o Debleskro dromestar tele!
48006002	Jek hunte dikell ap ko wawareste un hidjella leha, hoi an leskro dji leske dukrella. Jaake krenn tumer kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo tumendar kamella.
48006003	Koon patsella, kai job feteder hi har ko wawar, un hi kowa gar, kowa chochell pes kokres.
48006004	Hakeno hunte dikell ap peste, har job djiwella. Jaake nai sharell lo pes dran kowa, hoi job krella un dikell gar ap i wawareste.
48006005	Hakenes hi doha an peskro djipen, hoi hunte hidjell lo.
48006006	Jek te penell tumenge o Debleskro lab, palle hunte denn tumer les kowa, hoi les hunte well djipaske.
48006007	Ma patsenn, te krenn nai o Debleha, har tumer kamenna! Tumer te krenn latcho koowa, lenn tumer latcho koowa pale pale. Tumer te krenn tchilatcho koowa, lenn tumer tchilatcho koowa pale pale.
48006008	Koon krella, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, koleskro djipen atchell gar. Koon krella, hoi o Debleskro Ducho leske penella, kowa lell o Debleskro djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
48006009	Dikas, te was gar khino, te kras latcho koowa. Well ko tsiro, kai lah ninna latcho koowa.
48006010	Doleske kras latcho koowa jaake bud, har krah nai, hake menshenge, budeder kol patslenge.
48006011	Kanna tchinau bare laba. Koi pre dikenn tumer, kai me kowa tchinom miro wasteha.
48006012	Kol mursha, kai kamenn sorjaha, te mukenn tumen ap o mass te tchinell, kolla kamenn kol wawarende te sikrell, har latcho jon hi. Kowa krenn le, te wenn le gar palla lino. Te penans jon, kai o Jesus Kristeskro merepen ap o trushel kokres kowa hi, hoi tchiwell men an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste, wans jon palla lino.
48006013	Jon ninna, kai mukan pen ap o mass te tchinell, krenn gar lauter, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna. Doleske kamenn le, te mukenn tumen ap o mass te tchinell, jaake te sharenn jon pen glan i menshende.
48006014	Me djinau jek: An kek tsiro kamau me te sharap man. Me sharau ko trushel kokres, kai maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, meras. Kanna hi mange kowa lauter buder tchi moldo, hoi i menshenge jaake bud moldo hi. Me nashau ko koowa buder gar palla.
48006015	Hi tchi moldo, te hal tu ap o mass tchindlo. Hi witar tchi moldo, te hal tu gar ap o mass tchindlo. Jek koowa molella: O Dewel kras dran mende newe menshe.
48006016	Me kamoms, te dell o Dewel peskri bacht un peskro kamlepen lauterende, kai rikrenn pen ap kal laba. Mu well kowa ninna ap i tsele Debleskre menshende an Israel!
48006017	Ma krenn mange buder kek duka! Man hi bud tchinepen ap mande, hoi sikrenna, kai wom o Jesuseske dino.
48006018	Mire phrala, mangau maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, te well lo tumenge latcho. Amen.
49001001	Kau liil tchinau me, o Paulo. O Jesus Kristo bitchras man, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Jaake kamell kowa o Dewel. Me tchinau kau liil ap kolende, kolen o Dewel win gole das an o foro Efesus, un kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste.
49001002	Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Ko dell tumen maro Dewel, kai maro dad hi, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.
49001003	Sharas maro Debles! Job hi o Dewel un o dad maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, un das peskro tselo bolepaskro brawlepen mende, kai ham patslo ap o Jesus Kristeste.
49001004	Har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his, rodas lo men win, te djas ap o Jesuseskro drom. Job rodas men win, te dell lo men i djudjo dji, te hatsell lo kek doosh ap mende. Jaake bud kamas lo men,
49001005	te penas lo glan i raha tsiro an peskro dji, te was mer leskre tchawe. Un o Jesus Kristo kras, te wam mer o Debleskre tchawe, jaake har o Dewel kowa kamas,
49001006	te sharas mer leskro baro latchepen. Job his jaake latcho ap mende, te das lo peskro kamlo tchawes menge!
49001007	Har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel meras, un peskro rat menge ratas, las lo mari doosh un phagi mendar. Jaake baro hi leskro latchepen ap mende!
49001008	Bud kope his lo menge latches, un das men ninna goswepen, te haiwas leskro drom.
49001009	Kek mensho djinas, hoi o Dewel kamas te krell. Mende sikras lo, hoi les an peskro dji hi. Kowa, hoi job kamell te krell, krell lo o Jesus Kristeha.
49001010	Te well o tchatcho tsiro, anell lo halauter khetne, hoi hi an o bolepen un ap i phub. Un o Jesus Kristo well o rai pral halauter.
49001011	Job kras, te wam mer o Debleskre tchawe. Un ko bolepaskro brawlepen, hoi leskro hi, well ninna maro. Kowa kamas o Dewel glan i raha tsiro jaake. Un lauter, hoi job kamella, krell lo.
49001012	Doleske sharas mer maro baro Debles! I raha tsiro das maro dji pal o Kristeste gole, ko baro rajeste, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Un kanna hi lo kai.
49001013	Tumer ninna shunan o tchatchepen. Un tumen was ko drom siklo, hoi anas tumen pash o Debleste. Ko drom hi o Jesus Kristo. Har tumer ap leste patslo wan, das lo tumen o Debleskro Ducho an tumare djia. Glan i raha tsiro penas o Dewel, te dell lo les peskre tchawende. Jaake sikrell lo, koon leskre tchawe hi.
49001014	Kanna hi men o Debleskro Ducho an mende. Un doleske djinah, te lah budeder latcho koowa ap ko diwes, kai wah newes kerdo an o bolepen. Doleske sharas mer maro baro Debles!
49001015	Me shunom, har baro hi tumaro patsepen ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste. Ninna kamenn tumer i tsele patslen o djijestar.
49001016	Doleske parkrau man hako tsiro pash o Debleste tumenge, un mangau lestar,
49001017	te dell lo tumen goswepen, te haiwenn tumer, har baro job hi. Job hi o Dewel maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, un maro dad an o bolepen, o rai pral halauter.
49001018	Me mangau lestar, te krell lo tumare djia pre, te dikenn tumare djijeskre jakentsa, har baro un shukar kowa hi, hoi job i patslende della ap ko tsiro, kai wenn le pash leste an o bolepen khetne. Job das tumen gole, te lenn kowa lauter.
49001019	Un me mangau lestar ninna, te haiwenn tumer, har bari leskri soor hi, hoi an mende hi, kai patsah. Koi soor hi i emligi bari soor,
49001020	hoi kras o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido, un beshas les ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar an o bolepen,
49001021	un das halauter an leskre wasta, te well lo o rai pral i tsele rajende un pralstunende, sorele un bare. Kek lab hi bareder har leskro lab an kau tsiro, un ninna an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
49001022	O Dewel das halauter an leskre wasta, un kras, te was o Jesus Kristo o pralstuno pral i patslende.
49001023	Kolla hi leskre. Job djiwell an lende peskri tseli sorjaha. Un leskri tseli soor hi an halauter an o bolepen un ap i phub.
49002001	Har gar patslo hans, his bud doosh ap tumende. Un tumer hans tchilatcho. Jaake hans o Debleske mulo.
49002002	Tumer djan ap o tchilatcho drom, jaake har i wawar menshe, un shunan ap o bengeste. Kowa hi o rai pral i tchilatche sorja mashkral o bolepen un i phub. Un job budrell an i djia kolendar, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste.
49002003	His i tsiro, kai djiwam mer halauter har jon, un kram o tchilatchepen, hoi an mende hi. Mer kram, hoi mer kamam, un hoi menge an o shero was. Un o Debleskri choli his ninna pral mende har pral kol wawar menshende.
49002004	-
49002005	Kanna kras men o Dewel djido. Les his i baro dji menge un kamas men o tselo djijestar. Mer, kai leske mulo hams, har djiwam an maro tchilatchepen, men kras job djido, jaake har job o Jesus Kristes djido kras. Job his jaake latcho ap mende, te las lo men dran o tchilatchepen win.
49002006	Har djangras job o Jesus Kristes i mulendar pre, djangras men lo ninna pre, un beshas men an o bolepen pash leste.
49002007	Jaake baro hi leskro latchepen ap mende, kai patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste. Ninna an ko tsiro, hoi wella, dikenna i menshe, har baro leskro latchepen ap mende hi.
49002008	Dran peskro latchepen las lo tumen dran o tchilatchepen win, har patsan ap o Jesus Kristeste. Tumer wan nai gar dran tumari soor dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win. Na-a! O Dewel las tumen win.
49002009	Kowa kras lo gar doleske, kai tumer latcho koowa kran. Jaake sharell nai pes kek mensho glan o Debleste.
49002010	Kowa, hoi mer kanna ham, kras o Dewel dran mende. Har wam patslo ap o Jesus Kristeste, das lo men o newo djipen, te kras mer ko latcho koowa, hoi job an mare wasta das.
49002011	Ma bistrenn, koon tumer hans, har boldo wan! Tumer hans kek bibolde. Un i bibolde penan Bi-tchindle ap tumende. I bibolde wan ap pengro mass tchindlo, un kowa han tumer gar.
49002012	Ap ko tsiro prindjran tumer o Jesus Kristes gar un hans gar o Debleskre menshendar. Ko latcho koowa, hoi o Dewel peskre menshenge penas, te dell lo len, his gar tumenge. Tumer prindjran o Debles gar, un djiwan har an i kali rat un dikan kek momeli glan tumende.
49002013	Ap ko tsiro hans tumer dur o Deblestar. Kanna prindjrenn les. O Jesus Kristo anas tumen ap peskro drom, har job ap o trushel peskro rat tumenge ratas.
49002014	Job anas i bibolden khetne kol menshentsa, kai kek bibolde hi, te wenn le mala, un las o tchingepen lendar krik, hoi mashkral lende his.
49002015	Har job ap o trushel meras, tchiwas lo o Moseskre lila ap i rig, kai tchindlo hi, har i bibolde hunte djiwenna. Job kras tchomone newes, te well i biboldo khetne koleha, kai kek biboldo hi, un te wenn le lauter mala.
49002016	Har meras lo ap o trushel, anas lo kol dujen khetne o Debleha, te wenn le leskre mala. Kote las lo o tchingepen lendar krik, hoi mashkral lende his.
49002017	O Jesus Kristo was, un sikras lauteren o drom pash o Debleste. Tumen, kai tchi o Deblestar djinan un ninna i bibolden, kai gar dur o Deblestar his, sikras lo ko drom, te djiwas mer lauter pash leste khetne.
49002018	Mende halauterende das job o Debleskro Ducho. Un kowa krell, te nai wah mer lauter glan o Debleste, maro dadeste.
49002019	Kanna han tumer buder gar sawe menshe, kai win hi un o Debles gar prindjrenna. Na-a, khetne kol wawar patslentsa han tumer kanna o Debleskre menshe un han khere pash leste.
49002020	-
49002021	I tsele Debleskre menshe hi har jek kheer, kerdo dran barra. Tumer han kol barra, hoi hi tardo ap i telstune barra. I telstune barra hi o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un o Debleskre rakepangre. O Jesus Kristo hi ko sorelo bar, hoi rikrell o tselo kheer khetne. Un o kheer well baro un bareder, un well i shukar kheer, kai o Dewel djiwella.
49002022	Ninna tumer djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha khetne. Doleske han tumer ninna har barra an o Debleskro kheer, kai o Debleskro Ducho djiwella.
49003001	-
49003002	Doleske bitchras o Jesus Kristo man, o Paules, pash tumende, kai kek bibolde han. Dran kowa hom me kanna an o stilepen. Tumer shunan, har das man o Dewel miri budi, te penap kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi, har baro leskro latchepen ninna lenge hi.
49003003	Kowa djinan i menshe gar. An kau tikno liil tchinom tumenge, hoi sikras man o Dewel pral kowa.
49003004	Te drawerenn tumer miro liil, palle haiwenn, kai prindjrau kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge kras.
49003005	An o phuro tsiro djinan i menshe kowa gar. Kanna djinenn les o Debleskre bitchepangre un rakepangre. Lenge tchiwas les o Debleskro Ducho an o dji.
49003006	Job sikras len, te nai wenn ninna kolla o Debleskre tchawe, kai kek bibolde hi, te djiwenn le leha khetne. O latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar hi ninna lenge, jaake har o Dewel glan i raha tsiro penas.
49003007	Kau latcho lab penau me i menshenge. O Dewel his mange latcho, te das lo man kai budi. Ninna das lo man i soor, te krap kowa.
49003008	Ninna te hom me o tikneder kol tsele patslendar, das lo man koi shukar budi, te djap pash kolende, kai hi kek bibolde, te penap lenge, hawo baro brawlepen o Jesus Kristes lenge hi,
49003009	un te sikrap lauterende, har kras o Dewel kowa, hoi his les an o dji. Kowa djinan i menshe i raha tsiro gar. O Dewel kokres, kai kras o bolepen un i phub, djinas les.
49003010	Kanna dikenn i raja un i pralstune an o bolepen, har baro o Debleskro goswepen hi. Kowa dikenn le ap kowa, hoi job i patslenge kras.
49003011	Kowa, hoi les glan i raha tsiro an peskro dji his, kowa kras lo, har job o Jesus Kristes menge ap i phub bitchras. Kowa was maro rai,
49003012	un kras menge i drom pash o Debleste. Kanna, kai patsah ap leste, hunte trashas buder gar o Deblestar, un mer nai wah glan leste.
49003013	Doleske mangau tumen: Ma awenn gar khino an tumaro patsepen, ninna te shunenn tumer, kai me tumenge stildo hom. Kowa, hoi lau ap mande, sikrell tumende, har bud tumer mange moldo han.
49003014	Doleske perau ap mire tchanga, un parkrau man pash o Debleste, maro dadeste.
49003015	Job hi o tchatcho dad leskre tsele tchawendar an o bolepen un ap i phub.
49003016	Un leskri soor hi bari. Doleske mangau lestar, te krell leskro Ducho tumare djia soreles.
49003017	Me mangau lestar ninna, te djiwell o Jesus Kristo an tumende dran tumaro patsepen, un te kamenn tumer o Debles un ninna jek o wawares o djijestar. Palle han tumer har i ruk, koleskre draba djan dur an i phub. Un tumer han har i kheer, hoi soreles tardo hi.
49003018	Jaake nai haiwenn tumer i tsele patslentsa, har baro o Jesus Kristeskro dji tumenge hi,
49003019	ninna te hi leskro kamlepen bareder har lauter, hoi an mare shere dre djala. Te haiwah leskro kamlepen bud un budeder, palle djiwell o Dewel bud un budeder an mende.
49003020	-
49003021	Un job nai krell budeder, har mer lestar mangah, un budeder, hoi mer haiwah. Jaake bari hi leskri soor, hoi an mende kowa lauter krella. Mer lauter, kai patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste, sharas maro Debles kanna un hako tsiro. Amen.
49004001	Me hom an o stilepen o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un mangau tumen o djijestar, te djiwenn tumer tumaro djipen har sawe menshe, kolen o Dewel peske khetne gole das.
49004002	Ma krenn tumen bares! Awenn latches jek ap o wawareste! Denn i wawaren gar jaake sik pre! Djiwenn khetne an o kamlepen!
49004003	O Debleskro Ducho anas tumen khetne. Jaake denn garda, te well kek tchingepen mashkral tumende, un te rikrenn tumer lauter khetne!
49004004	Tumer patsle han jek familja. Tumen hi o emligo Debleskro Ducho an tumende. Un o Dewel das tumen gole, te djiwenn tumer lauter leha khetne.
49004005	Tumen hi o emligo rai, un o emligo patsepen. Un tumer wan lauter ap o Jesuseskro lab an o pani thodo.
49004006	Un tumen hi o emligo Dewel. Kowa hi o dad lauterendar. Job hi pral lauterende un mashkral lende, un djiwell an lauterende.
49004007	Hakeneske mendar his o Jesus Kristo latches un das les i budi, hoi budrell lo i patslenge.
49004008	Doleske hi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: Har job pre an o bolepen djas, las lo kolen peha, kai leskro wan, un das len i budi o Debleske te krell.
49004009	Kote hi tchindlo, kai job an o bolepen djas. Un kowa penell menge ninna, kai job glan kowa dran o bolepen ap i phub was.
49004010	Kowa, kai was tele ap i phub, hi ninna kowa, kai djas pre an o pralstuno bolepen, te djiwell lo an o bolepen un ninna ap i phub.
49004011	Job hi kowa, kai das i patslen pengri budi. Koi hi kolla, kolen job bitchras, te penenn le i menshenge lestar. Wawar rakrenna, hoi job lenge an o dji tchiwas, hoi kek wawar djinella. Wawar anenn kol menshen, kai gar patslo hi, pash o Jesus Kristeste. Pale wawar rikrenn i patslen khetne, un sikrenn lende o Debleskro drom.
49004012	Lauter kolla krenn pengri budi, te wenn i tsele patsle soreles an o patsepen, un te haiwenn le o Debleskri budi mishto te krell.
49004013	Kowa te well jaake, palle ham mer lauter khetne an jek patsepen, un prindjrah o Debleskro tchawes mishto. Bud un budeder haiwah, hoi job mendar kamella, bis te djiwah jaake har job djiwas.
49004014	Palle ham buder gar har tikne tchawe, kai lauter patsenna, kau diwes jaake un ko wawar diwes wawartchandes. Un mer shunah buder gar ap kolende, kai chochenna, un kamenn men o tchatcho dromestar tele te anell.
49004015	Mer hunte djiwas an o tchatchepen un penas o tchatchepen i menshenge. Maro kamlepen hunte well kek chocheno kamlepen. Jaake wah mer bud un budeder har o Jesus Kristo. Kowa hi o pralstuno pral lauterende, kai patsenn ap leste.
49004016	Job rikrell len khetne jaake, te well jek patslo i wawareha khetne anlo. Un jek patslo hidjell o wawares jaake, har les i soor hi. Mer te ham jaake kamlo, ko jek ap o wawareste, palle well o Debleskri familja baro un sorelo.
49004017	Me penau tumenge soreles, hoi mange o rai Jesus penas: Ma djiwenn buder har kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar! Kowa, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, hi tchi moldo.
49004018	O Deblestar kamenn le tchi te djinell. Lengro dji hi har i bar. Jaake djan le ap i tchilatcho drom, un prindjrenn ko djipen gar, hoi o Dewel della.
49004019	Jon ladjenn buder gar, te djiwenn le i wi-ladjedo djipen, un rikrenn pen gar pale te krenn le djungelo koowa.
49004020	Sawo koowa kras o Jesus Kristo gar. Na-a!
49004021	Tumer shunan lestar, un djinenna, har job djiwas. Ko drom, hoi job sikras men, hi o tchatcho drom.
49004022	Ma djiwenn buder gar tumaro phuro djipen! An tumaro phuro djipen was o tchilatcho koowa baro an tumare djia, un tumer kran, hoi tumenge gar mishto hi. Sawo koowa krell tumaro djipen paash.
49004023	Mukenn tumen o Deblestar newes te krell!
49004024	Djiwenn kanna o newo djipen, hoi tumen o Dewel das! Palle han tumer an o tchatchepen tardo, un han tchatchepaha leske koi.
49004025	Ma chochenn buder! Mer ham lauter phrala un phenja. Doleske rakrenn o tchatchepen jek o wawareha!
49004026	Te wenn tumer an i choli, palle denn garda, te krenn kek tchilatcho koowa! Mukenn o kham gar tele te djal pral tumari choli!
49004027	Denn garda ap tumende, te krenn tumer gar, hoi o beng kamella!
49004028	Koon tchoras an peskro phuro djipen, kowa tchorell buder gar! Job hunte budrell peskre wastentsa, te well les doha djipaske, un te nai dell lo ninna i tchorwelen tchomone.
49004029	Rakrenn kek tchilatche un djungele laba! Kowa, hoi tumer penenna, hunte well latches kolenge, kai shunenna, te lenn le newi soor an pengro djipen.
49004030	Te krenn tumer i tchilatcho koowa, palle dukrenn o Debleskro Ducho an tumare djia. O Dewel das les tumende, te sikrell lo, kai leskro han ap ko diwes, kai lell lo tumen dran o tselo tchilatchepen win.
49004031	Awenn ap kekeste tchilatcho un chojedo! Tchingrenn ap kekeste, un praassenn kekes!
49004032	Awenn kamlo jek ap o wawareste, un lenn i dji o wawareske! Bistrenn o tchilatchepen, hoi o wawar ap tumende kras! Ninna o Dewel bistras tumaro tchilatchepen, har o Jesus Kristo tumenge meras.
49005001	Tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Un job kamell tumen i tselo djijeha. Doleske krenn lauter jaake, har o Dewel kowa krella,
49005002	un djiwenn an o kamlepen, jaake har o Jesus Kristo peskro kamlepen mende sikras, har job menge meras. Un jaake das lo peskro djipen o Debleske. Un o Dewel dikas latches ap leste.
49005003	Tumer han o Debleskre menshe. Doleske krenn kek wi-ladjedo un djungelo koowa! Nashenn witar gar pal i lowe! Hi gar mishto, te well pral sawo koowa mank tumende rakedo!
49005004	Hi witar gar tchatcho o Debleskre tchawenge, te rakrenn le djungele laba, dinelo koowa, un sapaskro koowa, hoi tchi moldo hi! Tumare labentsa sharenn o Debles, un parkrenn tumen pash leste! Kowa krenn un gar ko wawar!
49005005	Tumer hunte djinenn: An o bolepen, kai hi o Jesus Kristo un o Dewel i raja, kote wenn kek mursha dre, kai sowenn wawar djuwjentsa, witar kek djuwja, kai sowenn wawar murshentsa, witar kek, kai krell djungelo koowa, witar kek, kai nashell pal i lowe. Kowa, kai nashell pal i lowe, koleske hi o brawlepen peskro dewel.
49005006	Ma patsenn kekes, kai penell tumenge, te nai krenn kowa lauter! Koon kowa penella, hi i chocheno. O Debleskri choli well ap kolende, kai gar ap o Debleste shunenna, un krenna sawo tchilatcho koowa.
49005007	Rikrenn tumen kolendar pale, kai kowa lauter krenna!
49005008	Glan ko tsiro, har tumer patslo wan, djan tumer ap o tchilatcho drom. Kowa his har te djans an i rati. Kanna hi kowa wawartchandes. Maro rai Jesus djiwell an tumare djia, un anas tumen ap peskro drom. Job hi i bari momeli tumenge. Djan kanna ap leskro drom, kai hi buder kek tamlepen!
49005009	Lauter kolla, kai ap leskro drom djana, krenn kowa, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi, un penenn o tchatchepen.
49005010	Rodenn pal kowa, hoi hi mishto glan o Jesuseste, maro rajeste!
49005011	Ma djan ap o tchilatcho drom kolentsa, kai krenna, hoi tchi moldo un tchilatcho hi! Sike lende, har tchilatcho kowa hi!
49005012	Kowa, hoi jon tchorchanes krenna, hi jaake djungelo, te hunte ladjell kowa pes, kai kolestar rakrella.
49005013	Te sikrah len lengro tchilatcho koowa, hi kowa jaake, har te anams ko koowa pash i momeli. Un jon dikenn les ninna.
49005014	Un kowa, hoi diklo wella, atchell gar an o tamlepen. Doleske giwah mer an i gili: "Tu, kai soweh, ste pre! Ste i mulendar pre! Un o Kristo well tuke har i momeli."
49005015	Denn jak koi pre, har tumer tumaro djipen djiwenna! Ma djiwenn har dinele menshe! Djiwenn har kolla, kai djinenna, hoi mishto hi!
49005016	Hako kopo, kai krenn nai latcho koowa, krenn kowa! Kau tsiro, kai djiwah, hi tchilatcho.
49005017	Doleske krenn tumaro dji pre, te haiwenn, hoi o rai Jesus tumendar kamella!
49005018	Ma pijenn jaake bud mool, te wenn mato! Te han mato, palle krenn tumer hako dinelo koowa. Mukenn o Debleskro Ducho o rai an tumende te well, un wenn pherdo lestar!
49005019	Giwenn lauter khetne o Debleskre gilja un sawe gilja, hoi sharenn o Debles, ninna sawe gilja, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwella! Giwenn un bashrenn o tselo djijestar o Jesuseske, maro rajeske!
49005020	Parkrenn tumen hako tsiro pash o Debleste, maro dadeste, lautereske, hoi das lo tumen! Krenn kowa an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar!
49005021	O Jesus Kristo hi tumaro rai. Un tumer penenn Rai ap leste. Doleske hunte hadell pes kek tumendar pral o wawareste.
49005022	Tumer djuwja, ma hadenn tumen pral tumare romende! Jaake sikrenn tumer, kai hi o Jesus Kristo tumaro rai.
49005023	O rom hi o rai pral i djuwjate jaake, har hi o Jesus Kristo o rai pral i tsele patslende. Kolen las job dran o tchilatchepen win. Jon hi leskre menshe.
49005024	Jaake har kol tsele patsle ap o Jesus Kristeste shunenna, jaake hunte shunenn ninna i romja ap pengre romende an hako koowa.
49005025	Tumer mursha, awenn jaake kamlo ap tumare romjende, har o Jesus Kristo kamlo hi ap i patslende! Job das peskro djipen lenge an o merepen,
49005026	te wenn le erligo un djudjo glan leste. Job thowas lengri doosh lendar tele, har patsan le leskro lab, un wan leske an o pani thodo.
49005027	Jaake kras lo len railes un shukar. Kek djungelo un tchilatcho koowa hi ap lende. Djudjo un erligo hi le glan leste tardo.
49005028	Jaake hunte well i mursh jaake kamlo ap peskri romjate har hi lo kamlo ap peste! Te hi lo kamlo ap peskri romjate, hi kowa jaake har te wals lo kamlo ap peste.
49005029	Kek hi tchilatcho ap peste. Na-a, job krell peske lauter latcho koowa. Jaake krell kowa o Jesus Kristo i patslenge ninna.
49005030	Mer ham leskri familja.
49005031	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Doleske mukell i mursh peskro dades un peskri da, te djiwell lo peskri romjaha khetne. Un kol dui wenna jek familja.
49005032	Kawa lab sikrell men i baro tchatchepen. Me rakrau o Jesus Kristestar un kolendar, kai ap leste patsenna.
49005033	Ninna te haiwau me kau lab jaake, penell kau lab tumenge: Hakeno hunte well jaake kamlo ap peskri romjate, har job kamlo ap peste hi! Un i romni hunte well latcho ap peskro romeste!
49006001	Tumer tchawe, shunenn ap tumaro dadeste un ap tumari date! Kowa hi mishto glan o Debleste.
49006002	-
49006003	O Dewel penell menge: Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto! Koon kowa krella, koleske djal mishto, un job djiwell i raha djipen ap i phub.
49006004	Tumer dada, ma choirenn tumare tchawen! Penenn lenge, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella, un sikrenn lende, har te djan le ap o Debleskro drom!
49006005	Tumer budepangre, kai hunte budrenn tumare rajenge, ap tumende penau: Shunenn ap tumare rajende! Darenn lendar un budrenn lenge, har te budrans o Jesus Kristeske!
49006006	Ma krenn koi budi jaake, te sharenn tumen i menshe! Na-a, krenn koi budi o Jesus Kristeske, te sharell job tumen! Jaake han leskre budepangre, kai o djijestar krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella.
49006007	Krenn tumari budi an o latchepen! Tumer budrenna o Debleske, un gar i menshenge.
49006008	Shunenn: Koon latcho koowa krella, koleste dell o Dewel latcho koowa pale. O Dewel dikell gar koi pre, hoi ko mensho hi: te hi lo i budepaskro, te hi lo i rai.
49006009	Tumer, kai han raja, ap tumende penau: Awenn latches ap kolende, kai tumenge budrenna! Ma denn len trad! Tumer djinenna: Len hi i rai an o bolepen. Kowa hi ninna tumaro rai. Glan leskre jaka hi jek mensho har ko wawar.
49006010	Ninna kamau tumenge te penell: Awenn soreles an o patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste! Les hi i bari soor tumenge.
49006011	O beng kamell tumen an peskro wast te lell. Doleske riwenn kol koola ap tumende, hoi dell o Dewel tumende, te atchenn nai soreles tardo an o kurepen o bengeha!
49006012	Mer kurah men gar i menshentsa. Na-a, tchilatche sorja hi mashkral o bolepen un i phub, kai wenna o bengestar. Kolen hi penepaske an kau tchilatcho tsiro. Kolentsa kurah men.
49006013	Doleske riwenn kol koola ap tumende, hoi dell tumen o Dewel, te kurenn tumen mishto ap ko diwes, kai well o beng ap tumende. Palle han sorleder har job, un atchenn soreles tardo.
49006014	Awenn jaake rido har i kurepaskro, kai djal an o kurepen! Trul leskro per hi i pessi soreli dori, un ap leskro betch i sasterno gad. Ap peskre pire riwell lo sorele kircha. Glan leste rikrell lo i buchli sasterni patrin. Ap leskro shero hidjell lo i sasterni stadi un an leskro tchatcho wast i charo. Djiwenn an o tchatchepen! Kowa hi jaake har te pandan i pessi soreli dori trul tumaro per. Krenn kowa, hoi hi mishto un latcho! Kowa hi har i sasterno gad ap tumaro betch.
49006015	Djan pash i menshende, un penenn lenge o latcho lab, te kras o Jesus Kristo i drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna! Kowa hi jaake, har te riwenn tumer sorele kircha.
49006016	Patsenn soreles ap o Jesus Kristeste! Kowa hi jaake, har te rikrenn i buchli sasterni patrin glan tumende. Koja krell koi jag win, kolaha o beng ap tumende karje della.
49006017	Ma bistrenn, te las tumen o Jesus Kristo dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win! Kowa hi tumenge har i sasterni stadi ap tumaro shero. Lenn ninna o Debleskro lab an tumaro wast. Kowa hi har i charo, hoi dell tumen o Debleskro Ducho.
49006018	Rakrenn hako tsiro o Debleha! Mangenn lestar kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumare djia tchiwella! Ma mukenn tele te mangell les i tsele patslenge!
49006019	Mangenn mange ninna, te dell o Dewel man i tchatche laba, un te darap gar i menshendar, te sikrap lende o Debleskro drom un penap lenge kowa, hoi djinenn le gar.
49006020	Koi budi das man o Jesus Kristo. Doleske hom me kanna stildo. Awa, mangenn o Debles mange, te darap gar un rakrap jaake, har miri budi hi.
49006021	-
