49006022	Me bitchrom maro latcho phrales, o Tichiko, pash tumende, te penell lo tumenge, har mange djala, un hoi me krau. Job budrell o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un krell peskro budi mishto. Me bitchrom les pash tumende, te djinenn tumer kowa lauter, un te krell lo tumare djia soreles.
49006023	Mire phrala, o Debleskri bacht well tumentsa, ninna kamlepen un patsepen! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai.
49006024	O Debleskro latchepen well pral lauterende, kai kamenn maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes, o tselo djijeha! Job dell len o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella!
50001001	Mer, o Paulo un o Timoteo, tchinah kau liil. Mer budrah o Jesus Kristeske, un tchinah kau liil ap lauterende, kolen o Dewel win gole das an o foro Filipi, te patsenn le ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kau liil hi ninna i pralstunenge, kai denn garda ap i patslende, ninna kolenge, kai krenn o Debleskri budi mashkral i patslende.
50001002	Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad an o bolepen, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.
50001003	Hako tsiro, kai wenn tumer mange an o shero, parkrau man tumenge pash miro Debleste.
50001004	Un hako tsiro, kai mangau o Debles tumenge lauterenge, hom bachtelo pral tumende.
50001005	Tumer budran mantsa khetne, har mer sikram i menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Kowa kran tumer, har patslo wan, un mukan gar tele bis kau diwes.
50001006	Doleske djinau: O Dewel kras i latchi budi an tumende. Un job krell ninna, te atchenn pash leste, te wenn latches glan leste tardo ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale.
50001007	Me nai sharau tumen jaake. Tumer han an miro dji un rikrenn mantsa khetne, ninna kanna, kai hom an o stilepen, un penau o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar glan i tchatchepangre un sikrau lende leskro drom jaake, te djinenn le o tchatchepen.
50001008	O Dewel djinella: Miro dji hi pash tumende. O Jesus Kristo das man i baro kamlepen tumenge.
50001009	Un me mangau o Deblestar, te well tumaro kamlepen bareder un bareder, te haiwenn, hoi o Dewel kamella, un te djinenn, hoi te krenna.
50001010	Jaake nai dikenn, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi. Un ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale, han tumer an o tchatchepen glan leste tardo, un kek doosh hi ap tumende.
50001011	Un ko bud latcho un tchatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran, krell o Debles bares. Kowa kran tumer an i soor, hoi o Jesus Kristo das tumen.
50001012	Shunenn, mire phrala, me kamau te djinenn tumer kowa: Dran lauter, hoi ap mande was, shunan bud menshe o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
50001013	I tsele lurde, kai denn garda ap o themeskro rajeskro kheer, ninna kol wawar, kai kate hi, kolla lauter djinenn kanna, kai hom me o Jesus Kristeske an o stilepen.
50001014	Ninna bud patsle wan sorleder an o patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste, kanna, kai me stildo hom. Kolen hi buder kek traash, te sikrenn le i menshende o Jesuseskro drom.
50001015	-
50001017	Mashkral lende hi ninna sawe, kai silwerenn ap mande. Kolla rakrenn o Jesus Kristestar, te sikrenn le mande, kai jon kowa feteder haiwenna har me. Jon krenn kowa dran i tchilatcho dji un kamenn, te well mange budeder ropaske. Wawar sikrenn i menshende o Jesuseskro drom dran i latcho dji. Jon kamenn man o djijestar un djinenna, me hom kate stildo, te sikrap o Jesuseskro drom i tchatchepangren jaake, te djinenn le o tchatchepen.
50001018	Hoi te penap? Mange hi bud moldo, te well o Jesuseskro drom i menshende siklo, jaake te jaake. Jek rakrell lestar dran i tchilatcho dji, un i wawar dran i latcho dji.
50001019	Awa, me hom bachtelo. Tumer mangenn o Debles mange. Un ap miri rig hi o Debleskro Ducho, kai o Jesus Kristo man das. Doleske djinau, te djal lauter mishto mange.
50001020	Me patsau te rikrell man o Dewel an o wast, un kamau o tselo djijestar te krap tchi, kai hunte ladjap man glan leste. Kamau gar, te trashap i menshendar. Jaake har rakrom hako tsiro o Jesus Kristestar, un trashom lendar gar, jaake kamau les ninna kanna an o stilepen te krell, ninna te hunte merap, te dikenn i menshe ap miro djipen un ap miro merepen, har baro un railo o Jesus Kristo hi.
50001021	Miro djipen hi o Jesus Kristeske. Un te merau me, hi kowa mange feteder.
50001022	Me te atchau djido, nai sikrau budeder menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Doleske djinau gar, hoi budeder moldo hi.
50001023	Awa, me djinau gar, hoi feteder hi. Ap jek rig kamaus te merap un te wap pash o Jesus Kristeste. Kowa wals mange feteder.
50001024	Ap i wawar rig wals tumenge feteder, te atchap djido.
50001025	-
50001026	Doleske hi miro dji sorelo, un me djinau, te atchap djido, un wau pale pash tumende. Te hom pale pash tumende, wenn tumer soreles un bachteles an o patsepen, un parkrenn tumen pash o Jesus Kristeste, un sharenn les bud un budeder.
50001027	Kanna, krenn lauter, te djan jaake ap o Jesuseskro drom, har kowa tumende siklo was! Krenn kowa ninna, te hom gar pash tumende! Te dikau tumen gar, kamaus te shunap, te rikrenn tumer lauter khetne an o patsepen, un te krenn i tseli sorjaha lauter, te well o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste sorelo pash tumende.
50001028	Ma darenn kolendar, kai kamenn gar o Jesus Kristes, un kai chan pen ap tumende! Te han sorelo an o patsepen tardo, sikrell kowa lende, te djan jon nashedo, un te lenn tumer o djipen an o bolepen, hoi wella o Deblestar.
50001029	O Dewel hi tumenge latcho, un das tumen o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste, un gar o patsepen kokres. Na-a, dran o patsepen ap leste, hunte lenn tumer ninna duka ap tumende.
50001030	Kol duka, hoi ap tumende wenna, his man ninna, har homs pash tumende. Un ninna kanna ap kau tsiro shunenn tumer mandar, kai hunte lap duka ap mande.
50002001	Me djinau, tumer rakrenn i menshenge o Jesuseskre laba an o dji. Tumare laba wenna dran o kamlepen, un krenn lengre djia soreles. O Debleskro Ducho rikrell tumen khetne, un tumen hi i baro dji i wawarenge.
50002002	Kowa lauter krell man bachtelo. Krenn man gomme bachtleder, te well tumen jek dji un jek djipen, un te kamell hakeno o wawares o djijestar! Rikrenn khetne un tchingrenn tumen gar!
50002003	Kek te krell tchomone, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, witar tchi, te well lo sharedo pash i menshende! Kek te krell, har te wals lo feteder har ko wawar! Na-a, ap hakeneste penau: Dik jaake ap o wawareste, har te wals lo bareder har tu!
50002004	Kek te dikell ap peste kokres, te djal leske mishto! Job te dikell ninna ap o wawareste, te djal koleske ninna mishto!
50002005	Djiwenn jaake, har o Jesus Kristo djiwas!
50002006	Ninna te his lo o Dewel, mukas lo peskro railepen un peskri soor, hoi les an o bolepen his.
50002007	Job das kowa lauter pre, un was i mensho, un djiwas har i menshe. Job was i budepaskro o Debleske,
50002008	un shunas ap leste, un mukas, te wan i menshe rai pral leste, un maran les, un dan les ap o trushel.
50002009	Doleske kras o Dewel, te well job bareder har hako wawar rai.
50002010	Un hakeno an o bolepen un ap i phub un tel i phub hunte perell glan leste tele ap i tchanga.
50002011	Un lauter hunte penenna: "O Jesus Kristo hi o rai pral lauter!" Un jaake sharenn le o Debles, maro dades an o bolepen.
50002012	Mire kamle phrala un phenja, tumer shunan hako tsiro ap kowa, hoi me tumenge penom, har pash tumende homs, ninna kanna, kai gar pash tumende hom. Me penau tumenge: Krenn lauter, te atchenn ap o Debleskro drom, bis te han pash leste! Shunenn ap o Debleste, un trashenn lestar!
50002013	Job sikrell tumen, hoi job kamella. Ninna krell lo an tumende, te kamenn tumer kowa, hoi job kamella, un te nai krenn kowa ninna.
50002014	Lauter kowa, hoi tumer krenna, krenn les i bachtelo djijestar, un tchingrenn gar!
50002015	Jaake djiwenn tumer, har mishto hi. Un kek hatsell i doosh ap tumende. Tumer han o Debleskre tchawe, un djiwenn mashkral kol menshende, kai hi tchilatcho un nashran pen an bud dinelo koowa. Mashkral kolende han tumer har i momlia an i rati,
50002016	te rikrenn tumer ap o Debleskro latcho lab, hoi o djipen della. Te krenn tumer kowa lauter, palle hom me bachtelo ap ko diwes, kai o Jesus Kristo pale wella. Jaake his miri budi pash tumende gar tchitcheske.
50002017	Me anom tumen ap o Debleskro drom. Doleske hom me glan leste tardo har i rashai, kai anell leske tumaro patsepen. Ninna te meroms pash miri budi o Jesus Kristeske, hom me kanna bachtelo tumentsa khetne pral tumaro patsepen.
50002018	Awenn tumer ninna bachtelo koi pral! Awa, awenn bachtelo mantsa!
50002019	Kamau te bitchrap o Timotes sik pash tumende, un patsau, te krell maro rai Jesus i drom, te bitchrap les. O Timoteo, te well lo pale pash mande, nai penell lo mange, har tumenge djala, te wap bachtelo pral tumende.
50002020	Man hi kek wawar har job, koles sawo baro dji hi tumenge, un job kamell, te djal tumenge mishto.
50002021	Kol wawar krenn lauter, hoi lenge mishto hi. Jon krenn gar, hoi o Jesus Kristo kamella.
50002022	Tumer prindjrenn o Timotes un djinenn, har mishto leskri budi hi. Har me i menshende o Jesuseskro drom sikrom, his lo mange koi, har hi i tchawo peskro dadeske koi.
50002023	Koles kamau me pash tumende bitchrell, jaake sik har djinau, hoi kate mantsa djala.
50002024	Me patsau te mukell man o rai Jesus sik pash tumende te well.
50002025	Kanna bitchrau maro phrales, o Epafrodito, pash tumende pale. Koles bitchran tumer pash mande, te anas lo man kowa, hoi man hunte well djipaske. Peskri tseli sorjaha kras lo mantsa o Debleskri budi.
50002026	Tumer shunan, kai job nasselo was. Har job shunas, kai tumer djinenn kowa, rowas leskro dji, un job kamas pash tumende te well.
50002027	Job his tchatchepaha ap o merepen tchiddo. O Dewel his leske latches, un rikras peskro wast pral leste. Gar kokres leske his lo latches, ninna mange his lo latches, te well mange gar budeder ropaske.
50002028	Doleske bitchrau les sik pash tumende, te dikenn les tumer, te wenn bachtelo, un te well ninna mange buder gar ropaske.
50002029	Lenn les o djijestar pash tumende pre! Job hi maro phraal an o patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste. Sawe phrala har job hi tumenge bud moldo.
50002030	Har tumer wan nai gar pash mande, his job mange koi, un leskro djipen his leske gar bud moldo. Leskri budi o Jesus Kristeske anas les pash o merepen.
50003001	Mire phrala, awenn bachtelo, kai tumer ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste, patsenn! Me wau gar khino, te tchinap tumenge pale te pale ko emligo koowa, te wenn tumer soreles an o dji.
50003002	Denn garda, te shunenn gar ap kolende, kai hi tchilatche budepangre un djukle. Jon kamenna, te mukenn tumen ap tumaro mass te tchinell, un penenn: "Kowa hunte krenn, te nai wenn tumer o Debleskre menshe!"
50003003	Mer, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsah, ham tchatchepaha o Debleskre menshe. Ap mende hi o Debleskro Ducho. Jaake nai krah o Debleskri budi. Mer ham bachtelo pral kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge kras un hunte rikras kek koowa, hoi wella i menshendar. Mer djinah, sawo koowa nai anell men gar pash o Debleste.
50003004	Me nai sharoms man ninna, te rikrom menshengro koowa. Jek te sharals pes, te hi lo tchindlo ap peskro mass, palle nai sharoms man budeder.
50003005	Me wom ap miro mass tchindlo, har homs ochta diwessa phuro. Me hom i Israelitari. Mire menshe hi Benjaminarja. Me hom i Hebreari. Un miro dad un miri dai hi ninna Hebrearja. Un me homs i Farisari, un djiwom pal o Moseskre lila.
50003006	Miri tseli sorjaha lom kolen palla, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna. Me krom kowa lauter, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, un kek nai anas i doosh ap mande.
50003007	Har o Jesus Kristo miro rai was, was mange lauter kowa tchi moldo, hoi mange an ko tsiro bud moldo his.
50003008	Awa, kowa lauter, hoi me ap ko tsiro patsom un krom, hi mange kanna buder tchi moldo. Me prindjrau kanna o Jesus Kristes. Job hi miro rai. Doleske hi ko tselo wawar koowa mange har tchik, un tchi moldo. O Jesus Kristes kokres kamau te prindjrell budeder.
50003009	Leske kamau te djiwell. Har djiwom pal o Moseskre lila kras man kowa gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. Na-a, miro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste kras man tchatcho glan o Debleste. Koon patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste, koles tchiwell o Dewel an o tchatchepen.
50003010	Kamoms te prindjrap tchi wawar har o Jesus Kristes un o Debleskri soor, kai kras les i mulendar djido. Un me lau duka ap mande, jaake har job duka ap peste las, te wap jaake har job bis ap o merepen,
50003011	te krell o Dewel man ninna i mulendar djido.
50003012	Ninna te hom gomme gar jaake har kamoms te wap, un hom gomme gar kote, kai kamau te wap, nashau o Jesuseskro drom, te lap o djipen pash o Debleste. Koleske das man o Jesus Kristo gole.
50003013	Mire phrala, me nai penau gomme gar mandar, te hom me jaake har kamoms te wap. Jek nai penau: Me bistrau, hoi pal mande hi, un rodau kowa, hoi glan mande hi.
50003014	Me nashau ap o Jesuseskro drom dureder, te lap ko shukar koowa, hoi dell o Dewel kolen, kai gar pre dan. Kowa hi o djipen pash leste an o bolepen. Doleske das lo men gole, te djiwas o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
50003015	Koon prindjrell kowa lauter, hunte djiwell jaake. Te haiwell jek tumendar tchomone wawartchandes, pale sikrell les o Dewel, har kowa tchatcho hi.
50003016	Jek hunte kras: Kowa, hoi mer djinah, jaake hunte djiwas ninna.
50003017	Mire phrala, dikenn ap mande un ap kolende, kai djiwenn jaake har me! Djiwenn tumer ninna jaake!
50003018	Me penom tumenge, un penau les kanna pale i ropaha: Bud menshe djiwenn jaake, har te wals lenge o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel tchi moldo.
50003019	Jon djan ap i drom, kai djan le nashedo. Lengro per hi lengro Dewel. Jon sharenn ko djungelo koowa, hoi kran le, un hunte ladjans pen pral kowa. Kowa, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, hi phubjakro koowa.
50003020	Maro them, kai khere ham, hi o bolepen, kai o rai, o Jesus Kristo, hi. Mer dikah ap ko diwes, kai well lo pale, un te dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
50003021	Kanna ham menshe, kai hunte merenna. Job krell dran mende newe menshe, kai wenn jaake har job, un merah buder gar. Jaake sorelo hi lo. Les hi koi soor, te krell lo lauter, hoi job kamella.
50004001	Mire kamle phrala, me kamau o tselo djijestar pash tumende te well. Tumer han miri bacht un miro railepen. Doleske atchenn soreles pash maro rajeste, o Jesuseste!
50004002	Me mangau tumen, tumer phenja Evodia un Sinticha, tchingrenn buder gar khetne! Tumer han phenja an o patsepen ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste.
50004003	Me mangau ninna tut, miro latcho males, ab lenge ap i rig! Har sikrom i menshenge o Jesuseskro drom, budran le khetne mantsa un o phraleha, o Klemens, un kol wawarentsa, kolengre laba hi tchindlo an o Debleskro liil, kai halauter dre tchindlo hi, kai lenn o Debleskro djipen.
50004004	Awenn bachtelo hako tsiro! Tumari bacht well o Jesusestar, maro rajestar. Awa, awenn bachtelo!
50004005	Sikrenn hakeneste tumaro latchepen! O rai Jesus wella an i tikno tsiro pale.
50004006	Ma darenn tchi! Hako tsiro mangenn o Deblestar, hoi tumen hunte well, un penenn leske lauter, hoi ap tumaro dji hi! Un parkrenn tumen pash leste!
50004007	Palle dell o Dewel tumen peskri bacht an o dji. Leskri bacht hi jaake baro, kai nai haiwah kowa gar. Un o Jesus Kristo rikrell tumaro dji, un lell tumari daar krik.
50004008	Pale penau tumenge, mire phrala, rakrenn pral kowa, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi, hoi djudjo hi, hoi kamlo hi, hoi mishto hi pash i menshende! Awa, rakrenn pral lauter kowa, hoi shukar hi un well sharedo!
50004009	Un djiwenn jaake, har me tumenge penom un sikrom, jaake har tumer kowa mandar shunan un ap mande dikan! Un o Dewel, kai kras i drom, te nai djiwah an o latchepen khetne, hi tumentsa!
50004010	Me homs o djijestar bachtelo, un parkrom man pash maro rajeste, o Jesuseste, har dikom, kai tumer bistran man gar, un bitchran man kowa, hoi man hunte well djipaske. Ninna te kaman tumer kowa i raha tsiro mange te krell, djas kowa gar.
50004011	Kowa penau gar, te sikrap tumen, kai man gar doha his. Na-a. An miro djipen haiwom, te hi mange kowa doha, hoi man hi.
50004012	Me nai hom tchorwelo, un me nai hom brawelo. Kowa lauter prindjrau. Me nai bokau. Un me nai hom tchalo. Me djinau har kowa hi, te hi man budeder har doha djipaske. Un me djinau, har kowa hi, te hi man gar doha djipaske.
50004013	O Jesus Kristo dell man i soor, te djiwap jaake te jaake.
50004014	Ninna te rakrau jaake, his kowa shukar tumendar, kai wan mange ap i rig, har djas mange gar mishto.
50004015	Tumer patsle, kai an o foro Filipi djiwenna, tumer djinenna, har krom man ap o drom, te penap i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un djom dran o them Macedonia win. An ko tsiro dan tumer man lauter, hoi man hunte was djipaske. Kek wawar patsle, pash kolende homs, kran kowa, har tumer kokres.
50004016	Ninna har homs an o foro Tessalonika, bitchran tumer mange dui kope tchomone.
50004017	Me penau kowa gar, te denn mange tchomone. Na-a, kamau, te denn tumer o Debleske tchomone, te sharell job tumen.
50004018	Kanna hi man lauter, hoi man hunte well djipaske, un budeder har doha. O Epafrodito anas mange kowa lauter, hoi tumer mange bitchran. Kowa hi jaake, har te anans tumer o Debleske latcho koowa, hoi sungell mishto, un kai dikell lo latches pre un hi bachtelo pral kowa.
50004019	Miro Dewel dell ninna tumen lauter, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske. Les hi i baro brawlepen an o bolepen. Kowa dell lo kolen, kai djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom.
50004020	Sharas o Debles, maro dades an o bolepen, kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.
50004021	-
50004022	Penenn ap kol tsele patslende, kai djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom: "Atchenn maro Debleha!" Kowa penenn tumenge ninna kol phrala, kai pash mande hi, ninna i tsele patsle, kai kate an o foro Rom hi. Kolla, kai budrenn an o kheer o baro rajestar an o foro Rom, kamenn tumen o tselo djijestar.
50004023	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, well pral tumende!
51001001	-
51001002	Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil khetne maro phraleha, o Timoteo. O Jesus Kristo bitchras man, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Jaake kamell kowa o Dewel. Mer tchinah kau liil ap o Debleskre tchawende an o foro Kolossa. Tumer han mare phrala un phenja an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste. Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, an o dji!
51001003	-
51001004	Mer shunam, har tumer patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, un har tumer i tsele patslen o djijestar kamenna. Doleske parkrah men tumenge pash o Debleste hako tsiro, kai mangah les tumenge. Job hi o dad maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar.
51001005	Tumaro patsepen un kamlepen well dran kowa, kai dikenn tumer ap ko diwes, kai djiwenn tumer o Debleha khetne an o bolepen. Kowa shunan tumer ap ko tsiro, har tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar penlo was. Un ko lab hi tchatcho.
51001006	Kau latcho lab was gar tumenge kokres penlo. Na-a, kau lab well ap i tseli phub penlo. Un bud un budeder menshe wenna patsle. Jaake hi ninna pash tumende: Tumer shunan ko latcho lab, un haiwan tchatchepaha, kai hi o Dewel latches ap tumende.
51001007	Kau lab penas tumenge maro kamlo phraal, o Epafras. Kowa budrella o Jesus Kristeske har mer. Job krell peskri budi mishto pash tumende.
51001008	Job penas menge, har baro tumaro kamlepen hi, hoi das tumen o Debleskro Ducho.
51001009	Un har mer kowa shunam, mangam o Debles tumenge, un mukam gar tele, te mangas lestar, te dell lo an tumende o goswepen, hoi dell o Debleskro Ducho, te haiwenn tumer, hoi o Dewel kamella.
51001010	Palle djiwenn tumer jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo, un krenn lauter, hoi hi latcho un mishto glan leskre jaka. Un dran tumaro djipen well bud latcho koowa. Un tumer prindjrenn o Debles hako tsiro feteder.
51001011	Lestar mangah, te dell lo tumen peskri bari soor, te wenn tumare djia soreles, te djan bachteles dureder ap leskro drom, ninna an ko tsiro, kai hi tumaro djipen pharo.
51001012	Parkrenn tumen o tselo djijestar pash o Debleste, kai hi tumaro dad an o bolepen! Job kras tumen moldo, te djiwenn tumer khetne i wawar patslentsa pash leste an o bolepen, kai hi kek tamlepen.
51001013	Job las men win dran i wasta kolestar, kai hi o rai pral o tamlepen un o tchilatchepen, te djiwas mer khetne peskro Tchaweha, koles job o djijestar kamella. Kowa hi maro rai,
51001014	kai plaissras menge peskro rateha, un las mari doosh mendar krik.
51001015	Kek nai dikell o Debles. Har leskro tchawo ap i phub was, sikras job har o Dewel hi. O Jesus Kristo hi jaake har peskro dad. Un job hi bareder har lauter, hoi kerdo was.
51001016	Dran leste was lauter kerdo, hoi hi an o bolepen un ap i phub, kowa, hoi dikah, un hoi gar dikah. Mank lende hi bare raja un i sorele pralstune un lauter, kai hi len penepaske mashkral o bolepen un i phub. Lauter wan dran leste, un wan leske kerdo.
51001017	O Jesus Kristo his glan hako wawareste koi. Un lauter, hoi koi hi, rikrell lo djides.
51001018	Job hi o pralstuno pral i tsele patslende. Har o Dewel les i mulendar djido kras, das lo les o newo djipen glan hako wawareste, koles o Dewel newes krella. Jaake kras o Dewel, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o pralstuno pral halauter, hoi koi hi.
51001019	O Debles his an peskro dji, te djiwell lo an peskro tchaweste, te well o tchawo jaake har o dad.
51001020	Un o Jesus Kristo hi ko drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe pale mala wenna. Har job ap o trushel meras, un peskro rat ratas, anas o Dewel lauteren pash peste khetne, hoi hi an o bolepen un ap i phub.
51001021	Ninna tumen anas o Dewel pash peste. Glan i raha tsiro djiwan tumer dur lestar, kran tchilatcho koowa, un kaman o Debles gar.
51001022	Kanna wan tumer o Debleskre mala. Har peskro tchawo tumenge meras, las lo tumari doosh tumendar un kras tumen djudjo un erligo glan leste.
51001023	Jek koowa hunte krenn tumer: Atchenn ap o Jesuseskro drom! Patsenn soreles ap leste! Mukenn gar tele, te dikenn ap kowa, hoi tumen hi pash o Debleste! Rikrenn soreles ap leskro latcho lab, hoi tumenge penlo was! Ko lab was penlo ap i tseli phub. Ninna me, o Paulo, hunte penap ko lab i menshenge. Kowa hi miri budi.
51001024	Un kanna hom bachtelo an kol duka, hoi anom tumenge ap mande. Jaake har o Jesus Kristo anas duka ap peste i patslenge, jaake hunte anap me ninna duka ap mande i patslenge.
51001025	Lengro budepaskro wom me. O Dewel das man koi budi, te penap tumenge o tselo Debleskro lab.
51001026	I raha tsiro djinan i menshe ap i tseli phub gar, hoi o Dewel kamas te krell. Kanna djinenn les o Debleskre menshe.
51001027	Kolen sikras o Dewel, har baro un shukar ko drom hi, hoi anell ninna kol menshen pash leste, kai kek bibolde hi. Un ko drom hi o Jesus Kristo, kai djiwell an tumende. Doleske djinenn nai, te djiwenn tumer leha khetne an o bolepen.
51001028	Un kau Jesuseskro drom sikrah mer i menshende, un penah hakeneske an o dji, te djal lo ap kau drom. Mer penah lenge o Debleskro lab jaake, te haiwenn le les mishto. O Dewel kamella, te well hakeno baro un sorelo an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste.
51001029	Dran kowa budrau i tseli sorjaha, hoi o Jesus Kristo an mande das.
51002001	Me kamau, te djinenn tumer, har me marau man tele tumenge un kol patslenge an o foro Laodicea, ninna kolenge, kai prindjrenn man gar.
51002002	Kowa krau, te wenn tumer soreles an tumaro dji, un rikrenn khetne an o kamlepen. Ninna kamau, te haiwenn tumer mishto o Debleskro drom, hoi i menshe i raha tsiro gar djinan. Ko drom hi o Jesus Kristo.
51002003	Job kokres nai dell tumen o tselo goswepen, te haiwenn o Debleskro lab mishto.
51002004	Kowa penau tumenge, te anell tumen kek chochene labentsa kau dromestar tele.
51002005	Ninna te hom gar pash tumende, han tumer an miro dji. Un me hom bachtelo, te shunau, kai han soreles tardo an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste.
51002006	Tumer lan o rajes, o Jesus Kristes, an tumare djia. Djiwenn kanna jaake leha khetne,
51002007	te well tumaro patsepen jaake sorelo har i ruk, hoi soreles an i phub tardo hi! Ma mukenn ko tchatcho drom, hoi tumende siklo was! Bistrenn witar gar, te parkrenn tumen bud pash o Debleste!
51002008	Denn jak, te shunenn ap kekeste, kai kamell te taprell tumen shukar labentsa, hoi wenna dran i menshengro goswepen. Kowa hi chochepen un tchi moldo! Kol laba hi menshengro rakepen, hoi i phure ap i tchawende dureder penan un wella i phubjatar, un gar o Jesus Kristestar.
51002009	-
51002010	O Jesus Kristo hi o rai pral i tsele rajende un lauterende, kai hi len penepaske mashkral o bolepen un i phub. Les hi o tselo Debleskro djipen an peste. Un ko djipen dell lo kolende, kai leskro hi.
51002011	Har mukan tumaro phuro djipen pal tumende, wan tumer o Debleskre menshe. I bibolde wan tchindlo i wastentsa ap pengro mass. Tumer wan gar tchindlo i wastentsa. Na-a! Tumer lan i newo dji, hoi das tumen o Jesus Kristo.
51002012	Har tumer o Jesus Kristeske an o pani thodo wan, was tumaro phuro djipen paskedo. Un jaake wan tumer o Jesus Kristeha paskedo. Har tumer ap leste patsan, kras o Dewel tumen djido, jaake har job o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido kras.
51002013	An o phuro tsiro, har tumer an o tchilatchepen djiwan, hans mulo o Debleske, un hans gar leskre menshe. Kanna kras o Dewel tumen o Jesus Kristeha djido, un las tumari tseli doosh tumendar.
51002014	Har kram tchilatcho koowa, his kowa jaake, har te wals mari doosh an i liil tchindlo. Ko liil las lo, un tchiwas les ap o trushel.
51002015	Un i raja un lauter, kolen hi penepaske mashkral o bolepen un i phub, kolla nashran pengri soor, har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel meras. Kote sikras o Dewel glan lauterende, kai hi o Jesus Kristo sorleder har jon.
51002016	Ma shunenn ap kolende, kai penenn tumenge: "Hi gar mishto, te chan un pijenn tumer kawa te kowa!" Ma shunenn ap lende, te penenn le tumenge, te denn jak ap i bare diwessa an o tchon un an o bersh, ninna ap o diwes, kai i bibolde gar budrenna.
51002017	Me penau tumenge: Kol tsele laba, kai penenn, hoi hunte krenn, un hoi hunte krenn gar, kol laba das o Dewel i bibolden glan i raha tsiro, te sikrell lo len, te well jek diwes, kai kowa wella, kai hi bareder har kau tselo koowa. Kowa was kanna. Job hi o Jesus Kristo.
51002018	Hi menshe, kai krenn pen bares, un kamenna, te shunenn tumer ap kawa te kowa, un te sharenn tumer o Debleskre bolepangre, har jon krenna. Ma shunenn ap lende! Ninna te penenn le tumenge, te dikan le i baro koowa, hoi kek wawar dikas, ma patsenn lenge! Kowa, hoi jon penenna, hi tchi moldo. Jon hi sharede, ninna te dell tchi, pral hoi jon nai sharans pen: Lauter hoi jon rakrenna well dran lengro shero.
51002019	Jon rikrenn pen gar ap o Jesus Kristeste, ko rai pral i tsele patslende. Jaake har i kokale i menshes khetne rikrenna, jaake rikrell job i patslen khetne pash leste, un dell len lauter, hoi len hunte well djipaske. Un jon wenna baro un sorelo an o patsepen jaake, har o Dewel kowa kamella.
51002020	Tumer meran o Jesus Kristeha. Doleske hi i phubjakro koowa buder gar o rai pral tumende. Hoske rikrenn tumen gomme ap kol menshengre laba, kai penenn tumenge:
51002021	Ma taprenn kawa! Ma chan kowa! Ma lenn kowa an tumaro wast!
51002022	Me penau: Ko koowa hi chapaske un atchell gar. Kol laba hi menshengre laba.
51002023	Ninna te wals jaake, har te wans kol laba gosewe laba, hi le tchi moldo. Kol menshe marenn pen tele o Debleske, jaake har jon kamenna, un gar har o Dewel kowa kamella. Jon shunenn ap kawa te kowa, un marenn pen tele. Un jaake krenn le kowa, hoi dran lende wella un gar o Deblestar.
51003001	O Dewel kras tumen o Jesus Kristeha i mulendar djido. Doleske tchiwenn tumaro dji ap kowa, hoi hi an o bolepen! Kote hi o Jesus Kristo ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar beshdo!
51003002	Dikenn ap kowa, hoi an o bolepen hi! Ma dikenn ap kowa, hoi ap i phub hi!
51003003	Tumer meran. Un tumaro newo djipen hi kanna o Jesus Kristeha pash o Debleste an o bolepen, ninna te dikenn kowa kanna gomme gar.
51003004	Ap ko tsiro, kai nai dikell hakeno o Jesus Kristes, dikenn le ninna tumen pash leste an leskro railepen.
51003005	Ma krenn buder ko koowa, hoi kran an tumaro phuro djipen: Ma luberenn trujal! Ma krenn djungelo un wi-ladjedo koowa! Ma mukenn tchilatcho koowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal! Ma nashenn pal i lowe! Koon pal i lowe nashella, koleske hi peskre lowe har leskro dewel.
51003006	Kol menshe, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste, kolla krenna sawo koowa. Doleske well o Debleskri choli pral lende.
51003007	Ap ko phuro tsiro, har tumer gar ap o Jesus Kristeste patsan, kran tumer ninna kowa lauter.
51003008	-
51003009	Kanna djiwenn tumer buder gar tumaro phuro djipen. Doleske tchiwenn i choli tumendar krik, ninna o tchilatchepen, o djungelo rakepen pral o wawareste, wi-ladjede laba! Ma chochenn tumen!
51003010	Djiwenn kanna o newo djipen! Mukenn tumen o Deblestar bud un budeder newes te krell, jaake te prindjrenn o Debles feteder un djinenn, hoi job kamella! Palle wenn tumer jaake har job, kai tumen o newo djipen das.
51003011	Kote, kai o Dewel i menshen newes kras, kote hi jek jaake bud moldo har o wawar: I bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi; kolla, kai ap o mass tchindlo hi un kolla, kai gar ap o mass tchindlo hi; wi-themarja un diwje; raja un budepangre. O Jesus Kristo djiwell an hakeneste mendar.
51003012	Tumer han kanna o Debleskre menshe, kolen job peske win rodas. Job kamell tumen o djijestar. Doleske hunte well tumen i baro dji o wawareske, te well hakeno latcho ap o wawareste, te krell pes kek bareder har o wawar, te rakrell hakeno latches o wawareha, te dell kek o wawares sik pre,
51003013	te choirell pes kek sik pral o wawareste. Un bistrenn ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kran! Jaake har o rai, o Jesus Kristo, tumari doosh bistras, hunte krenn tumer kowa ninna.
51003014	Bareder har lauter hi o kamlepen, hoi wella o Deblestar. Te kamenn tumer i wawaren o djijestar, palle krenn tumer lauter, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella, un hoi tumen khetne rikrella.
51003015	O Jesus Kristo das tumen pash peste gole, te djiwenn lauter leha khetne. Djiwenn kanna jaake, te han tumer jek dji un jek djipen! Un parkrenn tumen pash o Debleste!
51003016	Ma mukenn tele, te rakrenn un shunenn o lab o Jesus Kristestar! Rakrenn les tumenge an o dji! Awenn gosewo koi pashal, te sikrell jek o wawareste, har te djal lo ap o Debleskro drom! Giwenn Debleskre gilja un sawe gilja, hoi sharenn o Debles, ninna sawe gilja, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwella! Awa, giwenn o Debleske, un sharenn les an tumare djia!
51003017	Un lauter, hoi tumer krenna un penenna, kowa krenn un penenn jaake, te well maro rai Jesus sharedo! Un parkrenn tumen pash o Debleste, maro dadeste, lautereske, hoi o Jesus Kristo tumenge kras!
51003018	Tumer djuwja, ma hadenn tumen pral tumare romende! Jaake kamell kowa tumaro rai Jesus tumendar.
51003019	Tumer mursha, awenn kamlo ap tumare romjende, un gar chojedo!
51003020	Tumer tchawe, shunenn hako tsiro ap tumaro dadeste un ap tumari date! Kowa kamell o rai Jesus tumendar.
51003021	Tumer dada, ma awenn gar jaake chojedo ap tumare tchawen, te darenn le tumendar an o dji!
51003022	Tumer budepangre, shunenn hako tsiro ap tumare rajende, kolenge tumer hunte budrenna! Ma krenn tumari budi jaake, te sharenn tumen i menshe! Na-a! Budrenn lenge o tchatcho djijestar, un jaake, har kamell o rai Jesus kowa tumendar.
51003023	Lauter, hoi tumer krenna, krenn kowa o djijestar o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un gar i menshenge!
51003024	Djinenn, maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, dell tumen peskro brawlepen an o bolepen. Leskre budepangre han tumer.
51003025	Koon o tchilatchepen krella, kowa lell i phagi. Pash o Debleste hi hakeno jaake bud moldo har o wawar.
51004001	Tumer kai han raja, ap tumende penau: Awenn tchatches ap tumare budepangre un djan lentsa mishto trujal! Ma bistrenn, kai hi tumen ninna i rai an o bolepen!
51004002	Ma mukenn tele, te mangenn o Debles! Parkrenn tumen hako tsiro pash leste!
51004003	Mangenn o Debles ninna menge, te krell lo menge i drom pre, te penas nai leskro lab i menshenge, te sikras lende, te hi o Jesus Kristo ko drom, kai anell men pash o Debleste. Kowa djinan i menshe i raha tsiro gar. Har me kowa i menshenge penom, wom doleske an o stilepen.
51004004	Mangenn o Deblestar, te rakrap kowa jaake, har o Dewel kamella!
51004005	Djiwenn tumaro djipen jaake, te dikenn i wawar, kai tumer patsle han! Rodenn i drom, te rakrenn lentsa pral o Debleste!
51004006	Rakrenn lentsa kamles, un trashenn gar, te penenn o tchatchepen! Jek te putchell tumendar tchomone pral tumaro patsepen, palle rakrenn leha jaake, har kowa koleske mishto hi.
51004007	-
51004008	Me bitchrau miro latcho phrales, o Tichiko, pash tumende, te penell lo tumenge lauter, hoi mantsa djal. Job budrell mantsa o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un krell peskri budi mishto. Koles bitchrau pash tumende, te djinenn tumer, har menge djala, te wenn tumer soreles an o dji.
51004009	Leha khetne bitchrau miro latcho phrales, o Onesimo, kai rikrell soreles ap o patsepen. Kowa hi jek tumendar. Kol dui penenn tumenge lauter, hoi kate djala.
51004010	-
51004011	O Aristarcho, kai mantsa an o stilepen hi, penell tumenge "Atchenn o Debleha!" Ninna o Marko un ko Josua, kai ninna Justo kharella, penenn tumenge "Atchenn o Debleha!" O Marko hi o kakeskro tchawo o Barnabestar. Te well lo pash tumende, lenn les kamles pre, har penom tumenge glan i tsiro! Kolla triin mursha hi bibolde, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna. I tsele biboldendar, kai kate hi, krenna kol triin kokres mantsa khetne o Debleskri budi. Jon dan man soor an miro dji.
51004012	Ninna o Epafras penell tumenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Kowa hi jek tumendar, un budrell o Jesus Kristeske. Job mangell o Debles hako tsiro tumenge, te wenn tumer soreles an o patsepen, te djinenn lauter, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella un te krenn kowa ninna.
51004013	Me nai penau, har bud job o Deblestar mangas tumenge un kol patslenge an i forja Laodicea un Hierapolis.
51004014	Ninna o Luka un o Demas penenn tumenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" O Luka hi ko dramaskro, koles mer lauter o djijestar kamah.
51004015	Penenn i patslenge an o foro Laodicea mendar: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Penenn kowa ninna i Nimfa, un kol tsele patslenge, kai wenn khetne an lakro kheer!
51004016	Tumer te draweran kau liil, palle denn les ninna i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o foro Laodicea. Un drawerenn ninna ko liil, hoi tchinom kolenge!
51004017	Penenn ap o Archippo: Kre koi budi, hoi o rai Jesus tut das! Muk gar tele!
51004018	Me, o Paulo, tchinau tumenge miro wasteha kal laba: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Ma bistrenn man, kai hom an o stilepen! O Debleskro latchepen djal tumentsa!
52001001	Mer, o Paulo, o Silwano un o Timoteo, tchinah kau liil ap tumende, kol patslende, kai wenna khetne an o foro Tessalonika. Tumer patsenn ap o Debleste, maro dadeste, un ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste. Latchepen un bacht tumenge!
52001002	Hako tsiro, kai mangah o Debles, parkrah men tumenge pash leste, maro dadeste.
52001003	Hako tsiro, kai parkrah men pash leste, well menge kowa an o shero, hoi tumer leske krenna an o patsepen un an o kamlepen ap i menshende, un har tumer mukenn gar tele, te dikenn ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale.
52001004	Mire phrala, o Dewel kamell tumen o djijestar. Mer djinah, job rodas tumen win, te djiwenn leha khetne.
52001005	Har wam pash tumende, un penam tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab, koi penam gar leskro lab kokres, na-a, koi dikan tumer ninna o Debleskri soor an halauter, hoi job mashkral tumende kras. Un o Debleskro Ducho rakras ap tumende, un tumer haiwan, leskro lab hi tchatcho. Ninna djinenn tumer, har djiwam maro djipen pash tumende, un sikram tumen o Debleskro drom.
52001006	Un kowa, hoi dikan tumer ap mende, kowa krenn tumer kanna ninna, un djiwenn jaake, har o rai Jesus djiwas. Har shunan tumer o Debleskro lab, patsan les un hans bachtelo pral kowa, ninna te kran i menshe tumenge o djipen phares. Koi bacht das o Debleskro Ducho an tumende.
52001007	Kanna dikenn kol tsele patsle an i themma Macedonia un Achaja ap tumende, un kamenn kowa jaake te krell, har tumer kowa krenna.
52001008	Tumendar djas o latcho lab o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, dureder, gar kokres an i themma Macedonia un Achaja. Na-a, ninna an bud wawar themma shunan i menshe, har tumer patsenn ap o Debleste. Jaake hunte penas mer lenge buder tchi pral kowa.
52001009	Jon hi kolla, kai penenn i wawarenge, har lan tumer men pash tumende pre, har mukan tumaro phuro drom, te djan ap o Debleskro drom, un mangenn buder gar wawar koowa an har o djido un tchatcho Debles kokres.
52001010	Tumer dikenn ap ko diwes, kai well o Debleskro tchawo dran o bolepen pale. Kowa hi o Jesus, koles kras o Dewel i mulendar djido. Job lell men dran o Debleskri choli win, hoi pral i menshende wella.
52002001	Mire phrala, tumer djinenna, har wam pash tumende, un penam tumenge o Debleskro lab. Kowa his gar tchitcheske.
52002002	Glan ko tsiro, kai wam pash tumende, hams an o foro Filipi. Ninna te wam kote palla lino un dino, har tumer djinenn, djam pal kowa pash tumende an o foro Tessalonika. O Dewel das men i soor, te penas tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab, ninna te his pash tumende bud menshe, kai kran menge o djipen phares.
52002003	Jaake nai dikenn tumer, kowa, hoi tumenge penam, was gar dran i tchilatcho dji, un hi kek chochepen. Witar gar kamam tumen gosewe labentsa te taprell.
52002004	Na-a, o Debleske ham moldo, te das lo men koi budi, te sikras mer i menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Doleske rakrah mer lestar. Kowa krah gar, te dikenn i menshe latches ap mende, na-a, mer kamah, te dikell o Dewel latches ap mende. Job djinella, hoi an maro dji hi.
52002005	Tumer djinenna, mer rakram tumenge gar pal o mui. Witar gar penam o Debleskro lab, te las lowe i menshendar. O Dewel djinella, me penau o tchatchepen.
52002006	Mer rodam gar o sharepen i menshendar, gar tumendar, witar gar i wawarendar.
52002007	Mer ham o Jesus Kristeskre bitchepangre un nai penams tumenge soreles, hoi te krenn. Kowa kram gar. Na-a, mer hams kamlo ap tumende, har i dai ap peskre tchawende.
52002008	Tumer hans an mare djia, un doleske sikram tumende gar kokres o Debleskro drom, na-a, mer djiwam ninna tumentsa khetne; jaake baro his maro kamlepen tumenge.
52002009	Mire phrala, tumer djinenna, har phari mari budi his, har hams pash tumende, un sikram tumende o Debleskro drom. Ap o diwes un an i rat budram, te djiwas gar dran tumari possita.
52002010	O Dewel dikas, har djiwam mashkral tumende. Un tumer, kai ap leste patsenna, dikan ninna, te djiwam jaake pash tumende har o Dewel kamella, un djam pal o tchatchepen, te hatsas kek i doosh ap mende.
52002011	-
52002012	Tumer djinenna, mer rakram tumentsa har i dad peskre tchawentsa. Hakenes tumendar rakram an o dji latche un sorele labentsa, te djiwenn tumer jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo. Job das tumen gole, te djiwenn pash leste an o bolepen un lenn leskro railepen.
52002013	Doleske mukah gar tele, te parkras men pash o Debleste, te patsan tumer o Debleskro lab, hoi tumenge penam. Un tumer haiwan, ko lab well tchatchepaha o Deblestar un gar i menshendar. Un tumaro djipen sikrella, te patsenn tumer ap ko lab.
52002014	Mire phrala, tumare menshe lan tumen palla. Jaake djas tumenge har kol patsle biboldenge an o them Judea. Lengre menshe, i bibolde, lan len ninna palla.
52002015	I bibolde maran o Jesus Kristes. Glan leste maran le o Debleskre rakepangren. Men lan le ninna palla. Jon choirenn o Debles. Un ap i tsele menshende hi jon tchilatcho.
52002016	Jon mukenn men gar, te penas mer o latcho lab i wawarenge, kai kek bibolde hi, te nai wenn kolla ninna ap o Debleskro drom. Jaake was i biboldengri doosh jaake baro, bareder djal gar. Un o Debleskri choli was soreles pral lende.
52002017	Mire phrala, ninna te dikam men nai i tsiro gar, hams hako tsiro pash tumende maro djijeha. Maro dji nashell pal tumende, un mer kram lauter, te dikas tumen.
52002018	Me, o Paulo, kamom budeder kope pash tumende te well. Un o beng was hako kopo koi mashkral.
52002019	Mer ham bachtelo pral tumende. Un mer dikah ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale. Palle nai sharah men tumentsa.
52002020	Tumer han maro railepen un mari bacht.
52003001	Mer rikram buder gar win, te shunam buder tchi tumendar. Doleske penam menge, hi mishto, te atchap me, o Paulo, kate an o foro Athen, khetne maro phraleha, o Silwano,
52003002	un te djal maro phraal, o Timoteo, pash tumende. Kowa hi o Debleskro budepaskro, kai penell i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Mer bitchram les pash tumende, te krell lo tumen soreles an o dji un an tumaro patsepen,
52003003	te mukell kek tumendar peskro patsepen, ninna te well lo palla lino. Djinenn, kau pharo drom hi o Debleskro drom menge, un mer wah palla lino.
52003004	Kowa penam tumenge, har pash tumende hams. Un tumer dikan, kowa was jaake.
52003005	Doleske rikrom kowa buder gar win, un bitchrom o Timotes pash tumende, te nai penell lo mange, har han tardo an tumaro patsepen. Man his traash, te anals tumen o beng o Debleskro dromestar tele. Palle wals mari budi pash tumende tchitcheske.
52003006	Kanna was o Timoteo pale, un penas latcho koowa pral tumaro patsepen un kamlepen. Lestar djinah, mer ham hako tsiro an tumaro dji. Un tumer kamenn men pale te dikell, jaake har kamah mer tumen pale te dikell.
52003007	-
52003008	Mire phrala, kal latche laba kran mare djia bachtelo. Tumaro patsepen das men newi soor an maro pharo djipen. An i daar lam pale i newi soor, har dikam, te rikrenn tumen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste.
52003009	Mer nai parkrah men gar doha pash o Debleste, jaake bachtelo kran tumer men.
52003010	-
52003011	Ap o diwes un an i rati mangah o Debles o tselo djijestar, te dikas tumen pale, te nai kras tumaro patsepen gomme sorleder. Me kamoms o tselo djijestar, te anell man o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus, maro rai, pash tumende.
52003012	Tumenge mangau me maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, te well tumaro kamlepen baro un bareder mashkral tumende un i wawar menshenge ninna. Jaake baro hi ninna maro kamlepen tumenge.
52003013	Palle wenn tumare djia sorelo un djudjo. Un o Dewel, maro dad, hatsell kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus, maro rai, pale lauterentsa, kai leskre hi.
52004001	Mire phrala, mer sikram tumende, har te djiwenn tumaro djipen jaake, te well o Dewel bachtelo pral tumende. Un kowa krenn tumer. Kanna mangah tumen jaake har maro rai, o Jesus, mangals tumendar: Krenn kowa gomme budeder un feteder!
52004002	Tumer djinenna, hoi job tumendar kamella. Mer penam les tumenge.
52004003	O Dewel kamell, te djiwenn tumer i djudjo djipen, te sowell kek rom i djuwjaha khetne, kai hi gar peskri romni, un kek djuwel i mursheha, kai hi gar peskro rom.
52004004	Hako mursh hunte djiwell peskri romjaha jaake khetne, har glan o Debleste mishto hi. Job hunte dikell gar ap late, har te wals li tchi moldo.
52004005	I chantch hunte chal les gar pre, har kowa hi pash i menshende, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar.
52004006	Kek hunte chochell peskro phrales. Koon kowa krella, koles dell o Dewel i phagi. Jaake penam tumenge, un dam tumen trad.
52004007	O Dewel das men gole, te djiwas i djudjo djipen. Job das men gar gole, te kras djungelo koowa.
52004008	Koon kamell kol laba gar te shunell, kowa tchiwell o Debles ap i rig, un gar i menshes. Un o Dewel hi kowa, kai das peskro Ducho an tumende.
52004009	Me hunte tchinap tumenge gar, te well tumen i baro dji i patslenge. O Dewel penas tumenge kowa an o dji.
52004010	Un tumer krenn o latchepen ap i patslende an o tselo them Macedonia. Mire phrala, mukenn gar tele, te krenn kowa budeder un feteder!
52004011	Djiwenn tumaro djipen jaake, te nai rakrenn i menshe gar djungeles pral tumende! Krenn tumari budi! Budrenn jaake, te well tumen doha djipaske, jaake har tumenge penam!
52004012	Palle hunte lenn tumer tchi kolendar, kai hi gar patslo. Un jon rakrenn nai gar tchilatches pral tumende.
52004013	Mire phrala, mer kamah, te djinenn tumer, hoi hi kol patslentsa, kai meran, te well tumenge gar ropaske har kolenge, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar un djinenn gar, hoi pal o merepen wella.
52004014	Mer patsah, te meras o Jesus un stas i mulendar pale pre. Doleske djinah ninna, ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus pale, anell o Dewel ninna kolen khetne leha, kai an o patsepen meran.
52004015	Mer penah tumenge, hoi o rai Jesus menge penas. Mer, kai ham gomme djido ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus pale, wah gar sikeder pash leste har kolla, kai meran.
52004016	Ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus tele dran o bolepen, shunah, har jek gole della. O Debleskro pralstuno bolepaskro dell bari gole, un jek phurdell an o Debleskri bashepaskri. Palle stenn kol mule pre, kai patsan ap o Jesus Kristeste.
52004017	Palle wah mer, kai ham gomme djido, lentsa khetne pre hadedo un ap i wolke pash o rajeste, o Jesuseste, an o bolepen anlo. Un pash leste atchah hako tsiro.
52004018	Te dell jek o wawareste soor kal labentsa!
52005001	Mire phrala, mer hunte tchinas tumenge tchi pral ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella.
52005002	Tumer djinenna, o rai Jesus wella har i tchorepaskro an i rati.
52005003	Te penenn i menshe: "Lauter hi mishto, kek kurepen hi kai, un men hunte well kek daar", palle well i bibacht pral lende, un jon nai nashenn gar krik. Koi bibacht well pral lende jaake sik, har i duka wenna pral i djuwjate, kai lell i tarnepen.
52005004	Tumer, kamle phrala, ma djiwenn jaake har an i kali rat har kolla, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar! Palle well ko diwes gar pral tumende har i tchorepaskro an i rat.
52005005	Tumer lauter djan ap o tchatcho drom, un djiwenn gar an o tchilatchepen. Kowa hi har te djiwenn ap o diwes, un gar an i rat.
52005006	Doleske, te sowas mer gar har i wawar, te rikras mare jaka pre, un te das jak har djiwah!
52005007	Koon sowella, sowell an i rat. Un koon kamell pes mato te pijell, krell kowa ninna an i rati.
52005008	Mer djiwah ap o diwes. Doleske das jak, har te djiwas! Jaake har i kurepaskro riwell i sasterno gad ap peste, te nai dukrell les kek, jaake riwas mer o patsepen un o kamlepen ap mende har i ripen. I kurepaskro tchiwell ninna i sasterni stadi ap peskro shero, te dukrell les kek ap leskro shero. Jaake nai dukrell men kek, te dikah mer ap o Jesus Kristeste, un djinah soreles, te lell men o Jesus Kristo dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
52005009	O Dewel kamell gar, te well leskri choli pral mende. Na-a, job kamell, te dell men maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, o Debleskro djipen.
52005010	Kowa meras menge, te djiwas leha khetne, mer, kai gomme djido ham, un ninna kolla, kai meran.
52005011	Dran kowa, rakrenn kal laba jek ap o wawareste, te dell jek o wawares soor, jaake har tumer kowa ninna krenna!
52005012	Mire phrala, mer mangah tumen: Shunenn ap tumare pralstunende, kai budrenn mashkral tumende! O Dewel tchiwas len an pengri budi, te sikrenn le tumen, hoi job kamella!
52005013	Jon krenn o Debleskri budi. Awenn latches un kamles ap lende! Un mukenn kek tchingepen mashkral tumende te well!
52005014	Mire phrala, kanna penah tumenge, hoi te krenn: Denn kolen trad, kai kamenn gar te budrell! Rakrenn kolentsa mishto, kai hi dareno! Krenn kolen soreles, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen! Denn kekes sik pre!
52005015	Ma awenn tchilatcho ap kolende, kai tchilatcho ap tumende wan! Mukenn gar tele, te wenn latches ap hakeneste mashkral tumende, ninna ap i tsele wawar menshende!
52005016	Awenn bachtelo hako tsiro!
52005017	Mangenn o Debles hako tsiro!
52005018	Parkrenn tumen pash leste pral halauter! Kowa kamell o Dewel lauterendar, kai djan ap o Jesuseskro drom.
52005019	Mukenn o Debleskro Ducho mashkral tumende te budrell!
52005020	Shunenn ap kol laba, hoi o Dewel i patsleske an o dji tchiwas!
52005021	Denn jak, te well ko lab, hoi job penas, tchatchepaha o Deblestar! Un rikrenn kowa, hoi mishto hi!
52005022	Rikrenn tumen pale dran hako tchilatcho koowa!
52005023	O Dewel kras i drom, te was pash leste. Lestar mangau, te krell lo tumaro tselo djipen djudjo glan leste, te rikrell lo tumen an peskre wasta, jaake te hatsell lo kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale.
52005024	O Dewel das tumen pash peste gole, job mukell tumen gar, un krell kowa, hoi job penas.
52005025	Mire phrala, mangenn lestar ninna menge!
52005026	Penenn i tsele patslenge mendar: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Un denn len i tchum!
52005027	Me penau tumenge soreles an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesusestar: Drawerenn kau liil glan i tsele patslende!
52005028	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa!
53001001	Mer, o Paulo, o Silwano un o Timoteo, tchinah kau liil ap tumende, kol patslende, kai wenna khetne an o foro Tessalonika. Tumer patsenn ap o Debleste, maro dadeste, un ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste.
53001002	Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.
53001003	Mire phrala, mer hunte parkras men tumenge pash o Debleste hako tsiro, jaake bud latchepen shunam tumendar. Tumaro patsepen well baro un bareder. Un pash tumende lauterende well o kamlepen bareder, kai jek o wawareske hi.
53001004	Mer sharah men tumentsa pash i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab an i wawar forja, un penah lenge, hoi tumer lauter ap tumende lenna, un te mukenn gar tumaro patsepen, ninna te lenn le tumen palla un krenn tumaro djipen phares.
53001005	Ap kowa lauter dikenn tumer, kai djal o Dewel pal o tchatchepen ap ko diwes, kai rakrell lo o tchatchepen win pral i menshende. Tumer, kai lan leske bud pharo koowa ap tumende, lell lo pash peste. Tumer han leske moldo, te djiwenn leha khetne an o bolepen.
53001006	Job djal ninna pal o tchatchepen, te dell lo kolen i phagi, kai tumen palla lan.
53001007	Tumer, kai wenn kanna palla lino, tumen dell lo i bari bacht. Kowa dell lo tumende mentsa khetne ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale dran o bolepen, un lauter dikenn les. Leskre sorele bolepangre wenn leha,
53001008	un i jag hi trul lende. Palle well o Debleskri choli pral kolende, kai kaman lestar tchi te djinell, kolla kai shunan gar ap o latcho lab maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, un kaman gar ap leskro drom te djal.
53001009	Kolla lenn i phagi: Jon djan hako tsireske nashedo, un nai wenn buder gar pash o Debleste, un dikenna gar leskro baro railepen
53001010	ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, te well lo sharedo peskre menshendar. Un i tsele patsle dikenn les, un hi bachtelo pral leste, ninna tumer, kai patsan ap o Debleskro latcho lab, hoi mer tumenge penam.
53001011	O Dewel rodas tumen win, te djiwenn pash leste. Doleske mangah lestar hako tsiro, te djiwenn tumer kanna jaake ap kai phub, har job kowa peskre tchawendar kamella. Ninna mangah lestar, te dell lo tumen i soor, te nai krenn o latcho koowa, hoi kamenn te krenn dran tumaro patsepen.
53001012	Palle well maro rai Jesus sharedo dran tumende. Un leha khetne wenn tumer ninna sharedo. Jaake latcho hi maro Dewel un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, tumenge.
53002001	Mire phrala, kanna kamah te penas tumenge pral ko tsiro, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale, te lell lo men pash peste.
53002002	Mer mangah tumen: Ma mukenn tumen dinelo un dareno te krell, te penenn i menshe tumenge: "Ko diwes hi kanna kai." Ma patsenn lenge ninna, te penenn le, te sikras len o Dewel kowa, witar gar, te penenn le, te lans le i liil mendar, kai mer kowa tchinams!
53002003	Kowa lauter hi chochepen. Ma patsenn kekeske, kai kowa penella! Ko diwes wella gar jaake raha, har peran gar bud menshe o tchatcho dromestar tele. Ap ko tsiro well ko tchilatcho mensho diklo, kai rikrell pes ap kek tchatchepen. Leske hi glan-diklo, te djal lo nashedo.
53002004	Job hadell pes pral o Debleste un pral halauter, hoi i menshe an-mangenna, un beshell pes an o Debleskro baro kheer, un krell, har te wals job o Dewel.
53002005	Djinenn tumer buder gar, har penom tumenge kowa lauter, har pash tumende homs?
53002006	Kanna djinenn tumer, hoske job gomme gar diklo was. Leskro tsiro hi gomme gar koi.
53002007	Ninna te dikah les gomme gar, well o tchilatchepen bareder. Kanna rikrell jek o tchilatchepen pale. Te well job krik lino,
53002008	palle sikrell pes ko tchilatcho mensho, har job tchatchepaha hi. Koles marell maro rai Jesus ap ko diwes, kai well lo pale. Job phurdell ap leste, un kowa merella.
53002009	Ap ko tsiro, kai well ko tchilatcho mensho, lell lo peskri soor o bengestar, un krell bud chocheno baro un sorelo koowa.
53002010	Un chochepaha anell lo kolen ap o tchilatcho drom, kai djan nashedo. Kolla hi kol menshe, kai kaman gar o tchatchepen te shunell. Te patsans le o tchatchepen, nai wans le win lino dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.
53002011	Jon patsan gar o tchatchepen. Doleske mukell len o Dewel an o chochepen te perell. Doleske mukell lo len kol chochene laba te patsell.
53002012	Jaake len kolla pengri phagi, kai kaman o tchilatchepen budeder har o tchatchepen.
53002013	Mire phrala, mer hunte parkras men tumenge pash o Debleste hako tsiro. Maro rai Jesus kamell tumen o djijestar. Glan i raha tsiro, har o Dewel kras o bolepen un i phub, rodas lo tumen win, te djiwenn leha khetne an leskro railepen. Har patsan tumer leskro tchatcho lab, das lo peskro Ducho an tumende. Un kowa krell, te djiwenn tumer i djudjo djipen glan leste.
53002014	Har penam tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, das o Dewel tumen gole, te lenn tumer o railepen, hoi hi ninna maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes.
53002015	Doleske atchenn sorelo, mire phrala! Rikrenn tumen ap kol laba, hoi mer tumenge penam, un an mare lila tumenge tchinam.
53002016	O Dewel hi maro dad un kamell men o djijestar. Job hi menge latcho, un penell menge an o dji, te kras lo lauter menge mishto, un te lell lo men pash peste hako tsireske. Lestar mangah un maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar,
53002017	te dell lo tumen soor an tumare djia, te nai krenna un penenna lauter, hoi mishto hi.
53003001	Ninna mangau tumendar, mire phrala: Mangenn o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, menge, te nai penah leskro lab an bud wawar forja, te well lo kote jaake sharedo, har pash tumende.
53003002	Mangenn lestar ninna, te dell lo garda ap mende, te nai krenn men kol midjak un tchilatche menshe kek tchilatchepen. Gar hakeno patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste.
53003003	Maro rai Jesus mukell tumen gar. Job dell tumen soor, un dell garda ap tumende, te well kek tchilatcho koowa ap tumende.
53003004	Job hi maro un tumaro rai. Doleske djinah, tumer krenn, hoi mer tumenge penah, kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi glan mende hi.
53003005	Maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, mangah, te krell lo tumare djia pre, te dikenn tumer, har baro o Debleskro kamlepen tumenge hi. Un lestar mangah ninna, te denn tumaro patsepen gar pre, ninna te well tumaro djipen pharo, jaake har o Jesus Kristo gar pre das.
53003006	Mire phrala, an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, penah tumenge soreles: Rikrenn tumen kol phralendar krik, kai kamenn gar te budrell! Jon djiwenn gar jaake, har mer tumenge penam.
53003007	Tumer djinenna, har te djiwenn. Djiwenn jaake, har mer djiwam, har hams pash tumende! Mer kram mari budi,
53003008	cham pash kekeste tchitcheske. O diwes un i rati budram, te djiwas mer gar tumare lowendar.
53003009	Mer mangams nai tumendar kowa, hoi men hunte wals djipaske, un kram kowa gar. Mer kamam, te dikenn ap maro djipen, har te djiwenn.
53003010	Ninna har pash tumende hams, penam tumenge: Kowa, kai kamell gar te budrell, kowa hunte chal witar gar.
53003011	Mer shunam, mashkral tumende hi menshe, kolla kamenn gar te budrell. Tchi budrenn le, un kowa, hoi tchi moldo hi, krenn le.
53003012	Kolenge penah mer an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, te budrenn le, te nai ginenn le penge, hoi len hunte well djipaske.
53003013	Tumer, mire phrala, ma awenn khino te krenn kowa, hoi latcho hi!
53003014	Jek te krell kowa gar, hoi mer an kau liil tchinam, penenn kowa i wawar patslenge, un rikrenn tumen lestar pale, te well i ladj pral leste!
53003015	Ma dikenn ap leste har ap jekeste, kai kras tumenge tchilatcho koowa. Na-a, job hi tumaro phraal. Penenn leske, hoi job gar mishto kras, te well lo pale ap o tchatcho drom!
53003016	Maro rai Jesus, kolestar wella i tseli bacht, kolestar mangau, te dell lo tumen hako tsiro peskri bacht an o dji, kote, kai tumer han. Maro rai Jesus djal tumentsa lauterentsa!
53003017	Kal laba tchinau miro wasteha: Atchenn o Debleha! Jaake tchinau an mire tsele lila. Kowa sikrell tumen, kau liil well mandar.
53003018	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa lauterentsa!
54001001	Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro bitchepaskro, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Jaake kamell kowa o Dewel, kai lell men dran o tchilatchepen win, un o Jesus Kristo, ap koleste patsah.
54001002	Me tchinau kau liil ap tute, Timoteo. Tu hal mange har miro tchawo an o patsepen. Latchepen, kamlepen un bacht tuke! Kowa dell tut o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai, an o dji!
54001003	Tu djineh, har me tuke penom, te atchess an o foro Efesus. Kowa mangom tutar, har me an o them Macedonia djom. An o foro Efesus hi menshe, kai sikrenn i patslende i chocheno drom, hoi anell len gar pash o Debleste. Kolenge peness, te mukenn le kowa.
54001004	Pen lenge, te rodenn jon gar o tchatchepen an i parmisse, witar gar an kol bare lila, kai i phurengre laba tchindlo hi. Kowa anell tchingepen, un anell men gar ap o Debleskro drom dureder.
54001005	Lauter, hoi peneh tu lenge pral o patsepen, hunte sikrell lende, te well lengro kamlepen dran i djudjo dji, un te well len i patsepen, an koleste kek chochepen hi, un te krenn le lauter jaake, har lengro dji lenge penella.
54001006	Kol menshe, kai penenn wawar koowa, mukan o Debleskro drom, un rikrenn pen kanna ap kolla laba, hoi tchi molenna.
54001007	Jon kamenn sikepangre te well, kai penenn i menshenge, har te djiwenn le. Un jon haiwenn gar, hoi jon penenna un soreles rakrenna.
54001008	Mer djinah, kai o Moseskre laba mishto hi, te wenn le i menshende jaake penlo, har tchatcho hi.
54001009	Mer djinah, o Moseskre laba wan gar tchindlo kolenge, kai pal o tchatchepen djiwenna. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai gar pal o tchatchepen djiwenna, un kai gar ap o Debleste shunenna. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai gar ap o Debleste patsenna, un krenna, hoi job gar kamella. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai lengro dji djungelo hi, un kolenge, kai praassenn o Debles. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai marenn o dades un i da, un ninna wawar menshen.
54001010	O Moseskre laba wan tchindlo kol murshenge, kai sowenn wawar djuwjentsa, un kol djuwjenge, kai sowenn wawar murshentsa. Kol laba wan ninna tchindlo kol murshenge, kai sowenn i murshentsa un tchawentsa. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai tchorenn menshen un bikrenn len, un kolenge, kai penenn o chochepen, un kolenge, kai denn pen chochenes sowel. Un te dell wawar koowa, kai o Debleskro lab lestar penella, te kras mer kowa gar, palle wan o Moseskre laba kolenge tchindlo, kai kowa krenna.
54001011	Jaake penell menge o latcho lab, hoi das o Dewel an mire wasta, te penap kowa i menshenge. Ko lab sikrell men o Debleskro railepen. Lestar well o tselo latchepen.
54001012	Me parkrau man pash maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste, kai das man i soor, te budrap leske. Job patsas ap mande, un tchiwas man an koi budi, te wap leske koi.
54001013	His i tsiro, kai rakrom djungeles pral leste, un lom i patslen palla, te marap len. An ko tsiro prindjrom les gar, un djinom gar, hoi me krom. Job kras mange peskro dji pre, un las man dran o tchilatchepen win.
54001014	Jaake latcho his o Jesus Kristo mange, te das lo man ninna o patsepen ap leste un o kamlepen i wawarenge.
54001015	Hi tchatcho, hoi kanna penau. Un tumer nai patsenn man: Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, was ap kai phub, te anell lo kolen ap o drom pash o Debleste, kai dur lestar an tchilatchepen djiwenna. Kolendar hom me o djungleder.
54001016	Me krom bareder tchilatchepen har hako wawar. Un ninna man las o Dewel dran miro tchilatcho djipen win, te nai sikrell o Jesus Kristo ap mande, har bud job i menshen kamella, jaake, te patsenn i menshe ap leste, un lenna ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
54001017	Me sharau o Debles, koles, kai hako tsiro o baro rai hi; kowa, kai merella gar, un kai nai dikell les kek. Kowa kokres hi o Dewel. Leskro railepen atchell hako tsireske. Amen.
54001018	Miro tchawo Timoteo, kowa penau tuke, te rikress tu kowa an tiro dji. Ma biste kol laba, hoi glan i tsiro pral tute glan-wi penlo wan! Kolla laba denn tut i soor, te mukess gar tele te krell o Debleskri budi, jaake har i latcho kurepaskro gar pre dell an o kurepen.
54001019	Rike ap o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste! Kre, hoi tiro dji tuke penella! Hi menshe, kai shunan gar ap pengro dji, un kran gar, hoi mishto hi. Un jon peran o Debleskro dromestar tele.
54001020	Dui lendar hi o Himeneo un o Alexandro. Kolen dom an o bengeskro wast, te rakrenn le buder gar djungeles pral o Debleste.
54002001	Me penau tumenge kanna, hoi hunte krenn un gar mukenn: Mangenn o Debles i tsele menshenge! Penenn leske lauter, hoi ap tumaro dji hi! Parkrenn tumen pash o Debleste lautereske, hoi job das!
54002002	Mangenn lestar, te dell lo i rajen un i pralstunen o goswepen, te krenn le pengri budi mishto, jaake te djiwas nai an o latchepen, te djas mer o Debleskro drom, te nai rakrenn i menshe gar djungeles pral mende!
54002003	Kowa kamell maro Dewel, kai das men o newo djipen.
54002004	Job kamella, te wenn i tsele menshe ap leskro drom, un te haiwenn le leskro tchatchepen.
54002005	Hi jek Dewel i tsele menshenge. Un hi jek rakepaskro, kai anell o Debles un i menshen khetne. Kowa hi ko mensho Jesus Kristo.
54002006	Job das peskro djipen i tsele menshenge. Jaake sikras o Dewel an o tchatcho tsiro, kai kamell lo, te well hako mensho win lino dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.
54002007	Doleske bitchras man o Dewel pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te penap lenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un te sikrap lende o tchatcho patsepen. Man hi o Jesuseskro wast. Kowa hi o tchatchepen. Me chochau gar.
54002008	Jaake kamau me, te mangenn i mursha o Debles an, kote, kai i patsle khetne wenna. Kal mursha hunte djiwenn pengro djipen jaake, har o Dewel kamella. Te hadenn le pengre wasta pre, te mangenn le o Debles an, palle hunte denn le jak, te well kek choli un kek tchingepen an lengre djia.
54002009	Ninna kamau, te riwell i djuwel kek wi-ladjede ripja. Te riwell li pes gar jaake, te dikell hakeno ap late. Lakro shukapen te well gar diklo an kowa, har joi peskre balla hidjella, witar gar an o sonakai un wawar kutch koowa, witar gar an kutch ripja.
54002010	Lakro shukapen sikrell pes an ko latcho koowa, hoi joi krella. Jaake hi kowa pash kol djuwjende, kai ap o Debleste patsenna.
54002011	Te well o Debleskro lab i patslenge penlo, hunte shunenn i djuwja ap kowa, hoi penlo wella. Jon hunte rakrenn gar peha.
54002012	Me kamau gar, te penell i djuwel o Debleskro lab glan i murshende, witar gar, te well lat penepaske pral o mursheste. I djuwja rikrenn pen pale.
54002013	Hoske penau kowa? Doleske: O Adam was glan i Eva kerdo.
54002014	O sap chochas gar o Adames. O sap chochas i Evat. Un i Eva shunas gar ap kowa, hoi o Dewel penas.
54002015	I djuwel well sharedo, te lell li tchawen, un te patsell li ap o Jesuseste, un te hi lat o Debleskro kamlepen an lakro dji, un te djiwell li i djudjo djipen glan o Debleste un glan i menshende.
54003001	Kowa, hoi kanna penau, hi tchatcho. Te kamell jek i phureder te well mank i patslende, kowa kamell i latchi budi.
54003002	I phureder hunte djiwell jaake, te hatsell kek i doosh ap leste. Les well gar budeder har jek romni. Job rakrell kek dinelo koowa, un dell pes jak, hoi job rakrell un krell. Job mukell pes gar an djungelo koowa te tsardell. Job lell i wawaren latches an peskro kheer dre. Job sikrell mishto o Debleskro drom.
54003003	Job hi kek pipaskro. Job hi kek marepaskro. Les hi i baro dji i wawarenge. Job hi kek tchingepaskro. Job hi gar pal i lowe.
54003004	Job hi i latcho rai pral peskro kheer. Leskre tchawe shunenn ap leste.
54003005	Hi kau mursh kek latcho rai pral peskro kheer, nai well lo witar gar i latcho rai pral i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab.
54003006	I phureder mank i patslende hunte well gar newes an o patsepen, te nai phurdell lo pes gar pre. Te phurdas pes lo pre, nai tsardell les o beng o Debleskro dromestar tele.
54003007	I phureder hunte well jek, pral koleste ninna kol menshe, kai gar patslo hi, mishto rakrenna. Jaake hunte ladjell lo pes gar, un perell gar an o bengeskro wast.
54003008	Jaake har i phureder mank i patslende hunte djiwenn latches glan i menshengre jaka, jaake hunte djiwenn kolla ninna, kai budrenn i patslenge an o Debleskro kheer. Jon te rakrenn gar dui tchipjentsa. Jon te wenn kek pipangre. Jon te nashenn gar pal i lowe.
54003009	Jon hunte rikrenn soreles ap o tchatchepen, hoi o Dewel sikras. Lengro patsepen hunte well dran i djudjo dji.
54003010	Lenn tumen i tsiro, te dikenn tumer, har jon djiwenna. Te nashte rakrell kek pral lende djungelo koowa, palle nai budrenn le i patslenge an o Debleskro kheer.
54003011	I djuwja, kai hi i patslenge koi, hunte djiwenn ninna latches glan i menshengre jaka. Jon rakrenn kek chocheno koowa pral i wawarende. Jon rakrenn kek dinelo koowa. Jon krenn pengri tseli budi mishto.
54003012	I mursh, kai budrella i patslenge an o Debleskro kheer, les well gar budeder har jek romni. Job hunte well i latcho dad peskre tchawenge, un i latcho rai pral peskro kheer.
54003013	Kol budepangre, kai pengri budi mishto krenna, kolla wenn an-diklo pash i patslende, un pash o Debleste. Un len hi kek daar, te rakrenn le pral pengro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste.
54003014	-
54003015	Me kamau te wap sik pash tute. Te nai wau gar jaake sik, djineh tu kanna, har te krenn le lauter an o Debleskro kheer. Doleske tchinom tuke kau liil. I patsle hi o kheer o djido Deblestar. Jon rikrenn pen soreles ap o Debleskro tchatchepen. Jon hi har kol telstune barra, hoi o kheer khetne rikrenna.
54003016	Tchatchepaha, an maro patsepen hi i baro tchatchepen: O Debleskro tchawo was i mensho. Hoi job kras, hi tchatcho. Ko sikras men o Debleskro Ducho. I bolepangre dikan ap leste. An i tsele themma rakran le lestar. Ap i tseli phub patsan le ap leste. An o bolepen las les o Dewel pash peste.
54004001	O Debleskro Ducho penell menge, te perenn i menshe o Debleskro dromestar tele an ko tsiro, hoi wella. Jon shunenn ap o chochepen, un ap kowa, hoi wella o bengestar.
54004002	Kolla, kai anenn len o tchatcho dromestar tele, hi chochene, kai penenn pendar, te haiwenn le o tchatchepen. Un jon djinenn buder gar, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi. Ninna haiwenn le gar, hawo tchilatcho koowa jon krenna.
54004003	Jon penenna, te romedineress gar, un te chas gar hako chapen. Koon ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella, un o tchatchepen haiwella, nai chal lauter, te parkrell pes lo pash o Debleste, kai lauter kras.
54004004	Lauter, hoi o Dewel kras, hi latcho. Un tchi hi pale-tchiddo, te parkrah men mer koleske pash o Debleste.
54004005	O Debleskro lab krell, te nai chas hako chapen. Un mer parkrah men pash o Debleste koleske.
54004006	Te peneh tu kau koowa i patslenge, hal tu o Jesuseskro latcho budepaskro. Jaake sikreh, kai djiweh pal o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, hoi tu shunal un patsal, un kai djah tu dureder ap o Debleskro drom!
54004007	Ma shun ap dinele parmisse! Kolla wenna gar o Deblestar! Dik ap tute, te djiwess o djipen, hoi latcho hi glan o Debleskre jaka.
54004008	Te dikeh ap kowa, te wenn tire mussja un herja soreles, hi kowa gar bud moldo. Te dikeh ap kowa, te well tiro patsepen soreles, hi kowa bud moldo, un tu leh o tchatcho djipen. Ko djipen dell tut o Dewel kanna ap kai phub un an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
54004009	Kawa lab hi tchatcho, un tumer nai patsenn les.
54004010	Maro patsepen rikrell pes ap o djido Debleste. Job kamell hako menshes dran o merepen win te lell. Un kolla, kai patsenn ap leste, wenn dran o merepen win lino. Doleske budrah mer, un lah ninna duka ap mende.
54004011	Kal laba pen i patslenge un pen lenge, te shunenn le ap kowa!
54004012	Ninna te hal tarno, ma muk tut ap i rig te tchiwell! Tu djiwess jaake, te dikenn i wawar patsle, har hunte djiwenn jon. Kowa dikenn le ap tire laba, tiro djipen, tiro kamlepen i wawarenge, tiro patsepen ap o Jesuseste, un tiro djudjo dji.
54004013	Le o Debleskro lab an i wast, un sike i menshende, hoi koi dre tchindlo hi, un rake koi pral! Sike lende, har te djan jon ap o Debleskro drom! Kre kowa jaake raha, bis te wau pash tute!
54004014	Ma biste koi budi, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tut das, har kol phureder phrala tuke i wasta pre tchiwan, un hoi jon pral tute glan-wi penan!
54004015	Kre kowa lauter tiro tselo djijeha un tiri tseli sorjaha, te dikell hakeno, kai tiro patsepen bareder wella!
54004016	De garda ap tute, har tu djiweh un har tu sikreh o Debleskro drom! Kre ko koowa, hoi tuke penom! Jaake djah tu ap o drom pash o Debleste. Un kolla, kai shunenn ap kowa, hoi tu peneh, aneh tu ninna ap ko drom.
54005001	Ma tchinge ap i phureste! Tu te peneh o phuro mursheske, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras, palle rake leha, har te wals job tiro dad! Un i tarne murshentsa rake, har te wans le tire phrala!
54005002	Rake i phuri djuwjaha, har te wals li tiri dai! Rake i tarne djuwjentsa, har te wans le tire phenja, un kre kowa i djudjo djijeha!
54005003	Kanna rakrau pral kol djuwjende, kolengre romma buder gar djiwenna. De jak, te well kolen doha djipaske, kai hi len tchatchepaha kek menshe, kai lenge koi hi.
54005004	Te hi kol djuwjen tchawe, tchawengre tchawe, hunte wenn kolla lenge koi. Jaake sikrenn jon, te patsenn le ap o Debleste. Un jon parkrenn pen pash pengri dai un pengri mami, hoi kolla lenge lauter kran. Kowa hi mishto glan o Debleskre jaka.
54005005	I patsli djuwel, kai hi lat buder kek rom, witar kek wawar menshe, kolake hunte wenn tumer koi. Koja dikell ap o Debleste kokres un mangell lestar, te dell lo lat doha djipaske. Joi mangell les i tselo djijestar o diwes un i rati, un mukell gar tele.
54005006	Hi wawartchandes pash i djuwjate, kolakro rom buder gar djiwella, un kai dikell ap peste kokres, te well lat i shukar djipen. Kolakro patsepen hi mulo.
54005007	Pen i patslenge, te djiwenn le pal kal laba, te hatsell kek i doosh ap lende!
54005008	Koon gar peskre menshenge koi hi, un kolenge, kai pash leste an o kheer djiwenna, kowa nashras peskro patsepen, un hi har jek, kai patsell gar ap o Jesus Kristeste.
54005009	Kanna rakrau pral ko liil, kai i laba kol djuwjendar dre tchindlo wenna, kolakro rom buder gar djiwella. Te hi jek lendar tarneder har shob-deesh bersh (60), ma tchin lakro lab pre! Koja, kai well dre tchindlo, kolat hunte his jek rom.
54005010	Wawar menshe hunte dikenn ap late, te kras li latcho koowa, un te tsardas li peskre tchawen mishto pre. Jon hunte dikan, te las li menshen pash peste pre, un te thowas li i patslenge i herja. Jon hunte dikan, te his li kolenge koi, kolen i pharo djipen hi, un te kras li hako latcho koowa.
54005011	Kanna rakrau i tarne djuwjendar kolengre romma buder gar djiwenna. Ma tchin kolengre laba an ko liil! Jon nai kamans budeder pale i romes te lell, har te wenn le o Jesus Kristeske koi.
54005012	Jaake rikrenn le gar pengro lab, hoi jon o Jesus Kristeste dan. Un doleske anenn le doosh ap pende.
54005013	Kal tarne djuwja kamenn buder gar te budrell, un jon djan dran jek kheer an o wawar, un tchamrenn bud. Jon kamenn lauter feteder te djinell, un rakrenn jaake, hoi gar mishto hi.
54005014	Doleske kamau, te romedinerenn kol tarne djuwja pale, te lenn jon tchawen, un te budrenn jon an pengro kheer, jaake te nai penell kek djungelo koowa pral i patslende.
54005015	Djinau sawendar, kolla mukan o tchatcho drom, un djan o bengeske palla.
54005016	Te hi i patsli djuwjat wawar djuwja an lakri familja, kolengro rom buder gar djiwella, hunte dikell joi ap lende, te hi len doha djipaske. Kai budi hi gar i budi i tsele patslendar. I patsle hunte wenn kol djuwjenge koi, kai len kek menshe hi.
54005017	Kanna rakrau pral kolende, kai hi kol phureder mank i patslende, un krenn pengri budi mishto. I patsle hunte dikenn pre ap lende un shunenn ap lende. Ninna hunte denn le len lowe. Kowa penau budeder kolendar, kai penenn i menshenge o Debleskro lab, un sikrenn lende o Debleskro drom.
54005018	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Te budrell i ficho tuke, palle pande gar leskro mui, te kamell lo te chal! Ninna hi tchindlo: O budepaskro hi moldo, te well lo plaissedo.
54005019	Ma shun ap jekeste, kai anell i doosh ap i phureder pre, te hi gar dui, triin patsle koi, kai penenn kowa nai ninna, hoi job kras.
54005020	Kolla, kai kran tchilatcho koowa, kolen dess trad glan lauterende, te well kol wawaren daar.
54005021	Me penau tuke soreles glan o Debleste, un glan o Jesus Kristeste, un glan kol Debleskre bolepangre, te rikress tut ap ko koowa, hoi me tuke kanna penom! Pash hakeneste dja pal o tchatchepen! Ma tsarde jekes glan o wawareste!
54005022	Ma tchip sik tire wasta ap jekeste pre! De jak, te well i doosh i wawarestar gar ap tute! Rike tiro dji djudjo!
54005023	Tu te pijeh pani, palle tchore ninna mool dre! Kowa hi mishto tiro pereske. Tu hal jaake bud nasselo.
54005024	Denna menshe, kai lengri doosh diklo wella i wawar menshendar. Pash wawar menshende hi lengri doosh khatedo. O diwes wella, kai lengri doosh diklo wella.
54005025	Jaake hi ninna pash i menshende, kai krenn latcho koowa. Pash jekeste nai dikell kowa hakeno. Pash i wawareste hi kowa khatedo. Well i diwes, kai well o latcho koowa diklo.
54006001	I budepangre, kai ginlo wan, hunte shunenn ap pengre rajende, te nai rakrell kek mensho djungeles pral o Debleste un pral kowa, hoi mer i menshenge pral leste penah.
54006002	Kol budepangre, kai hi len patsle raja, hunte dikenn gar tele ap pengre rajende. Na-a, jon hunte budrenn latcheder lenge. Kolla hi lengre phrala. Un o Dewel kamell len o djijestar. Un jon krenn ninna latcho koowa. Kowa pen i patslenge an o dji, te krenn le les!
54006003	Te sikrell jek i menshende i wawar drom, un penell lenge gar o tchatcho lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, un sikrell lende gar, har te djan le ap o Debleskro drom,
54006004	palle hi job pre-phurdo un haiwell tchi. Job kamell te tchingrell pes hako labeske. Kowa hi jaake har i nasslepen. Dran sawo koowa well, te silwerenn le, te tchingrenn pen le, te rakrenn le djungeles jek pral o wawareste, te dikell ko jek tchilatche jakentsa ap o wawareste.
54006005	Sawo tchingepen djal dureder un dureder. Kolla, kai krenn kowa, hi nasselo an o shero un haiwenn buder gar, hoi o tchatchepen hi. Jon patsenna, te nashte lenn le bud lowe khetne, te krenn le, hoi o Dewel kamella.
54006006	Tchatchepaha, koon krella, hoi o Dewel kamella, un leske hi doha, hoi o Dewel les della, koleskro djipen hi pherdo latcho koowa.
54006007	Mer anam tchi ap kai phub, un nai lah tchi peha, te merah.
54006008	Te hi men chapaske un ripaske, hi menge kowa doha.
54006009	Kolla, kai kamenn brawele te well, kolla perenn an o bengeskro wast, un anenn pen an bud dinelo un djungelo koowa. Un kowa anell len an i bibacht un mukell len tele te djal.
54006010	Koon pal i lowe hi, perell an hako tchilatchepen. His menshe koi, kai kaman i lowe jaake bud, kai peran le o Debleskro dromestar tele, un dukran pen kokres.
54006011	Tu hal i Debleskro mursh. Rike tut ko tselo koowa pale! Kre lauter, te wess an o tchatchepen tardo, un te djiwess jaake, har o Dewel kamella! Kre ninna lauter, te atchess an o patsepen, un te kamess i menshen o tselo djijestar! Te djal tuke gar mishto, rike win! Ab latches ap i wawarende!
54006012	Jaake har i kurepaskro kurell pes mishto un dell gar pre, jaake dess tu gar tiro patsepen pre, te tapress ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. O Dewel das tut gole, te tapress les. Un tu penal glan bud menshende, kai patseh ap o Jesus Kristeste.
54006013	Me penau tuke glan o Debleste, kai krell lauter djido, un glan o Jesus Kristo, kai penas o tchatchepen glan o Pontio Pilato:
54006014	Rike o tselo djijeha ap kol laba, hoi tuke penlo wan, te hatsell kek i doosh ap tute. Atch koi pashal jaake raha har maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, gomme gar pale was.
54006015	Job wella ap o tchatcho tsiro. Ko tsiro djinell o Dewel. Koles sharah mer! Job kokres hi o baro rai, un bareder un sorleder har lauter. Job hi ko baro rai pral i tsele rajende.
54006016	Job nai merell gar. Job djiwell kote, kai i momeli jaake sorelo hi, kai kek nai dre djala. O Debles dikas kek mensho, un kek mensho nai dikell les. Koles well o tselo railepen un i tseli soor!
54006017	Pen kol brawelenge, te rikrenn jon pen gar bareder har wawar, un te tchiwenn jon pengro patsepen gar ap o brawlepen, hoi gar atchella. Mer tchiwas maro patsepen ap o Debleste, kai dell men lauter djipaske, jaake te nai djiwas bachteles.
54006018	Pen kol brawelenge ninna, te krenn le latcho koowa! Lengro dji te well baro i wawarenge, te denn le ninna i wawaren dran pengro brawlepen!
54006019	Jon te krenn latcho koowa i wawarenge, hi kowa lengro brawlepen an o bolepen, hoi atchella. Jaake djiwenn le o djipen, hoi o Dewel kamella.
54006020	Tu, Timoteo, atch pash kowa, hoi o Dewel an tiro wast tchiwas! Ma shun ap kolende, kai rakrenn laba, hoi tchi moldo hi, un hoi gar o Deblestar wenna! Jon rakrenn dinelo koowa, un patsenn, kai djinenn le budeder har kol wawar. Lengro hi gar tchatcho.
54006021	Denna menshe mashkral i patslende, kai patsan kolen, un peran o Debleskro dromestar tele. O Debleskro latchepen djal tumentsa lauterentsa!
55001001	Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil. Jaake har o Dewel kamas, bitchras man o Jesus Kristo, te penap i menshenge, kai o Dewel kamell len ko djipen te dell, hoi gar pre-herella. Ko djipen dell lo kolen, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna.
55001002	Me tchinau ap tute, Timoteo. Tu hal miro latcho tchawo an o patsepen. Latchepen, kamlepen un bacht tuke! Kowa dell tut o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai, an o dji!
55001003	Hako diwes un haki rati mukau gar tele, te parkrap man pash o Debleste tuke, un te mangap o Debles tuke. Job hi kowa, koleske budrau me o djudjo djijeha, jaake har ninna mire phure kowa kran.
55001004	Me bistrau nai gar, har tu glan mande rowal, un dikau tut jaake glan mande. Doleske kamau me tut o tselo djijeha pale te dikell, te wap bachtelo.
55001005	Dikom tiro patsepen, an koleste kek chochepen hi. Kau patsepen his ninna an tiri mamjate Lois, un an tiri date Eunike. Un me djinau, kai djiwell kau patsepen ninna an tute.
55001006	Doleske mangau tut: Muk koi soor an tute te budrell, hoi o Dewel tut das! Tu lal koi soor, har mangom o Debles tuke, un har tchiwom tuke i wasta pre.
55001007	O Debleskro Ducho, hoi o Dewel men das, kowa krell men gar dareno, na-a, o Debleskro Ducho dell men soor, kamlepen i wawarenge, un o goswepen, har te djiwas.
55001008	Ma ladj tut, te rakress tu maro rajestar, o Jesusestar! Ma ladj tut mange, ninna te hom me kanna leske an o stilepen! Na-a, rake maro rajestar, ninna te wenn duka ap tute, jaake har me lau duka ap mande, te well o latcho lab o Jesusestar penlo. O Dewel dell tut i soor.
55001009	Job las men dran o tchilatchepen win, un das men gole, te djiwas leha khetne. His gar dran maro latcho koowa, te das lo men gole. Na-a. Kowa his an leskro dji, te was lo menge latches. Har o bolepen un i phub gomme gar koi his, his an leskro dji, te bitchrell lo o Jesus Kristes menge ap i phub.
55001010	Kanna was o Jesus Kristo, te sikrell lo men o Debleskro latchepen. O Jesus Kristo las men dran o tchilatchepen win, un kras, te well o merepen buder kek soor pral mende. Job anas menge ko djipen, hoi atchella, har peskro latcho lab penella.
55001011	O Dewel bitchras man, te penap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar i menshenge, un sikrap len leskro drom.
55001012	Doleske hunte lap kawa lauter ap mande kate an o stilepen, un me ladjau gar. Me djinau, ap koneste patsaua. Un me djinau, kai o Jesus Kristo rikrell peskre wasta pral kowa, hoi job an miro wast das, bis te job pale wella.
55001013	Rike tut ap kol latche laba, hoi tu mandar shunal! Jaake djineh, har tu hunte rakress. Un atch an o patsepen un an o kamlepen, hoi o Jesus Kristo men das!
55001014	Kal latche laba hi har i kutch brawlepen, hoi an tiro wast dino was. Rike len! O Debleskro Ducho, kai an tute djiwella, dell tut koi soor, te kress kowa.
55001015	Tu djineh, kai mukan man kol tsele patsle, kai hi an ko them Asia. Mank lende hi ninna i phrala Figelo un Hermogeno.
55001016	Me mangau o Debles miro phraleske, o Onesiforo un i menshenge an leskro kheer, te well lo lenge latches. O Onesiforo kras bud kope miro dji soreles, un ladjas pes gar mange, har homs stildo.
55001017	Har job an o foro Rom was, rodas lo pal mande jaake raha, bis te job man hatsas.
