55001018	Me mangau o Debles, te well lo leske latches ap ko diwes, kai job glan leste tardo hi. Tu djineh ninna, har bud job i patslenge an o foro Efesus budras.
55002001	Tu, miro tchawo Timoteo, wess soreles an o patsepen! O Jesus Kristo dell tut koi soor.
55002002	Tu hals pashal, har penom bud menshen o Debleskro lab. Kowa, hoi shunal mandar, sike kanna wawar patslen, kai krenn, hoi tu lenge peneh, un kolendar tu djineh, te haiwenn le mishto o Debleskro lab te penell!
55002003	Jaake har i latcho kurepaskro duka ap peste lella, jaake le ninna duka o Jesus Kristeske ap tute!
55002004	Kowa, kai an o kurepen djala, krell kek wawar budi. Job kamell, te dikell peskro pralstuno latches ap leste.
55002005	Jek, kai kurell pes, un kurell pes gar jaake, har leske penlo was, kowa well gar o latcheder.
55002006	O hacho, kai phares budrella, hi o glanstuno, kai chal kolestar, hoi dran i phub was.
55002007	Muk an tiro shero trujal te djal, hoi penom tuke! Un o rai Jesus dell tut o goswepen, te haiwess kowa lauter.
55002008	Rike an tiro shero o Jesus Kristes! Koles las o Dewel dran i mulende win, un kras les djido. Job his o Davideskre menshendar. Jaake penau kowa i menshenge.
55002009	Koleske lau duka ap mande. Jon pandan man an o stilepen, har te woms i marepaskro. Ninna te pandan le man an o stilepen, nai pandenn jon gar o Debleskro lab.
55002010	Me lau kowa lauter ap mande kol menshenge, kolen o Dewel win rodas, te lenn jon o djipen un o railepen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa dell len o Jesus Kristo.
55002011	Kau lab hi tchatcho: Te merah o Jesus Kristeha, djiwah mer ninna leha.
55002012	Te rikrah win an o patsepen, wah mer raja leha an o bolepen. Te dah mer les buchoste, dell job men ninna buchoste.
55002013	Te rikrah men gar pash leste, job rikrell pash mende. Un job atchell jaake har job hi.
55002014	Pen lenge kowa pale te pale! De len trad glan o Debleste, te tchingrenn jon pen gar pral laba! Ko tchingepen hi tchi moldo, un krell o patsepen kolendar paash, kai kowa lauter shunenna.
55002015	Kre lauter, te wess i latcho budepaskro o Debleske, un hunte ladjess tut gar koleske, hoi tu kreh! Pen o Debleskro lab jaake, har tchatcho hi!
55002016	Ma shun ap dinelo rakepen, hoi well i menshendar un gar o Deblestar! Kowa hi tchi moldo un anell i menshen o Deblestar krik!
55002017	Ko rakepen hi har i tchilatcho nasslepen, kai chal trul peste. Mashkral lende, kai dineles rakrenna, hi o Himeneo un o Fileto.
55002018	Jon mukan o tchatcho drom, un penenn chochepen, te penenn le: "Ko tsiro his koi, kai o Dewel i mulen djido kras." Hi patsle koi, kolenge krell kau rakepen pengro patsepen paash.
55002019	Ninna te hi sawe menshe koi, kai rakrenn chochepen, djinah mer: Kowa, hoi o Dewel kras, nashte krell kek paash. Kowa hi har i bar, hoi soreles tardo hi. Kek nai witsrell les trujal. Ap leste hi tchindlo: O rai prindjrella kolen, kai leskre hi. Un ninna hi tchindlo: Koon o rajes an-mangella, hunte mukell o tchilatcho drom.
55002020	An i baro kheer dell bud tchare un pirja: kolla dran sonakai un rup, ninna wawar dran kasht un chatchedi tchik. Kol kutch tchare un pirja wenn ap i chapaskri tchiddo, un an kol wawar well djungelo koowa dre tchiddo.
55002021	Jaake hi kowa ninna i patslentsa: Kowa, kai tchiwas ko tselo tchilatchepen dran peskro djipen wi, kowa hi har i kutch tcharo o rajeske pral o kheer. Job hi kokres peskro rajeske koi, un hi leske bud moldo. Leskro rai nai dell leske haki latchi budi.
55002022	Tu, Timoteo, ma kre ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i tarne murshenge an o shero trujal djala! Kre lauter, te djiwess an o tchatchepen! Atch an o patsepen! Ab kamlo ap i wawarende! Djib latches lentsa khetne! Kre kowa lauter khetne kol phralentsa, kai o Debles an-gole denna o djudjo djijeha!
55002023	Te tchingrenn i menshe pral i laba, ma muk tut an ko dinelo rakepen dre tsardell, hoi tchi molella! Tu djineh, kowa anell tchingepen.
55002024	Kowa, kai budrell o Debleske, hunte tchingrell pes gar. Na-a, job hi kamlo ap hakeneste, un haiwell mishto i menshende o Debleskro drom te sikrell. Job well gar chojedo ap lende,
55002025	ninna te kamenn le gar ap leste te shunell. Job rakrell latches lentsa, te anell lo len ap o tchatcho drom! O Dewel nai dell len o dji, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un te haiwenn le, hoi o tchatchepen hi.
55002026	Jaake wenn jon pale dran o bengeskre wasta win, kai jon pandlo his. O beng tapras len, te kran le kowa, hoi job kamella.
55003001	Kowa hunte djiness tu: Glan ko tsiro, kai i phub tele djala, well i pharo tsiro ap i menshende.
55003002	An ko pharo tsiro dikenn i menshe ap pende, te djal lenge kokres mishto. Jon hi pal i lowe. Jon krenn pen bares. Jon dikenn tele ap i wawarende. Jon rakrenn djungeles pral o Debleste. Jon shunenn gar ap pengro dadeste un ap pengri date. Jon parkrenn pen gar ko latchepaske, hoi i wawar lenge kran. Jon djiwenn jaake, har te dals kek Dewel.
55003003	Len hi kek dji i wawarenge. Jon wenn gar pale latches pal o tchingepen. Jon rakrenn chochepen pral o wawareste. Jon hi bi-pandlo un dukrenn i wawaren. Jon kamenn kek latchepen.
55003004	Jon hi phukepangre. Jon wenn sik chojedo. Jon phurdenn pen pre. Jon kamenn budeder pengro khelepen har o Debles.
55003005	Kolla krenn jaake, har te wans le patslo. Jon prindjrenn gar koi soor, hoi well dran o tchatcho patsepen. Rike tut sawe menshendar pale!
55003006	Mashkral lende hi menshe, kai djan an i khera, te taprenn le sawe djuwjen, kai ladjenn pen glan tchi, un ap lende bud doosh hi.
55003007	Kalla djuwja kamenn hako tsiro newo koowa te shunell un haiwenn gar, hoi o tchatchepen hi.
55003008	Glan raha tsiro shunan o Jannes un o Jambres gar ap o Moseste. Jaake shunenn kol menshe witar gar ap o tchatchepen. Jon hi nasselo an o shero, un lengro patsepen hi tchi moldo.
55003009	An i tikno tsiro dikella hakeno, kai kowa dinlepen hi, hoi jon krenna, har kowa ninna pash kolla dui murshende was.
55003010	Me sikrom tut, har te djas ap o Debleskro drom, un tu atchal ap leskro drom, un djiwal jaake, har me tuke glan djiwom. Tu kameh kowa, hoi me ninna kamau. Tu dikal, har me patsau ap o Jesus Kristeste. Un tu djineh, har rikrom ap o patsepen. Tu djineh ninna, har kamom i wawaren o djijestar, un har rikrom lauter win.
55003011	Tu djineh, har lan le man palla an i forja Antiochia, Ikonion un Listra. Un tu djineh, hawe duka jon mange kran. Un kowa lauter rikrom win. Un dran lauter kowa las man o rai Jesus win.
55003012	Djiness, lauter kolla, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste un kamenn te krenn, hoi job kamella, wenn palla lino.
55003013	Kol tchilatche menshe un kol chochene, kai krenn jaake, har te wans le patslo, kolentsa well djungleder un djungleder. Jon peran o Debleskro dromestar tele, un tsardenn ninna wawaren o Debleskro dromestar tele.
55003014	Tu, Timoteo, atch pash kowa, hoi tuke penlo was, un hoi tu patseh! Tu djineh, koon tuke kowa lauter penas.
55003015	Tu prindjreh o Debleskro lab fun tiknes pre. Un ko lab das tut o goswepen, te hatsal o drom pash o Jesus Kristeste un haiwal, tu hunte patsess ap o Jesus Kristeste, te less ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
55003016	Lauter, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, tchiwas o Dewel an i menshengre djia, te tchinenn le kowa pre. Men hunte well o Debleskro lab, te sikras i menshende leskro drom, te sikras len lengri doosh, un hoi te krenn le feteder, un har te djiwenn le i djipen, hoi o Dewel kamella.
55003017	I mensho, kai kamell o Debleske koi te well, hatsell an o Debleskro lab lauter, hoi les hunte well, te nai krell lo lauter jaake, har o Dewel kamella.
55004001	Kowa, hoi kanna penau tuke, penau glan o Debleste un glan o Jesus Kristeste, kai krell o tchatchepen win pral i djidende un i mulende. Job, kai well pale, te well lo o baro rai pral i tsele menshende, kowa shunell, hoi tuke penau:
55004002	Pen i menshenge o Debleskro lab! Kre kowa un muk gar tele, ninna te kamenn i menshe kowa gar te shunell! Sike len lengri doosh! De len trad, te mukenn le o tchilatchepen! Kre lengre djia soreles an o patsepen! Un ab gar khino, te sikress len o tchatcho drom!
55004003	Well i tsiro, kai kamenn le o Debleskro tchatchepen buder gar te shunell. Jon djiwenna, har jon kamenna, un rodenn penge sawe sikepangre, kai kowa len sikrenna, hoi jon kamenn te shunell.
55004004	Palle shunenn jon buder gar ap o tchatchepen. Jon shunenn ap chochene parmisse.
55004005	Tu, Timoteo, de jak har tu djiweh! Rike win, ninna te krenn le tuke o djipen phares! Pen i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar! Koi budi das tut o Dewel. Kre koi budi mishto!
55004006	Miro djipen hi har i pipen, hoi well win tchoredo o Debleske. O tsiro was, kai hunte merap.
55004007	Me budrom phares o Jesuseske un dom miro patsepen gar pre. Me nashom jaake ap o Jesuseskro drom, har te woms i nashepaskro, kai nashell i raha drom. Kanna nashom o tselo drom.
55004008	Kowa, hoi kanna glan mande hi, hi ko shukar koowa, hoi kolla lenna, kai kran, hoi o Dewel kamella. Un kowa dell man maro rai Jesus. Job hi ko tchatchepaskro rai, kai djal pal o tchatchepen. Ko shukar koowa dell lo man ap ko diwes, kai job o tchatchepen wi-rakrell pral i tsele menshende. Ko shukar koowa dell job gar mande kokres. Job dell kowa lauterende, kai dikenn o tselo djijestar ap ko diwes, kai well lo pale.
55004009	Ab jaake sik har djala pash mande!
55004010	O Demas mukas man, un djas an o foro Tessalonika. Job kamell o djipen ap kai phub. O Kreskens djas an o them Galatia, un o Tito an o them Dalmatia.
55004011	O Luka atchas kokres pash mande. Te weh tu pash mande, aan o Markes tuha! Job nai budrell mange.
55004012	O Tichikes bitchrom an o foro Efesus.
55004013	Te weh tu, aan mange miri plashka, kai mukom an o foro Troas pash o mursheste, kai kharella Karpus. Aan ninna kol lila un kol ledertikre patria tuha, kai jaake bud moldo hi.
55004014	O Alexandro, kowa, kai budrell i sasteha, kras mange bud tchilatchepen. O rai Jesus rakrell i phagi pral leste win pal kowa, hoi job kras.
55004015	Tu ninna, de tut garda glan leste! Lauter, hoi mer penam, his leske gar mishto.
55004016	Har homs o glanstuno kopo glan i tchatchepangre tardo, his kek ap miri rig tardo. Lauter mukan man kokres. Me mangau o Debles, te lell lo koi doosh lendar.
55004017	O rai Jesus his ap miri rig, un das man i soor, te nai penap kote o tselo latcho lab lestar, jaake te shunan les ninna kolla, kai hi kek bibolde. Un job las man jaake dran lengre wasta win, har te woms dran i leweskro mui win lino.
55004018	Ninna an ko tsiro, hoi wella, lell man o Dewel dran o tselo tchilatchepen win, un lell man pash peste an o bolepen, kai job o rai hi. Les sharas mer kanna un hako tsiro. Amen!
55004019	Pen latche laba mandar ap i Priska un ap o Akwila! Pen ninna latche laba mandar ap i menshende an o Onesiforeskro kheer!
55004020	O Erasto atchas an o foro Korint, un o Trofimes hunte mukom nasselo an o foro Milet.
55004021	Trade tut, te wess glan o wend kai. O Eubulo un o Pudens, o Linus, i Klaudia, un i tsele wawar patsle penenn tuke: "Atch o Debleha!"
55004022	Maro rai Jesus hi tuha! Leskro latchepen djal tumentsa!
56001001	Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil. Me hom o Debleskro budepaskro. Un o Jesus Kristo bitchras man pash kolende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas, te krap lengro patsepen soreles, te haiwenn le o tselo tchatchepen, un te djan le ap o Debleskro drom.
56001002	Jon hunte djinenn, te lenn le o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa penas o Dewel glan i raha tsiro. Un job chochella gar.
56001003	Un kanna, kai o tchatcho tsiro was, mukell lo hakeneske peskro lab te haiwell. Maro Dewel, kai men dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win lella, job bitchras man, te penap kowa i menshenge.
56001004	Me tchinau ap tute, Tito. Tut un man hi jek patsepen. Doleske hal tu har miro tchatcho tchawo. Mu well tut latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tut o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.
56001005	Me mukom tut an o them Kreta pale, te kress tu kowa, hoi me buder gar krom, un te rodess tu phureden win mashkral i patslende an hako foro, te rikrenn le i patslen ap o tchatcho drom. Te kreh tu kowa, ma biste, hoi me tuke penom!
56001006	Sawo phureder hunte djiwell jaake, te dikell kek i tchilatcho koowa ap leste. Les well gar budeder har jek romni. Leskre tchawe shunenn ap leste, un patsenn ap o Debleste. Jon hi gar bi-pandlo.
56001007	I pralstuno pral o Debleskro kheer hunte djiwell jaake, te dikell kek i tchilatcho koowa ap leste. Job djal gar pal peskro shero, un well gar sik chojemen! Job well kek pipaskro un kek tchingepaskro! Job nashell gar pal i lowe!
56001008	Na-a, job well gar jaake! Job lell i wawaren latches an peskro kheer dre! Les well i baro dji i wawarenge. Job dell pes jak, hoi job rakrella. Job hi tchatcho un krella, hoi o Dewel kamella. Job nai lell pes khetne.
56001009	Job rikrell pes ap o Debleskro lab jaake, har kowa leske penlo was, un tchatcho hi. Palle nai rakrell lo i patslenge an o dji, te atchenn le ap o tchatcho drom. Ninna nai sikrell lo kolende, kai wawar koowa rakrenna, kai lengro gar tchatcho hi.
56001010	Koi hi bud menshe, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste, un rakrenna dinelo koowa, un anenn i menshen o tchatcho dromestar tele. Bud lendar djiwenn pal i biboldengro tchatchepen un penenn: I mursha hunte wenn tchindlo ap o mass.
56001011	Tu pandess lengro mui! Jon sikrenn i menshende i drom, hoi gar tchatcho hi. Kowa krenn le, te well len budeder lowe. Jaake djinenn tsele familje buder gar, hoi te patsenna.
56001012	Jek lendar, kowa djiwas ninna an o them Kreta, his i sikepaskro un penas pral lende: "I Kretarja chochenn hako tsiro. Har diwje fiche hi le! Jon haidjrenn pengro pesso per o tselo diwes un budrenn tchi."
56001013	Un kowa, hoi ko sikepaskro penas, hi tchatcho. Doleske pen lenge, hoi pash lende gar mishto hi, un de len trad, te djan le tchatches ap o Debleskro drom.
56001014	Pen lenge, te shunenn le gar ap i biboldengre parmisse, witar gar ap kol menshende, kai mukan o tchatcho drom un penenn i menshenge, te rikrenn le pen ap laba, hoi penenna, hoi pale-tchiddo hi un hoi gar pale-tchiddo hi.
56001015	Kolla, kai o Jesus lengri doosh lendar las, kolla hi djudjo un erligo glan o Debleste. Kolenge dell tchi, hoi hi pale-tchiddo. Kolla, kai gar ap leste patsenna, kolla hi pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Kolenge hi lauter pale-tchiddo. Lengro dji hi tchilatcho, un jon haiwenn buder gar, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi.
56001016	Jon penenn, te prindjrenn le o Debles. An lauter, hoi jon krenna, sikrenn le, kai jon les gar prindjrenna. Jon hi infam an o Debleskre jaka, un kamenn gar ap leste te shunell. Jaake hi lauter, hoi jon krenna, tchi moldo.
56002001	Tu, Tito, sike i patslende o Debleskro drom jaake, har kowa tchatcho hi!
56002002	Pen i phure murshenge, te penenn le kek dinelo koowa, te djiwenn le latches glan i menshende, te denn le jak, hoi jon rakrenna, te atchenn le an o tchatcho patsepen, te kamenn le i menshen o tselo djijestar, un te wenn le gar khino an o patsepen!
56002003	Pen i phure djuwjenge, te djiwenn le jaake, har o Debleskre tchawe djiwenna, te rakrenn le gar djungeles pral i wawarende, te pijenn le pen gar mato! Jon hunte sikrenn i wawaren, hoi latcho hi.
56002004	I tarne djuwjenge hunte penenn le, te kamell hakeni peskro romes un pengre tchawen o djijestar,
56002005	te denn le pen jak, hoi jon rakrenna, te krenn le kek wi-ladjedo koowa, te krenn le pengri budi mishto an pengro kheer, te wenn le latches, un te shunell hakeni ap peskro romeste! Jon te krenn kowa lauter, palle rakrell nai kek mensho djungeles pral o Debleskro lab.
56002006	Pen i tarne murshenge soreles, te denn le jak, hoi jon rakrenna un krenna!
56002007	An hako koowa sike lende, har tu kowa kreh, te krenn le ninna latcho koowa! Pen o Debleskro lab an o tchatchepen, te djal les hakeneste an o dji!
56002008	Pen les lenge jaake, te nai penell kek, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi, hoi tu peneh! Palle nai rakrenn kolla gar djungeles pral mende, kai hi chojemen ap mende. Na-a, jon ladjenn pen.
56002009	Pen kolenge, kai hunte budrenn i rajeske, te shunenn le hako tsiro ap leste, te krenn le kowa, hoi job kamella, te rakrenn le leske gar pale,
56002010	te tchorenn le tchi lestar! I budepangre hunte krenn pengri budi mishto un tchatcho. Jaake sikrenn le an hako koowa, har mishto o Debleskro drom hi, hoi lende siklo was. Un jaake sharenn le o Debles, kai las men win dran o tchilatchepen.
56002011	Jaake sikras o Dewel, har baro peskro latchepen i tsele menshenge hi. Job kras i drom, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
56002012	An peskro latchepen penell lo menge, te penas "na-a" ap lauter, hoi job gar kamella, te kras mer ko djungelo koowa gar, hoi kol wawar kate ap i phub krenna. Mer das jak, hoi krah, te djas ap o tchatcho drom, un te kras, hoi o Dewel kamella, jaake raha har mer djiwah ap kai phub.
56002013	Un mer dikah ap ko bachtelo diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale an o shukar railepen. Job hi maro baro Dewel, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.
56002014	Job das peskro djipen an o merepen, te las lo mari tseli doosh ap peste, un te kras lo maro dji djudjo, te was mer leskre menshe, un te kamas i tseli sorjaha latcho koowa te krell.
56002015	Pen kawa lauter i patslenge! Rake an lengre djia! Te krenn le tchomone, hoi gar mishto hi, pen les lenge an o Debleskri soor! Hakeno hunte shunell ap tute.
56003001	Pen i patslenge, te shunenn le ap i rajende pral i themma un pral i forja! Pen lenge ninna, te krenn le hako latcho koowa,
56003002	te rakrenn le gar djungeles pral i wawarende, un te rodenn le kek tchingepen! Na-a! Jon hunte wenn o djijestar latcho un kamlo ap i tsele menshende.
56003003	Glan ko tsiro, kai hams gar patslo, hams ninna sawe menshe, kai prindjran o tchatchepen gar. Mer shunam gar ap o Debleste, un djam gar ap leskro drom. Hams pandlo ap djungelo koowa, hams tchilatcho un dikam tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi i wawaren his. Hams tchilatcho un chojemen ap i wawarende, un jon ap mende.
56003004	Kowa lauter was wawartchandes, har o Dewel mende sikras, har latcho un kamlo job ap i menshende hi. Job las men dran o tchilatchepen win
56003005	un anas men pash peste. Hams gar moldo, te kras job kowa. Ninna te kram gar latcho un tchatcho koowa, his o Debles i baro dji menge. Doleske thowas lo mari doosh mendar tele, un mer wam leskre tchawe. Kau newo djipen das men o Debleskro Ducho.
56003006	Koles bitchras o Jesus Kristo pash mende, un mer lam lestar bud.
56003007	Jaake tchiwas men o Jesus Kristo an o tchatchepen dran lauter latchepen, te dell lo men ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un mer djinah, kai lah ko djipen an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
56003008	Kau lab hi tchatcho. Doleske rake kowa i patslenge an o dji, te rodenn le koi pal, har nai krenn le latcho koowa. Kowa hi mishto un bud moldo hakeneske.
56003009	Ma shun ap ko dinelo rakepen, hoi tchi molella! Ma tchinge lentsa pral kol lila, kai hi i phurengre laba dre tchindlo, witar gar pral kowa, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi. Sawo tchingepen hi gar mishto i menshenge, un hi tchi moldo.
56003010	Te dell jek mensho, kai anell tchingepen mashkral i patslende, pen koleske, te mukell lo kowa! Job te mukell gar tele, pen kowa leske i duito kopo! Job te shunell gar ap tute, palle rake buder gar leha!
56003011	Tu djiness, sawo mensho djas o tchatcho dromestar tele, un kamell gar pale ap o tchatcho drom te well. Jaake sikrell lo, kai job mukas o Debles.
56003012	Me kamau te bitchrap i phrales pash tute: nai well o Artemas, nai well o Tichiko. Te well jek lendar pash tute, palle hunte wess tu sik pash mande kate an o foro Nikopolis. Me kamau te atchap kate pral o wend.
56003013	O Zenas, ko tchatchepaskro, un o Apollo, kolen de lauter djipaske, te djan le ap o drom dureder!
56003014	Muk ninna i patslen latcho koowa te krell un i wawarende te dell, hoi kolen hunte well djipaske! Jaake djiwenn i patsle pengro djipen gar tchitcheske.
56003015	Lauter kolla, kai pash mande hi, mukenn tuke latche laba te penell. Pen latche laba mendar lauterenge, kai kamenn men an o patsepen! O Debleskro latchepen djal tumentsa lauterentsa!
57001001	Me, o Paulo, kai stildo hom o Jesus Kristeske, un maro phraal, o Timoteo, mer tchinah kau liil ap tute, Filemon! Tu hal maro kamlo phraal un kreh mentsa khetne o Debleskri budi.
57001002	Mer tchinah ninna ap mari phenjate, i Apfia, un ap o Archippo, kai budrella mentsa o Jesus Kristeske, ninna ap i tsele patslende, kai wenna khetne an tiro kheer.
57001003	Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, kai maro dad an o bolepen hi, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai.
57001004	Hako tsiro, kai rakrau o Debleha, parkrau man tuke pash leste.
57001005	-
57001006	Me shunom, kai tu kameh i tsele patslen o djijestar. Un tu patseh ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste, jaake har mer ap leste patsah. Me mangau o Deblestar, te well tiro patsepen jaake soreles an tute, te haiwess tu bud un budeder har baro o latchepen hi, hoi das men o Jesus Kristo.
57001007	Miro phraal! Tiro kamlepen, hoi hi tut i patslenge, kowa kras lengre djia soreles. Un kowa, hoi tu lenge kral, kras man ninna bachteles, un das man newi soor.
57001008	-
57001009	Kanna penau tuke, hoske tchinau kau liil: Me kamau tutar, te kress tu tchomone mange. Ninna te hi man o Jesuseskro wast, un nai penoms tuke soreles, hoi tu hunte kress, kamau me kowa gar soreles tuke penell. Na-a. Me, o Paulo, i phuro mursh, un stildo o Jesus Kristeske, kamau tut o djijestar.
57001010	Un doleske mangau tutar miro tchaweske, o Onesimo, te wess tu leske latches. Kate an o stilepen penom leske o Jesus Kristestar. Un job was patslo, un was miro tchawo an o patsepen.
57001011	Ap ko tsiro, har job pash tute budras, his lo tuke tchi moldo. Kanna hi lo mange har tuke bud moldo.
57001012	Koles bitchrau tuke pale. Un miro dji djal leha.
57001013	Me kamoms te atchals lo pash mande un wals mange koi, jaake har tu mange koi wals, te wals tu pash mande kate an o stilepen. Kate hom doleske, kai penom i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
57001014	Me kamom gar tchomone te krap, hoi tu gar kameh. Doleske rikrom o Onesimes gar pash mande. Tu te kameh les mange pale te dell, kress tu kowa dran tiro latchepen.
57001015	Nai wals, te his lo i tikno tsiro gar pash tute, te atchell lo kanna hako tsireske pash tute.
57001016	Kanna hi lo tuke buder gar kokres i budepaskro. Na-a. Job hi budeder har kowa. Job hi i latcho phraal. Kowa hi lo mange, un har bud budeder hi lo kowa kanna tuke: Job hi tiro budepaskro un ninna tiro phraal an o patsepen.
57001017	Me te hom tiro maal, palle le les pash tute pre, jaake har tu man pre lals.
57001018	Job te kras tuke tchomone tchilatches un te hi les i sijaan pash tute, palle kre jaake, har wals man koi sijaan pash tute.
57001019	Me, o Paulo, tchinau kowa kokres miro wasteha. Me kamau plaissrell, hoi job hunte plaissrals tuke. Me kamau gar te rakrap pral koi sijaan, hoi tut pash mande hi: Me anom tut ap o Debleskro drom.
57001020	Awa, miro phraal! Kre man bachteles, un kre kowa, hoi me tutar mangom! Kre kowa maro rajeske, o Jesus Kristeske, ap koleste mer dui patsah. Jaake kreh tu miro dji soreles an leste!
57001021	Me djinau, te shuneh ap mande un kreh ninna budeder har me tutar mangom. Doleske tchinom tuke kau liil.
57001022	I wawar koowa mangau tutar: Kre mange i isema an tiro kheer, kai me nai sowap! O Dewel te shunell tumaro mangepen, palle wau an i tikno tsiro pash tumende. Kowa patsau.
57001023	O Epafras, kai mantsa an o stilepen o Jesus Kristeske hi, penell tuke: Atch maro Debleha!
57001024	Ninna o Marko, o Aristarcho, o Demas, un o Luka, kai mantsa o Jesus Kristeske budrenna, kolla lauter penenn tuke: Atch maro Debleha!
57001025	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, well pral tumende!
58001001	An o phuro tsiro rakras o Dewel bud kope jaake te jaake ap peskre rakepangre, un bitchras len pash mare phurende, te penenn le lenge leskre laba.
58001002	Kanna, an kau tsiro, bitchras lo peskro tchawes pash mende, te rakras job ap mende. Koleste das o Dewel lauter an leskre wasta, te well job o rai pral lauter. Koleha kras lo o bolepen un i phub.
58001003	O Debleskro tchawo hi railo un baro har o Dewel. Un kowa, hoi hi o Debles an o dji, hi ninna o tchawes an o dji. Dran leskro sorelo lab rikrell lo lauter khetne, hoi job kras. O Debleskro tchawo las mari doosh un tchilatchepen mendar, un job beshas pes ap i tchatchi rig o baro Deblestar an o bolepen.
58001004	Job was bud bareder un sorleder har i bolepangre. Un o Dewel das les i lab, hoi hi bud bareder un raileder har lengre laba.
58001005	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, kai penell o Dewel ap peskro tchaweste: Tu hal miro tchawo. Kau diwes wom tiro dad. Sawe laba penas lo ap kekeste peskre bolepangre. Witar gar penas lo ap kekeste lendar: Me wau tiro dad. Un tu weh miro tchawo.
58001006	O Debleskro tchawes hi peskro dadeskro wast. Lestar penas o Dewel, har job les ap i phub bitchras: I tsele Debleskre bolepangre hunte witsrenn pen glan leste tele, te sharenn le les.
58001007	Pral peskre bolepangre penas lo: Jon hi mire budepangre, sik har i ducho, hoi phurdell pral i phub, un sorelo har i jag.
58001008	Ap peskro tchaweste penas lo: Tu, o Dewel, atcheh o baro rai kanna un hako tsiro. Tu hal tchatcho un latcho ap tire menshende.
58001009	O tchatchepen kamal tu, un o tchilatchepen dikeh glan i jaka nai gar. Doleske rodas tut tiro Dewel win, te wess tu bareder un bachtleder har kolla, kai pash tute hi.
58001010	Pale penas lo ap leste: Tu hal o baro rai, un kral i phub glan i raha tsiro. Un tire wasta kran o bolepen.
58001011	O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Tu atcheh hako tsiro. O bolepen un i phub wenn phuro, un djan paash har i ripen.
58001012	Tu tchiweh len khetne, har jek i phuri plashka khetne tchiwella, un i newi plashka ap peste tchiwella. Tu atcheh jaake, har tu hal, un mereh gar.
58001013	Ap kekeste peskre bolepangre penas lo kowa, hoi job ap peskro tchaweste penas: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig! Un me krau, te wess tu o rai pral kolende, kai chan pen ap tute.
58001014	I tsele bolepangre hi leskre budepangre. Kolen bitchras o Dewel ap i rig kolendar, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom, te lenn le o Debleskro djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
58002001	-
58002002	Glan i raha tsiro penan i bolepangre mare phurenge, har hunte djan jon ap o Debleskro drom. Koon gar ap o Debleste shunas, un gar ap leskro drom djas, kowa las peskri phagi. Jaake sorelo hi o Debleskro lab. Doleske hunte das mer baro jak ap ko lab, hoi mer shunam, te djiwas pal kowa, un te peras gar ko tchatcho dromestar tele.
58002003	Mer te djah gar ap o newo drom, kai lah o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella, palle wella o Debleskri choli pral mende. Kau newo drom sikras men maro rai Jesus. Un leskre laba hi o tchatchepen. Kolla, kai les shunan, penan les menge.
58002004	Un o Dewel das len peskri soor, te krenn le baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar mensho nai krella. Jaake sikras lo, te penan le o tchatchepen. Ninna das lo i patslende peskro Ducho un peskri soor, te krenn le peskri budi mashkral i menshende. Hakeneste das lo i soor, te krell job koi budi, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas.
58002005	Ap i bolepangre penas lo gar, te wenn le raja pral koi newi phub, hoi wella, kolatar mer kate rakrah. Na-a.
58002006	Kowa penas lo ap i menshende. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Hoske bistral tu gar o menshes? Hoske deh tu ap leste garda?
58002007	I tikno tsiro mukal les tikneder te well har i bolepangre. Palle kral tu les railo un baro.
58002008	Tu dal lauter an leskre wasta. Tchi hi koi, pral koleste job gar o rai hi. Ninna te djinah mer kowa, dikah kanna gomme gar lauter an leskre wasta.
58002009	Kones mer dikah, kowa hi o Jesus. Job his i tikno tsiro tikneder har i bolepangre, un meras i menshenge. Doleske kras o Dewel les baro un railo. Jaake latcho his o Dewel i menshenge, te bitchras lo o Jesuses lauterenge an o merepen.
58002010	O Dewel kamas, te wenn bud menshe peskre tchawe, un lenn leskro railepen. Doleske hunte las peskro tchawo duka un merepen ap peste, te nai anell lo len ap ko drom, kai lenn le o Debleskro djipen. Jaake his kowa mishto glan o Debleskre jaka, kai lauter kras, un koleske lauter kerdo was.
58002011	O Jesus kras i patslen tchatcho un erligo, un anas len pash peskro dadeste. Kanna hi leskro dad ninna lengro dad. Doleske ladjell lo gar, te dell lo len "phrala" gole.
58002012	Un job penell ap o Debleste: Me sikrau mire phralende, koon tu hal. Un kote, kai jon khetne wenna, sharau tut un giwau gilja tuke.
58002013	Un pale penell lo: Me tchiwau man an o Debleskre wasta. Un pale penell lo: Dik, kate hom me kal tchawentsa, kai o Dewel das man.
58002014	Jon hi menshe dran rat un mass. Doleske was lo ninna i mensho har jon, un meras, te las lo o bengeske i soor krik pral o merepen.
58002015	Jaake nai las lo kol menshenge i daar o merepastar, hoi his len an pengro tselo djipen.
58002016	Tchatchepaha, kowa kras lo gar i bolepangrenge, na-a, kowa kras lo kol menshenge, kai ap leste patsenna, jaake har o Abraham ap leste patsas.
58002017	Doleske hunte was o Jesus an lauter jaake, har leskre phrala, te well les i baro dji lenge, un te well lo lenge i tchatcho baro rashai glan o Debleste, te mangell lo les leskre menshenge, te lell job i doosh lendar.
58002018	O Jesus haiwella, hoi duka hi. Un job djinella, har kowa hi, te kamell o beng jekes o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Doleske nai well lo kanna ninna ap i rig kolendar, kai kamell len o beng o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell.
58003001	Mire patsle phrala, o Dewel das tumen gole, te djiwenn pash leste an o bolepen. Doleske dikenn ap o Jesuseste, kones o Dewel bitchras, te anell lo i menshen ap leskro drom. Les hi peskro dadeskro wast. Un job hi maro baro rashai. Ap leste patsah mer. Job mangell o Debles menge.
58003002	Koi budi das les o Dewel. Un job kras lat mishto jaake, har ninna o Mose peskri budi o Debleskre menshenge mishto kras.
58003003	O Jesus hi bareder har o Mose. Kowa hi jaake, har te wals i kheer kerdo: Kowa, kai kras ko kheer, well budeder sharedo har ko kheer, hoi kerdo was.
58003004	Hako kheer well jekestar kerdo. Un kowa, kai lauter kras, hi o Dewel.
58003005	O Mose budras mishto o Debleskre menshenge. Kowa, hoi job kras un penas, sikras lende, hoi o Dewel kamas te krell an ko tsiro, hoi wella. Ninna te budras o Mose mishto, his lo i Debleskro budepaskro.
58003006	O Jesus Kristo hi o Debleskro tchawo. Un an leskre wasta hi o Debleskre menshe, ap kolende job mishto garda della. Kolla ham mer, te tchiwah maro tselo patsepen ap leste, un dah gar pre bis te lah o railo djipen pash leste.
58003007	Doleske shunenn, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tumenge penella: Tumer te shunenna kau diwes o Debleskro rakepen, palle shunenn ap leste!
58003008	Krenn tumaro dji gar har barra jaake, har tumare phure kran an o mulo them, har tchingran le ap o Moseste, un kaman miro drom buder gar te djal!
58003009	Ninna te dikan le star-deesh bersha, hoi me, o Dewel, lenge krom, patsan le man gar, un mire laba his lenge tchi moldo.
58003010	Doleske wom me chojedo ap lende, un penom: Hako tsiro djan le pal pengro shero. Miro drom kaman le gar te djal.
58003011	Jaake chojedo homs ap lende, te dom man sowel, un penom: Jon wenn gar dre an miro them, kai jon pash mande khere nai wans.
58003012	Mire phrala, denn jak ap tumare djia, te mukell kek tumendar peskro patsepen, un kamell o djido Deblestar buder tchi te djinell.
58003013	Rakrenn hako diwes khetne pral o patsepen, te atchenn pash o Debleste! Ko tsiro, kai rakrell o Dewel ap tumende hi kanna. Te shunenn tumer gar ap o Debleste, nai well i tsiro, kai shunenn tumer buder gar, te dell lo tumen gole.
58003014	Te rikrah soreles ap maro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste jaake raha, har djiwah, palle ham tchatchepaha leskre.
58003015	Doleske hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Kau diwes, te shunenn tumer o Debleskro rakepen, shunenn ap leste, un krenn tumare djia gar har barra, har tumare phure kran, har tchingran le ap o Moseste, un kaman miro drom buder gar te djal!
58003016	Penenn mange: Koon his kolla, kai shunan o Debleskro rakepen, un kaman buder gar ap leskro drom te djal? Kolla his lauter, kai djan o Moseha win dran o them Egiptia.
58003017	Pale putchau tumendar: Pral koneste was o Debleskri choli star-deesh bersha? Leskri choli was ap kolende, kai kaman buder gar ap leskro drom te djal. Kolla meran an o mulo them, un atchan kote tchiddo.
58003018	Kanna penenn mange: Pral koneste rakras o Dewel, har job pes sowel das, te wenn le gar an leskro them, kai jon hako tsiro khere wans? Job rakras kolendar, kai shunan gar ap leste.
58003019	Jaake dikah mer: Kolla, kai patsan gar, hoi o Dewel penas, hi kolla, kai wan gar an o Debleskro them dre.
58004001	-
58004002	Dran kowa denn mishto garda, te dell kek tumendar peskro patsepen pre! An o phuro tsiro penas o Dewel peskre menshenge, te dell lo len i them, kai jon hako tsiro khere hi. Kau lab, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, atchell menge ninna. An o phuro tsiro shunan le les, un patsan les gar. Jaake wan le gar an o Debleskro them.
58004003	Mer, kai patsah, hoi o Dewel penas, mer wah an o Debleskro them. I wawarendar penell lo: An miri choli dom man sowel, un penom: Jon wenn gar dre an miro them, kai wans le hako tsiro pash mande khere. Kau them hi koi jaake raha, har o Dewel o bolepen un i phub kras. Lauter his kerdo, har job o bolepen un i phub an shob diwessa kras.
58004004	Pral o eftato diwes was penlo: Har kras o Dewel lauter an o bolepen un ap i phub, budras lo buder tchi ap o eftato diwes. Lauter his kerdo.
58004005	Kol menshendar an o phuro tsiro penas lo: Jon wenn gar an miro them dre, kai wans le hako tsiro pash mande khere.
58004006	Jaake dikah: Hi sawe menshe, kolla wan gar dre an leskro them, un wawar, kai nai wenn koi dre. Kolla, kai shunan o Debleskro lab an o phuro tsiro, patsan les gar, un wan gar dre.
58004007	Doleske rodas o Dewel i wawar diwes win, kai job pale ap i menshende rakrella. Ko diwes hi kanna. Bud bersha pal o tsiro, kai mare phure an o mulo them djan, tchiwas lo o Davideske kol laba an o dji: Tumer te shunenn kau diwes o Debleskro rakepen, palle shunenn ap leste! Krenn tumare djia gar har barra!
58004008	Glan o David djiwas o Josua. Kowa anas mare phuren an o them Israel. Te wals o them Israel ko them, pral koleste o Dewel rakras, rakrals lo bud bersha pal ko tsiro buder gar pral i wawar diwes.
58004009	Jaake dikah: Hi gomme i tsiro, kai nai wenn i menshe pash o Debleste, kai jon hako tsiro khere nai wenna.
58004010	Kote hunte krenn i menshe buder kek budi, jaake har o Dewel buder kek budi kras, har lauter ap i phub kerdo was.
58004011	Doleske tchiwas mer maro tselo dji koi pre, te was an leskro them dre, kai ham hako tsiro pash leste khere. Das jak, te perell kek mendar o Debleskro dromestar tele, har kol menshe an o phuro tsiro, kai shunan gar ap o Debleste!
58004012	O Debleskro lab hi djido un sorelo, un tchinell sorleder har i charo, hoi tchinell ap dui riga. Jaake har tchinell i charo dur dre an o mass, ninna an i kokale, jaake tchinell o Debleskro lab dur dre an o mensheskro dji, un sikrell leste, hoi hi latcho un tchilatcho an leskro djipen.
58004013	O Dewel dikella lauter. Tchi an mende hi khatedo glan leskre jaka. Lauter hi pre tchakedo glan leste. Un leske hunte penas mer halauter, hoi kram.
58004014	Men hi i baro rashai. Kowa hi o Jesus, o Debleskro tchawo. Job djas pash o Debleste an o bolepen, te mangell lo les menge. Doleske mukas mer gar tele, te rikras soreles ap maro patsepen.
58004015	Job, maro baro rashai, haiwell men mishto, un djinella, te hi men kek soor pral o tchilatchepen. Les kamas o beng ninna o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell, jaake har kamell lo men o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Jek koowa his an o Jesuseskro djipen wawartchandes har pash mende: Kek tchilatchepen his an leste.
58004016	Dran kowa was mer glan maro latcho Debleste. Koles hi i baro dji menge, te dell lo men peskri soor ap ko tsiro, kai hunte las mer leskri soor.
58005001	Hako baro rashai hi dran i menshende win rodedo, te well lo lengro rashai glan o Debleste. Leske anenn le fichen, te anell lo len glan o Debleste, te well lengri doosh lendar krik lino.
58005002	O baro rashai haiwell mishto, har kolenge djala, kai peran o Debleskro dromestar tele, ninna te djinan le gar, kai hi kowa tchilatcho, hoi jon kran. Job hi i mensho har jon, un les hi gar i soor pral o tchilatchepen.
58005003	Doleske hunte marell lo ninna peske i fiches, un anell les glan o Debleste, te well leskri doosh krik lino, jaake har job i wawar menshenge fichen marella, un glan o Debleste anella.
58005004	Kek mursh nai penella: Me wau baro rashai. Na-a, o Dewel rodell les win, jaake har job glan i raha tsiro ninna o Arones win rodas, te well lo i baro rashai.
58005005	Ninna o Jesus Kristo kras pes gar bares un penas: Me wau baro rashai. Na-a, o Dewel rodas les win, har penas lo ap leste: Tu hal miro tchawo. Kau diwes wom tiro dad.
58005006	I wawar kopo penas lo lestar: Hako tsiro hal tu o baro rashai glan mande, un kreh koi budi jaake, har glan i raha tsiro o Melchisedek kras.
58005007	Har o Jesus ap i phub djiwas, kras lo lauter, hoi o Dewel kamas. Doleske shunas les o Dewel. An i daar mangas o Jesus o Debles i ropaha un bari goljaha. Job djinas, kowa nai lell les dran o merepen win.
58005008	Ninna te his lo o Debleskro tchawo, hunte las job duka ap peste, te krell lo kowa, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas.
58005009	Un job kras kowa lauter, un tchi atchas pral, hoi hunte krals lo gomme. Jaake nai lell lo lauteren, kai ap leste shunenna, hako tsireske dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
58005010	Un o Dewel penas ap leste: Tu hal i baro rashai glan mande, har glan i raha tsiro o Melchisedek his.
58005011	Pral kowa wals men tumenge budeder te penell. Un menge hi kowa phares, te rakras jaake, te haiwenn tumer les: Tumare djia wan khino.
58005012	Tumer han jaake raha patslo, kai hunte wans sikepangre i wawar menshenge. Kowa han tumer gar. Tumende hunte well pale o Debleskro drom siklo har djinans les gomme gar. Jaake han tumer har tikne tchawe, kai pijenna thud, un nai chan kek mursheskro chapen.
58005013	I thud hi i tikne tchawenge, kai djinenn gar, hoi hi latcho un tchilatcho.
58005014	O mursheskro chapen hi kolenge, kai djiwenna pal o Debleskro lab un haiwenn bud un budeder, hoi latcho un tchilatcho hi.
58006001	Kanna kamah te rakras pral kowa, hoi kolenge hi, kai hi phure an o patsepen, un buder gar pral kowa, hoi mer kolenge penah, kai hi tarno an o patsepen. Mer kamah buder gar pral kowa te rakrell, hoi tumer shunan, har patslo wan! Ap ko tsiro was tumenge penlo, te mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom, hoi an o merepen anella, un te patsenn ap o Debleste, un te djan ap leskro drom.
58006002	Ninna was tumenge penlo, te mukenn tumen an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn tumer, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. Ninna was tumenge penlo, hoske i patslo peskre wasta ap i wawareste tchiwella. Tumenge was ninna penlo, te krell o Dewel i mulen djido, un te rakrell lo o tchatchepen pral lende win. Kowa, hoi job len dell, - o djipen har i phagi, - kowa atchell hako tsiro ap lende.
58006003	Djas kanna dureder! Kowa kamell o Dewel mendar!
58006004	-
58006006	Hi menshe koi, kolenge kras o Dewel lengre djia pre, te haiwan le leskro bolepaskro latchepen. Un o Debleskro Ducho budras an lengre djia. Un jon haiwan o Debleskro latcho lab un leskri soor an lengro djipen. Kolla te perenn o Debleskro dromestar tele, nai anell len kek pale ap o Debleskro drom. Kowa, hoi jon krenna hi jaake, har te denn le penge o Jesus Kristes pale ap o trushel. Un kol wawar san pral leste.
58006007	Mer menshe ham har i phub, ap late bud kope o brishin das. O Dewel dikell latches ap koleste, kai hi har koi phub, hoi lell o brishin an peste dre, un anell latcho koowa win kolenge, kai budrenn koi.
58006008	Job dikell gar latches ap koleste, te hi lo har koi wawar phub, hoi anell subjengre burra, un wawar djungele burra win. Koi phub hi tchi moldo, un pal i tsiro well li chatchedo.
58006009	Kamle mala, ninna te rakrah jaake, patsah soreles, te han tumer ap i feteder drom. Ko drom anell tumen pash o Debleste.
58006010	O Dewel hi latcho un tchatcho, un bistrell gar tumaro kamlepen ap leste, har budran i patslenge, un krenn kowa gomme kanna dureder.
58006011	Mer kamah o djijestar, te tchiwell hakeno tumendar peskro dji ap ko shukar djipen, hoi kamell o Dewel les te dell an o bolepen.
58006012	Ma awenn khino, te krenn o Debleskri budi! Awenn jaake har kolla, kai atchan soreles an o patsepen, un lan kowa, hoi o Dewel lenge penas.
58006013	-
58006016	Te dell i mensho peskro lab, dell lo peskro dadeskro wast koi pre. Leskro dad hi bareder har job. Jaake sikrell lo o wawares, te krell lo tchatchepaha kowa, hoi job penas. Un ko wawar patsell les. Har das o Dewel o Abrahameste peskro lab, das lo peskro wast koi pre. His kek, kai his bareder har o Dewel. Un o Dewel penas: Tchatchepaha, bud bacht mukau pral tute te well, un tutar wenna bud bud tchawe. Un o Abraham patsas o Debles, un witsras gar peskro patsepen ap i rig. Un jaake las lo kowa, hoi o Dewel leske penas.
58006017	Har das o Dewel peskre menshen peskro lab, das lo ninna peskro wast koi pre. Jaake sikras lo len, te dell lo len tchatchepaha kowa, hoi job lenge penas.
58006018	Ko lab, hoi das o Dewel un das peskro wast pre, nai well an kek tsiro krik lino. O Dewel chochella gar. Un mer, kai wam pash leste, te lell lo men dran o tchilatchepen win, men hi kanna leskro sorelo lab, te dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella, jaake har job penas.
58006019	-
58006020	Kau patsepen rikrell maro djipen, jaake har rikrell i sorelo saster i panjeskro ulepaskro, te djal lo gar ap o pani nashedo. Un kowa, ap koleste patsah un dikah, kowa hi o Jesus. Job djas glan mende pash o Debleste an o bolepen, jaake har djas o baro rashai an o phuro tsiro an o Debleskro kheer. Un jaake was o Jesus hako tsireske sawo baro rashai, har glan i raha tsiro o Melchisedek his.
58007001	O Melchisedek his o baro rai pral o foro Salem, ninna o baro rashai o baro Deblestar. An ko tsiro djas o Abraham an o kurepen, un maras i bare rajen pengre lurdentsa. Har job pale was, djas o Melchisedek pash leste, un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral leste win.
58007002	Un o Abraham das les o deshto kotar lauterestar, hoi las job an o kurepen. Ko lab Melchisedek kharella Tchatcho Rai, un job his ninna o rai pral o foro Salem. O lab Salem kharella Bacht.
58007003	An o Debleskro lab hi tchi tchindlo pral leskro dadeste un leskri date. Tchi hi koi tchindlo pral leskre phurende, witar gar pral ko diwes, kai job boldo was, un kai job meras. Jaake atchell lo o baro rashai hako tsireske, har o Debleskro tchawo.
58007004	Kowa sikrell tumen, har baro o Melchisedek his! Koles das maro kamlo dad, o Abraham, o deshto kotar lauterestar, hoi las job an o kurepen.
58007005	Ninna an o them Israel lan i rashaja o deshto kotar lauterestar, hoi i Israelitarja penge khetne anan. Jaake his tchindlo an o Moseskre lila. Kol rashaja, - lengro dad his o Levi, - lan o deshto kotar kolendar, kai lengre phrala his. Kolla lauter wan pal o Abraham.
58007006	Koleste das o Dewel peskro lab, te krell lo les baro, un te dell lo les bud bacht. Ninna te hi o Abraham jaake baro, hi o Melchisedek bareder har job. Job las o deshto kotar o Abrahamestar un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral leste win, ninna te his lo gar leskre menshendar.
58007007	Un hakeno djinella: O bareder rakrell i bacht win pral o tikneder.
58007008	I rashaja an o them Israel, kolende i menshe pengro deshto kotar denna, kolla hi menshe, kai hunte merenna. O Melchisedek, kolestar hi penlo, te djiwell lo.
58007009	I rashaja an o them Israel wenna pal o Levi. Kolla lenn o deshto kotar, hoi pengre phrala khetne anan. Un o Levi was pal o Abraham. Jaake nai penah: Har das o Abraham o deshto kotar, das kowa ninna leskro tchaweskro tchawo, o Levi,
58007010	ninna te his o Levi gomme gar boldo, har o Melchisedek pash o Abrahameste djas.
58007011	Mer djinah, har das o Dewel peskre menshende o Moseskre lila, koi penas job ap o Levideskre tchawe, te wenn le rashaja. Ninna te kran jon pengri budi jaake, har lengro dad, o rashai Aron, nai tchiwan le i menshen gar an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste. Doleske rodas o Dewel i wawar rashajes win, jek, kai krell peskri budi jaake har o Melchisedek, un buder gar jaake har o Aron.
58007012	Mer djinah: Te lell o Dewel peske i wawar rashai, kai gar o Levideskre tchawendar hi, palle sikrell o Dewel ninna i wawar drom, kai wenn nai i menshe pash leste.
58007013	-
58007014	Maro baro rashai, kolestar kate rakedo wella hi o Jesus Kristo. Job well gar o Levideskre menshendar. Mer lauter djinah, leskre menshe wenna pal o Juda. Un kek kolendar his i rashai. Lenge penas o Mose gar, te wenn le rashaja.
58007015	-
58007016	Mer haiwah mishto, ko wawar rashai, kai hi jaake har o Melchisedek, koles his kek dad, koon ninna rashai his. Na-a. Les hi o Debleskro djipen, kai hako tsiro atchella. Doleske was lo maro rashai.
58007017	O Dewel penell pral leste: Tu hal i rashai hako tsireske har o Melchisedek.
58007018	Jaake tchiwas lo kol phure laba, hoi o Mose i menshenge penas, ap i rig. An kol laba his kek soor. Un jon his tchi moldo.
58007019	O Moseskre laba nai kran i menshen gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. Doleske sikras men o Dewel i newo un feteder drom, kai anell men pash leste.
58007020	-
58007021	Job tchiwas o Jesuses an leskri budi un penas: Tu hal i baro rashai hako tsireske, un job das peskro wast koi pre. Un kal laba nai khaitenn les kek tsireske. Har job o Levideskre tchawen lengri budi das, te wenn le rashaja, das job gar peskri wast koi pre.
58007022	Jaake was o Jesus kowa, kai nai anell men tchatchepaha pash o Debleste. Kowa nai kras o Mose gar.
58007023	An ko tselo tsiro his bud rashaja. Kolla lauter hunte meran. Har jek meras, was pale i wawar.
58007024	O Jesus atchell o rashai hako tsireske. Job merella gar, un kek wawar well pal leste.
58007025	Doleske nai krell lo, te djal kek kolendar nashedo, koon job pash o Debleste anas. Job djiwell hako tsireske, un mangell o Debles lenge.
58007026	O Jesus hi o baro rashai, kai hunte well men. Job hi latcho glan o Debleskre jaka. Kek tchilatchepen, witar kek doosh hi ap leste. Na-a, job hi gar jaake har mer tchilatche menshe ham, kai ham pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Un o Dewel kras les bareder har hako wawar an o bolepen.
58007027	Job hi gar har kol wawar bare rashaja, un hunte anell gar hako diwes i maredo fiches o Debleske, te well peskri doosh krik lino. Ninna hunte anell lo gar i wawar menshenge marede fichen o Debleske, te well lengri doosh krik lino. Na-a, job kokres das peskro djipen an o merepen jek kopo hako tsireske.
58007028	Kol wawar bare rashaja hi menshe un gar sorelo, un nai krenn gar mishto kowa, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella. Jon wan rashaja jaake, har o Mose an peskre lila tchinas. Bud tsiro palla, das o Dewel peskro lab, un das peskro wast koi pre, te well leskro tchawo i baro rashai hako tsireske. Job krell lauter mishto, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.
58008001	Kowa hunte djinenn tumer: Men hi i baro rashai, kowa hi o Jesus Kristo. An o bolepen hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar.
58008002	Kote budrell lo o Debleske an o tchatcho Debleskro kheer, hoi kras o Dewel, un kek mensho.
58008003	Hako baro rashai ap i phub hunte anell o Debleske marede fichen, un wawar latcho koowa. Ninna maro rashai, o Jesus, hunte anell tchomone o Debleske.
58008004	Kate ap kai phub wals lo kek rashai. Ap i phub hi kol rashaja, kai anenn o Debleske latcho koowa jaake, har an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi.
58008005	Ko kheer, kai jon budrenna, un kowa, hoi jon krenna, sikrell men i tikno kotar dran koi tseli budi, hoi krell maro baro rashai, o Jesus Kristo, an o bolepen. Kowa dikah kanna gomme gar lauter. Har kras o Mose o Debleske i kheer dran fichengre balla an o mulo them, penas o Dewel leske, har te krell lo les un penas: Kowa lauter, hoi tu kreh, kre jaake, har me sikrom les tute ap i berga!
58008006	Maro baro rashai hi o Jesus. Koleste das o Dewel i feteder budi har kol rashajende ap i phub. Job hi ninna maro rakepaskro, kai kras menge i newo drom, kai nai wah pash o Debleste. Kau newo drom hi feteder har ko phuro drom, hoi o Mose sikras. Ap kau newo drom djiwah nai tchatchepaha o Debleha khetne, jaake har job kowa menge penas.
58008007	Te nai wams ap o phuro drom pash o Debleste, hunte rodals o Dewel kek newo drom.
58008008	Job dikas, kai kol menshe, kolengre phure o Israel un o Juda his, gar jaake djiwan, har job lenge penas. Koi penas lo: Ko tsiro wella, kai sikrau len i newo drom, te wenn le mantsa khetne.
58008009	Kau newo drom hi gar jaake, har ko phuro drom, hoi sikrom lende ap ko diwes, kai taprom lengre phuren ap i wasta, te anap len dran o them Egiptia win. Har atchan le gar ap miro drom, mukom len.
58008010	Ap ko tsiro, hoi wella, penell o Dewel, rakrau pale lentsa, un anau len ap o newo drom. Me tchiwau miro tchatchepen an lengre shere, un tchinau mire laba an lengre djia. Un me hom lengro Dewel, un jon hi mire menshe.
58008011	Kek hunte penell ap peskro phraleste, witar gar ap koleste, kai djiwell pash leste: Tu hunte hatsess o Debles! Hakeno djinella, koon me hom. I tikne un i bare prindjrenn man.
58008012	Un me bistrau lengri doosh, hoi jon ap pende anan. Ko tchilatchepen, hoi jon kran, well buder gar an miro shero.
58008013	Te penell o Dewel kate: Me krau i newo drom, jaake hi kowa, hoi job o Moseha win kras, i phuro drom. Un kowa, hoi hi phuro un buder tchi moldo, well krik lino.
58009001	An ko phuro tsiro, har o Mose i menshenge penas, har djan le ap o Debleskro drom, koi penas lo lenge ninna, har te budrenn le o Debleske an leskro kheer, un ninna, har te krenn le leske i kheer ap i phub, kai mangenn le les an.
58009002	-
58009003	Ko Debleskro kheer his i tikno kheer, kerdo dran fichengre balla, hoi hidjan le nai. Koles his dui iseme. I glanstuni isema kharella: O Debleskri isema. I palstuni isema kharella: O Debleskri kutch isema. An i glanstuni isema his i momelengri un i chapaskri tardo. Ap i chapaskri his kol mare tchiddo, hoi dan le o Debleste. Mashkral kol dui iseme his i wudar dran kutch pesso thann.
58009004	An i palstuni isema his o sonakaskro bob tardo, kai kutch gudlo kasht pral pre chatchedo was, hoi mishto sungella. Koi his ninna o sonakaskro mochton. An leste his o sonakaskro khoro, kai his ko maro dre tchiddo, hoi Manna kharella. An ko mochton his ninna o Aroneskro kasht, hoi senelo was, ninna kol dui tchindle barra. Ap kolende his i deesh Debleskre laba tchindlo, hoi o Dewel peskre menshentsa win kras.
58009005	Pral pre ap o sonakaskro mochton his dui raile bolepangre dran sonakai tardo. Kolen his mussja har bare tchirklen hi. Pengre mussja rikran le pral o sonakaskro mochton. Kote well i menshengri doosh krik lino. Kanna kamah gar te rakras pral hako tikno koowa an o Debleskro tikno kheer.
58009006	Kanna sikrau tumende, hoi an o Debleskro tikno kheer kerdo was. Hako diwes djan i rashaja an i glanstuni isema, te krenn le pengri budi o Debleske.
58009007	Jek kopo an o bersh djas o baro rashai kokres an i palstuni kutch isema. Har djal lo dre, lell lo o rat peha i fichestar, hoi maras lo o Debleske, te lell o Dewel leskri doosh lestar, ninna i doosh kol menshendar, kai anan doosh ap pende, ninna te djinan le gar, kai kowa, hoi jon kran, i tchilatcho koowa his.
58009008	Jaake sikrell men o Debleskro Ducho, kai kek nai djal an koi palstuni kutch isema, jaake raha, har hi koi glanstuni isema koi.
58009009	I glanstuni isema sikrell mende ko tsiro, an hoi mer kanna djiwah. I menshe anenn fichen, un wawar koowa o Debleske. Kowa lauter nai krell lengro dji gar djudjo. An lengro dji haiwenn le, te hi le gomme tchilatcho.
58009010	Ninna rikrenn pen i menshe ap laba, kai penenna, hoi te chan le gar, un hoi te pijenn le gar, un har te thowenn le pen. Kol laba hi menshengre laba. Kowa lauter his mishto jaake raha, har sikras len o Dewel gomme gar o feteder drom, te nai wenn jon pash leste.
58009011	Kanna was o Jesus Kristo. Job hi maro baro rashai un anas men o bolepaskro brawlepen. O Debleskro kheer an o bolepen, kai job dre djas, hi bareder un feteder har ko Debleskro kheer ap i phub. O Debleskro kheer an o bolepen hi gar i menshendar kerdo.
58009012	Har o Jesus an o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen djas, anas lo gar i bakrengro rat peha, witar gar i grumjengro rat. Na-a. Peskro rat anas lo glan o Debleste. Kowa kras lo jek kopo un gar bud kope. Un jaake las lo mari doosh hako tsireske mendar.
58009013	An o phuro tsiro tchoras o rashai o bakrengro rat, un o grumjengro rat, un o jagakri tchik i chatchedi grumjatar ap kolende, kai hi pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste, te wenn le pale erligo kerdo. Te hi o ficheskro rat jaake sorelo,
58009014	kitse sorleder hi o Jesus Kristeskro rat. O Debleskro Ducho, kai djiwella hako tsiro, das o Jesus Kristeste i soor, te nai das lo peskro djipen an o merepen. Un job meras o Debleske jaake har i bakro, ap koleste kek doosh hi. Kowa kras lo, te lell lo mari doosh mendar, jaake te djiwas mer buder gar pal kol laba, hoi tchi moldo hi un i menshe an o merepen anenna. Kanna hi maro dji djudjo, un mer nai wah tchatchepaha o djido Debleske koi.
58009015	Har o Jesus Kristo meras, las lo i doosh kol menshendar krik, kai djan ap o phuro drom, un kras lenge i newo drom, kai nai wenn le pash o Debleste, te djiwenn lauter kolla, kai o Dewel peske gole das, leha khetne hako tsiro, un te lenn le ko shukar brawlepen pash leste an o bolepen, jaake har job penas.
58009016	-
58009017	Te hi jekes i shukar brawlepen, hoi kamell lo i wawares te dell pal peskro merepen, palle tchinell lo kowa an i liil. Pal leskro merepen lell ko wawar ko brawlepen, jaake har an ko liil tardo hi. Job nai lell kowa gar jaake raha, har ko wawar gomme djiwella. Na-a, kowa hunte meras.
58009018	Jaake wan ninna an o phuro tsiro fiche maredo, har das o Dewel i menshen i tsillo, kai penas lo lenge, har jon leha khetne nai wenna. Un i fichengro rat sikras, te rikrenn le pen ap kol Debleskre laba.
58009019	Kowa lauter djas jaake: O Mose penas i menshenge kol laba, hoi an ko liil tardo hi, kai tchindlo hi, har te djiwenn le. Palle las lo i grumjengro rat un i bakrengro rat, das pani pashal, un las i kasht, hoi kharella Ysop, pandas lole bakrengre balla pral pre, un tchiwas ko kasht i balentsa an o rat, un tchoras ko rat ap ko liil un ap kol menshende,
58009020	un penas ap lende: Ko rat sikrell tumende: Tumer han o Debleskre menshe, un djiwenn pal kol laba, hoi job tumenge penas.
58009021	Un ap o Debleskro tikno kheer tchoras lo ninna o rat, ninna ap i tsele tchare un khore, kai kote dren hi.
58009022	Hi gar bud koowa, hoi well gar o rateha djudjo un erligo kerdo. Jaake hi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo. Un te well kek rat win tchoredo, nai well kek doosh krik lino.
58009023	O Debleskro tikno kheer ap i phub un lauter, hoi kote dren hi, sikrell mende i tikno kotar ko Debleskro kherestar, hoi hi an o bolepen. O Debleskro tikno kheer ap i phub hunte was i fichengro rateha djudjo un erligo kerdo. An o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen djas jek, koleskro rat hi latcheder har i fichengro rat.
58009024	Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo. Job djas gar an o Debleskro kheer, hoi i menshe kran, un hoi sikrell mende kokres i tikno kotar ko tchatcho Debleskro kherestar an o bolepen. Na-a, job djas an o bolepen glan o Debleste, te mangell lo les menge.
58009025	O menshengro baro rashai djal hako bersh o fichengro rateha an o Debleskro kutch isema. O Jesus Kristo meras jek kopo, un anas peskro rat jek kopo glan o Debleste, un gar bud kope.
58009026	Te wals kowa gar jaake, hunte merals lo bud kope jaake raha, har i phub koi hi. Job was kanna an kau tsiro, kai mer djiwah, te merell lo, un te lell lo jek kopo hako tsireske i doosh i menshendar.
58009027	Un jaake har i tsele menshe hunte merenna jek kopo, un palle rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral lende win,
58009028	jaake hunte meras o Jesus Kristo jek kopo i menshenge, te lell lo i doosh bud lendar ap peste. Ap ko tsiro, kai well lo i duito kopo, well lo gar, te lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik. Na-a. Palle well lo kolenge, kai tchiwan pengro dji ap leste, te lell lo len pash peste, un te dell lo len lauter kowa, hoi hi lenge an o bolepen.
58010001	Kowa, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, sikrell men gar o tselo bolepaskro brawlepen, hoi kamell o Dewel i menshende te dell. Na-a, i tikno kotar kolestar. Kolla, kai anenn marede fichen glan o Debleste, nai wenn gar tchatcho un erligo glan leskre jaka. Te wans le tchatcho un erligo, hunte anans le gar hako bersh pale fichen glan leste.
58010002	Te krals ko fichengro rat len jek kopo hako tsireske tchatcho un erligo, palle hunte anans le buder gar pale te pale marede fichen glan o Debleste. Lengre djia wans djudjo, un jon nai bistrans ko tchilatchepen, hoi jon kran.
58010003	Tchatchepaha, kol tsele marede fichen, hoi jon o Debleske hako bersh anan, kowa anas lenge pale te pale lengri doosh an o shero.
58010004	Della kek drom, kai lell nai o grumjengro rat un o bakrengro rat i doosh i menshendar krik.
58010005	Doleske penas o Jesus Kristo, har job ap i phub was, ap o Debleste: Mo Dewel, marede fichen un wawar koowa kamal gar. Na-a. Man mukal i mensho te well.
58010006	Tu dikeh gar latches ap i fichende, hoi chatchran le tuke, te well lengri doosh lendar krik lino.
58010007	Koi penom: Dik, mo Dewel, kate hom, te krap, hoi tu mandar kameh, jaake har was mandar glan i raha tsiro an o Debleskro lab tchindlo.
58010008	Ninna te hi tchindlo an o Moseskre lila, te marenn le fichen o Debleske, penas o Jesus Kristo: Tu, mo Dewel, kamal gar, te anenn le tuke marede fichen un wawar koowa, witar kek fichen, hoi jon tuke chatchrenna, te less tu lengri doosh lendar. Tu dikeh gar latches ap kowa.
58010009	Palle penas job: Dik, me wau, te krap, hoi tu kameh. Kanna dikah: Har o Jesus Kristo was, te dell lo pes o Debleske, koi was ko phuro drom buder tchi moldo.
58010010	Har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel menge meras, kras lo kowa, hoi o Dewel kamas. Un mari doosh las lo jek kopo hako tsireske mendar, un job kras men jaake djudjo un erligo glan o Debleste.
58010011	Hako rashai krell hako diwes peskri budi, un marell bud kope fichen o Debleske. Kal fiche nai len gar i doosh i menshendar.
58010012	-
58010013	O Jesus Kristo das pes jek kopo an o merepen, te lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik, un beshas pes hako tsireske ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig. Kote dikell lo ap ko diwes, kai wenn kolla tel leskre pire tchiddo, kai kaman les gar.
58010014	Jek kopo meras o Jesus Kristo kolenge, kai wenna pash o Debleste, un kras len hako tsiro tchatcho un erligo glan leste.
58010015	Ninna o Debleskro Ducho penell menge kowa. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo:
58010016	Ap ko tsiro, hoi wella, penell o Dewel, sikrau me i menshende i newo drom, har nashte wenn le pash mande: Me tchiwau miro tchatchepen an lengre shere un tchinau mire laba an lengre djia.
58010017	Un me bistrau lengri doosh. Un lengro tchilatchepen well buder gar an miro shero.
58010018	Kote, kai o Dewel i doosh krik las, kote hunte merell kek ficho buder gar, te lell lo i doosh krik.
58010019	Mire phrala, shunenn! Har o Jesus Kristo menge meras, un peskro rat ratas, kras lo menge i wudar pre, te nai wah glan o Debleste. Men hunte well buder kek traash.
58010020	Har o Jesus Kristo peskro djipen an o merepen das, his kowa jaake, har te krals lo menge ko wudar dran kutch pesso thann pre, hoi hi glan o Debleskri kutch isema. Jaake kras lo menge i newo drom, hoi anell men an o djipen o Debleha.
58010021	Men hi i baro rashai. Kowa hi i tsele patslenge koi.
58010022	Leskro rat thowas mari doosh mendar, un kras mare djia djudjo. Un mer wam an o djudjo pani tele thodo. Doleske djas kanna o latcho un tchatcho djijeha glan o Debleste an i sorelo patsepen!
58010023	Mer nai patsah o Debles, te krell lo kowa, hoi job penas. Job rikrell peskro lab. Doleske rikras soreles maro patsepen ap leste!
58010024	Das jak jek ap o wawareste, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar, un te krell hakeno latcho koowa!
58010025	Das jak, te atchas gar krik, te wenn i patsle khetne. Hi sawe mashkral i patslende, kai wenn buder gar khetne. Kowa hi gar mishto. Tumer dikenna, te hi o diwes gar dur, kai well o rai Jesus pale. Doleske djan kote, kai wenn i patsle khetne, te krell jek o wawares soreles an o dji.
58010026	Te kamell jek ap i tchilatcho drom te djal, un krell kowa ninna, ninna te prindjrell lo o tchatchepen, koleske hi buder kek koi, kai nai merals, te lell lo leskri doosh krik.
58010027	Na-a, job hunte trashell ko diwes, kai well o Debleskri choli pral i phub un i soreli jag pral kolende, kai kaman lestar tchi te djinell.
58010028	An o phuro tsiro his jaake: Ko mensho hunte meras, kai djiwas gar jaake, har an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi. Te dikan dui, triin menshe ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi ko mensho kras, hunte meras job. Un kekes hunte khaitas job.
58010029	Te his kowa jaake koleha, kai kras gar, hoi o Mose penas, kitse sorleder well o Debleskri choli pral koleste, kai o Debleskro tchawes pestar stakrella, un krella, har te wals o Jesus Kristeskro rat tchi moldo. Un kau rat lals peskri doosh krik, un krals les erligo glan o Debleste. O Debleskro Ducho his leske latches, un job dukras les.
58010030	Mer djinah, kai o Dewel penas: Me dau len ko tchilatchepen pale, hoi jon kran. Miri choli well ap lende. Un pale hi tchindlo: O Dewel rakrell o tchatchepen pral peskre menshende win.
58010031	Hawi bari phagi well pral kolende, ap lende o djido Dewel chojedo hi!
58010032	Ma bistrenn ko tsiro, kai o Debleskro kamlepen har i momeli an tumare djia was! Ap ko tsiro kran i menshe tumenge o djipen phares. Un tumer lan bud duka ap tumende, un witsran tumaro patsepen gar ap i rig.
58010033	Bud tumendar wan glan lauterende praassedo un dino. I wawar tumendar wan ap i rig kolendar, kai praassedo un dino wan.
58010034	Tumer rowan kolentsa, kai an o stilepen hi. Kolla, kai gar patslo his, lan tumendar kowa krik, hoi tumaro his. Un i bachtelo djijeha mukan tumer len kowa te krell. Tumer djinan, kai hi tumen i feteder brawlepen an o bolepen, hoi kek nai lell tumendar.
58010035	Doleske penau tumenge: Ma witsrenn tumaro patsepen tumendar! Tumer djinenn, hawi bacht lell kowa, kai ap o Debleste rikrella.
58010036	Tumer hunte wenn gar khino an tumare djia, te krenn kowa lauter, hoi o Dewel kamella! Palle dell lo tumen peskro brawlepen jaake, har job penas.
58010037	-
58010038	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Ko tsiro wella sik, kai well kowa, kai hunte wella. Job mukell pes gar ap o drom pale te rikrell. O Dewel penas: Koon ap mande patsella, kowa hi tchatcho glan mire jaka. Un job lell o djipen. Koon miro drom mukella, ap koleste dikau gar latches.
58010039	Tchatchepaha, mer ham gar kolendar, kai mukenn leskro drom un djan nashedo. Na-a. Mer ham kolendar, kai atchah an o patsepen, un lah o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
58011001	Te patsah ap o Debleste, patsah mer ninna, te dell men o Dewel kowa, hoi job penas. Kowa patsah soreles. Ninna te dikah kowa gomme gar, hi maro dji sorelo un djinell, te well kowa jaake, har job penas.
58011002	Sawo patsepen his an mare phurende, un o Dewel dikas latches ap lende.
58011003	Dran maro patsepen haiwah, te was o bolepen un i phub kerdo dran o Debleskro rakepen. Lauter, hoi kanna dikah, kowa kras o Dewel dran kowa, hoi nai dikah gar.
58011004	An o phuro tsiro patsas o Abel ap o Debleste, un maras leske i ficho. Har dikas o Dewel, hoi o Abel leske anas, dikas lo latches ap kowa. Jaake was o Abel an o tchatchepen tardo glan leste. Kowa, hoi leskro phraal, o Kain, o Debleske anas, kowa his gar jaake latcho glan o Debleskre jaka har kowa, hoi o Abel leske anas. Ninna te meras o Abel, sikrell men leskro djipen gomme kau diwes leskro patsepen.
58011005	Ninna o Henoch patsas, hoi o Dewel penas. Un o Dewel las les djides pash peste. Job hunte meras gar. Kek nai hatsas les buder. Glan kowa was lestar penlo, te kras lo kowa, hoi his latcho glan o Debleskre jaka.
58011006	Te hi jekes kek patsepen, nai krell lo gar, hoi hi latcho glan o Debleskre jaka. Koon kamell pash o Debleste te well, kowa hunte patsell, te hi o Dewel djido, un te hi lo latcho ap koleste, koon rodell les.
58011007	Ninna o Noa patsas, hoi o Dewel penas, har job leha rakras, un leste sikras, hoi pral i tsele menshende wella. Ninna te dikas o Noa kowa gomme gar, shunas lo ap o Debleste, un kras i baro panjeskro kheer. Jaake hunte meras job peskre menshentsa gar. Har o Noa ko panjeskro kheer kras, was diklo, te patsas job, hoi o Dewel penas. Ninna was diklo, i wawar menshe patsan gar, hoi o Dewel penas. Doleske hunte meran le. Ap o Noa penas o Dewel: Tu patsal man. Tu hal kanna an o tchatchepen tardo glan mande.
58011008	Ninna o Abraham patsas, hoi o Dewel penas. Har job leske penas: Dja an ko them, hoi me dau tute un tire tchawende, koi shunas o Abraham ap leste, un djas dran peskro them win, un djinas gar, kai job djala.
58011009	Ap ko tsiro djiwan wawar menshe an ko them, hoi kamas les o Dewel te dell. Un o Abraham djas kate un kote an ko them trujal, un djiwas an khera dran fichengre balla. Ninna leskro tchawo, o Isaak, un koleskro tchawo, o Jakobo, djiwan jaake. Kolenge penas o Dewel ninna: Tumende dau ko them.
58011010	O Abraham dikas ap ko tsiro, kai nai djiwell lo an ko foro, hoi o Dewel krella, un hoi hako tsiro atchella.
58011011	Ninna o Abrahameskri romni, i Sara, patsas, te nai kras o Dewel kowa, hoi job lenge penas. An lakro tselo djipen nai las li kek tarnepen. Un kanna, kai his li phuri, penas o Dewel, te lell li i tchawes. Joi patsas les, un las i soor, te lell li i tchawes.
58011012	Har o tchawo boldo was, his o Abraham ninna jaake phuro, te nai wals lo buder gar o dad i tchawestar. Un job was o dad bud bud menshendar. Leskre tchawe, tchawengre tchawe un lauter, kai pal leste wan, wan jaake bud har i bolepangre momlia, un har i tikne barra pash o baro pani, kai kek djinell, har bud kolla hi.
58011013	Kol phure patsle meran lauter. Ninna te lan le kowa gar, hoi kamas o Dewel len te dell, patsan le, te lenn le les. Jon dikan kowa dur glan pende, un his bachtelo pral kowa. Jon penan pendar, te hi len kek them ap i phub, un te hi le kate gar khere.
58011014	Kolla, kai jaake rakrenna, rodenn i wawar them, hoi lengro hi, un kai jon khere hi.
58011015	Te rakrans le pral ko them, hoi jon mukan, palle nai djans le kote pale.
58011016	Kowa kran le gar. Na-a. Lengro dji das gole pal i latcheder them. Kowa hi an o bolepen. Doleske ladjell o Dewel lenge gar, te penenn le: "Maro Dewel!" ap leste. Un job kras lenge i foro.
58011017	-
58011018	Tumer djinenna: An o phuro tsiro kamas o Dewel te dikell, har baro o Abrahameskro patsepen hi. Un o Dewel penas ap leste, te marell job peskro tchawes har i bakro, hoi o Debleske maredo wella. Un o Abraham shunas ap o Debleste, un las peskro tchawes, kai leske kokres boldo was, te marell lo les glan o Debleste. Glan kau tsiro penas o Dewel ap o Abrahameste: Tiro tchawo, o Isaak, hi o dad kolendar, kai pal tute wenna.
58011019	Kolla laba wan o Abrahameske an o shero un job penas peske: O Dewel nai krell les i mulendar djido. Jaake baro his leskro patsepen ap o Debleste. Doleske das les o Dewel o tchawes pale, un job hunte maras les gar. Kowa his leske jaake, har te wals lo i mulendar djido.
58011020	Ninna o Isaak patsas, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Un o Isaak tchiwas peskre wasta ap peskre tchawende, ap o Jakob un ap o Esau, un rakras i bacht pral lende win, hoi o Dewel len della an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
58011021	Ninna o Jakob patsas, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel leske penas. Har job ap o merepen tchiddo his, tchiwas lo peskre wasta ap o Josefeskre tchawende, un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral lende win, un tchiwas peskro shero glan tele ap peskro kasht, un sharas o Debles.
58011022	Ninna o Josef patsas, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Har job ap o merepen tchiddo his, penas lo peskre phralenge, te well ko tsiro, kai djan i Israelitarja dran o them Egiptia win. Palle hunte lenn le leskre kokale lentsa.
58011023	Ninna o Moseskro dad un peskri dai patsan ap o Debleste. Doleske trashan le gar o baro rajestar pral o them Egiptia, har kowa penas, te wenn i tikne tchawe maredo, hoi i Israeleskre djuwja lan. Har o Moseskro dad un peskri dai dikan, har shukar lengro tchawo hi, khatran le les triin tchon.
58011024	-
58011025	Ninna o Mose patsas ap o Debleste. Har job baro was pash o baro rajeste pral o them Egiptia, kamas lo buder gar, te kharenn le les: O baro rajeskri tchakro tchawo. Feteder kamas lo duka ap peste te lell, khetne i wawar Debleskre menshentsa, har te djiwell lo i tikno tsiro i shukar djipen an o rajeskro kheer, kai djiwan le jaake, har o Dewel gar kamas.
58011026	O Mose kamas feteder, te lell lo o praassepen ap peste, hoi ninna o Jesus Kristo ap peste las, har te lell lo o tselo brawlepen an o them Egiptia. Leske his o brawlepen an o bolepen budeder moldo.
58011027	Dran peskro patsepen djas o Mose win dran o them Egiptia, un daras gar o baro rajestar pral o them Egiptia, te well job chojedo ap leste. Na-a. Job rikras jaake ap o Debleste, koles kek nai dikella, har te dikals les lo peskre jakentsa.
58011028	O Dewel penas leske, hawi bibacht pral o them Egiptia wella. Un job penas leske ninna, hoi i Israelitarja hunte krenn, te well koi bibacht gar pral lende. Koi patsas o Mose, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Un o Mose penas ap i Israelitarja, te marenn le bakren, un te chan le len - kau chapen was Passa kharedo -, un te makenn le i fichengro rat ap pengre wudja. Har palle o bolepaskro was, te marell lo i tsele phureder tchawen, koi atchan i Israeleskre tchawe djido. Jon his an i khera, kai o rat ap i wudja hi.
58011029	I tsiro koi pre djan le mashkral o baro pani, hoi kharella lolo pani, har te djans le ap o drom. Kowa nai kran le doleske, kai patsan le, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. I Egiptarja kaman ninna mashkral o baro pani te djal, un jon tassan.
58011030	I Israelitarja patsan ninna kowa, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, har his le glan o foro Jericho tardo. Un jon djan efta kope trul o foro. Palle peran i tsele barra khetne, hoi trul o foro pre tchiddo his.
58011031	Ninna i lubni Rahab patsas ap o Debleste, un las kol murshen an lakro kheer dre, kolen o Mose bitchras, te dikenn le, har sorelo o foro Jericho hi. Jaake was i Rahab gar maredo khetne kol wawar menshentsa an ko foro, kai prindjran o Debles gar.
58011032	Hoi te penap tumenge budeder? Jaake bud tsiro hi man gar, te rakrap kol murshendar Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jeftah, David, Samuel un kolendar, kai his o Debleskre rakepangre.
58011033	Kol tsele mursha patsan, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. Mashkral lende his ninna kolla, hoi kuran pen kol bare rajentsa un kol rajengre lurdentsa. Un jon his sorleder har kol bare raja un lengre lurde. Wawar kran o tchatchepen un dikan pengre jakentsa, har kowa tchatcho was, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. Wawar wan glan bare un diwje margodje witsedo, un kolla dandran len gar.
58011034	Wawar wan an i jag witsedo, un i jag nai chatchan len gar. Wawaren kaman i menshe i chareha te marell, un jon nai nashan penge. Kolla, kai kek soor buder an lende his, kolen kras o Dewel soreles. An o kurepen lan le i soor, te tradan le i wawar lurden krik.
58011035	Mashkral kolende, kai patsan, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, his ninna djuwja, kolengre tchawe meran. Kolen das o Dewel lengre tchawen djides pale. Wawar patsle wan phares dino an o stilepen. Lenge was penlo, te mukans le pengro patsepen, nai wans le dran o stilepen win. Un jon mukan gar pengro patsepen, un mukan pen te marell. Pengro tselo djijeha dikan le ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel len i mulendar djido. Kowa his lenge budeder moldo, har o djipen ap kai phub.
58011036	Wawar wan praassedo, un wan i tchupnijaha dino. Wawar wan i sasterne shellentsa pandlo, un an o stilepen witsedo.
58011037	Wawar wan i barentsa mulo witsedo, an dui paash tchindlo, un o chareha maredo. Wawar wan palla lino. Len his kek kheer un tchi te chal. Lengre koola his dran bakrengre balla un busjengre balla. Un te wan le tapedo, wan le dino.
58011038	Jon nashan an o mulo them trujal, ninna an i berge un djinan gar, kai te djal. Mashkral i bare barra khatran le pen, ninna tel i phub. Kolla lauter his latche menshe. I wawar menshe ap kai phub his gar moldo, te djiwan kol latche menshe mashkral lende.
58011039	Kolla lauter patsan ap o Debleste, un job dikas latches ap lende. Fote latches job ap lende dikas, las gomme kek lendar kowa, hoi o Dewel kamell peskre tchawende te dell.
58011040	O Debles his an peskro dji i feteder drom menge. Job kamas gar, te wenn kol phure patsle glan maro tsiro pash leste. Job kamell, te was mer lauter khetne pash leste an o bolepen.
58012001	Kanna dikah, bud bud menshe patsan, te hi kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Mer ham gar kokres, kai patsah. Doleske hunte kras har jon kran, un mukas gar tele te nashas ap o Debleskro drom, hoi glan mende hi. Te tchiwas lauter tele, hoi kamell men pale te rikrell! Ninna hunte tchiwas o tchilatchepen tele, hoi kamell men te taprell.
58012002	Te dikas ap o Jesus Kristeste! Kowa anas men ap o Debleskro drom, un djal glan mende, bis te wah pash leste. O Jesus Kristo meras ap o trushel. Ninna te his kowa i ladj leske, las lo kau merepen ap peste. Job djinas, pal kowa well i bari bacht ap leste. Un kanna hi lo beshdo ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig.
58012003	Dikenn, hawo tchilatcho koowa i tchilatche menshe ap leste kran, te wenn tumer gar khino an tumare djia, un te atchenn soreles an o patsepen!
58012004	Me djinau, tumer kamenn gar, te well o tchilatchepen o rai pral tumende. Ninna te was tumenge pharo, te penenn na-a ap o tchilatchepen, meran doleske gomme gar.
58012005	Ma bistrenn kol laba, hoi rakras o Dewel peskre tchawenge an o dji: Dikenn mire tchawe, kowa hi tumenge mishto, te dap tumen i phagi. Te tchingrau ap tumende, ma nashenn mandar!
58012006	Kones o Dewel o djijestar kamella, kowa lell ninna lestar i phagi. Un koon well leskro tchawo, koles dell lo ninna dawa.
58012007	Hi mishto tumenge, te lenn lestar i phagi. Rikrenn kowa win! O Dewel krell tumentsa har i dad peskre tchawentsa. Prindjrenn tumer jekes, koon gar peskro dadestar i phagi las?
58012008	I tsele Debleskre tchawe djinenn i tsiro, kai lan le lestar i phagi. Tumer te djinenn kowa gar, palle han gar leskre tchatche tchawe.
58012009	Har tchawe hams, dan men mare dada i phagi. Un mer hunte shunam ap lende. Kitse budeder hunte shunas ap maro dadeste an o bolepen, te djiwas.
58012010	Mare dada ap i phub dan men i phagi, hoi dukas men i tikno tsiro, jaake har jon penan penge, te hi kowa menge mishto. O Dewel, te dell lo men i phagi, hi kowa tchatchepaha menge mishto. Job kamell, te was mer latcho un tchatcho, jaake har job hi.
58012011	Ap ko tsiro, kai lah i phagi, kamah kowa gar. Na-a, kowa dukell men. Pal ko tsiro haiwah, kowa his menge mishto. Un mare djia wenna pale bachtelo, un mer djiwah budeder an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste, har glan ko tsiro.
58012012	Doleske awenn pale soreles! Hadenn tumare wasta pale pre, hoi khino wan! Krenn tumare herja pale soreles, an lende buder kek soor hi!
58012013	Atchenn ap o tchatcho drom, te wenn kolla, kai gar sorelo hi, sasto an o patsepen, un te perenn le gar ko dromestar tele!
58012014	Krenn lauter, te well tumen kek tchingepen i wawar menshentsa! Tchiwrenn o tselo tchilatchepen dran tumende win! Kek mensho dikell o Debles, te mukell lo o tchilatchepen an peste te djiwell.
58012015	Denn jak, te tchiwell kek o Debleskro latchepen ap i rig! Denn jak, te djal kek tchilatcho rakepen mashkral tumende trujal, un krell o patsepen bud patslendar paash! Sawo rakepen hi har i tchilatcho chuchur, hoi krell kolen nasselo, kai les chana.
58012016	Denn garda, te krell kek tumendar wi-ladjedo koowa, witar gar, te djiwell jek har o Esau, koleske o Debleskro latchepen tchi moldo his! Job his o phureder tchawo, un les hi o tchatchepen, te lell lo peskro dadeskro brawlepen pal koleskro merepen. Was i diwes, kai was les bok, un job bikras ko tchatchepen, te lell lo i tcharo latcho chapen.
58012017	Tumer djinenn, hoi pal kowa was. O Esau nai kras buder tchi wawartchandes. Ninna te rowas lo soreles glan peskro dadeste, was lo ap i rig tchiddo. Leskro dad nai rakras buder gar koi bacht pral leste win, hoi hunte lals lo.
58012018	Shunenn, mire phrala! Tumaro tsillo, kai wenn khetne o Debleha, hi gar ko emligo har pash i Israelitarja. Jon djan pash i berga Sinai, un pash i jag, hoi dikan le nai. Trul lende his kali rat un i sorelo ducho phurdas.
58012019	-
58012020	Jon shunan i bashepaskri, kai jek dre phurdas. Ninna shunan le i sorelo rakepen, hoi penas: Hakeno, kai taprell koi berga i wastentsa, hunte well i barentsa maredo. Ninna ko ficho hunte merella, hoi kote djala. Har jon kol laba shunan, djas kowa lenge jaake an o dji, te mangan le o Mosestar, te wenn kol sorele laba buder gar ap lende rakedo.
58012021	Kowa lauter, hoi i menshe kote dikan un shunan, kras len jaake dareno, te penas ninna o Mose: Man hi sawi daar, te trissenn mire herja.
58012022	Kowa lauter dikan tumer gar. Na-a. Tumaro tsillo, kai wenn khetne o Debleha, hi ap i berga Zion an o bolepen. Kote hi o foro o djido Deblestar tardo, o newo foro Jerusalem. Kote hi bud bud serja bolepangre, kai sharenn o Debles.
58012023	Kote wenna o Debleskre tchawe khetne. Lengre laba hi an o bolepen pre tchindlo. Kote hi o Dewel, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende. Kote hi ninna kol tsele patsle, kai meran un kolen o Dewel pash peste las.
58012024	Kote hi ninna o Jesus, maro rakepaskro, kai kras menge o newo drom, te djiwas khetne o Debleha. Job meras menge, un leskro rat las mari doosh mendar. O Jesuseskro rat hi feteder har o Abeleskro rat. Har o Abel maredo was, das leskro rat gole pal i phagi pral o Kain. O Jesuseskro rat lell mari doosh mendar.
58012025	Denn jak, te shunenn ap o Debleste, kai ap tumende rakrella! Har job ap i phub ap i phure Israelitarja rakras, kaman le gar ap leste te shunell, un leskri choli was pral lende. Kitse budeder well o Debleskri choli pral mende, te shunah gar ap leste, kai dran o bolepen rakrella.
58012026	An o phuro tsiro trissas i phub, har o Dewel rakras. Kanna penell lo: An ko tsiro, hoi wella, trissell i phub i wawar kopo, un gar i phub kokres, na-a, ninna o bolepen trissella.
58012027	Kol laba i wawar kopo sikrenn men: Kowa, hoi kerdo was, - o bolepen un i phub, - kowa atchell gar soreles tardo un well krik lino. Palle atchell kowa, hoi soreles tardo hi, un hako tsiro atchella.
58012028	O Debleskro them an o bolepen, kai khere ham, atchell soreles tardo, un kote djah mer. Doleske parkras men pash o Debleste, shunas ap leste, daras lestar un kras, hoi job kamella!
58012029	Ma bistrenn, maro Dewel hi jaake har i soreli jag!
58013001	Mukenn gar tele, te kamenn i phralen un i phenjen o tselo djijestar!
58013002	Te well jek pash tumende, ma bistrenn, te lenn les an tumaro kheer! His menshe koi, kai lan bolepangre an pengro kheer, un djinan les gar.
58013003	Ma bistrenn kolen, kai hi an o stilepen. Denn lende kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske, jaake har te wans tumer kolla, kai stildo hi! Awenn ninna kolenge koi, kai wan palla lino un lan dawa. Awenn lenge jaake koi, har wans tumer kolla, kai wan palla lino un lan dawa.
58013004	Kolla, kai romedino hi, hunte bistrenn gar, te hi jon romedino. O rom hunte well gar khetne i wawar djuwjaha, un i romni hunte well gar khetne i wawar mursheha. Djinenn, o Dewel dell i phagi kol murshende, kai chochenn pengri romjat, un kol djuwjende, kai chochenn pengro romes, ninna lauterende, kai luberenn trujal.
58013005	Ma nashenn i lowe palla! Kowa, hoi tut hi, kowa muk tuke doha te well! O Dewel penas: Me bistrau tut gar, un mukau tut kek tsireske!
58013006	Jaake hunte daras gar un nai penah: O Dewel hi ap miri rig, me hunte darap gar. Hoi nai krell i mensho ap mande?
58013007	Ma bistrenn, har kolla pengro djipen djiwan, kai penan tumenge o Debleskro lab, un sikran tumen leskro drom! Dikenn, har jon djiwan un meran, un soreles an o patsepen tardo his! Djan jaake ap o Jesuseskro drom har jon djan!
58013008	O Jesus Kristo atchell har job hi: taissar, kau diwes, un hako tsireske.
58013009	Te hi menshe koi, kai sikrenn tumen wawar dromma un kamenn tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell, palle patsenn lenge gar! Har shukar hi kowa, te wenn tumer sorelo an o dji!
