Kowa krell o Dewel, kai hi jaake latcho ap tumende. Kolla, kai penenn tumenge, hoi te chan un hoi te chan gar, kolla nai krenn gar tumaro patsepen soreles. Lengre laba hi tchi moldo.
58013010	Mer djah ap o newo drom. Menge meras o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel. Kolla, kai djan ap o phuro drom, marenn fichen an o Debleskro kheer ap kai phub. Koon gomme fichen marella un glan o Debleste anella, koleske hi o Jesus Kristo gar koi.
58013011	I mule fiche, kolengro rat o baro rashai an o Debleskri kutch isema anas, te lell o Dewel i doosh i menshendar krik, kol fiche wenn win glan o foro an i jag chatchedo.
58013012	Jaake meras o Jesus ninna win glan o foro, te krell lo peskro rateha i menshen erligo glan o Debleste.
58013013	Doleske djas pash leste win glan o foro, te las o praassepen ap mende jaake, har job o praassepen ap peste las!
58013014	Ap kai phub hi men kek foro, kai nai atchenna. Na-a. Mer dikah ap ko tsiro, kai djiwah an o Debleskro foro, hoi wella.
58013015	Dran kowa parkras men pash o Debleste, sharas les hako tsiro, un kras o Jesuseskro lab bares.
58013016	Ma bistrenn te krenn o latchepen! Denn i wawaren tchomone, te well len ninna tchomone! Kowa, hoi tumer i menshenge krenna, hi har te krans tumer les o Debleske. Un job dikell latches ap kowa.
58013017	Shunenn ap kolende, kai sikrenn tumen, har te djan ap o Debleskro drom! Krenn kowa, hoi jon tumenge penenna! Lengri budi hi, te denn le jak ap tumende. Un jon hunte penenn o Debleske, har jon kran pengri budi. Djiwenn jaake, te krenn le pengri budi i bachtelo djijeha! Te rowenn jon pral tumende, palle wals kowa tumenge gar mishto.
58013018	Mangenn o Debles menge! Maro dji hi djudjo. Kowa djinah mer. Hako tsiro kamah kowa te krell, hoi latcho hi.
58013019	O tselo djijestar mangau tumendar, te mangenn o Deblestar, te nai wap sik pash tumende.
58013020	O Dewel kras i drom, te nai wah pash leste. Job kras o Jesuses, maro rajes, i mulendar djido. Kowa ratas peskro rat menge, te nai wah pash o Debleste, un djiwah hako tsiro leha khetne. O Jesus was maro baro bakrengro. Kowa dell jak ap mende, har i bakrengro dell jak ap peskre bakre.
58013021	Mangau o Deblestar, te dell lo tumen i soor, te krenn lauter kowa, hoi latcho hi, jaake har job kamella. Mu dell lo men i soor, te djiwas jaake, har mishto hi glan leskre jaka. O Jesus Kristo nai krell kowa. Sharas o Jesus Kristes kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.
58013022	Mire phrala, me mangau tumen, shunenn ap kol laba, hoi me tumenge an kau tikno liil tchinom!
58013023	Djinenn, maro phraal Timoteo was dran o stilepen win. Te well lo sik pash mande, wau leha pash tumende.
58013024	Penenn latche laba mendar kolenge, kai denn garda ap tumende, un ninna ap i tsele patslende! I patsle dran o them Italia penenn tumenge "Atchenn o Debleha!"
58013025	O Debleskro latchepen tumenge lauterenge!
59001001	Kau liil tchinau me, o Jakobo, kowa, kai budrell o Jesus Kristeske un o Debleske. Me penau latche laba kolenge, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste un djiwenn mashkral kolende, kai gar patslo hi.
59001002	Mire phrala, te well pharo koowa ap tumende, palle dikenn koi pre, har te well kowa i bacht tumenge.
59001003	Te well sawo koowa ap tumende, un tumer mukenn gar tele te patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, palle wenn tumer sorleder an o patsepen un denn gar sik pre.
59001004	Rikrenn win, un djan dureder an o patsepen! Ma atchenn tardo! Jaake wenn tumer sawe menshe, har kamell o Dewel dran tumende te krell. Un tumer krenna lauter, hoi mishto un latcho hi. Un kek doosh hi ap tumende.
59001005	Te djinell jek tumendar gar, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, palle nai mangell lo o Debles, te sikrell job leste kowa. O Dewel hi latcho, un job dell o djijestar, ninna te weh tu bud kope pash leste.
59001006	Tu te mangeh, hunte patsess, kai leh kowa ninna. Te patseh tu kowa gar, hal tu har i pani, kai phurdell i sorelo ducho pral un tradell les kate te kote.
59001007	Tu te hal jaake, djiness, kai leh tu tchi o Deblestar.
59001008	Palle hi tut dui djia, un djineh gar, hoi kameh, witar gar, hoi hunte kress.
59001009	I tchorwelo patslo, kai pash i menshende tchi molella, kowa nai sharell pes, kai job pash o Debleste bud molella.
59001010	I brawelo hunte sharell pes gar pral peskro brawlepen. Job hunte djinell, te atchell lo gar. Har i bluma an o senlepen merell lo.
59001011	O kham djal pre un chatchrell o senlepen. Un koi bluma perell tele, un nashrell peskro shukapen. Jaake har koi bluma, jaake merella ninna ko brawelo ap peskro drom.
59001012	Bachtelo hi kowa, kon mukell gar peskro patsepen, ninna te well i pharo koowa ap leste. Job hi moldo, te lell lo ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kawa djipen dell o Dewel kolen, kai les kamenna.
59001013	Te well jek an sawo koowa, hoi kamell les o tchatcho dromestar tele te anell, hunte penell lo gar: "Ko koowa well o Deblestar." Kek nashte anell o Debles o tchatcho dromestar tele. Un ninna o Dewel anell kekes o tchatcho dromestar tele.
59001014	Te mukah mer o tchatcho drom, hi men kokres doosh. Ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi an maro shero trujal djal, kowa well mendar.
59001015	Te shunah ap maro shero, krah mer ko tchilatcho koowa. Un te was ko tchilatcho koowa baro, anell kowa menge o merepen.
59001016	Mire kamle phrala! Ma chochenn tumen kokres!
59001017	Lauter, hoi hi mishto un latcho, wella o Deblestar an o bolepen. Job kras o kham un o tchon un i bolepangre momlia. Kolla krenn, te well diwes un rat, un jon wenn jek tsiro diklo un i wawar tsiro gar diklo. O Dewel hi gar jaake. Job atchell, har job hi.
59001018	Job kamas, te wam mer leskre tchawe. Kolla wam, har menge leskro tchatcho lab penlo was. Jaake wam mer o feteder mank lauter, hoi o Dewel kras.
59001019	Mire kamle phrala, djinenn: Hako mensho hunte lell peske tsiro, te shunell lo. Job te kamell te rakrell, palle hunte putchell lo pestar, te hi kowa mishto, hoi job kamell te penell. Un job hunte well witar gar sik chojedo.
59001020	Kek krell an i choli kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella.
59001021	Doleske mukenn hako djunglepen un tchilatchepen! Un patsenn ko lab, hoi o Dewel an tumende tchiwas! Krenn kowa i latcho djijeha! An o Debleskro lab hi koi soor, te lell lo tumen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
59001022	Hi gar doha, te shunenn leskro lab. Tumer hunte krenn, hoi ko lab penella. Tumer te krenn kowa gar, palle chochenn tumen kokres.
59001023	Kowa, kai shunell o Debleskro lab, un krell gar, hoi ko lab penella, kowa hi har i mensho, kai dikell pes an i dikepaskri.
59001024	Job dikell jek kopo dre, un djal peske, un bistras sik, har job wi-dikella.
59001025	Koon dikell pale un pale an o Debleskro latcho lab, hoi i menshen win lella dran lengro phuro djipen, ko mensho bistrell gar, hoi job dikas un shunas. Un kowa krella, hoi ko lab penella. Koles dell o Dewel peskri bacht an lauter, hoi job krella.
59001026	Te penell i mensho: "Me djiwau pal o Debleskro lab," un job rikrell peskro mui nai gar, kowa chochell pes kokres. Un kowa, hoi job o Debleske krella, hi tchi moldo.
59001027	Kanna penau tumenge, hoi o Dewel, maro dad, kamella, un hoi hi latcho glan leskre jaka: Krenn latchepen i tchorwele djuwjenge, kolen kek rom buder hi! Krenn ninna latchepen kol tchorwele tchawenge, kolen kek dad un dai buder hi! Ma mukenn tumen dre an ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna.
59002001	Mire phrala, tumer patsenn ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste. Job hi o rai pral i tsele rajende. Doleske, ma dikenn ap i menshende, koon jon hi, un har brawelo jon hi!
59002002	Hoi krans tumer, te wals jek pash tumende an i kangri, un les wals i sonakaskri gustrin ap peskro wast un raile ripja ap peste, un koi wals ninna i tchorwelo an tchorwele ripja dre?
59002003	Un tumer penans ap koleste, kai railo rido hi: "Besh tut kai ap ko shukar beshepaskro," un ap ko tchorweleste penans: "Atch koi tardo! Tu nai besheh tut ninna ap kai phub!"
59002004	Kowa wals jaake, har te penans: "Ko railo hi feteder har ko tchorwelo." Te dikenn tumer jaake ap tumare phralende, hi kowa tchilatcho.
59002005	Shunenn, mire kamle phrala! O Dewel rodas kolen win, kai hi tchorwelo ap kai phub, te wenn le brawelo an o patsepen. Ko tsiro wella, kai djiwenn le leha khetne an o bolepen un lenn leskro brawlepen. Kowa lenna kolla, kai kamenn les o djijestar. Jaake penas les o Dewel.
59002006	Har hi kowa pash tumende? I tchorwele hi tumenge tchi moldo. I brawele hi tumenge budeder moldo. Un jon hi kolla, kai rikrenn tumen tele, un anenn tchilatcho koowa ap tumende un anenn tumen glan i tchatchepangre.
59002007	Un pral koleste, koon tumaro rai hi, rakrenn le djungeles.
59002008	O Jesus Kristo hi maro baro rai un penell menge: Tu hunte wess jaake latches ap o wawareste har hal latcho ap tute kokres! Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab. Te djiwenn jaake, palle krenn tumer, hoi mishto hi.
59002009	Tumer te dikenn ap jekeste, koon job hi un har brawelo job hi, palle lenn tumer doosh ap tumende. Un o Debleskro lab penell tumenge, kai mukan tumer o Debleskro drom.
59002010	Te rikreh tut ap i tsele laba, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, un te kreh tu jek tchilatcho koowa, palle hi kowa, har te rikrals tu tut ap tchi, un tu leh doosh ap tute.
59002011	O Dewel penella: Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Un job penell ninna: Ma mare kekes! Tu te chocheh gar tiri romjat, un tu mareh jekes, palle mukal tu o Debleskro drom.
59002012	Rakrenn un djiwenn pal o Debleskro tchatchepen! Kau tchatchepen lell i menshen dran kowa win, hoi len pandas.
59002013	Ma bistrenn! Well jek diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral tumende. Te hi jekes kek dji i wawareske, koleske hi o Debles witar kek dji. Kones hi i dji i wawarenge, koles hunte well kek daar ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i menshende win.
59002014	Mire phrala, te penell jek, kai job ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella, un krell tchi leske, koleskro patsepen hi tchi moldo ap ko diwes, kai job glan o Debleste tardo hi.
59002015	Hoi molell kowa, te well pash tumende i phraal, i pheen, kai hi len gar doha ripaske, chapaske un pipaske,
59002016	un tumer denn len gar, hoi len hunte well djipaske? Palle hi lenge tchi moldo, te penell jek ap lende: "O Dewel hi tumentsa. Job dell tumen chapaske un ripaske."
59002017	Tchatchepaha, te krenn tumer kek latcho koowa, hi tumaro patsepen mulo.
59002018	Kanna nai well jek, kai penella: "Jekes hi patsepen un i wawar krell latcho koowa." Koleske penau me: Sike mande o patsepen kolestar, kai krell kek latcho koowa. Miro patsepen sikrau tute dran kowa, hoi me krau.
59002019	Tu patseh, kai dell jek Dewel kokres. Mishto, kre kowa! Ninna kol benga patsenn kowa un trashenna.
59002020	Hoske haiweh tu kowa gar? Dikeh tu gar, kai o patsepen ap o Debleste tchi molella, te kreh tu gar, hoi job kamella?
59002021	Ninna pash maro phuro dadeste, o Abrahameste, his kowa jaake: Job was latcho un tchatcho glan o Debleste, har job kras, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas: Job tchiwas peskro tchawes ap i pre tchidde barra, te marell lo les o Debleske.
59002022	Tu dikeh, har job kras, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas, koi sikras lo, kai leskro patsepen ap o Debleste baro his.
59002023	Kote was tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: O Abraham patsas o Debles. Doleske tchiwas les o Dewel an o tchatchepen glan peste. Ninna i menshe penan lestar, kai hi job o Debleskro maal.
59002024	Tumer dikenn kanna, o patsepen kokres hi gar doha. O mensho hunte krell ninna, hoi o Dewel kamella, te well lo tchatcho un erligo glan leste.
59002025	Ninna koi lubni Rahab was tchatcho un erligo glan o Debleste, har joi ko latcho koowa kras. Joi phukras gar ap kol dui bitchepangre dran Israel, kai wan an lakro foro, te dikenn le, har sorelo o foro hi. Joi khatras len, un anas len ap i wawar drom dran ko foro win.
59002026	Jaake har o mensho mulo hi, te hi les kek ducho, jaake hi maro patsepen mulo, te krah kek latcho koowa.
59003001	Mire phrala, hi gar mishto, te wenn bud tumendar sikepangre. Tumer djinenna, kai o Dewel rakrell o tchatchepen pral i menshende win. Ap ko tsiro dikell lo ap kol sikepangren budeder har ap kol wawarende.
59003002	Mer halauter krah bud kope, hoi gar mishto hi. Koon rakrell an kek tsiro tchilatcho koowa, kowa hi i latcho mensho, kai nai rikrell pes khetne.
59003003	Dikenn ap i graja! Te tchiwah mer lenge ko kotar saster an o mui, jaake nai anah mer len kote, kai mer kamah.
59003004	Dikenn ninna ap kol bare panjeskre ulepangre, kolen i sorelo ducho pral o baro pani tradell. Lengro rai anell len o tikno kashteha kote, kai job kamella.
59003005	Jaake hi ninna mari tchip tikno un krell nai bare laba. Tumer djinenna, i tikni jag nai chatchrell i tselo weesh tele.
59003006	I tchip hi har i jag. Lat hi i soor, te krell li bud tchilatcho koowa. I tchip nai krell o tselo menshes djungeles un tchilatches. Koi jag, hoi i tchip krell, chatchrell o tselo djipen, un well o bengestar.
59003007	I menshe hi i raja pral i tsele diwje fichende, ninna pral i tchirkle, pral i bare sapa un pral i bare matche. Un kolla hunte krenn, hoi i menshe kamenna.
59003008	Kek mensho hi o rai pral peskri tchip. I tchip hi diwjo un tchilatcho. I tchip hi har i midjak sap, hoi anell o merepen.
59003009	I tchipjaha sharah mer o Debles, kai hi maro rai un dad. Un i tchipjaha praassah mer i menshen, kai o Dewel kras jaake har job hi.
59003010	Dran ko emligo mui wella sharepen un praassepen. Kowa hi gar mishto, mire phrala!
59003011	Dran jek pani nai well gar jek kopo latcho pani un o wawar kopo londo pani.
59003012	Mire phrala, i ruk, hoi hidjella pawja, nai hidjell kek brola. I ruk, kai hidjell drake, nai hidjell kek kirjasse. Jaake nai well kek londo pani dran o latcho pani win.
59003013	Koon gosewo hi mank tumende un djinell bud, kowa hunte sikrell dran peskro latcho djipen, kai haiwas lo, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi. Un job sharell pes gar pral ko latcho koowa, hoi job kras.
59003014	Te silwerenn tumer un hadenn tumen pre pral i wawarende, ma penenn, kai han gosewo! Kowa wals i chochepen un gar o tchatchepen.
59003015	Sawo goswepen well gar o Deblestar. Kowa well o menshestar un o bengestar.
59003016	Kote, kai i menshe silwerenna, un hadenn pen pre pral i wawarende, kote hi tchingepen un hako tchilatcho koowa.
59003017	Ko goswepen, hoi o Deblestar wella, hi wawartchandes. I mensho, kai hi les kau goswepen, kowa djiwell i djudjo djipen. Job kamell te djiwell lo latches i wawarentsa khetne. Job hi kamlo un latcho. Les hi i dji i wawarenge, un krell bud latcho koowa. Job mukell pes gar ap jekeskri rig te tsardell. Les hi gar dui tchipja.
59003018	Kolla, kai lenn o tchingepen mank i menshende krik, kolendar well latcho koowa, kai atchell hako tsiro.
59004001	Kai well o kurepen un o tchingepen mashkral tumende? Kowa wella dran tumare tchilatche djia. Hakeno kamell o feteder koowa peske kokres.
59004002	Tumer kamenn bud te lell, un len tchi. Doleske nai marans i menshen. Tumer silwerenn ap i wawarende, un tumer nai lenn gar, hoi kamenna. Doleske tchingrenn un kurenn tumen. O Deblestar mangenn tumer tchi. Doleske hi tumen tchi.
59004003	Te mangell jek tumendar tchomone o Deblestar, mangell lo, hoi gar mishto hi, un hoi dran leskro tchilatcho dji wella. Doleske dell les o Dewel kowa gar.
59004004	Tumer chochan un mukan o Debles! Djinenn tumer gar, kai kolla, kai tchiwenn pengre djia ap i phubjakro koowa, kolla hi gar o Debleskre mala? Koon kamell ko drom te djal, hoi i menshe ap kai phub djana, kowa kamell o Debles gar.
59004005	O Debleskro lab penell gar tchitcheske: O Debleskro Ducho, kai an mende khere hi, kamell men peske kokres.
59004006	Un ninna budeder latchepen kamell men o Dewel te dell. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Kolla, kai krenn pen bares, kolen bitchrell job pestar. Un kolen, kai krenn pen gar bares, kolen dell job bud latchepen.
59004007	Doleske, shunenn ap o Debleste! Krenn lauter, hoi job kamella! Ma krenn, hoi o beng kamella! Jaake nashell o beng tumendar.
59004008	Awenn pash o Debleste! Jaake well job ninna pash tumende. Ap tumende, kai kran tchilatcho koowa, penau me: Krenn tumare wasta djudjo! Ap tumende, kai djan ap dui dromma, penau me: Mukenn ko tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom!
59004009	Denn gole pral tumaro tchilatcho djipen! Rowenn koi pral! Ma san gar buder! Awenn bibachtelo un buder gar bachtelo!
59004010	Witsrenn tumen tele glan o Debleste! Un job krell tumen bares.
59004011	Mire phrala! Ma rakrenn djungeles pral o wawareste! Koon pral peskro phraleste djungeles rakrella un o gushteha ap leskri doosh sikrella, kowa tchiwell pes pral kowa, hoi o Dewel penas. Tu te kreh kowa, hal tu buder gar jek, hoi o Debleskro tchatchepen krella. Na-a, tu tchiweh tut pral o tchatchepen.
59004012	O Dewel kokres hi o tchatchepaskro rai. Job nai dell jekes i phagi, un mukell i wawares te djal. Koon hal tu, te sikreh tu ap o wawareskri doosh?
59004013	Mashkral tumende hi kolla, kai penenna: "Kau diwes kamah mer an ko foro te djal, un kamah jek bersh koi te atchell, te ginas un te bikras, un te anas bud lowe khetne."
59004014	Jaake rakrenn tumer un djinenn gar, hoi taissar hi! Tumaro djipen hi har i ducho, hoi atchella gar. Tumer han i tikno tsiro djido. Un ap jek kopo han tumer buder gar koi.
59004015	Doleske hunte penas jaake: "Te kamell o Dewel, djiwah mer un krah kawa te kowa."
59004016	Kowa penenn tumer gar. Tumer krenn tumen bares, un sharenn tumen pral kowa, hoi tumer krenna. Tumaro sharepen hi gar mishto.
59004017	Koon djinell o latchepen, un krell les gar, kowa anell doosh ap peste.
59005001	Kanna penau ap tumende, kai brawelo han: Rowenn un denn gole pral koi bibacht, hoi pral tumende wella!
59005002	Tumer nashrenn tumaro brawlepen. Un tumare ripja chan i kerme.
59005003	Tumaro sonakai un rup molell buder tchi. Tumer rikran les tumenge. Kowa anell tumen glan o tchatchepaskro rai un chal tumen pre har i jag. I phub atchell buder gar raha. Ninna te djinan kowa, anan tumenge bud brawlepen khetne!
59005004	Shunenn! Tumer chochan tumare budepangren, kai budran ap tumaro them, un dan len kek lowe. Kolla denn gole ap o bolepen. Lengri gole shunell o Dewel, ko rai pral o bolepen un i phub.
59005005	Tumenge djas mishto ap kai phub, tumer chan un pijan, un wan pesso, jaake har i fiche, kai wenn maredo.
59005006	Koles, kai his kek doosh ap leste, anan tumer glan i tchatchepangre, te well lo mulo dino. Kowa kamas pes gar tumentsa te tchingrell.
59005007	Mire phrala, dikenn ap o diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, un awenn gar khino an tumare djia, jaake har i hacho dikell ap ko diwes, kai peskro kutch djob bares was. Job djinell, o brishin hunte well un krell i phub sapeno, un pal i tsiro hunte dell pale brishin, te well o djob bares. O tselo tsiro well o hacho gar khino an peskro dji.
59005008	Ninna tumer, ma awenn khino an tumare djia! Atchenn soreles an o patsepen! Hi buder gar raha, kai well maro rai Jesus pale.
59005009	Mire phrala, ma rakrenn chojemen jek pral o wawareste, te lenn kek phagi o Deblestar! O Dewel, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i menshende, hi kanna glan o wudar tardo.
59005010	Mire phrala, dikenn ap o Debleskre rakepangre, kai penan i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Jon wan gar khino an lengre djia, ninna gar, har wan bud duka ap lende. Awenn har jon!
59005011	Kolla hi tchatchepaha bachtelo, kai rikran soreles ap o Debleste. Tumer shunan, har rikras pes o Hiob soreles ap o Debleste, un tumer djinenna, hawo brawlepen o Dewel les lauter das. O Debles hi i baro dji i menshenge un hi lenge latches.
59005012	Mire phrala, ma denn tumen sowel, gar ap o bolepen, witar gar ap i phub un witar gar ap wawar koowa. Te penenn tumer: "Awa," jaake hunte well kowa ninna awa. Un te penenn tumer: "Na-a," jaake hunte well kowa ninna na-a, te lenn kek phagi o Deblestar.
59005013	Te hi jekes tumendar i pharo tsiro, penell lo o Debleske, hoi leske phares hi! Te hi jek bachtelo, giwell lo o Debleske gilja!
59005014	Te hi jek tumendar nasselo, kharell lo kolen, kai hi i phureder mank i patslende, te mangenn le o Debles leske, un te makenn le les o djeteha dre an o Jesuseskro lab.
59005015	Te mangenn i phureder o Debles un patsenn ap leskri soor, well ko nasselo sasto. Un o Dewel krell les pale soreles. Te hi doosh ap leste, palle lell o Dewel koi doosh lestar.
59005016	Doleske penenn tumenge tumari doosh, un mangenn o Debles jek o wawareske, te wenn tumer sasto. I mensho, kai djiwell jaake, har o Dewel kamella, job te mangell i tselo djijeha tchomone o Deblestar, nai krell o Dewel bud leske.
59005017	O Elija his i mensho har mer. Job mangas o Deblestar, te dell kek brishin. Un koi das kek brishin ap i phub triin bersha un shob tchon.
59005018	Un job mangas o Debles pale. Un koi das brishin. Un lauter was senelo un baro ap i phub.
59005019	Mire phrala, djinenn: Te peras jek tumendar o tchatcho dromestar tele, un jek wawar anell les pale ap o tchatcho drom,
59005020	palle las kawa les dran o merepen win, te djal job gar nashedo. Un leskri bud doosh hi lestar krik lino.
60001001	Me, o Petro, tchinau kau liil. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro bitchepaskro, un tchinau kau liil tumenge, kai djiwenn an i themma Pontus, Galatia, Kappadocia, Asia un Bitinia. Tumer han o Jesuseskre menshe un djiwenn mashkral kolende, kai patsenn gar ap o Jesus Kristeste.
60001002	O Dewel, maro dad an o bolepen, rodas tumen win, un das tumen peskro Ducho, te wenn tumer o Debleskre tchawe, un krenn, hoi o Jesus Kristo tumendar kamella. Un job thowas tumari doosh peskro rateha tumendar tele. Mu well tumen bud latchepen un bacht an o dji!
60001003	Mer sharah o Debles, ko dades maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar. O Dewel kamas men jaake bud, te was job maro dad un das men o newo djipen. Un an mare djia djinah soreles, jaake har job o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido kras,
60001004	jaake lah mer ninna ko djipen, hoi buder gar pre-herella. Ko shukar koowa, hoi lah an o bolepen, atchell hako tsiro. Kowa well gar tchiklo un phuro. Kau brawlepen hi tumenge,
60001005	kai patsenn ap leste. O Dewel rikrell tumen an peskro sorelo wast, bis te well ko diwes, kai lell tumen o Jesus Kristo dran i tseli bibacht win. Palle dikenn tumer har shukar kowa hi, hoi les tumenge hi.
60001006	Doleske awenn bachtelo, ninna te hunte djan i tikno tsiro ap i drom, kai well bud pharo koowa ap tumende.
60001007	Kowa wella pral tumende, te well tumaro patsepen sorelo. Jaake har o sonakai an i jag djudjo un kutch kerdo wella, jaake hunte well tumaro patsepen ninna djudjo un kutch kerdo. Tumaro patsepen hi budeder moldo har o sonakai, hoi atchell gar. Te atchell tumaro patsepen sorelo, palle sharell tumen o Dewel un krell tumen bares un railes ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale.
60001008	-
60001009	Koles kamenn tumer o djijestar, ninna te dikan les gar. Ap leste patsenn tumer, ninna te dikenn les kanna nai gar. Tumaro patsepen anell tumen pash o Debleste an o bolepen. Kote hi tumari bacht jaake baro, hoi i labentsa nai gar penenna.
60001010	Kol Debleskre rakepangre rakran glan i raha tsiro pral ko latchepen, hoi o Dewel tumen della. Jon kaman te djinell, har nai lenn i menshe o Debleskro djipen an o bolepen.
60001011	Jon kaman ninna ko tsiro te djinell, kai kowa wella. O Jesuseskro Ducho his an lende. Un kowa sikras len kol duka, hoi wenna pral o Jesuseste, un ko railepen, hoi lell lo pal kowa.
60001012	Kol Debleskre rakepangre haiwan, kai kowa gar lenge kokres hi, hoi len o Dewel sikras. Kowa hi tumenge, kai kanna djiwenna. Tumenge was o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar penlo. Kolla, kai penan les tumenge, rakran kowa, hoi penas lenge o Debleskro Ducho. Koles bitchras o Dewel dran o bolepen. Ninna i bolepangre kamenn o Jesuseskro railepen te dikell.
60001013	Doleske awenn gar khino an tumare djia, un denn garda, te atchenn ap o Debleskro drom! Dikenn ap ko baro latchepen, hoi o Dewel dell tumen ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale.
60001014	Tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Doleske shunenn ap leste, un djiwenn buder gar jaake har an ko tsiro, kai prindjran tumer o Debles gar un kran o tchilatchepen, hoi an tumende his.
60001015	O Dewel das tumen gole, te wenn tumer leske koi. An leste hi kek tchilatchepen, jaake hunte well ninna kek tchilatchepen an tumende.
60001016	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, kai o Dewel penella: An mande hi kek tchilatchepen. Doleske hunte well kek tchilatchepen an tumende.
60001017	O Dewel hi o tchatchepaskro rai, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral hakeneste pal kowa, hoi job kras. Un o Dewel dikell gar koi pre, koon ko mensho hi. Ap leste penenn tumer: "Tata!" Doleske djiwenn jaake, har job kowa kamella, jaake raha har tumer kate ap i phub djiwenna.
60001018	Tumer djinenna, o Jesus Kristo plaissras kek sonakai un kek rup, - kowa lauter atchell gar, - te lell lo tumen win dran tumaro phuro djipen, hoi tchi moldo his, har djan ap ko drom, kai tumare phure djan.
60001019	Job plaissras peskro kutch rateha, hoi job ratas, har meras lo ap o trushel. O Jesus Kristo his har i bakro, hoi maredo was o Debleske. Ap leste his kek doosh un kek tchilatchepen.
60001020	Har i phub gar koi his, rodas o Dewel les win, te merell lo i menshenge. Un an kau tsiro, kai djiwah, was lo tumenge ap i phub.
60001021	Job anas tumen ap o Debleskro drom. O Dewel kras les i mulendar djido, un das les peskro railepen. Doleske tchiwenn tumaro tselo patsepen ap leste!
60001022	Tumer shunan ap o tchatcho lab, un tchiwan o tchilatchepen dran tumaro djipen krik. Kanna nai kamenn tumen tchatchepaha har phrala un phenja. Mukenn gar tele, te kamenn tumen o tselo djijestar!
60001023	Tumer wan newes boldo un han tchawe jekestar, kai merell gar. Ko newo djipen lan tumer, har patsan ap o Debleskro lab, hoi hi djido un atchella hako tsiro.
60001024	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: I tsele menshe hi har o senlepen un har shukar blume. O senlepen merella, un i blume perenn tele.
60001025	O Debleskro lab atchell hako tsiro. Kowa hi ko lab, hoi was tumenge penlo.
60002001	Doleske mukenn hako tchilatcho koowa! Ma chochenn! Ma rakrenn dui tchipjentsa! Ma silwerenn! Rakrenn kek djungelo koowa pral kekeste!
60002002	Har i tarnepen pal o thud gole della, jaake hunte well tumen bok pal o Debleskro lab. Palle wenn tumer sorelo an o patsepen un djan mishto ap ko drom kai anell tumen pash o Debleste.
60002003	Tumer haiwan, har latcho maro rai Jesus hi.
60002004	Awenn pash leste! Job hi ko djido bar, hoi o Dewel win rodas. O Debleske hi lo o kutch bar, ninna te witsran les i menshe ap i rig.
60002005	Ninna tumer han sawe djide barra. Tumentsa kamell o Dewel peskro kheer pre te tchiwell. Job rodas tumen win, te wenn tumer leskre rashaja, un te wenn leske koi. An tumende das o Jesus Kristo peskro Ducho. Doleske nai sharenn o Debles jaake, har job kowa kamella.
60002006	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Me rodom jek kutch bar win, un tchiwom les an o foro Zion tele, jaake te well miro kheer ap leste soreles tardo. Un koon ap koleste patsella, atchell djido.
60002007	-
60002008	Kau bar hi kutch tumenge, kai patsenna. Kau bar hi gar kutch kolenge, kai gar patsenna. Jon perenn pral kau bar, un choirenn pen koi pral, jaake har tchindlo hi an o Debleskro lab: Ko bar, hoi kol budepangre ap i rig witsran, kowa was ko bar, ap koleste ko tselo kheer tardo hi; pral ko bar perenn i menshe, un choirenn pen koi pral. Kolla kai patsenn gar ap o Debleskro lab, perenn pral leste. Jaake hunte djal lenge.
60002009	Tumer han kolla, kai o Dewel peske win rodas. Tumaro baro rai hi o Jesus Kristo. Koleskre rashaja han tumer, te wenn leske koi. Tumer han o Debleskre menshe, kolen job khetne gole das, te penenn tumer i menshenge, hawo baro un latcho koowa o Dewel kras. Job las tumen dran i rati win, un anas tumen pash peste, kai hi lauter shukar un djudjo.
60002010	Glan i raha tsiro hans tumer gar leskre menshe. Kanna han tumer o Debleskre menshe. Glan i raha tsiro djinan tumer gar, kai hi les i baro dji tumenge. Kanna kras lo peskro dji tumenge pre.
60002011	Kamle mala, tumer djinenn, kai han gar khere ap kai phub. Me mangau tumen, awenn sorelo, te well o djungelo koowa an tumare djia pre. Palle penenn: "Na-a!" ap kowa un krenn les gar!
60002012	Tumer djiwenn mank i menshende, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Doleske djiwenn jaake, te hatsenn le kek tchilatchepen ap tumende! Un kolla, kai rakrenna djungeles pral tumende, kolla hunte dikenn o latcho koowa ap tumende, jaake te sharenn le o Debles ap ko diwes, kai job wella.
60002013	Shunenn ap kowa, hoi kol pralstune ap kai phub penenna! Kowa kamell o Dewel, maro rai, jaake. Shunenn ap o baro rajeste pral o them!
60002014	Shunenn ninna ap i moskere! Kolen das o themeskro rai i budi, te denn le kolen i phagi, kai kran tchilatcho koowa, un te sharenn le kolen, kai krenn latcho koowa.
60002015	O Dewel kamell, te krenn tumer o latchepen. Jaake pandenn tumer kol dinele menshenge o mui, kai haiwan gar o tchatchepen un rakrenn djungeles pral tumende.
60002016	Tumer han buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Doleske penenn gar: "Mer nai krah halauter, hoi kamah." Un pal sawo rakepen khatrenn tumer tumaro tchilatchepen. Ma bistrenn, kai han pandlo ap o Debleste!
60002017	Awenn latches ap hako mensheste! Kamenn i patslen o djijestar! Sharenn o Debles, un krenn, hoi job kamella! Shunenn ap o baro rajeste pral o them!
60002018	Tumer budepangre, shunenn ap tumare rajende, ap kolende, kai latcho un kamlo hi un ninna ap kolende, kai tchilatcho hi.
60002019	Te krenn tumer, hoi o Dewel kamella, un doleske dukrenn le tumen un tchingrenn ap tumende, ninna te kran tumer kek tchilatchepen, palle sharell tumen o Dewel.
60002020	Te krenn tumer tchilatcho koowa un wenn doleske dino, hi kowa gar mishto, ninna te rikrenn tumer i duka win. Te krenn tumer latcho koowa, un jon dukrenn tumen dran kowa, palle sharell tumen o Dewel.
60002021	Job das tumen pash peste gole, te krenn o latchepen, un te rikrenn i duka win. Ninna o Jesus Kristo las tumenge duka ap peste. Job kras kowa, te sikrell lo tumenge, har te djan leske palla.
60002022	Job kras kek tchilatcho koowa. Un dran leskro mui was kek chochepen.
60002023	Te tchingran le ap leste, tchingras job gar pale. Te dan le les, das lo len gar trad. Na-a, job tchiwas pes an o Debleskre wasta. Un o Dewel hi o tchatchepaskro rai, kai djal pal o tchatchepen.
60002024	O tchilatchepen, hoi mer kram, las o Jesus Kristo ap peste, un hidjas les ap o trushel. Har job menge meras, hi kowa jaake, har te meram mer leha. Kanna hi o tchilatchepen an mende mulo. Un mer djiwah nai i latcho un tchatcho djipen. Kol duka, hoi o Jesus ap peste las, kran maro djipen sasto.
60002025	Tumer hans har bakre, kai nashran pen. Kanna anas tumen o Jesus Kristo pale ap o tchatcho drom. Job hi tumenge har i bakrengro, un dell garda ap tumende.
60003001	-
60003002	Djuwjale, ma hadenn tumen pral tumare romende, ninna te shunenn jon gar ap o Debleskro lab! Jaake dikenn jon, har tumer i djudjo djipen djiwenna, un ap o Debleste shunenna. Un tumaro djipen sikrell len o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste, ninna te krenn tumer kek bare laba.
60003003	Tumaro shukapen hunte well gar diklo an kowa, hoi i menshe dikenna: har tumer tumare balla hidjenna, witar gar an o sonakai un kutch ripja!
60003004	Tumaro shukapen hunte well dran tumaro dji un sikrell pes an o latchepen, kai kek tchingepen dren hi. Sawo shukapen atchella, un hi bud moldo glan o Debleskre jaka.
60003005	Jaake djiwan ninna kol patsle djuwja an ko phuro tsiro. Jon dikan ap o Debleste, un hadan pen gar pral pengre romende.
60003006	Jek lendar hi i Sara. Joi shunas ap o Abrahameste, un penas ap leste Rai. Te krenn tumer, hoi latcho hi, un te mukenn tumen kekestar daar te krell, palle han tumer har lakre tcha.
60003007	Murshale, djiwenn tumare romjentsa latches khetne! Jon hi gar jaake sorelo har tumer. Awenn latches ap lende! Ma bistrenn, i djuwja lenn o Debleskro djipen har tumer! Te djiwenn tumer jaake, palle well tchi mashkral tumende tardo ap ko tsiro, kai rakrenn o Debleha.
60003008	Ap tumende lauterende penau: Rikrenn khetne! Hakenes te well i dji o wawareske! Tumer lauter han phrala un phenja. Awenn latches jek ap o wawareste! Ma krenn tumen bares!
60003009	Krenn kekeske tchilatchepen, kai kras ap tumende tchilatchepen! Jek te tchingrell ap tumende, ma tchingrenn pale! Rakrenn latche laba leha! O Dewel das tumen gole, te lenn tumer leskro latchepen.
60003010	An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Koon kamell i latcho djipen un bachtele diwessa te dikell, kowa dell garda ap peskri tchip. Kek chochepen, kek tchilatchepen hunte well dran leskro mui!
60003011	Job mukell o tchilatcho koowa, un krell o latcho koowa. Peskri tseli sorjaha krell lo, te djal kek tchingepen mashkral i menshende!
60003012	O Dewel, maro rai, dikell latches ap koleste, kai djiwell pal o tchatchepen. Un te mangell job o Debles, shunell lo les. Ap kolende, kai djiwenn an o tchilatchepen, dikell o Dewel gar latches.
60003013	Tumer te kamenn i tseli sorjaha latcho koowa te krell, koon krell tumenge tchilatchepen? Kek, patsau.
60003014	Tumer krenn, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella. Nai well, te lenn le tumen doleske palla. Palle han bachtelo. Te denn le tumen trad, ma darenn! Ma trashenn lendar!
60003015	O Jesus Kristo kokres te well o rai an tumare djia! Un te putchenn le tumendar tchomone pral tumaro patsepen, ma darenn kek tsiro, te penenn lenge, ap koneste tumer patsenna.
60003016	Rakrenn lentsa latchepaha, un krenn tumen gar bares pral lende! Rakrenn dran i djudjo dji, te well i ladj ap kolende, kai rakrenn djungeles pral tumaro djipen o Jesus Kristeha!
60003017	Te krenn tumer latcho koowa, un dran kowa krenn le tumentsa tchilatcho koowa, palle hi kowa feteder, har te krans tumer tchilatcho koowa. Jon nai dukrenn tumen gar, te mukals len o Dewel gar.
60003018	Ninna o Jesus Kristo las jek kopo duka ap peste, har job ap o trushel meras, un mari doosh ap peste las. Job his i latcho, un meras i tchilatchenge. Kowa kras lo, te anell lo len pash o Debleste. I menshe maran les. O Debleskro Ducho kras les djido.
60003019	Har job mulo his, djas lo ninna pash i mulende an o mulengro them tele, un penas lenge o Debleskro latcho lab.
60003020	Job djas pash kol mulende, kai djiwan an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas. Har o Noa ko panjeskro kheer kras, das o Dewel i menshen i raha tsiro, te wenn le pash leste. Un jon wan gar. His gar budeder har ochta menshe, kai djan an o panjeskro kheer. Un kolla tassan gar an o pani.
60003021	-
60003022	Jaake har wan kol ochta menshe win lino dran o merepen, jaake djas tumenge kanna ninna, har wan tumer o Debleske an o pani thodo. Kote was gar koi tchik tumendar tele thodo. Na-a! Koon mukell pes o Debleske an o pani te thowell, kowa mangell o Debles, te dell lo les i djudjo dji. Kowa nai dell o Dewel leste doleske, kai stas o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre un djas an o bolepen. Kanna hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar, un hi o rai pral i tsele bolepangre, un pral i tsele pralstune un sorele an o bolepen.
60004001	O Jesus Kristo las bare duka ap peste, har job ap i phub his. Doleske, ma darenn, te wenn ninna duka ap tumende. Koon an peskro djipen duka haiwas, kowa mukell o tchilatchepen.
60004002	Jaake raha, har kau mensho ap kai phub hi, krell lo kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella, un djiwell buder gar pal peskro shero.
60004003	I raha tsiro djiwan tumer har kol menshe, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Tumer kran wi-ladjedo koowa. Un tumaro dji nashas pal tchilatcho koowa. Tumer pijan tumen mato, chan tumen nasselo, un mangan wawar koowa an har o Debles. Kowa hi tchilatcho glan o Debleskre jaka.
60004004	Kanna djiwenn tumer buder gar ko djungelo djipen har kol tchilatche. Kowa djal kolenge gar an o shero. Doleske tchingrenn le ap tumende.
60004005	Well i diwes, kai wenn jon anlo glan o Debleste. Kowa rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i djidende, ninna pral i mulende. Un jon hunte penenn o Debleske, hoske jon ko tchilatcho koowa kran.
60004006	Doleske was ninna i mulenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar penlo, te nai lenn le o Debleskro djipen, ninna te meran le, har i tsele menshe hunte merenn.
60004007	Ko tsiro wella sik, kai tchi atchella, hoi kanna koi hi. Doleske denn garda, har tumer djiwenna, te rikrell tumen tchi pale, te rakrenn o Debleha!
60004008	Rikrenn khetne an o kamlepen! Kowa hi feteder har lauter wawar. O kamlepen tchakrell bud tchilatchepen.
60004009	Lenn jek o wawares kamles an peskro kheer! Un choirenn tumen gar pral koi budi, hoi tumen hi!
60004010	Hakeno tumendar las i budi o Deblestar, te nai krell lo i wawarengro patsepen soreles. Krenn koi budi! Awenn jek o wawareske koi! Jaake han tumer latche budepangre o Debleske.
60004011	Das tut o Dewel gole, te rakress o Debleskro lab, palle rake o Debleskro lab! Das tut o Dewel i soor, te budress i patslenge, palle kre kowa an o Debleskri soor! Jaake sharah mer o Debles an halauter, hoi o Jesus Kristo men das. Les hi o railepen un i soor kanna un hako tsiro. Amen!
60004012	Kamle mala, tumaro dji well gar dareno, te wenn tumer soreles palla lino. Sawo koowa djal kolenge, kai patsle hi. Kote well diklo, har tumaro patsepen hi.
60004013	Te wenn duka ap tumende, djinenn: sawe duka wan ninna ap o Jesus Kristeste. Doleske awenn bachtelo! Ap ko diwes, kai leskro railepen diklo wella, giwenna un bashrenna tumare djia i bachtjatar.
60004014	Te praassenn le tumen doleske, kai patsenn tumer ap o Jesus Kristeste, nai wenn tumer bachtelo. Palle nai djinenn: O Debleskro railo Ducho hi ap tumende tchiddo.
60004015	Kek tumendar hunte well i marepaskro, i tchorepaskro, i tchingepaskro, i phukepaskro! Kalla menshe len i phagi i menshendar un hunte ladjenn.
60004016	Jek, kai patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste un lell doleske i phagi, kowa hunte ladjell gar. Na-a, job te parkrell pes pash o Debleste, te hi o Jesus Kristo leskro rai.
60004017	Kanna was ko tsiro, kai wenna i tchilatche diwessa pral o Debleskre tchawende. Pal kowa wella bari bibacht pral kolende, kai patsan gar ap o Debleskro latcho lab!
60004018	Kolla, kai hi tchilatcho, un kamenn o Deblestar tchi te djinell, kolenge djal bud djungleder har kolenge, kai kran, hoi o Dewel kamas, ninna te well kolengro djipen ninna phares an ko tchilatcho tsiro.
60004019	Doleske penau tumenge: Te mukell o Dewel ap tumende i pharo tsiro te well, palle denn tumen tseles an o Debleskro wast, kai das tumen o djipen! Un mukenn gar tele, te krenn o latchepen!
60005001	Kanna rakrau ap kolende, kai hi i phureder mank tumende. Me hom ninna i phureder, un dikom mire jakentsa, har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel meras. Un ap ko diwes, kai well peskro tselo railepen diklo, hom me ninna pash leste. Tumenge penau soreles:
60005002	Denn garda ap i patslende, kai o Dewel peske khetne anas! Tumer han har i bakrengre. Un o Debleskre tchawe hi har bakre, hoi o Dewel an tumare wasta das. Denn len kowa, hoi len hunte wella, te atchell lengro patsepen djido! Krenn kowa o tselo djijestar! Jaake kamell les o Dewel. Krenn kowa gar, har te wals i phari budi, hoi hunte krenn! Krenn koi budi dran o kamlepen un gar, te wenn tumer plaissedo!
60005003	Ma awenn raja pral i patslende! Sikrenn lende, har tumer djiwenna, te djiwenn jon ninna jaake!
60005004	Un ap ko diwes, kai well o pralstuno bakrengro, lenn tumer leskro railepen, hoi atchella hako tsireske.
60005005	Kol tarne menshenge penau me: Krenn kowa, hoi kol phureder phrala tumenge penenna! Hakeneske penau: Kek te krell, har te well lo bareder har ko wawar! O Dewel hi gar ap i rig kolendar, kai krenn pen bares. Na-a, job hi latches kolenge, kai krenn pen gar bares.
60005006	Doleske krenn tumen tikno tel o Debleskro sorelo wast! O Debleskro tsiro wella, kai job tumen bares krella.
60005007	Lauter, hoi hi tumen phares ap o dji, witsrenn ap leste! Job krell lauter mishto.
60005008	Denn garda, un awenn gar khino! O beng kamell tumen te marell. Un job djal trujal har i diwji bari margodja, hoi hi lat bok, un rodella, kones joi nai chal pre.
60005009	Ma krenn, hoi o beng tumendar kamella! Atchenn soreles an o patsepen! Tumer hunte djinenna, kai lenn le tumare phralen un phenja ap i tseli phub ninna jaake palla har tumen.
60005010	I tikno tsiro well pharo koowa ap tumende. An kau tsiro lenn tumer i soor, te atchenn ap o Debleskro drom. O Dewel, kolestar well o tselo latchepen, job das tumen gole, te djiwenn hako tsiro khetne o Jesus Kristeha un lenn leskro railepen. Job dell tumen ninna i soor, te atchenn soreles an o patsepen un an o djipen.
60005011	I tseli soor hi leske kanna un hako tsiro! Amen!
60005012	Maro latcho phraal, o Silwano, was mange ap i rig, te tchinell lo kau tikno liil. An kau liil kamoms te penap tumenge an o dji, te djinenn tchatchepaha: O Dewel hi tumenge latcho. Atchenn pash leste!
60005013	I patsle, kai wenn khetne an o foro Babilon, penenn tumenge latche laba. Jon wan o Deblestar win rodedo har tumer. Ninna miro tchawo Marko penell tumenge latche laba.
60005014	Te wenn tumer khetne, denn tumen i tchum, te dikell hakeno, kai tumer phrala un phenja han! O Debleskri bacht tumenge lauterenge, kai djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom!
61001001	Me, o Simon Petro, tchinau kau liil. Me budrau o Jesus Kristeske un hom leskro bitchepaskro. Me tchinau ap lauterende, kai lan ninna ko patsepen har mer. Ko kutch patsepen, kai tchiwas men an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste, das men maro Dewel un o Jesus Kristo, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.
61001002	Me mangau o Deblestar, te dell lo tumen peskro latchepen un peskri bacht an o dji, te prindjrenn les un o Jesuses, maro rajes, feteder!
61001003	Job hi baro un railo, un his menge latcho, un das men pash peste gole. Har lam les an maro dji pre, das men o Dewel an peskri soor halauter, hoi men hunte well, te djiwas maro djipen jaake, har job kamella.
61001004	Glan i raha tsiro penas o Dewel i menshenge, te bitchrell lo lenge jekes, kai lell len dran o merepen win, un dell len o Debleskro djipen. Ko baro un kutch koowa kras lo kanna menge. Mer lam o Debleskro djipen un hunte kras buder gar ko djungelo koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub jaake kamenna, un hoi anell lenge o merepen.
61001005	Doleske tchiwenn tumaro tselo dji koi pre, te well pash tumaro patsepen ninna i djudjo djipen. Koon i djudjo djipen djiwella, haiwell, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.
61001006	Koon haiwas, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, kowa rikrell pes lauterestar pale, hoi leske gar mishto hi. Koon rikrell pes lauterestar pale, hoi leske gar mishto hi, kowa rikrell soreles ap kowa, hoi latcho hi. Koon kowa krella, kamell o Debles.
61001007	Koon o Debles kamella, koles hi ninna i dji peskre phralenge un phenjenge. Kones i dji hi peskre phralenge un phenjenge, kowa kamell ninna i tsele menshen ap kai phub.
61001008	Te krenn tumer kowa lauter, un djan dureder ap kau drom, palle prindjrenn tumer maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes, budeder un feteder.
61001009	I patslo, kai krell ko koowa gar, kowa hi korelo, un djiwell an o tamlepen. Job bistras, kai was leskri tseli doosh lestar krik lino, hoi job kras.
61001010	Mire phrala, o Dewel das tumen gole, un rodas tumen win, te wenn tumer leskre tchawe. Doleske djiwenn jaake tumari tseli sorjaha, te atchenn pash leste! Te djiwenn tumer jaake, perenn tumer gar o Debleskro dromestar tele.
61001011	Un o Dewel lell tumen latches pash peste an o bolepen pre, kai hi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, o rai hako tsiro, - job, kai las men dran i tseli bibacht win.
61001012	Ninna te djinenn kowa lauter, un han sorelo tardo an o tchatcho patsepen, penau tumenge kowa pale te pale.
61001013	Me patsau, hi mishto tumenge, te penap tumenge kowa jaake raha, har me djiwau, te bistrenn tumer kowa gar, un te wenn gar khino, te krenn kowa lauter.
61001014	Me djinau, kai merau an i tikno tsiro. Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, penas kowa mange.
61001015	Doleske tchinau me lauter pre, te bistrenn gar, hoi me tumenge penom.
61001016	Mer penam tumenge, te well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, i bari sorjaha pale. Kowa hi kek gosewi parmissa. Na-a. Mer dikam leskro baro railepen mare jakentsa.
61001017	O Dewel, leskro dad, das les peskro baro railepen un sharas les, har job dran o bolepen ap leste penas: "Kawa hi miro tchawo, koles me o djijestar kamau. Job krell man bachtelo."
61001018	Ko rakepen shunam mer dran o bolepen, har hams leha khetne ap koi Debleskri berga.
61001019	Doleske djinah mer tchatchepaha, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre penan. Tumer krenna mishto, te denn garda koi pre. Ko lab hi har i momeli, hoi chatchella an i rat, bis te well o diwes. Palle djal i raili momeli an tumare djia pre.
61001020	Un kowa hunte djinenn tumer: Kek Debleskro rakepaskro rakras nai pestar Debleskre laba.
61001021	An kek tsiro was o Debleskro lab i menshendar. Kol Debleskre rakepangre rakran, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. Kowa tchiwas lenge o Debleskro Ducho an o dji.
61002001	Glan i raha tsiro his chochene rakepangre an o them Israel, kai kran, har te bitchras len o Dewel. Jaake wenna ninna mashkral tumende chochene sikepangre, kai sikrenn tumen i chocheno drom, kai anell tumen krik o Deblestar. Kol sikepangre denn o Jesuses, maro rajes, buchoste, kai plaissras peskro rateha lenge, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win. Jon nashenn an pengri bibacht.
61002002	Bud wawar dikenn lengro wi-ladjedo djipen, un krenn jaake har jon, un djiwenn ninna i wi-ladjedo djipen. Doleske rakrenn kolla, kai gar patslo hi, djungeles pral o Debleskro drom.
61002003	Kol chochene sikepangre kamenn tumen chochene labentsa ap pengri rig te anell, te lenn le lowe tumendar. O Debleskri choli well tchatchepaha pral lende, un lengri bibacht wella sik.
61002004	O Debleskri choli was ninna pral kol bolepangre, kai kran o tchilatchepen. O Dewel witsras len an o telstunepen. Kote hi le pandlo an i kali rat, bis te well ko diwes, kai dell lo len lengri phagi.
61002005	Un o Debleskri choli was pral kol menshende, kai djiwan an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas. Jon kaman o Deblestar tchi te djinell, un shunan gar ap o Noa, har job lenge penas, te hunte djan le ap o Debleskro drom. Un o Dewel bitchras o baro pani pral lende. O Noa kokres un efta wawar tassan gar.
61002006	Un o Debleskri choli was pral kol forja Sodom un Gomorra. Un job chatchras kol forja jaake te atchas tchi har barra un jagakri tchik. Jaake sikras job kolende, kai pal lende wenna, hoi djal kolentsa, kai gar ap leste shunenna.
61002007	O Lot kokres was win lino dran o foro Sodom, har i jag tele peras. Job djiwas jaake, har o Dewel kamas. Un leske dukas ko djungelo djipen, hoi kol tchilatche menshe djiwan.
61002008	Hako diwes dikas un shunas lo, hoi jon tchilatches kran. Un lengro tchilatcho koowa dukras les an leskro dji.
61002009	O Dewel, maro rai, haiwell garda te dell ap kolende, kai les kamenna, te perenn le gar o tchatcho dromestar tele. Job haiwell ninna kol tchilatchen pandlo te rikrell, te lenn le pengri phagi ap ko diwes, kai well o tchatchepen wi-rakedo pral i tsele menshende.
61002010	Palle well i phagi soreles pral kolende, kai djiwan i fullo djipen, un kaman kek rajes pral pende. Kolla chochene sikepangre hi pre-phurdo, un krenn pen bares. Jon darenn gar, te rakrenn le djungeles pral kolende, kai hi an o bolepen.
61002011	I bolepangre hi sorleder har kol chochene sikepangre. Un jon praassenn i chochene sikepangren gar glan o Debleste.
61002012	Kol chochene sikepangre rakrenn djungeles pral kowa, hoi jon gar prindjrenna. Jon hi har diwje fiche, kai wenn boldo, te wenn le tapedo un maredo. Jaake merenn jon ninna.
61002013	Jon kran tchilatchepen, un tchilatchepen well pral lende. Jon chan pen nasselo, un pijenn pen mato ninna ap o diwes. Lenge hunte ladjenn tumen, te chan le pen pash tumende tchalo, un rakrenn lengro chochepen.
61002014	An lengre jaka dikeh, kai dikenn le pal haki djuwjate. Hako tsiro hi len bok pal tchilatcho koowa. Un jon anenn kolen o tchatcho dromestar tele, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen. Lengro dji hi pherdi bok pal i lowe. Praassedo hi le!
61002015	O tchatcho drom mukan le, un nashran pen. Jon djan ap ko tchilatcho drom, kai djas ninna o Bileam, - leskro dad hi o Beor. O Bileam kamas i tchilatcho koowa te krell, te lell lo lowe.
61002016	Koi rakras leha leskri esla har i mensho. Jaake was leske siklo, har tchilatcho kowa his, hoi kamas lo te krell. Un koi esla rikras les pale, te krell job kek dinelo koowa.
61002017	Kol menshe hi har i brunna, kai hi kek pani dre. Jon hi har o bolepen, kai dell kek brishin. Ap ko diwes, kai lenn jon pengri phagi, wenn le an i kali rat witsedo.
61002018	Jon rakrenn bare laba, kai tchi moldo hi. Lengro wi-ladjedo djipen tsardell kolen ap o tchilatcho drom, kai dan glan i tikno tsiro pengro phuro djipen pre.
61002019	Kolenge penenn le, te nai krenn jon, hoi jon kamenna. Kol chochene sikepangre hi pandlo ap o tchilatchepen, hoi krell lengro djipen paash. I mensho hi pandlo ap kowa, hoi sorleder hi har job.
61002020	Jon haiwan, kai maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, lenge meras, un dan pengro phuro djipen pre. Un palle wan le ap ko djungelo drom pale. Kanna hi lengro djipen djungleder har glan ko tsiro.
61002021	Jon prindjran o tchatcho drom, un mukan les. Jon kamenn buder tchi te shunell o Debleskro lab, hoi lenge penlo was. Lenge wals feteder, te djinans jon o Debleskro drom gar.
61002022	Kol menshenge djal jaake, har penlo well: "Ko djuklo chal pale kowa, hoi job win tchadas. Un ko balo witsrell pes pal o thopen pale an i tchik."
61003001	Latche phrala un phenja, kawa hi o duito liil, hoi me tumenge tchinau. Kalla lila tchinau, te wenn tumer gar khino an tumaro patsepen. Ma bistrenn,
61003002	hoi penan o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro! Bistrenn witar gar kol laba, hoi tumenge kolla penan, kolen maro rai Jesus pash tumende bitchras, - job, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.
61003003	Me kamau, te djinenn tumer, glan ko tsiro, kai o Jesus Kristo pale wella, wenna menshe pash tumende, kai san pral tumaro patsepen. Kolla djiwenn jaake har jon kamenna,
61003004	un penenn ap tumende: "Kai hi tumaro Jesus? Job penas, kai job pale wella. Mare phure meran, un lauter atchas jaake har his, har i phub kerdo was."
61003005	Kol menshe kamenn gar te haiwell, kai kras o Dewel o bolepen un i phub glan i raha tsiro. Jaake har job penas, djas i phub wi dran o pani un atchas ap jek rig tchiddo, un o pani ap i wawar rig.
61003006	Koi phuri phub djas tele an o baro pani.
61003007	Pral o bolepen un i phub, hoi kanna kai hi, penas o Dewel, te atchenn le jaake raha, bis te wenn le chatchedo an i jag. Jon atchenn jaake raha tardo, bis te well ko diwes, kai well o Debleskri choli pral i menshende ap kai phub, un job kolen i phagi della, kai gar ap leste shunan.
61003008	Latche phrala un phenja, jek koowa hunte djinenn tumer: Pash o Debleste hi jek diwes har i sero bersha, un i sero bersha hi har jek diwes.
61003009	Hi menshe, kai penenna: "O rai Jesus lell pes bud tsiro, te well lo pale." Kowa hi gar tchatcho. Les hi i baro dji tumenge, un kamell, te djal kek tumendar nashedo. Job kamella, te mukell hakeno peskro tchilatcho drom un well ap o Debleskro drom.
61003010	Kek djinell o diwes, kai maro rai Jesus pale wella. Ko diwes wella jaake har i dre-phagepaskro wella. Palle djal o bolepen krik bari goljaha. I bolepangre momlia chatchrenna krik. Ninna i phub un ko tselo koowa, hoi ap i phub hi, chatchrella pre.
61003011	Mer djinah, kai lauter jaake paash djala. Doleske hunte kras mer lauter, te atchas o Debleha, un djiwas jaake, har job kamella.
61003012	Djiwenn jaake, te well o Debleskro baro diwes sikeder! Ap ko diwes chatchrell o bolepen pre, un djal paash an i jag. Un i bolepangre momlia chatchrenna ninna pre.
61003013	Mende das o Dewel peskro lab, te krell lo i newo bolepen un i newi phub. Kote della buder kek tchilatchepen. Ap kowa dikah mer.
61003014	Latche phrala un phenja, tumer kamenna, te well ko diwes sik. Doleske krenn lauter, te well tchi mank tumende un o Debleste tardo! Djiwenn jaake, te hi tumen i djudjo dji, un te hatsell o Dewel kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai wenna glan leste tardo!
61003015	Dikenn, te well maro rai Jesus gar jaake sik pale, krell lo kowa, te dell lo i menshen gomme i tsiro, te wenn le pash leste. Kowa tchinas tumenge ninna maro kamlo phraal Paulo, koles o Dewel bud goswepen das.
61003016	Pral ko koowa tchinell lo an peskre tsele lila. Koi hi ninna laba dre tchindlo, hoi hi pharo te haiwell. Un kol menshe, kai haiwenn kowa gar, kolengro patsepen gar sorelo hi, kolla risrenn kol laba trujal, jaake har jon ninna krenna kol wawar Debleskre labentsa, hoi tchindlo hi. Un jaake djan le nashedo.
61003017	Latche phrala un phenja, kanna djinenn tumer, kai tchilatche menshe wenna, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste. Doleske denn garda, te patsenn gar o chochepen, hoi jon rakrenna! Ma djan lentsa, te perenn tumer gar o tchatcho dromestar tele! Atchenn soreles an o patsepen tardo!
61003018	Djiwenn bud un budeder dran o latchepen, hoi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, tumen della! Job las men win dran o tchilatchepen. Prindjrenn les bud un budeder! Sharedo well job kanna un hako tsiro. Amen.
62001001	Mer tchinah tumenge pral koleste, kai his hako tsiro koi. Mer shunam les, un dikam les. Awa, mer dikam les mare jakentsa, un tapram les mare wastentsa. Job hi ko lab, hoi o djipen della.
62001002	Awa, ko djipen was pash mende, un sikras pes mende. Mer dikam les. Doleske rakrah mer kolestar, kai dikam un shunam. Un mer penah tumenge, koon ko djipen della, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa his pash peskro dadeste an o bolepen, un was pash mende.
62001003	Kowa, hoi mer dikam un shunam, penah mer tumenge, te nai was mer tumentsa khetne an o tchatchepen. Un tchatchepaha, mer ham khetne o Debleha, kai hi maro dad an o bolepen, un leskro tchaweha, o Jesus Kristeha.
62001004	Kowa lauter tchinah tumenge, te wenn mare djia un tumare djia pherdo bacht.
62001005	Kowa, hoi tumenge penah, shunam o Jesus Kristestar. Lestar shunam, kai hi lauter latchepen an o Debleste. Un kek tchilatchepen hi an leste. O Dewel hi har o diwes un kek tamlepen hi an leste.
62001006	Mer te penah, te ham khetne o Debleha, un djiwah an o tchilatchepen, palle ham chochene, un djiwah gar pal o tchatchepen.
62001007	Mer te djiwah khetne o Debleha an o tchatchepen, jaake har o Dewel an o tchatchepen tardo hi, palle nai ham mer ninna lauter khetne an o tchatchepen. Un o rat leskro tchawestar thowell mari tseli doosh mendar tele.
62001008	Mer te penah: "Men hi kek doosh an maro djipen", jaake chochah men kokres, un mer ham gar an o tchatchepen tardo.
62001009	Mer te mangah men tele glan o Debleste, un penah leske, hawi doosh mer ap mende lam, palle krell lo, hoi job penas un lell i doosh mendar krik. Job hi latcho un tchatcho un thowell o tselo tchilatchepen mendar tele.
62001010	Mer te penah, kai lam kek doosh ap mende, palle krah, har te wals o Dewel i chocheno. Un mer djiwah gar pal leskro lab.
62002001	Mire tchawe, me tchinau tumenge kowa, te krenn tumer kek tchilatchepen! Un jek te kras i tchilatcho koowa, jaake hi men i rakepaskro, kai well ap mari rig un rakrell mishto menge pash maro dadeste an o bolepen. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo, kai an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste tardo hi.
62002002	Job kokres las mari doosh mendar, un las lat ap peste, har job menge ap o trushel meras. Gar mari doosh kokres las lo ap peste. Na-a, job las ninna i doosh i tsele menshendar ap kai phub ap peste.
62002003	Mer te krah kowa, hoi o Dewel menge penas, te kras, djinah mer, te prindjrah les.
62002004	Koon penella: "Me prindjrau o Debles", un krell gar, hoi job penas, kowa hi i chocheno, un djiwell gar pal o tchatchepen.
62002005	Koon krella, hoi o Dewel penella, an koleste hi tchatchepaha o Debleskro tselo kamlepen. Un ap kowa dikah mer, te atchah o Debleha.
62002006	Koon penella, te atchell lo o Debleha khetne, kowa hunte djiwella jaake, har o Jesus Kristo djiwas.
62002007	Kamle phrala, ko lab, hoi me tumenge kate tchinau, te krenn kowa, hi tumenge tchi newo. Na-a, kowa hi i phuro lab. Tumer shunan ko lab, har tumer patslo wan, un djinenn les.
62002008	Ko phuro lab hi ninna newo. O Jesus djiwas pal ko lab un tumer djiwenna ninna jaake. Ap kowa dikenn le, kai i rat pale djala, un o diwes wella.
62002009	Koon penella: "Me djiwau o Debleha," un krell peskro phraleske tchilatchepen, kowa djiwell gomme an o tchilatchepen. Kowa hi jaake, har te djiwell lo an i kali rat.
62002010	Koon peskro phrales o tselo djijestar kamella, kowa atchella o Debleha. An leste hi kek tchilatchepen, hoi les o Debleskro dromestar tele nai anell.
62002011	Koon peskro phraleske tchilatchepen krella, kowa djiwell har an i kali rat, un djal i drom, kai dikell lo nai gar. Job djinell gar, kai job djala. An i rat hi lo, har te wals lo korelo.
62002012	Tchowale, me tchinau tumenge kau lab, te bistrenn tumer gar, kai o Jesus Kristo meras tumenge. O Dewel las tumari doosh tumendar.
62002013	Phure murshale, tumenge tchinau kau lab, te bistrenn gar o Jesuses, kai hako tsiro koi hi. Tarne murshale, tumenge tchinau kau lab: Tumer hans sorleder har o beng un kran gar, hoi job tumendar kamas.
62002014	Tchowale, tumenge tchinom kau lab, te bistrenn gar, kai hi o Dewel tumaro dad. Phure murshale, tumenge tchinom kau lab, te bistrenn gar o Jesuses, kai hako tsiro koi hi. Tarne murshale, tumenge tchinom kau lab, te han tumer soreles. Un o Debleskro lab atchell an tumende. Un tumer kran gar, hoi o beng tumendar kamas.
62002015	Ma kamenn ko koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub kamenna! Ma kamenn ko koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna! Te kamell jek ko koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub kamenna, kowa kamell gar o Debles, maro dades an o bolepen.
62002016	Pash i menshende ap kai phub djal lauter pal jek koowa: chapen un pipen, romedinepen un khelepen, brawlepen un sharepen. Kowa lauter well gar o Deblestar, maro dadestar. Kowa lauter hi phubjakro koowa.
62002017	Kai phub atchella gar, witar gar kowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub kamenna. Koon krella, hoi o Dewel kamella, kowa atchella hako tsiro.
62002018	Tchowale, mer djiwah an ko tsiro, kai i phub buder gar raha atchella. Un tumer shunan, kai ko chocheno wella, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste. Shunenn, bud chochene hi kanna kai, kai hadenn pen pral o Jesus Kristeste. Ap kowa dikah mer, kai i phub buder gar raha atchella.
62002019	Kolla wan mendar. Jon his gar tchatchepaha mendar. Te wans jon mendar, atchans le pash mende. Un har jon penge djan, nai dikas hakeno, te his le gar mendar.
62002020	Tumer lan o Debleskro Ducho, un lestar djinenn tumer kowa lauter.
62002021	Me tchinom tumenge gar, har te prindjrans tumer o tchatchepen gar. Tumer prindjrenn les, un djinenn, kai kek chochepen dran o tchatchepen wella.
62002022	Kowa hi i chocheno, kai dell buchoste, kai o Jesus o baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Hakeno, kai dell buchoste, te hi o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo, un te hi o Dewel leskro dad, hi har ko chocheno, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste.
62002023	Hakeno, kai o Debleskro tchawes buchoste della, prindjrell witar gar o Debles, kai leskro dad hi. Koon ap o Jesuseste patsella, un i menshenge penella, te hi o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo, kowa prindjrella ninna o Debles, leskro dades.
62002024	Tumenge penau: Rikrenn kol laba an tumare djia, hoi shunan, har tumer patslo wan! Te atchenn kol laba an tumende, hoi tumer shunan, har patslo wan, jaake atchenn tumer khetne o Debleskro tchaweha un o Debleha, maro dadeha.
62002025	Un tumer lenn ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa penas o Jesus Kristo menge.
62002026	Kawa tchinom tumenge, te mukenn tumen gar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell.
62002027	O Jesus Kristo das tumen o Debleskro Ducho. Kowa atchell an tumende. Doleske hunte well tumen kek wawar sikepaskro. O Debleskro Ducho sikrell tumende o tselo Debleskro drom. Un lauter, hoi job tumende sikrell, kowa hi tchatcho un kek chochepen. Krenn kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tumende sikrella! Jaake atchenn tumer o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
62002028	Un kanna, mire tchawe, atchenn pash leste, te well men kek traash, te well job pale. Jaake hunte ladjas men gar glan leste.
62002029	Tumer djinenna: O Jesus Kristo kras, hoi tchatcho hi glan o Debleste. Jaake djinenn tumer ninna: Kolla, kai krenn, hoi tchatcho hi glan o Debleste, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe.
62003001	Dikenn, har baro o Debleskro kamlepen menge hi. O Dewel, maro dad, penell ap mende: "Mire tchawe". Un tchatchepaha, kolla ham mer. Dran kowa haiwenn men kol menshe gar, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Jon haiwenn gar, koon job hi.
62003002	Latche phrala un phenja, kanna ham Debleskre tchawe. Un hoi mer wah an ko tsiro, hoi wella, djinah gomme gar. Jek djinah: Ap ko tsiro, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale, dikah les har job hi, un mer wah jaake, har job hi.
62003003	Un hakeno, kai kowa patsella, rikrell peskro dji djudjo, te well kek doosh ap leste, jaake har ap o Jesus Kristeste kek doosh hi.
62003004	Hakeno, kai o tchilatchepen krella, djiwell gar pal o Debleskro tchatchepen. Un kowa, kai djiwell gar pal o Debleskro tchatchepen, anell doosh ap peste.
62003005	Tumer djinenna, kai o Jesus Kristo was, te lell lo ko tchilatcho koowa krik, hoi kram. Tumer djinenn ninna, kai an leste kek tchilatchepen hi.
62003006	Hakeno, kai atchell o Jesus Kristeha khetne, djiwell gar an o tchilatchepen. Koon an o tchilatchepen djiwella, kowa djinell tchi o Jesus Kristestar, un haiwas les gar.
62003007	Tchowale, mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Tumer hunte djinenna, kolla, kai krenna, hoi tchatcho hi glan o Debleskre jaka, kolla hi an o tchatchepen tardo glan o Debleste jaake har o Jesus an o tchatchepen tardo hi glan o Debleste.
62003008	Kolla, kai djiwenn an o tchilatchepen, kolla hi o bengestar. O beng krella o tchilatchepen jaake raha, har job koi hi. Doleske was o Debleskro tchawo ap kai phub, te phagell lo o bengeskri soor.
62003009	Kolla, kai o Debleskre tchawe hi, djiwenn gar an o tchilatchepen. O Debleskre tchawen hi o Debleskro djipen an lende. Un jon nai djiwenn gar an o tchilatchepen.
62003010	Hakeno, kai gar kowa krella, hoi hi tchatcho glan o Debleskre jaka, kowa hi gar o Deblestar. Witar gar hi kowa o Deblestar, kai peskro phrales gar o djijestar kamella. Ap kowa dikell hakeno, koon o Debleskre tchawe hi, un koon o bengeskre tchawe hi.
62003011	Ko lab, hoi tumer shunan, har patslo wan, hi kowa: Mer patsle hunte kamas men jek o wawares o djijestar.
62003012	Mer hunte was gar har o Kain. Kowa his o bengestar un maras peskro phrales. Hoske maras lo les? Leskro phraal kras, hoi latcho his. Un o Kain kras, hoi tchilatcho his. Doleske maras o Kain peskro phrales.
62003013	Mire phrala, krenn kek bare jaka, te hi i menshe ap kai phub chojedo ap tumende!
62003014	Mer hams mulo, kanna djiwah. Hoske djinah kowa? Mer kamah i patslen o djijestar. Kowa sikrell mende, kai wam dran o merepen an o djipen. Koon o wawar patsles gar kamella, kowa hi mulo un atchell mulo.
62003015	Djinenn, hakeno, kai hi krell peskro phraleske tchilatchepen, kowa hi har jek, kai marell peskro phrales. Un kowa, kai marell peskro phrales, koles hi gar ko djipen an leste, hoi gar pre-herella.
62003016	O Jesus sikras mende, har o Debleskro kamlepen hi. Job mukas peskro djipen menge. Jaake mukas mer ninna maro djipen i patslenge.
62003017	Te hi jek brawelo, un dikell, kai peskro phrales gar doha djipaske hi, un job dell les tchi, jaake nai atchell gar o Debleskro kamlepen an leste.
62003018	Mire tchawe, mer te kras gar bare laba te penah, kai kamah i menshen i djijestar. Na-a, o tchatcho kamlepen dikenn le ap kowa, hoi jek o wawareske krella.
62003019	Te kamah i menshen jaake, djinah, kai ham an o tchatchepen. Jaake hunte trashas gar o Deblestar.
62003020	Ninna te penell menge maro dji: "Tu djiwal gar jaake, har hunte wess," palle hi o Dewel bareder har maro dji, un djinell lauter.
62003021	Latche phrala un phenja, te penell menge maro dji gar, te lam doosh ap mende, hi men kek traash, te was glan o Debleste.
62003022	Un lauter, hoi mer lestar mangah, kowa lah mer, te rikrah men ap kowa, hoi job menge penas, un djiwah jaake, har job kamella.
62003023	Un kawa kamell o Dewel mendar: te patsas mer ap leskro tchaweste, o Jesus Kristeste, un te kamas men, jek o wawares o djijestar, jaake har o Jesus Kristo les menge penas.
62003024	Koon kowa krella, hoi job menge penas, kowa atchell o Debleha khetne. Un o Dewel atchell leha khetne. O Dewel das men peskro Ducho. Un kowa sikrell mende, te hi o Dewel mentsa.
62004001	Latche phrala un phenja, ma patsenn hakenes, koon penella, te hi les o Debleskro Ducho! Dikenn ap leskro rakepen, te djinenn tumer, te well kowa tchatchepaha o Deblestar! Bud chochene rakepangre nashenn ap i phub trujal. Kolla penenna i menshenge, te well lengro rakepen o Deblestar. Kowa hi gar tchatcho.
62004002	Har nai djinah, te hi o Debleskro Ducho an jekeste? Hakeno, kai penell glan i menshende, kai o Jesus Kristo was i mensho dran mass un rat, koles hi o Debleskro Ducho.
62004003	Koon kowa buchoste della, an koleste hi gar o Debleskro Ducho. Jaake rakrell o chocheno, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste. Tumer shunan, kai kowa wella. Job hi kanna ap kai phub.
62004004	Mire tchawe, tumer han o Deblestar, un han sorleder har kol chochene rakepangre. O Debleskro Ducho, kai an tumende hi, hi sorleder har o beng, kai an i menshende hi, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna.
62004005	I chochene rakepangre hi menshe kai phubjatar. Doleske rakrenn le har i menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Un i menshe shunenn ap lende.
62004006	Mer ham o Deblestar, un hakeno, koon o Debles prindjrella, shunell ap mende. Koon hi gar o Deblestar, kowa shunell gar ap mende. Doleske djinah mer, kones o Debleskro Ducho hi, kai rakrell o tchatchepen, un kones o chocheno ducho hi.
62004007	Latche phrala un phenja, o djijeskro kamlepen wella o Deblestar. Doleske hunte well men i dji mare phralenge un phenjenge an o patsepen. Kolen, kai hi i dji i wawarenge, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe, un prindjrenn o Debles.
62004008	O Dewel hi pherdo djijeskro kamlepen. Kones kek dji o wawareske hi, kowa prindjrell o Debles gar.
62004009	O Dewel sikras men peskro kamlepen, har bitchras lo peskro tchawes ap kai phub, te las mer lestar o tchatcho djipen.
62004010	Kawa hi o Debleskro kamlepen: Hi gar jaake, kai mer kamam o Debles. Na-a, job kamas men, un bitchras peskro tchawes, te lell job mari doosh ap peste.
62004011	Latche phrala un phenja, o Debles hi sawo baro dji menge. Doleske hunte well men ninna i baro dji mare phralenge un phenjenge an o patsepen.
62004012	Kek mensho dikas o Debles. Te hi men i dji i wawar patslenge, atchell o Dewel mentsa. Un leskro tselo kamlepen hi an mende.
62004013	O Dewel das men peskro Ducho. Ap kowa haiwah mer, kai o Dewel mentsa hi, un mer leha ham.
62004014	Mer dikam, kai o Dewel, maro dad, peskro tchawes bitchras. Doleske penah mer i menshenge, kai job kowa hi, kai lell len win dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.
62004015	Koon glan i menshende penella, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi, koleha atchell o Dewel, un job atchell o Debleha.
62004016	Mer haiwam ko tchatcho kamlepen, hoi o Debles menge hi. Un mer patsah, te kamell men o Dewel tchatchepaha! O Dewel hi pherdo kamlepen. Koon an o Debleskro kamlepen atchella, kowa atchella o Debleha, un o Dewel atchell leha.
62004017	Mer te ham pherdo Debleskro kamlepen, palle hi men buder kek daar glan o Debleste ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen wi-rakrella pral i tsele menshende. Ninna te ham mer kanna ap kai phub, ham mer o Debleha khetne, jaake har o Jesus Kristo o Debleha khetne hi.
62004018	Kones o Debleskro kamlepen an peste hi, koles hi kek traash. O Debleskro kamlepen tradell i traash win. Koon trashella, te nai lell lo i phagi, koles hi gar o tselo Debleskro kamlepen an peste.
62004019	O Dewel kamas men o djijestar. Doleske kamah mer o Debles un i menshen ninna.
62004020	Te penell jek: "Me kamau o Debles," un krell peskro phraleske tchilatchepen, kowa hi i chocheno. Job kamell gar peskro phrales, koles job nai dikella. Har nai kamell lo o Debles, koles job nai gar dikella?
62004021	Kawa hi, hoi o Jesus menge penas: Koon o Debles kamella, kowa hunte kamell ninna peskro phrales o tselo djijestar.
62005001	Kolla, kai patsenna, kai o Jesus o baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe. Un hakeno, kai kamell o dades, kowa kamell ninna leskre tchawen.
62005002	Kawa haiwam: Mer te kamah o Debles tchatchepaha, un krah, hoi job penella, palle kamah leskre tchawen ninna.
62005003	Maro kamlepen o Debleske sikrell pes, te krah mer kowa, hoi job menge penella. Un kowa, hoi job menge penella te kras, kowa hi gar pharo.
62005004	Hoske? Kolla, kai o Debleskre tchawe hi, hunte krenn buder gar ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna. Maro patsepen hi mari soor pral o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna.
62005005	Awa, kowa, kai patsella, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi, koles hi i soor pral o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe krenna.
62005006	O Jesus Kristo was pash mende. Job was o Debleske an o pani thodo, un meras ap o trushel. Har meras lo, ratas lo peskro rat. Hi gar kokres leskro thopen an o pani, na-a, ninna leskro rat sikrell mende, kai job o Debleskro tchawo hi. Un o Debleskro Ducho penell menge kowa ninna. Un o Debleskro Ducho penell o tchatchepen.
62005007	Kolla hi triin, kai sikrenn mende, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi:
62005008	O Debleskro Ducho, ko pani un ko rat. Hake triin penenn ko jek koowa.
62005009	Te shunah mer ap i menshende un patsah, hoi jon penenna, hoske patsah gar, hoi o Dewel penella? Kowa, hoi o Dewel penella, hi bareder har kowa, hoi i menshe penenna. Un o Dewel penas, kai o Jesus Kristo peskro tchawo hi.
62005010	Koon ap o Debleskro tchaweste patsella, kowa djinella an peskro dji, kai hi kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel pral o Jesus Kristeste penas. Koon o Debles gar patsella un leskre laba gar patsella, hoi o Dewel pral peskro tchaweste penas, kowa penella, te chochas o Dewel.
62005011	O Dewel penas tchatchepaha, te dell lo men ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un ko djipen hi an peskro tchaweste.
62005012	Kones o tchawo an peskro dji hi, koles hi ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kones o Debleskro tchawo gar an peskro dji hi, koles hi ko djipen gar.
62005013	Me tchinom tumenge, te djinenn tumer, kai tumen ko djipen hi, hoi gar pre-herella. Ko djipen hi kolenge, kai ap o Debleskro tchaweste patsenna.
62005014	Ko jek djinah: Te mangah o Deblestar tchomone, jaake har job kowa kamella, jaake shunell lo men.
62005015	Un te djinah mer, kai job men shunella, djinah mer ninna, kai job men kowa das, hoi mer lestar mangam.
62005016	Te dikeh tu, te kras i wawar patslo i tchilatcho koowa, palle hunte mangess tu o Debles leske! Un o Dewel dell les o djipen. Della ninna i doosh, hoi anell an o merepen. Un me penau gar, te mangess tu o Debles kolenge, kai koi doosh ap pende lan.
62005017	Hako kopo, kai mer i tchilatcho koowa krah, anah mer doosh ap mende. Gar haki doosh anell i menshen an o merepen.
62005018	Mer djinah, o Debleskre tchawe atchenn gar ap i tchilatcho drom. O Debleskro tchawo dell garda ap lende. Un o beng nai krell len tchi.
62005019	Mer djinah, kai ham o Deblestar. I tsele wawar menshe ap i phub hi an o bengeskro wast.
62005020	Mer djinah, kai o Debleskro tchawo ap kai phub was, te krell lo mare jaka pre, te prindjras o tchatcho Debles. Un jaake har mer ham khetne o Debleskro Tchaweha, o Jesus Kristeha, jaake ham khetne o tchatcho Debleha. O Jesus Kristo hi o tchatcho Dewel. Un job dell ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
62005021	Doleske, mire tchawe, denn jak, te mangenn o tchatcho Debles kokres an un kek wawares!
63001001	Me, i phureder mank i patslende, tchinau ap koi rajetsa, kolat o Dewel peske win rodas, un ap lakre tchawende. Me kamau tumen o tselo djijestar, un gar me kokres, ninna kol wawar, kai prindjrenn o tchatchepen, kamenn tumen o djijestar.
63001002	O tchatchepen atchell an mende, un hi pash mende hako tsiro. Doleske kamah tumen o djiestar.
63001003	Latchepen, kamlepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell men o Dewel, maro dad, un leskro tchawo, o Jesus Kristo, an o dji. Un jaake atchah mer khetne an o Debleskro tchatchepen un kamlepen.
63001004	Me homs bachtelo, kai hatsom menshe tumendar, kai an o tchatchepen djiwenna, jaake har o Dewel, maro dad, kowa kamella.
63001005	Romnija, kanna tchinau tuke un tire tchawenge i lab, hoi hi tumenge kek newo lab. Tumer shunan les, har wan patslo. Mangau tumendar, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar!
63001006	Te krah mer kowa, hoi o Dewel penas, sikrah mer, kai kamah les. Un kowa, hoi job penas, te kras, shunan tumer, har wan patsle.
63001007	Bud chochene sikepangre nashenn ap i phub trujal, kai kamenn i patslen o tchatcho dromestar tele te anell. Jon penenna, kai was o Jesus Kristo gar i mensho dran mass un rat. Kol sikepangre wenna gar o Deblestar. Jaake har jon rakrenna, jaake rakrell ninna ko chocheno, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste.
63001008	Denn jak, te nashrenn gar kowa, hoi mer tumen sikram, te well tumen ninna ko tselo brawlepen, hoi o Dewel kamell tumen te dell.
63001009	Hakeno, koon atchell gar pash kol laba, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge penas, un penell wawar koowa, kowa atchella gar o Debleha. Kowa, kai atchell pash kol laba, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge penas, kowa atchell o Debleha, maro dadeha, un peskro Tchaweha.
63001010	Te well jek pash tumende, un penell tumenge wawar koowa har kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge penas, koles lenn gar an tumaro kheer! Parkrenn les witar gar!
63001011	Koon les parkrella, koles hi ninna doosh ap leskro tchilatcho koowa, hoi job krella.
63001012	Me nai penoms tumenge gomme bud. Kowa kamau gar lauter an i liil te tchinell. Shukeder wals, te nai woms pash tumende, un rakroms tumentsa, te wenn mare djia pherdo bacht.
63001013	I tchawe tiri wi-rodedi phenjatar, penenn tuke latche laba.
64001001	Me, i phureder mank i patslende, tchinau tuke, latcho Gajo, kau liil. Me kamau tut o tselo djijestar.
64001002	Latcho phraal, me mangau o Debles, te djal tuke mishto, un te wess sasto jaake, har sasto hal an tiro patsepen.
64001003	Bachtelo homs, har mare phrala wan un mange penan, har tu ap o tchatcho drom djah, un pal o tchatchepen djiweh.
64001004	Pral kek wawar koowa hom jaake bachtelo, har te shunap, kai mire tchawe ap o tchatcho drom djana.
64001005	Latcho phraal, tu kreh i latchi budi tire phralenge, ninna te prindjreh len gar.
64001006	Jon penan tutar glan i patslende, kai kate khetne wenna, hawo baro kamlepen tut hi. Jon te djan ap pengro drom dureder, de len chapen un pipen peha, jaake har kowa glan o Debleskre jaka mishto hi.
64001007	Jon kran pen ap o drom, te penenn le i menshenge o Jesus Kristestar. Un jon lenn tchi kolendar, kai les gar prindjrenna.
64001008	Doleske hunte das mer sawe phralen kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske. Jaake budrah mer lentsa, te well o Debleskro tchatchepen i menshenge penlo.
64001009	Me tchinom i tikno liil ap i patslende, kai kote khetne wenna, kai hal. Jek lendar hi o Diotrefes. Kowa kamell o pralstuno mashkral lende te well, un shunell gar ap mande.
64001010	Te wau me pash tumende, penau me leske, hoi job lauter kras. Job anell o chochepen pral mende pre. Un kowa hi leske gar doha. Job lell gar i patsle phralen pre, kai wenna pash leste. Un kolla, kai kamenn len pash pende pre te lell, kolenge penell lo, te krenn le kowa gar, un witsrell len dran i kangri win.
64001011	Latcho phraal, ma kre o tchilatchepen palla! Kre o latchepen! Kowa, kai krell latcho koowa, well o Deblestar. Kowa, kai o tchilatchepen krella, kowa prindjrell o Debles gar.
64001012	O Demetrio krell o latchepen. Lauter rakrenn mishto pral leste. Un leskro djipen sikrella, te hi lo an o tchatchepen tardo. Mer ninna penah, kai kowa, hoi job krella, mishto hi. Un tu djineh, kai kowa, hoi mer penah, tchatcho hi.
64001013	Me hunte penoms tuke jaake bud. Kowa kamau gar lauter an i liil te tchinell.
64001014	Wals mishto, te dikams men jaake sik, har djala. Koi rakrams nai pral lauter.
64001015	O Debleskri bacht tuke! Kol mala pash mande penenn tuke "Atch maro Debleha!" Pen latche laba mandar mire malenge, kai pash tute hi, pen kowa hakeneske peskro labeha!"
65001001	Me, o Judas, tchinau kau liil ap tumende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas. Job hi tumaro dad un kamell tumen o djijestar. Un o Jesus Kristo dell garda ap tumende. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro budepaskro un o Jakobeskro phraal.
65001002	O Debleskro kamlepen, bacht un latchepen well bud un budeder pral tumende!
65001003	Mire phrala un phenja, his i tsiro, kai kamoms tumenge an i liil te tchinell, har latcho o Dewel ap mende hi, te las lo men dran o tchilatchepen wi. Pral kowa kamau me kanna buder gar te tchinell. Kanna dikau, hi feteder, te tchinap tumenge, te atchenn soreles an o patsepen. Ma mukenn tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Leskro lab, hoi tumenge penlo was, atchell tchatcho hako tsiro.
65001004	Me shunom, hi menshe koi, hoi tchorchanes mank tumende wan. Kolla kamenn o Deblestar tchi djinell. Jon penenn, te hi o Dewel latcho, un te nai krenn le lauter, hoi jon kamenna. Jaake djiwenn le i wi-ladjedo djipen, un denn maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes, buchoste. Kowa kokres hi maro rai. Glan i raha tsiro hi tchindlo, te lenn jon pengri phagi.
65001005	Ninna te djinenn tumer kowa lauter, kamau, te bistrenn gar, har o Dewel, maro rai, peskre menshen dran o them Egiptia win las. Un ap i wawar tsiro maras lo kolen, hoi gar patsan.
65001006	Ma bistrenn witar gar kol bolepangren, kai dan gar garda ap koi budi, hoi o Dewel len das, un mukan pengro kheer an o bolepen. Kolen pandas lo i shellentsa, hoi kek tsireske buder pre kerdo wenn. Un job rikrell len stildo an i kali rat, bis te well ko baro diwes, kai i phagi pral lende wi-rakedo wella.
65001007	Jaake lan ninna kol menshe i phagi, kai djiwan an i forja Sodom un Gomorra un an kol forja trul lende. Jon kran wi-ladjedo koowa har kol bolepangre un djan wawar mass palla. I phagi, hoi pral kol menshende was, sikrell mende, hoi kolenge djal, kai sawo koowa krenna. Jon djan an i jag, hoi hako tsiro chatchella.
65001008	Un jaake hi ninna kolla, kai dikenn sunja, un krenn wi-ladjedo koowa, un kamenn kek rajes pral pende, un rakrenn djungeles pral kolende an o bolepen.
65001009	O Debleskro baro bolepaskro, leskro lab hi Michael, las peske gar win, te praassell lo o benges, har job tchingras pes o bengeha, koon lendar lals o mulo Moses. Job penas leske kokres: "O Dewel, maro rai, dell tut i phagi!"
65001010	Kolla menshe praassenn lauter, hoi le gar prindjrenna. Kowa, hoi lengro mass kamella, kowa krenn le jaake har i fiche, kai tchi djinenna. Un jaake djan le nashedo.
65001011	Bibacht well ap lende! Jon djan ap o tchilatcho drom, kai ninna o Kain djas. Un i lowenge anenn le doosh ap pende, jaake har o Bileam kras. Un jaake har o Korach merenn le. O Korach hadas pes peskre menshentsa pral o Debleskre murshende.
65001012	Kol menshenge hunte ladjenn tumen. Te wenn tumer khetne, te pijenn un te chan, palle chan jon pen thules pash tumende un ladjenn pen gar. Jon dikenn ap pende kokres, te djal lenge kokres mishto. Jon krenn bare laba, hoi tchi moldo hi. Jon hi har ruka, ap kolende tchi baro wella, witar kek patria, un kai hi tseles mulo un wenn tele dino.
65001013	Jon hi har diwje panja, hoi witsrenn pengro tchik, hoi an lende hi, win ap i phub glan lende. Jon hi har bolepangre momlia, hoi dran pengro drom win djan, un hunte djan kanna hako tsireske an i kali rat.
65001014	Glan i raha tsiro penas pral lende o Henoch, kowa his o eftato dad pal o Adam: Dikenn, o Dewel, maro rai, well dran o bolepen. Un bud serja bolepangre hi pash leste.
65001015	Job well, te rakrell lo o tchatchepen wi pral i tsele menshende, un te dell lo kolen i phagi, kai djan gar ap o Debleskro drom un kran gar, hoi job kamas, un tchingran ap leste tchilatche labentsa.
65001016	Kolla hi sawe menshe, kolenge kowa gar mishto doha hi, hoi o Dewel len das. Un jon choirenn pen, kai lenge gar feteder djal. Jon djiwenn pal pengro shero. Jon hi sharede, kai rakrenn shukar labentsa i menshentsa, te lenn le lendar latcho koowa.
65001017	Tumer, mire prala un phenja, ma bistrenn kol laba, hoi tumenge kolla penan, kolen maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, bitchras, te penenn le i menshenge leskre laba.
65001018	Jon penan: Glan ko tsiro, kai maro rai Jesus pale wella, wenna sawe menshe, hoi san pral o Debleskro koowa, un djiwenn jaake, har jon kamenna un krenn, hoi o Dewel gar kamella.
65001019	An lengro shero hi phubjakro koowa. Un an lengro dji hi gar o Debleskro Ducho. Kolla anenn tchingepen un krenn, te rikrenn i patsle buder gar khetne.
