65001020	Tumer, mire phrala un phenja, atchenn soreles an tumaro patsepen, hoi das tumen o Dewel. Un mangenn les jaake, har leskro Ducho an tumende kamell.
65001021	Un rikrenn tumen an o Debleskro kamlepen! Un dikenn ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste! Kowa hi jaake latcho ap mende, te dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
65001022	Awenn latches ap kol menshende, kai djinenn gar, hoi te patsenn, un jek kopo kawa patsenn un ko wawar kopo kowa. Krenn lengre djia soreles!
65001023	Wawar nashran pen. Kolen anenn ap o tchatcho drom! Kowa hi jaake har te tsardans len dran i jag win. Wawar djiwenn i djungelo djipen. Rakrenn ninna kolenge latches an o dji! Un denn garda, te krenn gar kowa, hoi jon krenna. Lengro djipen hi har i tchiklo ripen ap lende.
65001024	Maro Debles hi i soor, te rikrell lo tumen ap leskro drom, te hatsell lo kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai han glan leste tardo, un dikenn leskro railepen, un han bachteles.
65001025	Sharas koles, kai kokres o Dewel hi! Job las men dran o tchilatchepen win, har maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, menge meras. Maro Dewel hi o baro rai. Les hi i tseli soor kanna un glan kau tsiro un an ko tsiro, hoi wella. Amen.
66001001	An kau liil hi kowa tchindlo, hoi o Dewel mukas o Jesus Kristes te dikell, te sikrell job peskre budepangren, hoi an i tikno tsiro hunte wella. Un o Jesus Kristo bitchras peskro bolepaskres pash mande, te sikrell lo mande kawa lauter. Me, o Johanni, hom leskro budepaskro
66001002	un tchinom kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo mande sikras, an kau liil. Kolla laba wenna o Deblestar. Lauter, hoi dikom, tchinom pre.
66001003	Bachtelo hi kowa, kai drawerell kal laba. Un bachtele hi kolla, kai shunenn kal laba, un rikrenn len an pengre djia. O tsiro hi gar dur, kai kawa lauter wella.
66001004	Me, o Johanni, tchinau kau liil ap i tsele patslende, kai an i efta forja an o them Asia khetne wenna. Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel! Job djiwella hako tsiro: kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi his un hoi wella! Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Debleskro Ducho! Kowa hi har efta jaga glan o Debleskro beshepaskro tardo.
66001005	Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Jesus Kristo! Job sikrell i menshende o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste. Un job hi o glanstuno lauterendar, kai stenn i mulendar pre un wenn djido. Un job hi ninna o rai pral i tsele raja ap kai phub! Job kamell men o tselo djijestar, un las men dran mari doosh win, un plaissras menge peskro rateha.
66001006	Job kras men raja un rashaja o Debleske, peskro dadeske. Leske hi o railepen un i soor kanna un hako tsireske! Amen.
66001007	Dikenn, job wella dran o bolepen, un hakeno dikell les, ninna kolla, kai les ap o trushel dan. Un an hake themma rowenn le pral leste, un penenn le: "Patsams mer ap leste!" Awa, jaake hunte well kowa. Amen.
66001008	O baro Dewel penella: "Mandar was halauter. Un lauter wella pale glan mande. Man hi i tseli soor, un djiwau hako tsireske: kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi his un hoi wella."
66001009	Me, o Johanni, hom tumaro phraal an o patsepen ap o Jesuseste. Job hi miro baro rai har job tumaro baro rai hi. Jaake har tumer wenn leske palla lino, wom me ninna leske palla lino un dom miro patsepen gar pre. Me penom i menshenge o Debleskro lab, un sikrom lende o Jesuseskro drom. Doleske wom stildo un anlo ap ko them Patmos, kai an o baro pani tchiddo hi.
66001010	Ap o Debleskro diwes was o Debleskro Ducho soreles pral mande. Un me shunom pal mande i sorelo rakepen. Kowa his har i gole, hoi dell i bashepaskri, kai phurdeh dre.
66001011	Un ko rakepen penas: "Tchin an i liil, hoi tu dikeh! Un bitche ko liil ap kol patslende, kai an kol efta forja khetne wenna: Efesus, Smirna, Pergamon, Tiatira, Sardes, Filadelfia un Laodicea!"
66001012	Un me risrom man trujal, te dikap koles, kai ap mande rakras. Un har risrom man trujal, dikom efta sonakangre momlia.
66001013	Un mashkral lende his jek tardo, hoi wi-dikas har i mensho. Les his i lengsto ripen ap leste, un i sonakaskri dori trul leskro betch.
66001014	Leskre balla ap o shero his parno har i bakrengre balla, har gib. Un leskre jaka chatchan har i jag.
66001015	Un leskre herja his har dran sonakai, hoi an o bob chatchedo un thodo wella. Un leskro rakepen his har i gole i baro panjestar, hoi dur tele perella.
66001016	Un an leskro tchatcho wast his les efta bolepangre momlia. Un dran leskro mui was i charo, hoi ap dui riga nai tchinella. Un leskro mui his har o kham.
66001017	Un har dikom les, perom glan leskre herja khetne, har woms mulo. Un job tchiwas peskro tchatcho wast ap mande, un penas: "Ma dare! Mandar was halauter. Un lauter wella pale glan mande.
66001018	Me hom o djido. Un me homs mulo, un kanna hom djido un djiwau hako tsireske. Man hi i soor pral o merepen. Un man hi o klidepaskro an o mulengro them.
66001019	Tchin lauter, hoi dikal, an i liil: kowa, hoi kanna hi, un kowa, hoi pal kowa lauter wella.
66001020	Me kamau te haiwess, hoi kol efta bolepangre momlia hi, hoi tu an miro tchatcho wast dikal. Te haiwess ninna, hoi kol sonakangre momlia hi! Kol efta bolepangre momlia hi o Debleskre budepangre, kai denn jak ap i patslende, kai an i efta forja khetne wenna. Un i efta sonakangre momlia hi i patsle, kai wenn khetne an i efta forja."
66002001	"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Efesus: Kawa penell kowa, kai rikrell kol efta bolepangre momlia an peskro tchatcho wast, un kai djal mashkral kol efta sonakangre momlia trujal.
66002002	Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer mange kran, tumari tseli phari budi. Tumer dan tumaro patsepen gar pre. Un tumer mukenn gar tchilatche menshe mashkral tumende te well. Un tumer lan kolen an o jak, hoi penan, te hi le o Jesuseskre bitchepangre, un jon hi kowa gar. Un tumer haiwan, te chochan le.
66002003	Tumer dan tumaro patsepen gar pre, un lan i pharo djipen mange ap tumende, un tumer wan gar khino an tumari budi mange.
66002004	Jek koowa hi pash tumende, hoi hi gar mishto: Tumer kamenn man buder gar o tselo djijestar, jaake har kowa his ap ko tsiro, har tumer patslo wan. Tumaro dji mukas man.
66002005	Mukenn tumenge kowa an o shero te djal, har dur tumer mandar tele peran. Awenn pale o tselo djijeha pash mande! Djiwenn ko djipen, hoi djiwan, har tumaro patsepen ap mande tarno his. Te krenn kowa gar, palle wau, un lau tumari momeli krik, un tchiwrau lat ap i rig.
66002006	Kate hi tchomone, hoi tumer krenn latches. Tumer kamenn gar, hoi kol Nikolarja krenna, jaake har me kowa witar gar kamau.
66002007	Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende! Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, koles dau te chal ko rukestar, hoi o djipen della, kowa, hoi tardo hi an o Debleskri shukar baar."
66002008	"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Smirna: Kawa penell kowa, hoi hi o glanstuno un o palstuno, hoi mulo his, un djido was.
66002009	Me djinau, te lenn le tumen palla. Ninna djinau, har tchorwelo han. Tchatchepaha han tumer brawelo! Me djinau ninna, te rakrenn kolla djungeles pral tumende, kai penenn pendar, te hi le Debleskre menshe. Jon hi kek Debleskre menshe. Na-a, jon hi bengeskre menshe.
66002010	Ma darenn kol duka, hoi ap tumende wenna! O beng mukell menshen tumendar an o stilepen te witsrell, te well diklo, har sorelo tumaro patsepen ap mande hi. Un tumer wenn deesh diwessa palla lino. Atchenn soreles an tumaro patsepen ap mande, ninna te marenn le tumen! Palle dau tumen ko shukar koowa, hoi kolla lenna, kai hi i sorleder an o kurepen. Un kowa hi o djipen, hoi atchella.
66002011	Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende! Kolla, kai soreles an o patsepen atchan, un gar pre dan, kolla merenn gar o duito kopo."
66002012	"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Pergamon: Kawa penell kowa, koles o charo hi, hoi ap dui riga tchinella.
66002013	Me djinau, tumer djiwenn kote, kai o beng o rai pral i menshende hi. Tumer rikrenn soreles ap mande, un mukan o patsepen gar, ninna an kol diwessa, har was o Antipas maredo, har job i menshenge mandar rakras an tumaro foro, kai o beng djiwella.
66002014	I tikno koowa pash tumende hi gar mishto. Mashkral tumende hi sawe menshe, kai djan ap ko drom, koles o Bileam glan i raha tsiro i menshende sikras. Job sikras o baro rajeste pral o them Moab, - leskro lab his Balak, - har te anell lo nai i Israelitarja ap i tchilatcho drom. Jaake chan i Israelitarja ko mass kol fichendar, hoi kol wawar menshe glan lengro debleste anan. Ninna djan le pash wawar djuwjende.
66002015	Jaake hi ninna mashkral tumende sawe menshe, kai ap kowa patsenna, hoi kol Nikolarja penenn.
66002016	Krenn kanna ko tchilatcho koowa buder gar! Te mukenn tumer kowa gar, jaake wau an i tikno tsiro, un tchingrau ap kolende, kai shunan gar ap mande. Un miro rakepen tchinella har i charo.
66002017	Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende! Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, koles dau ko maro dran o bolepen te chal, hoi kharella Manna. Ninna dau les i parno bar. Ap koleste hi o newo lab tchindlo, koles kek prindjrell, har kowa, kai les lella."
66002018	"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Tiatira: Kawa penell o Debleskro tchawo, koles hi jaka har i jag, un herja har sonakai.
66002019	Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer mange krenn. Tumer kamenn man o djijestar, un rikrenn soreles ap mande. Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer tumare phralenge krenna. Un tumer wan gar khino an tumaro patsepen. Kowa, hoi tumer kanna krenna, hi ninna budeder har kowa, hoi kran, har patslo wan.
66002020	Jek koowa hi gar mishto pash tumende. Tumer mukenn koi djuwel Isebel te rakrell, hoi joi kamella, koja, hoi penell, te hi li o Debleskri rakepaskretsa. Joi tsardell mire budepangren o Debleskro dromestar tele un penell lenge, te nai djan i mursha pash wawar djuwjende, un i djuwja pash wawar murshende. Ninna penell li lenge, te nai chan le ko mass, hoi wawar menshe glan lengro debleste anan.
66002021	Me dom lat tsiro, te nai mukell li peskro tchilatcho drom. Un joi kamell gar peskro djungelo koowa te mukell.
66002022	Doleske witsrau lat ap o nasslengro tchiben. Un kolla, kai laha sowan, jon te mukenn kowa gar, palle anau bare duka ap lende.
66002023	Un kolakre tchawen dau mulo. Palle haiwenn i tsele patsle, te hom me kowa, kai lauter prindjrella, hoi i menshen an o shero un an o dji hi. Un hakeno, kai tchilatcho koowa kras, kowa lell mandar koi phagi pal kowa, hoi job kras.
66002024	Tumer wawar patsle an o foro Tiatira, kai gar pal kol chochene laba djiwan, un ko bengeskro drom gar prindjrenna, ap tumende penau me: Me penau tumenge tchi wawar koowa, hoi tumer hunte krenna,
66002025	har kowa, te rikrenn mire laba soreles an tumare djia, jaake raha bis te wau pale.
66002026	Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, un krell lauter, hoi me kamau, jaake raha har djiwell lo, koleste dau i soor, te well lo rai pral i menshende an i wawar themma.
66002027	Job anell len i sasterno wasteha un dell lauteren paash, kai gar ap leste shunenna, jaake har tchare paash dino wenna.
66002028	Jaake har das man miro dad peskri soor, jaake dau me koles miri soor. Ninna dau les ko bolepaskri momeli, hoi djal pre taissarlake ap o bolepen.
66002029	Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"
66003001	"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Sardes: Kawa penell kowa, koleske o Debleskro Ducho koi hi, un koles i efta bolepangre momlia an o wast hi. Me djinau lauter, hoi tumer kran. Tumer han mulo, ninna te penenn le pral tumende, te han djido.
66003002	Stenn pre o sopastar! Mashkral tumende hi gomme menshe, kai patsenn ap mande. Kolla hi gar bud. Un lengro patsepen hi tikno. Krenn lengro patsepen pale soreles! Glan miro Debleste hi kowa gar mishto doha, hoi tumer mange krenn.
66003003	Ma bistrenn, hoi tumenge penlo was un hoi shunan! Un rikrenn ap kal laba! Un awenn pale ap o tchatcho drom! Te krenn kowa gar, un stenn gar pre o sopastar, palle wau pral tumende har i tchorepaskro. Un tumer djinenn gar, hawo tsireske pale wau.
66003004	Ninna te hi gar bud patsle an o foro Sardes, kai djan ap miro drom, hi sawe patsle mank tumende, kai kran pengre koola gar tchiklo. Kolla hi moldo, te wenn le rido an parne koola, un djiwenn mantsa an o bolepen.
66003005	Koon sorleder hi har o tchilatchepen, kowa lella parne ripja. Un leskro lab lau me gar win dran o liil, kai i djide dre tchindlo hi. Ninna penau glan miro dadeste un glan leskre bolepangre, kai jon hi mire.
66003006	Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"
66003007	"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Filadelfia: Kawa penell o Debleskro tchatchepaskro. Koles hi o Davideskro klidepaskro an o wast. Job te krell o wudar pre, palle nai krell les kek pale pandlo. Job te krell o wudar pandlo, palle nai krell les kek pre.
66003008	Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer mange kran. Dikenn, me krom i wudar glan tumende pre, hoi kek nai pandell. Tumen hi i tikni soor, un rikran miro lab an tumare djia, un dan man gar buchoste.
66003009	Shunenn, hoi me kol bengeskre menshentsa krau, kai chochenn un penenn pendar, te hi le o Debleskre menshe, un jon hi kek Debleskre menshe. Me krau, te wenn lendar pash tumende, te witsrenn le pen glan tumende ap i phub, un te haiwenn le, te kamau tumen o tselo djijestar.
66003010	Tumer rikran ko lab, hoi tumenge penom, un wan gar khino an o patsepen ap mande. Doleske rikrau mire wasta pral tumende an ko pharo tsiro, kai i bibacht wella pral i tsele menshende ap kai phub, te well diklo, hoi an lengre djia hi.
66003011	Me wau an i tikno tsiro pale. Rikrenn tumaro patsepen soreles, te lell kek wawar ko shukar koowa tumendar, hoi tumenge an o bolepen hi, un hoi kolla lenna, kai dan pengro patsepen gar pre.
66003012	Kowa, kai rikras peskro patsepen bis ap o merepen, dran koleste krau me jekes, kai hi har i baro bar, kai rikrell miro Debleskro kheer. Un kowa atchell koi tardo hako tsireske. Un me tchinau o lab miro Deblestar ap leste, un o lab o Debleskro forestar. Kowa hi o newo Jerusalem, hoi dran o bolepen tele wella. Un miro newo lab tchinau ninna ap leste.
66003013	Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"
66003014	"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Laodicea: Kawa penell kowa, kai kharell Amen, un penell hako tsiro o tchatchepen, un sikrell i menshende o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste. Job his koi pashal, har o Dewel lauter kras.
66003015	Me djinau halauter, hoi tumer kran. Tumer han har i pipen, hoi hi gar shila, witar gar tato. Kamaus, te wenn tumer jek kolendar.
66003016	Tumer han paash tato. Doleske tchungrau tumen wi dran miro mui.
66003017	Tumer penenna: Mer ham brawelo, un men hi halauter; tchi hunte well men buder. Me penau tumenge: Tumer djinenn gar, te han an i bibacht, jaake te khaitenn tumer man. Tumer han tchorwelo, un nango, un korelo.
66003018	Doleske penau tumenge: Ginenn mandar sonakai, sawo sonakai, hoi an i jag thodo was, jaake te wenn tumer tchatchepaha brawelo. Ginenn mandar ninna parne ripja un riwenn kolla ap tumende, te han buder gar nango, un hunte ladjenn tumen buder gar. Un ginenn kutch djet, un makenn tumare jaka, te nai dikenn pale!
66003019	Lauteren, kai kamau o djijestar, kolende sikrau lengri doosh, un penau lenge dawentsa, te shunenn le ap mande. Mukenn kanna tumaro tchilatcho drom, un awenn pale ap miro drom!
66003020	Dikenn, me hom glan o wudar tardo, un dau ap ko wudar. Koon shunella, hoi me penau, un krell mange o wudar pre, pash koleste djau me dre, un chau leha, un job mantsa.
66003021	Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, kowa nai beshell pes mantsa ap miro rajeskro beshepaskro, jaake har me ninna homs sorleder har o tchilatchepen, un me beshom man miro dadeha ap leskro rajeskro beshepaskro.
66003022	Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"
66004001	Pal kowa dikom i wudar an o bolepen, hoi pre hi. Un kowa, kai ap mande rakras, un leskri gole sorelo har i bashepaskri his, kai phurdeh dre, kowa penas ap mande: "Ab kate pre! Me sikrau tut, hoi pal kawa wella."
66004002	Un ap jek kopo was o Debleskro Ducho soreles ap mande, un me dikom i rajeskro beshepaskro an o bolepen tardo. Un ap koleste his jek beshdo.
66004003	Leskro mui dikas jaake shukar win har kol kutch shukar barra Jaspis un Karneol. Un trul o rajeskro beshepaskro his i brishineskro bogo, kai dikas jaake win har ko shukar bar Smaragdo.
66004004	Un trul o rajeskro beshepaskro his biish-te-star wawar rajengre beshepangre tardo. Un ap kolende his biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure beshdo. Kolen his parne ripja ap lende, un i shereskro sonakai ap lengre shere.
66004005	Un kotar, kai ko rajeskro beshepaskro hi, das jag karje pral un tele, un was i bari gole win, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin un te djal jag tele ap i phub. Un glan o rajeskro beshepaskro chatchan efta jaga. Kol efta jaga hi o Debleskro Ducho.
66004006	Glan o rajeskro beshepaskro his tchomone har i baro pani dran wali. Kowa his jaake djudjo, te dikenn le nai dre, har dikenn le an i wali. Trul o rajeskro beshepaskro his star sorele bolepangre, jek ap haki rig. Kolla his pherde jaka glan un palla.
66004007	Un ko glanstuno sorelo bolepaskro his har i bari margodja. Un ko duito sorelo bolepaskro his har i tarni murshkani grumni. Un ko triinto sorelo bolepaskres his i mui har i menshes hi. Un ko starto sorelo bolepaskro his har i baro tchirklo an o bolepen.
66004008	Un hakenes lendar his shob tchirklengre mussja. Kolla his dren un win pherde jaka. Un jon giwenn o tselo diwes un i tseli rat: "Baro hi o Dewel, baro hi o Dewel, baro hi o Dewel. Job hi o rai pral halauter. Hako tsiro djiwell lo, kanna, un an ko tsiro, hoi his, un hoi wella."
66004009	Un jaake sharenn kol star sorele bolepangre koles, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un jon hadenn les un krenn les baro, un parkrenn pen pash leste, kai djiwell hako tsireske.
66004010	Hako kopo, kai krenn le kowa, witsrenn pen kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure glan koleste tele, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un sharenn koles, koleskro djipen gar pre-herella. Un jon tchiwenn pengro sherengro sonakai glan o rajeskro beshepaskro tele, un penenna:
66004011	"Tu, o Dewel, maro rai, tu hal moldo, te less o railepen, un o sharepen, un i soor. Tu kral o bolepen un i phub. Jaake, har tu kamal, jaake kral tu kowa, un was kowa."
66005001	Un me dikom i liil an o tchatcho wast kolestar, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi. Ap ko liil his dren un win tchomone tchindlo. Un ko liil his khetne pandlo efta dorjentsa.
66005002	Un me dikom i sorelo bolepaskres, kowa das soreles gole: "Koon hi moldo, te nai krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre?"
66005003	Un an o bolepen, un ap i phub, un tel i phub his kek koi, kai hi moldo, te krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre.
66005004	Un har dikom, te his kek moldo, te krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre, koi rowom soreles.
66005005	Un jek kol tchatchepangre phurendar penas ap mande: "Ma rob! Dik, jek las i soor o Deblestar pral o tchilatchepen un o merepen, un hi moldo, te krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre. Job hi kowa, kai kharenn le lewo, kai well dran o them Juda. Job hi o Davideskro tchawo."
66005006	Un me dikom i tarno bakres pash o rajeskro beshepaskro, hoi wi-dikas, har wals lo maredo. Kowa hi tardo mashkral kol star sorele bolepangre un kol tchatchepangre phurende. Les hi efta shinga un efta jaka. Kol efta jaka hi o Debleskro Ducho, hoi pral i tseli phub win bitchedo was.
66005007	Un o tarno bakro was pash koleste, hoi ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo his, un las ko liil dran leskro tchatcho wast.
66005008	Un har job las o liil, peran kol star sorele bolepangre un kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure glan o tarno bakro tele. Un hakenes lendar his i bashepaskri. Un jon bashran i shukar bashepen. Len his ninna sonakangre tchare pherdo gudlo kasht, hoi o Debleske chatchedo wella, un mishto sungella. Un kowa his o mangepen, hoi o Debleskre menshe pengro Deblestar mangan.
66005009	Un jon giwenn i newi gili, un penenn: Tu hal moldo, te less ko liil, un te kress ko liil pre. Tu wal maredo, un plaissral tiro rateha, te giness menshen tiro Debleske. Kolla wenna dran hako them, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen.
66005010	Un tu kreh lendar raja un rashaja maro Debleske. Un jon wenn raja pral i tseli phub.
66005011	Un me dikom un shunom bud bolepangren tardo trul o rajeskro beshepaskro, un trul kol star sorele bolepangre, un trul kol tchatchepangre phurende. Jon his jaake bud har deesh serja (10.000) kope deesh serja un jek sero kope jek sero.
66005012	Un jon giwenn soreles: O tarno bakro, hoi was maredo, kowa hi moldo, te well les i bari soor, ninna o brawlepen, un o goswepen, un o sharepen, un o railepen, un i gilja, hoi les hadenna, un bares krenna.
66005013	Un me shunom i gili, hoi lauter giwan, kai an o bolepen hi, un ap i phub, un tel i phub, un an o baro pani. Un jon giwenn: "Koleske, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi un ko tarno bakreske, kolenge hi i gilja, un o sharepen, un o railepen, un i soor pral lauter, kanna un hako tsireske."
66005014	Un kol star sorele bolepangre penan: Amen! Un kol tchatchepangre phure witsran pen glan o Debleste un glan o bakro tele, un sharan len.
66006001	Un me dikom, har ko tarno bakro jek kol efta dorjendar pre pandas, hoi ko liil khetne rikrenna. Un me shunom, har jek kol star sorele bolepangrendar soreles penas: "Ab!"
66006002	Un me dikom i parno grajes. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo hi, koles hi i bogo an o wast. Un les was i shereskro sonakai dino, hoi sikrella, te hi job sorleder har bud wawar bare raja. Un job djas wi an o kurepen, un was sorleder har jon halauter.
66006003	Un o bakro pandas o duiti dori pre, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Un me shunom, har ko duito sorelo bolepaskro penas: "Ab!"
66006004	Un i wawar grai was wi. Ko grai his lolo har i jag. Un kowa, hoi pre beshdo his, koles was i soor dino, te anell lo o kurepen ap i phub, jaake te marenn pen i menshe. Un les was i baro charo dino.
66006005	Un o tarno bakro pandas i triinti dori pre, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Un me shunom, har o triinto sorelo bolepaskro penas: "Ab!" Un me dikom i kalo grajes. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo his, koles his jek koowa an peskro wast, hoi sikrella, har pharo tchomone hi.
66006006	Un me shunom i rakepen, hoi was mashkral kote wi, kai kol star sorele bolepangre tardo hi, un penas: "Jek diwes hunte budrenn le, te ginenn le jek tcharo parno djob. Un jek diwes hunte budrenn le, te ginenn le triin tchare djob. O djet un i mool atchenna, har jon hi. Kolenge hunte plaissrenn le gar budeder."
66006007	Un o tarno bakro pandas i starti dori pre, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Un me shunom, har o starto sorelo bolepaskro penas: "Ab!"
66006008	Un me dikom i grajes. Kowa his parno har i mulo. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo his, koleskro lab his "Mulo." Un o merepen was pal leste. Un les was i soor dino, te marell lo i menshen ap o starto kotar i phubjatar. O charo, i diwje fiche, i bok un o nasslepen marenn len.
66006009	Un o tarno bakro pandas i pantchti dori pre, hoi rikras ko liil khetne. Un me dikom kol tsele menshen, kai rikran soreles ap o Debleskro lab, un sikran i menshende o Debleskro drom, un wan doleske maredo. Jon his tardo pash o Debleskri jag.
66006010	Un dan soreles gole un penan: "Baro Dewel un tchatcho rai, ab sik un rake i phagi wi pral kolende ap i phub, kai maran men. De len ko tchilatchepen pale, hoi jon ap mende kran!"
66006011	Un hakenes lendar las i parno ripen. Un jek penas ap lende: "Mukenn tele i tikno tsiro! Tumare phrala, kai budrenn o Debleske har tumer budran, kolendar wenna ninna maredo, jaake bud har o Dewel mukell, te wenn le maredo."
66006012	Un me dikom, har o tarno bakro i shobti dori pre pandas, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Koi trissas i phub soreles. Un o kham was kalo har i kalo gono. Un o tselo tchon was lolo har o rat.
66006013	Un i bolepangre momlia peran ap i phub, jaake har perenn i brola ap i phub tele, te phurdell i sorelo ducho an i broleskro ruk.
66006014	Un o bolepen tsardas pes khetne, har i liil, hoi khetne uledo wella. Un kek berga atchas, kai his li tardo, witar gar kek them, hoi an i pani tchiddo hi.
66006015	Un i tsele menshe khatran pen: i raja pral i themma ap i phub, i bare un i brawele, i lurdengre pralstune un wawar pralstune, ninna i budepangre un lengre raja. Jon khatran pen an i phub, un mashkral i bare barra,
66006016	un penan ap kol berge un ap kol bare barra: "Perenn ap mende, un khatrenn men kolestar, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un koi bari choljatar, hoi ko tarno bakres hi!
66006017	Ko baro diwes was, kai lengri choli ap mende wella. Un kek nashte nashell lengri choljatar krik."
66007001	Un pal kowa dikom me star bolepangren. Kolla his tardo ap kol star riga i phubjatar, un rikran ko sorelo ducho pale, hoi phurdell dran hake star riga pral i phub. Jon rikran les pale, te phurdell lo gar pral i phub, witar gar pral o baro pani, witar gar pral i tsele ruka.
66007002	Un me dikom i wawar bolepaskres. Kowa was kol rigatar, kai o kham pre djala. Un job kras i sikepen ap kolende, kai o djido Debleske koi hi. Un job das soreles gole ap kol star bolepangre, kolen i soor dino was, te dukrenn le i phub un o baro pani.
66007003	Un job penas ap lende: "Ma dukrenn i phub un o baro pani, witar gar i ruka, jaake raha har mer kram gar i sikepen glan ap i shere kolendar, kai maro Debleske budran."
66007004	Un me shunom kitse menshe ko sikepen lan. Kolla his jek-sheel-te-star-deesh-te-star serja menshe (144.000), kai wan dran i tsele menshendar, kai wenna pal i deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawende.
66007005	-
66007008	Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Juda. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Ruben. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Gad. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Asser. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Naftali. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Manasse. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Simeon. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Levi. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Issachar. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Sebulon. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Josef. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Benjamin.
66007009	Pal kowa dikom me bud menshen, jaake bud, te nai penell kek, kitse jon hi. Kolla wenna dran hako them, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen. Un jon his khetne tardo glan o rajeskro beshepaskro un glan ko tarno bakro. Len his parne ripja ap lende un bare patria an lengre wasta.
66007010	Un jon dan soreles gole: "Mer sharah maro Debles, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi un ko tarno bakres! Jon lan men win dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen."
66007011	Un i tsele bolepangre his tardo trul o rajeskro beshepaskro un trul i tchatchepangre phurende un trul i star sorele bolepangre. Un jon witsran pen glan o rajeskro beshepaskro tele o mujeha ap i phub, un sharan o Debles.
66007012	Un jon penan: "Hi mishto, te giwas mer gilja maro Debleske, hoi les hadenna, un hoi les bares krenna. Leskro railepen un goswepen hi baro. Hi mishto, te parkras men pash leste, un te sharas les. Les hi bari soor, kanna un hako tsireske. Amen!"
66007013	Un jek kol tchatchepangre phurendar putchas mandar: "Koon hi kolla, kai hi len parne ripja ap lende? Kai wan le?"
66007014	Un me penom ap leste: "Miro rai, tu djineh les." Un job penas ap mande: "Kolla wan soreles palla lino, un wan wi dran ko pharo tsiro. Un jon thowan pengre ripja, un kran len parno an o tarno bakreskro rat."
66007015	Doleske hi le tardo glan o Debleskro beshepaskro un hi leskre rashaja an leskro kheer, un hi leske koi o tselo diwes un i tseli rat. Un kowa, kai ap o Debleskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, djiwell pash lende, un dell jak ap lende.
66007016	Un jon hunte bokenn buder gar, witar gar trushenn le buder. Un o kham chatchrell len buder gar, witar kek wawar tatepen.
66007017	O tarno bakro, hoi mashkral o Debleskro beshepaskro hi, kowa dell ap lende garda, har i bakrengro rai ap peskre bakre garda della, un anell len pash o pani, hoi o djipen della. Un o Dewel khossell hake swar ap lengre jaka tele.
66008001	Un har o tarno bakro i eftati dori pre pandas, hoi ko liil khetne rikras, rakras kek buder an o bolepen. I tikno tsiro rakran le tchi buder.
66008002	Un me dikom kol efta bolepangren, kai glan o Debleskro beshepaskro tardo hi. Kolla lan efta bashepangren, te phurdenn le dre.
66008003	Un i wawar bolepaskro was, un djas pash o Debleskri jag. Les his i sonakaskro tcharo an o wast, an koleste gudlo kasht chatchedo wella, hoi mishto sungella. Un ko bolepaskro las bud gudlo kasht, te chatchrell lo les ap o Debleskro sonakaskro bob, hoi glan o Debleskro beshepaskro tardo hi, te well o latcho sungepen khetne o mangepaha, hoi o Debleskre tchawe o Deblestar mangan.
66008004	Un ko latcho sungepen hadas pes pre dran leskro wast, un djas glan o Debleste khetne o mangepaha kol Debleskre menshendar.
66008005	Un ko bolepaskro las ko tcharo, an koleste ko gudlo kasht chatchedo wella, un kras les pherdi jag, hoi job dran o Debleskri jag las, un tchoras o tcharo wi ap i phub. Koi das jag karje pral un tele, un das bari soreli gole, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin, un te djal jag tele ap i phub. Un i phub trissas soreles.
66008006	Un kol efta bolepangre, kai his len kol efta bashepangre, lan len an i wasta, te phurdenn le dre.
66008007	Un o glanstuno phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Koi das brishin, hoi his har barra, un jag o rateha mashkral ap i phub. Un o triinto kotar i tseli phubjatar chatchras, un o triinto kotar i tsele rukendar chatchras, ninna o tselo senlepen.
66008008	Un o duito bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Koi was i bari kotar bar, hoi chatchella, an o baro pani witsedo. Un o triinto kotar o tselo baro panjestar was har o rat.
66008009	Koi meras o triinto kotar lauterestar, hoi an o baro pani djiwas. Ninna hako triinto panjeskro ulepaskro djas paash.
66008010	Un ko triinto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri: Un i bolepaskri momeli chatchas har jag, un peras tele ap i phub. Un koja peras ap o triinto kotar hako lengsto panjestar, ninna ap ko pani, hoi wella dran i phub wi.
66008011	Un koi bolepaskri momeli kharell shut. Un o triinto kotar kol panjestar was shutlo. Un bud kol menshendar, kai pijan ko pani, meran lestar.
66008012	Un o starto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Un o kham las i dab, un o triinto kotar lestar was kalo. Ninna o tchon un i wawar bolepangre momlia lan i dab. Un o triinto kotar lendar was kalo. Jaake chatchas o kham gar ap o triinto kotar ap o diwes, witar gar chatchan o tchon un i bolepangre momlia ap o triinto kotar an i rati.
66008013	Un me dikom dur pral ap o bolepen i baro tchirkles, un shunom, har job gole das: Bibacht, bibacht, bibacht! Te phurdenn i wawar triin bolepangre an pengre bashepangren, palle wella i bari bibacht ap kolende, kai ap i phub djiwenna.
66009001	Un o pantchto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Un me dikom i bolepaskri momeli, hoi tele ap i phub peras. Un koja kras o telstunepen pre.
66009002	Koi was i jagakri khand dran o telstunepen wi, har i jagakri khand dran i baro bob wi wella. Un koi jagakri khand hadas pes pre, un tchakras o kham un o bolepen, jaake te was rati.
66009003	Dran koi jagakri khand wan stepangre win ap i phub. Kolla lan i soor, te denn le tchurje, jaake har i skorpione denn tchurje.
66009004	Un lenge was penlo, te dukrenn le gar o senlepen ap i phub, witar gar i ruka. Jon hunte dukrenn kol menshen kokres, kai kek Debleskro sikepen glan ap lengre shere hi.
66009005	Kol menshen hunte dukrenn le pantch tchon, un hunte marenn len gar. Lengre duka wenn jaake baro, har te dans len i skorpione tchurje.
66009006	Un an ko tsiro kamenn i menshe te merell, un nashte merenn gar. Lengro dji nashell pal o merepen, un o merepen nashell lendar.
66009007	Un kol stepangre his har graja, kai djan an o kurepen. Un hakenes his ap leskro shero tchomone har i shereskro sonakai, jaake har bare rajen hi. Un lengre muja his jaake, har wans le menshengre muja.
66009008	Un lengre balla his har djuwjengre balla. Un len his danda har i bari diwji margodja.
66009009	Un ap lengro betch his len sasterne gada. Un koi gole, hoi lengre mussja kran, his har koi gole, hoi bud wurdja pengre grajentsa krenn, kai an o kurepen nashenna.
66009010	Un len his porja, un dan tchurje har i skorpione tchurje denna. Un lengri soor his an lengre porja, te dukrenn le i menshen pantch tchonna.
66009011	Un len hi i rai pral pende. Kowa hi o bolepaskro pral o telstunepen. Kowa kharell ap hebretikes Abadon. Un ap grichtikes kharell lo Apoljon.
66009012	Jek bibacht was ap i menshende. Un dui wawar wenn pal kaja.
66009013	Un o shobto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Un me shunom i rakepen. Kowa was win dran kol star shinga, hoi ap o Debleskro sonakaskro bob hi, ap koleste gudlo kasht o Debleske chatchedo wella. Ko sonakaskro bob hi glan o Debleste tardo.
66009014	Un ko rakepen penas ap ko shobto bolepaskro, kai hi les koi bashepaskri an o wast: "Muk kol star bolepangre te djal, kai pash o baro pani Eufrat pandlo hi! Kre lengre shelle pre!"
66009015	Un kol starenge wan lengre shelle pre kerdo, te krenn le koi budi, hoi hunte krenn le ap kau diwes, an kau tchon, an kau bersh: Jon hunte marenn hako triinto menshes ap i phub.
66009016	Un me shunom, kitse lurde ap pengre graja an o kurepen djan. Kolla his biish serja kope deesh serja.
66009017	Un me dikom kol grajen un kolen, kai ap lende klissenna. Kolengre sasterne gada his lolo har i jag un blaueto un djilto. I grajen his shere har bare diwje margodja. Un dran lengre muja was jag un khand, hoi marella.
66009018	Koi jag un koi khand maran hako triinto menshes.
66009019	I grajen hi lengri soor an lengre muja un an lengre porja. Lengre porja hi har sapa, un len hi shere. Kolentsa dukrenn le i menshen phares.
66009020	Un kol wawar menshe, kai gar maredo wan, kolla mukan gar pengro tchilatcho drom, un mukan gar tele, te mangenn le kowa an, hoi jon pen pengre wastentsa kran. Jon mukan gar tele, te mangenn le i bengen an, witar gar kol figuren dran sonakai, rup, saster, barra un kasht, hoi gar nai dikenna, un gar nai shunenna, un gar nai nashenna.
66009021	Un jon mukan gar pengro bengeskro koowa un pengro wi-ladjedo koowa, un mukan gar tele te marell un te tchorell.
66010001	Un me dikom i wawar sorelo bolepaskres dran o bolepen tele te well. I wolka his trul leste har i ripen. Un i brishineskro bogo his ap leskro shero. Leskro mui his har o kham, un leskre herja har dran jag.
66010002	Un les his i liil an peskro wast, hoi gar khetne uledo his. Un job tchiwas peskri tchatchi heri ap o baro pani, un i serwi heri ap i phub.
66010003	Un job das soreles gole, har i bari diwji margodja soreles gole della. Un har job gole das, shunom efta sorele gole dran o bolepen.
66010004	Har me kamom kol laba, hoi shunom, pre te tchinell, penas jek dran o bolepen ap mande: "Ma tchin ko bolepaskro rakepen pre, te djinell les kek!"
66010005	Un ko bolepaskres, kai dikom ap o baro pani un ap i phub tardo, kowa hadas peskro tchatcho wast pre an o bolepen,
66010006	un das pes sowel pash koleste, kai djiwella kanna un hako tsiro, kowa hoi o bolepen kras, un lauter, hoi an leste hi, ninna i phub un lauter, hoi ap late hi, un ninna o baro pani, un lauter, hoi an leste hi. Un o bolepaskro penas: "O tsiro hi trujal."
66010007	An kol diwessa, kai o eftato bolepaskro rakrella, un an peskri bashepaskri phurdella, hi lauter kerdo, hoi o Debles an o dji his, te kras lo les jaake har job ap peskre budepangre penas, te well kowa.
66010008	Un kowa, kai dran o bolepen ap mande rakras, rakras pale mantsa, un penas ap mande: "Dja pash ko bolepaskro, hoi ap o baro pani un ap i phub tardo hi! Un le o liil dran leskro wast!"
66010009	Un me djom koi, un penom ap leste: "Mangau tut, de man ko liil!" Un job penas ap mande: "Le les, un cha les pre! O liil well tuke phares an tiro per tchiddo, ninna te hi lo gudlo har o gwin an tiro mui."
66010010	Un me lom ko liil dran leskro wast, un chom les pre. Un an miro mui his lo gudlo har gwin. Un har chom les pre, his lo mange phares an o per tchiddo.
66010011	Un jon penan ap mande: "Tu hunte rakress pale pral kowa, hoi wella pral i menshende un lengre rajende, kai djiwenna an bud themma, kai wenna dran bud natione, un rakrenna bud wawar rakepen."
66011001	Un jek das man i kasht an o wast, un penas ap mande: "Tchip kowa ap o tselo Debleskro baro kheer, un dik palla, har baro kowa hi. Dik ninna palla, har baro o Debleskri chapaskri hi. Un dik, kitse menshe kote o Debles sharenna!
66011002	Un ko kotar phub glan o Debleskro baro kheer, kote tchip ko kasht gar pre. Ko kotar phub well kolende dino, kai kek bibolde hi. Un jon stakrenn o Debleskro foro khetne star-deesh-te-dui tchon.
66011003	Un me bitchrau dui rakepangren an ko foro. Kolla penenn i menshenge o tchatchepen pral mande. Lengre ripja hi kerdo dran gone. Deesh-te-dui-sheel-te-shob-desha (1.260) diwessa penenn jon lenge mire laba."
66011004	Kolla dui mursha hi kol dui djeteskre ruka un kol dui momlia, hoi hi tardo glan o Debleste, kai hi o rai pral kai phub.
66011005	Un te kamell jek te dukrell lo len, palle djal i jag dran lengro mui win, un chatchrell les pre. Jaake merenn lauter kolla, kai kamenn len tchilatchepen te krell.
66011006	Len hi i soor, te rikrenn le o brishin pale, jaake te dell kek brishin ap ko tsiro, kai jon o Debleskro lab penenna. Un len hi i soor pral o pani, te nai krenn le dran kol tsele panja rat. Ninna hi len i soor, te nai anenn le haki bibacht pral i phub, jaake bud kope, har jon kamenna.
66011007	Un te rakran jon i tsele laba, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, palle well o ficho dran o telstunepen pre. Un ko ficho hi sorleder har jon, un marell len.
66011008	Un kal mule mursha hi ap o drom tchiddo an ko baro foro, kai ninna lengro rai ap o trushel maredo was. Kau foro hi har o foro Sodom un har o them Egiptia.
66011009	Un bud menshe dran hako them, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen dikenn kol mule murshen ap o drom tchiddo triin diwessa un i paash diwes, un mukenn gar, te wenn jon paskedo.
66011010	I menshe ap i phub hi bachtelo, un giwenna un khelenna. Un jek bitchrell o wawareske shukar koowa. Jaake bachtelo hi le, te hi kol dui Debleskre rakepangre mulo, kai dukran kolen, kai ap i phub djiwenna.
66011011	Un me dikom: Pal kol triin-te-paash diwessa kras o Dewel len pale djido. Un jon stan pre. Un i bari daar tapras kolen, kai kowa dikan.
66011012	Un kol dui shunan i sorelo rakepen dran o bolepen, hoi ap lende penas: "Awenn kate pre!" Un jon djan an o bolepen pre. Un lauter kolla, hoi chojedo ap lende his, dikan kowa.
66011013	Un ap jek kopo trissas i phub soreles. Un o deshto kotar ko forestar peras khetne. Un efta serja (7.000) menshe wan maredo. Un kol wawaren tapras i bari daar, un jon sharan o Debles, kai an o bolepen hi.
66011014	I duiti bibacht hi pal lende. Un i triinti bibacht wella sik.
66011015	Un ko eftato bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Koi his i rakepen an o bolepen, un bud dan bari gole, un penan: "Kanna hi o Dewel un leskro tchawo, o Jesus Kristo, i raja pral i tsele menshende ap i phub hako tsireske."
66011016	Un kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure, kai glan o Debleste ap pengre beshepangre beshdo hi, kolla witsran pen glan o Debleste tele, un sharan les,
66011017	un penan: Mer parkrah men pash tute, maro rai. Tu hal o sorelo Dewel. Tu djiweh kanna har djiwal an o phuro tsiro. Tu sikral tiri bari soor, un wal o rai pral halauter.
66011018	I tsele natione choiran pen pral tute. Doleske was tiri choli pral lende. Kanna hi o tsiro kai, te well o tchatchepen wi-rakedo pral i mulende. Kanna was ko tsiro, te dess tiro brawlepen kolende, kai tuke budran, kai an tiro lab rakran, lauterende, kai tire menshe hi, un tut sharenna, un tutar darenna, i tikne har i bare. I tsiro hi ninna kai, te maress kolen, kai i menshen ap i phub maran.
66011019	Un o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen was pre kerdo. Un an o Debleskro kheer dikom me ko sonakaskro mochton, hoi sikrella, kai o Dewel o maal peskre menshendar hi. Un i jag das karje dran o bolepen pre te tele. Un o bolepen das bari gole, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen della, te dell baro brishin un te djal jag tele dran o bolepen. Un i phub trissas, un das brishin har bare barra.
66012001	Un i baro koowa sikras pes ap o bolepen: I djuwel hi koi. Kolakro ripen hi o kham. Un tel lakre pire hi o tchon. Un ap lakro shero hi deesh-te-dui bolepangre momlia.
66012002	Un joi hi an wawar koowa, un lakro tarnepen kamell te well. Un joi dell gole i dukatar.
66012003	Un i wawar baro koowa sikras pes ap o bolepen: I baro lolo sap was. Un les hi efta shere un deesh shinga. Un ap hako shero hi i shereskro sonakai.
66012004	Un leskri pori tsardell o triinto kotar kol bolepangre momlijendar krik, un witsras len tele ap i phub. Un ko baro lolo sap hi glan koi djuwjate tardo, kai an o tsiro was, te well o tarnepen. Un jaake sik, har ko tarnepen wals, kamas les lo pre te chal.
66012005	Un joi las i mursh tchawes. Kowa te well o rai pral i menshende an i tsele themma ap i phub. Job anell len i sasterno wasteha. Un lakro tchawo was pre hadedo pash o Debleste, un pash leskro beshepaskro.
66012006	Un koi djuwel nashas an o mulo them, kai kek menshe djiwenna. Kote hi o Debles lake i kotar phub, kai atchell li deesh-te-dui-sheel-te-shob-deesh (1.260) diwessa, un lell halauter, hoi lat hunte wella djipaske.
66012007	Un an o bolepen was i baro kurepen: O Michael un leskre bolepangre kuran pen o baro lolo sapeha un leskre kurepangre.
66012008	Un o Michael un leskre bolepangre his sorleder. Un o baro lolo sap un leskre kurepangre nashte atchenn buder gar an o bolepen.
66012009	Un o baro lolo sap was wi witsedo. Job hi ko phuro sap, hoi kharella ninna Beng un Satan, ko chocheno, kai tsardell i menshen ap i tseli phub ap peskro drom. Job was tele witsedo ap i phub, un leskre kurepangre leha.
66012010	Un me shunom i sorelo rakepen an o bolepen, hoi penas: Kanna las men maro Dewel dran o bengeskro wast win. Maro Dewel sikras peskri soor, un was o rai pral i tsele menshende ap i phub. Un job das peskri tseli soor koles, kai job wi rodas, te well lo o baro rai pral halauter. Tele witsedo hi ko phukepaskro, kai anas i doosh ap mare phralende glan o Debleste o diwes un i rati.
66012011	Mare phrala his sorleder har ko phukepaskro. O tarno bakro, hoi maredo was, kowa thowas lengri doosh peskro rateha tele. Mare phrala sikran i menshende o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste, ninna te wan le doleske maredo.
66012012	Lauter kolla, kai djiwenna an o bolepen, lengro dji dell gole i bachtjatar. Kol wawar, kai djiwenn ap i phub un ap o baro pani, i bibacht well ap lende. Pash lende was o beng. Leske atchell gar bud tsiro. Kowa djinell lo. Doleske hi les i bari choli.
66012013	Un har ko baro lolo sap dikas, te was lo ap i phub witsedo, las lo koi djuwjat palla, kai ko tchawes las.
66012014	Un koi djuwjake wan tchirklengre mussja dino, har i baro tchirkles hi, te nai djal li an o mulo them ap ko kotar phub, kai joi nai djiwella dur krik ko sapestar. Kote atchell li triin-te-paash bersha. Un kote lell li halauter te chal un te pijell.
66012015	Un ko sap kras peskro mui pre, un tchungras bud sorelo pani pal koi djuwjate win, te tassell li an ko pani.
66012016	Koi kras i phub peskro mui pre, un pijas ko tselo sorelo pani, hoi ko baro lolo sap dran peskro mui win tchungras.
66012017	Un ko baro lolo sap was chojedo ap koi djuwjate, un djas koi, te marell lo lakre tchawen. Kolla hi kol menshe, kai shunenn ap o Debleskro lab, un djan ap o Jesuseskro drom.
66012018	Un o baro lolo sap his pash o baro pani tardo.
66013001	Un me dikom dran o baro pani i fiches pre te well. Koles his deesh shinga un efta shere. Un ap haki shing hidjas lo i shereskro sonakai. Un ap leskre shere his sawe laba tchindlo, hoi praassenn o Debles.
66013002	Un ko ficho, hoi me dikom, his har i bari diwji margodja. Leskre herja his baro un sorelo. Un an leskro mui his bare danda. Un ko baro lolo sap das les peskri soor un peskro beshepaskro, te was ko ficho i baro rai, koles bud penepaske hi.
66013003	Un jek leskre sherendar his, har te wals lo maredo. Un les hi i baro tchinepen. Un ko tchinepen was sasto. Un i tsele menshe ap i phub kran bare jaka un djan ko ficheske palla.
66013004	I menshe djinan, kowa his o baro lolo sap, hoi das o ficheste peskri soor. Doleske sharan le o lolo sapes. Un jon sharan ninna o fiches, un penan: "Kek hi sorleder har o ficho! Kek nai kurell pes leha un well sorleder!"
66013005	Un o ficho rakras un phurdas pes pre un praassas o Debles. Star-deesh-te-dui (42) tchonna nai kras o ficho kowa.
66013006	Un job praassas o Debles, un rakras djungeles pral leskro lab un leskro kheer. Ninna kolen, kai an o bolepen djiwenna, praassas lo.
66013007	Un o Dewel mukas o fiches te kurell lo pes o Debleskre menshentsa, un mukas, te well lo sorleder har jon. Un kol fiches was i soor pral i menshende dran hake themma, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen.
66013008	Lauter, hoi ap i phub djiwenna, sharenn ko fiches, - lauter kolla, kolengre laba gar tchindlo hi an o djipaskro liil. Kolla, kai lengre laba dre tchindlo hi an kau liil, hi jaake raha dre tchindlo, har i phub koi hi. Kau liil hi o tarno bakres, hoi maredo was.
66013009	Tumer lauter, shunenn mishto, hoi tumenge penau!
66013010	Koon stildo hunte well, kowa well stildo. Koon o chareha maredo hunte well, kowa well o chareha maredo. Doleske hunte wenn o Debleskre menshe soreles tardo an o patsepen, te denn le gar pre.
66013011	Un me dikom i wawar fiches dran i phub pre te well. Un les his dui shinga har i tarno bakro. Un job rakras har o baro lolo sap.
66013012	Les hi i tseli soor, hoi ninna ko fiches hi, hoi dran o baro pani was. Un ko duito ficho kras, te sharenn i tsele menshe ap i phub ko fiches, hoi dran o baro pani was, koles ko baro tchinepen his, un pale sasto was. Un ko ficho, hoi dran o baro pani was, kowa dikas lauter, hoi ko duito ficho kras,
66013013	-
66013014	un das koles i soor, te krell job baro koowa, jaake baro, te mukas lo ninna i jag dran o bolepen glan i menshende tele te perell. Un kowa kras lo, te anell lo i menshen ap i phub ap o bengeskro drom. Job penas lenge, te krenn le penge i fiches, hoi wi-dikella har ko ficho, kai les his o tchinepen o charestar, un dran kowa meras, un pale djido was.
66013015	Un ko duito ficho las i soor, te krell lo ko fiches djido, hoi i menshe penge kran, jaake te nai rakrell kowa ninna, un te nai krell job, te wenn lauter maredo, kai les gar an-mangenna.
66013016	Un i tsele menshe hi an o wast ko fichestar: I bare har i tikne, i brawele har i tchorwele, i raja un i budepangre. Kolla lauter hunte krenn i sikepen ap pende. Hi sawe, kai hunte tchinenn les ap pengro tchatcho wast. Wawar hunte tchinenn les glan ap pengro shero.
66013017	Ko sikepen nai well o ficheskro lab, ninna leskri numra. Koles, kai ko lab gar ap peste hi, witar gar leskri numra, kowa nashte ginell tchi, un nashte bikrell tchi.
66013018	Kate hunte well men goswepen. Koon gosewo hi, kowa nai hatsell ko lab win. Ko lab hi i mensheskro lab. Leskri numra hi triin shoba (666).
66014001	Un me dikom ko tarno bakres ap i berga Zion tardo. Un leha his jek-sheel-te-star-deesh-te-star serja (144.000) menshe. Kolen hi o Jesuseskro lab un o lab leskro dadestar glan ap lengre shere tchindlo.
66014002	Un me shunom i gole dran o bolepen. Kai gole his jaake sorelo har bud panja gole denna, un har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin, un te dell jag karje tele ap i phub. Kai gole his ninna jaake har o bashepen, hoi kol bashepangre krenna, hoi harfe kharenna.
66014003	Un jon giwenn i newi gili glan o rajeskro beshepaskro, un glan kol star sorele bolepangre un glan kol tchatchepangre phurende. Un kek nai giwas koi gili, har kokres kol jek-sheel-te-star-deesh-te-star serja (144.000) menshe. O tarno bakro plaissras lenge peskro rateha, te lell lo len i phubjatar wi, un te anell lo len khetne o Debleske.
66014004	Kolengro djipen hi djudjo. An kek tsireske wan le khetne i djuwjaha. Un jon djan o tarno bakreske palla, kai job ninna djala. Dran i menshende ap kai phub las job len khetne peske un o Debleske.
66014005	An lende hi kek chochepen, witar kek tchilatchepen.
66014006	Un me dikom i wawar bolepaskres dur pral ap o bolepen. Kowa hunte penas i menshenge o latcho lab, hoi atchella un gar pre-herella. Job penas les i tsele menshenge, hoi ap i phub djiwenna, haki nationa, haki harmenationa, hako rakepen, un an hake themma.
66014007	Un job das bari gole: "Darenn o Deblestar un sharenn les! Ko tsiro hi kanna kai, kai job o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende wi-rakrella. Witsrenn tumen tele glan koleste, kai kras o bolepen un i phub, un o baro pani, un mangenn les an!"
66014008	Un i duito wawar bolepaskro was pal leste, un penas: "O baro foro peras khetne. O baro foro Babilon peras khetne, ko foro, hoi anas i menshen an i tsele themma ap peskro drom, te kran le wi-ladjedo koowa. Kowa his jaake har te das lo len mool te pijell. Doleske was o Debleskri choli pral o foro."
66014009	Un i triinto wawar bolepaskro was pal lende, un das bari gole: "Kolla, kai mangenn o fiches an, un ko fiches, hoi was i menshendar kerdo, un kolla, kai tchinan leskro sikepen glan ap pengro shero, ninna ap pengro wast.
66014010	Jon hunte pijenn o Debleskri mool. Kai mool hi o Debleskri choli. Kaja hi jaake soreli har i mool, kai kek pani dren hi. Kolla, kai mangenn o fiches an, hunte djan an i bari jag. Un koi jag un i jagakri khand krenn lenge bare duka. Un jon dikenn o Debleskre bolepangren un o tarno bakres.
66014011	Un i khand koi jagatar, hoi krell len sawe bare duka, djal pre hako tsiro. Kolla, kai mangan o fiches an un ko kerdo fiches, un lan leskro sikepen ap pende, kolen hi duka o diwes un i rati.
66014012	Doleske hunte wenn o Debleskre menshe soreles tardo an o patsepen, kolla lauter, kai krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella, un djan tchatchepaha ap o Jesuseskro drom."
66014013	Un me shunom, har i rakepen dran o bolepen penas: "Tchin kowa an i liil dre: Kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi wella, hi kolla bachtele, kai merenna un rikran soreles pengro patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste." "Awa," penell o Debleskro Ducho, "lenge djal latches, un jon bistrenn pengri tseli phari budi. Kowa, hoi jon kran o Debleske hi gar bistedo an o bolepen."
66014014	Un me dikom i parni wolka. Koi pre his jek beshdo, hoi dikas wi har i mensho. Koles his ap leskro shero i shereskro sonakai, un an leskro wast his les i bangi tchuri, hoi mishto tchinella.
66014015	Un i wawar bolepaskro was wi dran o Debleskro baro kheer, un das ap koleste bari gole, hoi ap i wolka beshdo hi, un penas ap leste: I phub un i menshe koi pre hi har i hachetikri phub, kai o djob baro was. Le tiri bangi tchuri, un tchin ko djob tele un pande les khetne! I tsiro hi kanna kai, te tchineh les tele.
66014016	Un kowa, kai ap i wolka beshdo his, witsras peskri bangi tchuri pral i phub. Un o djob was tchindlo un khetne pandlo.
66014017	Un i wawar bolepaskro was wi dran o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen. Un les his ninna i tchuri, hoi mishto tchinella.
66014018	Un i wawar bolepaskro his pash o Debleskri jag tardo. Un job his o rai pral i jag. Kowa was glan, un das ap koleste soreles gole, koles koi latchi tchuri hi, un penas: "I phub hi har i drakengro ruk. Le tiri tchuri, un tchin i drake tele! I tsiro hi kanna kai, te tchineh len tele."
66014019	Un ko bolepaskro witsras peskri tchuri pral i phub, un tchinas i drake tele, un witsras len an i bari piri, kai wenn i drake stakedo. Koi bari piri hi o Debleskri choli.
66014020	Win glan o foro wan kol drake an koi bari piri stakedo. Un o rat nashas koi win, jaake bud, te djas o rat o grajenge pash lengre muja, un nashas triin-sheel (300) kilometarja dur.
66015001	Un me dikom i wawar baro koowa an o bolepen. Kowa his baro un dareno. Kote his efta bolepangre, kai anenn efta kope i bari phagi pral i phub. Pal koi eftati phagi well buder kek phagi. Palle hi o Dewel buder gar chojedo.
66015002	Un me dikom tchomone har i baro pani. Kowa his djudjo har i wali. Un jag his koi dre. Un pash o baro pani dikom me kolen, kai sorleder his har ko ficho un har ko ficho, hoi i menshendar kerdo was. Jon mukan witar gar, te was o ficheskro lab ap lende tchindlo. Un len his bashepangre, hoi kharenna harfe. Kolen das lende o Dewel an lengre wasta.
66015003	Un jon giwan koi gili, hoi o Debleskro budepaskro, o Mose, giwas. Jon giwan lat o tarno bakreske, un penan: Baro un shukar hi halauter, hoi tu kral, maro rai, tu sorelo Dewel! Mishto un tchatcho hi tire dromma, baro rai pral i tsele themma!
66015004	Tutar darella hakeno, tiro labestar penenn le: Har baro un shukar hi lo! Maro rai, o baro Dewel hal tu. Kek wawar hi jaake har tu. I raja wenna dran hake themma; glan tute witsrenn le pen tele, te sharenn le tut. Lauter dikan, har pal o tchatchepen tu djal, har tu i menshende lengri phagi dal.
66015005	Un pal kowa dikom, har koi kutch isema pre kerdo was an o Debleskro tikno kheer an o bolepen.
66015006	Un kol efta bolepangre, kai efta kope i bari phagi pral i phub anenna, kolla wan dran o Debleskro kheer win. Len his djudje parne ripja ap pende, un trul lengro betch buchle sonakangre dorja.
66015007	Kote his ninna kol star sorele bolepangre tardo. Un jek lendar das kol efta bolepangren efta sonakangre tchare an lengre wasta. An kol tchare his i choli o Deblestar, kai djiwell kanna un hako tsireske.
66015008	Un o Debleskro kheer his pherdo tampa, hoi was dran o Debleskro railepen un soor. Un kek nai djas kote an o Debleskro kheer dre, bis te anan kol efta bolepangre efta kope i bari phagi pral i phub.
66016001	Un me shunom, har jek dran o Debleskro kheer bari gole das un ap kol efta bolepangre penas: "Djan wi un tchorenn kol efta tchare, kai pherdo Debleskri choli hi, pral i phub win!"
66016002	Un o glanstuno bolepaskro djas un tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral i phub. Koi was i djungelo un tchilatcho nasslepen ap kol menshende, kai lan o ficheskro lab ap pende, un mangan o fiches an, hoi i menshendar kerdo was.
66016003	Un o duito bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral o baro pani. Un o pani was rat, har i mulestar. Un lauter meras, hoi an o baro pani djiwas.
66016004	Un o triinto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral kol bare un tikne panja, hoi wenna dran i phub wi. Un kolla wan rat.
66016005	Un me shunom, har penas ko bolepaskro, koles i soor pral i panja hi: "Tu, o baro Dewel, djiweh kanna, har djiwal an o phuro tsiro. O tchatchepaskro Dewel hal tu. Kowa, hoi tu rakreh, hi mishto un tchatcho.
66016006	Jon maran tire menshen, ninna tire rakepangren, un mukan lengro rat te nashell. Un kanna hunte pijenn le o rat. Kowa hi lengri phagi."
66016007	Un me shunom, har jek pash o Debleskri jag penas: "Awa, rai, maro sorelo Dewel, mishto kral, kai tu dal len sawi phagi."
66016008	Un o starto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral o kham. Un o kham las i soor, te nai chatchrell lo i menshen.
66016009	Un i menshe wan soreles chatchedo. Un jon praassan o Debles, kai das len koi phagi. Un jon mukan gar pengro tchilatcho drom, un sharan o Debles gar.
66016010	Un o pantchto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral o ficho un leskro them, kai job o rai hi. Un i rati was ap lende. Un leskre menshe dandran ap pengri tchip i dukatar.
66016011	Lengre duka dran o djungelo nasslepen his jaake baro, kai praassan le o Debles an o bolepen. Un jon mukan gar pengro tchilatcho koowa, hoi jon kran.
66016012	Un o shobto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo win pral o baro pani, hoi kharella Eufrat. Un ko pani djas pale. Jaake was i drom kerdo kol rajenge, kai wenna dran o them, kai o kham pre djal.
66016013	Un me dikom triin benga, hoi dikan win har djambe. Kolla wan wi, jek dran o baro sapeskro mui, jek dran o ficheskro mui, un jek dran ko rakepaskro mui, kai job i chocheno hi, un krell pes, har te wals lo i Debleskro rakepaskro.
66016014	Kolla triin benga krenn baro un sorelo koowa, un djan pash i rajende pral i tsele themma, te anenn jon pengre lurden khetne, te djan le an o kurepen ap o Debleskro baro diwes.
66016015	-
66016016	Un i triin benga anan len khetne an i them, hoi kharella ap hebretikes: Harmagedon. Kanna shunenn, hoi o Jesus Kristo penella! Job penella: "Me wau har i tchorepaskro. Bachtelo hi kowa, kai jak della, un gar sowella, un leskre koola ap leste hi, jaake te hi lo gar nango un ladjella."
66016017	Un o eftato bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi an o ducho, hoi djal pral i phub. Un dran o Debleskro kheer was i rakepen kote win, kai o rajeskro beshepaskro hi, un penas soreles: "Kanna hi lauter kerdo."
66016018	Koi das i jag dran o bolepen karje pre te tele, un was i bari gole wi, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin un te djal jag tele ap i phub. Un i phub trissas jaake soreles, har dikan le kowa gar jaake raha, har menshe ap i phub hi.
66016019	Un o baro foro phagas an triin kotja. Un i forja an i wawar themma peran khetne. O Dewel bistras ko baro foro Babilon gar, un mukas i menshen kote peskri choli te pijell har mool.
66016020	Un hako them, hoi an o baro pani tchiddo hi, djas tele. Un i berge his buder gar koi.
66016021	Un das brishin har bare barra. Kolla his jaake pharo har i mensho, un peran tele dran o bolepen ap i menshende. Har i menshe sawi bari phagi lan, praassan le o Debles.
66017001	Un jek kol efta bolepangrendar, kai hi len kol efta tchare an i wasta, kowa was pash mande, un penas: "Ab kai! Me kamau tut i phagi te sikrell, hoi ko foro lella, hoi pash bud panja tchiddo hi. Ko foro hi har i djuwel, kai kras wi-ladjedo koowa.
66017002	I bare raja ap kai phub tchiwan pen laha khetne. Ko wi-ladjedo koowa, hoi koi djuwel kras, hi har i mool, hoi pijan kolla, kai ap i phub djiwenna, un latar mato wan."
66017003	Un o Debleskro Ducho was pral mande. Un o bolepaskro anas man an o mulo them. Un me dikom i djuwel ap i lolo ficho beshdo, hoi les efta shere un deesh shinga his. Un ap koleste his sawe laba tchindlo, hoi praassenn o Debles.
66017004	Un koi djuwel his rido an i kutch lolo ripen. Un ap late hi sonakai un kutch barra un mirklia. Un lat his i sonakaskro khoro an lakro wast, pherdo djungelo koowa un sawo koowa, hoi hi pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Kau koowa was dran lakro wi-ladjedo djipen.
66017005	Un ap lakro shero his i lab tchindlo, hoi i menshe gar haiwan: "Koi bari Babilon, kolatar wella hako djunglepen un wi-ladjedo koowa ap i phub."
66017006	Un me dikom, kai koi djuwel mato his o ratestar, hoi nashas, har o Debleskre menshe maredo wan, kolla, kai patsan ap o Jesuseste un dan pengro patsepen gar pre. Un me nashte patsom gar, hoi dikom.
66017007	Un ko bolepaskro penas ap mande: "Hoske patseh tu gar, hoi dikeh? Me kamau tuke te penell, koon koi djuwel hi, un koon ko ficho hi, hoi lat hidjella, un koles kol efta shere un kol deesh shinga hi.
66017008	Ko ficho his djido, un djiwell kanna buder gar, un well dran o telstunepen pale pre. Un palle djal lo hako tsireske nashedo. I tsele menshe krenn bare jaka, te dikenn le, te well ko ficho pale, hoi djido his, un kanna buder gar djiwella. Jon hi kolla, kolengre laba gar dre tchindlo wan an o djipaskro liil, har i phub gomme gar koi his.
66017009	Kanna hunte well men goswepen, te haiwas kowa: I efta shere ko fichestar hi efta berge, ap kolende koi djuwel beshdo hi. Kal shere hi ninna efta bare raja:
66017010	Pantch kolendar meran, ko jek hi koi, un ko wawar was gomme gar. Un te well lo, hunte atchell lo i tikno tsiro.
66017011	Ko ficho, hoi djido his, un kanna buder gar djiwella, job hi o ochtato. Ninna hi lo jek kol eftendar, un djal hako tsireske nashedo.
66017012	Un kol deesh shinga, hoi dikal, hi deesh bare raja. Kolen hi kanna gomme kek penepaske pral i menshende. Well i diwes, kai well len i soor, te wenn le bare raja pral i menshende khetne o ficheha i tikno tsireske.
66017013	Kolla rikrenn khetne, te denn le pengri soor ko fiches, te well koles bud penepaske.
66017014	Un jon kurenn pen ko tarno bakreha. Un o tarno bakro hi sorleder har jon. Job hi o rai pral i tsele rajende, un o pralstuno pral i tsele pralstunende. Un pash leste hi kolla, kolen job gole das un wi rodas, kolla, kai ap leste patsenna."
66017015	Un o bolepaskro penas ap mande: "Tu dikal, kai beshell koi djuwel, hoi wi-ladjedo koowa krell, pash bud panja. Kol panja hi menshe dran haki harmenationa, dran hako them, haki nationa, un hako rakepen.
66017016	Un kol deesh shinga, hoi dikal, khetne o ficheha wenn le chojedo ap koi djuwel, un lenn lake lauter krik, hoi lat hi, jaake te hi li nango. Un jon chan lakro mass un chatchrenn lat pre.
66017017	Kowa das len o Dewel an lengre djia, te krenn jon, hoi job kamella. Doleske rikrenn le lauter khetne, un denn pengri soor ko ficheste. Kowa djala lauter jaake raha, bis te was lauter jaake, har o Dewel penas.
66017018	Un koi djuwel, hoi tu dikal, kaja hi ko baro foro, hoi hi les penepaske pral i bare rajende ap kai phub."
66018001	Pal kowa dikom i wawar bolepaskres, kai dran o bolepen tele wella. Koles his i bari soor. Un i phub was pherdo leskro railepen.
66018002	Un job das soreles un bares gole: "O foro peras khetne! O baro foro Babilon peras khetne! Kanna djiwenn kote i benga. Kote khatrenn pen kol tchirkle un wawar fiche, kai pale-tchiddo hi, un i menshe darenn lendar.
66018003	I Babilon tsardas i menshen an hake themma an bi-pandlo un wi-ladjedo koowa. Kowa his har mool, hoi i menshe pijan. Un i bare raja ap kai phub tchiwan pen laha khetne. Un i bikepangre un i parepangre wan brawelo dran lakro brawlepen."
66018004	Un me shunom, har jek wawar dran o bolepen rakras un penas: "Mire menshe! Djan dran ko foro win, te lenn tumer gar leskri doosh un leskri bibacht ap tumende!
66018005	Ko foro hi har i djuwel, hoi wi-ladjedo koowa kras. Lakri doosh hi jaake baro, te djal koi doosh an o bolepen pre. Un o Dewel bistras ko tchilatcho koowa gar, hoi joi kras.
66018006	Krenn ap late jaake, har joi ap tumende kras! Denn lat dui kope jaake bud tchilatchepen pale, har joi ap tumende kras! Denn lat i pipen te pijell, hoi hi dui kope sorleder har kowa, hoi joi das tumende te pijell!
66018007	Denn lat jaake bud duka un bibacht har his lat i shukar un brawelo djipen ap kai phub! Ninna kanna penell li an lakro dji: Me hom i bari rajetsa. Un man hi lauter doha. Un i bibacht well gar ap mande."
66018008	Doleske well i tseli bari bibacht ap jek kopo pral ko foro: merepen, ropen, un bok. Un i jag chatchrella ko foro pre. Sorelo hi o Dewel, maro rai, kai rakrell pral i menshen an o foro o tchatchepen wi, un dell len i tchatchi phagi.
66018009	Un i bare raja ap kai phub, kai tchiwan pen lentsa khetne un wan brawelo, kolla denna gole un rowenna, har jon dikenn, te chatchrella ko foro.
66018010	Dur glan o foro hi le tardo i darjatar, te well koi bibacht ninna ap lende, un jon penenna: "Dikenn! Hawi bibacht! Hawi bibacht! O baro foro Babilon, o sorelo foro! Leskri phagi was an jek tikno tsiro pral leste."
66018011	Un i bikepangre un i parepangre ap kai phub rowenna pral leste, un denna pengre wasta khetne pral o shero. Kek kamell buder lengro koowa te ginell:
66018012	Lengro koowa dran sonakai un rup, kutch barra un mirklia, latcho parno thann un kutch lolo thann, un phar, i tsele kutch kashta, hoi latcho sungenna, ninna shukar koowa, hoi kerdo was dran parne danda, dran kutch kasht, dran lolo un kalo saster, dran parne barra,
66018013	ninna o tselo kutch thulepen, un ko gudlo kasht, hoi sungella mishto, ninna mool un djet, un latcho jarro un djob, un grumja un bakre, un graja un wurdja, un ninna sawe menshe, kai hunte budrenn i wawarenge.
66018014	Ap ko foro Babilon penenn le: "Lauter, hoi tu kamal, nashral. Tiro tselo brawlepen un shukapen hi nashedo, un tu leh les buder gar pale."
66018015	Kol bikepangre un parepangre, hoi kol forestar brawelo wan, kolla hi dur lestar tardo i darjatar, te well gar leskri bibacht ap lende. Un jon rowenna un denna lengre wasta pral o shero khetne,
66018016	un penenna: "Hawi bibacht! Hawi bibacht! Dikenn, o baro foro! I menshe an leste his rido an latcho parno thann, un an kutch lolo thann, un phar. Un sonakai, un kutch barra, un mirklia his ap lende.
66018017	An jek tikno tsiro djas lengro tselo baro brawlepen paash un nashedo!" Dur glan o foro his ninna kolla tardo, kai ap o baro pani hi: I pralstune ap i panjeskre ulepangre, kolla, kai kol ulepangre ulerenna, un kolla, kai ap kol panjeskre ulepangre budrenna, un hakeno, koleskri budi ap o baro pani hi.
66018018	Kolla lauter dikan koi jag, hoi ko fores pre chatchras, un dan gole, un penan: "Kek foro his jaake shukar har kawa!"
66018019	Un jon lan tchik, un tchiwan les ap pengre shere un rowan, un dan lengre wasta pral o shero khetne, dan gole, un penan: "Hawi bibacht! Hawi bibacht! Dikenn, o baro foro! Leskro brawlepen kras lauter kolen brawelo, kai hi len panjeskre ulepangre ap o baro pani! Un an jek tikno tsiro peras ko foro khetne."
66018020	Awenn bachtelo, tumer, kai djiwenn an o bolepen! O baro foro hi paash! Awenn bachtelo, tumer Debleskre menshe! Awenn bachtelo tumer, kai han o Jesuseskre bitchepangre, ninna tumer, kai han o Debleskre rakepangre! Kowa, hoi o foro tchilatches kras ap tumende, das o Dewel ko fores pale.
66018021	Un i sorelo bolepaskro hadas i baro bar pre, un witsras les an o baro pani, un penas: "Jaake djal o baro foro Babilon i sorjaha tele. Un tchi buder atchell lestar.
66018022	Kek bashepen un kek gipen shunenn le buder kote. Kek budepaskro budrella buder koi. Kek djob hi buder koi, te well dran leste jarro kerdo.
66018023	I tsele momlia djan win. Un kek krella pale i momeli an. Tu shuneh buder kek pirno peskri pirnjaha khelell un giwell. I bikepangren un i parepangren an ko foro his bud penepaske ap kai phub. Un ko bengeskro koowa, hoi kran le an o foro, anas i menshen an i tsele themma ap o bengeskro drom.
66018024	Ninna nashas an o foro o rat, hoi ratan kol Debleskre rakepangre un o Debleskre menshe, kai kote maredo wan, awa, o rat kolendar lauter, kai ap i phub maredo wan."
66019001	Un pal kowa dan bud menshe an o bolepen bari gole: "Halleluja! Maro Dewel las men dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win. Job hi o rai, un les hi i soor pral halauter.
66019002	Latcho un tchatcho hi lo. I phagi, hoi job i menshen das, hi mishto un tchatcho. Job das i bari lubjat lakri phagi. Joi tsardas i menshen ap i tseli phub an wi-ladjedo koowa un maras o Debleskre budepangren. O Dewel das lat ko tchilatchepen pale, hoi joi ap lende kras."
66019003	Un jon penan o duito kopo: "Halleluja!" Un ko forestar djas i jagakri khand pre hako tsireske.
66019004	Un kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure un kol star sorele bolepangre witsran pen tele glan o Debleste, kai ap peskro rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un sharan les, un penan: "Amen, Halleluja!"
66019005	Un i rakepen was kotar, kai o Debleskro beshepaskro hi, un kowa penas: "Sharenn maro Debles, tumer lauter, hoi leske budrenna, un lestar darenna, tikne har bare!"
66019006	Koi dan bud menshe gole: "Halleluja!" Koi gole his jaake sorelo, har i baro pani gole della, hoi dur tele perella, un har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin un te dell jag tele karje. Un jon rakran un penan: "Maro sorelo Dewel was o rai pral lauter.
66019007	Te was bachtelo, te giwas un stas, un les sharas! O tsiro hi kanna kai, te romedinerell o tarno bakro. Un leskri pirni kras pes shukar, te djal li leha."
66019008	Un joi las i shukar ripen dran djudjo parno thann. Ko latcho parno ripen hi o tchatcho koowa, hoi o Debleskre menshe kran.
66019009	Un o bolepaskro penas ap mande: "Tchin an ko liil: Bachtele hi kolla, kai kharedo wan, te wenn le ap o tarno bakreskro bijab. Kal laba hi tchatchepaha o Debleskre laba," penas lo ap mande.
66019010	Un me witsrom man glan leste tele, te sharap les. Un job penas ap mande: "Ma kre kowa! Share o Debles! Me hom o Debleskro budepaskro har tu un tire phrala, kai sikrenn i wawar menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Kolen das o Jesus o Debleskro Ducho. Kowa sikrell len, te hi le leskre menshe."
66019011	Un me dikom, har o bolepen pre hi. Un kote his i parno grai. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo hi, kharella: Mursh labestar, kai rakrell o tchatchepen. Job te dell i menshen i phagi un kurell pes kolentsa, kai tchilatche hi, djal job pal o tchatchepen.
66019012	Leskre jaka hi har i jag. Un ap leskro shero hi bud sonakai bud kutch barentsa. Glan ap leskro shero hi i lab tchindlo. Koles prindjrell kek har job kokres.
66019013	Un leskro ripen hi an o rat dre tchiddo. Job kharell: O Debleskro lab.
66019014	Un i tsele bolepaskre kurepangre wan leske palla ap parne graja. Len his koola dran parno djudjo thann.
66019015	Un dran leskro mui well i charo wi, hoi latches tchinella. Koleha kurell lo pes i menshentsa an i tsele themma, un well sorleder har jon. Job anell len i sasterno wasteha. Jaake har jek i drake paash stakrella, te well i mool win, jaake stakrell lo kolen paash, kai gar ap leste shunenna, un anell i choli o sorelo Deblestar ap lende.
66019016	Ap leskro ripen un ap leskri pralstuni heri hi i lab tchindlo, hoi kharella: o rai pral i rajende un o pralstuno pral i pralstunende.
66019017	Un me dikom i bolepaskro an o kham tardo. Kowa das soreles gole, un penas ap i tsele tchirkle, kai denn pen dur pral an o bolepen. "Awenn kate pash o Debleskro baro chapen khetne,
66019018	un chan o mass kolendar lauterendar, kai wenn maredo: i bare raja, i pralstune, i lurde, i graja un kolla, kai pre beshdo hi, i raja un pengre budepangre, i bare un i tikne."
66019019	Un me dikom ko fiches un i rajen ap i phub pengre lurdentsa. Kolla wan khetne, te kurenn le pen koleha, kai ap o grai beshdo hi un leskre lurdentsa.
66019020	Un ko ficho was tapedo, ninna leskro chocheno rakepaskro. Ko rakepaskro kras bud baro koowa, un anas kolen ap o bengeskro drom, kai o ficheskro lab ap pende lan, un ko fiches an-mangan, hoi i menshendar kerdo was. Un djides wan kol dui an i bari jag witsedo, hoi soreles chatchella un khandella.
66019021	Un kol wawar wan maredo o chareha, hoi dran o mui kolestar win djas, kai ap ko grai beshdo hi. Un i tsele tchirkle chan lengro mass, un wan tchalo.
66020001	Un me dikom i bolepaskres dran o bolepen tele te well. Un koles hi i klidepaskro an o wast, te pandell lo o telstunepen pre. Ninna i sasterno shello hi an leskro wast.
66020002	-
66020003	Un job tapras ko baro lolo sap, kowa hi ko phuro sap, hoi kharella ninna Beng un Satan, un pandas les, un witsras les an o telstunepen, te atchell lo kote jek sero (1.000) bersh pandlo. Un o bolepaskro pandas i wudar tele, hoi anell an o telstunepen, jaake te krell kek o telstunepen pale pre. Un an ko sero bersh nai anell o beng i menshen buder gar o Debleskro dromestar tele. Pal ko tsiro hunte well lo i tikno tsiro win muklo.
66020004	Un me dikom kolen, kolenge o shero tele dino was doleske, kai rikran le soreles ap o Debleskro lab un sikran i menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Jon mangan gar ko fiches an, witar gar ko fiches, hoi i menshendar kerdo was. Un jon lan o ficheskro lab gar ap pengre shere, witar gar ap pengre wasta. Kalla lauter wan kanna djido. Jon hi beshdo ap i rajengre beshepangre, un lenn i soor, te rakrenn le o tchatchepen wi pral i menshende. Khetne o Jesus Kristeha hi le raja jek sero bersh.
66020005	Jon hi kolla, kai glanstunes i mulendar pre stan. Un kol wawar mule wenn gar djido, jaake raha har ko sero bersh gar trujal djan.
66020006	Bachtele hi kolla, kai hi mank kolende, kai wenn glanstunes i mulendar djido. Jon hi o Debleskre menshe, un merenn gar o duito kopo. Jon hi i rashaja o baro Deblestar un o Jesus Kristestar. Un khetne leha hi le raja pral lauter jek sero bersh.
66020007	Pal kol sero bersh well o beng dran peskro stilepen wi muklo.
66020008	Un job djal wi, te tsardell lo i menshen ap i tseli phub ap peskro drom. Kolla menshe kharenna Gog un Magog. Un jon hi jaake bud, te penell nai kek, kitse jon hi. O beng anell len khetne, te djan le an o kurepen o Debleskre menshentsa.
66020009	Un jon djan pral i tseli phub, un atchenn trul ko foro tardo, kai o Debleskre menshe djiwenna. Kowa hi ko foro, koles o Dewel kamella o tselo djijestar. Un palle well i jag dran o bolepen un chatchrell kol tsele kurepangren pre.
66020010	Un o beng, kai anas len ap peskro drom, well an i bari jag witsedo, hoi soreles chatchella un khandella. Kote hi ninna o ficho, un ko chocheno rakepaskro. Kote well len hako tsiro bare duka.
66020011	Un me dikom i baro parno beshepaskro un koles, kai pre beshdo hi. I darjatar nashas i phub un o bolepen glan leste krik. Un kek dikas len buder pale.
66020012	Un me dikom i mulen: i bare har i tikne. Jon his tardo glan o Debleskro beshepaskro. Un lila wan pre kerdo, kai tchindlo hi, hoi i menshe kran. Pale was ko djipaskro liil pre kerdo, kai kolla dre tchindlo hi, kai djiwenna hako tsiro. Un o tchatchepen was wi-rakedo pral kol tsele mulende jaake, har an i lila dre tchindlo hi.
66020013	Un o baro pani das peskre mulen win, kai an leste hi. Un o merepen un o mulengro them dan pengre mulen win, kai an lende hi. Un pral lende was o tchatchepen wi-rakedo jaake, har hakeno djiwas ap i phub.
66020014	-
66020015	Un o merepen un o mulengro them wan an i bari jag witsedo, ninna hakenes, koneskro lab gar an o djipaskro liil dre tchindlo hi. Koon an i bari jag witsedo wella, merell o duito kopo.
66021001	Un me dikom i newo bolepen un i newi phub. O phuro bolepen un i phuri phub his buder gar koi. Un o baro pani his buder gar koi.
66021002	Un me dikom o Debleskro foro, o newo Jerusalem, har was ko foro tele o Deblestar dran o bolepen. O foro his shukar kerdo har i tarni tchai, kai romedinerell un shukar kerdo was peskro romeske.
66021003	Un me shunom i sorelo rakepen. Kowa was kotar, kai o Debleskro beshepaskro tardo hi, un kowa penas: "Dikenn, o Debleskro kheer hi pash i menshende! Job djiwell pash lende. Un jon hi leskre menshe. Un o Dewel hi lengro Dewel kokres, un hi pash lende."
66021004	Un job khossella hake swar ap lengre jaka tele. Un o merepen dell gar buder, witar kek bibacht, kek ropen un kek duka. Kowa hoi his, dell gar buder.
66021005	Un kowa, kai ap o Debleskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, penas: "Dikenn, me krau lauter newes." Un ap mande penas lo: "Tchin kal laba an i liil! Kal laba hi tchatcho. Un jaake well lauter."
66021006	Un job penas pale: "Halauter was jaake, har penom. Mandar was halauter. Un lauter wella pale glan mande. Me hom o glanstuno un o palstuno. Kones trush hi, kowa lell mandar o djido pani tchitcheske.
66021007	Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, kowa lell kau shukar koowa mandar. Me wau leskro Dewel. Un job well miro tchawo.
66021008	Kol wawar djan an i bari jag, hoi soreles chatchella un khandella. Kote merenn le o duito kopo. Jon hi kolla, kai i darjatar gar mantsa djan, kolla, kai phukran ap pengro patsepen, kolla, kai djungelo koowa kran, kolla, kai maran wawaren, kolla, kai luberan pen trujal, kolla, kai bengeskro koowa kran, kolla, kai mangan wawar koowa an har o Debles, un i tsele chochene."
66021009	Un pash mande was jek kol efta bolepangrendar, kai tchoran kol efta tchare wi, te was efta kope i bari phagi pral i phub. Pal kowa was kek wawar phagi pral i phub. Ko bolepaskro was pash mande, un rakras mantsa, un penas: "Ab kai! Me sikrau tute koi tchat, kai rodas peske o tarno bakro wi, te romedinerell lo lat."
66021010	Un o Debleskro Ducho was ap mande. Un o bolepaskro anas man ap i bari, bari berga, un sikras mande o Debleskro foro Jerusalem, har ko foro tele was o Deblestar dran o bolepen.
66021011	Ko fores hi o Debleskro railepen, un hi jaake shukar, har ko kutch bar, hoi Jaspis kharella, jaake djudjo har djudji wali.
66021012	Trul o foro hi i bari barengri baar. An koi barengri baar hi deesh-te-dui bare wudja, ap kolende denn deesh-te-dui bolepangre jak. Un ap kol bare wudja hi i laba tchindlo kol deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawendar.
66021013	An i barengri baar hi ap haki rig triin bare wudja: Kote, kai o kham pre djala hi triin wudja, un kote, kai hi o kham shila, hi triin wudja, un kote, kai hi o kham tato hi, triin wudja, un kote, kai o kham tele djala, triin wudja.
66021014	Un koi barengri baar hi tardo ap deesh-te-dui sorele barra. Ap kolende hi i laba tchindlo kol deesh-te-dujendar, kai his o tarno bakreskre bitchepangre.
66021015	Un ko bolepaskro, kai mantsa rakras, koles his i sonakaskro kasht an leskro wast. Kol kashteha ginas lo tele, har baro o foro hi, un har baro lengre wudja hi, un har baro koi barengri baar hi, hoi djal trul o foro.
66021016	O fores hi star riga. Jek rig hi jaake baro har i wawar. Un o bolepaskro dikas pal har baro ko foro hi ko sonakaskro kashteha: Haki rig hi dui-serja-te-dui-sheel (2,200) kilometarja baro. O lengstepen, o buchlepen un o pralstunepen hi lauter jek barepen.
66021017	Un job tchiwas peskro kasht ap i barengri baar, hoi djal trul o foro, te dikell lo, har dur koja pral djala. Koja djal jek-sheel-te-star-deesh-te-star (144) mussja pral. Jek mussi baro pash leste hi emligo har jek mussi baro pash i menshende.
66021018	Un i barra an koi barengri baar, hoi djal trul o foro, hi kutch barra, hoi kharenna Jaspis. Un o foro hi dran o latcho sonakai, djudjo har i wali.
66021019	Un kol deesh-te-dui telstune sorele barra an koi barengri baar hi shukar un kutch barra. O glanstuno bar hi i Jaspis, un o duito bar hi i Safir, o triinto hi i Kalzedon, un o starto hi i Smaragdo.
66021020	Un o pantchto hi i Sardonix, un o shobto hi i Karneol, un o eftato hi i Krisolit, un o ochtato hi i Berill, un o enjato hi i Topas, un o deshto hi i Krisopras, un o deesh-te-jekto hi i Hiazint, un o deesh-te-duito hi i Ametist.
66021021	Un kol deesh-te-dui bare wudja hi deesh-te-dui mirklia hako baro wudar hi jek mirkli. Un kol dromma an ko foro his dran o latcho sonakai, djudjo har wali.
66021022	Un me dikom kek Debleskro kheer an ko foro, kai mangenn le o Debles an. O baro Dewel kokres, kai hi o rai pral halauter, hi mashkral lende, job un o tarno bakro.
66021023	Pral o foro hi buder kek kham un kek tchon. O Debleskro railepen hi har o kham, un o tarno bakro hi i momeli o foreske.
66021024	Un i menshe an wawar themma dikenn koi momeli un wenna pash leste. Un i bare raja ap i phub anenn pengro brawlepen an ko foro.
66021025	Un o foreskre bare wudja atchenn hako tsiro pre, un wenn buder gar pandlo. Della kek rati buder.
66021026	Un i menshe dran i wawar themma anenn pengro kutch un shukar koowa un pengro brawlepen an ko foro.
66021027	Un tchi well kote dre, hoi an o Debleskre jaka pale-tchiddo hi, witar kek mensho, kai djungelo koowa krella un chochella. Kolla wenna an ko foro dre, kolengre laba an o tarno bakreskro liil dre tchindlo hi. Kote hi kolla dre tchindlo, kai lenna o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
66022001	Un job sikras man o baro lengsto pani, hoi djudjo hi har i djudji wali. Ko pani dell o djipen un well kotar, kai hi o beshepaskro o Deblestar un o tarno bakrestar.
66022002	O pani nashell mashkral o baro drom. Ap haki rig o panjestar hi kol ruka tardo, kai denna o djipen. Ap lende wenna deesh-te-dui kope an i bersh rukengro chapen baro, hako tchon jek kopo. Un i patria kol rukendar krenn i menshen an i tsele themma sasto.
66022003	Kanna dell tchi buder, hoi hi glan o Debleste praassedo. Un o beshepaskro o Deblestar un o tarno bakrestar hi an o foro tardo. Un leskre budepangre hi leske koi,
66022004	un dikenn les pengre jakentsa. Un leskro lab hi glan ap lengre shere tchindlo.
66022005	An ko foro well buder gar rati. Len hunte well kek momeli, witar gar o kham, te dikenn le. O baro Dewel hi lengri momeli. Un jon hi bare raja hako tsireske.
66022006	Un o bolepaskro penas ap mande: "Kal laba hi tchatcho. Un jaake well kowa. O Dewel, maro rai, kai das peskre rakepangren peskro Ducho, kowa bitchras peskro bolepaskres, te sikrell lo peskre budepangren, hoi an i tikno tsiro hunte wella."
66022007	"Shunenn," penell o Jesus, "me wau sik. Bachtele hi kolla, kai rikrenn kal laba, hoi an kau liil tchindlo hi, an pengre djia. Kolla laba sikrenna, hoi wella."
66022008	Un me, o Johanni, hom kowa, hoi kawa shunas un dikas. Un har kowa shunom un dikom, witsrom man tele ap i phub glan o bolepaskro, te sharap les, koles, kai man kowa lauter sikras.
66022009	Un job rakras ap mande un penas: "Ma kre kowa! Me hom o Debleskro budepaskro har tu un tire phrala, kai o Debleskre rakepangre hi. Un me hom ninna jek kolendar, kai rikrenn kal laba an pengre djia, hoi an kau liil tchindlo hi. Ma share man! Share o Debles!"
66022010	Un pale penas job ap mande: Ma pande kau liil tele, kai kol laba tchindlo hi, hoi sikrenna, hoi hunte well. O tsiro hi gar dur, te well kowa jaake.
66022011	Koon tchilatcho koowa krella, kowa krell kowa. Un koon djungelo koowa krella, kowa krell kowa. Un koon an o tchatchepen djiwella, atchell an o tchatchepen! Un koon o Debleha djiwella, kowa atchell o Debleha!
66022012	Dik, me wau sik, un dau hakenes pal kowa, hoi job kras.
66022013	Mandar was halauter. Un lauter well pale glan mande. Me hom o glanstuno un o palstuno, kowa, kolestar lauter was, un koleha lauter pre-herell.
66022014	Bachtele hi kolla, kai pengre ripja djudjes thowenna. Jon nai chan ko rukestar, hoi o djipen della, un nai djan an kol bare wudja an ko foro dre.
66022015	Win hi kolla, kai mukan o Debleskro drom, kolla, kai kran bengeskro koowa, kolla, kai luberan trujal, kolla, kai maran wawaren, kolla, kai mangan wawar koowa an har o Debles, un hakeno, kai kamell un krell o chochepen.
66022016	Me, o Jesus, bitchrom miro bolepaskres pash tumende, te penell lo kau koowa i patslenge. Me hom o Davideskro tchawo. Me hom koi raili bolepaskri momeli, hoi djal pre taissarlake ap o bolepen."
66022017	O Debleskro Ducho un o tarno bakreskri pirni penenna: "Ab!" Un koon kowa shunell, penella: "Ab!" Un kones trush hi, kowa wella! Koon kamell, kowa lell tchitcheske o pani, hoi o djipen dell.
66022018	Lauter, kai shunenn kal laba an kau liil, hoi sikrenna, hoi wella, kolenge penau: Denn jak! Te tchiwell jek tchomone kate pashal an kau liil, pral koleste anell o Dewel koi bari bibacht, hoi an kau liil tchindlo hi.
66022019	Un te lell jek tchomone krik kal labendar, kai hi tchindlo an kau liil, palle lell o Dewel leskro chapen krik ko rukestar, hoi della o djipen. Ninna nai djal job gar an o Debleskro foro dre, pral hoi tchinom an kau liil.
66022020	Kowa, kai kawa penas, penella: "Awa, me wau sik." Amen. Ab rai Jesus!
66022021	O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, djal lauterentsa!
